name: ABRUZZO PECORINO - BARONE DI VALFORTE 2019
tastingDescription: 90 Points, Gismondi on Wine - "Pecorino the grape, not the cheese, is grown on north-facing, calcareous laced soils in Piomba and Colle Sale, [Abruzzo]. The nose is a cool amalgam of almonds, minerals, and Asian pears, with an electric undercurrent of wet stones, citrus, and scrubby Meditteranean countryside...It's a giveaway at under $20." (May 2020)

name: ABRUZZO PECORINO - SPINELLI
tastingDescription: False

name: ACCADEMIA - PROSECCO PRIDE
tastingDescription: False

name: ACQUESI  - ASTI
tastingDescription: Aromatic and sweet white sparkling wine, pale yellow color, the nose is fresh and intriguing, with hints of white flowers, peaches and citrus zest. Pairs well with pastries, pies or stuffed peaches. It makes an excellent dessert wine!

name: AGLIANICO DEL VULTURE - BASILISCO TEODOSIO 2016
tastingDescription: 90 Points, Wine Advocate: “This is a near-term Aglianico offered at a terrific value price. ...an ample and broad bouquet that is infused with dark spice, dried blackberry and a slightly malolactic hint of milk chocolate... The finish is long and dusty, but there there is enough primary fruit to make this a very presentable red to drink... Drink: 2018 - 2024.” (August 2018)

name: AIX EN PROVENCE ROSE - BIELER PERE & FILS CUVEE SABINE 2020
nameSanitized: aix en provence rose - bieler pere & fils cuvee sabine 2020
sort: AIX EN PROVENCE ROSE - BIELER PERE & FILS CUVEE SABINE 2020
tastingDescription: 90 Points, Vinous: "Fresh red berries, citrus fruits and floral notes on the fragrant nose. Dry and energetic in the mouth, offering lively strawberry, cherry and tangerine flavors that flesh out through the midpalate. Closes long and subtly spicy, with repeating citrus fruit and floral character."

name: AIX EN PROVENCE ROSE - CHATEAU BARBEBELLE ROSE FLEURI 2020
nameSanitized: aix en provence rose - chateau barbebelle rose fleuri 2020
sort: AIX EN PROVENCE ROSE - CHATEAU BARBEBELLE ROSE FLEURI 2020
tastingDescription: 93 Points, Decanter's Rose Wines of the Year 2020 - "Ripe stone fruit, summer berries and rose aromas. Raspberry and ripe cherry provide sunny, warm fruits on the palate that sit alongside balanced acidity and an appealing weight.

name: ALBET I NOYA - PETIT ALBET PENEDES BRUT RESERVA ORGANIC 2017
nameSanitized: albet i noya - petit albet penedes brut reserva organic 2017
nameSuffix: PETIT ALBET PENEDES BRUT RESERVA ORGANIC 2017
sort: ALBET I NOYA - PETIT ALBET PENEDES BRUT RESERVA ORGANIC 2017
tastingDescription: 90 Points, WineScores - "NEW, tasty, organic. A traditional Penedes blend of Macabeo, Xarelo-lo and Parellada. Melon and candied lemons, apple peel, powdery floral notes and wild herbs yeasty undertones. primary flavours of yellow tree fruits, and citrus. A tasty traditional-method sparkling delivering good persistence and gulp-ability." (Jan 18 2021)

name: ALENTEJANO - BOJADOR SPECIAL EDITION VINHO TINTO
nameSanitized: alentejano - bojador special edition vinho tinto
sort: ALENTEJANO - BOJADOR SPECIAL EDITION VINHO TINTO
tastingDescription: Decanter, 93 points: "Moreto has the starring role in this blend, setting the tone, with a flavoursome, mellow palate. Savoury oak and cured leather notes lead on the nose and palate. Rich gusty dried fig and spicy, bay-leaf-accented currant fruit throughout. Ripe mouth-coating tannins lend depth, whilst persistent mineral acidity brings length of flavour."

name: ALENTEJANO - CASA SANTOS LIMA QUID PRO QUO
nameSanitized: alentejano - casa santos lima quid pro quo
nameSuffix: CASA SANTOS LIMA QUID PRO QUO
sort: ALENTEJANO - CASA SANTOS LIMA QUID PRO QUO
tastingDescription: 90 Points Wine Enthusiast: ""A rich, solid blend of Touriga Nacional, Tinto Roriz, Syrah and Alicante Bouschet, the wine has a fine balance between cool tannins and bold black fruits. It is a wine that will age further with its juicy acidity and tannins. Drink from 2021." (November 2020)

name: ALENTEJANO - SEGREDOS DE SAO MIGUEL
tastingDescription: This little Portuguese gem is a solid choice for sipping or pairing, and is sure to please with its silky smoothness and good fruit concentration.

name: ALENTEJANO RED - MERINO
tastingDescription: False

name: ALENTEJO BRANCO - HERDADE DE ROCIM AMPHORA 2018
nameSanitized: alentejo branco - herdade de rocim amphora 2018
sort: ALENTEJO BRANCO - HERDADE DE ROCIM AMPHORA 2018
tastingDescription: "This blend is dry and aromatic, with apricot, citrus and tropical fruit flavours, smoky, herbal and almond notes and nice acidity and minerality. Firm and dry on the palate, it reveals a hint of salinity. It follows an ancient method of winemaking - never sees barrel influence. It is crushed and ""all in"" clay amphorae vessels."

name: ALICANTE MONASTRELL - TARIMA
tastingDescription: Georgeous big dark fruit that is fully ripe without a hint of over ripeness. A big, rich wine with fine and generous tannin that is almost silky at the long finish.

name: ALICANTE MONASTRELL - VOLVER TAMIRA HILL OLD VINES 2017
nameSanitized: alicante monastrell - volver tamira hill old vines 2017
sort: ALICANTE MONASTRELL - VOLVER TAMIRA HILL OLD VINES 2017
tastingDescription: "This red shows grace and depth. Black cherry, plum, mineral and smoke flavors mingle harmoniously over well-integrated tannins, while lively acidity keeps this focused. Not showy, but all the pieces fit together. Balanced, in the modern style.

name: ALICANTE MONASTRELL ROSE - VERMADOR ORGANIC VEGAN
nameSanitized: alicante monastrell rose - vermador organic vegan
sort: ALICANTE MONASTRELL ROSE - VERMADOR ORGANIC VEGAN
tastingDescription: Brilliant pink colour with hues of smoked salmon. Fruity aromas of strawberry and plum. Full, fresh and fruity on the palate with aromatic persistence and good structure and balance. A very food-friendly, Mediterranean-style rose wine. Certified organic and vegan.

name: ALLEGRINI - PALAZZO DELLE TORRE IGT 2017
tastingDescription: 93 points, James Suckling - "What a beautiful red with lots of rich, ripe fruit, showing blackberry, walnut, dried,-fruit, fig and black-truffle aromas and flavors. It's full-bodied, layered and chewy but ever so well-crafted and polished. Drinkable now, but better in two years. Try after 2022. (September 1, 2020).

name: ALMANSA - LAYA
tastingDescription: 90 Points, James Suckling: Blackberries, brambleberries, coconut, potpourri and dried herbs on the nose. Medium-to full-bodied with fine, dry tannins and wild, herbal character. 70% garnacha tintorera and 30% monastrell. Vegan. Drink now. (October 2021)

name: ALMANSA RESERVA - PIQUERAS CASTILLO DE ALMANSA
nameSanitized: almansa reserva - piqueras castillo de almansa
sort: ALMANSA RESERVA - PIQUERAS CASTILLO DE ALMANSA
tastingDescription: Full, concentrated, rich wild berry fruit on the palate with finely balanced vanilla undertones, and well integrated tannins, great depth with a persistent finish. Enjoy it with grilled pork or smokies.

name: ALSACE RIESLING - FE TRIMBACH CUVEE FREDERIC EMILE
nameSanitized: alsace riesling - fe trimbach cuvee frederic emile
sort: ALSACE RIESLING - FE TRIMBACH CUVEE FREDERIC EMILE
tastingDescription: 95 Points, Wine Enthusiast: "The beeswax lift of mature Riesling shows immediately on the heady nose of this wine that's also imbued with baked-pear ripeness...The bone-dry palate adds in candied-lemon brightness that lends dynamism and drive. This is concentrated, lemony and elixir-like." (September 2020)

name: ALSACE RIESLING - FE TRIMBACH GRAND CRU MANDELBERG
nameSanitized: alsace riesling - fe trimbach grand cru mandelberg
sort: ALSACE RIESLING - FE TRIMBACH GRAND CRU MANDELBERG
tastingDescription: 96 Points, Wine Enthusiast: "The slender palate shimmers with vivid lemon freshness, notions of conifer and crushed herb, pleasantly bitter notes of pith and an uncompromising notion of hard, wet stone. This wine is extraordinary in its finesse and energy. The finish is bone dry." (May 2020)

name: ALVEAR - FINO
tastingDescription: 92 Points, Natalie Maclean:  "Love, love, love this dry Fino!  So much elegance and finesse. Toasted almond and a briny ocean note. Pair with roasted nuts and hard cheeses." Dec 2019

name: ALVEAR - MEDIUM DRY
tastingDescription: 92 Ponts, Natalie Maclean:  "Superb Amontillado that features clementine and tangerine notes on the nose and palate then finishes almost dry with pleasant burnt almond note. Lovely!"  Dec 2019

name: ALVEAR - PEDRO XIMENEZ SOLERA 1927
tastingDescription: 98 Points, Wine Advocate - "The NV Pedro Ximenez Solera 1927 is non-vintage, but does have some 1927 material in it. This is totally dark brown/amber with notes of figs, toffee, caramel syrup, molasses and coffee. It is dense, super sweet, intense, rich and an amazingly, unctuously textured, thick beverage to consume slowly and introspectively after a meal. Drink now through 2050, or even longer." (November 2015)

name: AMARONE - MONTRESOR 2016
tastingDescription: Deep ruby red colour with pomegranate reflections. Ethereal nose which reminds of peach blossoms, violet, raspberry and mint. On the palate, it is intense and refined, displaying full-bodied smoothness with notes of dried grapes. It is ideal with spicy dishes, game and seasoned cheeses.

name: AMARONE - MUSELLA 2014
tastingDescription: To make this special wine, Corvina, Corvinone, Rondinella and Oseleta grapes are dried in a well-ventilated loft. The grapes lose 35% of their weight and become very concentrated in flavours and sugars. They are then fermented to dryness, making a full-bodied, ripe and complex Amarone. The Musella is an ideal wine to warm your guests on a cold night. Try with Gorgonzola cheese.

name: AMARONE - TEDESCHI 2013
tastingDescription: 91 Points, Wine Spectator: “Pretty violet and spice notes accent this rich red, set in an elegant frame, showing saturated flavors of black cherry coulis, herbes de Provence and fig cake layered with fine, dusty tannins. Drink now through 2025.” (February 2018)

name: AMARONE - TEDESCHI 2015
tastingDescription: 91 Points, Wine Spectator: “Pretty violet and spice notes accent this rich red, set in an elegant frame, showing saturated flavors of black cherry coulis, herbes de Provence and fig cake layered with fine, dusty tannins. Drink now through 2025.” (February 2018)

name: AMARONE CLASSICO - ALLEGRINI 2016
tastingDescription: 94 points, James Suckling - "Very attractive dried fruit, such as plums, with fig and walnut undertones. Full-bodied with round, polished tannins that are chewy, but very smooth. Flavorful finish. Drink now. (September 2020)

name: AMARONE CLASSICO - CANTINA DI NEGRAR 2017
tastingDescription: Amazing value here! This full-bodied wine displays elegant complexity and incredible balance! Velvety tannins hold together a bouquet of black cherry, stewed plum, thyme and minty aromas, that lead to dark chocolate ganache and dried fruit flavours. A great wine to serve along with ripe and aged cheese, risottos, braised or roasted meats or a wild mushroom ravioli.

name: AMARONE CLASSICO - MASI COLLEZIONE GRANDE ANNATA 1990
nameSanitized: amarone classico - masi collezione grande annata 1990
sort: AMARONE CLASSICO - MASI COLLEZIONE GRANDE ANNATA 1990
tastingDescription: False

name: AMARONE CLASSICO - MASI COSTASERA 2015
tastingDescription: 94 Points, James Suckling: “The balance in this Amarone is so beautiful with chocolate, berry, walnut and cedar character. Medium to full body, polished and silky tannins and a flavorful finish. Always in balance. Wonderful to drink now.” (September 2018)

name: AMARONE CLASSICO - MASI COSTASERA CONTEMPORARY ART 2001
nameSanitized: amarone classico - masi costasera contemporary art 2001
sort: AMARONE CLASSICO - MASI COSTASERA CONTEMPORARY ART 2001
tastingDescription: False

name: AMARONE CLASSICO - MASI COSTESERA CONTEMPORY ARTS 2000
nameSanitized: amarone classico - masi costesera contempory arts 2000
sort: AMARONE CLASSICO - MASI COSTESERA CONTEMPORY ARTS 2000
tastingDescription: Every two years Masi chooses an internationally famous artist coming from a country with links to Masi and its wines to create a work of art dedicated to its icon wine, Costasera Amarone, and its historic label. The artist chosen for the 2017 edition is Susan A. Point, the most important representative of Coast Salish Art: the artistic expression of the indigenous people of the west coast of Canada. The labels reproducing her work adorn a selection of bottles of Costasera 2000.

name: AMARONE CLASSICO - MONTE DEL FRA LENA DI MEZZO 2013
nameSanitized: amarone classico - monte del fra lena di mezzo 2013
nameSuffix: MONTE DEL FRA LENA DI MEZZO 2013
sort: AMARONE CLASSICO - MONTE DEL FRA LENA DI MEZZO 2013
tastingDescription: 95 Points, James Suckling: “A layered and rich red with plenty of dried orange peel and plum character. So tight and focused. Full body, ultra-fine tannins and a beautiful finish. Drink now or hold.” (October 2017)

name: AMARONE CLASSICO - NOVAIA CORTE VAONA 2012
tastingDescription: Intense perfume, with predominant hints of red fruits and black cherries in the nose, combined with a peculiar note, typical of the drying process. Characteristic spicy hues, with scents of dark chocolate and tobacco, as well as “goudron” notes arising with maturity. Rich-bodied, soft and persistent on the palate, with well-balanced alcohol, high extract, and a particularly intense mineral note on the finish, enhancing the product’s typicity.

name: AMARONE CLASSICO - TOMMASI 2016
tastingDescription: 94 Points, James Suckling: “Complex and beautiful aromas of blackberry, spice and coffee follow through to a full body and silky and polished tannins. Intense fruit is tied into a firm and polished tannin backbone. Beautiful now but better in 2019.” (October 2017)

name: AMARONE CLASSICO RISERVA - MASI COSTASERA 2013
tastingDescription: 94 Points, James Suckling: “A rich and fruity red with chocolate and berry character. Full body, round and velvety tannins and a flavorful finish. Lovely wine now. Drink and enjoy.” (June 2018)

name: AMYNDEON XINOMAVRO - KIR-YIANNI KALI RIZA
tastingDescription: 90+ Points, Wine Advocate:- "... soft and sweet on opening (although the sweetness is a touch of wood that dissipates), with good acidity. The soft impression does not last long, as it has some serious tannins. The mid-palate makes this [wine] seem delicate ... with finesse." (June 2020)

name: ANDRES - MEDIUM DRY
tastingDescription: False

name: ANJOU - CHATEAU DE SURONDE ORGANIC 2018
tastingDescription: Fresh and aromatic with peach and melon scents. Full and generous on the palate with plenty of flesh and substance plus flavours of nectarine and a refreshing citrus finish.

name: ANNA SPINATO - PROSECCO BRUT ORGANIC & VEGAN
nameSanitized: anna spinato - prosecco brut organic & vegan
sort: ANNA SPINATO - PROSECCO BRUT ORGANIC & VEGAN
tastingDescription: Notes of rose petals and acacia with sweet aromas of creamed honey, fresh pears, apricot and yellow apples. Plenty of juicy fruit and sweet citrus flavours.

name: ANNA SPINATO - SPUMANTE BRUT ROSE ORGANIC & VEGAN
nameSanitized: anna spinato - spumante brut rose organic & vegan
sort: ANNA SPINATO - SPUMANTE BRUT ROSE ORGANIC & VEGAN
tastingDescription: With gentle suggestions of crushed rose petals, raspberries and berry compote, this dry, restrained sparkling is full of finesse.

name: ARBOIS TROUSSEAU - DOMAINE ROLET 2015
tastingDescription: Dark amber color, small red fruits in particular raspberry and redcurrant develop on the nose. A voluminous and structured mouth with a persistent and fresh finish. A vintage that will lend itself wonderfully with beautiful red meat, or tasty game. A chocolate pie for the most gourmet.

name: ARDECHE CHARDONNAY - LOUIS LATOUR
tastingDescription: This solid white has wafts of honeycomb, crisp Bosc pears, lemon citrus and toasted spices that tickle the nose. The palate is creamy and nicely balanced with mouth-watering acidity and a hint of oak. The finish lingers on notes of vanilla, butter, citrus and spice.

name: ARDECHE SYRAH - SAINT DESIRAT
tastingDescription: If you’re a fan of silky Northern Rhône Syrahs like Saint-Joseph and Crozes-Hermitage, this deliciously affordable wine is for you. This wine has lots of characteristic Northern Rhône black pepper spice and savoury complexity, but it actually comes from vineyards just outside Saint-Joseph, hence the great price.

name: ARGENTINA RED - CORAL
tastingDescription: Deep red with violet hues. This assemblage reveals a smooth entrance on the mouth, round tannins, delicious aromas of dark fruits in harmony with spices and a long finish.

name: ARGENTINA RED - MASCOTA UNANIME MENDOZA UCO VALLEY 2017
nameSanitized: argentina red - mascota unanime mendoza uco valley 2017
sort: ARGENTINA RED - MASCOTA UNANIME MENDOZA UCO VALLEY 2017
tastingDescription: 95 points, James Suckling: "This is a rich, dense red with blackberry and blueberry aromas and flavors. Extremely well-crafted tannins. Hints of vanilla to the ripe fruit at the end. Incredible value. A blend of 55% cabernet sauvignon, 30% malbec and 15% cabernet franc.

name: ARGENTINA ROSE - AMENNI
tastingDescription: Amenni wines are to be enjoyed young and all the time with all kinds of menu. Slightly sweet yet crisp, the taste of red berries and a fruitiness gives this great linger. A good sipper or try with pasta salads, grilled chicken or roast of ham.

name: ARGENTINA WHITE - AMENNI
tastingDescription: Very aromatic, this combination of Chardonnay and Torrontes offers a lot of citrus flavour and fruitiness to enjoy. Try with everyday menus, grilled fare, pasta dishes and seafood.

name: ARGENTINA WHITE - BIANCHI NEW AGE
tastingDescription: A refreshing white from Argentina - a product of Torrontes and Sauvignon Blanc grapes. The low alcohol and naturally sweet taste is offset by a slight spritz and bright acidity to keep things lively. Make a Tincho (New Age over ice and a slice of lime). Try before the meal as an aperitif or as a white Sangria base.

name: ARGYLE - VINTAGE BRUT 2014
tastingDescription: 91 Points, Wine Spectator - "Vibrant and floral apple and cherry aromas lead to layered and lively cinnamon, fresh ginger and spice flavours that linger on the long finish.

name: ARMAND DE BRIGNAC - BRUT
tastingDescription: False

sort: ARMAND DE BRIGNAC - BRUT LIMITED EDITION GOLD
tastingDescription: 93 Points, Wine Advocate - "The NV Brut (Gold) opens with lovely matured brioche, toast and ripe fruit flavors. Fresh, pure and elegant on the palate, with beautifully matured flavors and an elegant creaminess. The wine reveals good grip and mineral tension. Drink: 2018 - 2030." (June 2018)

name: ARMAND DE BRIGNAC - ROSE
tastingDescription: Strawberry, currants and cherry abound on the nose, with floral hints and a touch of sweet almond. The red grape dominance brings a structured palate filled with black fruits, cherries and hints of baked pastry. The hint of Chardonnay brings more lightness and elegance.

name: ARTISAN CO. - BCLS 100TH ANNIVERSARY RETRO RED BLEND
nameSanitized: artisan co. - bcls 100th anniversary retro red blend
sort: ARTISAN CO. - BCLS 100TH ANNIVERSARY RETRO RED BLEND
tastingDescription: This limited-edition wine was bottled to commemorate 100 years of BC Liquor Stores. Our unique blend highlights the best of the Okanagan Valley. A well balanced, jammy Cabernet Merlot blend. Full of ripe red raspberries, light spice and well-rounded oakiness. Easy drinking and a little reminiscent of Bordeaux.

name: ASAHARA - SHIN PREMIUM YUZU WINE
tastingDescription: Yuzu wine’s aroma and flavour offer a rare and complex blend of lime, lemon, grapefruit and mandarin orange with tangy acidity that is perfect for seafood or served as a desert wine.

name: ASTORIA - EXTRA DRY PROSECCO ROSE
tastingDescription: Pale pink colour. Elegant, fruity and floral aromas. Rich, thick and balanced mouthfeel.

name: AUGUSTIN - CUVEE CXVI BLANC DE BLANCS
nameSanitized: augustin - cuvee cxvi blanc de blancs
sort: AUGUSTIN - CUVEE CXVI BLANC DE BLANCS
tastingDescription: This 100% Chardonnay is made under spontaneous fermentation on natural yeasts. This Champagne is light green-gold, with fine, persistent mousse. On the nose and palate are notes of apple blossom, yellow apple, pear, and pineapple. Light bodied with elegant entry and moderate mid-palate acidity. Great with shellfish or as an aperitif. No added sulphites.

name: AUSTRALIA RED - 19 CRIMES THE UPRISING
tastingDescription: This wine pays homage to Australia's "Rum Rebellion" and thus a portion has been aged for 30 days in rum barrels. Dark with jammy flavours and a smoky finish.

name: AUSTRALIA RED - MCGUIGAN BLACK LABEL
tastingDescription: A delicious blend of red grape varieties; rich ripe blackcurrant and spice, delivering a long, satisfying finish.

name: AUSTRALIA RED - MCGUIGAN BLACK LABEL
tastingDescription: A delicious blend of red grape varieties; rich ripe blackcurrant and spice, delivering a long, satisfying finish.

name: AUSTRALIAN RED - 19 CRIMES THE UPRISING
tastingDescription: Full and round on the palate with a distinct sweetness making the wine rich and mouth coating. The mocha and sweet spice aromatics carry through on the palate and compliment subtle flavors of brown sugar and cinnamon.

name: AUSTRALIAN RED - ANGOVE HOPES END
tastingDescription: Bright, deep purple red in colour with aromas of boysenberry and cherry jam. Forest fruit jam, vanilla with subtle oak, a hint of chocolate and a velvety, smooth finish.

name: AUSTRALIAN RED - YELLOW TAIL JAMMY RED ROO
nameSanitized: australian red - yellow tail jammy red roo
sort: AUSTRALIAN RED - YELLOW TAIL JAMMY RED ROO
tastingDescription: Made from a blend of Shiraz, Cabernet Sauvignon, and other red varietals, [yellow tail] Jammy Red Roo is sweet and vibrant, with notes of juicy red berries, vanilla and chocolate. Enjoy with your favourite BBQ dishes or in your favourite Sangria or cocktail recipe.

name: AVERILL CREEK - PREVOST VANCOUVER ISLAND 2016
tastingDescription: A local Vancouver Island winery, Averill Creek can be found in the Cowichan Valley where the dryer climate and warmer temperatures assist in ripening grapes. A blend of red varietals make up this Prevost Red that has red and black fruit flavours, spice and soft tannins. Will go with all kinds of menu.

name: BABY CANADIAN SPARKLING
tastingDescription: Aromas of fresh apple and pear which carry through on the palate. This sparkling wine has just a touch of sweetness balanced by refreshing acidity and a delicate mouth-feel. Serve with lightly spiced chicken or pork, or on it's own as a refreshing sipping wine.

name: BABY CANADIAN SPARKLING
tastingDescription: Aromas of fresh apple and pear which carry through on the palate. This sparkling wine has just a touch of sweetness balanced by refreshing acidity and a delicate mouth-feel. Serve with lightly spiced chicken or pork or on it's own as a refreshing sipping wine.

name: BABY DUCK
tastingDescription: Fruity aromas of blueberry, cherry, watermelon and purple grape overflow from the glass. A light-bodied sparkler with sweet fruity flavors of mixed berries, watermelon and cherry. Serve with spicy Asian dishes and fresh fruit desserts.

name: BACKYARD VINEYARDS - NOSEY NEIGHBOUR RED 2018
tastingDescription: A deep and dense opaque wine with aromas of dark fruits, sweet spice, liquorice, dried herbs & crème Brule. Meanwhile, flavors of blackberry, black cherry, dark chocolate and black pepper attack on the palate, Approachable but packed with complexity for those who want to explore this careful blend.

name: BACKYARD VINEYARDS - NOSEY NEIGHBOUR WHITE 2019
tastingDescription: A brilliant light gold shimmer sets the tone for this extremely aromatic white blend. Pear, Royal Gala apples, pineapple and a variety of tropical fruits greet the nose, while the friendly and inviting palate boasts notes of baked apple crisp, tangerine, lemon, lime and waves of lychee.

name: BAILLIE-GROHMAN - FLORENCE ROSE 2020
tastingDescription: False

name: BAILLIE-GROHMAN - GEWURZTRAMINER 2020
tastingDescription: False

tastingDescription: False

name: BAILLIE-GROHMAN RECOLTE BLANCHE 2020
tastingDescription: The Récolte Blanche is a luminous straw with a green hue and a nose of lifted focused peach, stone fruit and white flowers. The rich textural palate with a long finish of sweetness and zesty acidity. Fresh and fruit forward. The blend is Pinot Gris, Schoenburger, Kerner and Gewürztraminer.

name: BAILLY LAPIERRE - CREMANT DE BOURGOGNE RESERVE BRUT
nameSanitized: bailly lapierre - cremant de bourgogne reserve brut
sort: BAILLY LAPIERRE - CREMANT DE BOURGOGNE RESERVE BRUT
tastingDescription: A blend of four grape varieties, Pinot Noir, Chardonnay, Gamay Aligot, this is a typically light, creamy and frothy cremant. It has lively pear and red apple juice flavours, with great, crisp acidity that make it perfect for fresh salads.

name: BANDOL PROVENCE ROSE - TERRASSES DE FONTANIEU
nameSanitized: bandol provence rose - terrasses de fontanieu
sort: BANDOL PROVENCE ROSE - TERRASSES DE FONTANIEU
tastingDescription: Located in the Fontanieu area, the stone-walled terraces of vineyards retain the soil in the heart of the Bandol appellation. "One vine stock, one bottle", is how the winemaker describes the very limited production. A classic, dry rosé. Expressive, elegant and refined aromas of mango and cherry kirsch.

name: BANDOL RED - DOMAINE DE LA BEGUDE
nameSanitized: bandol red - domaine de la begude
sort: BANDOL RED - DOMAINE DE LA BEGUDE
tastingDescription: False

name: BARBARESCO - CANTINA DEL PINO 2016
tastingDescription: 92 Points, Wine Advocate: “...a smooth and delicate wine. It shows a dark and intact color with light berry aromas followed by light shadings of spice, tar and tobacco. The wine appears light and streamlined in terms of mouthfeel, yet it also delivers power, structure and length. Drink: 2018 - 2030.” (August 2018)

name: BARBARESCO - CANTINA DEL PINO ALBESANI 2013
tastingDescription: 94 Points, Wine Advocate: “The 2013 Barbaresco Albesani offers a delicate approach with a silky texture and seamless flavors of wild berry, rose hip, spice and cured leather. The bouquet offers complexity and finesse, showing the best side of the Barbaresco appellation in a slightly cooler vintage. Drink: 2020 - 2035.” (April 2018)

name: BARBARESCO - PELISSERO TULIN 2016
tastingDescription: 94 points, Wine Spectator - ''Plump, with cherry and strawberry fruit, licorice, eucalyptus and spice flavors. Fluid and fresh, this builds to a lingering finish, where dusty tannins reign. Very elegant. Best from 2023 through 2043.'' (April, 2020)

name: BARBARESCO - PIO CESARE 2014
tastingDescription: 95 points, James Suckling - "A dense and layered red with plums, dried orange and lemon peel and a long and flavorful finish. Beautiful. Such impressive layers and a fantastic finish. Very exciting... Drink in 2020, but already beautiful" (Sept 24, 2018)

name: BARBARESCO - PRODUTTORI DEL BARBARESCO 2017
tastingDescription: 94 Points, Vinous - "In 2017, the warm, dry growing season gave the Barbaresco an extra kick of richness that fills out its frame and adds so much immediacy. Sweet red berry fruit, cinnamon, rose petal and mint are open in the glass, but it is the wine's seductive radiance that wins the day...The 2017 is such an inviting and expressive wine. Don't miss it!" (Oct 2020)

name: BARBARESCO - PRODUTTORI DEL BARBARESCO 2017
tastingDescription: 94 Points, Vinous - "In 2017, the warm, dry growing season gave the Barbaresco an extra kick of richness that fills out its frame and adds so much immediacy. Sweet red berry fruit, cinnamon, rose petal and mint are open in the glass, but it is the wine's seductive radiance that wins the day...The 2017 is such an inviting and expressive wine. Don't miss it!" (Oct 2020)

name: BARBARESCO - PRODUTTORI DEL BARBARESCO CRUS COLLECTION 2016
nameSanitized: barbaresco - produttori del barbaresco crus collection 2016
sort: BARBARESCO - PRODUTTORI DEL BARBARESCO CRUS COLLECTION 2016
tastingDescription: Produttori del Barbaresco is renowed for their single vineyard Barbaresco Riservas. The Cru Collectors is an assortment of all nine 2016 Riserva Crus: Asili, Muncagota, Montefico, Montestefano, Ovello, Paje, Pora, Rabaja, and Rio Sordo. A perfect gift for collectors looking to acquire each Riserva, contained within an elegant wooden box.

name: BARBARESCO - SOTTIMANO BASARIN
tastingDescription: False

name: BARBARESCO OVELLO - CANTINA DEL PINO 2016
tastingDescription: 93 Points, Wine Advocate: “The beautiful 2014 Barbaresco Ovello opens to a precious and delicate personality. There is plenty of aromatic intensity here, and it comes forth with dried blueberry, pressed violet, wild rose and earthy truffle. The mouthfeel is silky and smooth, but it also shows firm density and solid structure. Drink: 2019 - 2035.” (August 2018)

name: BARBARESCO RISERVA - PRODUTTORI BARBARESCO MONTESTEFANO 16
tastingDescription: 98 Points, Vinous - "The 2016 Barbaresco Riserva Montestefano is another profound wine in this lineup. There is virtually no perception of tannin, as the fruit is so rich and so voluptuous. Dark cherry/plum fruit, spice, menthol, licorice and a whole range of balsamic inflections grow as the Montestefano shows off its class." (Oct 2020)

name: BARBARESCO RISERVA - PRODUTTORI BARBARESCO MONTESTEFANO 2016
tastingDescription: 98 Points, Vinous - "The 2016 Barbaresco Riserva Montestefano is another profound wine in this lineup. There is virtually no perception of tannin, as the fruit is so rich and so voluptuous. Dark cherry/plum fruit, spice, menthol, licorice and a whole range of balsamic inflections grow as the Montestefano shows off its class." (Oct 2020)

name: BARBARESCO RISERVA - PRODUTTORI DEL BARBARESCO ASILI 2016
nameSanitized: barbaresco riserva - produttori del barbaresco asili 2016
sort: BARBARESCO RISERVA - PRODUTTORI DEL BARBARESCO ASILI 2016
tastingDescription: 97 Points, Wine Spectator - "This is pure and intense, exuding rose, cherry, strawberry, currant, mineral and wild juniper flavors, driven by the vibrant structure. The tannins are present yet refined, finishing long and resonant. A contrast of power and finesse. Best from 2025 through 2045." (Nov 2021)

name: BARBARESCO RISERVA - PRODUTTORI DEL BARBARESCO MONTEFICO 16
nameSanitized: barbaresco riserva - produttori del barbaresco montefico 16
sort: BARBARESCO RISERVA - PRODUTTORI DEL BARBARESCO MONTEFICO 16
tastingDescription: 98 Points, Vinous - "The 2016 Barbaresco Montefico is a jewel of a wine. Freshly cut flowers, minerals, crushed rocks, rose petal and lavender are all finely cut. As always, the Montefico is tense and chiseled in style. Its sense of transparency is simply beguiling. The Montefico is a Barbaresco that will thrill readers who enjoy taut reds." (Oct 2020)

name: BARBARESCO RISERVA - PRODUTTORI DEL BARBARESCO OVELLO 2016
nameSanitized: barbaresco riserva - produttori del barbaresco ovello 2016
sort: BARBARESCO RISERVA - PRODUTTORI DEL BARBARESCO OVELLO 2016
tastingDescription: 97+ Points, Vinous - "The 2016 Barbaresco Riserva Ovello is the most severe and angular of these wines. It will appeal most to die-hard classicists. Chalk, white pepper, mint and sweet red cherry fruit all grace this chiseled, beautifully translucent Barbaresco...It is a positively stellar wine in every way." (Oct 2020)

name: BARBARESCO RISERVA - PRODUTTORI DEL BARBARESCO OVELLO 2016
nameSanitized: barbaresco riserva - produttori del barbaresco ovello 2016
sort: BARBARESCO RISERVA - PRODUTTORI DEL BARBARESCO OVELLO 2016
tastingDescription: 97+ Points, Vinous - "The 2016 Barbaresco Riserva Ovello is the most severe and angular of these wines. It will appeal most to die-hard classicists. Chalk, white pepper, mint and sweet red cherry fruit all grace this chiseled, beautifully translucent Barbaresco...It is a positively stellar wine in every way." (Oct 2020)

name: BARBARESCO RISERVA - PRODUTTORI DEL BARBARESCO PORA 2016
nameSanitized: barbaresco riserva - produttori del barbaresco pora 2016
sort: BARBARESCO RISERVA - PRODUTTORI DEL BARBARESCO PORA 2016
tastingDescription: 95 Points, Wine Spectator - "This red is saturated with bright cherry, strawberry and currant fruit. Mint, iron, tar and green, vegetal elements peek through as this evolves on the palate through the long finish. Assertive tannins put the grip on the finish, yet the intense fruit will come forward with time." (Nov 2021)

name: BARBARESCO RISERVA - PRODUTTORI DEL BARBARESCO RABAJA 2016
nameSanitized: barbaresco riserva - produttori del barbaresco rabaja 2016
sort: BARBARESCO RISERVA - PRODUTTORI DEL BARBARESCO RABAJA 2016
tastingDescription: 98 Points, Wine Advocate - "Rabajà is known for its precision and extreme balance, and these qualities are especially pronounced in this excellent vintage...Sheer elegance is the impression you get upon first inspection, and the bouquet opens gradually to embrace wild berry, cherry, white stone, light spice, tar and hint of toasted hazelnut." (Jun 2021)

name: BARBARESCO RISERVA - PRODUTTORI DEL BARBARESCO RABAJA 2016
nameSanitized: barbaresco riserva - produttori del barbaresco rabaja 2016
sort: BARBARESCO RISERVA - PRODUTTORI DEL BARBARESCO RABAJA 2016
tastingDescription: 98 Points, Wine Advocate - "Rabajà is known for its precision and extreme balance, and these qualities are especially pronounced in this excellent vintage...Sheer elegance is the impression you get upon first inspection, and the bouquet opens gradually to embrace wild berry, cherry, white stone, light spice, tar and hint of toasted hazelnut." (Jun 2021)

name: BARBERA D'ALBA - BATASIOLO
tastingDescription: This deep, ruby-coloured wine has a pronounced nose of blueberry and raspberry with hints of earthiness. It is medium-bodied with flavours of cooked, dark fruits and has fine tannins to give it a crisp and lively finish.

name: BARBERA D'ALBA - CONTERNO FANTINO VIGNOTA
tastingDescription: Organic. The nose opens with a delicately fruity bouquet, with hints of small ripe red fruits. On the palate it is pleasantly dry, balanced and refined. Perfect to be served with savory pasta dishes with meat sauce or with mushroom and sausage risotto; it is ideal to combine with stewed meats.

name: BARBERA D'ALBA - GD VAJRA 2019
tastingDescription: "Classic Barbera from the house of Vajra. Garnet red, very pleasant nose with light cherry notes and aromas of fine spices. Rich on the palate with the typical effervescence of a traditional and sophisticated wine of the Alba region." - SUPERIORE.DE

name: BARDOLINO - MONTE DEL FRA
tastingDescription: 92 Points, Wine Enthusiast: “Aromas of ground black pepper and wild berry lead the way. The juicy delicious palate mirrors the nose, doling out succulent Marasca cherry, crushed raspberry and cinnamon. Easygoing and balanced, it boasts supple tannins and fresh acidity.” (December 2017)

name: BAREFOOT - BUBBLY PINOT GRIGIO
tastingDescription: This clean and crisp light-bodied sparkling Pinot Grigio displays aromas and flavours of apple and citrus with hints of orange blossom.

name: BAROLO - ARNALDO RIVERA RAVERA 2016
tastingDescription: 94 Points, James Suckling: "A juicy and tannic Barolo, yet the tannins are soft and rounded with plenty of ripe strawberry and cherry character. It's full-bodied with lots of richness and length. Meat and walnuts to the dried fruit. Give it two or three years to soften."

name: BAROLO - AURELIO SETTIMO 2013
tastingDescription: 92 Points, James Suckling: “This Barolo shows lots of lemon rind and fresh sliced plum aromas and flavors. Full body, silky tannins and a long, long finish. Drink or hold.” (September 2015)

name: BAROLO - AZELIA 2016
tastingDescription: 93 Points, Wine Advocate: "A spicy or savory personality with accents of laurel leaf, eucalyptus and clove...that hover over a core of dark fruit and dried blackberry. On the Nebbiolo scale...a sultry side of the variety, with slightly more fruit weight, texture and pronounced black fruit." (July 2020)

name: BAROLO - AZELIA BRICCO FIASCO 2015
tastingDescription: 95 Points, James Suckling - "Attractive red-cherry and spiced red-plum aromas, surrounded by nuances of tar and cedar. The palate has brisk acidity married with upright tannins, creating a juicy red-cherry surge through the finish. Good potential here." (June 2019)

name: BAROLO - AZELIA BRICCO FIASCO 2017
tastingDescription: 96 Points, James Suckling: "A firm, fine-grained red with plum, mahogany, iron and bark on the nose and palate. It's full-bodied with a dusty texture from the tannins. Flavorful finish. Needs time to soften, but a beautiful young Barolo." (June 2021)

name: BAROLO - AZELIA MARGHERIA 2014
tastingDescription: 94 Points, Vinous - "Bright red cherry and plum fruit, licorice, anise, rose water and orange peel are some of the many notes that give the wine its personality. Bright, saline and sculpted in feel...it is unquestionably vibrant and expressive today." (February 2018)

name: BAROLO - AZELIA SAN ROCCO 2017
tastingDescription: 96 Points, James Suckling: "Very pure fruit with crushed strawberries, spices and white truffles on the nose. The palate is full and tight with brightness and focus. Firm, creamy tannins. The super quality of fruit really comes through here." (July 2021)

name: BAROLO - BATASIOLO 2016
tastingDescription: The bouquet has all the typical aromas of the Nebbiolo grape which after refining is flowery and toasty with hints of sweet spices, nuts and typically delicate herbaceous aromas. In the mouth, the perfect balance of tannins, crispness and alcohol content offer bold yet absolutely elegant and pleasing sensations.

name: BAROLO - CAGLIERO RAVERA 2015
tastingDescription: 93 Points, Wine Enthusiast: “This opens with classic Nebbiolo aromas of rose petal, red cherry, leather and a hint of truffle. The bright juicy palate doles out crushed raspberry, licorice and tobacco alongside austere but polished tannins and fresh acidity. It's already tempting but will be even better after more aging. Drink 2020–2030.” (May 2018)

name: BAROLO - CHIARA BOSCHIS CANNUBI 2016
tastingDescription: 98 Points, Wine Advocate: "This wine is like a statue of a Grecian goddess with perfect proportions and feminine aesthetic appeal. The bouquet peels back to reveal many layers with bright fruit, white pepper, mint, orange peel and tangy licorice. The tannins are polished..." (July 2020)

name: BAROLO - CHIARA BOSCHIS VIA NUOVA 2016
tastingDescription: 100 Points, Vinous: "In my opinion, the 2016 Barolo Via Nuova is the single greatest Barolo Chiara Boschis has made in her storied career. Dark macerated cherry, lavender, spice, menthol and rose petal are kicked up a few notches from underlying veins of acidity and tannin." (February 2020)

name: BAROLO - CONTERNO FANTINO GINESTRA VIGNA DEL GRIS 2005

tastingDescription: 95 points, Wine Spectator - ''Focused on bright cherry, black currant and freshly cut hay aromas and flavors, this red is vibrant, verging on racy. Accents of iron, tobacco and tar add complexity, and this is balanced and long on the finish. Best from 2023 through 2045.'' (November 2020)

name: BAROLO - CONTERNO FANTINO MOSCONI VIGNA PED 2010
nameSanitized: barolo - conterno fantino mosconi vigna ped 2010

name: BAROLO - DAMILANO CANNUBI 2013
tastingDescription: 94 Points, Wine Advocate: “The 2013 Barolo Cannubi is a layered and enriched expression that shows both elegance and power. This is a beautiful quality that is so specific to the celebrated Cannubi cru... The Barolo offers all of the most graceful aromatic highlights that you should expect of Nebbiolo. These qualities will improve with age. Drink: 2018 - 2030.” (August 2017)

name: BAROLO - DAMILANO LECINQUEVIGNE 2014
tastingDescription: 93 Points, Wine Advocate: “The 2013 Barolo Lecinquevigne is fragrant and intense with a mounting sense of aromatic importance and persistence. The effect is really quite beautiful because this wine literally blossoms in the glass before you. ...this wine is at the head of the class. On the quality versus price ratio, it offers great value. Drink: 2018 - 2027.” (August 2017)

name: BAROLO - FONTANAFREDDA 2017
tastingDescription: 92 Points, James Suckling: “Glazed cherries and blueberries, as well as incense and lavender, make for a really pretty first impression on the nose. Tight and delicate on the palate with firm tannins and a bright finish. Drink now or hold.” (July 2018)

name: BAROLO - FONTANAFREDDA SERRALUNGA D'ALBA 2016
tastingDescription: 93 Points - James Suckling:"Very pretty ripe cherries and strawberries with light toffee undertones. It’s full-bodied, but tight and focused. Chewy tannins." (August 4, 2020)

name: BAROLO - G D VAJRA BRICCO DELLE VIOLE 2016
nameSanitized: barolo - g d vajra bricco delle viole 2016
nameSuffix: G D VAJRA BRICCO DELLE VIOLE 2016
sort: BAROLO - G D VAJRA BRICCO DELLE VIOLE 2016
tastingDescription: 97 Points, Antonio Galloni:  "... Dark red/purplish fruit, hard candy, mint, lavender and sweet spice give the 2016 striking inner perfume. ... will especially delight readers with traditionally leaning palates. ... a great balance of structure, aromatics and mid-palate sweetness. I absolutely loved it." Drink to 2041. (Feb 2020)

name: BAROLO - G.D. VAJRA BAUDANA
tastingDescription: 95 Points, Vinous "A darker side of Nebbiolo emerges from the 2014 Barolo Baudana. Powerful but also supple... a wine of pure, arresting beauty. Sweet red cherry, kirsch and floral notes ...a striking, textured Barolo ... a joy to taste, even at this early stage. Drink to 2044" Feb 2018

name: BAROLO - G.D. VAJRA RAVERA
tastingDescription: 97 Points - Wine Enthusiast "... this is just stunning, offering intense aromas of wild berries, new leather, floral notes, camphor and grilled herb. The delicious, structured palate shows finesse and power, featuring ripe red cherry, blood orange, cedar, licorice and mineral notes suggesting tangy iron. Drink 2022-2032." (7/1/2021)

name: BAROLO - GIOVANNI ROSSO SERRALUNGA D'ALBA 2015
tastingDescription: 91 Points, Wine Advocate: “Starting with a slightly heavier footprint, the 2014 Barolo del Comune di Serralunga d'Alba is a tightly knit wine that is packed carefully with wild berry, cassis and dried cranberry aromas... These wines by Giovanni Rosso are distinguished by the smooth consistency of their tannins. Drink: 2019 - 2030.” (April 2019)

name: BAROLO - J D VAJRA ALBE 2016
tastingDescription: 94 Points, Wine Advocate - "...Albe is a brand on its own, ...one of the most versatile, accessible and well-priced Baroli to emerge from the appellation. The G.D. Vajra 2016 Barolo Albe ... forest fruit, wild cherry, crushed stone and blue flowers. ...Drink to 2035" (July, 2020).

name: BAROLO - LUIGI EINAUDI CANNUBI 2016
tastingDescription: False

name: BAROLO - MARCARINI BRUNATE 2015
tastingDescription: False

name: BAROLO - MARCARINI LA SERRA 2016
tastingDescription: 94 Points, James Suckling: “A red with a beautiful depth of fruit plus orange peel and walnut character. Full body, round tannins and a clean finish. Needs time to soften. Better in 2018.” (April 2015)

name: BAROLO - MASSIMO RIVETTI ORGANIC 2016
tastingDescription: 94 Points, Wine Advocate - "The Massimo Rivetti 2016 Barolo is made with a selection of fruit from multiple sites. This vintage is subdued and restrained, offering subtle aromas of wild berry, crushed flower, candied orange peel, eucalyptus and crushed limestone...this Barolo is a lot more focused and determined on the palate...[offering] a silky and linear mouthfeel with good length." (Jul 2020)

name: BAROLO - PODERI COLLA BUSSIA DARDI LE ROSE 2016
nameSanitized: barolo - poderi colla bussia dardi le rose 2016
nameSuffix: PODERI COLLA BUSSIA DARDI LE ROSE 2016
sort: BAROLO - PODERI COLLA BUSSIA DARDI LE ROSE 2016
tastingDescription: 95 Points, Vinous: "The 2016 Barolo Bussia Dardi Le Rose is just as gorgeous as it always has been. Dark and translucent, the 2016 possesses striking layers of complexity. Spice, menthol, leather, sage and tobacco lend compelling nuance throughout..." (February 2020)

name: BAROLO - PRUNOTTO 2015
tastingDescription: 93 Points, James Suckling: “Wonderful purity of fruit to this red with strawberry, cherry and orange-peel aromas. Medium to full body, very fine tannins and a creamy, silky-textured finish. All in finesse here. Better in 2019.” (January 2017)

name: BAROLO - RENATO RATTI CONCA 2016
tastingDescription: 97 Points, Wine Enthusiast - "Fragrant, elegant and brimming with youthful tension, this radiant red has enticing aromas evoking red rose, forest berry, camphor and dark spice. Loaded with finesse, the focused palate doles out juicy red cherry, pomegranate, licorice and a mineral tone alongside taut, refined tannins. Fresh acidity keeps balance and focus." (Sep 2020)

name: BAROLO - RENATO RATTI MARCENASCO 2016
tastingDescription: 97 Points, Wine Enthusiast - "Iris, rose, botanical herb and dark spice aromas lead the way in this fragrant red, along with an enticing whiff of graphite. Elegantly structured and boasting youthful tension, the vibrant palate delivers juicy Morello cherry, crushed raspberry, cinnamon and star anise framed in taut, refined tannins. It's balanced and focused, with bright acidity." (Sep 2020)

name: BAROLO - RENATO RATTI ROCCHE DELL'ANNUNZIATA 2016
tastingDescription: 97 Points, Wine Enthusiast - "Glossy, elegant and full bodied, this beauty opens with aromas of dark berry, menthol, wild rose and exotic spice. The delicious, finessed palate doles out mouthfuls of juicy red cherry, raspberry compote, vanilla and licorice framed in taut, fine-grained tannins. Vibrant acidity keeps it focused and lends youthful tension." (Sep 2020)

name: BAROLO RISERVA - AURELIO SETTIMO ROCCHE DELL'ANNUNZIATA 2012
nameSanitized: barolo riserva - aurelio settimo rocche dellannunziata 2012
sort: BAROLO RISERVA - AURELIO SETTIMO ROCCHE DELL'ANNUNZIATA 2012
tastingDescription: 93 Points, James Suckling: “The nose suggests that this is going to be quite a decadent wine as it conjures up aromas of meat, tar, leather, figs, dried plums and cedar. Full body and ripe tannins, but there is a fine line of acidity holding this nicely together and keeping it fresh and vivid. A long finish. Drink in 2022.” (July 2018)

name: BAROLO RISERVA - PRUNOTTO BUSSIA VIGNA COLONNELLO 12
nameSanitized: barolo riserva - prunotto bussia vigna colonnello 12
sort: BAROLO RISERVA - PRUNOTTO BUSSIA VIGNA COLONNELLO 12
tastingDescription: 95 Points, Wine Enthusiast: “Fermented with the stems, this fascinating, single-vineyard bottling offers an enticing fragrance of rose, dried cherry, leather and an intense balsamic note. The delicious palate weaves together sweet Morello cherry, wild strawberry, eucalyptus, white pepper, cinnamon and a blast of orange zest alongside firm, polished tannins and vibrant acidity. Drink 2018–2048.” (December 2014)

name: BARONS DE ROTHSCHILD - BLANC DE BLANCS 2008
nameSanitized: barons de rothschild - blanc de blancs 2008
sort: BARONS DE ROTHSCHILD - BLANC DE BLANCS 2008
tastingDescription: 94 Points, Wine Enthusiast: ''It is full of minerality as well as crisp intensity. The fruit is almost mature while still fresh and tangy. This textured Champagne will be best from 2020.'' (December 2018)

name: BARONS DE ROTHSCHILD - BLANC DE BLANCS BRUT 2010
nameSanitized: barons de rothschild - blanc de blancs brut 2010
sort: BARONS DE ROTHSCHILD - BLANC DE BLANCS BRUT 2010
tastingDescription: 97 Points, Vinous - ''Citrus, floral and mineral notes literally explode out of the glass in a vibrant, wonderfully deep vintage Champagne that beautifully expresses the character of Chardonnay from the Côtes de Blancs. The 2010 is a blend of fruit from Avize, Cramant, Oger, Le Mesnil-sur-Oger, all Grand Cru villages. Dosage is around 4 grams per liter. Production is just over 6,000 bottles, which is tiny for the region.'' (November 2020)

name: BARONS DE ROTHSCHILD - BRUT
tastingDescription: This nicely balanced low dosage Brut displays notes of fresh almond, pear, and citrus zest with light brioche notes. Rich and complex, it shows excellent freshness wrapped in a lightly creamy texture with flavors of patisserie apple, pastry, almond and meringue. A smoky hint of minerality gains momentum on the finish.

name: BARONS DE ROTHSCHILD - BRUT
tastingDescription: This nicely balanced low dosage Brut displays notes of fresh almond, pear, and citrus zest with light brioche notes. Rich and complex, it shows excellent freshness wrapped in a lightly creamy texture with flavors of patisserie apple, pastry, almond and meringue. A smoky hint of minerality gains momentum on the finish.

name: BARSAC - CHATEAU COUTET 2017
tastingDescription:
"This is youthfully packed, with a green tea accent wrapping up a dense core of creamed pineapple, yellow apple chutney, candied pink grapefruit and quince flavors. The long finish is viscous but bright, gilded liberally with ravishing singed almond and hazelnut notes. Semillon, Sauvignon Blanc and Muscadelle. Best from 2022 through 2045."
95 Points, Wine Spectator

name: BARSAC - CHATEAU COUTET 2017
tastingDescription:

The long finish is viscous but bright, gilded liberally with ravishing singed almond and hazelnut notes. Semillon, Sauvignon Blanc and Muscadelle. Best from 2022 through 2045."
95 Points, Wine Spectator

name: BARSAC - CHATEAU COUTET 2018
tastingDescription:
"The 2018 Coutet has a very intense bouquet with marmalade, clementines, mango and light apple blossom scents, all delivered with exceptional precision and delineation. The palate is vibrant and tensile on the opening thanks to a killer line of acidity that slices through the viscous fruit. There is so much tangible energy in this Coutet. This comes highly recommended. Drinking Window: 2023 - 2050."
94 pts, Vinous
12 bottle limit

tastingDescription:

name: BARSAC - CHATEAU DOISY DAENE 2017
tastingDescription:
"The 2017 Doisy Daene comes strutting out of the glass with flamboyant notes of tropical fruits-pineapple tart and green mango-plus lemon meringue pie and peach preserves with candied peel, spice cake and musk perfume in the background. The satiny-textured palate has wonderful poise and freshness with and an ethereal lightness of being and mineral-tinged finish. Drink: 2022 - 2047."
94 Points, Wine Advocate

name: BARSAC - CHATEAU DOISY DAENE 2018
tastingDescription:
The 2018 Doisy-Daëne has a well-defined bouquet, a little reticent at first but opening to offer scents of wild honey, white flowers and orange blossom. The palate is medium-bodied with a ripe, viscous opening, very pure and full of tension, more so than other 2018 Sauternes/Barsacs. Very persistent on the finish. This is an excellent Doisy-Daëne. Drink: 2023 - 2048."
95 pts, Vinous

Package design by artist Iemza.

name: BEAUJOLAIS - BOUCHARD AINE
tastingDescription: Fresh and expressive with pleasant aromas of red fruit - cherries, gooseberries and plum.  A  supple and well balanced wine with a subtle floral finish.  Beaujolais is the perfect wine for picnics, before meals or served with cold meats and starters.

name: BEAUJOLAIS - DUBOEUF
tastingDescription: Look for lovely fresh strawberry and ripe cherry on the nose and palate, complemented with bright acidity in this deliciously young and fruity wine.

name: BEAUJOLAIS - J P BRUN TERRES DOREES L'ANCIEN 2018
nameSanitized: beaujolais - j p brun terres dorees lancien 2018

tastingDescription: 92 Points, Wine Advocate: "From vines that are more than 40 years old... On the palate, it’s medium to full-bodied, deep and concentrated, with supple and fine-grained but youthfully chewy structuring tannins and a long, sapid finish. It’s a superb wine that would embarrass many cru Beaujolais. Drink: 2018 - 2027." (September 2018)

name: BEAUJOLAIS NOUVEAU - JEAN-BAPTISTE  DUPERRAY VIEILLES VIGNES

name: BEAUJOLAIS NOUVEAU - MOMMESSIN 2021
tastingDescription: Bright ruby red in colour. Intense aromas combining fresh black fruit. Very intense mouth with a perfect balance between red fruit, refreshing and softness. A well-balanced wine.

name: BEAUJOLAIS NOUVEAU - ROSE 2021
tastingDescription: Vibrant hue of clear gooseberries. Aromas of red fruits and strawberries mixed with yellow fruits like peaches. A tender, full-bodied palate!

name: BEAUJOLAIS NOUVEAU PAPER LABEL 2021
tastingDescription: Stunning and vibrant garnet red. Its intense bouquet reveals magnificent aromas of small black and red fruits. Fresh, full-bodied, structured, delicious and smooth. A fruity, scrumptious Beaujolais-Villages Nouveau!

name: BEAUJOLAIS VILLAGES - DOMAINE LONGERE JARRE 2016
tastingDescription: 91 Points, Wine Advocate: "Bursting with aromas of sweet plums, cherries and spices, the 2016 Beaujolais-Villages Jarre is medium-bodied, ample and succulent, with excellent volume, depth and substance, concluding with some youthfully chewy tannic grip. Only 500 bottles of this amphora-matured cuvée were produced. Drink: 2018 - 2025." (September 2018)

name: BEAUJOLAIS VILLAGES - JADOT COMBE AUX JACQUES 2019
nameSanitized: beaujolais villages - jadot combe aux jacques 2019
sort: BEAUJOLAIS VILLAGES - JADOT COMBE AUX JACQUES 2019
tastingDescription: This Beaujolais is deep red in colour with a floral, cherry and strawberry nose tinged with citrus zest and hints of fruit pit. The palate is smooth with complexity provided by clove, orange zest and mineral notes all supporting the delicious blackberry, blueberry and plum favours.

name: BEAUMONT DES CRAYERES - JACQUES LORENT GRANDE  RESERVE
nameSanitized: beaumont des crayeres - jacques lorent grande  reserve
sort: BEAUMONT DES CRAYERES - JACQUES LORENT GRANDE  RESERVE

Honey flavored palate with fresh plum and cherry stones notes. Pleasant finish with a good length."

name: BEAUNE 1ER - DOM BOUCHARD PERE BEAUNE DE CHATEAU ROUGE 2016
nameSanitized: beaune 1er - dom bouchard pere beaune de chateau rouge 2016
nameSuffix: DOM BOUCHARD PERE BEAUNE DE CHATEAU ROUGE 2016
sort: BEAUNE 1ER - DOM BOUCHARD PERE BEAUNE DE CHATEAU ROUGE 2016
tastingDescription: A union of fruit from a collection of Beaune's Premier Cru, this wine justly expresses the character of the region. Pure fruit, signature minerality, structured tannins and a whole lot of earthy goodness define this balanced and elegant wine. Still young, but ready if you are...with a decanter, of course! Otherwise, it does have the potential to age at least until 2024. Pair with a coq au vin, roasted beet terrine or duck confit.

name: BEAUNE 1ER CRU CHAMPS PIMONT - DOMAINE JACQUES PRIEUR 2018
nameSanitized: beaune 1er cru champs pimont - domaine jacques prieur 2018
sort: BEAUNE 1ER CRU CHAMPS PIMONT - DOMAINE JACQUES PRIEUR 2018
tastingDescription: 89-91 points, Vinous: "The 2018 Beaune Champs Pimonts 1er Cru is de-stemmed and matured in 25% new oak. That wood is showing more conspicuously than in the other Beaune crus and will need time to be assimilated. The palate is medium-bodied with supple tannins, quite fleshy and forward. Lightly spiced red fruit appears toward the finish, which tapers in slightly (possibly closing down for the second winter). Good potential, though." (January 2020)

name: BEAUNE 1ER CRU CLOS DES URSULES - LOUIS JADOT 18
nameSanitized: beaune 1er cru clos des ursules - louis jadot 18
sort: BEAUNE 1ER CRU CLOS DES URSULES - LOUIS JADOT 18
tastingDescription: 94 Points, Wine Enthusiast - "This dense and structured wine comes from a small walled vineyard within the larger Les Vignes Franches premier cru, partially owned by Louis Jadot. Robust tannins frame its rich, juicy black fruit, showing potential for long aging. Drink from 2024." (March 2017)

name: BEAUNE 1ER GREVES - DOM BOUCHARD PERE L'ENFANT JESUS 2017
nameSanitized: beaune 1er greves - dom bouchard pere lenfant jesus 2017
sort: BEAUNE 1ER GREVES - DOM BOUCHARD PERE L'ENFANT JESUS 2017
tastingDescription: 94 Points, Wine Spectator: "Lush and vibrant, exuding cherry and blueberry flavors, this ripe red is inviting yet deceptive in terms of structure. The tannins are wrapped in flesh and fruit for now, but should provide support over the next 10 to 15 years. Best from 2020 through 2033." (November 2017)

name: BEAUNE 1ER MARCONNETS - DOMAINE BOUCHARD PERE 1999
tastingDescription: Bouchard Père & Fils has owned vineyards here since 1791 and today harvests from 2.32 hectares situated at the northernmost point of the territory of Beaune. The layers of grey , marly chalk give this Premier Cru distinction, character, elegance and bouquet.

name: BEIRA ATLANTICO BAGA TOURIGA NACIONAL - LUIS PATO 2015
nameSanitized: beira atlantico baga touriga nacional - luis pato 2015
sort: BEIRA ATLANTICO BAGA TOURIGA NACIONAL - LUIS PATO 2015
tastingDescription: Black fruit and bitter chocolate. Excellent acidity with live fine tannins, brief usage of wood and light alcohol provides a very interesting red.

name: BENOIT MARGUET - SHAMAN 17 BLANC
tastingDescription: One of the very few biodynamic and organic certified Champagnes with zero dosage and very low sulftite. A  nose of roasted apples wafts from the glass, with delicate smoky notes, yeast dough, a lot of chalk underlay. Showing beautiful maturity, with an ingenious field of tension between fresh, chalky-mineral notes and the somewhat wild, oxidative character. Racy on the palate with notes of citrus, green apricot, walnut, sour cherry, and yeast. The acidity is supportive, which makes it a great champagne with food.

name: BERGERAC - CHATEAU LA BESAGE GRANDE CUVEE 2017
nameSanitized: bergerac - chateau la besage grande cuvee 2017
sort: BERGERAC - CHATEAU LA BESAGE GRANDE CUVEE 2017
tastingDescription: 91 points, winescores.ca - " This Grand Cuvee is a blend of the classics: Cabernet and Merlot, It is a savoury red with wild black berries, smoked meat, leather, graphite, black plum, carob and toasted spice aromas. The entry is supple and leads with flavours of charred cherries, which are layered with baking spice, leather and tobacco. It has length and depth and structure and balance all in check." (January 2021)

name: BERLUCCHI - FRANCIACORTA 61 BRUT
tastingDescription: False

name: BERLUCCHI - FRANCIACORTA 61 BRUT
tastingDescription: 92 points,Wine Enthusiast -‘‘A blend of 90% Chardonnay and 10% Pinot Noir, this refined sparkler opens with heady aromas of white wild flower, citrus and a whiff of bread crust. On the lively palate, fresh acidity brightens creamy white peach, Golden Delicious apple and lemon drop. A brioche note wraps up the finish.’’  (April 2018)

name: BERNARD MASSARD - CUVEE DE L'ECUSSON BRUT GIFT PACK

name: BIANCO - FRESCO DI MASI

name: BIERZO - ALVARO PALACIOS PETALOS 2018
tastingDescription: 92+ Points, Wine Advocate - “It's a showy, approachable, aromatic and open version of Pétalos, and as I tasted it later on in the season, it felt more polished and round, with a lush texture. It's extremely aromatic, in a way similar to the 2012. This is always one of the best values not only of Bierzo but for the whole of Spain.” (August 2017)

name: BIERZO - DESCENDIENTES DE J PALACIOS LAS LAMAS 2016
nameSanitized: bierzo - descendientes de j palacios las lamas 2016
nameSuffix: DESCENDIENTES DE J PALACIOS LAS LAMAS 2016
sort: BIERZO - DESCENDIENTES DE J PALACIOS LAS LAMAS 2016
tastingDescription: A hugely perfumed and complex bouquet evokes ripe red and blue fruits, candied flowers, exotic spice, licorice and smoky minerals. Sweet and penetrating on the palate, offering densely packed black raspberry, cherry liqueur, spice-cake and lavender flavors that show outstanding delineation and back-end power. The mineral and floral notes drive an extremely long, energetic finish.

name: BIERZO - DESCENDIENTES DE J PALACIOS MONCERBAL 2015
nameSanitized: bierzo - descendientes de j palacios moncerbal 2015
sort: BIERZO - DESCENDIENTES DE J PALACIOS MONCERBAL 2015
tastingDescription: 96 Points, Wine Advocate - "The 2015 Moncerbal has more white grapes than 2014, because the white grapes were almost perfect and they thought they should go into the vat. The vintage was very complete that year with very healthy grapes. The wine is medium- to full-bodied, always showing that stoniness, austerity and minerality, even in a riper vintage like this 2015. Drink: 2017 - 2026.” (August 2017)

name: BIERZO MENCIA - BODEGAS PEIQUE RAMON VALLE
nameSanitized: bierzo mencia - bodegas peique ramon valle
sort: BIERZO MENCIA - BODEGAS PEIQUE RAMON VALLE
tastingDescription: 97 Points Decanter: "Our judges loved the brooding aromatic asperities of this jet-black wine, and its plunging wild-plum-and-mountain-herb flavours, improbably allied to a texture of pure velvet. Few wines, too, in our Best In Show selection this year have a longer finish than this eerie, haunting beauty." (June 2020)

name: BIFERNO ROSSO - DI MAJO NORANTE RAMITELLO 2013
nameSanitized: biferno rosso - di majo norante ramitello 2013
sort: BIFERNO ROSSO - DI MAJO NORANTE RAMITELLO 2013
tastingDescription: 91 Points, James Suckling: “Very fun with interesting ripe-fruit, spice and walnut character. Some hot stones, too. Full-bodied, juicy and generous. A blend of montepulciano and aglianico. Drink now.” (November 2016)

name: BILLECART SALMON - BLANC DE BLANCS GRAND CRU BRUT
nameSanitized: billecart salmon - blanc de blancs grand cru brut
nameSuffix: BLANC DE BLANCS GRAND CRU BRUT
sort: BILLECART SALMON - BLANC DE BLANCS GRAND CRU BRUT
tastingDescription: 92 Points, James Suckling - "Aromas of sliced apple and pear with hints of flowers and cream. Some peach too. Full-bodied, creamy and fine with mineral, chalk and sliced green apples that turn to delicate white peach. Drink now." (October 2012)

name: BILLECART SALMON - BLANC THE BLANCS CUVEE LOUIS 2007
nameSanitized: billecart salmon - blanc the blancs cuvee louis 2007
sort: BILLECART SALMON - BLANC THE BLANCS CUVEE LOUIS 2007
tastingDescription: 96 Points, Wine Advocate: "The 2006 Millésime Brut Blanc de Blancs Cuvée Louis offers a generous, rich and chalky bouquet of ripe yellow and white-fleshed fruits and vanilla brioche as well as a remarkable purity, precision and freshness. …highly elegant, seductive and wonderfully balanced. Drink: 2019 - 2032." (December 2018)

name: BILLECART SALMON - BRUT BLANC DE BLANCS GRAND CRU
nameSanitized: billecart salmon - brut blanc de blancs grand cru
nameSuffix: BRUT BLANC DE BLANCS GRAND CRU
sort: BILLECART SALMON - BRUT BLANC DE BLANCS GRAND CRU
tastingDescription: 92 Points, James Suckling - "Aromas of sliced apple and pear with hints of flowers and cream. Some peach too. Full-bodied, creamy and fine with mineral, chalk and sliced green apples that turn to delicate white peach. Drink now." (October 2012)

name: BILLECART SALMON - BRUT NATURE
tastingDescription: 92 Points, James Suckling - "This extra brut has a super crisp aperitif-style with great fruit purity and savory persistence. Aromas and flavors of little wild red fruits, as well as an array of cool, crisp reed and green apples on the palate. Super fresh. Drink now." (September 2018)

name: BILLECART SALMON - BRUT ROSE
tastingDescription: 94 Points, James Suckling - "A gorgeous rosé Champagne with sliced strawberries, orange peel and hints of cream and pie crust. Medium body, tight and integrated tannins and a long and flavorful finish. Tangy acidity. The texture shows a fine bead and lightness. Long and intense. Drink now." (September 2018)

name: BILLECART SALMON - CUVEE NICOLAS FRANCOIS BILLECART 2002
nameSanitized: billecart salmon - cuvee nicolas francois billecart 2002
sort: BILLECART SALMON - CUVEE NICOLAS FRANCOIS BILLECART 2002
tastingDescription: 98 Points, James Suckling - "A very composed Champagne with plenty of still fresh lemon and white cherry fruits on offer. There's impressive clarity, power and richness here. The nose has candied peach, strawberry, white cherry and grilled nuts. Very flavorsome palate with pastry flavors adding savory notes to the stone fruits and citrus. Toasted almonds and chalky minerals define the long finish. Still so young and powerful! Drink now." (October 2017)

name: BILLECART SALMON - VINTAGE 2007
tastingDescription: 93 Points, James Suckling: "The spicy pinot noir holds sway on the nose with an array of sous bois, flinty minerals, dried cherries and brioche. The smaller component of chardonnay (25%) delivers a crisp lemon acidity on entry, which builds weight to a cherry-pastry finish." (September 2018)

name: BISOL - JEIO PROSECCO ROSE
tastingDescription: Pink in the glass, delicate with brilliant nuances, and a very fine perlage. Floral, sweetness of rose and lily of the valley, with a fresh citrus fragrance. Soft, balanced, clean cut, distinct, and elegant on the palate.

name: BLACK CELLAR - MALBEC MERLOT
tastingDescription: With this Malbec Merlot, the winemaker experimented with 13 different blends before the ultimate one was achieved. The result is a smooth, full-flavoured wine with an abundance of sweet cherry, blueberry and spice aromas and flavours that embody the mystique of the Black Cellar.

name: BLACK CELLAR - MALBEC MERLOT
tastingDescription: With this Malbec Merlot, the winemaker experimented with 13 different blends before the ultimate one was achieved. The result is a smooth, full-flavoured wine with an abundance of sweet cherry, blueberry and spice aromas and flavours that embody the mystique of the Black Cellar.

name: BLACK CELLAR - MALBEC MERLOT
tastingDescription: With this Malbec Merlot, the winemaker experimented with 13 different blends before the ultimate one was achieved. The result is a smooth, full-flavoured wine with an abundance of sweet cherry, blueberry and spice aromas and flavours that embody the mystique of the Black Cellar.

name: BLACK CELLAR - SHIRAZ CABERNET
tastingDescription: Traditional red wine making with French and American oak aging for added depth of flavour and complexity. Medium-bodied and fruit-forward with a bouquet of blue plum, cherry and black current, accented by spice. Enjoy with red meats with sauces and marinades; barbecued ribs; burgers with all the fixings.

name: BLACK HILLS - ALIAS
tastingDescription: The 2016 Alias is a blend of 30% Riesling, 28% Pinot Blanc, 19% Gewürztraminer, 9% Schoenberger, 8% Muscat and 6% Ehrenfelser. Off-dry notes of lemon peel, pineapple, passionfruit and guava are balanced by a refreshing streak of acidity, finishing on a juicy note. Enjoy with sushi, curry or lemongrass chicken.

name: BLACK HILLS - NOTA BENE 2018
tastingDescription: Unmistakably Nota Bene on the nose, the 19th edition of our flagship wine shows cassis, dark berry and cherry aromas, alongside notes of cedar and dark chocolate. Fresh berry fruit and French oak flavours shape the palate, with additional complexity coming from hints of mint and sage. Ample fresh acidity frames a long fruit driven finish.

name: BLACK HILLS - SYRAH 2018
tastingDescription: This ripe Syrah offers black and blue fruits with savoury earth, cocoa and peppery notes. It finishes on a smoked meat character.

name: BLACK SAGE VINEYARD - CABERNET FRANC 2018
tastingDescription: Rich aromas of red cherries, dried strawberries, and toasted vanilla. The palate has lots of red currants and more dried strawberries with a nice soft toastiness. The tannins are soft and approachable, and the acidity is balanced and has a medium finish.

name: BLACK SAGE VINEYARD - CABERNET SAUVIGNON 2018
tastingDescription: Bright aromas of black currants, blackberries, mocha, toast, and some subtle minerality. The palate is full of dark fruit f lavours with an undertone of rich toasted oak and spice. The tannins are pleasant and soft with an approachable acidity. The finish is long lasting and the flavour persists on the palate.

name: BLACK SAGE VINEYARD - MERLOT 2018
tastingDescription: Picked at peak ripeness, the grapes were fermented in stainless steel tanks for 2 weeks and was pumped over twice daily during the fermentation. The wine then went through malolactic fermentation and was aged in specially selected French and American oak barrels for 18 months.

name: BLACK SAGE VINEYARD - PIPE 2010
tastingDescription: Pipe is a Port-style blend aged in oak barrels for more than 3 years, yielding luscious flavours of ripe cherry and soft blackberry with a hint of fig.

name: BLANDY'S - 10 YEAR OLD SERCIAL MADEIRA
tastingDescription: 92 Points, Wine Enthusiast - "As warmer weather approaches, this is a wine that should immediately come to mind at apéritif time. This bone-dry style, with its inimitable nutty character, is so fresh, so vibrant. It has some tannins, enlivening acidity giving a great lift at the end. Bring on the freshly salted, roasted almonds." (December 2008)

name: BLANDY'S - 5 YEAR OLD GIFT PACK
tastingDescription: Dark, golden brown with characteristic Madeira bouquet of raisins, toffee and nuts. Sweet with a rich, full bodied, honeyed and complex finish and beautifully balanced acidity.

name: BLANDY'S - RICH DUKE OF CLARENCE MADEIRA
nameSanitized: blandys - rich duke of clarence madeira
sort: BLANDY'S - RICH DUKE OF CLARENCE MADEIRA
tastingDescription: Deep golden brown colour with honey and raisins on the nose and a full-bodied and softly textured palate. A great after-dinner drink. It is a superb accompaniment to dessert dishes, especially fruits, cakes, chocolate puddings and soft cheeses. It will keep for several months after opening.

name: BLANDY'S - SERCIAL 1980
tastingDescription: 96 points, Wine Spectator - "This is rich, with racy cut driving the clove, dark tea, bitter orange, date, walnut and hazelnut aromas and flavors. Ends on a note of buckwheat honey, staying dry. Drink now. 220 cases made. � JM"

name: BLASTED CHURCH - CABERNET SAUVIGNON MERLOT 2018
tastingDescription: The 2017 Cabernet Merlot opens with a bouquet of cassis, blueberry, dried herbs, plum and leather on the nose, all underlined with savoury chocolate and coffee notes derived from its time in barrel. Rounded notes of dark fruit, dried herb and cocoa carry through to the mid-palate where the structure builds and persists into the smooth, well-balanced finish. Beef, lamb, duck or mushroom dishes would be perfect companions for this wine.

name: BLASTED CHURCH - HATFIELD'S FUSE 2019
tastingDescription: The 2018 Hatfield's Fuse is a cornucopia of flavours made with 11 different grape varietals. The wine opens with an abundance of stone fruit - apricot and peach - followed by spicy floral notes, green apple, lemon and orange blossom that carry to a bright, well-balanced finish. Enjoy with everything from sushi and halibut to curry dishes, roasted chicken and creamy pastas.

name: BLOUBERG - STELLENBOSCH
tastingDescription: This wine is made from a blend of Sauvignon Blanc (60%), Sémillon (20%), and Cape Riesling (20%) grapes. A brilliant green. Aromas of asparagus and green figs. Off-dry lemony flavors with a crisp and fresh finish follow through on the palate. The wine maker suggests pairing this wine with a range of foods, from pizza and pastas, to seafood, poultry, and cream-based dishes and cheeses.

name: BLUE NUN - SICHEL SOHNE
tastingDescription: Fantastic scents of apples and fruits create a luscious, delicate wine. With a mineral taste and refreshing acidity the Blue Nun Rivaner enthuses with its playful finesse of a slight residual sweetness.

name: BOBAL ROSADO - SIERRA SALINAS
tastingDescription: Intense pink with touches of violet. Sweet and traditional confectionery, all strawberry chewing gum, soft sweets and fresh cream. Fresh, fruity and balanced, smooth and with a long finish.

name: BODACIOUS - BOURBON
tastingDescription: Rich, bold, smooth, and tasty with aromas of black cherry, vanilla, and spice.

name: BODACIOUS - BUBBLES
tastingDescription: This sparkling is refreshing, crisp and fruit-forward, with aromas of tropical fruit, citrus and peach.

name: BODACIOUS - CABERNET SAUVIGNON
tastingDescription: Juicy, ripe and robust with aromas of blackberry and black currant.

name: BODACIOUS - CABERNET SAUVIGNON
tastingDescription: Juicy, ripe and robust with aromas of blackberry and black currant.

name: BODACIOUS - DARK
tastingDescription: Aromas of blackberry burst with vibrancy on the palate, enhanced with decadent flavours of mocha and hints of vanilla for a silky, smooth finish.

name: BODACIOUS - MALBEC
tastingDescription: Spicy, rich, robust and intense with aromas of cherry, plum, and blackberry

name: BODACIOUS - PINOT GRIGIO
tastingDescription: Fresh, fruity, aromatic and easy-drinking with aromas of citrus.

name: BODACIOUS - SMOOTH RED
tastingDescription: A bold, ripe, juicy and full-bodied red that is a blend of Merlot and Cabernet Sauvignon. Rich flavours and aromas of blueberries and blackcurrant are present from start to finish.

name: BODACIOUS - SMOOTH RED
tastingDescription: A bold, ripe, juicy and full-bodied red that is a blend of Merlot and Cabernet Sauvignon. Rich flavours and aromas of blueberries and blackcurrant are present from start to finish.

name: BODACIOUS - SMOOTH RED
tastingDescription: A bold, ripe, juicy and full bodied red that is a blend of Merlot and Cabernet Sauvignon.  Rich flavours and aromas of blueberries and black current are present from start to finish.

name: BODACIOUS - SMOOTH WHITE
tastingDescription: Rich, crisp and fruit-forward, Bodacious Smooth White is blend of Sauvignon Blanc and Moscato that opens up with aromas of tropical fruit, citrus and peach.

name: BODACIOUS - SMOOTH WHITE
tastingDescription: Rich, crispand fruit forward.  Bodacious Smooth White is a blend of Sauvignon blanc and Moscato that opens up with aromas of tropical fruit, citrus and peach.

name: BODACIOUS - SMOOTH WHITE
tastingDescription: Rich, crisp and fruit-forward, Bodacious Smooth White is blend of Sauvignon Blanc and Moscato that opens up with aromas of tropical fruit, citrus and peach.

name: BODEGAS FILLABOA - SELECCION FINCA MONTE ALTO ALBARINO 2017
nameSanitized: bodegas fillaboa - seleccion finca monte alto albarino 2017
sort: BODEGAS FILLABOA - SELECCION FINCA MONTE ALTO ALBARINO 2017

This is full in body, with just enough acidity to keep the balance right. Melon and apple flavors are leesy like the nose, while the finish is consistent." (March 2020)

class: Other Country Fruit and Dessert Wine
name: BOKBUNJA-UM BLACK RASPBERRY
