name: BOLGHERI - GUADO AL TASSO IL BRUCIATO 2018
nameSanitized: bolgheri - guado al tasso il bruciato 2018
sort: BOLGHERI - GUADO AL TASSO IL BRUCIATO 2018
tastingDescription: 93 Points, James Suckling - "There's a very fresh array here of thyme, newly picked blackcurrants, iodine, crushed stones and sea salt. The exuberant fruit is matched nicely to fine and elegant tannins, which paint a compact and neat picture on the medium-to full-bodied palate. Drink from 2021" (November, 2019)

name: BOLGHERI - LE SERRE NUOVE ORNELLAIA 2018
tastingDescription: 95 - 96, James Suckling: "Really beautiful second wine from Ornellaia with blackcurrant and blueberry aromas and flavors. Full body and round, soft tannins that caress the palate" (November 2019)

name: BOLGHERI - LE SERRE NUOVE ORNELLAIA 2019
tastingDescription: This 2019 has a nose full of fresh notes of ripe red fruits, accompanied by a lively balsamic vein with aromatic hints of cypress and eucalyptus berries. The wine is soft and silky in the mouth, filling it with an elegant tannic texture and a sapid and persistent finish.

name: BOLGHERI - ORNELLAIA LE SERRE NUOVE 2016
tastingDescription: Dark in colour, the wine shows a charming nose of perfectly ripe red fruit and spices. The palate is rich and well-rounded with beautiful velvety-textured tannins that coat the palate. A wine that combines immediate pleasure and great ageing capacity.

name: BOLGHERI - POGGIO AL TESORO IL SEGGIO 2018
nameSanitized: bolgheri - poggio al tesoro il seggio 2018
sort: BOLGHERI - POGGIO AL TESORO IL SEGGIO 2018
tastingDescription: 98 Points, Decanter: "Complex aromas in which notes of copse and warm stone mingle with fine leather and sun-warmed plums: classy and refined. It's deep, dark, vivid and long on the palate, with supple yet ample tannins; the bright fruits shade into laurel and thyme... Beautifully crafted... 2018-2030." (April 2018)

name: BOLGHERI SUPERIORE - GUADO AL TASSO
tastingDescription: Guado al Tasso 2017 is intensely ruby red in color. Its nose is intact, clean and powerful and has hints of small red ripe fruits such as raspberries, wild strawberries, arbutus, wild blackberries and pleasant notes of laurel and mint.

name: BOLGHERI SUPERIORE - ORNELLAIA 2014
tastingDescription: 95 Points, James Suckling: “A solid and structured red with tile, dark berry and black tea character and some cloves, too. Full body, tannic and rich. Needs time to soften. Well done for a 2014. Ornellaia shows its pedigree here. Better in 2019.” (August 2017)

name: BOLGHERI SUPERIORE - ORNELLAIA 2015
tastingDescription: 97 Points, Wine Spectator: “A big, brooding red, packed with blackberry, plum and earth flavors, all wrapped in spicy oak. Monolithic now, finishing with saline mineral elements, a leafy tobacco edge and dense, mouthcoating tannins. Terrific potential. Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot, Cabernet Franc and Petit Verdot. Best from 2023 through 2038.” (July 2018)

name: BOLGHERI SUPERIORE - ORNELLAIA 2016
tastingDescription: 98 Points, James Suckling; 98 Points, Decanter; 98 Points, Robert Parker - Beautifully concentrated yet primordial effort that offers serious intensity in its cassis, black cherry, graphite, bay leaf and spring flower aromas and flavors. Full-bodied and multi-dimensional on the palate.

name: BOLGHERI SUPERIORE - ORNELLAIA 2017
tastingDescription: 97 Points, James Suckling - "A big, rich wine for the vintage, poised and lively with firm, chewy tannins that give form and intensity to the wine. It shows loads of blackberry, blackcurrant and walnut flavors. Ripe yet polished tannins. Give this three or four years to come together." ( May 2020)

name: BOLGHERI SUPERIORE - ORNELLAIA 2018
tastingDescription: Ornellaia 2018 features a lively and intense aromatic expression, a distinctive mark of the vintage. With the first taste it is enveloping and all its components well-balanced: the tannins, both dense and silky in texture, fill the palate with elegance and precision. The finish is fresh and persistence.

name: BOLLA - PROSECCO EXTRA DRY
tastingDescription: A clear, bright, deep straw in colour. Appealing ripe fruit on the nose with hints of apple, pear and peach. Fresh and fruity on the palate with a great vein of acidity and lively finish.

name: BOLLICINI - SPARKLING CUVEE
tastingDescription: Crisp, fragrant notes of apple, peach and pear. Delicious on its own or with appetizers, it also pairs perfectly with light appetizers, fresh seafood, grilled chicken, salads and desserts.

name: BOLLICINI - SPARKLING ROSE CAN
tastingDescription: Crisp and fragrant notes of strawberry and red berry. For all your Bubbly Moments

name: BOLLINGER - BRUT ROSE
tastingDescription: 93 Points, Wine Spectator - "Focused and vibrant, this finely meshed rosé Champagne marries a firm acidic frame and a chalky texture with a tightly knit range of crushed raspberry, toast, candied lemon zest and fragrant ground spice notes that linger on the mouthwatering finish. Drink now through 2022." (November 2018)

name: BOLLINGER - LA GRANDE ANNEE 2012 GIFT BOX
nameSanitized: bollinger - la grande annee 2012 gift box
sort: BOLLINGER - LA GRANDE ANNEE 2012 GIFT BOX
tastingDescription: 97 Points, Wine Spectator - "This goes from zero to 60 right out of the gate...tightly meshed flavours of crushed black currant, ground coffee, candied grapefruit peel and toasted almond. The profile expands on the palate, carried by the fine, raw silk-li

name: BOLLINGER - R.D. CRYSTAL SET 1988
tastingDescription: Presenting one of the noblest offerings from Champagne! 1.5L of liquid gold from an incredible vintage in Champagne that has been bench marked for ageing potential. Golden goodness reveals toasty notes of brioche along with stewed apples, citrus curd and vibrant acidity. Complex, balanced and gracefully aged, it is currently wearing its third decade elegantly and is ready to be appreciated now. Of course, it can hold a few more years, that is… if you are willing to wait! This Crystal Set offers an unparalleled opportunity for any collector of premium and aged wines to own one of the world’s most unique gems. Only 307 such sets were designed and hand-crafted by Saint-Louis Crystal in Lorraine, France for the whole world. We are one of the very few privileged retailers to have an extremely limited quantity available.

name: BOLLINGER - R.D. EXTRA BRUT 2007
tastingDescription: 97 Points, Wine Advocate: "Bollinger's eagerly awaited 2007 Extra-Brut R. D. is beautiful, unwinding in the glass with aromas of crisp orchard fruit, citrus pith and white flowers mingled with hints of honey, orange oil, buttery pastry, English walnuts and delicately spicy bass notes. Full-bodied, vibrant and incisive..." (March 2021)

name: BOLLINGER - SPECIAL CUVEE BRUT
tastingDescription: 96 Points, Decanter - "The complexity and richness of Special Cuvee is unparalleled among the entry non-vintage blends of every Champagne house...it's the dynamic freshness and vitality that really set it apart as one of the most affordable Champagne benchmarks."  (July, 2020).

name: BOLLINGER - SPECIAL CUVEE BRUT
tastingDescription: 92 Points, Wine Advocate - "This has a refreshing, concentrated bouquet of citrus fruits, sweet cherries, ripe apples, white flowers, toast, walnuts, ripe apricots and peaches, with just a touch of brioche. On the palate, this is an intense, very elegant and refined cuvée with a very long, refreshing, intense, aromatic and salty finish. Drink: 2018 - 2030." (June 2018)

name: BOLLINGER - SPECIAL CUVEE BRUT
tastingDescription: 96 Points, Decanter - "The complexity and richness of Special Cuvee is unparalleled among the entry non-vintage blends of every Champagne house...it's the dynamic freshness and vitality that really set it apart as one of the most affordable Champagne benchmarks."  (July, 2020).

name: BORDEAUX - ALTO DE CANTENAC BROWN BLANC 2018
nameSanitized: bordeaux - alto de cantenac brown blanc 2018
sort: BORDEAUX - ALTO DE CANTENAC BROWN BLANC 2018
tastingDescription:
"This nearly pure sauvignon blanc shows freshness and density at the same time for the vintage. Full-bodied, exotic and crisp. The clay and limestone soils helped."
93-94 pts, James Suckling

name: BORDEAUX - CHATEAU D'AIGUILHE 2018
tastingDescription:
The 2018 d'Aiguilhe offers up a compelling mélange of inky red/ purplish fruit and plenty of structure to match. It is impressive in its peer group, but also needs quite a bit of time to be at its best. The 2018 is not quite as showy as it was en primeur, and yet its energy and depth are intriguing. Drinking Window: 2023 - 2033.
92 pts, Vinous

name: BORDEAUX - CHATEAU DE COURTEILLAC
tastingDescription: Courteillac benefits from a privileged location, 20 minutes southeast of Saint-Emilion and 14km south of Castillon la Bataille, in the commune of Ruch, one of the highest plateau of the Entre-Deux-Mers. The wine is fruit-forward with a lot of character and excellent balance.

name: BORDEAUX - CHATEAU MARJOSSE ROUGE 2018
tastingDescription:
"The 2018 Marjosse is made up of 80% Merlot, 10% Cabernet Sauvignon and 10% Cabernet Franc with a splash of old Malbec. Medium to deep garnet-purple in color, it opens with a compelling nose of baking spices, raspberry pie, warm red and black currants, rose hip tea and fragrant earth with a waft of wild sage. Medium-bodied, the palate is filled with fragrant red and black fruit, framed by great freshness and soft, supple tannins, finishing on a floral note."
90-92+ pts, Wine Advocate

name: BORDEAUX - CHATEAU PEY LA TOUR 2017
tastingDescription: The rich bouquet develops notes of fresh, ripe fruit. Very pleasing from the outset, thanks to its appealing rounded character, the wine becomes concentrated on the palate, where finesse and freshness meld with fruity notes. The wine culminates in a long, full-flavoured finish

name: BORDEAUX - CHATEAU SAINT BERNARD 2018
tastingDescription:
"Exceptional vintages like 2018 are an opportunity to look for values in petits châteaux such as this one. Purple plums and other ripe, dark fruits are prominent on the nose along with flowers and spice. Tannins support the palate without being overwhelming. Juicy and youthful, this wine will be ready to drink in 2022. Enjoy with Lamb Chops au Poivre."
90 pts, Barbara Philip MW

name: BORDEAUX - CLARENDELLE 2015
tastingDescription: 91 Points, James Suckling - "Fresh nose with berries and chocolate with hints of hazelnuts. Sandalwood. Medium-bodied, linear and focused with fine tannins and a delicious finish. Drink and enjoy."

name: BORDEAUX - LE DEFI DE FONTENIL 2018
tastingDescription:
"Deep purple-black in color, the 2018 Le Defi Fontenil is a little subdued by oak to begin, opening out to fragrant blueberry coulis, baked plums and chocolate-covered cherries scents with hints of roasted nuts, black olives and garrigue. Full-bodied and concentrated, with great richness, it has a firm, grainy texture and seamless freshness, finishing long and savory."
93-95 pts, Wine Advocate
12 bottle limit

name: BORDEAUX - MOUTON CADET
tastingDescription: The nose opens on black fruit aromas of bilberry and blackcurrant, then with aeration develops notes of refined spice, especially cinnamon. From a full and firm attack, richly fruited and very smooth, the round and lush mid-palate reveals blackberry flavours and toasted notes, leading into a long and complex finish on expressive fruit.

name: BORDEAUX - MOUTON CADET HERITAGE EDITION 2017
tastingDescription: This Bordeaux is crimson red with rich aromas of blackberry, blackcurrant, and vanilla. Strong flavours of spice and ripe black fruit lead to a smooth finish

name: BORDEAUX 2017 DUCLOT COLLECTION CASE
tastingDescription:
Produced in limited quantities and protected by an authentication system, the Duclot Bordeaux Collection Case brings together some of the top Bordeaux chateaux. The 2017 vintage case contains one bottle each of the following: Chateau Lafite Rothschild (97+ pts, Wine Advocate), Chateau Mouton Rothschild (97 pts, Wine Spectator), Chateau Margaux (98 pts, Wine Advocate), Chateau Haut-Brion (97 pts, Wine Advocate), Chateau La Mission Haut-Brion (97 pts, Wine Advocate), Chateau Cheval Blanc (97+ pts, Vinous), Chateau Ausone (98 pts, Wine Advocate), Chateau Petrus (98+ pts, Wine Advocate), Chateau d'Yquem (97-99 pts, Wine Advocate)
1 bottle limit

name: BORDEAUX BLANC - AILE D'ARGENT 2018
tastingDescription:
"Composed of 55% Sauvignon Blanc and 45% Sémillon, the 2018 Aile d'Argent has 13% alcohol and is a little reticent to begin, offering fragrant notions of lemongrass, freshly chopped ginger and lemon tart with a core of fresh pineapples, white peaches and aniseed. The palate is rich, sultry and exotic with loads of spices and tropical fruit and an electric backbone of acid, finishing very long."
93-95 pts, Wine Advocate
2 bottle limit

name: BORDEAUX BLANC - CHATEAU REYNON 2014
tastingDescription: 89 Points, Wine Advocate: “...light white flower aromas. The palate is well balanced with crisp acidity, lively in the mouth with a twist of sour lemon. It gently fans out with a lively, citrus lemon and Granny Smith apple finish, plus a dash of white pepper on the aftertaste. Drink: 2017 - 2022." (March 2017)

name: BORDEAUX BLANC - CLARENDELLE 2019
tastingDescription: Wine Advocate - "The debut 2016 Clarendelle Blanc is a blend of 47% Sémillon, 42% Sauvignon Blanc and 11% Muscadelle. It has a straightforward Granny Smith and fresh pear scented bouquet. The palate is well balanced with crisp citrus fruit on the entry, fresh with green apple and a touch of peach skin, leading to a pleasant, sour lemon finish. Drink: 2017 - 2020.” (April 2017)

name: BORDEAUX BLANC - MOUTON CADET
tastingDescription: The powerful and fruit-driven nose opens on boxwood and lemon notes which gradually make way with airing for fuller fruit aromas such as apricot and vine peach. The ample and smooth attack on fresh citrus notes leads into a mid-palate which displays touches of herby flavours such as coriander, while boxwood flavours return on a long, zesty and fresh finish.

name: BORDEAUX BLANC - Y D 'YQUEM 2016
tastingDescription:
“A unique dry white Bordeaux with a cool, fragrant and vibrant personality. Lots of candied citrus and pineapple with hints of almonds and finely chopped fresh herbs. Although quite voluptuous and creamy on the palate, you’d never guess that it had 14.5 per cent alcohol, because of the wonderful, pineapple and lemon freshness. Just a whisker of sweetness at the long, elegant finish. A blend of 75 per cent sauvignon blanc and 25 per cent semillon. Drink or hold.”
97 Points, James Suckling
2 bottle limit

name: BORDEAUX ROSE - CHATEAU BROWN 2016
tastingDescription: Chateau Brown Rosé, produced for the first time in 2012, elegantly combines the terroir of red grapes (60% Cabernet Sauvignon and 40% Merlot) and the estate’s expertise in vinifying whites in French oak barrels, with maturation on the fine lees. It is gourmet and fruity in expression, like all the estate’s wines.

name: BORDEAUX ROUGE - JEAN PIERRE MOUEIX 2016
tastingDescription: Jean-Pierre Moueix Bordeaux is composed of Merlot and Cabernet Franc. The Merlot grape offers depth and complexity, while Cabernet Franc brings structure and spice to the blend. Combined, these varietals produce wines of character and body while maintaining a unique suppleness. The wine is ruby red with an intense, complex nose presenting notes of cherry, strawberry and blond tobacco. The palate is powerful and inviting with smooth, silky tannins.

name: BORDEAUX SUPERIEUR - CHATEAU CANADA 2018
tastingDescription: 90 points, Winescores.ca:  "Toasted, savoury, classic. The 2018 suggests chocolate covered cherries, vanilla, pipe tobacco and baking spices with lashings of cedar and dried rose petals. Cocoa, espresso, spice and charred oak flavours are layered with dusty plums. It's a classic wine; this vintage has notable grip and a toasty/savoury character." (February 18, 2021).

name: BORDEAUX SUPERIEUR - CHATEAU PEY LA TOUR RES DU CHATEAU 2016
nameSanitized: bordeaux superieur - chateau pey la tour res du chateau 2016
nameSuffix: CHATEAU PEY LA TOUR RES DU CHATEAU 2016
sort: BORDEAUX SUPERIEUR - CHATEAU PEY LA TOUR RES DU CHATEAU 2016
tastingDescription: 91 Points, James Suckling - A tight and very fine-tannined red here with currants, dark chocolate and subtle, hazelnut undertones. Medium body. Pretty. A blend of 87% Merlot and 13% Cabernet Sauvignon.

name: BORDERTOWN - CABERNET FRANC 2018
tastingDescription: Bordertown Vineyards and Estate Winery from Osoyoos in the south Okanagan presents its flagship red wine. This Cabernet Franc has dark berry flavours with wonderful underlying tobacco, dark spice and herbaceous green pepper notes. An ideal barbecue wine!

name: BORDERTOWN - SYRAH 2019
tastingDescription: Bordertown's Osoyoos estate grown Syrah has a lovely nose of violets and black fruits, leading to a palate of berry flavours, pepper and savoury notes.  It combines bright fruity flavours with a depth of complexity, finishing with a smooth velvety texture and fabulous length.

name: BOTTEGA - MOSCATO PETALO IL VINO DELL'AMORE
nameSanitized: bottega - moscato petalo il vino dellamore

tastingDescription: Il Vino dell’Amore Petalo Moscato is a white sparkling wine characterized by a clear sweetness, pronounced and elegant  bouquet, low alcohol content and a typical scent of roses that  evokes the image of petals on the label.

name: BOTTEGA - PROSECCO GOLD BRUT
tastingDescription: The striking presentation of this Prosecco is what grabs you first but the elegant texture and rich fruit flavours are what keep your attention

name: BOTTEGA - PROSECCO GOLD BRUT
tastingDescription: Festive, delicate, lively. Fresh and delicate nose of acacia, melon, pomelo, pears in honey and tangerine. It has a bright and lively bead, a creamy texture and plenty of crunchy orchard fruit flavours underscored with almond and citrus.

name: BOTTEGA - PROSECCO GOLD BRUT MAGNUM
tastingDescription: Festive, delicate, lively. Fresh and delicate nose of acacia, melon, pomelo, pears in honey and tangerine. It has a bright and lively bead, a creamy texture and plenty of crunchy orchard fruit flavours underscored with almond and citrus.

From subtle aromas of summer berries, spice and brioche through to the delicate creamy mousse that refreshes the palate, it offers light, red berry flavours and a lengthy mouth-watering finish. Great value, enjoy it whiling away an afternoon or with smoked salmon.

With fresh honey and white flower aromas, the wine shows elegant, rich white fruit on the palate in a medium-full body with fresh acidity. Pairs with most white, flaky fish such as Dover sole and halibut, white meat such as pork, and poultry. This wine can be enjoyed immediately or within five years of the vintage.

name: BOURGOGNE GAMAY - LOUIS LATOUR 2019
tastingDescription: Black cherry and strawberry leap from the glass while some spices, perhaps clove, are lurking underneath. The vibrant acidity maintains a refreshing palate

name: BOURGOGNE PINOT NOIR - BOUCHARD PERE RESERVE 2016
nameSanitized: bourgogne pinot noir - bouchard pere reserve 2016
sort: BOURGOGNE PINOT NOIR - BOUCHARD PERE RESERVE 2016
tastingDescription: 87 Points, Wine Advocate: "...a well-defined blackberry and crushed strawberry-scented bouquet, subtle tertiary scents filtering through. The palate is well balanced with a pleasant chewiness on the entry, good matière with satisfying freshness on the finish. Given the expected price, you cannot go wrong with this. Drink: 2017 - 2020." (December 2017)

tastingDescription: Made with grapes only from what is considered the best area in Burgundy, this Pinot Noir has aromas of red cherry, cranberry and spice. On the palate, it is dry and medium-bodied with fine grained tannins and mouth-watering acidity. This pairs to perfection with duck, seafood and soft cheese.

name: BOURGOGNE PINOT NOIR - LOUIS LATOUR 2018
tastingDescription: This is a classic, reliable, well-made Burgundian Pinot Noir at good price. Raspberry and strawberry aromas and flavours complement a savoury earthiness reminiscent of beetroot. A clean, balanced and supremely drinkable wine, try it with barbecued planked salmon, roasted duck or wild mushroom risotto.

name: BRIDE VALLEY - ROSE BELLA 2014

The palate is taut but has an appetizing touch of wet stone along with fresh, fruity notes and a mellow but bright autolytic core that creates a harmonious impression. Tiny bubbles fizz away beatifically, sure in the knowledge that they go straight to your heart.” (December 2017)

name: BRIGHTS - 74 APERA

name: BRINDISI RISERVA - CORTE OTTONE 2016
tastingDescription: Intense ruby red colour. In youth it has fresh varietal aromas that become more complex with time, thus it is a wine to age. During this time it loses its fruity notes, becomes more spicy with hints of  toast and vanilla coming from the oak. Even if tannins are still in evolution, this wine has a well balanced structure. It matches well with mature hard cheeses, roasted pork, beef steaks and all game dishes.

name: BROUILLY - CHATEAU DE PIERREUX 2019
tastingDescription: With a beautiful intense blueberry color, this Brouilly opens with floral notes, and black fruits. The palate is dense and elegant with hints of caramel and peonies. The tannins are melted and silk.

name: BRUNELLO DI MONTALCINO - ALTESINO 2014

name: BRUNELLO DI MONTALCINO - PERTIMALI DIECI
tastingDescription: 93 Points, Robert Parker's The Wine Advocate - "Released one decade after the harvest, the 2007 Brunello di Montalcino Dieci is a one-off wine meant to celebrate an exceptional vintage. The aging process sees 48 months in large Slavonian oak casks and the wine then rests in the bottle for the remaining years before its release. Only 8,000 bottles are available. The bouquet clearly shows tertiary aromas of licorice and tar, but the wine also has dark berry and dried cherry at its core. The finish is smooth and silky. The tannins have had considerable time to integrate. The wine still has life within and should continue its slow evolution" (May 2017)

It is medium to full bodied palate weight characterised by satisfying tannins and a savoury finish."

tastingDescription: Carmen was founded in 1850 and today is located in the heart of the Alto Maipo Valley next door to Santa Rita. With the discovery of Carmenere in Chile, the Carmen winery was one of the first to go to market with this varietal. The Frida Kahlo cuvee is new starting with the 2017 vintage and getting great reviews. A stronger year, 2018 shows even better in the glass at a price point that Chile can really over-deliver with.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - CARMEN GRAN RESERVA MAIPO 2018
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon - carmen gran reserva maipo 2018
sort: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - CARMEN GRAN RESERVA MAIPO 2018
tastingDescription: Carmen Gran Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon has a deep and intense ruby-red colour. The nose presents aromas of black currants, blackberries and licorice with smooth, elegant cedar notes. The palate is very rich and generous yet fresh and vibrant at the same time. The wine has abundant fruit and firm tannins that lend structure and depth. 94% Cabernet Sauvignon, 3% Carmenere, 3% Petite Verdot. Growing area: Maipo Alto Valley.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - CARMEN RESERVA PREMIER
tastingDescription: This wine has great concentration and personality. The nose is lush with blackcurrants, cherries and a soft hint of cedar. Vibrant and penetrating with fine-grained tannins and a firm yet silky texture.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - CARNIVOR
tastingDescription: Carnivor says it all! This big, bold and intense California red is packed with flavours of toasty oak, espresso, chocolate and dark jammy fruit. Serve with grilled, medium-rare red meats.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - CATENA HIGH MOUNTAIN VINES 2019
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon - catena high mountain vines 2019
sort: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - CATENA HIGH MOUNTAIN VINES 2019
tastingDescription: 93 Points, James Suckling - "Lots of spice and hints of dried herbs to the currant and berry aromas. Medium to full body. Firm, lightly chewy tannins and a balanced finish." (April 2020)

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - CAYMUS NAPA
tastingDescription: This lush and stylish wine, brimming with loads of rich dark berries, cocoa, vanilla and cassis has abundant but velvety tannins that caress the palate through the long finish.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - CAYMUS NAPA
tastingDescription: False

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - CAYMUS NAPA 2019
tastingDescription: Caymus has a signature style that is dark in colour, with rich fruit and ripe, velvety tannins – as approachable in youth as in maturity. This Cabernet offers layered, lush aromas and flavours, including cocoa, cassis and ripe dark berries.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - CHATEAU STE MICHELLE COLUMBIA VLY 2018
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon - chateau ste michelle columbia vly 2018
sort: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - CHATEAU STE MICHELLE COLUMBIA VLY 2018
tastingDescription: This Cabernet from Washington State packs a solid core of ripe, black fruits wrapped around silky, soft tannins. The finish is long and luxurious with a great balance between ripe fruit flavours and hints of toasty oak. Think grilled porterhouse or sirloin steak. Great value.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - CHOCALAN RESERVA MAIPO 2018
tastingDescription: 91 Points, Wine Enthusiast - "Spicy berry aromas show traditional side notes of eucalyptus and mint. A juicy palate has grip, structure and light tannic bite." (September 2020)

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - CLIFF LEDE NAPA STAGS LEAP 2017
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon - cliff lede napa stags leap 2017
sort: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - CLIFF LEDE NAPA STAGS LEAP 2017
tastingDescription: 91 Points Wine Advocate: "the 2017 leaps from the glass with notions of baked black plums, black forest cake and raspberry coulis with hints of cracked black pepper, hoisin, sautéed herbs and charcuterie. Medium to full-bodied, the palate is filled with juicy baked berries and plum preserves notions, soft tannins and plenty of freshness." (November 2019)

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - COLUMBIA CREST GRAND ESTATES
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon - columbia crest grand estates
sort: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - COLUMBIA CREST GRAND ESTATES
tastingDescription: Great complexity and structure. There are aromas of dark berry fruits and plum on the nose with chocolate and vanilla on the palate.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - COLUMBIA CREST H3 HORSE HEAVEN HILLS 17
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon - columbia crest h3 horse heaven hills 17

tastingDescription: 90 Points, Wine Spectator - "Supple and approachable, with lively black cherry and spiced herb flavors that linger on the finish. Drink now through 2022." (August 2018)

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - COLUMBIA WINERY COLUMBIA VALLEY
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon - columbia winery columbia valley
sort: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - COLUMBIA WINERY COLUMBIA VALLEY

With layers of complexity, this wine has a firm structure and smooth tannins that lead to a broad mouthfeel and soft, juicy finish. Notes of mocha and toffee complement the ripe blackberry and blackcurrant flavors.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - CONCHA Y TORO CASILLERO DEL DIABLO

This wine is best served with red meats, cheese, spicy stews, and pasta with spicy sauces.

tastingDescription: From the Maipo Valley. A deep red coloured wine with an unctuous cherry, cassis, cedar, blackberry, black tar and smokeled presence that has a deep concentration of flavours framed by firm tannins. A smooth, almost silky texture masks the firm tannic structure beneath, which really comes to the fore at the beginning of the long finish. Pair with red meats, spicy food and ripe cheeses.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - CONCHA Y TORO TERRUNYO PIRQUE 2015
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon - concha y toro terrunyo pirque 2015
sort: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - CONCHA Y TORO TERRUNYO PIRQUE 2015
tastingDescription: 92 Points, Tim Atkin:  With a deep, bright red color, this Cabernet Sauvignon reflects aromas of red fruits, black sarsaparilla, and blueberries. It also has mineral notes, like pencil lead. Good density, fresh acidity, and silky tannins. It has subtle notes of vanilla, graphite, and earth in its tenacious Finish.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - CONO SUR BICICLETA
tastingDescription: Offering notes of plum, raspberry and sweet spices, in the mouth there is hints of chocolate and subtle vanilla. Very structured, balanced, a long and elegant wine that is available in this half bottle (3 glasses x 125ml) format.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - CONO SUR BICICLETA
tastingDescription: Deep, impressive ruby-red colour. The nose starts with pleasant notes of plum, raspberry and sweet spices, while in the mouth, chocolate and subtle hints of vanilla can be appreciated. Very structured, balanced, long and elegant wine.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - CONO SUR RESERVA ESPECIAL COLCHAGUA
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon - cono sur reserva especial colchagua
sort: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - CONO SUR RESERVA ESPECIAL COLCHAGUA
tastingDescription: All the Especial wines come with a valley designation. Here the Cabernet Sauvignon hails from a new vineyard in Aconcagua which is north of Santiago and where the terrain becomes dryer and dryer as one goes north to the Atacama desert.  For the money there is considerable varietal fruit and structure showing in this wine and joins the Carmenere and Sauvignon Blanc on the shelf.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - COPPOLA BLACK LABEL CLARET 2018
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon - coppola black label claret 2018
sort: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - COPPOLA BLACK LABEL CLARET 2018
tastingDescription: Rich and aromatic, the Black Label Claret boasts beautiful extraction, velvety tannins, and robust character. Exotic spices and earthy nuances embellish dark, complex fruit flavors that are long-lived on the finish.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - DIAMOND CREEK MIXED CASE 2017
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon - diamond creek mixed case 2017
sort: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - DIAMOND CREEK MIXED CASE 2017
tastingDescription:
Available on May 29.
Only a handful of names produce Diamond Mountain AVA wines which are distinct for their volcanic soils and elevation above the fog influence. In modern times this mountainside location was restarted by Diamond Creek in 1968 with small vineyards planted of Bordeaux varieties. One of California's iconic names, the 2017 Diamond Creek vineyard collection will be sold as a 6-pack case containing two bottles each of the following: Gravelly Meadow Cabernet Sauvignon 2017 (95 points, James Suckling), Red Rock Terrace Cabernet Sauvignon 2017 (97 points, James Suckling), and Volcanic Hill Cabernet Sauvignon 2017 (96 points, James Suckling).
One case per customer.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - DOMAINE BOUSQUET MENDOZA ORGANIC VEGAN
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon - domaine bousquet mendoza organic vegan
sort: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - DOMAINE BOUSQUET MENDOZA ORGANIC VEGAN
tastingDescription: 90 Points James Suckling: "Aromas of brambleberries, purple flowers and blackberry leaf. It's medium-bodied with powdery tannins and a fresh finish. From organically grown grapes. Vegan. Drink now." (July 2021)

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - DUCKHORN DECOY CALIFORNIA 2018
tastingDescription: Decoy Sonoma County Cabernet Sauvignon offers a rich and appealing expression of the varietal crafted to be ready upon release.  From its deep, inviting colour to its enticing aromas of blackberry, currant and cocoa, this wine showcases what we love about great Sonoma County Cabernet Sauvignon. On the palate, the lush fruit flavours are framed by rich tannins and hints of sweet oak and spice.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - DUCKHORN NAPA 2017
tastingDescription: Complex and compelling, this wine has vibrant layers of red and black fruit mingled with hints of violet, dried herbs, black licorice and graphite on the nose. The flavours echo the aromas, with lovely black currant and licorice elements supported by firm, impeccably balanced, tannins and an excellent structure. Good acidity helps to carry the juicy dark fruit notes through to a long, satisfying finish.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - DUNN HOWELL MOUNTAIN 2017
tastingDescription: 97 Points, Antonio Galloni: "Powerful and ample, it marries the natural intensity of the year with the savouriness that makes Howell Mountain Cabernets so distinctive. Dark blue/purplish fruit, graphite, spice, leather, dried herbs and lavender imbue the 2017 with striking intensity and character.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - DYNAMITE VINEYARDS 2019
tastingDescription: Full-bodied with flavors of blackberry, plum and cassis spread out, tinged with cedar and hints of chocolate and vanilla. Smooth and inviting, the ripe berry flavors linger across the finish.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - EDGE ALEXANDER VALLEY 2018
tastingDescription: 93 Points, James Suckling: "A firm, polished red with plenty of currant and berry aromas, as well as hints of bark and mushroom, following through to a full body with round, juicy tannins and a flavorful finish. It's refined and flavourful with lots of fruit on the finish." (Nov. 2020)

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - ENIGMA
tastingDescription: False

tastingDescription: Fresh and intense aromas of red and black fruits accompanied by lightly spiced notes. Good structure and body with a juicy sensation attributes to the fresh acidity, polished tannins and lingering finish.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - ESCORIHUELA 1884 ESTATE GROWN MENDOZA

It doles out sweet blueberry, raspberry, cassis, vanilla, crushed flowers, pipe tobacco and baking spice on the nose and in the mouth. Expect a pleasingly fresh wine with a spicy chocolate finish. Pairs deliciously with Parmigiano-Reggiano polenta or lamb stew.

Currant fruit, savoury notes, freshness and good linger denote this red. Match to red meat dishes, pizza night or when the slow cooker is working your favourite recipe.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - FINCA LOS PRIMOS
tastingDescription: The taste of Cabernet Sauvignon is always so regal, showing lots of currant berry fruit partnered with oak barrel complexities. Check out this top selling Argentinian Cabernet and match it to beef, lamb or grilled veggies.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - FLAGSTONE POETRY
tastingDescription: A perfect companion to barbequed fare! Rounded plum notes with black tea, olives and cinnamon along with supple tannins make this wine a delicious companion to lamb souvlaki, grilled kebabs or vegetable skewers.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - FLIP FLOP
tastingDescription: False

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - FORMAN VINEYARDS 2015
tastingDescription: 97+ Points, Vinous - “A totally dazzling wine, Ric Forman's 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon is easily one of the wines of the vintage. Today, the 2013 is dense, powerful and explosive, with fabulous energy and tons of sheer intensity. Graphite, smoke, tobacco and layers of dark-fleshed fruit all open up in the glass.” (October 2015)

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - FREEMARK ABBEY NAPA
tastingDescription: 94 points, Wine Enthusiast: "This impressive wine possesses just over 16% Merlot and touches of Malbec, Petit Verdot and Cabernet Franc. Using a small percentage of new French oak, it offers dusty texture and well-defined flavors of dark cherry, plum, rock and earth.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - FREI BROTHERS RESERVE ALEXANDER VLY 17
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon - frei brothers reserve alexander vly 17
sort: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - FREI BROTHERS RESERVE ALEXANDER VLY 17
tastingDescription: There are 3 valleys in Sonoma, as you head inland they provide buffer to the cool Pacific ocean. Alexander Valley runs from the centre of the Sonoma County east to the Mayacamas range that borders with Napa. Warming heat and less ocean influence allows the reds like Cabernet Sauvignon to ripen especially well. Alexander Cabernets are known for a chocolate note. An excellent example of the value that Sonoma Cabernet from a sub-AVA location within Sonoma can offer.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - GALIL MOUNTAIN KOSHER
tastingDescription: Deep opaque purple. Pure ripe raspberry and blueberry primary fruit character, with hints of herbs and tobacco leaf. A medium-to-full bodied wine with delicate tannins. The finish is long and firm. Best served at 64 F / 18 C to accompany a wide range of meat dishes.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - GIRARD NAPA 2017
tastingDescription: 90 Points, Wine Advocate - "The 2016 opens with youthful black cherries, warm plums and cassis notions with hints of dried herbs, underbrush, new leather and pencil lead. The medium to full-bodied palate is laden with earth-laced black fruits, with a velvety frame and good length. Drink: 2019 - 2030." (October 2018)

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - GNARLED VINE
tastingDescription: Oakridge winery is based in Lodi California, and specialize in reds like Zinfandel and in this case Cabernet Sauvignon. The ripening heat here in the San Joaquin Valley is what has made this one of California's largest food production zones with a huge range of crops. Great grapey fruit here, currant notes and long on the finish.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - GRACELAND STELLENBOSCH 2018
tastingDescription: This is a great example of Stellenbosch Cabernet. An elegant bouquet of perfumed plums, cassis, cocoa, spice and violets lead to a medium-bodied palate with structured, fine-grained tannins, wonderful harmony and an intricately woven thread of acidity imparting tautness on the finish.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - GUNSIGHT ROCK PASO ROBLES
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon - gunsight rock paso robles

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - HESS SELECT NORTHCOAST 2017
tastingDescription: 90 Points, Wine Enthusiast - "This plushly textured and luxuriously ripe wine has soothing baking spice aromas, soft plum and blackberry syrup flavors and a medium body. Moderate tannins boosted by 11% Petite Sirah are well integrated and make for a velvety mouthfeel." (December 2017)

Taste: blackberry and blackcurrant, with notes of biscotti and nougat, as well as roasted nuts. Fine tannins provide texture and structure.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - JOSEPH PHELPS INNISFREE NAPA VALLEY 17
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon - joseph phelps innisfree napa valley 17
sort: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - JOSEPH PHELPS INNISFREE NAPA VALLEY 17
tastingDescription: 90 Points, Wine.com: "The 2017 Innisfree Cabernet Sauvignon is lush and nicely balanced. This wine is bright and persistent with black fruit, licorice, and savory spices in its aromas and flavors. Enjoy it with roast duck in a white wine reduction sauce." (August 2020)

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - JOSEPH PHELPS NAPA ESTATE 2018
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon - joseph phelps napa estate 2018
sort: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - JOSEPH PHELPS NAPA ESTATE 2018
tastingDescription: 95 Points, James Suckling - "Lots of burnt orange with currant and dust undertones. Some rose petal, too. Full body, chewy and tannic with lots of tension and intensity. Needs two or three years to soften but already a very impressive wine for the vintage. Drink in 2020." (December 2017)

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - JOSH CELLARS 2018
tastingDescription: One of the hottest brands in the USA right now is Josh with their Cabernet Sauvignon being the driver in a bold expressive taste profile that is approachable now. Utilizing Mendocino, Sonoma, Lake Country and Napa fruit, the taste is textbook California Cabernet with black currant, plum, black fruits and some cigar box hints in the finish.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - KAIKEN SELECCION ESPECIAL
tastingDescription: Owned by Montes of Chile, this Kaiken Cabernet Sauvignon confirms the ability for Argentina to make delicious reds from this noble variety.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - KWV CATHEDRAL CELLAR
tastingDescription: The layered and complex Cabernet Sauvignon shows hints of chocolate, dried herbs, dark berries and subtle cassis on the nose. It is truly rich, concentrated and generous, with a full bodied tannin structure and lingering finish.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - LAKE SONOMA COUNTY 2018
tastingDescription: This Cabernet Sauvignon blend expresses the diversity of Sonoma County's growing regions. On the palate, this wine welcomes you with dark cherry and cranberry, white pepper and hints of toasty oak. Fine, silky tannins are complemented by a smooth, lingering finish.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - LAYER CAKE 2018
tastingDescription: This wine jumps from the glass with aromas of ripe Bing cherries and blackberries plus cedar and tobacco. Deep layers of spice-infused dark fruit fill the mouth, with a rich, creamy layered texture and powerful structure. Flavours of chocolate and espresso continue through the long, lingering finish. Enjoy with steak and ribs, bison burger, pastas, lamb, strong-flavoured cheeses and dark chocolate.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - LINDEMANS BIN 45
tastingDescription: This wine displays aromas of dark berry fruits, with hints of cedar and oak. The medium to full bodied palate exudes plum and blackcurrant flavours with a touch of mint supported within a soft tannin structure.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - LINDEMANS GENTLEMAN'S COLLECTION
tastingDescription: With rich notes of blackcurrant and cassis a smooth finish and aroma of blueberry and violet, this variety is the perfect companion for a sophisticated soiree. Pair with pasta, red meat or a cheese platter to truly impress.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - LONGSHOT
tastingDescription: Fruit forward, juicy with good varietal and fruit character. The wines are consumer friendly and made to go with food menus and casual occasions.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - LOS VASCOS CROMAS GRAN RESERVA
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon - los vascos cromas gran reserva
sort: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - LOS VASCOS CROMAS GRAN RESERVA
tastingDescription: Los Vascos is a large investment in Chile by the Lafite Rothschild group. The breed and tannic structure of Bordeaux varieties is enhanced by the addition of some Syrah and the ripeness of the Colchagua growing area. Refinement and fruit combine here to offer excellent value. Highly recommended.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - LOUIS MARTINI NAPA 2017
tastingDescription: 93-95 Points, Wine Advocate: “The 2014 Cabernet Sauvignon Napa Valley spends 18 months in a combination of 30% new and 70% used French and American barrels. It is another big boy at 15.4% natural alcohol. One of the strongest efforts yet from the Martinis, this cuvée still sells at a modest $38.00 [USD] – a fair price for something this compelling. The wine has an opaque purple color, a beautiful nose of blueberries, blackcurrants, licorice, camphor and graphite. The wine is full-bodied and multilayered on the palate with sensational richness and length. It should drink well for 20-25 years.” (October 2016)

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - LOUIS MARTINI SONOMA COUNTY 2018
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon - louis martini sonoma county 2018
sort: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - LOUIS MARTINI SONOMA COUNTY 2018
tastingDescription: A welcomingly round mouthfeel with ripe notes of red fruit and cherry, and a delicate hint of dark chocolate and oak spice on the finish that adds layers of elegance and freshness, offering a rich yet balanced expression of the varietal.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - MATCHBOOK RED GRAVEL DUNNIGAN HILLS 19
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon - matchbook red gravel dunnigan hills 19
sort: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - MATCHBOOK RED GRAVEL DUNNIGAN HILLS 19
tastingDescription: Dunnigan Hills is in the northern part of the Central Valley, a good spot that is slightly less hot, offering slower ripening conditions. Vineyards started here in 1981 and over time have been fine-tuned working with the red gravel soils and a blend that today is 75% Cabernet Sauvignon, 23% Petit Verdot and 2% Malbec. Excellent intensity, concentration and balance.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - MCGUIGAN BLACK LABEL
tastingDescription: Dark cherry and blackberry flavours are supported by fine ripe tannins and a hint of spicy oak.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - MCGUIGAN SINGLE BATCH PROJECT
