sort: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - MCGUIGAN SINGLE BATCH PROJECT
tastingDescription: Lashings of blackcurrant and berry fruit flavours combine with subtle oak integration and pleasant herbaceous notes before fine velvety tannins ensure a savory and long-lasting finish.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - MCGUIGAN THE PLAN
tastingDescription: Charming flavours of cherry and blackberry highlight this wine with a subtle oak influence of chocolate and vanilla. A full-flavoured wine with a rich finish. An ideal partner for red meat dishes, especially succulent roast dinners.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - MEIOMI
tastingDescription: With its deep ruby color, Meiomi Cabernet Sauvignon opens with expressive aromas of blackberry, boysenberry, and bramble, along with notes of toasty vanilla and graham cracker. This wine owes much of its complexity to a blend of premium grapes harvested from California's most notable winegrowing regions. Made in the unique Meiomi style, this fruit-forward, delicious red wine gracefully unifies each of its respective appellations, with flavors of black currant, minty herbs, ripe blackberry, raspberry, boysenberry, and other dark red, jammy fruits. The full flavors of this multifaceted cabernet wine are highlighted by a plush, velvety mouthfeel that leads to a long finish.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - MICHAEL DAVID FREAKSHOW LODI 2018
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon - michael david freakshow lodi 2018
sort: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - MICHAEL DAVID FREAKSHOW LODI 2018
tastingDescription: 91 points, Wine Enthusiast - "...extravagant aromas of mulled fruit and baking spice. The palate is delicious in ripe black-fruit flavors that are framed by soft tannins that seem to melt in the mouth. For all its big features, it's easy to drink and appreciate." (March 2020)

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - MICHEL TORINO DON DAVID RESERVE
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon - michel torino don david reserve
sort: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - MICHEL TORINO DON DAVID RESERVE
tastingDescription: This dark ruby-red wine has persistent aromas of spices accompanied by smoky and tobacco notes. It is powerful, well-balanced and full of ripe tannins with notes of blackberries, morello cherries and pepper.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - MIL PIEDRAS VALLEY DE UCO 2018
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon - mil piedras valley de uco 2018
sort: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - MIL PIEDRAS VALLEY DE UCO 2018
tastingDescription: Plum and berry aromas are clean and tight. This wine has an iron grip and rock-hard tannins to frame hammering black-fruit flavors. Salty notes rise up on a hard finish that's consistent with the palate.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - MONTES ALPHA COLCHAGUA VALLEY 2017
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon - montes alpha colchagua valley 2017
sort: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - MONTES ALPHA COLCHAGUA VALLEY 2017
tastingDescription: 92 Points, James Suckling - "Full body, juicy with chocolate, walnut and currant. Bright and firm. Lovely texture and solid." (March 2018)

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - MONTES LA FINCA COLCHAGUA 2018
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon - montes la finca colchagua 2018
sort: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - MONTES LA FINCA COLCHAGUA 2018
tastingDescription: The excellent 2018 vintage in Chile shows here with a 91 point score from James Suckling (April 2020) - "An array of fresh, ripe blackberries and cassis on the nose, as well as violets and light herbal notes. The palate has a cool, supple core of blueberries with a smooth, soft, pastry-like texture on the palate."

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - MONTGRAS INTRIGA MAIPO 2017
tastingDescription: As Napa Valley aligns to Cabernet Sauvignon so well, Chile's Maipo Valley does the same and at distinct value for the price. Here is a textbook example from the Intriga estate that offers powerful fruit character and some Maipo texture and taste. Is drinkable now or you can put in your cellar for a few years. Black and red fruits are combined with touches of well integrated oak and a spicy and balsamic finish. This wine is complex, deep and potently rich in texture with layers of black cherry and red fruit surrounded by elegant toasted oak. Pair it with a braised rack of lamb or filet mignon.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - MOOROOK MCBAINS CROSSING
tastingDescription: This Cabernet Sauvignon displays intense blackberry and plum aromas with a hint of black olive. The palate is generous and rich with black current and chocolate flavours, wonderfully supported by velvety tannis and a long satisfying finish. Enjoy now or cellar 4-6 years.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - MT. DAWSON
tastingDescription: Mt. Dawson Cabernet Sauvignon is a full-bodied red with rich notes of red fruit and a long lasting finish. Pair at the end of your journey with robust, rich dishes.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - MURRAY BANKS
tastingDescription: This has opulent aromas of violets and dark berry fruits, with robust flavours of blackberry and plum complemented with soft, fine-grained tannins.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - NEDERBURG WINEMASTERS
tastingDescription: A rich and full-bodied wine with ripe fruit, cherry and delicate oak spice flavours, firm tannins and a lingering aftertaste. Great value for the money. Pair with barbeque chicken.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - NOBLES VINES 337 LODI
tastingDescription: Named for the French vine clone, 337 is an alluring expression of a California Cabernet Sauvignon with prestigious Bordeaux roots. This elegant red exhibits inviting aromas of spice and blackberry, with a raspberry a top note. Smooth and velvety tannins wrap around a core of fruit with hints of chocolate. This wine well on its own or with braised meats and game.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - ORIN SWIFT PALERMO NAPA 2018
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon - orin swift palermo napa 2018
sort: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - ORIN SWIFT PALERMO NAPA 2018
tastingDescription: 91 Points, Wine Advocate - "Opens with notions of crushed red currants, blackberries and mulberries with touches of Indian spices, sandalwood and menthol. Medium to full-bodied, the palate has a spicy undercurrent with loads of red and black fruits...a chewy frame, finishing long and perfumed. Drink: 2018 - 2028." (March 2018)

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - PATO CRIOLLO
tastingDescription: Deep red color with dark hues. Notes of wild red and black fruit combined with pepper. Good structure, ripe tannins, balanced acidity.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - PENDRAGON
tastingDescription: Translucent medium ruby in colour. Ripe purple fruit, plums, smoke and tea leaves on the nose. Between off-dry and medium-dry with lower acidity, tannins and alcohol. Round with ripe sweet plums and dark fruit flavours.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - PENFOLDS BIN 149
tastingDescription: 97 Points, James Suckling: "Lots of blackberry, currant, light chocolate and hazelnut. This is rather dense and plush, but shows impressive layers of tannins that have a rough-velvet texture. Juicy and intense fruit. A global wine. In the end, it's nicely toned and curated. Needs three or four years to come together." (Feb 2021)

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - PENFOLDS BIN 169 COONAWARRA 2018
tastingDescription: A style that is immediately Penfolds, whilst simultaneously illustrative of its ongoing search for diversity and style separation. A classic reflection of the region and a testament of Penfolds longstanding commitment to the vineyards of Coonawarra.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - PENFOLDS BIN 407 2019
tastingDescription: Bin 407 offers varietal definition and approachability, yet still with structure and depth of flavour. Textbook cabernet sauvignon, multi-vineyard blending, with a core of ripe fruit supported by sensitive use of French and American oak.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - PENFOLDS BIN 704
tastingDescription: 95 Points, James Suckling: "A beautiful,aromatic wine with blackcurrant, cool fruit and hints of minerals and tar. Full-bodied, yet polished and really well manicured. Long and creamy. Shows tension, energy and refinement. Drink after 2024, but so beautiful already. Hard not to drink" (Feb 2021)

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - PENFOLDS BIN 707 2019
tastingDescription: 97 Points Wine Spectator: A towering Cabernet, tightly wrapping its supple, expressive core of currant and boysenberry with subtle hints of cream, espresso and dried herbs, flowing seamlessly into the long and vivid finish. Offers depth and power without apparent weight. A knockout.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - PENFOLDS BIN 98 QUANTUM
tastingDescription: 98 Points, James Suckling: "What sticks with you about this global blend of Napa and Southern Australian wine is the intense and transparent purple and blue fruit. Lots of blackberry and blueberry aromas with some stones and flowers.It's a very layered and intense wine with very refined, creamy and chewy tannins" (Feb 2021)

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - PENFOLDS MAX'S 2018
tastingDescription: All the hallmarks of classic cabernet sauvignon are present and accounted for. First impressions are reminiscent of a stroll through the garden. Earthy, leafy notes prevail with dried native mint adding a lovely herbal note. Further investigation reveals cocoa powder, red currants and blood orange.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - PENLEY ESTATE PHOENIX COONAWARRA 2019
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon - penley estate phoenix coonawarra 2019
sort: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - PENLEY ESTATE PHOENIX COONAWARRA 2019
tastingDescription: This juicy Cabernet Sauvignon is medium-bodied with full but lush tannins. The palate opens with cassis which is joined by blackcurrant, floral and a hint of fresh mint flavour. Delicious with red meat.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - PEREZ CRUZ RESERVA
tastingDescription: 95 Points, Decanter World Wine Awards 2017 - "Lovely dark fruits and some leafy notes on the nose. The intense aromas follow through on the juicy palate with mint and cassis. Ripe tannins, subtle oak, nice concentration and long finish. Good blend!"

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - PETER LEHMANN THE BAROSSAN
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon - peter lehmann the barossan
sort: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - PETER LEHMANN THE BAROSSAN
tastingDescription: Varying expressions of this classic varietal have been seamlessly blended, delivering a complex and layered wine with fruit intensity and suppleness. Aromas of violet, plum and hints of spice lead to a rich and luscious palate with plush tannins and depth

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - PIRRAMIMMA MCLAREN VALE 2018
tastingDescription: Aromas of lifted black currant, violets and mint, with hints of cedar oak. Rich flavours of briary blackberry, red currant and spicy black plum, with hints of quince, red pepper and Kalamata olive. This powerful yet elegant wine is framed by balanced tannins and subtle oak, finishing with great length.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - QUARISA JOHNNY Q
tastingDescription: With an intense red colour with purple hues, the nose is fresh and complext exuding aromas of cassis, mint, and some well-integrated vanillin oak. This is a versatile Cabernet Sauvignon that delivers a solid blackcurrant varietal expression with plenty of freshness balanced with savoury characters from the oak. The punchy mid-palate leads to a finish which is long and smooth. Pairs well with chargrilled sirloin or hearty minestrone soup.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - RAVENSWOOD VINTNERS BLEND
tastingDescription: This bold red shows juicy fruit aromas backed by blackberry, black currant, toasted oak and vanilla flavours. The fruity palate is complemented with strong tannins. Perfect with grilled vegetables and skewered beef kebabs.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - ROBERT MONDAVI NAPA 2019
tastingDescription: Our Cabernet Sauvignon represents the best of what Napa Valley offers. Sourced from many of the distinctive districts within the valley and from our vineyards in Oakville and Stags Leap. A beautiful nose of fresh, ripe blackberry and black plum jam, gently framed by notes of dried thyme and toast.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - ROBERT MONDAVI PRIVATE BOURBON BARREL
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon - robert mondavi private bourbon barrel
sort: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - ROBERT MONDAVI PRIVATE BOURBON BARREL
tastingDescription: Mixing the California winemaking tradition with southern USA whisky barrel aging, the result is a remarkable marriage of flavours to enjoy. Offering currant fruit, cassis and full flavours, the bourbon note is subtle and adds complexity to the finish. Try with hearty fare, grill action or slow cooked ribs.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - ROBERT MONDAVI PRIVATE SELECTION
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon - robert mondavi private selection
sort: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - ROBERT MONDAVI PRIVATE SELECTION
tastingDescription: Blended with a touch of Syrah, Carignan, Malbec, Petite Sirah and Petit Verdot, this wine shows decadent aromas of black cherry, blackberry, vanilla, toasty oak and coffee. Ripe and elegant, with soft red and black fruit flavours and gentle tannins, this wine was aged in a combination of American and French oak.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - RODNEY STRONG SONOMA COUNTY 2017
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon - rodney strong sonoma county 2017
sort: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - RODNEY STRONG SONOMA COUNTY 2017
tastingDescription: Rich with dark cherries, plum, spices and black pepper. The palate is full with medium tannins and a lush finish.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - ROOT 1
tastingDescription: Root 1 has an enticing nose with black cherry, ripe plum, soft vanilla and toffee notes. The wine's silky tannins and solid structure are supported the concentrated, ripe, black fruit character. It will artfully accompany grilled red meats, ripe cheeses and savoury dishes including spicy Italian and Mediterranean food.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - RUPERT WINES PROTEA
tastingDescription: Aromas of dark cocoa, cigar and tobacco leaves with blackcurrants, spice and fruitcake populate the bouquet. The palate is rich, supple and rounded with layers of those same elements: cocoa, cigars, fruitcake and black berries. While juicy and drinkable, it's textured with lovely ripeness. The core is firm with typical Cabernet Sauvignon backbone. It's poised and integrated with a long, pleasant finish.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - SAMUEL WYNN
tastingDescription: A deep red Cabernet Sauvignon with hints of cassis and cinnamon that give way to concentrated blackberries and dark, plush fruit. It is medium to full bodied but balanced with natural fruit sweetness and spiciness from clever use of oak.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - SAN PEDRO GATO NEGRO
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon - san pedro gato negro
sort: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - SAN PEDRO GATO NEGRO
tastingDescription: Dark ruby colour. Very intense Cab, full red fruit aromas, berries, cherry, cassis perfectly mixed with sweet vanilla and coconuts notes. A fresh mouth feel, medium body, slightly rich, soft tannins and long pleasant finish.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - SAN PEDRO GATO NEGRO
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon - san pedro gato negro
sort: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - SAN PEDRO GATO NEGRO
tastingDescription: Dark ruby colour. Very intense Cab, full red fruit aromas, berries, cherry, cassis perfectly mixed with sweet vanilla and coconuts notes. A fresh mouth feel, medium body, slightly rich, soft tannins and long pleasant finish.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - SAN PEDRO GATO NEGRO
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon - san pedro gato negro
sort: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - SAN PEDRO GATO NEGRO
tastingDescription: Dark ruby colour. Very intense Cabernet Sauvignon, full red fruit aromas, berries, cherry, cassis perfectly mixed with sweet vanilla and coconut notes. A fresh mouth feel, medium body, slightly rich, soft tannins and long pleasant finish

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - SANTA ANA LA MASCOTA
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon - santa ana la mascota
sort: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - SANTA ANA LA MASCOTA
tastingDescription: 91 Points, James Suckling: "A fresh, clean cabernet with blackcurrant and light chocolate flavors. Medium body and light tannins that give a slightly velvety impression. Drink now." (April 2020)

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - SANTA CAROLINA
tastingDescription: Deep ruby red colour with the aromas of blackberries, black currants, chocolate. A harmonious, balanced, full bodied, red wine with a persistent flavor. Perfectly paired with lamb chops or steak.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - SANTA CAROLINA ESTRELLAS 2016
tastingDescription: The world’s greatest deal! Awarded 90 points Decanter 2017 World Wine Awards. What Chile does best: Cabernet Sauvignon with currant and cassis notes, menthol and good supple body and persistence. For steaks, grilled fare, pizza night, hockey games.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - SANTA CAROLINA RESERVA COLCHAGUA
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon - santa carolina reserva colchagua
sort: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - SANTA CAROLINA RESERVA COLCHAGUA
tastingDescription: Aromas of red fruits and cassis with soft cedar notes. The palate is well structured with strong ripe tannins.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - SANTA RITA 120
tastingDescription: 120 Cabernet Sauvignon is a deep and intense violet-red in color. Notes of red and black fruits predominate on the nose with the touch of spice that is typical in Cabernet, plus the aromas of vanilla, cloves, and tobacco that come from the oak. Sweet, elegant, and smooth tannins lend depth to the well-rounded palate and lead to a fresh, fruity, and juicy finish.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - SIDEWOOD ESTATE STABLEMATE
tastingDescription: 93 Points, Wine Orbit - "Sweetly fruited and beautifully fragrant, the bouquet shows blackcurrant, spiced cherry, vanilla, mint chocolate and toasted almond characters. The palate is equally delightful, displaying excellent fruit purity and intensity, backed by silky mouthfeel and fine chalky tannins. Flavoursome and delicious. At its best: now to 2025." (Dec 2018)

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - SIGNORELLO ESTATE NAPA 2018
tastingDescription: 94 Points, Vinous: "The 2018 Cabernet Sauvignon is laced with bright red-toned fruit, rose petal, cinnamon and a kiss of new French oak. Beautifully aromatic and nuanced, the 2018 captures all the best this vintage has to offer. Bright acids and a mid-weight structure and the signatures in this very pretty, nuanced Cabernet Sauvignon. The 12% Franc really drives the aromatic profile. This is such a vivid wine." -Antonio Galloni (Jan. 2021)

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - SILVER OAK ALEXANDER VALLEY 2016
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon - silver oak alexander valley 2016
sort: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - SILVER OAK ALEXANDER VALLEY 2016
tastingDescription: The 2014 has an alluring nose of chocolate-covered strawberries, vanilla, nutmeg, truffle and sage. On the palate, it has a broad yet delicate entry and offers cranberry flavours. The wine finishes with silky tannins, cedar and bramble flavors with excellent length and return. This wine can be enjoyed through 2038.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - SLOW PRESS
tastingDescription: Slow Press wines are a tribute to the true craft of wine making. Our vintners know that great wines are worth waiting for, so they've slowed down the process from start to finish. Slow Press Cabernet Sauvignon undergoes malolactic fermentation and is then aged in American oak barrels for 9 months. This process delivers bold, concentrated flavors of dark fruits, blackberries and cassis, with notes of tobacco and leather. Its robust structure and firm tannins grip the taste buds, leaving a velvety finish.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - SMOKY BAY
tastingDescription: This cabernet sauvignon from South Eastern Australia is deep ruby in colour and exhibits aromas and flavours of raspberry, blackberry, ripe red plum, pepper, vanilla and oak. Medium-bodied and fruity, with soft silky tannins, this is an ideal match for veal tenderloin, grilled steak or a charcuterie board.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - SOMETHING ABOUT JUJU
tastingDescription: Deep purple, with rich aromas of plum and black cherry, JuJu Cabernet Sauvignon delivers a punch of blackberry jam.  Well suited to hearty dishes, but also a decadent experience all on its own! The Lodi Appellation is the leading producer of and California's best kept secret for Cabernet Sauvignon.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - SPADE AND SPARROWS CALIFORNIA 2018
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon - spade and sparrows california 2018
sort: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - SPADE AND SPARROWS CALIFORNIA 2018
tastingDescription: Dark ruby color, raspberry and sassafras aromas are complemented by sweet cherry, cinnamon, vanilla, and subtle French and American Oak notes. The first sip showcases plum, pomegranate, blackberry, bittersweet cocoa and delicate rosemary with a finish of dried cranberry, sweet leather and cherry cola with a hint of cedar and minerals.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - SPIER SEAWARD
tastingDescription: 90 Points, Tim Atkin: "Cooler vineyards supply the fruit for this good value Cabernet Sauvignon from Frans Smit and his team. It has a corresponding elegance and freshness to the fruit, with unobtrusive oak, fresh acidity and herbal cassis flavours." Drink 2020-2024.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - SPOTTSWOODE NAPA VALLEY
tastingDescription: False

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - SPOTTSWOODE ST HELENA 2017
tastingDescription:
This product is part of Discover California Wines Release 2020.
"Deep garnet-purple in color, the 2016 Cabernet Sauvignon is still very tight and youthful, slowly unfurling to reveal a multifaceted wine with tons of black, blue and red fruit sparks - plums, cherries, black currants and red currants - with dark chocolate, cedar chest, black tea and red roses in the background plus wafts of pencil lead and prosciutto. Medium-bodied and firmly textured by superbly ripe, grainy tannins, it has a fantastic core of intense, complex layers, finishing on an edifying mineral note. Wow! Drink: 2022 - 2060." (October 2018)
100 Points, Wine Advocate
2 bottle limit

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - ST FRANCIS SONOMA
tastingDescription: A full-bodied, savoury Californian Cabernet with aromas of campfire and smoke from toasty oak aging. Juicy and delicious. Pair with grilled meats, heavier pasta dishes and barbequed fare.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - STAGS LEAP ARTEMIS NAPA 2017
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon - stags leap artemis napa 2017
sort: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - STAGS LEAP ARTEMIS NAPA 2017
tastingDescription: 91-93 Points, Wine Advocate - "A blend of 94% Cabernet Sauvignon, 5% Merlot and 1% Petit Verdot, the 2015 Cabernet Sauvignon Artemis (a barrel sample) is a deep garnet-purple color with a lovely nose of pure cassis and blackberries with earth and herbal notions plus violets and an exotic spice waft. Medium to full-bodied, taut and muscular in the expressive mouth, it has grainy tannins and a long finish." (December 2017)

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - STAGS' LEAP NAPA 2017
tastingDescription: The 2017 Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon is expressive and inviting, with juicy blackberry, cassis, strawberry. Additional hints of sweet tobacco, brown spice and bittersweet chocolate result in a full rich body. Integrated oak and cocoa-powdery tannins provide a plush mouthfeel and add layers of complexity, resulting in a textured finish.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - STAVE & STEEL BOURBON BARREL AGED 2018
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon - stave & steel bourbon barrel aged 2018
sort: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - STAVE & STEEL BOURBON BARREL AGED 2018
tastingDescription: False

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - STERLING NAPA
tastingDescription: Opens with aromas of blackberries, along with hints of mocha and caramel. The palate is smooth. delivering a balanced expression of plum, blackberry and toffee. Soft and chocolaty tannins hold the finish which is long and luxurious. Pairs well with red meats such is filet mignon to barbecued ribs.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - TANGLED TREE ROBERTSON
tastingDescription: This ruby red wine boasts delectable chocolate and mocha notes, elegantly layered with notes of cassis and blackberries. This wine has a full and fruity palate with delicate tannins and a long, lingering chocolate aftertaste.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - THE MAGIC BOX
tastingDescription: Deep purple in colour and intrigue, this wine enchants with powerful aromas of blackberry and dark plum. Unmistakably a South Australian Cabernet Sauvignon, it has a soft yet compelling tannin profile. The palate has a bounty of fruit weight balanced by o

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - THE SHOW 2016
tastingDescription: Aromatics of black cherry, plums, currant with notes of cedar. Dark fruit, spice and rich flavors continue on the palate. The tannins are super integrated and soft, with terrific balance and finish that gives it unusual length in the palate.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - THREE FINGER JACK LODI EASTSIDE
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon - three finger jack lodi eastside
sort: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - THREE FINGER JACK LODI EASTSIDE
tastingDescription: Big structured, dense tannin wine offering bright fruit aromas and flavors of black cherry, blackberry, cassis, charred oak and hints of pepper and natural acidity. The full mouthfeel leads to a long and lingering finish.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - THREE THIEVES CALIFORNIA 2019
tastingDescription: 91 Points, Wine Enthusiast - "This exuberant wine is packed with expressive fruit aromas and irresistible flavors that range from cherry to black plum and blackberry. No noticeable oak gets in the way of the wine's fruit flavours. Medium body, good balance and gentle tannins make it easy to sip. " (October, 2019)

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - TNT OAK RIDGE WINERY
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon - tnt oak ridge winery
sort: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - TNT OAK RIDGE WINERY
tastingDescription: Fruit forward flavours of raspberry jam and bing cherry. Nice structure with supple tannins and integrated oak.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - TOM GORE 2019
tastingDescription: The Tom Gore Cabernet Sauvignon is dark red in colour with aromas of cherry and currant and notes of leather and tobacco leaf, along with hints of dark chocolate and mocha from oak aging. This wine is fruit-forward on the entry with a rich, round mouthfeel and fine, supple tannins leading to a long finish.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - TRUCHARD CARNEROS NAPA 2017
tastingDescription: 92 Points, James Suckling - "A linear and fine red with terracotta, dark berry and chocolate character. Medium to full body, round tannins and a flavorful finish. Very attractive. Drink or hold." (December 2017)

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - TWO HANDS SEXY BEAST MCLAREN VALE 2015
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon - two hands sexy beast mclaren vale 2015
nameSuffix: TWO HANDS SEXY BEAST MCLAREN VALE 2015
sort: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - TWO HANDS SEXY BEAST MCLAREN VALE 2015
tastingDescription: Notes of redcurrant, tobacco, bay leaf, juniper, fresh earth and mulberry. The palate is complimented with notes of redcurrants, mulberry, and juniper. Depth and layers are found in the form of bay leaf and dried herbs whilst the palate touches on notes of tobacco, earth and ash.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - UKO SELECT UCO VALLEY 18
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon - uko select uco valley 18
sort: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - UKO SELECT UCO VALLEY 18
tastingDescription: The Uco Valley is within the Mendoza region at higher elevation and closer to the Andes range. For 2018 this Cabernet Sauvignon rates 93 points James Suckling.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - VASSE FELIX FILIUS MARGARET RIVER 2018
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon - vasse felix filius margaret river 2018
sort: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - VASSE FELIX FILIUS MARGARET RIVER 2018
tastingDescription: 94 Points, James Halliday: "Wild raspberry, red licorice, pomegranate, kelp, iodine, crushed pepper, spicy oak and the all important saline acid. The vintage has contributed a fruit power that gives the wine great length of flavour."

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - VINA RIOJANAS LA CHAYA
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon - vina riojanas la chaya
sort: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - VINA RIOJANAS LA CHAYA
tastingDescription: La Chaya refers to a local carnival that takes place in the Argentine region of La Rioja. The wine is Cabernet Sauvignon, a grape that can be done very well in Argentina. Hints of currant fruit and soft tannins make this a good value. Perfect for winter months and hearty menus.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - WAKEFIELD ESTATE CLARE VALLEY 2018
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon - wakefield estate clare valley 2018
sort: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - WAKEFIELD ESTATE CLARE VALLEY 2018
tastingDescription: This stylish and fresh Cabernet has refreshing acidity that paves the way for blackcurrant, cassis, cedar and licorice notes. The tannins are refined and well-balanced. Brilliant with brisket.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - WALKING DEAD CALIFORNIA 2016
tastingDescription: This full-bodied wine reveals flavors of dark cherries and currants which pool on the palate, giving way to notes of mocha and spice. Fine, chocolaty tannins hold the long smooth finish.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - WENTE SOUTHERN HILLS LIVERMORE 2018
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon - wente southern hills livermore 2018
sort: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - WENTE SOUTHERN HILLS LIVERMORE 2018
tastingDescription: This Cabernet Sauvignon shows a rich crimson colour with purple highlights. Hints of cedar and violets can be found on the nose while it exhibits flavours of cherry, dark plum and a hint of coffee. Rich, yet approachable tannins provide a long, smooth finish. This a great partner with roasted and grilled meats, or fuller-flavoured fish such as salmon and Ahi tuna.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - WILLIAM HILL NORTH COAST 2019
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon - william hill north coast 2019
sort: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - WILLIAM HILL NORTH COAST 2019
tastingDescription: This has a rich palate of dark fruit flavours, with subtle hints of toasted oak and caramel. The Lake County Cabernet brought excellent structure and dark, ripe blackberry and blueberry, while Sonoma and Mendocino Cabernet added soft tannins, firm acidity and subtle red fruit notes.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - WINES OF SUBSTANCE COLUMBIA VALLEY 2018
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon - wines of substance columbia valley 2018
sort: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - WINES OF SUBSTANCE COLUMBIA VALLEY 2018
tastingDescription: 92 Points, Wine Advocate: "The wine offers up classic aromas of crushed cassis, loamy soil and pencil lead. On the palate, it's medium-bodied, layered and flavorful, with chewy but ripe tannins and succulent balancing acids, concluding with good length. …it's a remarkable achievement. Drink: 2018 - 2021." (June 2018)

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - WOLF BLASS YELLOW LABEL
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon - wolf blass yellow label
sort: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - WOLF BLASS YELLOW LABEL
tastingDescription: Wolf Blass Yellow Label Cabernet Sauvignon is expertly blended to create a smooth, rich red wine with flavours of plum, blackberry and cassis, hints of varietal leafiness, and a subtle touch of oak.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - WOODBRIDGE
tastingDescription: The Woodbridge Cabernet Sauvignon opens with aromas of cherries, berries, cedar, brown sugar and toast. Flavours of berries, toasted marshmallow, chocolate, and graham cracker follow with a toasty caramel finish. This medium-bodied wine pairs deliciously with grilled meats and tomato-based pasta dishes.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - WOODWORK CALIFORNIA
tastingDescription: The nose of this Cabernet Sauvignon is powerful with ripe black fruit, chocolate covered cherries and warm nuts. On the palate, it is rich, fruity and has a touch of sweetness. Try it with a ribeye steak on the grill.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - WYNNS BLACK LABEL COONAWARRA 2014
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon - wynns black label coonawarra 2014
sort: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - WYNNS BLACK LABEL COONAWARRA 2014
tastingDescription: A true classic this is a favourite of consumers and critics alike. Renowned winemaker consistent expression of Coonawarra it provides lush black fruit cassis spice leather and herbal hints. Perfect with steak

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - WYNNS COONAWARRA ESTATE THE SIDING
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon - wynns coonawarra estate the siding
sort: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - WYNNS COONAWARRA ESTATE THE SIDING
tastingDescription: Dark purple in color. Fresh aromatics of blackberry and mint, accentuated by subtle dried herb. On the palate red cherry and plum leading to notes of moss and earth. Enhanced with soft but succulent acid, fine cedary oak and elegant malleable tannin, finishing with a hint of thyme.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON - YELLOW TAIL
tastingDescription: This Cabernet Sauvignon is everything a great wine should be – vibrant, velvety, rich and easy to drink. This wine leaps from the glass with a touch of mint and aromas of blackberries, chocolate and vanilla. The seamless structure shows rich, berry flavours peppered with spice.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON CARMENERE SYRAH - CONO SUR ORGANIC
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon carmenere syrah - cono sur organic
sort: CABERNET SAUVIGNON CARMENERE SYRAH - CONO SUR ORGANIC
tastingDescription: This is one of the province's top-selling Chilean wines and is a perfect paring for mixed barbecue grill, red meats, poultry, veggie kebabs and roasted peppers.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON CHAPPELLET SIGNATURE NAPA 2018
tastingDescription: 94+ Points, Wine Advocate - "Superb blackberry and floral-infused blueberry fruit and cassis, a full-bodied mouthfeel, moderate but sweet tannin and a long, layered, texture and finish make for a profound Cabernet Sauvignon that actually sells at a bargain price for what is in the bottle. Drink: 2016 - 2036." (December 2016)

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON MALBEC - CATENA ZAPATA NICOLAS 2017
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon malbec - catena zapata nicolas 2017
sort: CABERNET SAUVIGNON MALBEC - CATENA ZAPATA NICOLAS 2017
tastingDescription: 97 Points, James Suckling: "Sweet tobacco, walnuts, blackberries and dried flowers on the nose. Full body, yet ultra-fine tannins and a super long finish. Superb finesse and polish. (April 2021)

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON MALBEC - ESTANCIA MENDOZA RECRI
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon malbec - estancia mendoza recri
sort: CABERNET SAUVIGNON MALBEC - ESTANCIA MENDOZA RECRI
tastingDescription: Deep blue with violet hues. Aromas reveals complexity with red and dark fruits, spices and floral aromas of violets. Smooth entrance, a broad and round structure with a pleasant and long finish.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON MERLOT - CHILICIOUS
tastingDescription: Chilean flavors of these two Bordeaux grapes always works well. You have the black and red fruit notes with supple tannins and lots of menu options. Pasta, bbq or pizza, these all sound pretty good. Enjoy.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON MERLOT - CONO SUR TOCORNAL
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon merlot - cono sur tocornal
sort: CABERNET SAUVIGNON MERLOT - CONO SUR TOCORNAL
tastingDescription: Deep purple ruby color with dry and soft plumy berry character. This wine is light to medium bodied with little evidence of oak and tannin.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON MERLOT - KWV THE VINECRAFTER
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon merlot - kwv the vinecrafter
sort: CABERNET SAUVIGNON MERLOT - KWV THE VINECRAFTER
tastingDescription: This medium-bodied wine delivers fresh raspberry and blackberry aromas. The wine is soft and smooth with a fruit driven palate complimented by hints of violets and spice.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON MERLOT - LONG COUNTRY
tastingDescription: Long Country wines are fruity and easy to understand, great value for the money. Cherry, raspberry, and dark chocolate flavours.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON MERLOT - MIRAFLORA
tastingDescription: False

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON MERLOT - RUPERT AND ROTHSCHILD CLASSIQU
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon merlot - rupert and rothschild classiqu
sort: CABERNET SAUVIGNON MERLOT - RUPERT AND ROTHSCHILD CLASSIQU
tastingDescription: Nuances of fresh cranberry and wild black cherry which evolves into delicate hazelnut truffle chocolate with a silky, smooth lingering texture. Recommended with seared Springbok loin, braised Springbok shoulder and aromatic potato pudding with a gastrique of port cherry and puffed barley.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON MERLOT - SUR ANDINO 1969
tastingDescription: A deep red colour with shades of violet is complimented by a distinct fruity aroma recalling red cherry intermingled with floral and vanilla notes. Body and structure are provided by sweet and soft tannins. A perfectly balanced wine with a lingering finish. This wine pairs preferably with all fatty fish such as salmon, also pizzas and pastas with meat-based sauces and red meat.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON MERLOT - TINAJAS DEL MAULE TELMO AND RUTH
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon merlot - tinajas del maule telmo and ruth
nameSuffix: TINAJAS DEL MAULE TELMO AND RUTH
sort: CABERNET SAUVIGNON MERLOT - TINAJAS DEL MAULE TELMO AND RUTH
tastingDescription: Tinajas is Spanish for the clay amphoras that used to be and still are, used to make wine in Chile. In this case when the winery was purchased the many old tinajas on the property inspired the new winery name. Cabernet Merlot blends from Chile have been successful for decades on our shelves and here we have another tasty example. Cabernet Sauvignon provides the structure and currant & cassis flavours; Merlot offers more fat, red berries and plushness to fill out the blend.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON MERLOT - TWO OCEANS
tastingDescription: A soft, fruit-driven wine with juicy berry fruit flavours and subtle hints of oak. Enjoy with roasted beef, steak, and hamburgers.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON MERLOT - WILD PLUM BLEASDALE 2019
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon merlot - wild plum bleasdale 2019
sort: CABERNET SAUVIGNON MERLOT - WILD PLUM BLEASDALE 2019
tastingDescription: A lifted and perfumed wine with red berry, black olive and plum flavours. Juicy fruit and a generous middle palate with star anise and cinnamon stick nuances. Perfectly paired with flame grilled porterhouse or braised beef in red wine.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON SISTER'S RUN COONAWARRA
tastingDescription: Gold Medal Women's Wine & Spirits Awards 2020 - This dark red wine offers aromas of blackberry and herbs. The fresh acidity balances with the firm Cabernet tannins and just-ripe fruit flavours. Decant before drinking for maximum enjoyment. Enjoy with BBQ, rich savoury dishes or a big bowl of potato chips.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON SYRAH - ESTRELLA DE PASCUA
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon syrah - estrella de pascua
sort: CABERNET SAUVIGNON SYRAH - ESTRELLA DE PASCUA
tastingDescription: Overdelivery in a glass as these two grapes really have class x 2. Hints of plum and spice and black fruits, the juiciness works well with all kinds of menu, from meatloaf to sausages to grilled peppers to grilled cheese.

name: CABERNET SAUVIGNON- LIBERTY SCHOOL PASO ROBLES 19
nameSanitized: cabernet sauvignon- liberty school paso robles 19
sort: CABERNET SAUVIGNON- LIBERTY SCHOOL PASO ROBLES 19
tastingDescription: Bright fruit aromas of fresh blackberry, black cherry and boysenberry along with hints of violets, leather and toasted oak fill the glass. On the palate, this elegant, medium-bodied Cabernet is filled with lush black cherry and pomegranate flavors complemented by juicy acidity along with notes of cracked black pepper, dried black tea leaves and a touch of vanilla that leads to a long velvety finish.

name: CABERNET SHIRAZ - MAJELLA THE MUSICIAN COONAWARRA 2016
nameSanitized: cabernet shiraz - majella the musician coonawarra 2016
sort: CABERNET SHIRAZ - MAJELLA THE MUSICIAN COONAWARRA 2016
tastingDescription: 95 Points James Halliday: "A 70/30% blend fermented in stainless steel and oak barrels... It is a freakish wine that has been selling for around $19 since it was first released in '04 and has won 7 trophies and 79 medals to date." (August 2019)

name: CABERNET SHIRAZ - PENFOLDS BIN 389 2018
tastingDescription: 94 Points, James Suckling - "Cabernet-dominant style (54%) and marries cassis, blueberries, leaves and cedary-dominant aromas with more substantial blackberries and dark cherries, as well as redder tones at the finish. Long, vanilla-laced after-trail. Drink over the next fifteen years. A stallion in the cellar!"

name: CABERNET SHIRAZ - PENFOLDS BIN 600
tastingDescription: 93 Points, James Suckling: "A very fine and polished red with cherry, berry, chocolate and cedar aromas and flavors. Some spice and meat with hints of tea leaf. Medium body and extremely refined texture, showing real balance and elegance. The tannins spread across the palate in a beautiful way." (Feb 2021)

name: CABERNET SHIRAZ - SHOT IN THE DARK
nameSanitized: cabernet shiraz - shot in the dark
sort: CABERNET SHIRAZ - SHOT IN THE DARK
tastingDescription: Intense brick red with purple hues. On the nose, ripe and round blackberries conspire with flavours of plum and cinnamon spice. On the palate, notes of brooding red berries and fresh brewed coffee. Impressive length and structure with a seductively soft and lingering finish.

name: CABERNET SHIRAZ - THE GREAT BONZA
tastingDescription: Full bodied wine with dense ripe berry fruit flavours of cherries and black currants balanced with spicy oak having a long and smooth finish.

name: CABERNET SHIRAZ - YALUMBA THE CALEY COONAWARRA AND BAROSSA 2
nameSanitized: cabernet shiraz - yalumba the caley coonawarra and barossa 2
nameSuffix: YALUMBA THE CALEY COONAWARRA AND BAROSSA 2
sort: CABERNET SHIRAZ - YALUMBA THE CALEY COONAWARRA AND BAROSSA 2
tastingDescription: 98 Points, James Suckling - "A strong cross-regional combination. Immense depth of olives, cassis, blue plums with blackberries, fragrant baking spices and chocolate.  The palate is beautifully assembled with deep-set tannins that carry long and majestic. Rich dark-fruit flavours. A landmark first release that will drink well for decades.  (January 2018)

name: CABERNET SHIRAZ MERLOT - PETER LEHMANN CLANCYS
nameSanitized: cabernet shiraz merlot - peter lehmann clancys
sort: CABERNET SHIRAZ MERLOT - PETER LEHMANN CLANCYS
tastingDescription: A juicy blend of Cabernet Sauvignon, Shiraz and Merlot. The palate shows bright red fruit, blackcurrent and some wood spice. Great for chili or wings

name: CABERNET SHIRAZ MERLOT - WYNNS COONAWARRA
tastingDescription: The “red-stripe” blend of three red varieties creates a versatile wine suited to many occasions. Soft fruit and judicious oak create a wine that is perfect for current drinking or medium-term cellaring. The Wynns Cabernet Shiraz Merlot is a well-balanced and approachable wine, providing a true reflection of its regionality.

name: CADILLAC - CHATEAU SUAU 2010
tastingDescription: False

name: CADILLAC-COTES DE BORDEAUX CHATEAU CARIGNAN PRIMA 2016
nameSanitized: cadillac-cotes de bordeaux chateau carignan prima 2016

tastingDescription:
“Very attractive and suave nose with toasty oak and fresh berries, leading to a plush and neatly arrayed palate with ample, deep-set tannins and good ripeness. Second label of Château Carignan. Try from 2022.”
92 Points, James Suckling

name: CAHORS - CHATEAU DU CEDRE EXTRA LIBRE VIN NATURAL 2019
nameSanitized: cahors - chateau du cedre extra libre vin natural 2019
nameSuffix: CHATEAU DU CEDRE EXTRA LIBRE VIN NATURAL 2019
sort: CAHORS - CHATEAU DU CEDRE EXTRA LIBRE VIN NATURAL 2019
tastingDescription: Extra Libre by the famous Château du Cèdre presents a beautiful, dark but gentle beast. Malbec from its spiritual home, it’s rich but nimble, serious but friendly with great texture, balance and length. Made from a small parcel of organically farmed Malbec vinified and bottled without the addition of sulphites.

name: CAHORS MALBEC - DOMAINE CAPELANEL AMPHUT 2012
tastingDescription: This is a serious Malbec with a concentrated nose, perfumed and complex. On the palate, it is vibrant with driving acidity, very fine tannins and a beautiful, lingering finish. It is a delicious and radical departure from the traditional, austere Malbecs of the past. Amphût is a word combining amphora and fût (French for cask) reflecting the final product being a blend of wines aged in terracotta amphora and 500-litre oak barrels.

name: CAHORS MALBEC - DOMAINE DE CAUSE LA LANDE CAVAGNAC 2016
nameSanitized: cahors malbec - domaine de cause la lande cavagnac 2016
nameSuffix: DOMAINE DE CAUSE LA LANDE CAVAGNAC 2016
sort: CAHORS MALBEC - DOMAINE DE CAUSE LA LANDE CAVAGNAC 2016
tastingDescription: 92 Points, Wine Enthusiast: "This is a single-parcel wine from old vines (which date back to the 1970s). Aged in wood, this very fine wine shows sophisticated tannins, complex spice, black-plum fruits and a judicious shot of acidity. It is a fine wine, still young and showing a good potential for aging." (July 2017)

name: CAHORS MALBEC MERLOT - CHATEAU EUGENIE TRADITION 2018
nameSanitized: cahors malbec merlot - chateau eugenie tradition 2018
sort: CAHORS MALBEC MERLOT - CHATEAU EUGENIE TRADITION 2018
tastingDescription: This wine has dark red fruit aromas of blackcurrant and cherry with a slightly spicy touch.  The flavour on the palate is pronounced, unpretentious, and rich in substance.  The wine's warm and generous structure makes it a perfect partner for grilled meats, duck breast, or paté.

name: CAIRANNE - BOUTINOT LA COTE SAUVAGE 2017
tastingDescription: 92 Points, Wine Spectator: "Focused, featuring raspberry and boysenberry pâte de fruit notes carried by a graphite spine, with flashes of fruitcake and red licorice skittering through. Frankly ripe, but with freshness for balance. Grenache, Syrah, Mourvèdre, Carignan and Cinsault. Drink now through 2022." (November 2018)

name: CALATAYUD OLD VINES GARNACHA - ANCIANO
tastingDescription: 90 Points, Decanter "Peppery, earthy, multi-layered, full-bodied, ripe velvety tannins, excellent balance and peaking now. Fruity finish with a touch of spice. (Sept 2020)

name: CALATYUD GARNACHA TEMPRANILLO - SAN GREGORIO LOMA GORDA 2018
nameSanitized: calatyud garnacha tempranillo - san gregorio loma gorda 2018
sort: CALATYUD GARNACHA TEMPRANILLO - SAN GREGORIO LOMA GORDA 2018
tastingDescription: 93 Points, James Suckling - "Quite a discreet nose with notes of caramel and cocoa powder, but this has plenty of power and structure on the palate. The dry tannins build on the long, driving finish. Better from 2019 and probably has another decade in it after that." (August 2018)

name: CALI ROSE - 19 CRIMES
tastingDescription: 19 Crimes is defiant by nature, bold in character and always uncompromising. This spirit lives on today through in Cali's own Snoop Dogg. Ripe strawberry notes along with delicate floral and rose petal aromas. Fruit-forward notes of fresh raspberry, strawberry, and red cherry. Pleasant mouthfeel with balanced acidity and sweetness.

name: CALIFORNIA RED - 19 CRIMES CALI RED
tastingDescription: 19 Crimes is defiant by nature, bold in character and always uncompromising. We are proud to partner with entertainment icon, Snoop Dogg, who embodies all these qualities, and more, through hard work and perseverance. Snoop Dogg is a culture creator, innovator and a leader in pop culture. Dark purple with rich berry nose: Ripe black fruit, accented with distinct, smoky, American oak aromas of vanilla and hazelnut. On the palate: Full and dense, with strong black and blue fruit from the Petite Sirah, complemented by bright red, slightly candied fruit inthe background from the Zinfandel. The dark toasted oak integrates these flavors and finishes on a slightly sweet note.

name: CALIFORNIA RED - APOTHIC DARK
tastingDescription: A blend of seven dark grape varieties reveal rich layers of flavor and texture. Flavours of black cherry and blackberry that seamlessly meld with espresso and dark chocolate. The smooth mouthfeel creates a full finish that haunts the palate.

name: CALIFORNIA RED - APOTHIC INFERNO
tastingDescription: Here we have the latest expression of Apothic that stays on trend with what is going on with red wines these days: letting them gain some character by being aged in whisky barrels. With the usual black fruit and juicy rich character in behind, we also can appreciate the notes of black cherry, maple and spice.

name: CALIFORNIA RED - APOTHIC WINEMAKERS BLEND
tastingDescription: Made from a blend of rich Zinfandel, smooth Merlot, flavourful Syrah and bold Cabernet Sauvignon, Apothic Red offers flavours of black cherry and rhubarb together with notes of mocha, vanilla and spice. It is medium- to full-bodied on the palate with soft tannins leading to a smooth finish. A wine made for pasta.

name: CALIFORNIA RED - APOTHIC WINEMAKERS BLEND
tastingDescription: False

name: CALIFORNIA RED - CA MOMI ROSSO 2017
tastingDescription: This freestyle red blend rocks its own style without pretension. Aromas of ripe blueberries, subtle campfire smoke, and that blackberry patch down the road put summer vacation in your glass. Intense plum, blackberry pie, and toasty spice mingle on the palate, with moderate tannins providing structure through the finish.

name: CALIFORNIA RED - CARLO ROSSI
tastingDescription: Rich, full-bodied wine with a deep red color.

name: CALIFORNIA RED - CARLO ROSSI
tastingDescription: Rich, full-bodied wine with a deep red color.

name: CALIFORNIA RED - CLINE CELLARS FARMHOUSE  VEGAN

sort: CALIFORNIA RED - CLINE CELLARS FARMHOUSE  VEGAN
tastingDescription: Enjoy this luscious, medium to full-bodied red wine with a variety of flavourful foods. It's smooth with nicely balanced acidity and has dark cherry, raspberry and toasty notes with a plush, rich finish.

name: CALIFORNIA RED - CONUNDRUM
tastingDescription: Layers of plum and ripe berries mix with dark chocolate, fig and supple tannins making this bold Califiornia wine very approachable.

name: CALIFORNIA RED - DREAMING TREE CRUSH
tastingDescription: A blend of the North Coast's best varieties, Merlot and Zinfandel, this wine pulls you in with a smoky, berry note and then jumps up with a smack of raspberry jam. The cooked red fruit palate is plush and leads to a long finish with silky tannin highlights.

name: CALIFORNIA RED - FOLIE A DEUX MENAGE A TROIS
nameSanitized: california red - folie a deux menage a trois
nameSuffix: FOLIE A DEUX MENAGE A TROIS
sort: CALIFORNIA RED - FOLIE A DEUX MENAGE A TROIS
tastingDescription: On top we've got Zinfandel, a saucy tease that brings blackberry and raspberry jam to the relationship. Merlot, with its generous mouth feel and red fruits, fits perfectly in the middle. The rich flavours and firm tannins of Cabernet Sauvignon complete the trio.

name: CALIFORNIA RED - GAME OF THRONES CENTRAL COAST 2017
nameSanitized: california red - game of thrones central coast 2017
sort: CALIFORNIA RED - GAME OF THRONES CENTRAL COAST 2017
tastingDescription: Dark black cherry, brambly blackberry, vanilla and cocoa aromas. Soft, juicy black fruit flavour combine in the mouth with hints of leather and spice. Tannins are round and chewy with a rich, juicy mouthfeel that ends with a warm and spicy tasty, vanilla-laced finish.

name: CALIFORNIA RED - JOSH CELLARS LEGACY 2019
tastingDescription: False

name: CALIFORNIA RED - ORIN SWIFT ABSTRACT 2018
tastingDescription: 92 Points, Wine Spectator - "Plump and appealingly gamy, with black raspberry, smoky beef and cracked pepper flavors that take on depth toward big but polished tannins. Grenache, Syrah and Petite Sirah. Drink now through 2023." (July 2018)

name: CALIFORNIA RED - THE PRISONER 2018
tastingDescription: Features enticing aromas of Bing cherry, dark chocolate, clove, and roasted fig. Persistent flavors of ripe raspberry, boysenberry, pomegranate, and vanilla linger harmoniously, for a smooth and luscious finish.

name: CALIFORNIA RED - THE RAVE
tastingDescription: This smooth red wine is beautifully balanced, rich and full-bodied. California's warm days during growing season allow for the grapes to develop robust, concentrated flavours of plum, cherries and black fruits. This wine is delicious on its own but is also a great match for grilled meats and tomato based pasta dishes.

name: CALIFORNIA RED - THE SHOW LUDDITES UNITE 2014
nameSanitized: california red - the show luddites unite 2014
sort: CALIFORNIA RED - THE SHOW LUDDITES UNITE 2014
tastingDescription: Good old-fashioned, hand-made production. Luddites Unite is dark red blend, with opulent black fruit weaved throughout and accented with mocha and spice.

name: CALIFORNIA RED - TRIBUNAL
tastingDescription: A blend of Zinfandel, Syrah, Merlot, Petite Sirah, Barbera, Grenache and Petite Verdot in just the right proportions, this wine is a bold and full-bodied style, full of juicy, ripe fruit with a finish that goes on for days. Enjoy with burgers, tacos, pasta, pizza, sausages, soups or stews.

name: CALIFORNIA RED - UNITED REPUBLIC
tastingDescription: The Independent Red is crafted from Cabernet Sauvignon for good structure, Merlot for supple fruit notes and Zinfandel for hints of berry spice. The final result is an elegant harmony of chocolate and dark cherry aromas, complemented by silky tannins and a rich, smooth finish.

name: CALIFORNIA ROSE - JOSH CELLARS 2019
tastingDescription: Crisp, refreshing and bright: our Rose is perfect for sunsets and warm summer days. This wine has flavors of white peach and strawberry complemented by hints of nectarine.

name: CALIFORNIA ROSE - LONGSHOT
tastingDescription: False

name: CALIFORNIA ROSE - MEIOMI 2018
tastingDescription: Delicately pink in color, Meiomi Rosé is delightfully dry with vibrant acidity. The wine opens to delicate aromas of watermelon, orange peel, and subtle hints of rose petal. The palate offers a lush mouthfeel with flavors of stone fruit and strawberry with a cool minerality on the finish.

name: CALIFORNIA WHITE - APOTHIC WINEMAKERS BLEND
tastingDescription: Apothic White opens with aromas of tropical fruit leading to generous flavours of honeyed apples, ripe peach, finishing with a light floral note.

name: CALIFORNIA WHITE - CARLO ROSSI
tastingDescription: Straw-colored, semi-dry white wine with a crisp, light taste.

name: CALIFORNIA WHITE - CARLO ROSSI FRUITY WHITE
nameSanitized: california white - carlo rossi fruity white
sort: CALIFORNIA WHITE - CARLO ROSSI FRUITY WHITE
tastingDescription: A crisp, straw-colored white wine with a slightly sweeter taste than Chablis.

name: CALIFORNIA WHITE - CONUNDRUM
tastingDescription: Fresh fajitas. Relaxing before dinner. A night out for Thai or Vietnamese. Conundrum White goes with them all. Sourced from California’s premier winegrowing regions, this wine is both exotic and bright, a blend of Chardonnay, Sauvignon Blanc, Semillon, Muscat Canelli and Viognier. It lures you in with scents of apricot, pear and honeysuckle, and if you’re paying attention, orange and lemon meringue pie. Initial sweetness is balanced by natural acidity, and we love the hint of oak that plays with flavors of peach, apple and citrus. The long finish will leave you longing for another glass.

name: CALISSANO VERMOUTH ROSSO TORINO SUPERIORE
tastingDescription: The Calisanno Vermouth Rosso is made from Gavi and Nebbiolo. Brilliant red in colour the first sip fully releases the traditional note of bitter wormwood. Complimented by the citrus scents of bitter orange and grapefruit, backed by a spicier base of thyme and bay leaf. Rounded off with an elegant vanilla note.

name: CALLEJUELA  - MANZANILLA ORIGEN
tastingDescription: False

name: CALLIOPE - CABERNET MERLOT FIGURE 8 2019
tastingDescription: Intense nose of black and red currant, plum, raspberry, maraschino cherry and floral violet notes with hints of dried sage. The medium-bodied palate is fresh and juicy with crisp acidity and bright red plum, red currant, red cherry and some dried sage and thyme on the long savoury finish.

name: CALLIOPE - FIGURE 8 WHITE 2020
tastingDescription: Exotic and aromatic nose of peach, nectarine, apricot and Asian pear along with floral jasmine and rose petal notes, grapefruit and lemon. Slightly off-dry on the palate with crisp acidity, medium body and intense flavours of citrus zest, lime leaves, green apple, pear and cilantro with a long, fresh finish.

name: CALONA - ROYAL RED
tastingDescription: This semi-sweet red wine is perfect for drinking on its own or making summer sangria. Pairs well with chocolate desserts.

name: CALONA - ROYAL WHITE
tastingDescription: This medium-dry white wine is light and refreshing and perfect for a summer salad or grilled chicken dishes.

name: CAMPANIA GRECO - MASTROBERARDINO MASTRO 2015
tastingDescription: 90 Points, Wine Advocate - “This is a fresh and zesty white wine. The 2015 Greco di Tufo NovaSerra shows the light and fragrant side of the grape with citrus, Golden Delicious apple and poached pear. The bouquet is rich and nicely layered. This wine offers medium build in the mouth with zesty freshness at the end.” (August 2017)

name: CAMPO DE BORJA GARNACHA - BORSAO
tastingDescription: Cherry red with violet nuances and has a ripe fruit nose with floral tones. The wine is full-bodied, spicy and with a complex and long aftertaste.

name: CANELLA - ADVENT CALENDAR
tastingDescription: False

name: CANNONAU DI SARDEGNA - SANTADI NORAS 2017
tastingDescription: 91 Points, James Suckling: “A fresh and clean red with berry and orange peel character. Medium body, fine tannins and a linear finish. Drink now.” (October 2017)

name: CARINENA CRIANZA - MONASTERIO DE LAS VINAS
nameSanitized: carinena crianza - monasterio de las vinas
sort: CARINENA CRIANZA - MONASTERIO DE LAS VINAS
tastingDescription: Notions of smoke, game, violets, blackberry, and blueberry set the stage for a smooth, elegant offering in which the oak adds a touch of complexity. This superb value is impeccably balanced and lengthy.

name: CARINENA GARNACHA - CASTILLO DE MONSERAN
tastingDescription: Dark red black color. Intense plum, damson aromas almost blackberry. Soft lush palate, rich flavors of dark fruit. The tannins are present without being firm.

name: CARINENA GRAN RESERVA - MONASTERIO DE LAS VINAS 2013
nameSanitized: carinena gran reserva - monasterio de las vinas 2013
sort: CARINENA GRAN RESERVA - MONASTERIO DE LAS VINAS 2013
tastingDescription: The wine shows a fine ruby red color that’s starting to display some garnet reflections, and aromas of red currants, tobacco and eucalyptus pervade the nose. Expect full bodied and intense flavors of cherries, red currants and balsamic touches on the palate that lead to a long and enjoayable finish.

name: CARINENA RESERVA- MONASTERIO DE LAS VINAS
nameSanitized: carinena reserva- monasterio de las vinas
sort: CARINENA RESERVA- MONASTERIO DE LAS VINAS
tastingDescription: Spice box, pepper, violets mineral, black cherry, and plum aromas are followed by a ripe, plush, pleasure-bent red that has enough structure to evolve over time. Well balanced, fluid and smooth with a fruity exuberance.

name: CARINENA ROSE - PANIZA LA FEA SELECCION ESPECIAL 2018
nameSanitized: carinena rose - paniza la fea seleccion especial 2018
sort: CARINENA ROSE - PANIZA LA FEA SELECCION ESPECIAL 2018
tastingDescription: This is an ultra quaffable 100% Garnacha rosé with a floral bouquet, plush palate, delicate berry fruit notes and a long, clean finish.

name: CARLO PELLEGRINO - MARSALA FINE
tastingDescription: Sure marsala is great for cooking, but it makes fine sipping too! Like port, this storied fortified from the Italian isle of Sicily has varying designations, with “fine” indicating a wine aged less than two years. Rich fruit and a smooth finish make this an easygoing fortified.

name: CARMENERE - CARMEN GRAN RESERVA APALTA 2018
tastingDescription: From the Alto Maipo region. The bouquet is fruity with plum, cherry, and mulberry notes, with aromas of a vegetable edge of ripe red pepper, with complex flavours of jam, spinach and chocolate. Barrel aging lends to pleasant smoky and toast notes, bringing out its spices; texture is soft, with rounded tannins and medium body. The perfect wine to enjoy with full-flavoured red meats such as lamb, ribs and beef with spicy sauces.

name: CARMENERE - CONCHA Y TORO CASILLERO DEL DIABLO
nameSanitized: carmenere - concha y toro casillero del diablo
nameSuffix: CONCHA Y TORO CASILLERO DEL DIABLO
sort: CARMENERE - CONCHA Y TORO CASILLERO DEL DIABLO
tastingDescription: From the Rapel Valley. This deep purple wine has a bright appearance, with pleasant aromas of plum, blackcurrant, dark chocolate and hints of coffee. The wine has notes of dark plum and spice, generously framed by toasty American oak with a soft and well structured mouthfeel. Pairs well with pasta, aged cheese, lamb, grilled chicken and risotto.

name: CARMENERE - CONO SUR RESERVA ESPECIAL
tastingDescription: Long on red fruit and savoury Carmenere essence, there is hints of cocoa and spice on the palate and very long finish. The vineyard source for this wine is in the Cachapoal area of Chile, and the Carmenere grape is an old Bordeaux varietal that has been rediscovered in Chile. Medium bodied and flavourful, try with barbequed dishes, aromatic curry spice recipes or pasta.

name: CARMENERE - ESTAMPA ESTACION COLGHAGUA 2017
tastingDescription: False

name: CARMENERE - FALERNIA GRAN RESERVA ELQUI VALLEY 2017
nameSanitized: carmenere - falernia gran reserva elqui valley 2017
sort: CARMENERE - FALERNIA GRAN RESERVA ELQUI VALLEY 2017
tastingDescription: With the textbook varietal hints on the nose of spicy bamboo, cigar wrapper and toast, this Chilean Carmenere has a silky, concentrated palate hinting at plum and currant fruit. With a dry chocolate finish that goes on and on, it's best served in a big glass.

name: CARMENERE - OOPS SPICY SPLENDOUR
tastingDescription: Deep ruby in colour with a good structure and silky texture. Sensual flavours of black and red fruit mingle with intense spicy notes. Soft tannis with an elegant finish, it pairs well with heavier meat, pasta and cheese.

name: CARMENERE - SAN PEDRO 1865 SINGLE VINEYARD MAULE 2018
nameSanitized: carmenere - san pedro 1865 single vineyard maule 2018
sort: CARMENERE - SAN PEDRO 1865 SINGLE VINEYARD MAULE 2018
tastingDescription: Aroma: Excellent aromatic intensity, characterized by spicy notes such as green pepper and nutmeg, as well as ripe, red fruit aromas.  Palate: Ample volume with fine balance and smooth tannins. Very persistent on the palate.

name: CARMENERE - UNDURRAGA GRAN RESERVA SIBARIS COLCHAGUA
nameSanitized: carmenere - undurraga gran reserva sibaris colchagua
sort: CARMENERE - UNDURRAGA GRAN RESERVA SIBARIS COLCHAGUA
tastingDescription: From the Maipo Valley. A brilliant ruby red, this wine has pronounced red and black fruit aromas, with smoky, spicy, herbal notes adding complexity. The aromas carry through on the full-bodied palate, with silky fine tannins adding superb structure and balance. Try this wine with grilled meats and pasta dishes.

name: CARMENERE CABERNET SAUVIGNON - EMILIANA NOVAS
tastingDescription: A blend of 85% Carmenere to 15% Cabernet Sauvignon, the wine shows its ripe Colchagua origins and typical chunky weight. This wine will pair well with steaks, grilled veggies or pork chops in a Carmenere wine reduction sauce.

name: CARMENERE MALBEC - ESTAMPA RESERVA COLCHAGUA 2018
tastingDescription: From Colchagua Estampa really specializes in Carmenere and blends. Which really is one of Chile's strengths: Carmenere on its own or with friends. Savory, structural and spice, Carmenere brings this to the blend with Malbec offering more juiciness, plum and black fruits and of course extra colour.

name: CARMENERE PETIT VERDOT - MONTES PURPLE ANGEL COLCHAGUA 2018
nameSanitized: carmenere petit verdot - montes purple angel colchagua 2018
sort: CARMENERE PETIT VERDOT - MONTES PURPLE ANGEL COLCHAGUA 2018
tastingDescription: 98 Points, James Suckling. Elegant on the nose, with aromas of ripe red and blackberries over a background of sweet notes. Being stored in French oak barrels adds aromas of dark chocolate, coffee which go with the typical fruity aromas of this variety. Well structured, with smooth and full tannins.

name: CASA DOS VINHOS SELECTED RICH MADEIRA
nameSanitized: casa dos vinhos selected rich madeira
nameSuffix: CASA DOS VINHOS SELECTED RICH MADEIRA
sort: CASA DOS VINHOS SELECTED RICH MADEIRA
tastingDescription: Our take on a Gin Fizz cocktail, this Sour is bursting with juicy botanical flavours. Juniper, Orange Peel and Coriander come together with a bright citrus punch of squeezed lemon, Cascade and Amarillo hops, creating a crisp, light and refreshingly tart experience.

name: CASTEL DEL MONTE - TORMARESCA TRENTANGELI ORGANIC 2017
nameSanitized: castel del monte - tormaresca trentangeli organic 2017
sort: CASTEL DEL MONTE - TORMARESCA TRENTANGELI ORGANIC 2017
tastingDescription: Intense and fruity aromas with notes of cherries, berry fruit (blackberries and mulberries) and spices (pepper and liquorice). On the palate, it is warm and rich with great structure and persistence. Ageing in barrique endows the wine with length and elegance. The blend is 70% Aglianico, 20% Cabernet Sauvignon and 10% Syrah.

name: CASTEL DEL MONTE RISERVA - RIVERA IL FALCONE 2014
nameSanitized: castel del monte riserva - rivera il falcone 2014
sort: CASTEL DEL MONTE RISERVA - RIVERA IL FALCONE 2014
tastingDescription: 93 Points, Decanter: "A savoury and firm red with an exotic mix of incense, tobacco and leather. The palate blends blueberry and redcurrant, while mineral and salted black liquorice takes over on the finish." (January 2019)

name: CASTELAO - QUINTA DO CHOCAPALHA TINTO

tastingDescription: This organically made red is a cherry colour with a violet shade indicating its youth. On the nose you'll find fresh cherries and other red berries, with similar notes on the palate that shows moderate tannins.

name: CASTILLA Y LEON - VALDUERO FINCA AZAYA
nameSanitized: castilla y leon - valduero finca azaya
sort: CASTILLA Y LEON - VALDUERO FINCA AZAYA
tastingDescription: 97 Points, Decanter World Wine Awards Best In Show: "Intense red ruby colour. It has a refined and lasting aroma as the result of its aging in toasted oak showing notes of menthol, liquorice and roasted coffee. Perfectly balanced on the palate, this wine transmits a sensation of maturity and power. Pairs beautifully with cured and roasted meats, strong cheeses and blue fish."

name: CASTILLO TEMPRANILLO - VICTORIANAS CONCILIO
tastingDescription: Clean, bright, cherry red colour developing to ruby in appearance. The nose is fresh with notes of berries and red fruits. This wine has good acidity and smooth in style.

name: CASTILLON COTES DE BORDEAUX - CHATEAU DE BELCIER 2010
nameSanitized: castillon cotes de bordeaux - chateau de belcier 2010
sort: CASTILLON COTES DE BORDEAUX - CHATEAU DE BELCIER 2010
tastingDescription: 92 Points, james Suckling: Chocolate, licorice and plums. Some mint and candied violets. Intensely juicy and full-bodied on the palate with pure dark fruit and lots of new wood. Big and structured with firm, yet ripe tannins that still need some time to soften.

name: CASTILLON COTES DE BORDEAUX - CHATEAU DE BELCIER MAGNUM 2010
nameSanitized: castillon cotes de bordeaux - chateau de belcier magnum 2010
sort: CASTILLON COTES DE BORDEAUX - CHATEAU DE BELCIER MAGNUM 2010
tastingDescription: 92 Points, james Suckling: Chocolate, licorice and plums. Some mint and candied violets. Intensely juicy and full-bodied on the palate with pure dark fruit and lots of new wood. Big and structured with firm, yet ripe tannins that still need some time to soften.

name: CASTILLON COTES DE BORDEAUX - CHATEAU JOANIN BECOT 2017
nameSanitized: castillon cotes de bordeaux - chateau joanin becot 2017
sort: CASTILLON COTES DE BORDEAUX - CHATEAU JOANIN BECOT 2017
tastingDescription:
"Rich and fruity, this is a warm wine. Tannins are nicely integrated with the black fruits. Acidity comes through to give a fresh end to this already attractive wine. Drink from early 2020."
88 Points, Wine Enthusiast

name: CATALAYUD GARNACHA - MARQUES DE NOMBREVILLA
tastingDescription: Red cherry color of medium intensity, clean and bright. Young and complex on the nose that reminds to cherries, strawberry and stones fruits, mixed with spicy aromas and cinnamon. Soft in the mouth, fruity and light. Round finish, velvety and persistent.

name: CATALUNYA - TORRES SANGRE DE TORO
tastingDescription: Sangre de Toro has fresh, expressive and intense red fruit aromas with a subtle nuance of oak ageing. Velvety on the palate, this Grenache and Carignan blend from Catalonia is a great match for stews, game and many other savoury, meaty dishes. The name "Sangre de Toro" is inspired by Baccus, Roman god of wine, known in ancient times as "Son of the Bull.”

name: CATALUNYA - TORRES VINA ESMERALDA
tastingDescription: Born on the Mediterranean coast in 1976 and inspired by the colour of the sea, Vina Esmeralda embodies elegance with a contemporary soul. The design of this limited edition pays tribute to the beautiful sunsets by the Mediterranean sea. The wine is off dry with aromatic notes of floral and tropical fruits.

name: CATTIN SAUVAGE - CREMANT D'ALSACE BRUT ORGANIC
nameSanitized: cattin sauvage - cremant dalsace brut organic
sort: CATTIN SAUVAGE - CREMANT D'ALSACE BRUT ORGANIC
tastingDescription: 90 points, Wine Enthusiast - "Lifted lemon peel and lemony angelfood cake make for an appetizing nose. The palate of this wine comes with more rounded flavors of fresh red apple with that lovely, yeasty backdrop. The mousse is fine, the body slender and t

name: CEDARCREEK - CABERNET MERLOT 2018
tastingDescription: This wine is all about balance and contrast. Balance of sites. Contrast of varietals. Think dark fruits and tart raspberry. Sweet plums and cacao. Baking spice and herbal notes. All in perfect harmony.

name: CEDARCREEK - CHARDONNAY 2019
tastingDescription: Nashi pear, cantaloupe, jasmine flowers and lemon zest. Bright acidity well balanced with weight and texture on the palate.

name: CEDARCREEK - MERITAGE
tastingDescription: Osoyoos is the place to ripen the Bordeaux grapes. In this instance Merlot (42%), Cabernet Sauvignon (26%), Malbec (20%) and Cabernet Franc (13%). Merlot and Malbec add plushness, the 2 Cabernets contribute structure and pedigree. Look for currant and berry flavours with subtle oak complexities. Will age or why wait, open one today. Will work with stove top, oven and grill menu options.

name: CEDARCREEK - MERLOT 2017
tastingDescription: CedarCreek's classic ripe, juicy style is further enhanced by the intense heat of the Okanagan. On the nose, lush aromas of fruitcake, clove, and anise. On the palate, ripe plum, blackberry, and vanilla stand out with a hint of dried fig on the finish. A Merlot made for Merlot lovers.

name: CEDARCREEK - MERLOT PLATINUM DESERT RIDGE 2017
tastingDescription: Malbec comes through on the nose with blackberry and blueberry notes. On the palate, fresh berry fruit upfront. Black currant and cassis on the finish. Cellaring: Enjoy now or cellar until 2027.

name: CEDARCREEK - PINOT GRIS 2019
tastingDescription: Rich flavours of orchard fruit, lots of pear and green apple. A hint of spice, with a round finish. This versatile wine goes with everything, or nothing at all. Try it with seafood, pork, lemon chicken, or hot wings, or sip it on its own.

name: CEDARCREEK - PINOT NOIR 2018
tastingDescription: This lighter style of Pinot Noir with good fruit concentration has loads of black cherry, raspberry and wood spice wrapped in moderate tannins and juicy acidity

name: CEDARCREEK - PLATINUM PINOT NOIR BLOCK 2 2017
tastingDescription: Nice mouthfeel, fine dusty tannins. Red fruit and floral notes, with a hint of clove and minerality.

name: CEDARCREEK - PLATINUM VIOGNIER HAYNES CREEK 2017
tastingDescription: A fine example of Viognier from the Okanagan Valley, this opens with fragrant aromas of tropical fruit, peach, pear and bergamot with hints of orange blossom, ginger and exotic spice. Medium-bodied with a succulent texture and a slick, oily mouthfeel. Pair with roast chicken, seared scallops or lightly spicy Asian dishes.

name: CEDARCREEK - SENATOR'S RED 2018
tastingDescription: This red is a tribute to Senator Ross Fitzpatrick who has been involved in the fruit and wine industry in the Okanagan for at least half a century. A Bordeaux blend led off by Cabernet Franc then Cabernet Sauvignon and Merlot, there is some Syrah in the mix too, to give it a bit more savoury character.

name: CERASUOLO D'ABRUZZO - TIBERIO 2019
tastingDescription: 92 Points, Eric Guido, Vinous: "The 2019 Tiberio Cerasuolo is wonderfully fresh and perfumed, showing depths of smoky minerals on the nose, giving way to notes of ripe strawberry and wild flowers, with a hint of crushed limestone and chalk. On the palate, silky textural depths are offset by saline-minerality and brisk acids, as notes of cherry with a hint of orange citrus wash across the senses. The finish is long, with a twang of tart red berry and hints of wild herbs, almost salty, and begging me to take another sip." (May 2020)

name: CEVENNES ROSE - LES FLEURS DU MAL
nameSanitized: cevennes rose - les fleurs du mal
sort: CEVENNES ROSE - LES FLEURS DU MAL
tastingDescription: Beautiful aromas of fresh, ripe wild strawberries. On the palate, the flavours of strawberries, young cherries and herbal notes come rushing in, accompanied by some spice notes and a clean, well-balanced finish.

name: CHABERTON - MADELEINE SYLVANER ESTATE GROWN FRASER VALLEY 19
nameSanitized: chaberton - madeleine sylvaner estate grown fraser valley 19
nameSuffix: MADELEINE SYLVANER ESTATE GROWN FRASER VALLEY 19
sort: CHABERTON - MADELEINE SYLVANER ESTATE GROWN FRASER VALLEY 19
tastingDescription: The Madeleine Sylvaner vines have been growing in Chaberton's Fraser Valley vineyard since 1982. These old vines produce gorgeous grapes with a brilliant golden hue. This is a delicate white wine with a bright and fresh floral nose, notes of sweet melons and honey, and a refreshingly dry finish. Enjoy with spicy curries, teriyaki or Thai chicken, Quiche Lorraine and strong cheeses.

name: CHABLIS - BAUDOUIN MILLET 2019
tastingDescription: False

name: CHABLIS - BEAUFUME 2019
tastingDescription: False

name: CHABLIS - CHATEAU DE FLEYS 2018
tastingDescription: The nose evokes aromas of spring flowers and white fruits including apple and peach. Aeration adds an exotic touch, hints of bread and a discreetly mineral background. The attack is full with a round, silky texture. It remains well-balanced overall thanks to the invigorating finish marked by lemony touches and a nice sharpness.

name: CHABLIS - DROUHIN VAUDON RESERVE DE VAUDON 2018
nameSanitized: chablis - drouhin vaudon reserve de vaudon 2018
sort: CHABLIS - DROUHIN VAUDON RESERVE DE VAUDON 2018
tastingDescription: 92 Points, Wine Socres: "Fresh, delightful, elegant. This wine delves into hazelnuts and yellow apples, wet stone, lemon zest and orang blossom aromas. A lovely Chablis, balanced and persistent; a delight to drink." March 2021

name: CHABLIS - JEAN MARC BROCARD GRAND CRU BLANCHOTS
nameSanitized: chablis - jean marc brocard grand cru blanchots
nameSuffix: JEAN MARC BROCARD GRAND CRU BLANCHOTS

tastingDescription: 95 Points, Decanter - "Reflecting the quality of many Blanchot bottlings in 2018, this has orange zest and sandalwood aromas, hint of beeswax and citrus and sappy, mouth-watering finish." (July 2019)

name: CHABLIS - LA CHABLISIENNE LA PIERRELEE 2015
tastingDescription: 91 Points, Decanter - “A host of wild herb characters on the nose with a juicy palate of stone fruit and a bright finish.” (February 2016)

name: CHABLIS - ROLAND LAVANTUREUX 1ER FOURCHAUME
tastingDescription: The nose shows a surprising intensity with a rich blend of floral and fruity notes. The wine is straight and mineral with pronounced aromas of ripe stone fruit and honeycomb which persist on the long pleasing finish.

name: CHABLIS - ROLAND LAVANTUREUX GRAND CRU VAUDESIR
nameSanitized: chablis - roland lavantureux grand cru vaudesir
sort: CHABLIS - ROLAND LAVANTUREUX GRAND CRU VAUDESIR
tastingDescription: 95 Points, Vinous: "...It has a fabulous nose of citrus fruit, orange blossom, crushed limestone and light fumé aromas. The oak here is beautifully knitted. The palate is very well balanced and poised, the oak perhaps a little prominent on the midpalate and masking some of the terroir at the moment..." (September 2020)

name: CHABLIS - WILLIAM FEVRE CHAMPS ROYAUX 2018
tastingDescription: Lively acidity, citrus and green apples greet the palate and develop into white flowers, gun smoke and wet stone flavours with a lovely clean and mineral finish in this French Chablis

name: CHABLIS 1ER BEAUROY - PASCAL BOUCHARD 18
tastingDescription: 91 points, Vinous: ''The 2018 Chablis Beauroy 1er Cru, which is 25% fermented in wood and sees 10 months on the fine lees, has the best aromatics from Pascal Bouchard, featuring lively citrus fruit, dried quince and crushed rock. The palate is well balanced with a lightly honeyed opening, the tropical tones kept in check with more spicy ginger and lemongrass toward the finish. This is a thoroughly enjoyable Chablis to drink over the next 7-9 years.'' (September 2020)

name: CHABLIS 1ER FOURCHAUME - DOMAINE WILLIAM FEVRE 2017
tastingDescription: 90-92 Points, Wine Advocate: “It has a delightful bouquet with scents of fresh pear, a hint of marzipan; it is sweet and charming while retaining Chablis-like austerity and poise. The palate is well balanced with crisp acidity, well poised with a touch of salinity developing towards the harmonious finish. Drink: 2018 - 2030.” (August 2016)

name: CHABLIS 1ER MONTEE DE TONNERRE - BROCARD 2018
tastingDescription: 96 Points, Decanter - "There's certainly no sign of stress or over-ripeness in this beautifully weighted foudre- and stainless steel-fermented Right Bank premier cru, the best of the vintage. Sappy, elegant and refined with a hint of wood spice and a fresh, racy, classically Chablisien finish. " (July 2019)

name: CHABLIS 1ER MONTMAINS - JEAN MARC BROCARD 2017
tastingDescription: 93 Points, Wine Enthusiast: “This crisp, steely wine comes from the cooler left bank of the river in Chablis. It is a tight wine, strong on minerality and tangy acidity, with the steely texture that gives the ability to age. Drink this nervy, crisp wine from 2020.” (February 2018)

name: CHABLIS 1ER VAILLONS - DOM C MOREAU CUVEE GUY MOREAU 2016
nameSanitized: chablis 1er vaillons - dom c moreau cuvee guy moreau 2016
nameSuffix: DOM C MOREAU CUVEE GUY MOREAU 2016
sort: CHABLIS 1ER VAILLONS - DOM C MOREAU CUVEE GUY MOREAU 2016
tastingDescription: Fresh citrus and juicy lemon with ample spiced shell minerality on the nose, carrying through to the ripe and concentrated palate. Green apple, oyster shell, lemon pith lay overtop of a textured white peach base, finishing with a lingering seashell spice.

name: CHABLIS 1ER VAILLONS - DOMAINE CHRISTIAN MOREAU 2016
tastingDescription: More concentrated aromas of citrus, minerals, white flowers and flint. This medium-bodied on the palate with a very good concentration and good class. The medium-plus length finish features a strong mineral element.

name: CHABLIS 1ER VAILLONS - DROUHIN VAUDON 2018
tastingDescription: 93 Points, Wine Scores:  "Luxurious, slick, creamy. It boldly delivers aromas of quince and lemon meringue, marzipan and coriander, yellow apples and fresh mountain stream. A lovely palate is creamy yet exuberant; it has a slick texture and long finish trailing flavours of almond paste and praline. Outstanding." Feb 2021

name: CHABLIS GRAND CRU LES CLOS - DOMAINE WILLIAM FEVRE 17

Incredible depth, high acidity and a very long finish. A great Clos!” (August 2018)

name: CHABLIS GRAND CRU MOUTONNE - BICHOT DOM LONG DEPAQUIT 2016
