name: GEVREY-CHAMBERTIN 1ER LE POISSENOT - GEANTET PANSIOT 2016
tastingDescription: False

name: GEWURZTMINER - WILLY GISSELBRECH CUVEE GUILLAUME 2018
tastingDescription: False

name: GEWURZTRAMINER - DOMAINE WEINBACH CUVEE LAURENCE 2018
tastingDescription: The aromas are evocative with notes of rose petals and exotic fruit. Slightly off-dry on the palate, this vintage unveils a bouquet of ripe cantaloupe, guava, and nectarine aromas which are balanced with delicate spices such as ginger and cardamom. The finish is long and elegant.

name: GEWURZTRAMINER - DOMAINE ZIND HUMBRECHT ROCHE ROULEE 2018
nameSanitized: gewurztraminer - domaine zind humbrecht roche roulee 2018
sort: GEWURZTRAMINER - DOMAINE ZIND HUMBRECHT ROCHE ROULEE 2018
tastingDescription: 93 Points, James Suckling - "This smells literally like a beautiful bouquet of roses and it has a great balance, thanks to the fine tannins...they neatly counterpoint the full body and hint of sweetness.  Almost dry finish and no perceptible alcohol, in spite of being 14.5%." (December 2020)

name: GEWURZTRAMINER - HUGEL ESTATE
tastingDescription: 91 Points, James Suckling: "Very little lychee, but a lot of smoke and spice on the nose. There’s a great balance between creaminess and dry freshness in this wine married to some discreet textural qualities that add interest without making it too much to take." (September 2016)

name: GEWURZTRAMINER - PFAFFENHEIM GRAND CRU STEINERT 2017
tastingDescription: This is a luxurious white wine, ripe with white fruit flavours in a robust, full-bodied texture. Lychee abounds in this veritable fruit cocktail, refreshing the palate with each sip. Balanced structure makes this an ideal wine for food pairing with Asian flavours such as Szechuan spice, sambal and the like.

name: GEWURZTRAMINER - PFAFFENHEIM PFAFF 2017
tastingDescription: With its very intense nose, this Gewurztraminer develops typical aromas such as spices, sultanas and marc. A couple of floral notes offer freshness and refined characteristics. Very expressive, this wine evokes spices with a couple of notes of honey. It offers good aromatic persistence and excellent freshness on the palate.

name: GEWURZTRAMINER - VALCKENBERG PFALZ 2018
tastingDescription: Floral aromatics with a clean, crisp nature lead into a balanced complexity in this dry GewuÌˆrztraminer from the Pfalz region. Rose and white pepper flavours accompany lychee fruit, giving this wine a light-bodied and bold character.

name: GIGONDAS - CHATEAU DE SAINT COSME 2019
tastingDescription: 95 Points, Wine Spectator: "Perfumy and stylish, with rooibos tea, blood orange and cherry aromas and flavors weaving through, infused with sandalwood, anise, bay leaf, sage and pepper notes along the way. A very fine and persistent chalky spine supports it all. Best from 2020 through 2035." (November 2018)

name: GIGONDAS - CHATEAU DE SAINT COSME HOMINIS FIDES 2018
nameSanitized: gigondas - chateau de saint cosme hominis fides 2018
nameSuffix: CHATEAU DE SAINT COSME HOMINIS FIDES 2018
sort: GIGONDAS - CHATEAU DE SAINT COSME HOMINIS FIDES 2018
tastingDescription: 95-97 Points,  Jeb Dunnuck - A step up, the 2018 Gigondas Hominis Fides offers slightly more mid-palate depth and richness as well as full body, ripe, polished tannins, and stunning notes of blackberries, ground herbs, peppery garrigue, and loamy soil. This fleshy, opulent, sexy wine does everything right.

name: GIGONDAS - CHATEAU DE SAINT COSME LE CLAUX 2019
nameSanitized: gigondas - chateau de saint cosme le claux 2019
nameSuffix: CHATEAU DE SAINT COSME LE CLAUX 2019
sort: GIGONDAS - CHATEAU DE SAINT COSME LE CLAUX 2019
tastingDescription: 97 Points, Wine Spectator - "This offers a range of sage, savory and bay leaf aromas followed by crushed black cherry, bitter plum and red currant fruit, all supported by racy, mouthwatering chalky cut. Dense, but fresh and well-defined throughout. Long finish. Best from 2020 through 2040." (November 2018)

name: GIGONDAS - CHATEAU DE SAINT COSME LE POSTE 2019
nameSanitized: gigondas - chateau de saint cosme le poste 2019
nameSuffix: CHATEAU DE SAINT COSME LE POSTE 2019
sort: GIGONDAS - CHATEAU DE SAINT COSME LE POSTE 2019
tastingDescription: 98 Points, Wine Spectator: "Offers a perfumed feel to lavender, violet and savory notes that lead off, followed quickly by ripe, focused fresh cherry, cassis and raspberry puree flavors, all harnessed by very fine chalky minerality, which extends through the lengthy finish. Best from 2020 through 2040." (November 2018)

name: GIGONDAS - DOM. BRUSSET LE TRADITION GRAND MONTMIRAIL 2019
nameSanitized: gigondas - dom. brusset le tradition grand montmirail 2019
nameSuffix: DOM. BRUSSET LE TRADITION GRAND MONTMIRAIL 2019
sort: GIGONDAS - DOM. BRUSSET LE TRADITION GRAND MONTMIRAIL 2019
tastingDescription: 92-94 points, Joe Czerwinsky: "This is exceptional, combining ripeness, power & complexity, with plum, black cherry and licorice aromas and a full-bodied palate boasting creamy, ripe tannins, black olives and licorice on the lengthy finish."  Wine Advocate. (November, 2020).

name: GIGONDAS - DOMAINE BRUSSET LES HAUTS DE MONTMIRAIL 2018
nameSanitized: gigondas - domaine brusset les hauts de montmirail 2018
nameSuffix: DOMAINE BRUSSET LES HAUTS DE MONTMIRAIL 2018
sort: GIGONDAS - DOMAINE BRUSSET LES HAUTS DE MONTMIRAIL 2018
tastingDescription: This full-bodied wine is produced from Grenache, Mourvedre and Syrah. 93-95 points, Wine Advocate - "The 2018 features hints of dark fruit, leather, cedar and spices on the nose. It's full-bodied, rich, creamy and concentrated, finishing lush and long, with hints of cocoa and garrigue on the finish." (October, 2019).

name: GIGONDAS - MEFFRE DOMAINE DE LONGUE TOQUE 2016
nameSanitized: gigondas - meffre domaine de longue toque 2016
sort: GIGONDAS - MEFFRE DOMAINE DE LONGUE TOQUE 2016
tastingDescription: 92 Points, Wine Spectator: "This shows the broad, ripe feel of the vintage, with layers of warm cassis, cherry preserves and raspberry reduction flowing through, lined with subtle singed apple wood, tea and floral hints. A light cedar accent hangs through the finish. Drink now through 2026." (2018)

name: GIGONDAS - SANTA DUC LES HAUTE GARRIGUES
nameSanitized: gigondas - santa duc les haute garrigues
sort: GIGONDAS - SANTA DUC LES HAUTE GARRIGUES
tastingDescription: False

name: GIGONDAS - TARDIEU-LAURENT VIEILLES VIGNES
tastingDescription: 94 points, Wine Enthusiast  - ''Spicy hits of clove, nutmeg and cinnamon entice on the nose of this full-bodied, luminous red. An invigorating blend of Grenache (80%), Mourvèdre (10%) and Syrah (10%), it offers youthful blackberry and plum flavors etched by hints of lavender, sage and bramble. A lovely, unadorned expression of Gigondas best now–2030.'' (March 2021)

name: GINESTET LA CHEVALERIE
tastingDescription: This wine offers a brilliant robe with garnet red tints. It develops a nose of fresh fruits grades. A pleasant mouth feel frank and fruity. An elegant wine which would go well with a mixed grill or summer salad

name: GIUSEPPE CARPANO - ANTICA FORMULA VERMOUTH
tastingDescription: Made from botanicals sourced from all over the world - Vanilla from Madagascar, Papua New Guinea and Tahiti; Saffron from Iran and wormwood from Piedmont and the Aosta Valley, this bold flavoured aperitif also incorporates white wines from indigenous Italian grape varieties. Spicy clove, candied nuts and bitter citrus zest flavours make it a perfect aperitif. You could also get creative and use it to make some ingenious cocktails!

name: GOLD HILL - CHARISMA CABERNET MERLOT 2020
tastingDescription: A noted grower for noted wineries in the Okanagan, Gold Hill has their own label to put out tasty blends like this. Intensity and weight on the palate, with a softness and hints of black currant and plum. A bigger frame makes this a red to go with bigger fare. Such as lamb chops or game dishes or sausages on the grill.

name: GONZALAS BYASS - FINO EN RAMA TIO PEPE
nameSanitized: gonzalas byass - fino en rama tio pepe
sort: GONZALAS BYASS - FINO EN RAMA TIO PEPE
tastingDescription: False

name: GONZALEZ BYASS - FINO PALOMINO TIO PEPE
nameSanitized: gonzalez byass - fino palomino tio pepe
sort: GONZALEZ BYASS - FINO PALOMINO TIO PEPE
tastingDescription: The nose of this sherry is pungent with blanched almonds, seaweed and lemon zest. Its quenching sensation in the mouth will liven the palate. Try with grilled sardines and lemon.

name: GONZALEZ BYASS - OLOROSO NUTTY SOLERA
tastingDescription: This medium-dry sherry is a deep amber colour with walnut and almond front and centre, followed by dried fruit and a touch of toffee

name: GONZALEZ BYASS - VORS AGED 30 YEARS APOSTOLES
nameSanitized: gonzalez byass - vors aged 30 years apostoles
sort: GONZALEZ BYASS - VORS AGED 30 YEARS APOSTOLES
tastingDescription: 91 Points, Wine Spectator - "Rather friendly for a Sherry, with ginger, almond paste, toffee and roasted peanut notes forming the core. A light bitter almond edge keeps the finish honest. Purists may decry the lack of austerity here, but if you want to ease someone into Sherry, this might be the way." (December 2017)

name: GOOD NATURED -  CRISP CHARDONNAY
tastingDescription: Clear and bright with a pale lemon hue. A fresh, clean fruit aroma of Granny Smith apple and Bartlett pear. A light, smooth, easy-drinking Chardonnay with flavours of lemon, lime, and apple, which also linger on the finish.

name: GOOD NATURED - PETIT VERDOT MERLOT
tastingDescription: A deep ruby colour with a lovely bouquet of blueberry and violets. A medium-bodied, smooth, easy-drinking Merlot / Petit Verdot blend with flavours of cranberry, chocolate, and nutmeg spice. A smooth medley of red fruit flavours, along with a note of sweet spice linger on the finish.

name: GRAHAM - 10 YEAR OLD TAWNY
tastingDescription: 92 Points, Wine Spectator - "Date, fig and mulled plum fruit flavors form this broad and juicy core. Cinnamon, black tea and hazelnut notes fill in the background. Shows some power, with the cut and drive for balance. Drink now." (June 2018)

name: GRAHAM - LATE BOTTLED VINTAGE PORT 2015
tastingDescription: Graham's 2014 LBV has an intense deep red colour. In the mouth, compact, ripe black fruit flavours marry with fresh, spicy notes from the Sousao. The finish is typically Graham with the signature balance between complexity and elegance.

name: GRAHAM - SIX GRAPES RESERVE
tastingDescription: This port has rich aromas of ripe plums, cherries and dark chocolate. It is full-bodied with rich, dark fruits on the palate complemented by dark chocolate notes. Six Grapes is bottled relatively young in order to retain the freshness and vigour of a young vintage port.

name: GRAHAM'S - GIFT PACK
tastingDescription: An elegant selection of Graham's finest Ports. Including: Fine White Port, Six Grapes, Late Bottle Vintage, 10 Year Old Tawny and 20 Year Old Tawny.

name: GRAHAM'S - VINTAGE PORT 2016
tastingDescription: 98 Points, Wine Spectator: "This offers a distilled plum and boysenberry essence, with a racy feel, as spearmint and graphite notes drive through. Has the showy ripeness of the vintage... imparting a sense of precision despite the heft. Best from 2030 through 2055." (December 2018)

name: GRANVILLE ISLAND OSAKE - JUNMAI NAMA
tastingDescription: Handcrafted in Granville Island's artisan studio, this pale yellow Canadian Sake offers bouquet of lively green pear, melon and citrus aroma. The palate is mild and refreshing with notes of dried banana, floral and tapioca, with delicate finish of sweetness. It is a refined sipping sake and is ideal for pairing with seafood, salad and acidic cheeses.

name: GRANVILLE ISLAND OSAKE - JUNMAI SPARKLING SAKE
nameSanitized: granville island osake - junmai sparkling sake
sort: GRANVILLE ISLAND OSAKE - JUNMAI SPARKLING SAKE
tastingDescription: This lively and fresh sparkling sake has a brilliant body with a golden colour and aromas of pear with hints of toast, nuts, honey, and nougat. Light carbonation makes it perfect for pairing with a cheese plate, shellfish, fruit, or as an aperitif.

name: GRAVES - CHATEAU RAHOUL BLANC 2018
tastingDescription:
"Aromas of cooked lemon, guava, flint and nettles. It's medium-bodied with bright, tangy acidity. Fresh and precise with citrus notes on the finish."
91 pts, James Suckling

name: GRAVES - CHATEAU RAHOUL ROUGE 2018
tastingDescription:
"The 2018 Rahoul has a tightly wound nose that needed an hour's aeration before revealing black currant, Japanese seaweed and inky aromas. Fine delineation here, and quite pure. The palate is medium-bodied with fine-grained tannins, quite structured and very classic in style. But I admire the balance and freshness, and there's plenty of sapidity on the finish. Drinking Window: 2023 - 2033."
91 pts, Vinous

name: GRAVES - CLOS FLORIDENE BLANC 2017
tastingDescription:
"A wine of real distinction and class, the 2017 Clos Floridene Blanc also shows just how appealing the vintage is for Bordeaux's dry whites. Lemon confit, tangerine oil, pear, spice and a kiss of new French oak all grace this soft, wonderfully expressive white from the Dubourdieu family. The 2017 is pure class. That's all there is to it. Drink: 2020 - 2027."
91 Points, Vinous

name: GRAVES - CLOS FLORIDENE BLANC 2017
tastingDescription: False

name: GRAVES - CLOS FLORIDENE BLANC 2018
tastingDescription:
"The 2018 Clos Floridène Blanc is an absolute delight to taste. Bright and airy, with effusive aromatics, the 2018 is just gorgeous. Orchard fruit, lemon oil, mint, sage and a hint of nutmeg are some of the many notes that grace this polished, refined white from the Dubourdieu family. Drinking Window: 2021 - 2026."
90 pts, Vinous

name: GRAVES - CLOS FLORIDENE ROUGE 2017
tastingDescription:
"A pure, focused style, with damson plum and raspberry coulis flavors that glisten with an iron minerality on the finish. Shows a light incense echo at the very end. Cabernet Sauvignon and Merlot. Drink now through 2024."
90 Points, Wine Spectator

name: GRAVES - CLOS FLORIDENE ROUGE 2018
tastingDescription:
"Stylish, with a mix of cherry, currant and plum notes that glide through, supported gently by a kiss of toast and notes of red tea and tobacco leaf. Ends with a subtle iron twinge through the finish. Cabernet Sauvignon and Merlot. Drink now through 2028."
91 pts, Wine Spectator

name: GRAVES BLANC - CLOS FLORIDENE 2013
tastingDescription: 90-92 Points, Wine Advocate: “Lots of orange marmalade and lemon blossom notes intermixed with honeyed grapefruit, fig and melon aromas jump from the glass of this impeccably well-made, outstanding white Graves. Dry, zesty and perfumed with impressive concentration, this offering from proprietor Denis Dubourdieu is terrific. Drink: 2014 - 2021.” (August 2014)

name: GRAVES BLANC - CLOS FLORIDENE 2014
tastingDescription: 91 Points, Wine Spectator: “This has notes of lemon zest and chamomile that streak around the yellow apple and white peach flavors, imparting a plump hint and mouthwatering cut. Drink now through 2020.” (March 2017)

name: GRAY MONK - CHARDONNAY UNWOODED 2020
tastingDescription: Pale straw in colour this unoaked Chardonnay displays aromas of apple, pineapple, honeydew melon and cinnamon. This luscious wine tastes of apple, tropical fruit, tangerine with a fresh and lengthy finish.

name: GRAY MONK - GEWURZTRAMINER 2020
tastingDescription: Exotic flavours of lychee and rose petal, grapefruit rind and some spicy candied ginger are prominently featured. This wine is off-dry but the bright acidity keeps it fresh

name: GRAY MONK - LATITUDE FIFTY WHITE 2020
tastingDescription: A blend of Gewurztraminer, Bacchus, Muller-Thurgau and Riesling, this wine has aromas of lemon, apple and hay. The palate shows flavours of Bartlett pear, mandarin orange and ginger. The finish is off-dry with a pleasing hint of spice.

name: GRAY MONK - MERLOT 2018
tastingDescription: Garnet in colour this classic ripe Merlot has aromas of plum, blackberry, and cocoa. The palate is rich with blackberry, chocolate and plum. This wine has firm round tannins and a lengthy finish.

name: GRAY MONK - MONK'S RED BLEND 2019
tastingDescription: A bright purple colour with a beautiful bouquet of blue plum, blueberry, black cherry, cassis and pomegranate with delicate notes of oak and spice. This medium-bodied red wine has soft silky tannins and juicy ripe flavours of dark berries, cherry and plum. The juicy dark fruits keep lingering through on the finish with an added note of black tea and sweet spice.

name: GRAY MONK - ODYSSEY BRUT 2018
tastingDescription: Riesling, Chardonnay Musqué and Pinot Blanc make up the blend in this traditional method sparkler that sees 16 months aging on its lees. The result is a robust but crisp bubbly bursting with citrus and apple aromas. More citrus and brioche flavours abound before a lingering, slightly off-dry finish.

name: GRAY MONK - PINOT AUXERROIS 2020
tastingDescription: Next to Noir, Gris and Blanc, Auxerrois is the least-known of the Pinots. Gray Monk brought Pinot Auxerrois vines to BC from Alsace in the 1970s, and they use the grapes to make a lively, aromatic and fruity white perfect for these salad days of summer.

name: GRAY MONK - PINOT GRIS 2020
tastingDescription: The Gray Monk story goes back to planting the first handful of Pinot Gris vines in the province decades ago. Flavourful, fruity, fresh and delicious, the taste is perfect for sipping with all kinds of menu and company. This is #1 with our customers!

name: GRAY MONK - PINOT NOIR 2019
tastingDescription: Garnet in colour with aromas of red cherry and vanilla. Medium-bodied with flavours of pomegranate, red currant and cherry with a long finish.

name: GRAY MONK - RIESLING 2020
tastingDescription: Pale straw in colour, this Riesling has a pretty nose of orange blossom, lime sorbet and subtle minerality. The zesty palate displays flavours of key lime, green apple, and gooseberry on the refreshing minerally finish.

name: GRENACHE - PIRRAMIMMA STOCK'S HILL
tastingDescription: 93 Points, Wine Orbit: "Showing enticing aromas of dark plum, sweet raspberry, violet and vanillin oak, the wine offers excellent weight and plush texture combined with gorgeously flowing mouthfeel. Groovy and very tasty." (June 2020)

name: GRENACHE - TAKE IT TO THE GRAVE MCLAREN VALE
nameSanitized: grenache - take it to the grave mclaren vale
nameSuffix: TAKE IT TO THE GRAVE MCLAREN VALE
sort: GRENACHE - TAKE IT TO THE GRAVE MCLAREN VALE
tastingDescription: 92 point, Wine Orbit - "It's attractively fruited and fragrant, showing mulberry, sweet plum, violet, toasted spice and almond characters. The palate offering lovely weight and fruit intensity, elegantly framed by fine-grained tannins, leading to a lengthy supple finish." (April 2020)

name: GRENACHE SHIRAZ MATARO - TORBRECK THE STEADING  2017
nameSanitized: grenache shiraz mataro - torbreck the steading  2017
sort: GRENACHE SHIRAZ MATARO - TORBRECK THE STEADING  2017
tastingDescription:
The 2017 The Steading offers consumers a mid-priced chance to sample the Torbreck style. A blend of 51% Grenache, 25% Shiraz and 24% Mataro, it matured 18 months in a large foudre. Black cherries, anise and cracked pepper all appear on the nose, while the full-bodied palate is supple and rich, marked by flavors of plum, dark chocolate and spice cake. All those elements linger harmoniously on the long, velvety finish. Drink: 2019 - 2030.
93 pts, Wine Advocate

name: GRENACHE SHIRAZ MATARO - YALUMBA BAROSSA 2016
tastingDescription: 90 Points, James Suckling - "The red fruit of grenache are sent to the heather with bracken and blue fruit, as well as a gentle, earthy edge. Medium body, red fruit and smooth, balanced appeal. Drink now."

name: GRENACHE SHIRAZ MOURVEDRE - BAROSSA VALLEY ESTATE BAROSSA 17
nameSanitized: grenache shiraz mourvedre - barossa valley estate barossa 17
sort: GRENACHE SHIRAZ MOURVEDRE - BAROSSA VALLEY ESTATE BAROSSA 17
tastingDescription: Delicate violet, subtle herbal notes, a fresh burst of raspberry on a rich centre of juicy plum. Ideal as an aperitif or perfectly matched with steak, charcuterie, duck, mushroom, truffle, Asian and Italian flavours, and goat’s cheese.

name: GRENACHE SHIRAZ MOURVEDRE - TORBRECK OLD VINES BAROSSA 2018
nameSanitized: grenache shiraz mourvedre - torbreck old vines barossa 2018
sort: GRENACHE SHIRAZ MOURVEDRE - TORBRECK OLD VINES BAROSSA 2018
tastingDescription: 92 points, WineAlign - "A spicy grenache, syrah and mourvedre blend with a lightly meaty, smoky undercurrent. Very southern Rhone - aromatic, elegant and very pure. Flavours on the palate are beautifully integrated with feathery tannins and an abundance of sweet red fruit. (February 2020)

name: GRIGNOLINO DEL MONFERRATO CASALESE - ACCORNERO BRICCO DEL BO
nameSanitized: grignolino del monferrato casalese - accornero bricco del bo
sort: GRIGNOLINO DEL MONFERRATO CASALESE - ACCORNERO BRICCO DEL BO
tastingDescription: Grignolino is a rare varietal from Piedmont. It will rejoice the finest Burgundy, Barolo and Barbaresco lovers. Crushed red berries, mint, wild flowers, cinnamon and rosewater are all beautifully lifted in this silky, wonderfully inviting lightly tannic wine. It pairs well with with hors d'oeuvres, vegetable quiches, duck, white meat and fried dishes. Definitely worth trying with fish dishes.

name: GROW WILD - ENCHANTING WHITE BLEND 2020
tastingDescription: Riotous citrus and lemon peel. Unfettered pear and apple. A crips finish that won't be held back. Blend: 59% Pinot Blanc, 27% Pinot Gris, 14% Riesling.

name: GROW WILD - RAVISHING ROSE 2020
tastingDescription: Aromas of pink grapefruit, strawberry and crushed gravel. This Rosé is dry-to-off-dry. It is medium bodied with medium acidity and just a touch of drying tannins. The palate has a silky mouth feel, offering delicate flavours of pink grapefruit, strawberries and savory notes, followed by watermelon on the medium finish.

name: GROW WILD - RED BLEND 2019
tastingDescription: Uninhibited cherries and plums. Exuberant spice and a taste that lingers without limit. Blend: 60% Pinot Noir, 20% Merlot, 20% Syrah.

name: GRUNER VELTLINER - ALZINGER DURNSTEIN FEDERSPIEL
tastingDescription: 90 Points, Falstaff - "Light yellow-green, silver reflections. Delicate herbal seasoning, tobacco nuances, yellow apple fruit, some mango and orange zest. Medium body, delicate pear, fine acid arc, subtle sweetness in the aftertaste." Translated from German, (June 2019)

name: GRUNER VELTLINER - DOMAINE WACHAU TERRACES 2019
tastingDescription: Domane Wachau’s Terraces Gruner Veltliner is a crisp, dry white wine with a wonderfully refreshing apple and citrus laden palate. Delicately aromatic on the nose, the palate is rounded with hints of honey, mineral and just a little spice.

name: GRUNER VELTLINER - LAURENZ UND SOPHIE SINGING 2018
nameSanitized: gruner veltliner - laurenz und sophie singing 2018
sort: GRUNER VELTLINER - LAURENZ UND SOPHIE SINGING 2018
tastingDescription: A very attractive fruit bouquet yields apple, peach and citrus aromas along with a typical Veltliner spiciness and a touch of white pepper. The soft and juicy palate is supported by fine acidity. It sings on the palate!

name: GUSBOURNE - BLANC DE BLANCS 2013
tastingDescription: Dry, minerally and elegant. Pale gold with a delicate mousse, this Blanc de Blancs blends classic Chardonnay characters of green apple, citrus and white fruit on the nose, with mineral notes and buttered toast complexity from extended lees ageing. The palate provides vibrant and ripe acidity with soft, creamy development.

name: HAKUTSURU - DAI GINJO SAKE
tastingDescription: False

name: HAKUTSURU - DRAFT SAKE
tastingDescription: this draft sake, which is aged for one month after brewing, has a fruity, rice-like aroma and a refined freshness that is characterized by a light, smooth taste. it has hints of caramel and is slightly fruity in the mouth, but is quite dry with a rice-flavoured finish. Best enjoyed chilled.

name: HAKUTSURU - JUNMAI GINJO SAKE
tastingDescription: As featured in TASTE Magazine, Fall 2017. "Uncover the pairing potential of sake! Crisp Asian pear, anise and savoury umami notes with balanced acidity make this silky-smooth sake a delight to sip on!"

name: HAKUTSURU - NISHIKI
tastingDescription: Determined to create an original sake rice that would surpass the "king of rice," Yamada-Nishiki, Hakutsuru spent eight years in research and development to cultivate the Hakutsuru Nishiki rice, a new cross of Yamadaho and Tankan Wataribune. Enjoy the elegance of refreshing floral notes of jasmine and orange blossom and savour a hint of vanilla sweetness in the long finish.

name: HAKUTSURU - SAKE
tastingDescription: Hakutsuru Sake has been brewed for over 260 years using the same traditional method. It is characterized by its full-bodied taste and mellow aroma and can be served at any temperature; warm, hot, chilled or room temperature.

name: HAKUTSURU - SAYURI NIGORI SAKE
tastingDescription: Hakutsuru Nigori is a creamy sake that passes through a mesh and is coarsely filtered.  This process gives Sayuri a refreshing aroma, natural sweetness and smooth aftertaste. Shake well and serve chilled.

name: HAKUTSURU - SHO-UNE JUNMAI DAI GINJO SAKE
nameSanitized: hakutsuru - sho-une junmai dai ginjo sake
sort: HAKUTSURU - SHO-UNE JUNMAI DAI GINJO SAKE
tastingDescription: False

name: HAKUTSURU - TENKU YAMADA NISHIKI JUNMAI DAIGINJO
nameSanitized: hakutsuru - tenku yamada nishiki junmai daiginjo
sort: HAKUTSURU - TENKU YAMADA NISHIKI JUNMAI DAIGINJO
tastingDescription: False

name: HAKUTSURU - UKIYO-E JUNMAI
tastingDescription: False

name: HARVEY'S - BRISTOL CREAM
tastingDescription: A blend of old Oloroso, Fino and Amontillado sherries, sweetened with Pedro Ximénez, this amber-coloured sherry has orange rind and caramel aromas with flavours of vanilla bean, toasted caramel and toffee. Serve well-chilled to balance the sweetness with the fruit and floral notes of this dessert treat.

name: HARVEY'S - BRISTOL CREAM
tastingDescription: A blend of old Oloroso, Fino and Amontillado sherries, sweetened with Pedro Ximénez, this amber-coloured sherry has orange rind and caramel aromas with flavours of vanilla bean, toasted caramel and toffee. Serve well-chilled to balance the sweetness with the fruit and floral notes of this dessert treat.

name: HARVEYS - APERITIVO ORANGE
tastingDescription: From the vineyards of Andalucia comes the new Harveys Aperitivo Orange. Predominately bitter orange and mandarin aromas, with hints of aromatic herbs. Tastes slightly sweet upon entering the mouth with a pleasant and perfectly composed acidity. Finishes with a notable presence of citrus, especially fresh orange.

name: HAUT MEDOC - CHATEAU BELGRAVE 2018
tastingDescription:
Enjoyable depth and power. This has walls of spice and smoke set against powerful cassis and bilberry, and plenty of Haut- Médoc signature. Oak notes also, but well-integrated even at this young stage. Enjoyable with plenty of life ahead of it. Drinking Window: 2026 - 2042."
93 pts, Decanter

name: HAUT MEDOC - CHATEAU BELLEVUE 2018
tastingDescription:
A blend of 48% Cabernet Sauvignon, 30% Merlot, 20% Petit Verdot, 1% Cabernet Franc and 1% Carménère, aged for approximately 14 months in oak, 30% new, the 2018 Belle-Vue reveals pretty notions of crushed blackberries, mulberries and boysenberries, plus suggestions of underbrush, ground cloves  and menthol. The medium-bodied palate is elegantly styled and refreshing, delivering bags of crunchy black fruits and a soft texture, finishing with a minty kick. Drink Date: 2022 - 2032."
90 pts, Wine Advocate

name: HAUT MEDOC - CHATEAU CAMBON LA PELOUSE 2018
nameSanitized: haut medoc - chateau cambon la pelouse 2018
sort: HAUT MEDOC - CHATEAU CAMBON LA PELOUSE 2018
tastingDescription:
Alluring tobacco and dark tea notes lead the way while a caressing set of cassis and black cherry purée flavors follow closely. Cedar echo on the finish. Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot and Petit Verdot. Drink now through 2025."
90 pts, Wine Spectator

name: HAUT MEDOC - CHATEAU LANESSAN 2018
tastingDescription:
"The 2018 Lanessan is a total delight. Medium in body, with terrific persistence, the 2018 is all class. Cedar, sweet pipe tobacco, mint, dried flowers and sweet red cherry all open with a bit of time in the glass. Lanessan is such a pretty and alluring Haut-Médoc. Drinking Window: 2022 - 2033."
91 pts, Vinous

name: HAUT MEDOC - CHATEAU PEYRABON 2009
tastingDescription: This wine displays aromas of savoury black cherry and black raspberry with spice and earth.� The palate is focused and medium bodied with a firm structure.

name: HAUT MEDOC - CHATEAU SENEJAC 2018
tastingDescription:
"Blackcurrant, blackberry, herbal and earthy undertones. It's full-bodied with chewy tannins and structure. Savory and layered on the palate. Rich finish. Chewy. Try after 2024."
93 pts, James Suckling

name: HAUT MEDOC - CHATEAU SOCIANDO MALLET 2017
tastingDescription:
"Freshness and brightness to this. Medium to full body with firm, juicy tannins. A little chewy now, but will come around nicely with bottle age. Excellent for the vintage. Better after 2021."
93 Points, James Suckling

name: HAUT MEDOC - CHATEAU VERDIGNAN 2005
tastingDescription: 90 Points, Wine Spectator: "Dark in color, with lots of blackberry, mineral, licorice and a hint of toasty oak. Full-bodied, with velvety tannins and a long, caressing finish. Balanced and generous, with lots of fruit underneath. Best after 2011." (March 2008)

name: HAUT-MEDOC - CHATEAU BELGRAVE 2017
tastingDescription:
"This well-formed wine has tannins and black-currant fruits in balance. It shows structure and a ripe, classic profile that will allow it to age. Drink this wine from 2022."
93 Points, Wine Enthusiast

name: HAUTES COTES DE NUITS - DOM MICHEL GROS FONTAINE ST MARTIN 2
nameSanitized: hautes cotes de nuits - dom michel gros fontaine st martin 2
nameSuffix: DOM MICHEL GROS FONTAINE ST MARTIN 2
sort: HAUTES COTES DE NUITS - DOM MICHEL GROS FONTAINE ST MARTIN 2
tastingDescription: 90 Points, Gilbert et Gaillard 2019: "Appealing, medium intense cherry-red. Focused nose revealing beautiful aromas of ripe red fruits underscored by a touch of fresh oak. The palate is mouth-filling and fat with a lightweight, soft mouthfeel. Clean, precise and persistent."

name: HAYWIRE - VINTAGE BUB 2013
tastingDescription: False

name: HAYWIRE GAMAY 2019
tastingDescription: Elegant reds are just the ticket for BC to make as they show off the fresh fruit, softer tannin and red berry fruit notes that work so well with the menu. Gamay is the grape of Beaujolais, notable for being a great food wine. The combination adds up to a flavourful red wine with raspberry and strawberry notes and a satisfying palate. Try with all kinds of menu. 700 cs produced.

name: HELIOS CABERNET SAUVIGNON - PENLEY ESTATE
tastingDescription: False

name: HENKELL - LIMITED EDITION
tastingDescription: Fresh, fruity, aromatic with a hint of citrus fruit. A perfect balance between sweet and dry with a medium body and persistant aftertaste.

name: HENKELL - TROCKEN DRY SEC
tastingDescription: Bright yellow bubbles rise to the top bursting in an expression of celebration. It's a light-bodied sparkling with soft floral and fruit nuances. It's fun to serve a little bottle alongside everyone's glass at the table.

name: HENKELL ROSE
tastingDescription: Pretty and pink in the glass with bubbles that pop with aromas of citrus and red fruits, this rosé is slightly sweet and full of flavours of peach, raspberry, apple and hints of orange peel. Perfect with chocolate desserts.

name: HENKELL ROSE PICCOLO
tastingDescription: Pretty and pink in the glass with bubbles that pop with aromas of citrus and red fruits, this rosé is slightly sweet and full of flavours of peach, raspberry, apple and hints of orange peel. Perfect with chocolate desserts.

name: HENKELL TROCKEN DRY SEC
tastingDescription: Bright yellow bubbles rise to the top bursting in an expression of celebration. It's a light-bodied sparkling with soft floral and fruit nuances. It's fun to serve a little bottle alongside everyone's glass at the table.

name: HENKELL TROCKEN DRY SEC
tastingDescription: Bright yellow bubbles rise to the top bursting in an expression of celebration. It's a light-bodied sparkling with soft floral and fruit nuances. It's fun to serve a little bottle alongside everyone's glass at the table.

name: HENKELL TROCKEN DRY SEC PICCOLO
tastingDescription: Bright yellow bubbles rise to the top bursting in an expression of celebration. It's a light-bodied sparkling with soft floral and fruit nuances. It's fun to serve a little bottle alongside everyone's glass at the table.

name: HENNERS - BRUT ROSE
tastingDescription: An elegant and beautifully crafted rosé.  This English sparkling rosé delivers classic English red berry fruit flavours including raspberries, redcurrants and rhubarb.

name: HENRI GIRAUD - AY GRAND CRU FUT DE CHENE BRUT MV 10
nameSanitized: henri giraud - ay grand cru fut de chene brut mv 10
nameSuffix: AY GRAND CRU FUT DE CHENE BRUT MV 10
sort: HENRI GIRAUD - AY GRAND CRU FUT DE CHENE BRUT MV 10
tastingDescription: 92 Points, Wine Advocate - "The MV10 opens with a clear, pure, fresh and coolish bouquet of white fruits, dried flowers, fresh oak and cold earth. There is a certain maturity here, but the palate is round, fresh and elegant, with good grip and tension and a perfect touch of sweetness. Drink: 2018 - 2026." (June 2016)

name: HENRI GIRAUD - ESPRIT NATURE
tastingDescription: Wine Spectator 92 points - "A skein of exotic spice unravels through flavors of apple tarte Tatin, ginger pastry cream, graphite and smoke in this expressive Champagne, framed by lithe acidity and a finely detailed mousse. Disgorged January 2018."�

name: HERMITAGE - DELAS BESSARDS 2017
tastingDescription: False

name: HERMITAGE - DELAS LES BESSARDS 2013
tastingDescription: 94+ Points, Wine Advocate: "The 2013 Hermitage les Bessards is a big, full-bodied, burly wine that offers first rate purity in its black raspberry, ozone, liquid rock, and creosote-like bouquet. It has plenty of material and density, but will need bottle age to become approachable. Drink: 2022 - 2045." (December 2015)

name: HERMITAGE - DOMAINE BELLE 2012
tastingDescription: 93 Points, Vinous: "Inky ruby. Ripe blueberry, cherry cola and cassis on the deeply perfumed nose, along with a smoky nuance and a hint of vanilla bean. Smooth, sappy and concentrated; black and blue fruit flavors are complemented by suggestions of peppery spices, mocha and licorice." (March 2016)

name: HERMITAGE - DOMAINE DU COLOMBIER 2013
tastingDescription: 93 Points, Vinous: "Bright purple. Assertively perfumed aromas of cassis, candied licorice and incense, and a sexy floral pastille note that builds in the glass. Sappy, sweet and broad on entry, then tighter in the mid-palate, offering vibrant black and blue fruit." (March 2016)

name: HERMITAGE - PAUL JABOULET LA CHAPELLE 2013
tastingDescription: 95 Points, Wine Advocate: "The 2013 Hermitage la Chapelle offers a sensational bouquet of blackberry and black raspberry fruits, powdered rock, gunpowder and pepper. Medium to full-bodied, with good levels of concentration, it has high, yet beautifully polished tannin, integrated acidity, and terrific cut and focus on the finish. Drink: 2020 - 2040." (December 2015)

name: HERMITAGE - PAUL JABOULET LA CHAPELLE 2015
tastingDescription: 100 Points, Jeb Dunnuck - "A legendary wine in the making, the 2015 Hermitage La Chapelle is reminiscent of the 1990 with its full-bodied, opulently, sexy, yet concentrated style. Offering sensational notes of blackcurrants, smoked herbs, beef blood, and chocolate, it's a huge yet elegant wine that has masses of sweet tannin, incredible purity and finesse, and a killer finish. It's the finest wine from this estate in close to 30 years." (January 2018)

name: HERMITAGE - PAUL JABOULET LA CHAPELLE 2017
tastingDescription: 97+ Points, Wine Advocate - "In need of serious air to open up, the 2017 Hermitage La Chapelle became more and more impressive the longer I kept it in the glass. At first it seemed a bit simple, if admirably plummy and rich, but by the time ten minutes had elapsed, it was showing off elegant notes of crushed stone, pencil shavings and cassis, while remaining full-bodied, rich and concentrated. It's velvety and long on the finish, but something left me wanting a bit more. It's surely a great La Chapelle..."

name: HERMITAGE BLANC - CHAPOUTIER CHANTE ALOUETTE ORGANIC 2017
nameSanitized: hermitage blanc - chapoutier chante alouette organic 2017
sort: HERMITAGE BLANC - CHAPOUTIER CHANTE ALOUETTE ORGANIC 2017
tastingDescription: "Chante-Alouette is a beautiful example of a Hermitage wine.  Brilliant and green gold colour.  Complex and subtle, aromas of quince, walnut, honey, ginger, acacia with a hint of linden-tree.  Rank attack, without aggressiveness, final of almond, very el

name: HERMITAGE BLANC - DOMAINE J L CHAVE
nameSanitized: hermitage blanc - domaine j l chave
sort: HERMITAGE BLANC - DOMAINE J L CHAVE
tastingDescription: 95 Points, Wine Spectator: “Lush yet precise, with green tea, honeysuckle and quinine notes rippling through the core of green plum, pear and Jonagold apple fruit. The finish has mouthwatering minerality and subtle persistence. Seamless and long. Best from 2012 through 2022.” (November 2011)

name: HERON BAY - CABERNET SAUVIGNON
tastingDescription: Inspired by the majestic heron, this bold and vibrant wine adds a hint of grandeur to every occasion. With notes of berries and plum, it pairs well with red meats, cheeses - and moments of waterside relaxation.

name: HERON BAY - CABERNET SAUVIGNON
tastingDescription: Inspired by the majestic heron, this bold and vibrant wine adds a hint of grandeur to every occasion. With notes of berries and plum, it pairs well with red meats, cheeses - and moments of waterside relaxation.

name: HESTER CREEK - CABERNET FRANC RES BLK 3 GOLDEN MILE BENCH 18
nameSanitized: hester creek - cabernet franc res blk 3 golden mile bench 18
nameSuffix: CABERNET FRANC RES BLK 3 GOLDEN MILE BENCH 18
sort: HESTER CREEK - CABERNET FRANC RES BLK 3 GOLDEN MILE BENCH 18
tastingDescription: Block 3 was originally planted in 1968 so old vines and the Cabernet Franc varietal combine here as a savoury, black fruited red that drinks now or can age. An exceptional vintage, here we have ripeness, elegance and good structure. Try with grilled fare, vegetarian dishes or roasted meats.

name: HESTER CREEK - CHARACTER RED  2020
tastingDescription: Hester Creek plantings from 1968 were not always identified as to what varietal. The unknown grapes provide some of the 'character' in this blended red. Black fruit flavours, licorice and earthy Golden Mile essence makeup the taste profile. A great match with wintry fare like casseroles, crockpot dishes or pasta.

name: HESTER CREEK - CHARACTER WHITE 2020
tastingDescription: The character here comes from putting together 6 grape varietals from the estate vineyards on the Golden Mile. Yes there is gold in those grapes as the taste is fruity with citrus and tree fruit flavours to enjoy. Fall menus ideas: risotto or planked salmon.

name: HESTER CREEK - PINOT GRIS 2020
tastingDescription: A crisp palate of golden apple, ripe pear and nectarine give way to a juicy, mineral finish in this BC Pinot Gris

name: HESTER CREEK - SELECTED BARRELS CABERNET MERLOT 2019
nameSanitized: hester creek - selected barrels cabernet merlot 2019
sort: HESTER CREEK - SELECTED BARRELS CABERNET MERLOT 2019
tastingDescription: This blend is an easygoing favourite, with structure provided by the Cabernets and ripe, dark fruit flavours added by Merlot. Slightly herbaceous aromas of currant, cinnamon, clove and tobacco lead to a medium-bodied raspberry palate. Pair it perfectly with grilled pork tenderloin, smoked ribs or medium-strong cheeses.

name: HESTER CREEK - SELECTED BARRELS MERLOT 2019
tastingDescription: The winery name comes from a neighbouring creek called Hester that was named for an early pioneers' daughter. Exhibiting a ripe fruit laden palate, this easy going red comes from the exceptional 2019 vintage. Match to grilled meats, vegetarian fare or pasta.

name: HESTER CREEK - THE JUDGE 2018
tastingDescription: False

name: HESTER CREEK - THE JUDGE GOLDEN MILE BENCH 2018
nameSanitized: hester creek - the judge golden mile bench 2018
sort: HESTER CREEK - THE JUDGE GOLDEN MILE BENCH 2018
tastingDescription: The Hester Creek property dates back to vines planted in 1968 at this Golden Mile location. A blend of Merlot, Cabernet Sauvignon and Cabernet Franc, The Judge delivers black cherry, blackberry, leather, cocoa, toasty oak, anise, roasted bell pepper and dried sage notes with velvety tannins and a lengthy finish.

name: HIDALGO - MANZANILLA LA GITANA
tastingDescription: 91 Points & Top 100: 2013, Rank: 32, Wine Spectator - "Bright, with saline, sunchoke and blanched almond notes backed by a piercing, chalk-framed finish. This is all precision and cut. Drink now." (October 2013)

name: HIJOS DE RAINERA PEREZ MARIN - MANZANILLA LA GUITA
nameSanitized: hijos de rainera perez marin - manzanilla la guita
sort: HIJOS DE RAINERA PEREZ MARIN - MANZANILLA LA GUITA
tastingDescription: Green olives, chamomile and a yeastiness of flor. Some flowers and fruits in the background, bringing some feminine touches to this wine. Medium body, very dry and slightly tangy with hints of chalk and salt as subtle nutty flavours. Medium long finish, still full and nicely balanced.

name: HILLSIDE - GEWURZTRAMINER 2018
tastingDescription: A Naramata Bench fixture for many years, this Hillside Gew is mouth coating with varietal flavours and that BC freshness. A great sipper or try with Pacific rim cuisine.

name: HOCHTALER
tastingDescription: Fruity and floral on the nose, with fresh peach and melon aroma. Sweetness is balanced with a tart apple finish.

name: HOCHTALER
tastingDescription: Fruity and floral on the nose, with fresh peach and melon aroma. Sweetness is balanced with a tart apple finish.

name: HOCHTALER DRY
tastingDescription: Light to medium-bodied with a rich aroma of peach and kiwi; easy drinking with a lovely, balanced taste.

name: HONEST LOT - CABERNET SAUVIGNON
tastingDescription: A bright garnet in colour with a bouquet of black currant, blueberry, and dark plum fruit, accented by a touch of violet and tobacco leaf. A dry, medium-bodied red wine with flavours of black fruits mingling with sweet spice. Red and black fruit, spice, and a touch of oak and earth linger on the finish.

name: HONEST LOT - SAUVIGNON BLANC
tastingDescription: False

name: HUNGARIA - GRANDE CUVEE BRUT
tastingDescription: Bubbly, fresh, floral and fruity, coupled with toasty brioche notes wrapped in a mousse like effervescent texture. The fine bubbles explode off the palate when paired with fried tapas, salmon tartar, sushi, grilled and baked seafood.

name: IL NERO SICILIA NERO D'AVOLA - B.IO ORGANIC
nameSanitized: il nero sicilia nero davola - b.io organic
sort: IL NERO SICILIA NERO D'AVOLA - B.IO ORGANIC
tastingDescription: Deep crimson color with ruby hue. Ripe profile of ripe plum & cherry with a hint of christmas fruitcake. Full- bodied, silky texture with fine tannins that melt  with the soft acidity.

name: IMAYO TSUKASA SAKE - KOI
tastingDescription: The�KOI��bottle design has won several awards in Japan and internationally. The design is based on the Nishiki-Koi, which is a classic symbol of Japan and known as a living jewel. This Sake�was awarded the Silver Medal at the International�Wine Challenge(IWC). Its wonderful fruity flavour of Junmai Daiginjo.

name: IMBZZL - DOUBLE CROSS PINOT GRIS
tastingDescription: This shrewdly medium bodied wine offers excellent balanced acidity with just a splash of sweetness on the finish. Aged in 100% stainless steel to preserve ripe stone fruit and zesty lemon flavours, it's the perfect choice to enjoy with friends.

name: IMBZZL - FAST ONE RED BLEND
tastingDescription: A blend of Merlot, Cabernet Sauvignon and Cabernet Franc from South Okanagan's most prized vineyards. Aged 12 months in both French and American Oak with a short spell in stainless to showcase ripe cherry and plum characteristics. Surprisingly full bodied yet offering softer tannins and a smooth approachable finish.

name: IMBZZL - RUSE ROSE
tastingDescription: Syrah, Merlot and Cabernet Franc grapes go into the tank and a juice stabulation technique from Gascony (and now much in vogue in Provence) leaves the juice on lees for 17 days prior to cool fermentation. Red berry and citrus hints and a good 'ruse' colour makes this an attractive glass of rosé. Perfect with family style meals, al fresco settings or pre-dinner sipping.

name: INDIGENOUS WORLD WINERY - HEE-HEE-TEL-KIN RED BLEND 2018
nameSanitized: indigenous world winery - hee-hee-tel-kin red blend 2018
sort: INDIGENOUS WORLD WINERY - HEE-HEE-TEL-KIN RED BLEND 2018
tastingDescription: Deep purple in color, the wine is full bodied with notes of blackberry, blueberry and plum ending with soft tannins and notes of fennel and spice.

name: INNISKILLIN NIAGARA - VIDAL ICEWINE 2017
tastingDescription: Generous aromatics of ripe peach, juicy mango and lively citrus fruits are balanced beautifully by an outstanding acidity. This icewine is rich in mouthfeel and has a long fruit-filled finish.

name: INNISKILLIN OKANAGAN - CABERNET SAUVIGNON 2019
tastingDescription: Cabernet Sauvignon is hot these days and this red is leading the trend. Look for currant and cassis note alongside ripe fruit and rounded tannins. Will go with roasts of meat, slow cooker recipes, pasta or vegetarian dishes.

name: INNISKILLIN OKANAGAN - MERLOT 2018
tastingDescription: The Okanagan Estate Series Merlot is deep red in colour with a complex bouquet, harbouring luscious scents of black cherry and raspberry. This Merlot is a well-balanced wine layered with toasty oak and vanilla and supported by firm tannins and a long finish.

name: INNISKILLIN OKANAGAN - PINOT GRIGIO 2019
tastingDescription: Okanagan white with passion fruit and pineapple flavours and notes of lemon zest. It's medium-bodied and mouth-watering.

name: INNISKILLIN OKANAGAN - PINOT NOIR 2019
tastingDescription: Known as the heartbreak grape, Pinot Noir is tough to grow and tough to produce. But the end result when done well is a silky medium-bodied red with cherry and raspberry flavours that magically linger. Match to tuna steaks, roast poultry or everyday casseroles.

name: INNISKILLIN OKANAGAN - RIESLING ICEWINE 2018
tastingDescription: Golden yellow in colour, this icewine is intense with fruit aromas of apricot, peach and tropical fruits. Its rich palate is overflowing with sweet nectar flavours and is balanced with a crisp acidity.

name: INNISKILLIN OKANAGAN - SHIRAZ CABERNET SAUVIGNON 2020
tastingDescription: This is an excellent red blend for the money with the Shiraz and Cabernet structure and fruit combining with the Okanagan valley in an excellent warm vintage. Lots of berry fruit and flavor to enjoy. Smooth tannins add up to a crowd pleaser kind of wine.

name: INNISKILLIN OKANAGAN - VIDAL ICEWINE 2016
tastingDescription: Ripe sweet honey apricot aromas, concentrated peach and apricot flavours and a long finish characterize this vintage.

name: INTERSECTION MILEPOST RED
tastingDescription: Medium burgundy colour to a cherry-red rim, nice and clean. Nose shows bright Lapin cherry with notes of clove, cinnamon, and mixed red berry jam. Palate is dry and inviting with bright acidity and smooth, integrated tannin. Finishes with warm baking spices and lots of fresh red fruit. A great value bottle which will match well to buttermilk fried chicken, paneer masala, stuffed roasted red peppers or any grilling fare.

name: INVISIBULL - MALBEC
tastingDescription: Invisibull is a new brand of contemporary varietals and flavours. The Malbec offers blackberry and plums with a nuance of chocolate. Pair it with your favourite lean red meats, funky cheeses and earthy mushrooms. Another good value Exclusive from BC Liquor Stores.

name: INVISIBULL - SAUVIGNON BLANC
tastingDescription: Invisibull is a new brand of contemporary varietals and flavours. The Sauvignon Blanc showcases lime, green apple and white peach with a herbaceous finish. Pair it with a herby leafy salad and soft briny cheeses. Another good value Exclusive from BC Liquor Stores.

name: ISOLA DEI NURAGHI - PUNICA MONTESSU 2014
tastingDescription: 91 Points, James Suckling: “Aromas of blueberries, flowers and stones. Medium to full body, firm and silky tannins and a flavorful and refined finish. Always outstanding. Drink now.” (November 2016)

name: ISTRIAN MALVASIA - CORONICA
tastingDescription: This fresh Malvazia wine from the Istrian peninsula of Croatia opens with balanced minerals and moves on to hints of almond before finishing with ripe peaches and apricots. Flavours are ripe, full, delicious, complex and harmonious.

name: J M LABRUYERE - PROLOGUE GRAND CRU BRUT
nameSanitized: j m labruyere - prologue grand cru brut
sort: J M LABRUYERE - PROLOGUE GRAND CRU BRUT
tastingDescription: 92 Points, James Suckling: "A pinot-dominant blend (70 per cent) that has a flavorsome array of berries and brioche on the nose with light, spicy nuances, too. The palate has attractive, vinous, fleshy presence, some chalky oyster-shell notes and a crisp, dry, succulent finish. Drink now." (September 2018)

name: JACKSON TRIGGS - PROPRIETOR'S SELECTION CABERNET SAUVIGNON L
nameSanitized: jackson triggs - proprietors selection cabernet sauvignon l
sort: JACKSON TRIGGS - PROPRIETOR'S SELECTION CABERNET SAUVIGNON L
tastingDescription: Rich, bold aromas of black current and hints of vanilla and spice.� Serve with roast beef, pasta with sun-dried tomatoes and basil.� This wine is 8% alcohol and 79 calories.

name: JACKSON TRIGGS - PROPRIETOR'S SELECTION SMOOTH RED
nameSanitized: jackson triggs - proprietors selection smooth red
sort: JACKSON TRIGGS - PROPRIETOR'S SELECTION SMOOTH RED
tastingDescription: Forward jammy notes of  plum, blackberry and cassis with a touch of  smoke and spice. Enjoy with grilled steak or a bacon cheeseburger.

name: JACKSON TRIGGS - RESERVE CABERNET SAUVIGNON
tastingDescription: Hints of Okanagan regionality and herbs are upfront and the coiled fruit core keeps coming at you. Black fruit flavours and a savoury quality reach into the end for a long finish. A good wine to go with lamb chops.

name: JACKSON TRIGGS - RESERVE CABERNET SAUVIGNON SHIRAZ 2017
nameSanitized: jackson triggs - reserve cabernet sauvignon shiraz 2017
sort: JACKSON TRIGGS - RESERVE CABERNET SAUVIGNON SHIRAZ 2017
tastingDescription: “Look for some of that black currant and cassis hints courtesy of the Cabernets plus some blackberry and black pepper from the Shiraz. It all adds up to a tasty berry sandwich that really lingers. Will work wonders with grilled sausages, casseroules or slow cookers. This is a good wine to have onhand for everyday fare, take-out nights or drop-in weekends.” - Stephen Schiedel, Category Manager for Wines of Canada, USA & South America

name: JACKSON TRIGGS - RESERVE CHARDONNAY 2018
tastingDescription: This Chardonnay displays lovely aromas of green apple, spice, and vanilla, highlighted by nuances of butter cream. Beautifully structured with a buttery textured, flavourful finish. Elegant with broiled lobster.

name: JACKSON TRIGGS - RESERVE MERLOT
tastingDescription: This wine has characteristics of black fruits and subtle oak. The soft tannins make this wine very balanced with hints of sage. Great with grilled fare or vegetarian dishes.

name: JACKSON TRIGGS - RESERVE METHOD CLASSIQUE
tastingDescription: Fresh and zippy with aromas of citrus, elderflower, peach and apple. Delicate flavours of citrus and green apple shine through

name: JACKSON TRIGGS - RESERVE PINOT GRIGIO 2018
tastingDescription: A light-bodied white with crisp green apple, stone fruit and honeydew melon on the palate. This wine is delightfully refreshing and easy to drink

name: JACKSON TRIGGS - RESERVE RIESLING GEWURZTRAMINER 2018
tastingDescription: Fresh and lively with bold aromas of ginger, apple, honey, and peach with a refreshing blast of apple and orange zest on the palate. Medium high acidity with a medium finish.

name: JACKSON TRIGGS - RESERVE RIESLING ICEWINE 2017
tastingDescription: A golden yellow colour, this dessert wine shows notes of baked apple, vanilla cream, mineral and pear. On the palate, it offers a buttery, rich mouth feel that leads into a long finish featuring lively acidity.

name: JACKSON TRIGGS - RESERVE SAUVIGNON BLANC 2018
tastingDescription: This fresh white has a fruit-driven bouquet with citrus and herbaceous notes. A palate of grapefruit and citrus fruit is well-balanced and crisp with a nice, tingling acidity.

name: JACKSON TRIGGS - RESERVE SHIRAZ 2017
tastingDescription: JT has a good reputation for their Shiraz and this is no exception. Dark and dreamy, this Shiraz likes dinner by candlelight. In addition to steaks or lamb chops, try it with tenderloin, lamb or other grilled meats.

name: JACOB'S CREEK - SPARKLING CHARDONNAY PINOT NOIR
nameSanitized: jacobs creek - sparkling chardonnay pinot noir
sort: JACOB'S CREEK - SPARKLING CHARDONNAY PINOT NOIR
tastingDescription: This sparkling wine is refreshingly light with enticing, fruity aromas and a generous, nutty, creamy palate. It pairs well with fish and salad dishes.

name: JAUME SERRA - CAVA CASTELFINO BRUT
tastingDescription: 91 Points, Decanter World Wine Awards 2021

name: JINRO - MAKGULI RICEWINE
tastingDescription: A rice wine made from 100% Korean rice and pure spring water, Jinro Makguli does not contain any preservatives or artificial flavours. Traditional Makguli making artistry renders it one of the best tasting rice wines in the world.  The patented HTST (High Temperature / Short Time) technology gives it a longer shelf life compared to other rice wines.

name: JOIE - A NOBLE BLEND 2020
tastingDescription: This aromatic wine exhibits an intense nose of guava, nutmeg and clove. This spiciness continues on to the palate and opens up with unctuous flavours of lychee, corriander and guava carrying through to a fresh grapefruit finish. Overall, the flavours and texture of this wine are focused and intense.

name: JOIEFARM - RE THINK PINK 2020
tastingDescription: Its bright hue anticipates the aromas of strawberry, raspberry and dried sage. On the palate, the structure is medium-bodied, slightly off-dry with mouth-watering acidity and touch of tannin. The intense nose carries through to the palate of blood oranges, strawberries and cream. The finish is long, tart and dry.

name: JP CHENET - ADVENT CALENDAR 2021
tastingDescription: 24 days of celebration! The grown-up way to celebrate the countdown to the holidays. Get in the holiday spirit by indulging in this year's limited edition advent calendar, including 24 different wines and/or bubbles.

name: JP CHENET ICE EDITION
tastingDescription: Creamy and smooth on the attack, with a fine, supple yet rich texture. It becomes pleasantly fruity with notes of grilled almonds. Sweetness emerges on the finish to underline the wine's delicate fruitiness. Recommendations: Enjoy it as a light and refreshing dessert wine that will complement pastries or tarts.

name: JULIENAS - PASCAL AUFRANC LES CERISIERS 2018
tastingDescription: 91 Points, Wine Enthusiast - ''Planted in an area where cherry trees once grew, this fruity wine also has firm core of tannins. Its acidity and structure show aging potential, giving a texture that will soften. Drink from late 2020.'' (April 2020)

name: JUMILLA - CASTILLO DE MADAX RED BLEND
nameSanitized: jumilla - castillo de madax red blend
sort: JUMILLA - CASTILLO DE MADAX RED BLEND
tastingDescription: Delicious aromas of dark fruit and a fresh bouquet of ripe red fruit jump out of the glass. An excellent structured wine that is fun, fresh and lively and simply over delivers with every sip.

name: JUMILLA - EL PETIT BONHOMME TINTO
tastingDescription: An approachable and easy drinking red blend with an abundance of fruit character. Bright flavours of plums, dark berries, and a hint of spice characterize this versatile wine. Silver Medal, Intervin International Wine Awards 2016

name: JUMILLA MONASTRELL - GIL FAMILY ZAGALIN
tastingDescription: It is a full-throttle, exuberant, dense ruby/purple- coloured effort with loads of creme de cassis, liquorice and acacia flower characteristics. This exotic, deep, broad, intense red should be enjoyed over the next 3-4 years.

name: JUMILLA MONASTRELL - LAS HERMANAS ORGANIC
tastingDescription: 90 Points, James Suckling - "This has attractive, light red-berry aromas with a rich, red-plum palate, delivered on ripe, glossy tannins. From organically grown grapes. Vegan."

name: JUNMAI SAKE - ZUIYO
tastingDescription: This sake is a dry, full-bodied Junmai Sake. Mild and mellow at first, then the dry charactoer emerges with a nice acidity level.

name: KAMPTAL GRUNER VELTLINER - BRUNDLMAYER
tastingDescription: 90 Points, Anne Krebiehl MW: "Yeast and a subtle note of sage are timid on the nose.  The light palate then adds green-pear freshness, while an edge of white pepper completes this picture of subtlety and freshness.  This is brisk and crisp with a real refreshment factor."

name: KEEP CALM - AND LAUGH SAUVIGNON BLANC
nameSanitized: keep calm - and laugh sauvignon blanc
sort: KEEP CALM - AND LAUGH SAUVIGNON BLANC
tastingDescription: Citrus notes, passion fruit, lively, fresh and intense. Perfect as an aperitif, with fish, sushi or afternoon sipping!

name: KEEP CALM AND THRIVE - CABERNET SAUVIGNON
nameSanitized: keep calm and thrive - cabernet sauvignon
sort: KEEP CALM AND THRIVE - CABERNET SAUVIGNON
tastingDescription: Hints of Blackberries, black cherries and spices. Fruity and lush with a deep, spicy finish. Excellent with steak, braised beef and BBQs.

name: KINDZMARAULI - TETRI
tastingDescription: All Kindzmarauli producers use the same winemaking technology based on the ancient method of slow fermentation at a low temperature, when not all sugar of grape juice is converted to alcohol; so, the residual sugar content in wine is pretty high (35 -45 g/liter). That makes Kindzmarauli very unique and versatile wine and a nice pairing not only for desserts, fresh and dry fruit or nuts, but also for a great variety of spicy Georgian, Asian or Mediterranean dishes of seasoned or previously marinated meat or seafood. Enjoy the new taste of grilled beef, lamb, poultry or salmon in savory combination with mild freshness of Kindzmarauli.

class: Other Country Fruit and Dessert Wine
name: KOOKSOONDANG - SSAL MAKKOLI
tastingDescription: False

name: KREMSTAL RIESLING - RAINER WESS
tastingDescription: The grapes are hand harvested and are given a short maceration before pressing. They are aged in tank on their lees, and bottled and released in March, the wine has ample "cool fruit in their bouquets and expressive citrus and stone fruits on the palate.

name: KRUG - GRAND CUVEE
tastingDescription: 95 Points, Wine Advocate - "The Grande Cuvee (disgorged 1998) is scented of croissant, buttered cinnamon toast and warm strawberries with a hint of smoky bacon. Muscular and still very taut in the mouth, the densely packed flavors are refreshed with a pure, crisp acid line. It finishes long with plenty of toast and nut layers." (May 2012)

name: KRUG - VINTAGE 2006
tastingDescription: Very expressive and indulgent nose revealing yellow and dried fruit, toasted almonds, hazelnut, and maple syrup. On the palate it is deep and fresh with aromatic persistence and a long finish. It has notes of nougat, pastry, plenty of citrus with a beautiful finish on pink grapefruit skin.

name: KUBOTA JUNMAI DAIGINJO MANJYU
tastingDescription: False

name: KVALITETNA GRASEVINA - KUTJEVO 2019
tastingDescription: This fresh and simple white wine has crisp acidity and medium alcohol levels and is from the Slavonia region of Croatia. It is dominated by delicious aromas of ripe fruit, sweet and juicy apples and pears, with quince on the nose.

name: KWV - CAPE PALE DRY CLASSIC COLLECTION
nameSanitized: kwv - cape pale dry classic collection
sort: KWV - CAPE PALE DRY CLASSIC COLLECTION
tastingDescription: This wine has traditional, delicate yeast flavours with hints of nuttiness, apricot, honey and butterscotch and a refreshing dry finish.

name: KWV - CAPE RUBY CLASSIC COLLECTION
tastingDescription: Beautiful dark berry flavours are complemented by caramel, butterscotch and nuttiness. The wine is well-balanced, fresh and fruitful with a lingering finish.

name: KWV - CAPE TAWNY CLASSIC COLLECTION
tastingDescription: Extended wood maturation resulted in a beautiful amber colour with orange zest, dried fruit, caramel and nuttiness on the nose. This full  flavoured wine explodes with fruit, marzipan and toffee on the palate, with a well-balanced sweet finish.

name: L'ESPRIT DE CHEVALIER BLANC 2016
tastingDescription:
“The intense, grassy and pithy-lemon aromas, as well as a swathe of fresh herbs, all make for an attractive young wine. The palate has mouthwateringly fresh, lemony acidity and delivers a very energetic, flavorful impression. Second wine of Domaine de Chevalier Blanc. A blend of 60 per cent sauvignon and 40 per cent semillon. Drink or hold.”
93 Points, James Suckling

name: L'ESPRIT DE CHEVALIER ROUGE 2016
tastingDescription:
“Wonderful, fragrant blackberry and cherry nose with a delicate touch of oak. Concentrated and elegant with a beautiful balance of finely etched dry tannins and very bright acidity. Long, crisp and minerally finish with a ton of energy. Second wine of Domaine de Chevalier. A blend of 45 per cent cabernet sauvignon, 45 per cent merlot and ten per cent petit verdot. Try in 2021.”
94 Points, James Suckling

name: LA CHAPELLE DE LA MISSION HAUT BRION ROUGE 2016
nameSanitized: la chapelle de la mission haut brion rouge 2016
nameSuffix: LA CHAPELLE DE LA MISSION HAUT BRION ROUGE 2016
sort: LA CHAPELLE DE LA MISSION HAUT BRION ROUGE 2016
tastingDescription:
“The 2016 La Chapelle de la Mission Haut-Brion is blended of 42% Cabernet Sauvignon, 36.5% Merlot and 21.5% Cabernet Franc. Medium to deep garnet-purple colored, it absolutely sings of red roses, black tea and tilled black soil with a core of crushed blackberries, Morello cherries and cassis plus a hint of cinnamon stick. Medium-bodied, the palate delivers a great intensity of ripe black berries and floral layers, framed by soft, silken tannins and seamless freshness, finishing long and mineral laced. Drink: 2019 - 2035.”
94 Points, Wine Advocate

name: LA CHETEAU - CREMANT DE LOIRE BRUT BIO
nameSanitized: la cheteau - cremant de loire brut bio
sort: LA CHETEAU - CREMANT DE LOIRE BRUT BIO
tastingDescription: False

nameSanitized: la clarte de haut brion blanc 2015
nameSuffix: LA CLARTE DE HAUT BRION BLANC 2015
sort: LA CLARTE DE HAUT BRION BLANC 2015
tastingDescription: 94 Points, James Suckling: “Lots of minerals and stones here. Full-bodied with phenolic tension and lime, lemon and chalk flavors. Layered and joyous. Just the right lees stirring. Why wait? Drink now.” (February 2018)

name: LA CLARTE DE HAUT BRION BLANC 2016
nameSanitized: la clarte de haut brion blanc 2016
nameSuffix: LA CLARTE DE HAUT BRION BLANC 2016
sort: LA CLARTE DE HAUT BRION BLANC 2016
tastingDescription:
“Very juicy and youthfully compact still, with a bracing hint to the white peach, lemon pith and star fruit flavors that lead the way. But behind them are notes of acacia, straw and shortbread that should emerge more with modest cellaring, leading to a slightly fuller feel overall. Your choice... Drink now through 2028.”
92 Points, Wine Spectator

name: LA CUADRILLA RED - STOLPMAN VINEYARDS BALLARD CANYON 2019
nameSanitized: la cuadrilla red - stolpman vineyards ballard canyon 2019
sort: LA CUADRILLA RED - STOLPMAN VINEYARDS BALLARD CANYON 2019
tastingDescription:
Available on May 29.
"An exciting red blend that like other wineries in the appellation, utilizes some Sangiovese in the mix. "The 2019 La Cuadrilla is a blend of 70% Syrah, 15% Grenache and 15% Sangiovese. Medium ruby-purple, it opens with perfumed red and blue berry fruits with nuances of licorice and flowers. The medium to full-bodied palate bursts with juicy fruits in a grainy frame, and it finishes long with floral nuances." Rated 92 points, Wine Advocate"

name: LA GRANGE TIPHAINE - MONTLOUIS SUR LOIRE PET NAT
nameSanitized: la grange tiphaine - montlouis sur loire pet nat
sort: LA GRANGE TIPHAINE - MONTLOUIS SUR LOIRE PET NAT
tastingDescription: Biodynamic. This natural sparkling wine displays an explosive nose of quince paste, marzipan, seringa, lemon-verbena, a mix of Chenin and autolytic notes. The palate is first broad and dense to become sleeker and saltier to finish with smoke and iodine. The bubbles are remarkably creamy and lingering. This wine could be cellared a year or so without problem. To be enjoyed not too cold with roasted poultry, grilled fish and soft-press cheeses.

name: LA JARA - PROSECCO BRUT ORGANIC VEGAN
nameSanitized: la jara - prosecco brut organic vegan
sort: LA JARA - PROSECCO BRUT ORGANIC VEGAN
tastingDescription: 92 Points, Falstaff Magazine: “Vibrant, light hue with fine bubbles. Pleasant nose showing appealing spring-like notes backed by Canary melon and pear. Light palate displaying delicious soft, plump weight. Harmonious effervescence for a good quality dry sparkling wine.” (January 2019) Certified organic and vegan.

name: LA MANCHA GARNACHA - DOMINIO DE PUNCTUM GALERNA
nameSanitized: la mancha garnacha - dominio de punctum galerna
sort: LA MANCHA GARNACHA - DOMINIO DE PUNCTUM GALERNA
tastingDescription: An intense cherry red colour and a violet shaded rim at first sight. The bouquest has notes of red berries. Sweet tannins and long finish on the palate.

name: LA MANCHA VERDEJO - DOMINIO DE PUNCTUM GALERNA
nameSanitized: la mancha verdejo - dominio de punctum galerna
sort: LA MANCHA VERDEJO - DOMINIO DE PUNCTUM GALERNA
tastingDescription: Bright golden color with lime reflections. Fruity citrus aromas with notes of tropical flowers that carry over to the palate. Well balanced, good acidity, and long finish. This wine pairs nicely with fresh salads, all fish and poultry dishes.

name: LA MARCA - CONEGLIANO VALDOBBIADENE PROSECCO SUP LUMINORE
nameSanitized: la marca - conegliano valdobbiadene prosecco sup luminore
sort: LA MARCA - CONEGLIANO VALDOBBIADENE PROSECCO SUP LUMINORE
tastingDescription: Crafted to celebrate LaMarca’s 50th anniversary, this upscale Prosecco Superiore is sure to please with flavours of white flowers, stone fruit, pear and a soft, creamy texture.

name: LA SCALA SPUMANTE
tastingDescription: Fresh aromas of juicy grapes and melons and flavours of white grapes and tropical fruits. An Italian style medium-sweet sparkling wine. Enjoy on its own as a sipping wine or as a summer wine cooler.

name: LA SCALA SPUMANTE
tastingDescription: Fresh aromas of juicy grapes and melons and flavours of white grapes and tropical fruits. An Italian style medium-sweet sparkling wine. Enjoy on its own as a sipping wine or as a summer wine cooler.

name: LACRIMA DI MORRO D'ALBA - UMANI RONCHI FONTE DEL RE 2018
nameSanitized: lacrima di morro dalba - umani ronchi fonte del re 2018
sort: LACRIMA DI MORRO D'ALBA - UMANI RONCHI FONTE DEL RE 2018
tastingDescription: Lacrima, so called from the characteristic tear‐drop which weeps from the cluster when the grapes are fully ripe, is a vine that has been known since ancient times. It has been saved from extinction, and is currently cultivated in a tiny production area around Morro d’Alba. The wine has aromas of roses, violets and brushwood and a soft, fairly rounded palate with good body and persistence.

name: LAKE BREEZE - PINOT BLANC 2018
tastingDescription: Known as Weissburgunder in Germany, Klevner in Austria and Pinot Bianco in Italy, the grape has been around in BC for a while and is a special treat. Especially from Lake Breeze who are long time Naramata pioneers.  Made from Naramata fruit so you can experience the citrus, tree fruits and fresh palate that is wonderful to taste.

name: LAMARCA - PROSECCO
tastingDescription: Pale, and golden straw in color, with bubbles that are full texture and persistent. LaMarca brings fresh citrus with hints of honey and floral notes. Flavors are fresh and clean, with ripe citrus, lemon, green apple, and touches of grapefruit, minerality, and some toast.

name: LAMARCA - PROSECCO
tastingDescription: Scents of dried grasses and sweet apples carry through this Prosecco. It lasts on nutty flavors, pleasantly balanced. Try this stone fruit and herbal-scented Prosecco with pesto pasta.

name: LAMARCA - ROSE PROSECCO 2020
tastingDescription: False

name: LAMBRUSCO DI SORBARA - SOLIERA
tastingDescription: False

nameSanitized: lambrusco di sorbara frizzante - piria paltrinieri
sort: LAMBRUSCO DI SORBARA FRIZZANTE - PIRIA PALTRINIERI
tastingDescription: 90 Points, Vinous  - "Salmon pink. Fresh strawberry and sweet spices on the nose. Bright and clean with similar flavors and a zingy long finish." (January 2018)

name: LAMBRUSCO METODO ANCESTRALE - MEDICI ERMETE PHERMENTO
nameSanitized: lambrusco metodo ancestrale - medici ermete phermento
sort: LAMBRUSCO METODO ANCESTRALE - MEDICI ERMETE PHERMENTO
