tastingDescription: False

name: PUGLIA  NEGROAMARO - MEZZOMONDO
tastingDescription: An intriguing wine featuring meaty, peppery, spicy, aromas and black cherry hints. It has a smooth texture with ripe plum, violets and woody flavours leading to a long finish. Try with four cheese ravioli.

name: PUGLIA MERLOT PRIMITIVO - TREVINI PRIMO
tastingDescription: This blend of Merlot and Primitivo has intense blackberry and vanilla flavours. The palate is full-bodied, displaying elegant tannins and a long, tasty finish.

name: PUGLIA NEGROAMARO - LUCCARELLI
tastingDescription: Plush aromas of sweet dark cherries, plum cake, rich mocha chocolate, baking spices and a pinch of pepper. Concentrated dark fruit rolls into pipe tobacco, chocolate, cedar and spice that lingers. Try with braised beef ribs.

name: PUGLIA NEGROAMARO ROSADO - CRUDO ORGANIC
tastingDescription: Passion fruit and guava aromas with herbal nuances on the nose. A fresh, zesty wine with a complex palate of ripe, tropical fruits. A crisp, refreshing finish.

name: PUGLIA NERO DI TROIA - TORRE VENTO TORRE DEL FALCO
nameSanitized: puglia nero di troia - torre vento torre del falco
sort: PUGLIA NERO DI TROIA - TORRE VENTO TORRE DEL FALCO
tastingDescription: Intense, full and fragrant bouquet, with notes of raspberries and blueberries. The taste is full-bodied, robust and with sweet tannic notes. Pair with red meat, roast, game, ripe cheeses or salami.

name: PUGLIA PRIMITIVO - FARNESE FANTINI
tastingDescription: The Fantini Primitivo Puglia is a 100% Primitivo with a ruby red color and violet hues. The bouquet is intense fruity. Aromas of small red berries and a fine spice characterize the wine. On the palate, this Primitivo is remarkably balanced and supple tannins are well integrated.

name: PUGLIA PRIMITIVO - IL LEALE
tastingDescription: False

name: PUGLIA PRIMITIVO - LUCCARELLI
tastingDescription: This Zinfandel sibling from Italy is big and fruity with rich flavours of plum, cherry, vanilla and some boysenberry jam. Very easy drinking for such an occasion.

name: PUGLIA SANGIOVESE - FARNESE FANTINI
tastingDescription: Ruby red color. Intense and persistent fragrance, fruity with cherries, prunes and vanilla scent. Medium bodied wine, well balanced and soft, ready to drink.

name: PULIGNY MONTRATCHET - JADOT REFERTS
tastingDescription: False

name: QUADY - ESSENSIA ORANGE MUSCAT 2016
tastingDescription: Made from Orange Muscat grapes, this delicious dessert wine has an aroma reminiscent of orange blossom and apricots. The vibrant flavour and lingering, refreshing aftertaste make it an excellent accompaniment to desserts featuring chocolate and fruit.

name: QUAILS GATE - CHARDONNAY 2019
tastingDescription: This cooler climate Chardonnay expresses racy citrus, light stone fruit with only hints of creamy oak and fresh churned butter around the palate. A perfect pairing with fish pie

name: QUAILS GATE - CHARDONNAY STEWART FAMILY RESERVE
nameSanitized: quails gate - chardonnay stewart family reserve
sort: QUAILS GATE - CHARDONNAY STEWART FAMILY RESERVE
tastingDescription: Orange blossom, tangerine zest, dried sage and shortbread nuances frame the core of peach, apple, pear and melon notes. Medium-bodied, loaded with tropical and stone fruit flavours, it has a beautifully creamy texture, refreshing acidity and a long, mineral-driven finish. Pair with fresh BC halibut, bacon-wrapped scallops or butter-poached lobster.

name: QUAILS GATE - CHASSELAS PINOT BLANC PINOT GRIS 2020
nameSanitized: quails gate - chasselas pinot blanc pinot gris 2020
sort: QUAILS GATE - CHASSELAS PINOT BLANC PINOT GRIS 2020
tastingDescription: There was once a Chasselas wine from Quails’ Gate but over the years and many winemakers, it has evolved to this unique blend. Grapey, sleek, offering apple and citrus hints and great acidity, it is mouth-watering and requires good company and food.

name: QUAILS GATE - FORTIFIED VINTAGE FOCH
tastingDescription: With a deep purple colour, this wine opens with a rich nuttiness along with notes of dark cherry, chocolate and espresso. On the palate it is soft and sweet with flavours of Christmas cake, mulling spice, orange zest and cranberries. Pair with chocolate truffles, sticky toffee pudding or a decadent cheese platter with lots of blue cheese and candied nuts.

name: QUAILS GATE - GEWURZTRAMINER 2020
tastingDescription: Anticipate soft notes of lychee and rose petal on the nose, layered with pear, grapefruit, white peach and a hint of savoury ginger. This leads you to a touch of sweetness on the palate, balanced with just the right amount of acidity and an off-dry finish.

name: QUAILS GATE - MERLOT 2019
tastingDescription: Aromas of juicy black cherry, ripe plum and toasty oak. The palate is intense and full bodied with structured tannins. Flavours of ripe red fruit, tobacco and leather mingle with characteristic black cherry and cocoa notes. This full-bodied wine will pair nicely with hearty, bold dishes such as braised short ribs, lasagna or grilled game meat.

name: QUAILS GATE - OPTIMA BOTRYTIS AFFECTED 2020
tastingDescription: A unique sweet dessert-style wine, full of honeyed fruit flavours. Intense aromas of spring blossoms, poached pears, quince and ripe apricot. The waxy palate is rich and complex with notes of honey and tropical fruit flavors that include guava and mango. The wine is beautifully balanced with vibrant citrus orange acidity and a long, lingering finish.

name: QUAILS GATE - PINOT NOIR 2019
tastingDescription: Classic Pinot Noir, with notes of cherry, raspberry and plum fruit with allspice, earth, dried herbs and savoury notes. The balance of fruit, acidity and light tannins make this a very versatile food wine. We suggest roasted chicken, grilled BC salmon and duck dishes. For vegetarians, beet, mushroom and French lentil dishes make great pairings.

name: QUAILS GATE - PINOT NOIR STEWART FAMILY RESERVE 2019
nameSanitized: quails gate - pinot noir stewart family reserve 2019
sort: QUAILS GATE - PINOT NOIR STEWART FAMILY RESERVE 2019
tastingDescription: Combining Old World charm and New World nuances, this complex Pinot Noir wafts from the glass with attractive aromas of red cherry, raspberry and redcurrant laced with undergrowth and spice. On the palate, the wine is medium-bodied with a supple attack, which segues into a more assertively tannic finish.

name: QUAILS GATE - RIESLING 2020
tastingDescription: Back for summer, this Riesling offers the drive train acidity that is the grape and also from sourcing fruit from estate East and West Kelowna vineyards. Crisp and super pure, the green apple and floral and tree fruit nuances are refreshing and flavourful. Classic pairings might be grilled pork chops, corn on the cob, white fish, take-out Thai food, potato salad. Not for nothing is Riesling called the food wine!

name: QUARTS DE CHAUME GRAND CRU - DOMAINE DES BAUMARD 2012
nameSanitized: quarts de chaume grand cru - domaine des baumard 2012
sort: QUARTS DE CHAUME GRAND CRU - DOMAINE DES BAUMARD 2012
tastingDescription: 91 Points, Wine Spectator: “Unctuous, with a forward core of creamed yellow apple, pear and mango notes, underscored by warm pie-crust and ginger accents. Maintains a plump, open feel through the flattering finish. Drink now through 2019.” (September 2015)

name: QUINTA DO NOVAL - VINTAGE NACIONAL 2017
tastingDescription: False

name: QUINTA DO VESUVIO - VINTAGE 2016
tastingDescription: 96 Points, Wine Advocate: "If this Quinta has a hallmark to me, it is the expressive, gorgeous fruit. It has a seductive feel, but it is also muscular and intense. It is one of the most muscular in the Symington stable this year... Drink: 2028 - 2075." (July 2018)

name: RAMOS PINTO - VINTAGE 2017
tastingDescription: False

name: RASTEAU - CAVE DE RASTEAU LA DOMELIERE 2019
nameSanitized: rasteau - cave de rasteau la domeliere 2019
sort: RASTEAU - CAVE DE RASTEAU LA DOMELIERE 2019
tastingDescription: This wine from one of the best villages of the Côtes du Rhône is made from 40-year-old vines. Grenache gives bright, fresh, dark red fruit, Syrah gives darker colour, black fruit and spice while Mourvèdre adds depth and length to the palate. Silky with lovely freshness, there is a hint of anise mixed in with the red and black fruit.

name: RASTEAU - PERRIN L'ANDEOL 2018
tastingDescription: This impressive wine shows exotic, heady aromas of dark berry, tobacco and spice. The beautifully textured and mouth-watering palate is packed with mocha and ripe black fruits. It will pair well with traditional hearty cuisine. Drink now or age for 6-7 years.

name: RAVEN - CONSPIRACY DEEP DARK RED 2020
tastingDescription: The Raven clicks into the ‘dark red blend’ trend that is going on with California reds. Sort of the darker the better, showing a bit more intensity and upfront drinkability. Which consumers seem to like. Lots of berry fruit here and can be a good sipper with the hockey game or with BBQ fare or casseroles or pulled pork sandwich.

name: RED BLEND - ANGOVES HOPE'S END
tastingDescription: False

name: RED BLEND - CONCHA Y TORO CASILLERO DEL DIABLO DEVILS COLL
nameSanitized: red blend - concha y toro casillero del diablo devils coll
nameSuffix: CONCHA Y TORO CASILLERO DEL DIABLO DEVILS COLL
sort: RED BLEND - CONCHA Y TORO CASILLERO DEL DIABLO DEVILS COLL
tastingDescription: This medium to full bodied wine has soft ripe red flavours with juicy raspberry, blackcurrant and plum fruits. A hint of liquorice spice with a fresh and lingering finish.

name: RED BLEND - J SHED
tastingDescription: Ripe, sweet fruited core of blackcurrants and vanilla spice finishing with soft velvety tannins. This wine has a nice acid balance and great length.

name: RED BLEND - PENNY LANE
tastingDescription: A soft, easy-drinking Californian red with a personality as bright and as pleasing as its label. Expect aromas and flavours of strawberry and raspberry with ripe plummy notes. The palate is soft and smooth with a lush berry fruit finish.

name: RED BLEND - SAMUEL WYNN
tastingDescription: The red blend has lifted aromas of red berries, supple tannins an hints of oak spice, which melds together in a generous, balanced wine. It is medium to full bodied and has lingering length to entice your senses for more. A blend of Cabernet Sauvignon and Syrah.

name: RED ROOSTER - BRUT ROSE
tastingDescription: A bouquet of crab apple, cranberry, rhubarb and a touch of yeast and bread gently escapes from the glass. This lively, exciting sparkling wine is light to medium-bodied with a lovely expanding mousse. Flavours of cranberry, pink grapefruit and a touch of yeast dance on the palate. Notes of rhubarb, tangy berries and yeast linger on the refreshingly dry finish.

name: RED ROOSTER - CABERNET MERLOT 2019
tastingDescription: Red Rooster was part of the first wave of Naramata wineries in the early 1990s. The classic blend in Bordeaux is also magic here in the Okanagan where the plushness of Merlot merges with the structure of Cabernet Franc and Sauvignon. Red and black fruits combine with oak complexities to make this a stylish red of considerable appeal.

name: RED ROOSTER - MERLOT 2018
tastingDescription: Aromas of black cherry, black pepper spice, smoke and tobacco leaf. This is a medium-bodied Merlot with silky tannins and balancing acidity. Flavours of cherry, red berry and spice fill the mouth, followed by lingering notes of blackberry, currants and toast.

name: RED ROOSTER - PINOT GRIS 2020
tastingDescription: Clear and bright. Pure, clean fruit aromas of melon, pear, red apple and a touch of citrus.  This Rooster shows a smooth, slightly rich profile with melon, pear and peach flavours on the palate.  Notes of citrus, green apple and tangy pineapple ‘take flight’ on the finish.

name: RED ROOSTER - PINOT NOIR 2019
tastingDescription: This is a great red wine to go with many food items such as salmon steaks, roasted poultry or pasta. Taste the red berry and cherry fruit with your menu or occasion.

name: RED ROOSTER - SYRAH RARE BIRD SERIES 2017
nameSanitized: red rooster - syrah rare bird series 2017
sort: RED ROOSTER - SYRAH RARE BIRD SERIES 2017
tastingDescription: This Syrah has a full body, moderate drying tannins, and a fruit-forward palate of dark plum, accented by notes of sweet spice.  The extra-dry lingering finish shows notes of spice, oak, plum, cherry and cocoa.

name: REDSTONE - LIMESTONE RIDGE RIESLING
tastingDescription: A lively, off-dry wine from a cooler year gives our Riesling a bright acidity and beautiful orchard fruit on the nose. The aromas of crunchy green apple and lime zest tickle the nose, without betraying the juicy tangerine, ripe pear and lemon twist on the pal- ette. The limestone soils lend sumptuous weight and supple mouth feel while leaving your mouth watering.

name: REGIONAL RESERVE CABERNET SAUVIGNON - WOLF BLASS GOLD LABEL
nameSanitized: regional reserve cabernet sauvignon - wolf blass gold label
sort: REGIONAL RESERVE CABERNET SAUVIGNON - WOLF BLASS GOLD LABEL
tastingDescription: A classic, aromatic Cabernet Sauvignon nose, showing black cherry, rich chocolate, light mint, blackcurrant and mulberry, underscored by subtle fragrant vanilla and fine cedar oak aromas. A medium- to full-bodied, velvety, textured palate with concentrated varietal and regional Cabernet flavours of dark cherry, mulberry, rich dark chocolate and ripe blackcurrant.

name: RENARDAT FACHE - CERDON BUGEY METHODE ANCESTRALE
nameSanitized: renardat fache - cerdon bugey methode ancestrale
sort: RENARDAT FACHE - CERDON BUGEY METHODE ANCESTRALE
tastingDescription: Expressive nose displaying vivid aromas of purple wild flowers, raspberry patch, and mouth-watering grapefruit zest. The palate is delicate, light and fresh  with flavors of sweet strawberries, raspberries and crunchy blueberries supported by a thirst-quenching mineral acidity and a soft kiss of sweetness. This low alcohol organic sparkling Rose makes  a delicious aperitif or dessert wine.

name: RETSINA - TSANTALI
tastingDescription: False

name: RHEINHESSEN PINOT GRIGIO - HANS BAER
tastingDescription: False

name: RHEINHESSEN RIESLING - SCHMITT SOHNE BLUE
tastingDescription: False

name: RHONE AQUERIA TAVEL - CHATEAU D'AQUERIA
tastingDescription: 92 Points, Vinuous: "Highly fragrant red currant, cherry, orange pith and floral qualities on the nose. Picks up a subtle white pepper nuance with air, which complements and sharpens the juicy red fruit, blood orange and fennel flavours. The gently chewy finish shows fine detail and lingering cherry and citrus fruit notes." -Josh Raynolds (June 2021).

name: RIAS BAIXAS ALBARINO - TORRES PAZO DAS BRUXAS 2019
nameSanitized: rias baixas albarino - torres pazo das bruxas 2019
sort: RIAS BAIXAS ALBARINO - TORRES PAZO DAS BRUXAS 2019
tastingDescription: 90 points, Wine Spectator (USA) - "Brilliant gold color. Fragrant, with exquisitely delicate floral (acacia) and fruit (lemon marmalade) notes against a vegetative (fennel) backdrop.  Intense and fresh on the palate, with delicate fruit acidity." (2019)

name: RIAS BAIXAS ROSAL ALBARINO - ADEGAS VALMINOR DAVILA 2018
nameSanitized: rias baixas rosal albarino - adegas valminor davila 2018
sort: RIAS BAIXAS ROSAL ALBARINO - ADEGAS VALMINOR DAVILA 2018
tastingDescription: A wide and complex range of spring-flower aromas, accented by notes of pineapple and mango.  Velvety and fresh on the palate with a complex blend of tropical fruits that are well integrated with aromatic herbs. Its complexity and minerality contribute to a long finish.

name: RIBEIRA SACRA - ENVINATE LOUSAS SEOANE
tastingDescription: False

name: RIBEIRA SACRA MENCIA - ALBAMAR-FUSCO 2019
tastingDescription: Fusco 2018 is a fresh and pleasant wine from old vines Mencia, perfect representation of the grape and the DO of Ribera Sacra where is grown.Very refined with great acidity and beautiful notes of red and black fruit and soft notes of backery, easy to drin

name: RIBEIRA SACRA MENCIA - FINCA CUARTA 2019
tastingDescription: Aromas of blue and red berries, mulberry, with nuances of licorice and menthol. Dry on the palate with refreshing acidity, flavours of mulberry and licorice, and moderate tannin. This medium-full body wine completes in a long, mineral, and bitter chocolate finish. Excellent with roast meats, barbecue, or cured cheese.

name: RIBERA DEL DUERO - CALLEJO MAJUELOS DE CALLEJO 2014
nameSanitized: ribera del duero - callejo majuelos de callejo 2014
sort: RIBERA DEL DUERO - CALLEJO MAJUELOS DE CALLEJO 2014
tastingDescription: 93 Points, James Suckling: "Lovely purity to this Ribera del Duero, which shows fresh dark plums, citrus, oyster shell and iodine. Really driven on the palate with a wonderful transparency of fruit and cutting acidity that slices through the muscular tannins." (July 2019)

name: RIBERA DEL DUERO - PINGUS 13 15
tastingDescription: 96 Points, Robert Parker's The Wine Advocate - "The nose is aromatic, expressive and open, quite perfumed and subtle, with no traces of oak, even the spices are very much in the background…The palate is also approachable and gentle, with very good acidity and very fine tannins, elegance and character.” (October 2015)

name: RIBERA DEL DUERO - PORTIA PRIMA LA ENCINA
nameSanitized: ribera del duero - portia prima la encina
sort: RIBERA DEL DUERO - PORTIA PRIMA LA ENCINA
tastingDescription: Clean, bright, intense cherry red colour developing to ruby. Complex, warm. Vanilla and black fruits notes,cocoa on the background. Tasty, structured and very balanced. Very long finish in barrel ageing hints and black fruits.

name: RIBERA DEL DUERO - SARMENTERO ROBLE 2019
tastingDescription: Youthful aromas of ripe blackberries on a backdrop of campfire, menthol, and an oak accent derived from five months of barrel aging. This medium-full bodied wine is dry, lush, with well integrated acid and tannin. The youthful flavours of fruit, dark berries linger in a moderately long finish.

name: RIBERA DEL DUERO - VILLACRECES PRUNO 2018
tastingDescription: 91+ Points, Wine Advocate - " It's mostly Tempranillo with 9% Cabernet Sauvignon fermented for three weeks and matured in French barrels for 11 months. It's clean and quite fruit-driven, approachable and juicy, with integrated oak. Very pleasant, with very good freshness." (December 2019)

name: RIBERA DEL DUERO CRIANZA - TORRES CELESTE 2017
nameSanitized: ribera del duero crianza - torres celeste 2017
sort: RIBERA DEL DUERO CRIANZA - TORRES CELESTE 2017
tastingDescription: Since Torres launched Celeste a few years ago, the wine has gotten better and better. This is textbook Ribera: it has smoothness and size along with intriguing black cherry, plum, herbs, tea and tobacco. A bottling for pretty much any wine lover. Pairs with roast chicken or pork, sausages or stew.

name: RICHBOURG - THIBAULT LIGER BELAIR 2014
tastingDescription: 96 Points, Tim Atkin MW: "Showing the adaptability of his winemaking, Thibault Liger-Belair used no whole bunches on his Richebourg in 2014, judging that the allowing fruit didn’t need it. The result is superb: deftly oaked, opulent and dense with layer upon layer of flavour and age worthy tannin." (January 2016)

name: RIESLING - BEND IN THE RIVER
tastingDescription: This is an off-dry white wine with balanced acidity and a refreshing structure. Sweet fruit flavours lead way to a lemony tartness, making this a great wine for cleansing the palate between slightly spicier mouthfuls or oilier dishes.

name: RIESLING - BLACK TOWER
tastingDescription: A deliciously crisp Riesling, cool fermented to obtain elegant floral aromas and mouth-watering ripe fruit flavours.

name: RIESLING - BLANK CANVAS
tastingDescription: 93 Points, Bob Campbell MW - "From the Blind River vineyard in the Awatere Valley. A powerful riesling with lime, lemon zest and subtle mineral flavours. Low pH and assertive acidity balances around 23g/l of residual sugar and builds a lovely tension to give a medium-dry finish. An impressive wine that will develop well." (Jul 2018)

name: RIESLING - BLUE NUN
tastingDescription: Intense aromas point to its noble provenance. It is the perfect combination of tropical fruit and white peach with a delicate floral bouquet. Excellent with light stews, chicken, vegetables, Asian cuisine and fish dishes.

name: RIESLING - BREE 2016
tastingDescription: Bree is an aromatic Riesling in the drier style with tangy, mouth-watering acidity. Slate, petrol, apples and spice notes lead to a palate of honeyed apricots, pears and citrus and a lingering pink grapefruit finish. It's perfect as an aperitif or with Szechuan dishes.

name: RIESLING - DOMAINE OSTERTAG LES JARDINS
tastingDescription: Biodymanic and organic wine. Hints of tangerine, lemon and mandarin on the nose of this wine convey ripeness and freshness in equal measure. The palate offers melon juiciness edged with lemon, leavening ripeness with freshness. The finish is dry, long and a total joy.

name: RIESLING - DOMAINE WEINBACH GRAND CRU SCHLOSSBERG 2018
nameSanitized: riesling - domaine weinbach grand cru schlossberg 2018
sort: RIESLING - DOMAINE WEINBACH GRAND CRU SCHLOSSBERG 2018
tastingDescription: Offers a delicate nose of fresh orchard fruit and light floral notes with a touch of beeswax. The granite of the terroir can be felt through a crisp and vivid acidity. The palate is light-bodied and balanced with a slight minerality for an endless finish.

name: RIESLING - DOMAINE ZIND HUMBRECHT GRAND CRU BRAND 2018
nameSanitized: riesling - domaine zind humbrecht grand cru brand 2018
nameSuffix: DOMAINE ZIND HUMBRECHT GRAND CRU BRAND 2018
sort: RIESLING - DOMAINE ZIND HUMBRECHT GRAND CRU BRAND 2018
tastingDescription: 96 Points, James Suckling - "This is a very ripe and concentrated wine with caramelized pineapple, smoke and spice. A fireworks display of minerals on the palate that doesn't want to stop, but the texture is also stunning and that follows through into the super-long sea-salt finish." (June 2017)

name: RIESLING - DR LOOSEN ERDENER TREPPCHEN GG ALTE REBEN 15
nameSanitized: riesling - dr loosen erdener treppchen gg alte reben 15
nameSuffix: DR LOOSEN ERDENER TREPPCHEN GG ALTE REBEN 15
sort: RIESLING - DR LOOSEN ERDENER TREPPCHEN GG ALTE REBEN 15
tastingDescription: 95 Points, Wine Advocate - "The wine is incredibly rich, vital and piquant on the palate; it is round and almost lush, but well structured by its minerals that give enormous length, grip and tension. This is a fascinating Riesling GG and by far the best dry Treppchen I have ever tasted. Riesling lovers should not miss it. Drink: 2017 - 2040.” (April 2017)

name: RIESLING - DR LOOSEN GRAACHER HIMMELREICH GG ALTE REBEN 15
nameSanitized: riesling - dr loosen graacher himmelreich gg alte reben 15
nameSuffix: DR LOOSEN GRAACHER HIMMELREICH GG ALTE REBEN 15
sort: RIESLING - DR LOOSEN GRAACHER HIMMELREICH GG ALTE REBEN 15
tastingDescription: 95 Points Wine Advocate: "From ungrafted vines, 2019 Graacher Himmelreich Riesling GG Alte Reben displays a fine, concentrated, beautifully slatey and floral bouquet of perfectly ripe Riesling berries and apricots as well as the flinty character of blue slate. Round and finessed on the palate and a lingering, mouthwatering finish."

name: RIESLING - DR LOOSEN MOSEL
tastingDescription: This crisp, refreshing quaff from the Loosen family who grow only Riesling has notes of green apple, melon, slate, herbs and citrus tastes of pears and apples. With spice and hints of lemon-lime on the finish, it's off-dry, refreshing and loves spicy Thai dishes.

name: RIESLING - DR LOOSEN WEHLENER SONNENUHR GG ALTE REBEN 15
nameSanitized: riesling - dr loosen wehlener sonnenuhr gg alte reben 15
nameSuffix: DR LOOSEN WEHLENER SONNENUHR GG ALTE REBEN 15
sort: RIESLING - DR LOOSEN WEHLENER SONNENUHR GG ALTE REBEN 15
tastingDescription: 93 Points, Wine Advocate - "The 2015 Wehlener Sonnenuhr Riesling Alte Reben GG offers a beautifully clear, bright and fresh Riesling, slate and lemon bouquet with a remarkable depth and mineral freshness. It is full-bodied, round and lush on the palate, with a smooth acidity and a generous texture. This is a mouth-filling, pretty rich and fruit-intense Sonnenuhr with very fine tannins and a long, aromatic finish. Drink: 2022 - 2040.” (April 2017)

name: RIESLING - DRATHEN BERNKASTEL
tastingDescription: Good drainage and heat reflection gives Riesling the optimum growing conditions. Beautifully scented, this “Bernkasteler” is fresh and fruity with well balanced acidity and sweetness. A classic Mosel.

name: RIESLING - EGON MULLER SCHARZHOF 2017
tastingDescription: 92 Points, James Suckling: "An off-dry riesling beauty with very attractive white-flower and white-fruit aromas, a hint of green-apple freshness lifting the medium-bodied palate. Precise balance at the long, clean finish. Drink or hold." (August 2021)

name: RIESLING - HUGEL ESTATE 2015
tastingDescription: 91 Points, Wine Spectator: “Floral and spice notes draw you into the glass of this well-cut Riesling, where a streak of smoky minerality underscores flavors of yellow peach, pink grapefruit zest and honeycomb. Racy finish. Drink now through 2025.” (November 2017)

name: RIESLING - KARP SCHREIBER MY KARP MOSEL 2018
nameSanitized: riesling - karp schreiber my karp mosel 2018
sort: RIESLING - KARP SCHREIBER MY KARP MOSEL 2018
tastingDescription: This refreshing off-dry Riesling offers intense citurs and apricot. Steely fresh, delicate and fine with a long finish. Pairs well with seafood, jalapeno or tomatillo in a snapper dish.

name: RIESLING - MERTES LANDLUST
tastingDescription: Notes of honeysuckle, blossom, citrus and white peach on the nose. On the palate, lively notes of Asian pear, red apple and peach are balanced with lemon and lime notes and are framed by an intense & refreshing minerality leading to a long, harmonious finish.

name: RIESLING - MOSELLAND ARS VITIS
tastingDescription: Wine grower Heinz Ames, the painter behind the bottle art, uses Riesling instead of water in his original watercolours. The Ars Vitis entices with fruit, spice and lime aromas, followed by ripe apricots, pears, citrus and minerals. Its light sweetness, offset with generous acidity, makes it an ideal match for salads and Asian dishes.

name: RIESLING - MOSELLAND DR. TROCKEN
tastingDescription: Dr. Trocken is passionate about dry wines. His name speaks for pleasurable, serious, yet unconventional Dry Riesling from Germany�s world-class Rheinhessen region. Experience lively fruit aromas of juicy apples and ripe citrus.

name: RIESLING - PETER LEHMANN WIGAN
tastingDescription: A wine of celebrity status, it is best enjoyed fro celebratory occasions.  Classic intense lime cordial flavous carry through resonant of an Eden Valley Riesling and complemented by lemon rind and crips pure acidity in palate.  This wine presents some toast characters amongst beautiful lime citrus and floral notes.

name: RIESLING - PEWSEY VALE EDEN VALLEY 2019
tastingDescription: 93 Points, James Halliday: "It never fails to please. It's the gentle flow of citrus flavours, the hint of ginger spice and finger lime popping acidity and the dry, light finish. Enjoy it with the freshness of youth or age with confidence." Aug 2020

name: RIESLING - ROCKBARE CLARE VALLEY
tastingDescription: Bright and fragrant with classic fresh cut lime and lemongrass notes, alongside a subtle hint of wet slate. Blossom and zest of lime dominate the palate with notes of pastry lemon tart. The wine is crisp and dry with a beautiful zing of grapefruit like acidity to its finish.

name: RIESLING - SCHLOSS REINHARTSHAUSEN RHEINGAU 2019
tastingDescription: Tropical aromas abound in the bouquet while flavours of lime zest, peaches and honey trickle on the palate. Delicious alongside prawn stir-fry, Szechuan-style.

name: RIESLING - SELBACH MOSEL 2020
tastingDescription: 91 Points, WineScores.ca: "A classic Mosel Riesling, the Fish label is a consistent white, which over-delivers. The 2019 is described by snappy green apples, lime, peach pit, with delicate floral undertones. Like the nose, the palate is bright and pretty; expect a slick texture and focus and precision with a racy lemon-lime finish." Daenna Van Mulligen (October 2021)

name: RIESLING - ST URBANS HOF MOSEL OLD VINES 2019
nameSanitized: riesling - st urbans hof mosel old vines 2019
nameSuffix: ST URBANS HOF MOSEL OLD VINES 2019
sort: RIESLING - ST URBANS HOF MOSEL OLD VINES 2019
tastingDescription: 91 Points & Top 100: 2018, Rank: 44, Wine Spectator - "A pure, well-sculpted, off-dry version, with persimmon, lime and slate flavors coating the palate. Hints of orchard blossom and herbs add to the complexity, making you reach for another sip. Drink now through 2024." (February 2018)

name: RIESLING - TRIMBACH 2018
tastingDescription: 93 Points, Wine Enthusiast: “Wet stone and fresh lemon are faint but distinct on the nose. A pure lemon flavor streaks across the slender, taut palate, with a comet-like spray of freshness. This wine is dry and, if it weren't for juicy glimpses of ripe lemon, would be almost austere.” (August 2018)

name: RIESLING - WILLY GISSELBRECH PIERRE BRECHT 2019
tastingDescription: False

name: RIESLING - ZIND HUMBRECHT ROCHE CALCAIRE
tastingDescription: False

name: RIESLING DRY - KUNSTLER HOCHHEIM STIELWEG ALTE REBEN 2018
nameSanitized: riesling dry - kunstler hochheim stielweg alte reben 2018
sort: RIESLING DRY - KUNSTLER HOCHHEIM STIELWEG ALTE REBEN 2018
tastingDescription: False

name: RIESLING GEWURZTRAMINER - HARDYS STAMP SERIES
tastingDescription: Stamp Riesling Gewürztraminer is a medium-bodied wine with aromatic citrus, delicate tropical notes and a crisp, clean finish.

name: RIESLING GEWURZTRAMINER - HARDYS STAMP SERIES
tastingDescription: The Stamp Riesling Gewürztraminer is a medium-bodied wine releasing aromatic citrus, delicate tropical notes and a crisp, clean finish.  A best seller, this wine is delightful with turkey, chicken teriyaki, honey mustard pork chops or ginger garlic salmon steaks.

name: RIESLING GOLDKAP - DR LOOSEN ERDENER PRALAT
nameSanitized: riesling goldkap - dr loosen erdener pralat
sort: RIESLING GOLDKAP - DR LOOSEN ERDENER PRALAT
tastingDescription: 98 Points, James Suckling: "Forget dessert and substitute it for this much more delicious and healthy option! The wonderfully fragrant mango, papaya and mangosteen nose pulls you deep into this concentrated but super elegant Auslese with a very long, powerful finish. The sweetness is already beautifully integrated. Drink or hold. "

name: RIESLING KABINETT - B RESS HATTENHEIMER SCHUTZENHAUS 2017
nameSanitized: riesling kabinett - b ress hattenheimer schutzenhaus 2017
sort: RIESLING KABINETT - B RESS HATTENHEIMER SCHUTZENHAUS 2017
tastingDescription: Bartlett pear and apple nuances offer refreshing relief to mildly curried Indian seafood or vegetarian dishes.

name: RIESLING KABINETT - MOSELLAND PIESPORTER MICHELSBERG
tastingDescription: This off-dry Riesling is light straw in colour with pronounced peach, citrus and white flower aromas. It's a light-bodied wine with slight, ripe fruit sweetness balanced by crisp, refreshing acidity and a hint of minerality.

name: RIESLING KABINETT - ROBERT WEIL RHEINGAU 2018
tastingDescription: 92 Points, Wine Advocate - "The 2016 Rheingau Riesling Kabinett is bright and fresh on the nose but also concentrated and opulent. This is a crisp, piquant and lush Riesling with energy and tension. It's salty, light and a prefect expression of Kabinett. Drink: 2026 - 2046.” (December 2017)

name: RIESLING KABINETT - SELBACH OSTER ZELTING HIMMELREICH 2019
nameSanitized: riesling kabinett - selbach oster zelting himmelreich 2019
sort: RIESLING KABINETT - SELBACH OSTER ZELTING HIMMELREICH 2019
tastingDescription: 93 Points, Stephan Reinhardt, Wine Advocate - "The 2018 Zeltinger Himmelreich Riesling Kabinett halbtrocken displays a bright yet intense bouquet with finely weathered and flinty slate and dried white fruit aromas. Juicy, piquant and salty on the palate, this is a round and charming yet intense, persistently crystalline and elegant Kabinett with a long and harmonious but tensioned, slightly bitter finish. Excellent. Tasted at the domain in September 2020." (October, 2020)

name: RIESLING KABINETT - ST URBANS HOF OCKFEN BOCKSTIEN 2018
nameSanitized: riesling kabinett - st urbans hof ockfen bockstien 2018
sort: RIESLING KABINETT - ST URBANS HOF OCKFEN BOCKSTIEN 2018
tastingDescription: 90 Points, Wine Advocate - "Sourced from the Zickelgarten parcel, the 2015 Bockstein Kabinett (AP 28 16) opens with a bright, ripe and remarkably dense Riesling bouquet with floral and herbal aromas. Sweet and racy-piquant on the palate, this is a juicy, round and lush yet elegant Kabinett with a good aromatic finish. Drink: 2022 - 2035.” (April 2017)

name: RIESLING KABINETT RICHTER WEHLENER SONNENUHR 2015
tastingDescription: 93-95 Points, Wine Advocate - "A powerhouse but in the most delicious and delicate way. The palate is complex, opening wide but always precise and very, very long, with great mineral grip and tension but also lush and sensual features. This is a great Mosel Riesling indeed." (June 2019)

name: RIESLING SEKT EXTRA BRUT - ROBERT WEIL 2016
nameSanitized: riesling sekt extra brut - robert weil 2016
sort: RIESLING SEKT EXTRA BRUT - ROBERT WEIL 2016
tastingDescription: False

name: RIESLING SPATLESE - RICHTER WEHLENER SONNENUHR 2012/13
tastingDescription: False

name: RIESLING SPATLESE - ROBERT WEIL RHEINGAU 2016
tastingDescription: 91 Points, Wine Advocate - "The 2016 Rheingau Riesling Spätlese displays a clear, fresh and lovely bouquet of white stone fruits. It has a reductive, elegant style. On the palate, this is a lush, light and finessed Spätlese that is graceful, fresh and enormously piquant if not racy. The finish is stimulatingly mineral and salty. This is a beautiful expression of the Kiedrich terroir. Drink: 2018 - 2050.” (October 2016)

name: RIESLING SPATLESE ZELTINGER SCHLOSSBERG - SELBCH OSTER
nameSanitized: riesling spatlese zeltinger schlossberg - selbch oster
sort: RIESLING SPATLESE ZELTINGER SCHLOSSBERG - SELBCH OSTER
tastingDescription: False

name: RIESLING TROCKEN - BASSERMANN JORDAN PFALZ 2018
tastingDescription: 88 Points, Wine Spectator - "A pretty, dry version, with ripe, fruity character and vibrant acidity. Aromas and flavors of apple, hazelnut and hops combine with a vivid structure and a firm backbone, ending with a long finish. Drink now.” (2018)

name: RIESLING TROCKEN - HANS BAER
tastingDescription: Fragrant & fruit driven with soft orange, peach aromas on the nose. Bright citrus, ripe peach, a hint of minerality and spicy flavours on the palate with a mouth-watering finish.

name: RIESLING TROCKEN - ROBERT WEIL KIEDRECH 2018
tastingDescription: 90 Points, Wine Advocate - "The 2016 Rheingau Kiedricher Riesling Trocken opens with a clear, intense and concentrated bouquet of ripe white and yellow stone fruits. This is a full-bodied, intense and concentrated Riesling with good grip and length. It is powerful but not alcoholic. Drink: 2018 - 2035.” (December 2017)

name: RIESLING TROCKEN - ROBERT WEIL KIEDRICH GRAFENBERG G G 2018
nameSanitized: riesling trocken - robert weil kiedrich grafenberg g g 2018
nameSuffix: ROBERT WEIL KIEDRICH GRAFENBERG G G 2018
sort: RIESLING TROCKEN - ROBERT WEIL KIEDRICH GRAFENBERG G G 2018
tastingDescription: 95 Points, Wine Advocate - "Weil's citrus colored 2016 Rheingau Riesling Kiedrich Gräfenberg "GG" is bright, pure, fresh and dusty-mineral on the nose but also indicates ripe, intense and concentrated (Mirabelle) fruit that is perfectly mixed with the aromas of the deep and complex Gräfenberg terroir. On the palate, this is a mouthful of lush, elegant and even delicate dry Riesling that is dense and structured but reveals remarkable finesse and mineral piquancy as well. Drink: 2020 - 2035.” (December 2017)

name: RIESLING TROCKEN - VON WINNING DEIDESHEIM PARADIESGARTEN 16
nameSanitized: riesling trocken - von winning deidesheim paradiesgarten 16
sort: RIESLING TROCKEN - VON WINNING DEIDESHEIM PARADIESGARTEN 16
tastingDescription: 90 Points, Wine Advocate - "The 2015 Deidesheimer Paradiesgarten Riesling Trocken offers a coolish, clear and very precise bouquet; there are stony and leafy flavors intertwined with white stone fruit and ripe lemon aromas. Dry, medium-bodied, very elegant and nicely piquant on the palate, this is a tightly woven, very well focused and perfectly balance Riesling. It is aromatics and juicy with stone fruit, passion fruit and mango flavors in the persistent, stimulatingly salty finish. Drink: 2017 - 2023." (August 2016)

name: RIGAMAROLE - ROSE 2019
tastingDescription: Hints of red fruits and a zippy youthful essence make this Rigamarole rosé refreshing to taste. Enhance the summer picnic, grill or tapas session with some rosé today.

name: RIGAMAROLE - WHITE
tastingDescription: An engaging mingling of Riesling, Gewürztraminer and other Germanic varieties. Don't let these eccentric names fool you – it's a wonderfully dry, aromatic and engaging white. Pair with Asian, Thai, and Indian food.

name: RIOJA - MARQUES DE RISCAL RESERVA TIN CANISTER
nameSanitized: rioja - marques de riscal reserva tin canister
nameSuffix: MARQUES DE RISCAL RESERVA TIN CANISTER
sort: RIOJA - MARQUES DE RISCAL RESERVA TIN CANISTER
tastingDescription: False

name: RIOJA - MUGA SELECCION ESPECIAL
tastingDescription: False

name: RIOJA BLANCO - BODEGAS IZADI 2019
tastingDescription: 91 Points, James Suckling "Sliced-apple and lemon aromas with some peach. It's medium-bodied with brightness and freshness." - September 2020

name: RIOJA CRIANZA - ANTANO
tastingDescription: Rich cherry red in colour with clear and brilliant violet tones. A complex nose displaying enticing aromas of raspberry and blackberry with just a hint of spice. Full-bodied with a lingering finish. Rioja at its finest!

name: RIOJA CRIANZA - CVNE VINA REAL 2017
tastingDescription: 93 Points, James Suckling:  "A Rioja with plum, blackberry, black truffle and hints of chocolate. Some walnut, too. It's medium-to full-bodied with firm, chewy tannins and a flavorful finish."  Nov 2020

name: RIOJA CRIANZA - MARQUES DE CACERES VEGAN
nameSanitized: rioja crianza - marques de caceres vegan
sort: RIOJA CRIANZA - MARQUES DE CACERES VEGAN
tastingDescription: Ruby red in colour with an intense bouquet of blackberry and blueberry, this Rioja has some floral notes and a hint of spice. Made from predominantly Tempranillo grapes, this red is full-bodied with a nice balance of fruit flavours and smooth tannins.

name: RIOJA GARNACHA - LA MALDITA
tastingDescription: A trendy red; fresh and easy to drink. A nimble wine from old vines in Tudelilla and Central Rioja. Part of the wine was aged in barrels for three months, while the rest matured on the lees in tanks.

name: RIOJA GRAN RESERVA - CVNE IMPERIAL 2012
tastingDescription: 97 Points, Tim Atkin:  "Another brilliant release.  Savoury, sweet and well balanced, with 15% Graciano adding extra backbone and the zest that you expect from this special red." Feb 2019

name: RIOJA GRAN RESERVA - CVNE IMPERIAL 2014
tastingDescription: 94 Points, Robert Parker: "There is a developed and subtle nose reminiscent of petrol, hints of iodine and sweet spices. The palate is powerful. Serious, austere, faithful to its character." (October 2020)

name: RIOJA GRAN RESERVA - FAUSTINO I 2006
tastingDescription: Clean, bright. Ruby colour developing to maroon. On the nose is complex and elegant, wide fruity and spicy notes. On the mouth, elegant, with pleasant hints due to the barrel ageing. Long and silky finish.

name: RIOJA GRAN RESERVA - FAUSTINO I 2009
tastingDescription: An iconic wine produced at the Rioja winery, made from a selection of Tempranillo, Graciano and Mazuelo grape varieties conferring this wine an elegant structure and acidity, it has an intense, complex nose with a sweetness reminiscent of a blend of ripe fruit, a hint of vanilla, jam and cinnamon, among others.

name: RIOJA GRAN RESERVA - MUGA PRADO ENEA 2014
nameSanitized: rioja gran reserva - muga prado enea 2014
sort: RIOJA GRAN RESERVA - MUGA PRADO ENEA 2014
tastingDescription: 97 Points, James Suckling, July 5, 2021 : Really beautiful aromas of crushed blackberry, brambleberry, hazelnut, walnut and light coffee, following through to a full yet so reserved and polished body with fine, creamy-textured tannins. Fresh and exquisite finish. Very enjoyable now, but this will improve with age for a long time.

name: RIOJA RESERVA - ANTANO
tastingDescription: Aged 24 months in oak barrels, the Antano Reserva from Rioja displays a beautifully dark garnet colour with ruby glints. Enticing aromas such as vanilla, spices and assorted black fruit lead. In the glass, this wine opens up to reveal savory blackberry flavours, complexity and silky tannins.

name: RIOJA RESERVA - BERONIA 2014
tastingDescription: Big and bold, this wine features dark plum, black cherry, vanilla, cedar and some savoury characteristics. Brilliant with the scallops.

name: RIOJA RESERVA - CAMPO VIEJO
tastingDescription: Cherries, black plums and ripe blackberries mingle with clover, pepper, vanilla and coconut. A great balance of fruit and flavours imparted from American and French oak casks.

name: RIOJA RESERVA - MARQUES DE RISCAL 2016
tastingDescription: Silky texture and complex aromas of vanilla, sweet herbs and strawberry preserves make this delicious wine a good partner for roast game hen.

name: RIOJA RESERVA - MUGA  2016
tastingDescription: 95 Points, James Suckling - "This is really tight and powerful with gorgeous tannins and solid fruit. Full body. Tight and composed. Wet earth, smoked meat and hints of black truffles. Very long and powerful. Wonderful length. Real Rioja. One of the top best-value, high-quality reds in Spain."(July 2019)

name: RIOJA TEMPRANILLO - CAMPO VIEJO
tastingDescription: This Rioja has a classic nose of coconut, strawberry jam and toast. The palate is smooth and appealing. Open it the next time you make beef and red pepper stirfry.

name: RIONDO - PROSECCO FRIZZANTE CUVEE 18
tastingDescription: Prosecco Spago Nero is effusively fruity and light-bodied, offering terrific floral notes, persistent effervescence, and a clean, delicate finish. There is perfect body and weight in this crystal clear, pure sparkling wine. It is simply amazing!

name: RIVIERA LIGURE DI PONENTE - TERRE BIANCHE PIGATO 2019
nameSanitized: riviera ligure di ponente - terre bianche pigato 2019
sort: RIVIERA LIGURE DI PONENTE - TERRE BIANCHE PIGATO 2019
tastingDescription: This organic dry white is produced in Liguria, on the Mediterranean coastline. Its golden, intense colour reveals  lasting aromas with hints of peach, acacia honey and aromatic herbs. It has  a lovely bitter aftertaste and a chalky feel on the lingering finish. Perfect with any fish and crustaceans, grilled white meats, pesto and even cured meats.

name: ROAD 13 - GAMAY NOIR 2018
tastingDescription: The colour of the 2018 Gamay is reminiscent of dark cherry/candy apple red with a slight purple hue. On the nose, you have wonderful array of fruity aromas consisting of black raspberry, cranberry and pomegranate supported by notes of black pepper, red liquorice and white flowers.  On the palate, these flavours are joined by notes of dark plum, spicy cigar box, and delicate lashings of vanilla bean.  Texturally, the palate is full and mouth-coating, but very soft and elegant, with a long finish.  The 2018 Gamay will pair well with many lighter dishes such as pork, duck, turkey (with cranberry sauce), and tomato-based pasta dishes, and dinner parties with your friends.

name: ROAD 13 - HONEST JOHN'S RED 2019
tastingDescription: The Honest John’s Red has flavours of cherry, blueberry, and cracked pepper, along with delicate notes of vanilla, clove, and orange blossom on a medium-bodied palate. The rich texture and soft tannins combine to produce a delicious, fruity wine that calls out for friends around a BBQ.

name: ROAD 13 - HONEST JOHN'S ROSE 2020
tastingDescription: Flavours of strawberry, grapefruit, and watermelon combined with hints of apricot and cherry are framed in a rich, mouth-filling wine with a long, clean, elegant finish.

name: ROAD 13 - SEVENTY-FOUR K 2018
tastingDescription: The Seventy-Four K has notes of cassis, and mint woven through a matrix of soft, silky tannins in a medium frame. The overall impression is of a seductive wine that is carefully crafted to drink well now and for the next few years.

name: ROAD 13 - SPARKLING CHENIN BLANC 2015
tastingDescription: A pure, seductive array of green apple, quince and grapefruit aromas jump out of the glass and into your nose. Searching beyond the fruit, you find complex layers biscuit, bread and fresh cream.  On the palate, the mousse is lively and popping in your mouth, but so fine that it enhances the full, creamy texture of the wine - an effect that is only experienced in those wines that are made in the traditional method and aged for a very long time ‘en tirage’. There is a beautiful, racy acidity that frames this wine nicely and allows all of the bubbles and flavours to reside in perfect harmony, and extend out with a long elegant finish.

name: ROAD 13 VINEYARDS - HONEST JOHNS VIOGNIER 2020
tastingDescription: A nice treat is this small lot from Road 13 from the excellent 2020 vintage. Fresh and aromatic is the best expression of this varietal, with hints of peach, honey and citrus. The textures and flavours make this a great sipper or with flavourful cuisine like tandoori chicken, sushi platters or spicy curry dishes. Enjoy. 780 cases produced

name: ROBIN RIDGE - GAMAY ORGANIC 2020
tastingDescription: Complex aromas of violets, berry, almond and licorice. The palate is elegant, crisp and juicy and full of blackberry, cherry, raspberry, mineral and spice flavours that linger on the lively, long and silky finish. BC Wine Awards Silver. Vancouver Sun’s Top 25 BC Summer Wines.  Anthony Gismondi’s BC Weekly Pick.

name: ROEDERER ESTATE - ANDERSON VALLEY BRUT
tastingDescription: 93 Points & Top 100: 2018, Rank: 27, Wine Spectator - "Seamless and silky, showing an almost effortless sense of complexity, with notes of lemon and pear paired with toasty brioche, fresh ginger and hazelnut details. Drink now." (July 2018)

name: ROLET - CREMANT DE JURA BRUT NV
nameSanitized: rolet - cremant de jura brut nv
sort: ROLET - CREMANT DE JURA BRUT NV
tastingDescription: 91 points, Gismondi On Wine - "Creamy red and brisk green apple, crystalline lemon, grapefruit pith, stony toast, and a kiss of vanilla pod perfumes the lingering finish. The creaminess is well balanced off with a bright spire of lemony acidity. (August 2020)

name: ROMAGNA ALBANA - TRERE ARLUS 2019
tastingDescription: Aged in stainless-steel tanks, with five months on the lees. Medium gold colour, with aromas of citrus, wildflowers, honey, almonds, and Mediterranean herbs. This dry wine has moderate acidity, medium body, and the aromas are repeated on the palate. Herbs and minerality complete the medium-long finish. Perfectly pairs with white fish and other seafood dishes.

name: ROMAGNA SANGIOVESE PREDAPPIO - CHIARA CONDELLO 2018
tastingDescription: This 100% organically cultivated and hand-harvested Romagna Sangiovese exhibits a complex bouquet of blackberry, cherries, and hints of violets and rose. On the palate is a lively acidity well complemented with silky tannins. With a  long elegant finish, the Predappio pairs well with a diversity of pasta and meat dishes.

name: ROSE - CHILDREN OF THE REVOLUTION VEGAN
nameSanitized: rose - children of the revolution vegan
sort: ROSE - CHILDREN OF THE REVOLUTION VEGAN
tastingDescription: 89 points, Wine Orbit, "Youthfully fresh and elegantly lifted, the bouquet shows citrus peel, apple, ripe strawberry and floral aromas, followed by a finely expressed palate that's juicy and refreshing. Elegant and lingering with an attractive crisp-dry finish." (October, 2020)

name: ROSE - CHILICIOUS
tastingDescription: Intense aromas characterized by fresh notes that combine perfectly with black fruit flavours, such as blueberries and cassis. The palate is fresh and silky with pleasant finish.

name: ROSE - GALIL MOUNTAIN KOSHER
tastingDescription: A pink-colored wine with shades of glittering lilac. Notes of strawberry, pomegranate and ripe nectarine with characters of blooming wild flowers. Refreshing and balanced acidity with a pleasurable finish. This wine can be enjoyed with tapas or a summer meal featuring a variety of refreshing dishes.

name: ROSE - ISLA NEGRA WEST BAY
tastingDescription: This tasty rose wine is all about refreshment and making the occasion more special. Hints of red fruits and fresh acidity make this a long sip. Try with salad courses, at the grill, finger foods or pasta bowls. Keep chilled. Comes in handy 6-pack should you need to stock up.

name: ROSE - KIM CRAWFORD HAWKES BAY 2020
tastingDescription: "Made from Malbec and Merlot, this rose is soft, luscious, brimming with red berry fruits and sure to please. A lovely pick for Mom!" - Kim Giesbrecht, Category Manager for Wines of Australia, New Zealand, South Africa, BIBC & Cask

name: ROSE - MANCURA ETNIA 2020
tastingDescription: "Made to go with food and  friends, this Chilean rosé is dry styled with red berry hints and lots of refreshment value. Try with summer fare, bbq menus and al fresco occasions."

name: ROSE - MIRAFLORA
tastingDescription: Intense aromas characterized by fresh notes that combine perfectly with black fruit flavours, such as blueberries and cassis. The palate is fresh and silky with pleasant finish.

name: ROSE - NACIDO Y CRIADO 2019
tastingDescription: False

name: ROSE - OYSTER BAY MARLBOROUGH 2020
tastingDescription: Floral aromas of cherry blossom and strawberry, with a delicate texture and lively citrus zest. Oyster Bay Marlborough Rosé is ideal as an aperitif or perfectly matched with prawns, fish, soft cheeses, spicy Mexican flavours and strawberries.

name: ROSE - PATO CRIOLLO
tastingDescription: Fresh, fruity and expressive, with aromas of juicy red berries. Slightly sweet and refreshing entrance, with a lingering, fruity finish.

name: ROSE - PROTEA
tastingDescription: Orange citrus notes of grapefruit and tangerine are apparent, with fresh cut watermelon, wild flowers and lemon zest playing a supporting role. The delicate palate is clean and refreshingly dry, with more of the same watermelon and citrus fruit adding sweetness and balance to the long finish.

name: ROSE - SAN PEDRO GATO NEGRO
tastingDescription: False

name: ROSE - SPADE & SPARROWS CALIFORNIA 2019
tastingDescription: Keeping the spotlight on her, Kaitlyn Bristowe will be on the 29th season of Dancing With The Stars. Kaitlyn says: "A little romance from you to you, with notes of strawberries and florals...for peak deliciousness, chill before enjoying. "

name: ROSE - STONELEIGH LIGHTER
tastingDescription: The wine has a beautiful light blush colour. The nose is perfumed with floral notes and wild strawberry nuances. The palate is light, fine and delicate, with yellow flesh plum and summer red berry fruit flavours.

name: ROSE - THE PEOPLE'S WINE SESSIONS LIGHTER
nameSanitized: rose - the peoples wine sessions lighter
sort: ROSE - THE PEOPLE'S WINE SESSIONS LIGHTER
tastingDescription: False

name: ROSE - VINA CASABLANCA CEFIRO
tastingDescription: Intense pink color. Fresh and sweet aromas reminiscent of red fruit like cherries and raspberries. A balanced and creamy wine with a fresh finish.

name: ROSE - WOLF BLASS MAKERS PROJECT RESERVE LANGHORNE 2019
nameSanitized: rose - wolf blass makers project reserve langhorne 2019
nameSuffix: WOLF BLASS MAKERS PROJECT RESERVE LANGHORNE 2019
sort: ROSE - WOLF BLASS MAKERS PROJECT RESERVE LANGHORNE 2019
tastingDescription: Makers' Project Rose was made with free run juice drained directly from the press. With no squeezing of the skins and seeds, only the pure, fresh, vibrant juice was fermented, resulting in a deliciously light, fruity wine. A juicy palate and lingering finish make it the perfect dinner date.

name: ROSE MERLOT - 8 RIOS
tastingDescription: This Rosé is made from the white vinification of Cabernet Sauvignon grapes, it has an attractive pink colour, fruity aroma and medium body giving it its distinctive freshness. It is ideal as an appetizer, to accompany desserts, fruits and cheese. Serve between 10° - 12° C.

name: ROSE METAL - BERTON
tastingDescription: False

name: ROSE OF MALBEC - DONA PAULA MENDOZA 2021
nameSanitized: rose of malbec - dona paula mendoza 2021
sort: ROSE OF MALBEC - DONA PAULA MENDOZA 2021
tastingDescription: Pale pink colour. In the nose it has deep berries and violet aromas coming from the early harvest. In the mouth it is a very fresh wine due to its high acidity. It presents a long, balanced and soft finish.

name: ROSSESE DI DOLCEACQUA - TERRE BIANCHE 2018
tastingDescription: Intense aromas of wild berries, cherry, dog-rose and spices. It is slightly savoury, with a warm body and bitter notes. A perfect complement for tuna, grilled or lightly dressed white meats, stockfish and vegetables pies.

name: ROSSO - FRESCO DI MASI
tastingDescription: False

name: ROSSO DI MONTALCINO - ALTESINO 2018
tastingDescription: 91 Points, James Suckling: “Red cherries, redcurrants and cinnamon. Medium body, fine tannins that still manage to somewhat cling to the mouth and a juicy finish. Drink now.” (July 2018)

name: ROSSO DI MONTALCINO - GIANNI BRUNELLI 2016
tastingDescription: 90+ Points, Wine Advocate: “The 2016 Rosso di Montalcino is a terrific wine that offers good value as well. The bouquet reveals earthy aromas that are folded within ripe cherry and dried raspberry. The wine goes into oak casks for eight months, and this is just enough to build a generous, extrovert personality. Drink: 2018 - 2022.” (June 2018)

name: ROSSO DI TORGIANO - LUNGAROTTI RUBESCO 2018
tastingDescription: 92 Points, JamesSuckling.com - "A rich, layered red with ripe-berry, dark-chocolate and walnut aromas and flavors. Full-bodied and intense. Flavorful finish." (November, 2020)

name: ROUSSETTE DE SAVOIE - DOMAINE VENDANGE ALTESSE 2018
nameSanitized: roussette de savoie - domaine vendange altesse 2018
sort: ROUSSETTE DE SAVOIE - DOMAINE VENDANGE ALTESSE 2018
tastingDescription: Elegant nose with floral and spicy notes of biscuit, hawthorn, ripe pear and candied citrus fruit, ginger, green tea and musk. The energic palate is intense and precise, delivering a mouth-coating texture. The finish is long and persistent. This wine can age beautifully.

name: ROUSSILLON - CARAMANY SOUS LA MONTAGNE
tastingDescription: False

name: ROUSSILLON BLANC - CHAPOUTIER BILA HAUT
tastingDescription: 89-91 Points, Wine Advocate - “The 2016 Côtes du Roussillon Les Vignes de Bila Haut Blanc is a blend of 60% Grenache Blanc, 20% Macabeu and then smaller amounts of Marsanne and Vermentino. From a mix of estate terroirs (schistes, clay, limestone and granite), it has racy, vibrant aromas and flavors of lime, salty minerality and white peach. Medium-bodied, seamless and incredibly drinkable, it’s absolutely worth buying.” (April 2017)

name: ROUSSILLON BLANC - DOMAINE LAFAGE CENTENAIRE 2018
tastingDescription: 90-92 Points, Wine Advocate: “The 2017 Centenaire Blanc includes 20% non-centenary Roussanne, but the balance is Grenache Blanc and Grenache Gris. It's medium to full-bodied, with ripe guava and melon notes and a velvety-textured mid-palate underscored by a crisp, lime-zest-driven finish. Drink: 2018 - 2022.” (April 2018)

name: ROUSSILLON LES ASPRES AN 1886 - GERARD BERTRAND GRAND TERROI
nameSanitized: roussillon les aspres an 1886 - gerard bertrand grand terroi
sort: ROUSSILLON LES ASPRES AN 1886 - GERARD BERTRAND GRAND TERROI
tastingDescription: 91 Points, Robert Parker: "A blend of 40% Grenache and 30% each Mourvèdre and Syrah, this is fruit-driven, with notions of blueberries, cherries and raspberries. There's a peppery edge plus hints of crushed stone. It's medium to full-bodied. This delivers plenty of pleasure for a very reasonable price."

name: ROUSSILLON VILLAGES - CHAPOUTIER BILA HAUT
tastingDescription: 89-91 Points, Wine Advocate: "An inky colored effort, the 2016 Côtes du Roussillon Villages Les Vignes de Bila Haut offers a beautiful freshness and purity as well as fabulous notes of jammy blackberries, violets, pepper and hints of leather. Rich, concentrated and tasting like it costs four times the price..." (April 2017)

name: ROUSSILLON VILLAGES - DOMAINE BOUCABEILLE MONTE NERO 2018
nameSanitized: roussillon villages - domaine boucabeille monte nero 2018
sort: ROUSSILLON VILLAGES - DOMAINE BOUCABEILLE MONTE NERO 2018
tastingDescription: The Monte Nero is a 50-50 Grenache and Mouvedre that spent a year in used barrels. It offers such black cherries on the nose, with hints of baking spices and pencil shavings. It's medium to full-bodied, with silky tannins and solid structural underpinnings yet remains approachable and should drink well for up to a decade.

name: RUEDA VERDEJO - EL PETIT BONHOMME BLANCO
nameSanitized: rueda verdejo - el petit bonhomme blanco
sort: RUEDA VERDEJO - EL PETIT BONHOMME BLANCO
tastingDescription: Rich gold in colour, this wine exhibits aromas of mango and peach on the nose. The palate is floral with mineral notes, crisp and fresh with an intense finish. Verdejo is a food-friendly wine, try it with grilled salmon, seared scallops, lemon chicken or a fresh tomato and olive salad.

name: RUEDA VERDEJO - MENADE 2020
tastingDescription: 89 points, gismondionwine.com - "Menade is made with organic grapes that see no sulphur or copper sulphate in the vineyards. The palate is a sea of citrus, lime, mango and nectarine in a medium-rich style. Think of this as an upscale sauvignon for the senses with the perfect yin and yang for the palate."  (July 2019)

name: RUFFINO - MODUS 2010
tastingDescription: False

name: RUFFINO - PROSECCO EXTRA DRY
tastingDescription: The bouquet is fragrant and bursting with aromas of apples, pear and citrus. The taste profile is crisp, clean and delicate with fine bubbles and intense fruit flavours that lead to a pleasant finish.

name: RUFFINO - PROSECCO EXTRA DRY
tastingDescription: Crisp, clean, and delicate with fi ne bubbles on the palate.

name: RUFFINO - PROSECCO ROSE
tastingDescription: A crisp, off-dry sparkling wine that offers alluring flavours of strawberry and rose petals, with delicate hints of red berries, white fruits, citrus, and spice. Full and intense, yet delicate, finish.

name: RUFFINO - RISERVA DUCALE ORO 1990
tastingDescription: False

name: RUINART - BLANC DE BLANCS
tastingDescription: 92 Points, Wine Enthusiast: "With its 100% Chardonnay, this Champagne is finely textured, elegant with minerality and the freshest crispest apple flavors. It does have some weight and certainly has intensity-a satisfying, textured wine that is ready to drink." (December 2020)

name: RUINART - BLANC DE BLANCS BRUT
tastingDescription: New eco-friendly packaging, 100% paper, entirely recyclable. 93 Points, Wine Spectator: "Steeped apricot and candied ginger flavors are an aromatic entry for this graceful Champagne, backed by finely cut acidity and layered with accents of kumquat, toast point and salted Marcona almond. It's fresh and racy, yet there's an effortless quality to the integration that makes this hard to stop sipping. Long, minerally finish. Drink now through 2027" (Dec 2020)

name: RUST WINE CO - CAB FRANC
tastingDescription: False

tastingDescription: 93 Points, Wine Advocate: "The 2016 Saint-Amour is lovely, wafting from the glass with scents of strawberries, plums and sweet spices. On the palate, it's full-bodied, ample and fleshy, with rich but melting structuring tannins, a succulent core of fruit and a flavorful finish. Drink: 2018 - 2030." (September 2018)

name: SAINT AUBIN - GACHOT MONOT 2018
tastingDescription: False

It's a dark-hued wine with firm tannins, the sensation of crushed stone and blackberry-blueberry fruit. Full-bodied, it's made for winter nights and meaty stews."

name: SAINT EMILION - CHATEAU MONBOUSQUET 2015
tastingDescription: False

name: SAINT JOSEPH - CHAPOUTIER LES CLOS 2014
tastingDescription: 95 Points, Robert Parker - "The two flagship releases from St Joseph include the Le Clos and Les Granits. From a difficult vintage, I was shocked at the quality of the 2014 St Joseph Le Clos; this warmer, east-facing vineyard continues to impress. Full-bo

name: SAINT JOSEPH - DOMAINE GEORGES VERNAY TERRES D'ENCRE 2017

tastingDescription: 93 Points, Wine Spectator: "This has a dark tea and mesquite frame, but remains on the mineral side of the ledger due to a bright iron streak through the core of gently mulled black cherry and plum fruit. A sanguine note checks in, keeping this tangy and racy in feel. Shows lovely perfume throughout. Drink now through 2030." (November 2018)

name: SAINT JOSEPH - JEAN LOUIS CHAVE 2012
tastingDescription: 93-95 Points, Wine Advocate: "Still in component parts...Chalaix (92-94) displayed enticing notes of violets, blueberries and licorice; the Dardouille (93-95) was lusher and suppler, loaded with black cherries; and the Bachasson (94-96) was the most complex, mixing herbs and licorice with plummy fruit." (December 2019)

name: SAINT LOUIS - BLANC DE BLANCS BRUT
nameSanitized: saint louis - blanc de blancs brut
sort: SAINT LOUIS - BLANC DE BLANCS BRUT
tastingDescription: Saint Louis Brut Blanc de Blancs is a delicious, affordable sparkling wine produced and bottled in France, perfect for any occasion. Dry, flavourful and refreshing, just the wine to add a little sparkle to family gatherings or for entertaining friends. Impressive packaging - the brand is named in honour of King Saint Louis who reigned over France in the Middle Ages, renowned for his charity and much beloved by his people.

name: SAINT LOUIS - ROSE
tastingDescription: Bright strawberry color with numerous and fine bubbles. Fruity scents with red fruits aromas. Fresh and lively attack on the palate with fresh red fruits aromas and a long crisp finish

name: SAINT-BRIS - WILLIAM FEVRE 2012

name: SAINTE EPINE - DELAS SAINT JOSEPH

name: SAINTLY - THE GOOD ROSE 2020
tastingDescription: Saintly is a good tasting rose. Crisp and lively, there is red fruit hints, lots of taste and linger to enjoy. Perfect for sipping; matching with easy-to-make menus; when your work day is over.

name: SAKEHITOSUJI JUNMAI GINJO SAKE - KINREI
tastingDescription: Specialty Junmai Ginjo sake from the Toshimori brewery. 100% made from the famed heirloom sake rice, Omachi, which is cultivated by Toshimori brewery in Okayama, Japan. This sake is very savory, yet dry and crisp. Its long-lasting finish with an umami flavour is unforgettable.

name: SALENTO - VERSO ROSSO
tastingDescription: Verso is a full-bodied wine made with a small percent of appassimento (air-dried) grapes. Rich and dark in colour, with vibrant spice flavours, it is a hedonistic experience that captures the polished side of Negroamaro and Primitivo.

name: SALENTO NEGROAMARO ROSATO - TORMARESCA CALAFURIA
tastingDescription: Intense and delicate with fragrant notes of pomegrante, peach, and grapefruit along with floral notes, particularly violets. On the palate initially soft with a pleasurable crispness followed by delicately savory sensations.

name: SALICE SALENTINO  - LUCIO LEUCI TERRA GUANIANI KOSHER 2018
nameSanitized: salice salentino  - lucio leuci terra guaniani kosher 2018
sort: SALICE SALENTINO  - LUCIO LEUCI TERRA GUANIANI KOSHER 2018
tastingDescription: Made from Negroamaro grapes, this wine is a great match for grilled red and white meats, first courses and hard and semi-hard cheeses.

name: SALICE SALENTINO RISERVA - CODICI MASSERIE
tastingDescription: This wine has a deep red color with beautiful ruby highlights. The bouquet is full of spices with jammy notes made of cherries, wild berries, and a unique smoky character. The palate is nicely structured with soft, delicate tannins, while the finish is persistent and memorable. Pair this wine with savory meats like roast, game, lamb, and aged cheeses.

name: SANCERRE - CHATEAU DE SANCERRE
tastingDescription: This Sauvignon Blanc is a pale straw colour with green highlights. The nose is classic with pronounced herbal notes and fresh citrus. Subtle fruit flavours and crisp acidity are balanced by a nice mineral undertone.

name: SANCERRE - DOMAINE DU NOZAY 2020
tastingDescription: 94 Points, Decanter: “Ripe grapefruit aromas which are also very limestone and flinty in character. Attractive mouthfilling texture with real substance and breadth. Quite a serious style here which shows in the finish, charged with zippy, crunchy structure." (August 2016)

name: SANCERRE - DOMAINE FOUASSIER LES ROMAINS ORGANIC 2018
nameSanitized: sancerre - domaine fouassier les romains organic 2018
sort: SANCERRE - DOMAINE FOUASSIER LES ROMAINS ORGANIC 2018
tastingDescription: 92 Points, Wine Enthusiast: “Produced from biodynamically grown grapes, the wine honors the fact that the Romans got here 2,000 years ago. It has intense fruit, yellow and whites stone-fruit flavors and just the right bright acidity to go with all this opulence. The aftertaste brings in spice and vanilla that add complexity.” (October 2017)

name: SANCERRE - DOMAINE VACHERON
tastingDescription: 90 Points, Wine Enthusiast: “Packed with ripe white and yellow fruits, this entry-level wine in the Vacheron range is impressive in its own right. Its richness comes from the intense fruit that contrasts with the final mineral texture. Drink from 2019.” (December 2018)

name: SANCERRE - FRANCOIS LE SAINT CALCAIRE 2019
tastingDescription: Aromas and flavours of tart apple and grapefruit with slight herbal notes follow on the the rich palate, enhanced and rounded by some aging on lees, culminating in a crisp, vivid finish marked by subtle mineral notes.

name: SANCERRE - HENRI BOURGEOIS LES BARONNES 2019
tastingDescription: Typical of the Sancerre appellation and the Domaine Henri Bourgeois style. Subtle yet powerful, its persistence and harmony find their origin in the exposition and quality of the terroir. Crispy, and fruity this wine has some lime, apple and gunflint aromas balanced by ripe tropical and yellow orchard fruits.

name: SANCERRE - JEAN PAUL BALLAND GRANDE CUVEE 2019
nameSanitized: sancerre - jean paul balland grande cuvee 2019
sort: SANCERRE - JEAN PAUL BALLAND GRANDE CUVEE 2019
tastingDescription: The initial impression on the nose is rich and luscious, ripe peach flavoured with citrus, vine flowers and oaky notes. A greedy palate of exotic fruits (mango, pineapple) and citrus with zest of roasted hazelnuts and tobacco fragrance. The finish is mineral, powerful and sweet open up on a saline sense with honey touch.

name: SANDEMAN - FINE RUBY
tastingDescription: This port is brilliant red ruby in colour with aromas of dried cherries, plums and strawberries. It has full rich fruit flavours of fresh plums and red fruits with a hint of nuttiness on the finish.

name: SANDHILL - CABERNET MERLOT 2018
tastingDescription: Sandhill Okanagan and Vanessa Similkameen are the vineyards that contribute to this classic blend. This is a full-bodied wine with soft drying tannins, good structure and moderate acidity. Fruit forward flavours of black cherry, black currant and dark plum fill the mouth. The lingering finish shows notes of black tea, cocoa powder, spice and black fruit preserves

name: SANDHILL - CHARDONNAY 2019
tastingDescription: This medium-bodied white, with a slightly rich mouth feel, is bright straw-yellow in colour with a bouquet of ripe apple, pear, pineapple and yellow plum. The palate is balanced by fresh acidity and flavours of yellow apple, pineapple, tropical fruit and spice. The clean, lingering finish of lemon custard, green apple, pear and light minerality is complemented by hints of vanilla extract and oak.

name: SANDHILL - MERLOT 2018
tastingDescription: This full-bodied Merlot has soft yet drying tannins, great structure and moderate acidity. The fruit-forward palate shows notes of ripe blackberry and plum, with accents of spice, coffee bean and smoky oak. The extra-dry, lingering finish shows notes of blackberry, coffee, toasted oak, black tea leaves and spicy black pepper.

name: SANDHILL - PINOT GRIS 2020
tastingDescription: Named for the dominant soil of the southern Okanagan - sand and lots of it - Sandhill started with their estate vineyards on the Black Sage bench. Over time other vineyards have been added to meet demand for the various whites, reds and of course now rose. Sourcing from Okanagan Falls and Naramata Bench vineyards, the tree fruit flavours, citrus and floral notes complete a fresh fruity expression of BC's most popular white wine.

name: SANDHILL - SMALL LOTS BARBERA SANDHILL EST 2018
nameSanitized: sandhill - small lots barbera sandhill est 2018
sort: SANDHILL - SMALL LOTS BARBERA SANDHILL EST 2018
tastingDescription: Juicy, fruit-forward flavours of cherry and plum are accented by a note of earth. Red berry tea, pomegranate, wild strawberry, spice, and earth linger beautifully on the dry finish.

name: SANDHILL - SMALL LOTS ONE SIMILKAMEEN VALLEY VANESSA 2017
nameSanitized: sandhill - small lots one similkameen valley vanessa 2017
nameSuffix: SMALL LOTS ONE SIMILKAMEEN VALLEY VANESSA 2017
sort: SANDHILL - SMALL LOTS ONE SIMILKAMEEN VALLEY VANESSA 2017
tastingDescription: Deep garnet in colour with an ever-changing bouquet of cassis, blue plum, sweet spice, violet, oak, molasses, vanilla extract, forest floor and earth. This full-bodied wine has firm drying tannins, great structure and rich fruit flavours. Rich black fruit flavours mingle with spice, oak and leather notes. Notes of black currant, blackberry, spice and black tea linger on the finish.

name: SANDHILL - SMALL LOTS SANGIOVESE SANDHILL ESTATE 2017
nameSanitized: sandhill - small lots sangiovese sandhill estate 2017
sort: SANDHILL - SMALL LOTS SANGIOVESE SANDHILL ESTATE 2017

sort: SANDHILL - SMALL LOTS SYRAH SANDHILL ESTATE 2017
tastingDescription: This full-bodied wine has soft yet drying tannins, great structure, and plenty of juicy, dark fruit flavours, accented by notes of dark chocolate.  Wonderful warming notes of black tea, cocoa powder, black currant, black cherry, spice, vanilla extract and oak linger on the finish.

name: SANDHILL - SMALL LOTS THREE SANDHILL ESTATE 2016
nameSanitized: sandhill - small lots three sandhill estate 2016
sort: SANDHILL - SMALL LOTS THREE SANDHILL ESTATE 2016
tastingDescription: This medium to full-bodied wine has soft yet drying tannins, good structure and food-friendly acidity. Red berries and red currant fruit notes unfold on the palate, complemented by notes of spice and coffee bean. Chai spice, sweet oak, vanilla, red licorice, earth and charred wood notes linger beautifully on the finish.

name: SANDHILL - SMALL LOTS TWO SANDHILL ESTATE 2017
nameSanitized: sandhill - small lots two sandhill estate 2017
sort: SANDHILL - SMALL LOTS TWO SANDHILL ESTATE 2017
tastingDescription: This full-bodied wine has moderate drying tannins, great structure and moderate acidity. Rich, ripe dark fruit flavours of plum, cherry, blackberry and currant are accented by notes of sweet spice and oak. The extra-dry finish shows wonderful notes of dark plum, vanilla extract and sweet spice.

name: SANDHILL - SOVEREIGN OPAL 2019
tastingDescription: "A totally unique wine, this made-in-BC varietal is grown by only one grower in the world: the Casorso family vineyard in Kelowna. A lighter white with spicy hints and citrus and apple, it is a great sipper or with west coast cuisine." - Stephen Schiedel, Catagory Manager for Canadian Wines.

name: SANDHILL - SYRAH 2019
tastingDescription: A blend of valleys, the Similkameen (Vanessa vineyard) and Okanagan (Sandhill estate vineyard) make up this savoury red. Syrah is an exciting BC red as it conveys depth of flavour and character at a world class level. Try with lamb dishes, full-flavoured menus or the cheese course.

name: SANGIOVESE RUBICONE  - TAVERNELLO
tastingDescription: 92 Points, Luca Maroni: "Intense red ruby colour and has notes of ripe cherry and blackberry making it very well balanced with good body. With its juicy red fruit flavours, Sangiovese is a delicious accompaniment to cured meats, cheeses and other traditional Italian dishes."

name: SANGIOVESE RUBICONE - GIACONDI
tastingDescription: This wine is ruby red with violet reflections. Light with an unmistakable bouquet of violets and soft fruit. Dry, with a pleasant aftertaste. Excellent with pastas and grilled red meats.

name: SANGIOVESE RUBICONE - GIACONDI
tastingDescription: This wine is ruby red with violet reflections. Light with an unmistakable bouquet of violets and soft fruit. Dry, with a pleasant aftertaste. Excellent with pastas and grilled red meats.

name: SANGIOVESE SUPERIORE - LE ROCCHE MALATESTIANE I DIAVOLI
nameSanitized: sangiovese superiore - le rocche malatestiane i diavoli
sort: SANGIOVESE SUPERIORE - LE ROCCHE MALATESTIANE I DIAVOLI
tastingDescription: False

name: SANGRE DE TORO - ZERO RED
tastingDescription: Dark cherry red with purple edge. Intense, with black fruit notes and subtle spicy undertones. Supple, jammy palate with fruity aromas.

name: SANGRIA - YELLOW TAIL
tastingDescription: Inspired by the traditional drink of Spain, Sangria combines premium red wine with a splash of sweet citrus for a party-starter in a bottle! A lively blend that offers pronounced citrus, strawberry and floral notes on the nose; the palate is medium-sweet with medium acid and a soft/full mouthfeel.

name: SANTA CRUZ MOUNTAIN RED - RIDGE MONTE BELLO
nameSanitized: santa cruz mountain red - ridge monte bello
sort: SANTA CRUZ MOUNTAIN RED - RIDGE MONTE BELLO

Because of its high quality, the region boasts Italy�s most prestigious status, Prosecco Superiore DOCG. Santa Margherita Prosecco Superiore DOCG is fresh, elegant, and refined. Enjoy its lovely ripe fruit aromas and flavours including hints of pineapples and apples.

name: SANTA YNEZ VALLEY RED - JONATA TODOS BALLARD CANYON 2017
