name: TAKARA - SHO CHIKU BAI SAKE KOSHER
nameSanitized: takara - sho chiku bai sake kosher
sort: TAKARA - SHO CHIKU BAI SAKE KOSHER
tastingDescription: False

name: TAMANOHIKARI - JUNMAI GINJO IWAI SAKE
tastingDescription: The Junmai Ginjo Iwai is brewed using only iwai sake rice from Kyoto, a special variety revived in recent years by farmers and the Japanese government. Elegant with a subtle ginjo fragrance, it’s perfect for traditional Kyoto cuisine and duck.

name: TANGLEWOOD - RESERVE RED
tastingDescription: Robust and smooth. Rich berry, plum and a hint of oak.

name: TANNAT - FELIX LAVAQUE QUARA CAFAYATE
tastingDescription: Intense red with bluish shades. Spicy in the nose with notes of mature red fruit, veggie aromas. Powerful and expressive taste. It´s an exotic wine, medium to full-bodied. It has rough and round tannins, with long finish.

name: TANNAT - GARZON RESERVA 2018
tastingDescription: A juicy, full-bodied wine. Rich purple in colour with very fresh aromas reminiscent of red and black fruits such as plums and raspberries, with a delicate spicy nose. In the mouth, it presents a strong personality. Its mature tannins and minerality transform it into a wine with great soil identity.

name: TANNAT - LAS MORAS RESERVE
tastingDescription: “Here is a new grape to try: Tannat hails from France but here in Argentina can achieve extra ripeness. Very savoury with black currant hints and lots of character. Try with roasted meats, chops or barbeque ribs.” - Stephen Schiedel, Category Manager for Wines of Canada, USA & South America

name: TANTALUS - PINOT NOIR 2019
tastingDescription: A deep garnet in colour, with aromas of allspice, cherry and black plum. The palate lifts with violets, ripe strawberry and a lovely hint of French oak

name: TANTALUS CHARDONNAY 2018
tastingDescription: False

name: TAURASI - VILLA MATILDA ALTAVILLA 2015
tastingDescription: 92 Points, Wine Advocate: “Aglianico vines are planted from 400 to 500 meters above sea level to assure the freshness and the integrity of the fruit. The 2010 Taurasi Tenute di Altavilla is a profound and deep wine with savory aromas of black fruit, spice, tar and smoke... Drink: 2017 - 2028.” (August 2017)

name: TAVEL - BROTTE LES EGLANTIERS 2017
tastingDescription: Beautiful vivid pink with bright glints. Reminiscent of small red fruits (red cherry, strawberry) with nuances of white-fleshed stone fruits (white peach, nectarine). Revealing fresh fruit flavours of wild strawberry, this rose has gentle acidity showing a smooth elegance and intensity with a plump finish.

name: TAVEL - DOMAINE LAFOND ROC EPINE 2019
tastingDescription: A very pure soft pink colour. The dominant aromas are complex; red and white fruits mixed with floral tinges. With time these fruity aromas tend to mellow, with touches of spices and kernel-fruits, while the colour takes on amber tints. A most versatile wine throughout the meal. Wonderful with spiced Mediterranean dishes as well as white meat and fowl. This wine accompanies the local dishes "brandade" (salt cod with garlic, olive oil and cream), "bourride" and "bouillabaisse". Domaine LAFOND TAVEL is particularly recommended for Asian cuisine; an exciting match to the flavours of oriental cooking. The wine is best enjoyed at a temperature of 10°C to 12°C. It will age nicely for three or four years.

name: TAVEL - DOMAINE MABY PRIMA DONNA 2018
tastingDescription: 90 points, Wine Enthusiast: "Fiery notes of peppercorn and char introduce this piquant blend of Cinsault (60%) and Grenache (40%). Blackberry and plum flavors are crisply concentrated on the palate and shaded by savory plumes of smoke and char. It's perfect for lovers of spicy red wines or as an accompaniment to steak or game." (September, 2020)

name: TAVERNELLO GRECANICO PINOT GRIGIO - TERRE SICILIANE ORGANIC
nameSanitized: tavernello grecanico pinot grigio - terre siciliane organic
sort: TAVERNELLO GRECANICO PINOT GRIGIO - TERRE SICILIANE ORGANIC
tastingDescription: 91 Points, Luca Maroni: "Straw-yellow with light golden hue. Aromas of sweet spices, and jasmine jump from the glass. A defined and harmonious bouquet. The palate is dry and attractive with an elegant structure and good acidity that leads to a long, mineral finish."

name: TAYLOR FLADGATE - 10 YEAR OLD TAWNY
tastingDescription: 90 Points, Wine Spectator - "The colour is garnet orange showing its barrel age the nose a nutty spicy, fig, brown sugar affair with flecks of pipe tobacco, nutmeg and orange peel. The palate is aromatic with almonds, toffee and spice that finishes long and sweet. Serve fireside with friends or a great book." (June 2018)

name: TAYLOR FLADGATE - 10, 20, 30 & 40 YEAR OLD CENTURY OF PORT
nameSanitized: taylor fladgate - 10, 20, 30 & 40 year old century of port
sort: TAYLOR FLADGATE - 10, 20, 30 & 40 YEAR OLD CENTURY OF PORT
tastingDescription: A presentation box containing one half bottle each of 10, 20, 30 & 40 Year Old Tawny. This unique collection demonstrates the evolution of tawny Port as it ages in wood, starting with the round and jammy 10 Year and culminating in the sumptuous 40 Year with its wonderful mellow complexity and concentration.

name: TAYLOR FLADGATE - 1961 SINGLE HARVEST VERY OLD PORT
nameSanitized: taylor fladgate - 1961 single harvest very old port
sort: TAYLOR FLADGATE - 1961 SINGLE HARVEST VERY OLD PORT
tastingDescription: A powerful nose of extraordinary complexity and opulence.  Aromas of molasses, dried fig and marzipan are followed by spicy notes of black pepper and cardamom. The flavour is dense, round and concentrated, with a thick and velvety texture. Fresh acidity crammed with lingering flavours of butterscotch, almond and dried fruit.

name: TAYLOR FLADGATE - 1968 SINGLE HARVEST VERY OLD TAWNY
nameSanitized: taylor fladgate - 1968 single harvest very old tawny
sort: TAYLOR FLADGATE - 1968 SINGLE HARVEST VERY OLD TAWNY
tastingDescription: 98 Points, Wine Spectator - "Gorgeous from the get-go, with toasted sesame, green tea, walnut husk, pistachio cream and peanut toffee notes seamlessly layered atop one another, framed by a subtle singed alder hint. Everything glides with grace through the finish like a gently wafting plume of smoke off burning incense. Drink now." (February 2018)

name: TAYLOR FLADGATE - 1969 SINGLE HARVEST VERY OLD TAWNY
nameSanitized: taylor fladgate - 1969 single harvest very old tawny
sort: TAYLOR FLADGATE - 1969 SINGLE HARVEST VERY OLD TAWNY
tastingDescription: 93 Points, Wine Spectator - "This has gained length, cut and nuance with age, offering a mix of hazelnut husk, date, singed sesame, buckwheat, bitter cocoa and black currant paste flavours, all laced with a streak of green tea." (September 2019)

name: TAYLOR FLADGATE - 1970 SINGLE HARVEST VERY OLD TAWNY
nameSanitized: taylor fladgate - 1970 single harvest very old tawny
sort: TAYLOR FLADGATE - 1970 SINGLE HARVEST VERY OLD TAWNY
tastingDescription: 98 Points, Decanter - "Gloriously lifted on the nose with a touch of sultana, molasses and roasted coffee. Rich and beautifully intense on the palate; a smooth, slightly syrupy resonance offset by a lithe streak of acidity, which keeps the wine fresh all the way through. (May 2020)

name: TAYLOR FLADGATE - 20 YEAR OLD TAWNY
tastingDescription: 95 Points, James Suckling:  "Full-bodied, very fruity and dense with intense nut and mahogany flavors. Hints of sultanas, chocolate and coffee. Extremely creamy, long and flavorful. Delicious all the way."  June 2019

name: TAYLOR FLADGATE - 30 YEAR OLD TAWNY
tastingDescription: 95 Points, Wine Spectator - "This is lovely, displaying warm date, toffee and persimmon notes entwined with sesame oil, green tea and ginger flavours. Shows a lovely interplay of sweet and dry, with flashes of hazelnut cream and juniper contrasting each other on the long and deep finish." (June 2018)

name: TAYLOR FLADGATE - 40 YEAR OLD TAWNY
tastingDescription: 95 Points, Wine Spectator - "Alluring, with a warm date and gently mulled fig and peach core gliding through, while light alder, bitter almond and candied ginger notes add sparkle and texture along the edges." (June 2018)

name: TAYLOR FLADGATE - FINE WHITE
tastingDescription: Fully matured in oak so it is smooth and ready to drink, Taylor Fladgate's Fine White Port is made exclusively from white grapes. Serve it chilled with toasted almonds or hazelnuts for a creative aperitif.

name: TAYLOR FLADGATE - FIRST ESTATE RESERVE
tastingDescription: Deep ruby in colour, it has a potent nose of concentrated fruit, crammed with blackcurrant, plum and liquorice flavours. Its luscious texture is supported by a firm tannic structure giving the wine restrained elegance for which Taylor's Ports are famous for.

name: TAYLOR FLADGATE - LATE BOTTLED VINTAGE 2016
tastingDescription: 92 Points, James Suckling: "Blackberries with some dried fruit and hints of sultanas. Slightly lifted. It's medium-bodied with lovely sweetness and a lightly chewy and grippy ending that turns sweet and slightly dry at the end. Delicious Port." (July 2021)

name: TAYLOR FLADGATE - LATE BOTTLED VINTAGE 2016
tastingDescription: 92 Points, James Suckling: "Blackberries with some dried fruit and hints of sultanas. Slightly lifted. It's medium-bodied with lovely sweetness and a lightly chewy and grippy ending that turns sweet and slightly dry at the end. Delicious Port." (July 2021)

name: TAYLOR FLADGATE - VERY OLD TAWNY PORT "KINGSMAN" EDITION
nameSanitized: taylor fladgate - very old tawny port "kingsman" edition
sort: TAYLOR FLADGATE - VERY OLD TAWNY PORT "KINGSMAN" EDITION
tastingDescription: A very rare, exclusive and limited edition, this Tawny port matured for almost 90 years in hand-made seasoned oak casks.  The wine opens with a rich confection of molasses and butterscotch, with complex notes of almond, fig and spices.  The palate is smooth and velvety with rich, intense flavours.

name: TAYLOR FLADGATE - VINTAGE 2000
tastingDescription: 98 Points, Wine Advocate - "Among the most saturated blue/purple/black-colored examples of the vintage, Taylor's 2000 tastes like a young vintage of Chateau Latour on steroids. Aromas of graphite, blackberry liqueur, creme de cassis and smoke jump from the glass. Spectacularly concentrated and enormously endowed, with sweetness allied to ripe tannin, decent acidity, and layer upon layer of fruit and extract, this is the leading candidate for the port of the vintage. Anticipated maturity: 2010-2040." (October 2002)

name: TAYLOR FLADGATE - VINTAGE 2000
tastingDescription: False

name: TAYLOR FLADGATE - VINTAGE 2007
tastingDescription: 97 Points, Wine Advocate - "Very fine delineation, dark berries, boysenberry, wild heather and a touch of honey. The palate is medium-bodied with very fine tannins and a wonderful sense of symmetry and focus, crisp acidity with a very intense finish. There is a completeness, a sensual aspect to this Taylor’s that is beguiling." (July 2011)

name: TAYLOR FLADGATE - VINTAGE 2016
tastingDescription: 100 Points, James Suckling - #4 Top 100 of 2018 - "OMG. This is really the most amazing young Taylor's I have ever tasted. Full-bodied and lightly sweet with super power and intensity. So racy and focused. Yet this has such muscle and intensity." (November 2018)

name: TAYLOR FLADGATE - VINTAGE 2016
tastingDescription: 100 Points, James Suckling - #4 Top 100 of 2018 - "OMG. This is really the most amazing young Taylor's I have ever tasted. Full-bodied and lightly sweet with super power and intensity. So racy and focused. Yet this has such muscle and intensity." (November 2018)

name: TAYLOR FLADGATE - VINTAGE 2016
tastingDescription: 100 Points, James Suckling - #4 Top 100 of 2018 - "OMG. This is really the most amazing young Taylor's I have ever tasted. Full-bodied and lightly sweet with super power and intensity. So racy and focused. Yet this has such muscle and intensity." (November 2018)

name: TAYLOR FLADGATE - VINTAGE 2018
tastingDescription: 97 Points, Vinous.com: It has a classy, aristocratic bouquet, with dense black fruit and touches of melted tar, cloves and white pepper. The palate is very harmonious with fine tannins, perfect acidity and very pure with a gentle, almost caressing second half. White pepper interlaces the black fruit with a very precise finish. Pure class.

name: TENKU NO TSUKI - UMESHU
tastingDescription: Aromatic and refreshing 'Umeshu' plum wine. Bright fresh plum and apricot nose with full flavour of Japanese plums on the palate backed by balanced sweetness and acidity level with a lasting satisfying finish. Versatile enough to go with meals as aperitif or digestif. Great with desserts, with soda water or on the rocks. Fresh plum flavour adds brightness in any cocktails.

name: TERRE DI CHIETI BIANCO - ALTOPIANO
tastingDescription: False

name: TERRE SICILIANE - B.IO BIANCO ORGANIC
tastingDescription: False

name: THE AUDACITY OF THOMAS G. BRIGHT - CABERNET MERLOT 2018
namePrefix: THE AUDACITY OF THOMAS G. BRIGHT
nameSanitized: the audacity of thomas g. bright - cabernet merlot 2018
sort: THE AUDACITY OF THOMAS G. BRIGHT - CABERNET MERLOT 2018
tastingDescription: Full-bodied with a bit of spice and toast, our Cabernet-Merlot blend is grown in Okanagan and finished in whisky barrels for an exceptionally smooth finish.

name: THE CHOCOLATE BLOCK - BOEKENHOUTSKLOOF SWARTLAND 2019
tastingDescription: The varietal content of this particular wine varies from vintage to vintage but the quality never wavers. Expect a mix of blackcurrant, raspberry and plum with some vanilla, licorice and oak spice.

name: THE CREATOR K VINTNERS - HOUSE OF SMITH
nameSanitized: the creator k vintners - house of smith
sort: THE CREATOR K VINTNERS - HOUSE OF SMITH
tastingDescription: 97 Points, Wine Advocate - "The 2015 The Creator is a blend of 80% Cabernet Sauvignon and 20% Syrah, but even though it's in the minority, the Syrah seems to define the wine's personality. On the palate, it's full-bodied, rich and layered, with immense depth and concentration. Drink: 2018 - 2038." (June 2018)

name: THE FOREIGN AFFAIR - CONSPIRACY 2017
tastingDescription: Following the ripasso method perfected in Italy's Veneto region, this unique wine uses dried grapes to add richness and depth to the fresh and dried berries, spice and leather notes. An impressive wine and perfect for grilled red meats.

name: THE FOREIGN AFFAIR - DREAM 2016
tastingDescription: This wine is complex and expressive on the nose with aromas of figs, blackberries, sweet spices, leather/cedar, tobacco, anise and dark cherries. It's a densely coloured wine in the glass and unfolds on the palate in layers of dark fruits, leather, eucalypt, licorice and a range of wood spices all supported by ripe, assertive tannins.

name: THE MENTORS ORCHESTRA - K.W.V. WESTERN CAPE 2017
nameSanitized: the mentors orchestra - k.w.v. western cape 2017
sort: THE MENTORS ORCHESTRA - K.W.V. WESTERN CAPE 2017
tastingDescription: This modern, multi-layered and Bordeaux-style blend shows aromas of blackcurrants, blueberries, plums and black pepper with nuances of pencil shavings and dried herbs. On the palate, the intense concentration is prompted by a firm tannin structure and layers of sweet fruit with an excellent follow-through.

name: THE SECOND ACT - FIELD BLEND PIQUETTE
nameSanitized: the second act - field blend piquette
sort: THE SECOND ACT - FIELD BLEND PIQUETTE
tastingDescription: Our Piquette honours, the lost art of crafting 'petite wines'. Practiced for centuries in Europe, piquette is made from the second stage fermentations of grape skins. Refreshingly light with a crisp finish and gentle fizz, piquette gives our Okanagan-grown grapes their Second Act.

name: THE VIEW WINERY -  PEARLS SPARKLING BRUT 2017
nameSanitized: the view winery -  pearls sparkling brut 2017
sort: THE VIEW WINERY -  PEARLS SPARKLING BRUT 2017
tastingDescription: This elegant, dry, sparkling Riesling has notes of crisp green apple, citrus and subtle minerality which dance on your palate with lively effervescence.

name: THE WINEMAKER'S HOUSE - CABERNET SAUVIGNON
tastingDescription: The Winemaker’s House Cabernet Sauvignon is bold and full of plum and dark fruit flavours with a long finish. Pair with tomato pasta dishes or roasted meats and enjoy!

name: THE WINEMAKER'S HOUSE - PINOT GRIGIO
tastingDescription: The Winemaker's House Pinot Grigio has gentle notes of tropical fruits, and a light, refreshing finish. Serve chilled and pair with chicken dishes, cream sauces or salad.

name: THE WINEMAKER'S HOUSE - PINOT GRIGIO
tastingDescription: The Winemaker’s House Pinot Grigio has gentle notes of tropical fruits, and a light, refreshing finish. Serve chilled and pair with chicken dishes, cream sauces or salad.

name: THE WINEMAKER'S HOUSE - ROSE
tastingDescription: The Winemaker's House Rosé has soft spring floral notes with hints of strawberry, melon and cherry.

name: THE WINEMAKER'S HOUSE - SAUVIGNON BLANC
tastingDescription: Our Sauvignon Blanc has aromas of gooseberry and tropical flavours. Served chilled and pair with seared vegetables, white fish or grilled chicken

name: THE WOLFTRAP RED - BOEKENHOUTSKLOOF
tastingDescription: Dark berries, tobacco, baking spices and licorice all show through the relaxed tannins of this wine with a slight black olive note appearing on the finish

name: THIENOT - CUVEE GARANCE BLANC DE ROUGES 06
nameSanitized: thienot - cuvee garance blanc de rouges 06
sort: THIENOT - CUVEE GARANCE BLANC DE ROUGES 06
tastingDescription: 93 Points, Wine Spectator - "Flavors of crème de cassis, red licorice, toasted hazelnut, honey, apricot and smoky mineral are finely knit,focused by vibrant acidity and a lively bead. Accessible now, but this has the structure for cellaring. Drink now through 2026." (November 2013)

name: THRACIAN VALLEY MAVRUD AND RUBIN - EDOARDO MIROGLIO BIO
nameSanitized: thracian valley mavrud and rubin - edoardo miroglio bio
sort: THRACIAN VALLEY MAVRUD AND RUBIN - EDOARDO MIROGLIO BIO
tastingDescription: Bounded by the Black Sea and Greece, Bulgaria’s Thracian Valley is considered to be one of the oldest winemaking regions in the world. A certified organic wine made from indigenous grapes of Mavrud and Rubin. Aromas of cherry and eucalyptus, with flavours of tart cherry, cranberry and pomegranate.

name: TIGNANELLO - ANTINORI
tastingDescription: Tignanello is remarkable on the nose for its complexity of ripe red fruits and delicate spicy aromas of cloves and licorice. On the palate it is rich, mouth-filling and vibrant with supple velvety tannins. Its lengthy finish and persistent aftertaste bring back aromatic notes perceived on the nose.

name: TINHORN CREEK - CABERNET FRANC 2019
tastingDescription: The nose has a dusty cocoa powder note with black cherry, strawberry and rhubarb pie and a delightful pie crust with it. Lots of red currant and rhubarb on the palate, and fine tannins and bright acidity give the tactile profile of a good Chianti, but with new world freshness of red fruits.

name: TINHORN CREEK - GEWURZTRAMINER 2020
tastingDescription: The nose is loaded with tropical fruit, banana, pineapple, papaya and lychee, with the next whiff showing fresh ginger and flowers. Plenty of power here with mandarin flavours with a slight grip in the finish. Will go with salad to Asian to roast ham menus.

name: TINHORN CREEK - MERLOT 2018
tastingDescription: Beautiful, balanced aromas of fresh red berry fruit, preserved cherries and orange rind with clove. Focused flavours of spicy oak and grenadine up front. The mid palate compliments with cherry pie sweetness before finishing with fine tannins that carry the fruit sweetness nicely. It will reward some short/mid-term cellaring.

name: TINHORN CREEK - OLDFIELD SERIES MERLOT 2018
tastingDescription: 93 Points, Wine Scores - "This vintage of the reserve Merlot is a pastiche of plums muddled with black cherry, star anise and mocha, dried roses and botanical, cedar chips and leather. Generous, luxurious and chocolaty, it is mouthfilling and succulent. Great balance and equally chic." (November 2017)

name: TINHORN CREEK - PINOT GRIS 2019
tastingDescription: Aromas of banana and papaya jump out while honey and lemon mingle with pear and honeydew melon. The palate is focused and precise, with refreshing citrus-driven flavours. Tropical fruit in the mid-palate and crisp lingering finish. This wine screams for shellfish.

name: TINHORN CREEK - PINOT NOIR 2019
tastingDescription: A customer favourite, 2018 is shy on this grape from Tinhorn but enough for a November taste. Deep in colour, rich in flavor, the Pinot Noir texture and red fruits show here very well. Try with tuna steaks, slow cooked recipes or tangine recipes.

name: TINHORN CREEK - THE CREEK 2018
tastingDescription: Beautiful garnet red colour showing barrel ageing to perfection, with a youthful appearance. Nose opens with chocolate and black currant, cassis liquor, and blueberry pie.  e wine has wonderful balance of power and elegance, with layers of chocolate and fresh red and black fruits.

name: TINTORETTO - PROSECCO ROSE EXTRA DRY
tastingDescription: 92 Points, Luca Maroni: "A bright pinky colour with a delicate floral and aromatic bouquet with hints of strawberries, lemons and savoury notes and a fresh smooth finish."

name: TISSOT MAIRE - CREMANT DU JURA MILLESIME 2015
nameSanitized: tissot maire - cremant du jura millesime 2015
sort: TISSOT MAIRE - CREMANT DU JURA MILLESIME 2015
tastingDescription: Only exceptional years used to produced this cuvee. Rich and complex, aged for 36 months on laths for refined fruit aromas which melt in delicious nutty notes.

name: TOKAJ - DISZNOKO 5 PUTTONYOS
tastingDescription: False

name: TOKAJ FURMINT - SAMUEL TINON BIRTOK DRY 2014
nameSanitized: tokaj furmint - samuel tinon birtok dry 2014
sort: TOKAJ FURMINT - SAMUEL TINON BIRTOK DRY 2014
tastingDescription: The fruit is ripe, the acids are high and there’s plenty of structure to create a pungent balance. It’s like taking the weight and creamy texture of Chenin Blanc and the acidic edge and stony fruit of Riesling and mashing them together with smoke and salt.

name: TOKAJ SZAMORODNI  - SAMUEL TINON DRY 2008
tastingDescription: Distinct vin jaune/amontillado sherry aromas of toffee, salted butter, green almond, hazelnut and medicinal herbs. Very ripe, yeasty and sherry-like in the mouth, with ripe acidity giving this wine a fascinating light touch. The very long finish features strong nut and white raisin notes and surprising floral lift. This would make a lovely aperitif.

name: TOKAJI ASZU 5 PUTTONYOS - CHATEAU DERESZLA 2016
tastingDescription: 96 Points - Gold Medal, Decanter World Wine Awards 2020: "Pale gold in colour, yet rich with complex sweet flavour, Dereszla's Tokaji Aszu shows vibrant aromas of caramel and floral notes. The palate is smooth with intense honey, nuts, apricots, marmalade, mango and papaya leading into a perfectly balanced, spicy finish. Pair it with blue cheese drizzled with honey and walnuts or chocolate dessert. "

name: TOKAJI ASZU 6 PUTTONYOS - CHATEAU DERESZLA 2010
tastingDescription: 95 Points, Wine Spectator - "This tightly wound and focused sweetie offers intense acidity harnessing layers of apricot coulis, golden raisin, mango and passion fruit puree. It's all about the fruit now, with grace notes of spice and chalk accenting the finish. This should develop nicely over time. Drink now through 2035." (February 2012)

name: TOKAJI ASZU 6 PUTTONYOS - ROYAL TOKAJI 2014
tastingDescription: False

name: TOKAJI FURMINT DRY - CHATEAU DERESZLA 2019
tastingDescription: A dry and fragrant white, this wine is made from Furmint, the same variety that yields Dereszla's Tokaji Aszu. The nose is very aromatic with a refreshing and structured palate of juicy pear, spicy apricot and lovely minerality. Enjoy this with grilled fish, fresh salads or as a patio sipper.

name: TOKAJI MUSCAT LATE HARVEST - TOKAJI KERESKEDOHAZ 2016
nameSanitized: tokaji muscat late harvest - tokaji kereskedohaz 2016
sort: TOKAJI MUSCAT LATE HARVEST - TOKAJI KERESKEDOHAZ 2016
tastingDescription: False

name: TORO - TERRA D'URO FINCA LA RANA 2012
nameSanitized: toro - terra duro finca la rana 2012
sort: TORO - TERRA D'URO FINCA LA RANA 2012
tastingDescription: The delicate yet complex bouquet displays a struck match, yeasty brioche character with a fresh and vibrant palate of citrus and cashew with a clean finish of great length.

name: TORRES - SANTA DIGNA ESTELADO ROSE 2018
tastingDescription: 90 Points, James Suckling - "Delightful sparkling rose, made from pais, offering pretty red berries, nectarines and flower petals. Light, simple and crisp on the palate. Goes well with light dishes. Drink now." (April, 2020)

name: TORRONTES - FINCA LOS PRIMOS
tastingDescription: Aromas of white flowers, peach and grapefruit, with fresh citrus on the palate. Pair with light meats and spicy foods.

name: TORRONTES - MICHEL TORINO CUMA ORGANIC
tastingDescription: "The appeal of this Argentine white grape is the tropical spicy flavours applied to a softer palate feel. It sort of curls up with a nice linger to enjoy. Serve with spicy fare, tandoori chicken or starter salad courses." - Stephen Schiedel, Category Manager for Wines of Canada, USA & South America

name: TOSCANA - ANTINORI SOLAIA 2011 3L
tastingDescription: On the palate, the ripe red fruit and the spices, along with deep and floral notes, define the wine’s complex structure. The palate is succulent, rich, enveloping, and sweet thanks to the presence of dense, supple, and rounded tannins. 96 points- James Suckling, 94 points- Wine Enthusiast.

name: TOSCANA - ANTINORI TIGNANELLO 2018
tastingDescription:
93 Decanter, 95 Vinous, 96 James Suckling, 96 Wine Advocate; Made by Marchesi Antinori, one of Italy's most important producers, Tig has given many a connoisseur that aha! moment: Experiencing the body, structure and finish of a truly fine wine.
6 Bottle limit.

name: TOSCANA - ANTINORI TIGNANELLO 2018
tastingDescription: Tignanello 2017 is remarkable on the nose for its complexity of ripe red fruits and delicate spicy aromas of cloves and licorice. On the palate it is rich, mouth-filling and vibrant with supple velvety tannins. Its lengthy finish and persistent aftertaste bring back aromatic notes perceived on the nose.

name: TOSCANA - ANTINORI VILLA ANTINORI 2018
tastingDescription: 91 Points, James Suckling: "A bright, vivid red with blackberries, blueberries and some violets and spices. Medium body, ultra fine tannins and a delicious finish. Succulent and very clean. A blend of sangiovese, syrah, merlot and cabernet franc. Drink now" (April 2021)

name: TOSCANA - ARGIANO NON CONFUNDITOR 2018
tastingDescription: 93 Points, James Suckling - "The ripe berries with delicate chocolate and hazelnut undertones are very attractive, as are the dusty tannins and herbal, berry and light tobacco undertones at the finish." (August 2020)

name: TOSCANA - BANFI SUMMUS 2014
tastingDescription: 92 Points, Wine Spectator: “Black currant, cedar, iron and sage notes prevail in this dense, powerful red. Retains a sense of elegance, finishing long, with echoes of fruit, herbs and spice. Everything is in the right place. Sangiovese, Cabernet Sauvignon and Syrah. Best from 2022 through 2038.” (October 2018)

name: TOSCANA - BIBI GRAETZ TESTAMATTA 2018
tastingDescription:
Finely textured, with a nuanced perfume that fills the glass and takes you to the intense underbrush of Tuscany. Succulent and yet savoury, this has a lilting freshness that is overlaid with ripe berry fruits, sage and white pepper spice, and clear minerality� This is a great wine, with scope and imagination that doesn't want to let you go�
100 pts, Decanter

name: TOSCANA - DONATELLA CINELLI COLOMBINI IL DRAGO 8 2015
nameSanitized: toscana - donatella cinelli colombini il drago 8 2015
sort: TOSCANA - DONATELLA CINELLI COLOMBINI IL DRAGO 8 2015
tastingDescription: 90 Points, Wine Spectator: “Black cherry, plum, tar and mineral flavors are the hallmarks of this solid yet fresh red. The tannins coat the gums, but this shows balance and fruit. Sangiovese, Merlot and Sagrantino. Best from 2018 through 2023.” (October 2017)

name: TOSCANA - FELSINA FONTALLORO 2016
tastingDescription: 96 Points, Wine Advocate: “Gorgeous and soft, the 2013 Fontalloro is another landmark wine from this classic vintage. There is enormous intensity here and the wine is only at the beginning of its long aging trajectory. There is evident thickness and generosity here... Drink: 2018 - 2035.” (December 2016)

name: TOSCANA - FRESCOBALDI GIRAMONTE 07/08
tastingDescription: 93 Points, James Suckling: “A balanced and pretty red with currant, plum and spice character. Medium to full body, fine tannins and a fresh finish. Such beauty and balance for the vintage. Blend of merlot and sangivoese. Drink or hold.” (February 2018)

name: TOSCANA - FRESCOBALDI MORMORETO 2016
tastingDescription: 94 Points, James Suckling: “This is a divergence from old Mormoreto style showing a precision and finesse. Full to medium body, fine tannins, fresh acidity and a long and beautiful finish. Racy and so pretty. A blend of cabernet sauvignon, cabernet franc and petit verdot.” (July 2016)

name: TOSCANA - GAJA CAMARCANDA PROMIS 2018
tastingDescription: Opens with floral aromas of wild rose and violet, then it turns into a more earthy bouquet with hints of maritime pine, eucalyptus, roots, wet stones. The palate is fresh and juicy, with notes of red and black fruits - raspberry, wild strawberry, and mulberry. Creamy, smooth tannins.

name: TOSCANA - IL FAUNO DI ARCANUM
tastingDescription: 93 points, Wine Advocate - "A blend of 59% Merlot, 30% Cabernet Franc, 9% Cabernet Sauvignon and 2% Petit Verdot. This wine offers terrific value, especially to those who prize soft richness and concentration in their blended Tuscan reds. This beautiful, medium to full-bodied wine would pair seamlessly with grilled or roasted meats."

name: TOSCANA - ISOLE E OLENA CEPPARELLO 2017
tastingDescription: 97 Points, vinous.com "...the 2017 is positively stellar from the very first taste. Succulent dark cherry, plum, licorice, spice, menthol and coffee all open up with a bit of air. Here, too, Paolo De Marchi has done a tremendous job in preserving freshness in the wine. Drink 2025-2042" (Sept 2020)

name: TOSCANA - LUCE DELLA VITE 2016
tastingDescription: A ripe but suggestive nose of dark cherries, dark chocolate, hot stones, cassis, brambleberry pie and bark. On the palate, the sleek tannins carry fresh layers of forest fruit through to a compact, full-bodied palate. Powerful acidity steers it through a balanced finish.

name: TOSCANA - LUCE DELLE VITE LUCENTE 2017
tastingDescription: 93 Points, James Suckling: “This has delicious undertones of sage and thyme that highlight ripe yet refined notes of strawberries, red cherries and darker blackcurrants. Full body, a dense, generous texture and a polished finish. Needs time. Drink in 2019.” (August 2017)

name: TOSCANA - MATAROCCHIO
tastingDescription: Matarocchio shows a great aromatic complexity with notes of dark berry fruit which alternate with sensations of powdered chocolate, exotic spices, and toasted coffee. The palate is an enveloping one, rich, one of excellent tension and of long persistence on the finish and aftertaste.

name: TOSCANA - MAZZEI SIEPI 2016
tastingDescription: Monumentally built, with crispy notes of elder, plum, berries, sandalwood, tobacco, with a very long, bright finish.  Pairs well with flavourful, textured dishes, dark sauces, game and blue cheeses.

name: TOSCANA - MONTE ANTICO
tastingDescription: This wine is 85% Sangiovese with 10% Cabernet Sauvignon and 5% Merlot. Dark ruby in colour, its bouquet of leather, earth, herbs, black cherries, licorice and plums is confirmed on the medium- to full-bodied palate. Round, spicy, elegant, attractively fruity and extremely versatile - in other words food-friendly and pocket-friendly!

name: TOSCANA - MONTE ANTICO
tastingDescription: This wine is 85% Sangiovese with 10% Cabernet Sauvignon and 5% Merlot. Dark ruby in colour, its bouquet of leather, earth, herbs, black cherries, licorice and plums is confirmed on the medium- to full-bodied palate. Round, spicy, elegant, attractively fruity and extremely versatile - in other words food-friendly and pocket-friendly!

name: TOSCANA - ORNELLAIA LE VOLTE 2018
tastingDescription: Le Volte dell'Ornellaia is a fine wine for spontaneous wine lovers and needs no ceremony. The wine was aged for 10 months, partly in barrique used for Ornellaia and partly in cement tanks, to obtain the perfect balance between tannic structure and an expression of fresh fruit.

name: TOSCANA - PILUKA PINOT BIANCO 2018
tastingDescription: Elegant wine with a lively acidity and a fresh finish. Fruity, characteristic Golden apple aromas, hazelnut notes, pleasant freshness. The sapidity balances the sensations of warmth and softness. Hight persistence.

name: TOSCANA - ROCCA DELLE MACIE ROCCATO 2012
tastingDescription: 92 points, James Suckling “A red with tension and crisp citrus tension and intensity. Full body, firm tannins and a tangy and bright finish. Lively and structured red here. A blend of Sangiovese and Cabernet Sauvignon. Drink or hold.” (August 5, 2015).

name: TOSCANA - RUFFINO IL DUCALE 2018
tastingDescription: Dark ruby in colour, this wine is made predominately of Sangiovese, with a touch of Merlot and Syrah. The flavour is rich with aromas of dark plum, black cherry, spice and notes of cassis and chocolate. On the palate, it is well-balanced with pleasant acidity, fruit intensity and round tannins. It's a delightfully modern Tuscan wine.

name: TOSCANA - RUFFINO MODUS 2008
tastingDescription: Ruby�red�in�color�with�garnet�hues,�this�well-structured�wine�has�hints�of�sweet�tobacco�and�spice�lead to�inviting�aromas�of cherries,�blackberries�and�plums. This full-bodied�wine�is�rich�with�refined,�silky�tannins and a long finish of�mint,�chocolate�and�red�berry�essences.��50%�Sangiovese, 25% Cabernet Sauvignon, 25% Merlot�

name: TOSCANA - RUFFINO MODUS 2017
tastingDescription: Full-bodied and harmonious with modern Super Tuscan finesse and style, this wine is rich with soft tannins and flavors of mature blackberry fruit that lead to a persistent finish.

name: TOSCANA - SAN FABIANO CALCINAIA CASA BOSCHINO ORGANIC 2016
nameSanitized: toscana - san fabiano calcinaia casa boschino organic 2016
nameSuffix: SAN FABIANO CALCINAIA CASA BOSCHINO ORGANIC 2016
sort: TOSCANA - SAN FABIANO CALCINAIA CASA BOSCHINO ORGANIC 2016
tastingDescription: This Tuscan red is a blend of Sangiovese, Cabernet Sauvignon and Merlot from organically and sustainably farmed vineyards. It expresses aromas of blackberries, violets licorice and spice. The palate is full bodied with ripe black fruit and persistent tannins. Pair with tomato based pasta, grilled red meats, pizza or medium cheeses.

name: TOSCANA - SAN GUIDO GUIDALBERTO 2018
tastingDescription: 94+ Points, Wine Advocate: “This wine is showing exceptionally well in this classic vintage. The 2016 Guidalberto (Cabernet Sauvignon and a smaller percentage of Merlot) opens to a full and generous bouquet... This may well be the best vintage of Guidalberto I have yet to taste—and you can get this wine at a great price too. Drink: 2019 - 2030.” (February 2018)

name: TOSCANA - SETTE PONTI CROGNOLO 2017
tastingDescription: 95 Points, James Suckling: “Aromas of rosewood, cherries and blueberries follow through to a full body, tight and focused tannins and a long and flavorful finish. This is linear and bright. The tannins are wonderfully polished and poised. Hard not to drink now, but it will improve beautifully in the bottle. A blend of mostly sangiovese with a touch of merlot.” (July 2018)

name: TOSCANA - SETTE PONTI ORENO 2018
tastingDescription: 98 Points, James Suckling: “Plenty of blackcurrant, blackberry and dark chocolate character with oyster shell and walnut undertones. Full body, extremely tight and structured with blueberry and light vanilla and coffee highlights. A gorgeous Oreno. Give this wine two or three years to come together.” (July 2017)

name: TOSCANA - TENUTA FANTI POGGIO TORTO
tastingDescription: 92 Points, James Suckling: "Plenty of blackberries and burnt orange peel with some thyme and sage. Medium to full body, light tannins and a fresh finish with good acidity."

name: TOSCANA - TOMMASI POGGIO AL TUFO ROMPICOLLO 2017
nameSanitized: toscana - tommasi poggio al tufo rompicollo 2017
sort: TOSCANA - TOMMASI POGGIO AL TUFO ROMPICOLLO 2017
tastingDescription: 92 Points, James Suckling: “A bright and fruity wine with sweet berry and lemon character, medium body and a fresh finish. Always a delicious bottle with cabernet and sangiovese. Drink now.” (August 2017)

name: TOSCANA CABERNET FRANC - POGGIO ARGENTIERA POGGIO RASO 2018
nameSanitized: toscana cabernet franc - poggio argentiera poggio raso 2018
sort: TOSCANA CABERNET FRANC - POGGIO ARGENTIERA POGGIO RASO 2018
tastingDescription: 99 Points, Luca Maroni: Lots of crushed-berry, cherry and fresh-herb character here. It's full-bodied with chewy tannins and a long, flavorful finish. It's very young now and needs a couple of years to come together. Try after 2022.

name: TOSHIMORI SHUZO - BIZEN JUNMAI GINJO PREMIUM SAKE
nameSanitized: toshimori shuzo - bizen junmai ginjo premium sake
sort: TOSHIMORI SHUZO - BIZEN JUNMAI GINJO PREMIUM SAKE
tastingDescription: A well crafted-sake from Toshimori brewery from Okayama, Japan, this delicate Junmai Ginjo has a floral tone with a hint of anise. It is soft and silky on the palate with a long, lasting finish. Pair with fish or chicken with cream sauce. Vegan pizza is also another option to try.

name: TOURAINE - HENRY MARIONNET RENAISSANCE GAMAY
tastingDescription: Organic, no added sulfite, unfiltered. Crafted from ungrafted gamay vines, this natural wine diplays a nose of spices (cinnamon, cloves), flowers (violet, rose) and ripe red fruit. Lively, fleshy and fruity with a moderate tannic structure, this cuvée is a pure expression of gamay. A wine for friends to enjoy in its youth with charcuterie, grilled white meat/tuna fish.

name: TOURAINE AMBOISE - LA GRANGE TIPHAINE COT VIEILLES VIGNES 18
nameSanitized: touraine amboise - la grange tiphaine cot vieilles vignes 18
nameSuffix: LA GRANGE TIPHAINE COT VIEILLES VIGNES 18
sort: TOURAINE AMBOISE - LA GRANGE TIPHAINE COT VIEILLES VIGNES 18
tastingDescription: Biodynamic. This  Malbec (locally called Cot in Loire) displays an intense nose of black fruit, herbal undertones, graphite notes and hint of smokiness. This shows elegance and explosive aromatics with a core of sweet cassis, a sappy old-vine intensity and chewy rich texture, with a perfect balance between the acidity and the soft tannins. This wine should be open a least a couple of hours or decanted prior enjoying it.

name: TOURAINE CHENONCEAUX - DOMAINE DE LA CHAISE 2018
nameSanitized: touraine chenonceaux - domaine de la chaise 2018
sort: TOURAINE CHENONCEAUX - DOMAINE DE LA CHAISE 2018
tastingDescription: From the Davault family's best plots along the sunny ridges above the river Cher, around the most iconic Loire Chateaux of the same name, Chenonceaux. A rare treat, this elite CRU of Touraine Sauvignon is perfumed with white flowers, richly textured and full bodied with notes of citrus and exotic fruit.

name: TREBBIANO CHARDONNAY RUBICONE - DONINI
tastingDescription: An Italian table wine with a fresh, fragrant, lingering bouquet and a palate revealing a dry, fruity flavour. Enjoy with fish, salads and light pastas.

name: TREBBIANO D'ABRUZZO - TIBERIO 2019
tastingDescription: 91 Points, Eric Guido, Vinous. "The 2020 Trebbiano d'Abruzzo lifts up, more savory than sweet and decidedly floral. Dusty dried flowers and incense give way to hints of crushed raw almonds. Its round textures find balance, as a wave of brisk acids and mineral-tinged orchard fruits cascade across the palate. A gentle tug of citrus and hints of peach linger. The 2020 is a remarkably pretty and lifted vintage for Tiberio's Trebbiano." (April 2021)

name: TREBBIANO RUBICONE - GIACONDI
tastingDescription: Brilliant straw yellow colour. Very pleasant with intriguing notes of white flowers on the nose and a refreshingly dry palate.

name: TRENTINO PINOT GRIGIO - MEZZACORONA
tastingDescription: The flavour of Italian Pinot Grigio is both refreshing and extremely complementary to all kinds of cuisine. Hints of apple, yellow plum and citrus combine with youthful qualities that make for a refreshing taste. An excellent partner to seafood, poached salmon and grilled poultry.

name: TREVERI CELLARS - BLANC DE BLANC BRUT ZERO COLUMBIA VALLEY
nameSanitized: treveri cellars - blanc de blanc brut zero columbia valley
nameSuffix: BLANC DE BLANC BRUT ZERO COLUMBIA VALLEY
sort: TREVERI CELLARS - BLANC DE BLANC BRUT ZERO COLUMBIA VALLEY
tastingDescription: Treveri Cellars is a family-owned sparkling wine estate located in Yakima Valley, Washington State. Their Blanc de Blanc Brut Zero is fruit-forward and stunning, showcasing the true aspects of sparkling wine with zero-dosage. This completely dry bubble expresses hints of apple, citrus, melon and complex yeast tones with a creamy finish.

name: TRUMPETER - ROSE DE MALBEC EXTRA BRUT
nameSanitized: trumpeter - rose de malbec extra brut
sort: TRUMPETER - ROSE DE MALBEC EXTRA BRUT
tastingDescription: Salmon pink with coral reflections. Bubbles are fine and continuous from the initial pour. Ripe red fruit notes such as cherry and strawberry combine with baked quince and toast. The complexity persists through a fresh and mellow finish.

name: TSANTALI BLANC - TSANTALI
tastingDescription: False

name: TSANTALI ROUGE - TSANTALI
tastingDescription: This Greek table wine is bright red in colour with a pleasant, fruity aroma. Hints of blackcurrants, licorice and soft tannins characterize this well-made, affordable red. Pair with Mediterranean food.

name: TWIST OF FATE - MALBEC MERLOT
tastingDescription: This intriguing wine is a rich blend of Malbec and Merlot. With aromas of blackberry and plum, every bottle is well balanced and has a long, smooth finish.

name: TWIST OF FATE - PINOT GRIGIO CHARDONNAY
nameSanitized: twist of fate - pinot grigio chardonnay
sort: TWIST OF FATE - PINOT GRIGIO CHARDONNAY
tastingDescription: This intriguing wine is a wonderful blend of Pinot Grigio and Chardonnay. Crisp and fresh, every bottle expresses aromas of citrus fruit and pear and has a long, refreshing finish.

name: UNDURRAGA - SPARKLING ROSE ROYALVALLE DE LEYDA
nameSanitized: undurraga - sparkling rose royalvalle de leyda
sort: UNDURRAGA - SPARKLING ROSE ROYALVALLE DE LEYDA
tastingDescription: 95 Points, Decanter World Wine Awards - "Beautiful summer fruit and red apple nose. The palate is fruit-forward, juicy and elegant with refreshing acidity, a crisp mousse and a long, red cherry finish. Really well put together, expressive, joyful and cultured."

name: UNSWORTH VINEYARDS - CHARME DE L'ILE ROSE
nameSanitized: unsworth vineyards - charme de lile rose
sort: UNSWORTH VINEYARDS - CHARME DE L'ILE ROSE
tastingDescription: Cowichan Valley Pinot Noir is used to create a vibrant, balanced sparkling wine with distinctive terroir expression. Salmon in colour with bright, raspberry, strawberry and rhubarb notes. Dry with beautiful balance and a fine, persistent mousse.

name: UNSWORTH VINEYARDS - PINOT GRIS 2020
tastingDescription: Bright, fresh pear, green apple and citrus with delicate notes of fennel and herbs with distinctively pronounced Vancouver Island minerality. The wine was whole cluster pressed and fermented in 90% stainless steel and 10% neutral barriques.

name: VACQUEYRAS - MEFFRE DOMAINE DE LONGUE TOQUE 2017
nameSanitized: vacqueyras - meffre domaine de longue toque 2017
sort: VACQUEYRAS - MEFFRE DOMAINE DE LONGUE TOQUE 2017
tastingDescription: 90-92 Points, Wine Advocate: "The inky colored 2015 Vacqueyras is a more Syrah-dominated blend that includes 40% Grenache. It’s destemmed and brought up all in concrete tanks. Spice, peppery herbs, creamy licorice and ample dark fruits emerge from this medium to full-bodied, ripe, beautifully textured Vacqueyras that will drink nicely through 2025." (December 2016)

name: VALAIS SYRAH - CAVE SAINT PIERRE 2016
tastingDescription: Black fruits, sweet spices and some minerality. On the palate, this wine is complex with plum, blackberry, clove and oak supported by integrated acidity and tannins.

name: VALDADIGE PINOT GRIGIO - SANTA MARGHERITA 2018
tastingDescription: This Pinot Grigio is cool, crisp and refreshing with green apple and lemon carrying the flavour from start to finish

name: VALDARNO DI SOPRA - IL BORRIGIANO IL BORRO 2018
nameSanitized: valdarno di sopra - il borrigiano il borro 2018
sort: VALDARNO DI SOPRA - IL BORRIGIANO IL BORRO 2018
tastingDescription: 92  Points, Robert Parker Wine Advocate - "The 2018 Valdarno di Sopra Borrigiano is a blend of Merlot, Sangiovese and Syrah that sees a brief period of cold maceration followed by ten months of aging in large oak casks. The aim here is to keep the freshness of the fruit intact, and this goal has been readily achieved. The bouquet opens to forest berry aromas with raw plum and fresh prune. This is a terrific wine with a confident, pure and easy-drinking appeal that is nothing short of charming." (August, 2019)

name: VALDEORRAS GODELLO - ALBAMAR-CEIBO
tastingDescription: The wine is harmonious and clean, varietal, a little shy at first and with a balsamic nose with notes of herbs, bay leaf, white flowers and pollen. The palate is round, showing the generosity the variety is able to do, velvety and lush, without excess. It

name: VALDEPENAS GRAN RESERVA - ANCIANO AGED 10 YEARS OLD
nameSanitized: valdepenas gran reserva - anciano aged 10 years old
sort: VALDEPENAS GRAN RESERVA - ANCIANO AGED 10 YEARS OLD
tastingDescription: Dark ruby, mellowing to brick red at the edges, this wine is developed and complex with aromas of fresh black cherries, pepper, vanilla, tobacco, leather and caramel. On the palate you’ll find intense flavours of ripe fruit compote and liquorice, well-integrated oak, balanced tannins and a long, velvety finish.

name: VALDEPENAS GRAN RESERVA - ANCIANO AGED 7 YEARS OLD
nameSanitized: valdepenas gran reserva - anciano aged 7 years old
sort: VALDEPENAS GRAN RESERVA - ANCIANO AGED 7 YEARS OLD
tastingDescription: By law, Gran Reserva wines must be aged for a minimum of five years before release. Anciano shows this time spent in the cellar. An alluring red wine with luscious notes of black plum and vanilla. Rich mulled fruit flavours partner with a soft structure in this fuller-bodied red.

name: VALDEPENAS RESERVA - ANCIANO AGED 7 YEARS 2010
tastingDescription: Bright ruby red, mellowing to brick red at the edges. Aromas of fresh red fruit, prunes and cherries accompanied by notes of coffee, vanilla, tobacco and caramel. In a classic Reserva style, the wine is well rounded with warm, generous and well-integrated oak, balanced tannins and a long, intense finish. Perfect with hearty casseroles, grilled red meat, and mature cheeses. Enjoy now, or cellar for up to 2 years.

name: VALDO - VALDOBBIADENE PROSECCO SUPERIORE MARCA ORO EXTRA DRY
nameSanitized: valdo - valdobbiadene prosecco superiore marca oro extra dry
nameSuffix: VALDOBBIADENE PROSECCO SUPERIORE MARCA ORO EXTRA DRY
sort: VALDO - VALDOBBIADENE PROSECCO SUPERIORE MARCA ORO EXTRA DRY
tastingDescription: Valdo is a smooth and creamy Prosecco with a delicate bouquet of spring blossoms and hints of peach leading to a bright and fruity finish.

name: VALLE D'AOSTA - CHARRERE LES CRETES TORRETTE 2016
nameSanitized: valle daosta - charrere les cretes torrette 2016
sort: VALLE D'AOSTA - CHARRERE LES CRETES TORRETTE 2016
tastingDescription: 93 Points, James Suckling: “Love the aromas of blue fruit and slate that follow through to the medium body, integrated tannins and a tar and mineral aftertaste. Some black tea. Drink now.” (August 2018)

name: VALPOLICELLA - NOVAIA ORGANIC 2018
tastingDescription: 91 Points, Daenna Van Mulligen - "This organic classic Valpolicella delivers fresh cherries and baking spices, licorice, wet stone, balsamic and faint mocha aromas. Primarily polished, it still has some textural grip and cherry and licorice flavours mimic

name: VALPOLICELLA CLASSICO - BOLLA
tastingDescription: From the foothills surrounding romantic Verona in northeastern Italy, this classic blend of Corvina, Corvinone and Rondinella grapes wafts dusty cherry and oak in a lean, lip-smacking style capable of unleashing your inner Romeo or Juliet. Raspberry and black cherry are complimented by black pepper, cedar, licorice and walnuts in this classic Valpolicella. Rich, black-cherry flavours with notes of spice are followed by a pleasant finish.

name: VALPOLICELLA CLASSICO - MASI BONACOSTA
tastingDescription: Made in the historical heart of the Valpolicella region, this wine is a blend of three indigenous Italian grapes, namely Corvina, Rondinella and Molinara. Freshness on the palate, with good supporting acidity and excellent balance marked by soft and silky tannins. Dry and refreshing, this mild wine makes a great pairing with rich dishes.

name: VALPOLICELLA CLASSICO SUPERIORE RIPASSO - FOLONARI 2017
tastingDescription: Light to medium ruby colour; intense spicy bouquet , dried black fruits and rich ripe cherry flavours; dry, full bodied, smooth, raisin, ripe cherry and well balanced; rich, dry finish

name: VALPOLICELLA RIPASSO - TOMMASI 2017
tastingDescription: 93 Points, James Suckling: "Dried redcurrants and strawberries meet fragrant tea leaves and mooncake character. Medium body with a beautiful sweet-and-sour character and a tangy finish with a touch of dried fruit. Drink now." (November, 2019)

name: VALPOLICELLA SUPERIORE - TEDESCHI MATERNIGO 2015
tastingDescription: 90 Points, Wine Spectator: “Fig cake and dried sage notes underscore wild cherry, orange zest and smoky mineral flavors in this well-balanced, chewy, medium-bodied red. Enjoy this with salumi. Drink now through 2023.” (2018)

name: VALPOLICELLA SUPERIORE RIPASSO - MUSELLA 2016
tastingDescription: “Refermenting this wine on the skins of the powerful Amarone grapes gives it a spicy, savory and irresistable quality. Try with hard cheese and salami.” - Barbara Philip MW, Category Manager for Wines of Europe, Sparkling & Fortified

name: VAPORETTO - PROSECCO BRUT NO 8
tastingDescription: 90 Points, Wine Align - "This prosecco has a fruity, floral aroma that is fresh and pleasant. The palate is elegant, slightly soft with a fruity aftertaste and subtle floral persistence. Great as an aperitif, but also pairs perfectly with delicate dishes."

name: VARIAS - CAVA GENUI BRUT NATURE
tastingDescription: 91 Points, WineScores.ca - "Brut Nature means it is a completely, naturally dry sparkling, in this case made with the three classic varieties, Macabeo, Parellada and Xarel-lo. A golden hue, it has toasted almond croissant, melon and grilled lemons and honey and almond aromas that morph into a palate that is an echo of the nose. Good overall complexity, a fine bead, balanced and extra dry with citrus and mineral on the finish." (November 2019)

name: VAROIS EN PROVENCE ROSE - DOM ST FERREOL LES VAUNIERES 2020
nameSanitized: varois en provence rose - dom st ferreol les vaunieres 2020
sort: VAROIS EN PROVENCE ROSE - DOM ST FERREOL LES VAUNIERES 2020
tastingDescription: Traditional vinification at low temperature allows optimal extraction of aromas creating an intense nose of red fruits (wild strawberries and raspberry) and citrus (orange) wrapped in a classic pastel pink colour. All with a soft mouth feel offering freshness and aromatic persistence in the spirited soul of this dry rosé with tangy flavours of white currants. Presented in a satin finish bottle.

name: VAROIS EN PROVENCE ROSE - L'OPALINE 2020
tastingDescription: Light pink with a refined and elegant nose that reveals subtle notes of citrus fruit. A beautiful, crisp and harmonious mouthfeel, with some roundness and texture. Finishes off with an aromatic persistence.

name: VENETO - CANTINI DI VERONA CHIARRETO BARDOLINO

name: VENETO APPASSIMENTO - TOMMASI ARELE 2017
tastingDescription: 91 Points, James Suckling: “Ripe strawberries combine with black fruit such blackberries as well as brambles and fresh herbs and hints of coffee beans. Medium to full body, juicy tannins and a pretty finish. Drink now and enjoy.” (October 2017)

name: VENETO CABERNET - SAN OSVALDO MONTELVINI IGT
nameSanitized: veneto cabernet - san osvaldo montelvini igt

tastingDescription: "92 points, Wine Orbit “It’s elegantly fruited and delicately lifted on the nose showing fresh pear, crunchy apple, citrus and floral characters with a subtle savoury nuance. The palate is equally appealing with lovely weight and youthful fruit intensity, backed by crisp acidity, leading to a lingering mouth-watering finish.” January 2020"

name: VENEZIE PINOT GRIGIO - L'ORA
tastingDescription: Aromas of apricots, golden apples and guava are layered with a dollop of honey, spring blossoms and a fresh mountain stream mineral note. The palate is pristine with excellent fruit expression and is underscored by juicy lemony flavours, which are rounded out with intrinsic forest floor and smoky flavours.

name: VENTOUX - LA VIEILLE FERME
tastingDescription: Authentic, sincere and easy-going, this is a true wine of pleasure. Opulent on the nose, it develops notes of red and black fruit (blackberry, blackcurrant) and spices. On the palate, it is fruity and velvety. Balanced, crunchy, with silky tannins, and finishes with a beautiful aromatic persistence.

name: VENTOUX - LA VIEILLE FERME
tastingDescription: Authentic, sincere and easy-going, this is a true wine of pleasure. Opulent on the nose, it develops notes of red and black fruit (blackberry, blackcurrant) and spices. On the palate, it is fruity and velvety. Balanced, crunchy, with silky tannins, and finishes with a beautiful aromatic persistence.

name: VENTOUX ROSE - LA VIEILLE FERME
tastingDescription: Fresh and very aromatic nose, this wine has a delicate bouquet with notes of red fruit, flowers and citrus fruit. Nice balance between sweetness and acidity in the mouth. There are notes of fresh fruit, and great length.

name: VENTOUX ROSE - LA VIEILLE FERME
tastingDescription: Fresh and very aromatic nose, this wine has a delicate bouquet with notes of red fruit, flowers and citrus fruit. Nice balance between sweetness and acidity in the mouth. There are notes of fresh fruit, and great length.

name: VERDEJO - MATCHBOOK TINTO REY DUNNIGAN HILLS 2018
nameSanitized: verdejo - matchbook tinto rey dunnigan hills 2018
sort: VERDEJO - MATCHBOOK TINTO REY DUNNIGAN HILLS 2018

name: VERDICCHIO CLASS SUPERIORE - UMANI RONCHI CASAL SERRA 17

The juicy, medium-bodied palate has good weight and concentration, offering tangerine, ripe pear, bitter almond and a hint of banana. Bright acidity offsets the rich flavors while a ginger note closes the finish." (July 2016)

name: VERDICCHIO CLASSICO RISERVA - BUCCI VILLA BUCCI 2017
nameSanitized: verdicchio classico riserva - bucci villa bucci 2017
sort: VERDICCHIO CLASSICO RISERVA - BUCCI VILLA BUCCI 2017
tastingDescription: 95 Points, Wine Enthusiast - "Finesse abounds on this radiant wine, starting with alluring scents of Spanish broom, aromatic herb, citrus and a delicate whiff of beeswax. On the elegantly structured palate, a mineral vein underscores crisp apple, pear, lemon zest and white almond. Vibrant acidity provides the backbone. Drink 2018 through 2028." (July 2016)

name: VERDICCHIO CLASSICO SUPERIORE - MUSONE INCAUTO 2018
tastingDescription: 90 Points, winescores.ca - "Singular, slick, organic.Incauto is a singular organic wine with bold lemony notes woven with mineral, green almonds, crunchy tree fruits and dusty wildflowers. It has an oily texture and slightly oxidative character with flavours of candle wax and lanolin, marmalade and matcha. The finish is long and slick."

name: VERDICCHIO CLASSICO SUPERIORE - MUSONE VIA CONDOTTO 2019
nameSanitized: verdicchio classico superiore - musone via condotto 2019
sort: VERDICCHIO CLASSICO SUPERIORE - MUSONE VIA CONDOTTO 2019
tastingDescription: 90 Points, winescores.ca. Tangy, slick, focused. A gastronomic wine, straw in colour, with green almonds, wild grasses, pomelo and crunchy white fruits, fresh mountain stream and dried flowers notes. The palate is tangy and slick with weight; creamy lemony and oyster shell flavours lead to a focused and mouthwatering finish.

name: VERDICCHIO CLASSICO SUPERIORE - SARTARELLI TRALIVIO 2018
tastingDescription: 91 Points, Vinous - "I have always found the Verdicchio dei Castelli di Jesi Tralivio of Sartarelli to be the most minerally intense and energetic of their portfolio, and the 2018 is no different...It's medium in body with a luxurious oily-like texture, hosting flavors of honeydew and kiwi, with a twang of zesty acids and sour apple that keep the mouth watering through the close." (Sep 2020)

name: VERDICCHIO DEI CASTELLI DI JESI - SARTARELLI CLASSICO
nameSanitized: verdicchio dei castelli di jesi - sartarelli classico
sort: VERDICCHIO DEI CASTELLI DI JESI - SARTARELLI CLASSICO

It is very clinically / classically controlled...yielding a tight, tart white with green apple, Asian pear crunch, green melon rind, green hedge, and a snappy tangerine acidity. Pour this sharp wine with starters or raw fish." - Gismondi On Wine (Feb. 2020)

name: VERMENTINO DI SARDEGNA - ARGIOLAS COSTAMOLINO 2018
tastingDescription: Straw yellow with light green tinges. Subtle, intense and delicate, with good primary and secondary aromas. Fresh and dry, sapid, with pleasant delicate and fine feel.

name: VERONESE CORVINA - ALLEGRINI LA POJA 2013
tastingDescription: 94 points, James Sucking: “A juicy and round-textured red with plum and chocolate character. Full-bodied yet tense and focused. Always delicious. Why wait? Drink or hold.” (June 16, 2019)

name: VEUVE CLICQUOT - BRUT
tastingDescription: 90 Points, Wine Spectator: "This fresh and balanced Champagne is lightly toasty, with snappy acidity and a lively, creamy mousse carrying flavors of white cherry, pickled ginger and Marcona almond. Offers saline-laced minerality" (November 2019)

name: VEUVE CLICQUOT - BRUT
tastingDescription: 90 Points, Wine Spectator: "This fresh and balanced Champagne is lightly toasty, with snappy acidity and a lively, creamy mousse carrying flavors of white cherry, pickled ginger and Marcona almond. Offers saline-laced minerality" (November 2019)

name: VEUVE CLICQUOT - BRUT
tastingDescription: 91 Points, Wine Spectator - "A well-cut and lacy Champagne in an elegant, aperitif style, with hints of chalk and graphite underscoring the lively Honeycrisp apple, cherry and lemon curd flavors. Offers a sleek, minerally finish. Drink now through 2021." (November 2018)

name: VEUVE CLICQUOT - BRUT
tastingDescription: 91 Points, Wine Spectator - "A well-cut and lacy Champagne in an elegant, aperitif style, with hints of chalk and graphite underscoring the lively Honeycrisp apple, cherry and lemon curd flavors. Offers a sleek, minerally finish. Drink now through 2021." (November 2018)

name: VEUVE CLICQUOT - BRUT
tastingDescription: 91 Points, Wine Spectator - "A well-cut and lacy Champagne in an elegant, aperitif style, with hints of chalk and graphite underscoring the lively Honeycrisp apple, cherry and lemon curd flavors. Offers a sleek, minerally finish. Drink now through 2021." (November 2018)

name: VEUVE CLICQUOT - EXTRA BRUT EXTRA OLD
nameSanitized: veuve clicquot - extra brut extra old
sort: VEUVE CLICQUOT - EXTRA BRUT EXTRA OLD

name: VEUVE CLICQUOT - LA GRANDE DAME 2008
tastingDescription: 94 Points, Wine Advocate - "Very intense and complex on the nose, this is a full-bodied, round, rich and mouth-filling, but also refined prestige cuvée; it reveals a fascinating purity, precision and freshness. The finish is long and complex, and shows a spicy minerality. This comes highly recommended. Drink: 2016 - 2030." (June 2016)

name: VEUVE CLICQUOT - ROSE
tastingDescription: 91 Points, Wine Spectator - "This mouthwatering rosé Champagne shows textural density, sitting like raw silk on the palate and offering flavors of dried white cherry, grapefruit granita and ground ginger, with a light and lingering toast note. Drink now." (November 2018)

name: VEUVE CLICQUOT - VINTAGE BRUT 2012
tastingDescription: 93 Points, Wine Spectator - "A vivid version, like raw silk on the palate, with a powerful frame of acidity well-meshed with saline-tinged, minerally underpinnings and flavors of black currant, apricot, almond biscotti and crystallized honey. Disgorged February 2016. Drink now through 2030." (December 2017)

name: VEUVE CLICQUOT ROSE ICE JACKET
tastingDescription: Coppery-orange color. Expressive aromas of strawberry and very ripe wild strawberries. A full-bodied, structured, vinous palate which stays fresh. Length and character define this champagne.

name: VEUVE DU VERNAY - BRUT

name: VEUVE DU VERNAY - BRUT ROSE
tastingDescription: Pleasingly pink with notes of cranberry, rhubarb and grapefruit, this dry bubbly offers good value, making it brilliant to pour for a crowd. Intensely aromatic on the nose with hints of strawberry, cranberry and lemony citrus hints and as a refreshing and clean palate with vibrant entry and soft finish. Serve as an aperitif, also good with tapas and light dishes.

name: VEZELAY CHARDONNAY - PASCAL BOUCHARD 2018
tastingDescription: 90 Points, Gismondi: ''This comes from Vézelay, south of Chablis, and was vinified in stainless, where it continued to age for 8 months. Tight and bright with lemon, white peach blossom, and white grapefruit across a lightly lees-decked palate. It has some of the palate generosity of the weighted 2018 vintage, but ample bright freshness to counter, finishing quite harmonious at 12.5%. A lovely, smart, accessible white Bourgogne for drinking now.'' (June 2021)

name: VILLA CONCHI - CAVA BRUT SELECCION
tastingDescription: This Cava is fresh and fruity, with flavours of apple, citrus and hints of toast. Lovely bubbles cleanse and refresh the palate.

name: VILLA SANDI - ASOLO PROSECCO SUPERIORE BRUT

name: VILLA TERESA - PROSECCO

name: VILLA TERESA - PROSECCO FRIZZANTE ORGANIC

name: VIN DE FRANCE - CHATEAU TERTRE BLANC 2018

90-92 pts, Wine Advocate

name: VIN DE FRANCE PROVIGNAGE - HENRY MARIONNET ROMORANTIN 2016

Its palate is full with pear, quince, white flower, honey and hazelnut aromas. One of the greatest Loire Valley ambassadors!
