This is truly delicious and gulpable, with very fine tannins, finessed and not wide." (April 2020)

name: VINTAGE INK - PINOT GRIGIO 2019
tastingDescription: A customer favourite, Pinot Grigio is about freshness, fruitiness and deliciousness. Meaning it is doing an excellent job for a white wine. Whether as a sipper or with pasta dishes or salad courses or more. Enjoy

name: VINTAGE INK - REBEL RED 2019
tastingDescription: Here is another hot blend that is meeting our customers’ needs.  Vintage Ink shows off the Okanagan fruit character as black and red fruits, supply tannins and good length. An all-rounder that goes with all kinds of menu all the time.

name: VINTAGE INK - WHISKY BARREL AGED RED 2020
nameSanitized: vintage ink - whisky barrel aged red 2020
sort: VINTAGE INK - WHISKY BARREL AGED RED 2020
tastingDescription: Ripe red berry fruits meet up with some smoke and caramel and chocolate nuances. The result is a good fireside sipper or with bbq menus or slow cooked hearty dishes.

name: VINTAGE PORT - DOW'S 2017
tastingDescription: False

name: VIOGNIER - CONO SUR BICICLETA
tastingDescription: This wine is fresh and lively with concentrated stone fruit and pear that combine with a waxy richness that rounds out the mouth feel.

name: VIOGNIER - GALIL MOUNTAIN KOSHER
tastingDescription: Fresh herbal aromas and a delicate background of oak. Notes of apricot, ripe nectarine and invigorating perfume. A medium-bodied wine with a silky texture and long, balanced finish. Best with flavourful dishes or cream-based dishes like pasta in cream of mushroom sauce.

name: VIOGNIER - YALUMBA Y SERIES
tastingDescription: 93 Points, The Real Review: "It's an incredibly attractive nose of fresh apricots and white flowers. It's more skewed towards apricot on the palate, though balanced and demanding another sip. A lovely young white wine." Dec 2020

name: VOLNAY 1ER CHAMPANS -  DOMAINE BLAIN GAGNARD 2015
tastingDescription: 92 Points, Burghound: "...sense of purity to the liqueur-like red cherry aromas that evidence plenty of floral character and in particular rose petal. There is excellent concentration to the elegant and refined medium weight flavors that brim with minerality on the robust, intense and powerful finish. In a word, impressive." (April 2017)

name: VOLNAY COTES DE BEAUNE PINOT NOIR - PIERRICK BOULEY PLUCHOT
namePrefix: VOLNAY COTES DE BEAUNE PINOT NOIR
nameSanitized: volnay cotes de beaune pinot noir - pierrick bouley pluchot
sort: VOLNAY COTES DE BEAUNE PINOT NOIR - PIERRICK BOULEY PLUCHOT
tastingDescription: False

name: VOSNE ROMANEE 1ER LES PETITS MONTS - JOSEPH DROUHIN 19
nameSanitized: vosne romanee 1er les petits monts - joseph drouhin 19
sort: VOSNE ROMANEE 1ER LES PETITS MONTS - JOSEPH DROUHIN 19
tastingDescription: 94 Points, Burghound: "Delightful bouquet with well-defined black cherry and raspberry scents laced with bergamot and crushed violet aromas. The palate is rounded and sensual on the entry, very pure with well-judged acidity, a little plushness toward the finish that gently glides across the mouth." (April 2018)

name: VOSNE ROMANEE 1ER PETITS MONTS - LUCIEN LE MOINE 2017
nameSanitized: vosne romanee 1er petits monts - lucien le moine 2017
sort: VOSNE ROMANEE 1ER PETITS MONTS - LUCIEN LE MOINE 2017
tastingDescription: Perfumed with rose, cherry, strawberry and sandalwood aromas, this red is elegant and silky. Seriously dense and powerful, it shows a lovely balance and harmony which makes it very approachable now, augmented by a well integrated structure for aging. Fine and persistent length.

name: VOSNE ROMANEE 1ER SUCHOTS - LUCIEN LE MOINE 2017
nameSanitized: vosne romanee 1er suchots - lucien le moine 2017
sort: VOSNE ROMANEE 1ER SUCHOTS - LUCIEN LE MOINE 2017
tastingDescription: Aromas of black cherry, licorice, menthol and dark chocolate. Very ripe on the palate but with terrific inner-mouth tension, packed with red fruits. The fine-grained but firm tannins spread out horizontally and build, with late notes of cocoa powder and violet emerging. Very complex with a long lasting finish.

name: VOUVRAY - VINCENT CAREME LE CLOS
tastingDescription: 95 Points, Vinous: 'While expansive and round, the 2019 Le Clos offers excellent clarity and freshness. A definite thread of chalkiness provides line and tension. There's also a subtle oak influence here, adding a soupçon of savoriness on the nose and rounding its shoulders in terms of its shape. The lengthy finish is lithe and pure.' (March 2021)

name: VOUVRAY MOELLEUX - PHILIPPE FOREAU
tastingDescription: 91 Points, Vinous Media: Deep golden in color. Lots of ripe apple, even Calvados-like notes, autumnal, fallen leaves, cinnamon and mulled spices. It's pretty sweet but the palate is generous and inviting and the finish is straight and chalky. 60 grams per liter of residual sugar.

name: VOUVRAY SEC - V FOREAU DOMAINE DE CLOS NAUDIN 2019
nameSanitized: vouvray sec - v foreau domaine de clos naudin 2019
nameSuffix: V FOREAU DOMAINE DE CLOS NAUDIN 2019
sort: VOUVRAY SEC - V FOREAU DOMAINE DE CLOS NAUDIN 2019
tastingDescription: 90 Points, Vinous Media: The balance of fruit, mineral, and piercing acidity is seamless, with notes of pear, clay, and white floral blossoms. A core of salt and white pepper frame the long finish. Dry and crisp, even with 5 grams per liter residual sugar.

name: VOUVRAY SEC - VINCENT RAIMBAULT BEL AIR 2018
nameSanitized: vouvray sec - vincent raimbault bel air 2018
sort: VOUVRAY SEC - VINCENT RAIMBAULT BEL AIR 2018
tastingDescription: Wine of good maturity with scents of white flowers with notes of vanilla. Fresh and full fruity aromas of peach, apricot and honey.

name: VRAIN AUGE - BRUT CUVEE PRESTIGE
tastingDescription: Guide DUSSERT-GERBE 2019: "Superb Champagne ... a beautiful wine that combines elegance, structure and finesse, aromas dominated by brioche and ripe pear." Luxurious, refined palate with a round, structured body, and complexity of grapes, brioche, toast and black truffle. Serve as aperitif, also excellent with appetizers, seafood/shellfish, vegetables, pastas, poultry/white meats, cheeses, pastries.

name: VRANAC - PLANTAZE
tastingDescription: False

name: VRANKEN POMMERY - CHAMPAGNE POP ROSE
tastingDescription: Pommery was produced according to the same principles that Pommery holds so dearly in the production of it's rosé wines: a blend of different Chardonnay and Pinot wines and a dash of reds. Perfectly balanced, a fresh and fruity wine emerges from the finesse and the delicacy typical of Chardonnays

name: WACHAU RIESLING - DOMANE WACHAU SMARAGD ACHLEITEN
nameSanitized: wachau riesling - domane wachau smaragd achleiten
sort: WACHAU RIESLING - DOMANE WACHAU SMARAGD ACHLEITEN
tastingDescription: False

name: WARRE'S - 10 YEAR OLD TAWNY OTIMA
tastingDescription: 91 Points, Wine Spectator - "Racy and fresh, with detailed green fig, dried cherry, incense and hazelnut notes. Offers a long, focused finish. Drink now." (June 2018)

name: WARRE'S - VINTAGE 2017
tastingDescription: False

name: WARRE'S - WARRIOR FINEST RESERVE
tastingDescription: 90 Points, Wine & Spirits Magazine. Warrior is the oldest brand of Port in the world, having been shipped continuously since the 1750's. The traditional style has been maintained over the years and it is today a classic full-bodied wine with wonderful richness and balance. Best served at the end of a meal, with chocolate, chocolate desserts, as well as strong cheeses and nuts.

name: WARRE'S - WARRIOR FINEST RESERVE
tastingDescription: Warrior is the oldest brand of Port in the world, having been shipped continuously since the 1750's. The traditional style has been maintained over the years and it is today a classic full-bodied wine with wonderful richness and balance.  Best served at the end of a meal, with chocolate, chocolate desserts, as well as strong cheeses and nuts. 90 Points, Wine & Spirits Magazine

name: WAYNE GRETZKY OKANAGAN - CABERNET SYRAH 2019
tastingDescription: Noted puck man Wayne Gretzky scores in the glass with this tasty red blend. Very complimentary to each other, the Cabernet fruit essence and Syrah spice offer great flavours to savour. Try with roasted meats, lamb chops or burger sliders.

name: WEEKDAY WINE - PINOT GRIGIO
tastingDescription: Crisp, luscious, and refreshing. Completed by a lingering, mouth-watering finish. A wine to wind down with.

name: WEEKDAY WINE - PINOT GRIGIO
tastingDescription: Crisp, luscious, and refreshing. Completed by a lingering, mouth-watering finish. A wine to wind down with.

name: WEEKDAY WINE - RED BLEND
tastingDescription: Vibrant, rich and decadent. Wrapped in a cozy bundle of supple tannins. Sink into it like your comfiest chair.

name: WEEKDAY WINE - RED BLEND
tastingDescription: Vibrant, rich and decadent. Wrapped in a cozy bundle of supple tannins. Sink into it like your comfiest chair.

name: WEISSBURGUNDER DRY - WEINGUT DONNHOFF
tastingDescription: False

name: WESTERN CAPE RED - KWV ROODEBERG
tastingDescription: This famous red blend shows aromatic layers of plum, cherry and tobacco with undertones of fresh strawberry on the nose. The palate is lively with nuances of dark chocolate, dried spice and aniseed, accompanied by the perfectly integrated tannin structure and a lingering finish.

name: WHISTLER - LATE HARVEST CHARDONNAY 2018
tastingDescription: False

name: WHISTLER - PINOT NOIR ICEWINE 2018
tastingDescription: False

name: WHISTLER - SAUVIGNON BLANC ICEWINE 2018
tastingDescription: This dessert wine tastes like taking a bite out of a ripe Granny Smith apple. It has aromas and flavours of pineapple, apple, apricot and peach with medium acidity and great length.

name: WHITE ZINFANDEL - BERINGER
tastingDescription: Fresh red berry, citrus and melon flavors accented by subtle hints of stone fruit and violets.

name: WHITE ZINFANDEL - CORBETT CANYON
tastingDescription: Delicate and refreshing with classic ripe strawberry and raspberry notes.

name: WHITE ZINFANDEL - GALLO FAMILY VINEYARDS
tastingDescription: This white Zinfandel combines crisp refreshment with bright fruit. Taste flavours of fresh strawberry and hints of sweet, white peach.

name: WILD GOOSE - AUTUMN GOLD 2020
tastingDescription: A blend of Riesling, Gewürztraminer and Pinot Blanc. This is a clean, crisp, white wine blend that carries aromas of orchard fruit, grapefruit and citrus. The smooth round palate tastes of orange, candied ginger, and a hint of rose, all balanced with easy acidity.

name: WILD GOOSE - GEWURZTRAMINER 2019
tastingDescription: With German roots the Kruger family set up their vineyards in the early 1980s in Okanagan Falls. Early varietals were Germanic of course but Riesling didn't have the customers. Gewurztraminer did develop a fan base with BC consumers and for Wild Goose was a top seller. Sourcing from Oliver to Kelowna, the exuberant varietal aromas and flavours can be found here as spices, stone fruits and citrus.

name: WILD GOOSE - PINOT GRIS 2020
tastingDescription: An Okanagan Falls grape growing pioneer in the early 1980s, the winery followed in 1990 with much success. The Pinot Gris sources from estate and up-the-valley fruit and is always a flavourful glass of this varietal. Look for typical Okanagan tree fruit flavours, a juiciness and lip-smacking persistence. Will go all kinds of menu, from salmon to pasta to grilled fare.

name: WILD GOOSE - RIESLING 2019
tastingDescription: Always an exceptional example of this grape and Okanagan Falls fruit, the 2017 offers good acidity and varietal character. Try with spicy prawns or sushi rolls or pork chops. Awarded 2018 Lt. Governor Award for Top BC Wine.

name: WILLIAMS AND HUMBERT - DRY SACK
tastingDescription: The nose of this dark sherry is powerful with caramel, roasted nuts and baking spices. The slightly sweet palate would marry beautifully with a piece of 6-month-old Manchego cheese and dried figs.

name: WINE O'CLOCK - CABERNET SAUVIGNON
tastingDescription: A robust and flavourful wine with hints of black cherry and vanilla. Our Cabernet Sauvignon is a fruit forward and smooth wine with a velvety finish.

name: WINE O'CLOCK - CHARDONNAY
tastingDescription: False

name: WINE O'CLOCK - MERLOT
tastingDescription: A smooth and supple wine with sun-ripened strawberry and blackberry flavours. It's a classic favourite with a soft and round finish.

name: WINE O'CLOCK - SHIRAZ
tastingDescription: A fruit-forward Shiraz bursting with flavors of juicy black cherry, with a hint of spice. Smooth with a well-balanced finish.

name: WINEMAKER'S CUT - BOHO ZEN 2020
tastingDescription: A medium luminous purple hue in the glass opens rich and complex layers of dark berry fruit, lifted floral, herbal and savoury spice notes on the nose. The palate is finely balanced with concentrated black plum, peppery spice structured tannins that lead to a finish with a fresh power.

name: WOODWORK CHARDONNAY
tastingDescription: Woodwork Chardonnay exhibits the striking balance of rich tropical fruit and fragrant oak. The nose opens with lovely pineapple, caramel and vanilla aromas. In the mouth, ripe apple and pear flavors develop, accompanied by shortbread and baking spices. The harmonious integration of fruit and spice unfolds with round, creamy texture and supple mouthfeel and weight. A pop of fresh citrus accents the long finish.

name: WW ON POINT - CRISP WHITE
tastingDescription: The official wine of WW Canada - On Point Crisp White is a delightful low calorie wine with bright aromas and flavours of citrus and passion fruit with a refreshingly light & crisp finish.

name: WW ON POINT - SMOOTH RED
tastingDescription: The official wine of WW Canada - On Point Smooth Red is a delicious low calorie wine featuring dark fruit and plum flavours with a hint of spice and a soft & smooth finish.

name: XOXO - PINOT GRIGIO CHARDONNAY
tastingDescription: Clear and bright with aromas of Bartlett pear, tangerine, pink grapefruit, banana and melon. This perfect match provides an off-dry, smooth yet refreshing, light to medium body mouth-feel and flavours of tropical fruit, melon and pear. Notes of mandarin orange, melon and tropical fruit linger on the finish.

name: XOXO - PINOT GRIGIO LIGHT
tastingDescription: A bright lemon colour with a fresh-picked fruit aroma of peach, nectarine, and lemon. This light-bodied wine has a clean, pure fruit expression, and a splash of refreshment. Tree-fruit flavours of apple, pear, yellow plum and a touch of citrus dance on the palate and linger through on the finish.

name: XOXO - PINOT NOIR
tastingDescription: Off-dry and medium-bodied, with notes of bright red fruit along with vanilla and a slight hint of cloves.

name: XOXO - ROSE
tastingDescription: A delicate copper pink colour with aromas of ripe strawberry, white grape, watermelon and sweet floral. This rosé has a medium-sweet, light to medium body mouth-feel and refreshing flavours of watermelon, strawberry and grape. Notes of red berry tea, strawberry, melon and honey linger on the finish.

name: YECLA - CASTANO LA CASONA
tastingDescription: Superb value. Ripe baked red and black fruit that is rich yet balanced beautifully by savoury dried herb and spice notes. Nice tannic grip, acidity and savoury minerality to give complexity. A good gateway wine from the richness of the new world to the savoury old world.

name: YECLA MERLOT MONASTRELL - LUJURIA
tastingDescription: Blackberry, cherry and raspberry are imbued with sweet peppercorns, cedar bark and orange peel. Slightly chunky and rustic grip on the finish. Bright, simple, authentic and honest, and an ideal mid-week value red.

name: YELLOW TAIL - BUBBLES
tastingDescription: Bubbles pops with citrus flavours and a fresh, creamy finish. Flavours of tropical fruits combine perfectly with medium sweetness and a delightfully crisp finish. The everyday celebration!

name: YELLOW TAIL - PINK BUBBLES
tastingDescription: Pink Bubbles is sparkling, bubbly goodness ready to brighten up ordinary moments, everyday. Made from blending red and white wines, this bubbly has a pink hue and an appealing bouquet of wild strawberry, red cherry and sweet spice. Red grape flavours predominate with red cherry, sweet spice and tropical fruits at the forefront.

name: YELLOWGLEN - PINK
tastingDescription: Inviting strawberry aromas, a splash of citrus bubble with refreshing fruit characters of berry and lime with a hint of lemon. A great value wine from Australia's premier house of sparkling.

name: YOSHI NO GAWA - BREWMASTER'S CHOICE PREMIUM HONJOZO SAKE
nameSanitized: yoshi no gawa - brewmasters choice premium honjozo sake
sort: YOSHI NO GAWA - BREWMASTER'S CHOICE PREMIUM HONJOZO SAKE
tastingDescription: Rice polished down to 65%. The name tells everything about this sake. This is the sake that sake brewmasters want to drink on regular basis themselves. Crafted using local “Gohyaku-man-goku” sake rice, this can be enjoyed chilled or heated. It is smooth with a clean finish.

name: YOSHI NO GAWA - GOKUJO GINJO PREMIUM SAKE
nameSanitized: yoshi no gawa - gokujo ginjo premium sake
sort: YOSHI NO GAWA - GOKUJO GINJO PREMIUM SAKE
tastingDescription: Crisp aromas of fennel and fresh herbs.  Ultra-smooth and refreshing with delicate elements of honeydew, orange-magnolia flowers and anise on the finish.

name: YOSHI NO GAWA - INSPIRATION SPARKLING SAKAGURA NO AWAYUKI P
nameSanitized: yoshi no gawa - inspiration sparkling sakagura no awayuki p
nameSuffix: INSPIRATION SPARKLING SAKAGURA NO AWAYUKI P
sort: YOSHI NO GAWA - INSPIRATION SPARKLING SAKAGURA NO AWAYUKI P
tastingDescription: Grand Jury Medal Winner Kura Master France 2019. Bright sparkling bubbles dance in your mouth. Delicate aromas of ripe fruits with a pleasant round sweetness make this sparkling sake perfect as an aperitif or with dessert. The name "Awayuki" means "Light Snowflakes"

name: YOSHI NO GAWA - UMI BLU PREMIUM GINJO
nameSanitized: yoshi no gawa - umi blu premium ginjo
sort: YOSHI NO GAWA - UMI BLU PREMIUM GINJO
tastingDescription: Semi-dry with pleasing aromas of ripe tropical fruits and a well-balanced acidity that leads to a smooth, clean finish.

name: YUKI HOTARU - SAKE
tastingDescription: Great entry level sake! Fruity and floral on the nose while it is drier on the palate. A smooth silky mouthfeel with a crisp and refreshing finish, yet its subtle sweetness is quite satisfying. Not only its aroma and flavour, but also its friendly price is reasonable for many consumers.

name: ZAGO - PROSECCO ROSE BRUT 2019
tastingDescription: Pale pink with fine-grained and persistent bubbles, this Prosecco Rose has a delicate fruity bouquet with hints of wisteria blossoms. Dry, crisp, savory and creamy on the palate, it is ideal as an aperitif and can go well with cold-cuts, salami, shellfish, or fish-based dishes. Serve chilled to 6-8 degrees C.

name: ZENATTA SYROCCO - ALAIN GRAILLOT SYROCCO
tastingDescription: Deep ruby colour with an expressive nose, excellent balance and complex aromatics. Plenty of ripe purple black fruits and dried red cherry followed by hints of sandalwood, herbs, and spice. The finish is dry, long, and similar to classic Syrah. An excellent wine for a BBQ feast!

name: ZINFANDEL - 1000 STORIES BOURBON BARREL SMALL BATCH 2016
nameSanitized: zinfandel - 1000 stories bourbon barrel small batch 2016
sort: ZINFANDEL - 1000 STORIES BOURBON BARREL SMALL BATCH 2016
tastingDescription: Aged in bourbon barrels. Exotically fruity and approachable, this full-bodied, almost-sweet wine has lots to appreciate. It starts with a complex bouquet of black currant, cedar and ripe black cherry and continues on the palate with ripeness and concentration, without a lot of tannin.

name: ZINFANDEL - BIG HOUSE CARDINAL ZIN
tastingDescription: This is a wine bursting with intense flavours of dark cherry, blackberry and mocha followed by notes of toasty oak and vanilla. It’s full on the palate, with rich aromas and bold fruit flavours that linger on the tongue from the first sip to the very last drop.

name: ZINFANDEL - BOTA BOX OLD VINE
tastingDescription: Bota Box Zinfandel is rich in colour with aromas of blackberry, black cherry and toasted oak. Jammy and fruit-forward, Bota Zin also features lingering oak nuances on the palate, with hints of black pepper that carry through to a long, lingering finish. Nicely balanced acidity and supple tannins make this medium-bodied wine an ideal partner for roasted pork tenderloin studded with garlic and rosemary, grilled burgers topped with blue cheese, or even chocolate brownies.

name: ZINFANDEL - CARNIVOR
tastingDescription: Big and brash, the Carnivor Zinfandel offers California in a bottle as this is a heritage grape unique to the Golden State. Rich berry fruit and hints of chocolate and vanilla combine to be a hearty drop of red wine. Perfect with BBQ fare, pasta or slow-cooked menus.

name: ZINFANDEL - CAYMUS NAPA
tastingDescription:
Available on May 29.
The Caymus brand is really about Cabernet Sauvignon so the Zinfandel is a nice Napa treat that is very sought-after here in BC. A dense, dark purple colour is accompanied by intense aromas of sweet, ripe blackberry, fig and toasted brown spices. The fleshy, medium-bodied palate shows notes of blackcurrant, rhubarb, cranberry, black cherry, dark chocolate and subtle oak vanilla characters. The finish is lingering and full, with a wonderful balance of persistent berry flavours and bright acidity.

name: ZINFANDEL - CLINE OLD VINE LODI
tastingDescription: This delicious red shows an array of dark berry fruit, including black cherry and strawberry. Savoury spice notes and a lasting finish of vanilla and firm, supple tannins from oak aging add complexity to this food-friendly Zinfandel.

name: ZINFANDEL - GNARLY HEAD LODI OLD VINE
nameSanitized: zinfandel - gnarly head lodi old vine
sort: ZINFANDEL - GNARLY HEAD LODI OLD VINE
tastingDescription: "Zinfandel is basically a grape unto California which loves all that sunshine and the west coast menu. On Canada's best-coast we have similar conditions to make this medium bodied, berry-delicious Zinfandel work really well. Try with spicy Asian cuisine or spicy wings or mac-n-cheese with bacon on top." - Stephen Schiedel, Category Manager for Wines of Canada, USA & South America

name: ZINFANDEL - INTO ZIN LODI
tastingDescription: "For quite some time, Lodi has been the place to go for killer Zin. Perfect growing conditions, huge acreage and old vines mean this was the source for many an old time red wine brand. Today Lodi still offers up delicious Zinfandel flavours that show fresh black and red berry notes, spicy hints and an all-around juicy palate to go with everyday fare. Quite the deal from an exceptional year, so make sure to stock up.” - Stephen Schiedel, Category Manager for Wines of Canada, USA & South America

name: ZINFANDEL - JOEL GOTT 2018
tastingDescription: The Joel Gott Zinfandel has aromas of cherry cola and raspberry with hints of white pepper and vanilla oak. On the palate, bright red fruit flavours and acidity are followed by a juicy mid-palate and a soft, round mouth feel and a long finish.

name: ZINFANDEL - KLINKER BRICK LODI OLD VINE 2015
nameSanitized: zinfandel - klinker brick lodi old vine 2015
sort: ZINFANDEL - KLINKER BRICK LODI OLD VINE 2015
tastingDescription: 90 Points, Wine Spectator - "Ripe and broad-shouldered, with perky baked cherry, smoked licorice and spice flavors. Drink now through 2022." (November 2018)

name: ZINFANDEL - LAKE SONOMA DRY CREEK 2016
tastingDescription: This well-balanced Zinfandel shows briar berry and baking chocolate aromas. The palate leads with spicy blackberry pie, cinnamon and caramelized oak on the finish while featuring smooth tannins throughout.

name: ZINFANDEL - LIBERTY SCHOOL CALIFORNIA 2013
tastingDescription: False

name: ZINFANDEL - MOUNT PEAK RATTLESNAKE 2016
tastingDescription:
Available on May 29.
Mount Peak winery, one of the fabled ghost wineries of Northern California dating to 1886, carries on today as this brand using fruit from the acclaimed vineyard it is located next to: the legendary Monte Rosso on the Western slopes of Mount Veeder at 1300 feet.  "Medium garnet-purple colored, it leaps forth with baked raspberries, kirsch and blackberry pie notes pus nuances of dusty soil, cinnamon stick, dried roses and oolong tea with a hint of spearmint. Full-bodied, rich and spicy in the mouth, it has a plush texture and fantastic freshness, finishing with a minty lift." 94 points, Wine Advocate.

name: ZINFANDEL - RAVENSWOOD LODI OLD VINE 2017
tastingDescription: This robust and spicy red features aromas of black cherry, raspberry, blueberry, cocoa and a splinter of oak. It has fruit flavours of ripe raspberry, cherry and boysenberry leading to soft tannins and a mouthwatering finish, making it ideal for lasagna, grilled pepper steak or stew.

name: ZINFANDEL - RAVENSWOOD VINTNERS BLEND OLD VINE
nameSanitized: zinfandel - ravenswood vintners blend old vine
sort: ZINFANDEL - RAVENSWOOD VINTNERS BLEND OLD VINE
tastingDescription: The Vintners Blend has a somewhat smoky and savoury character at the core of chocolate, peppery spices and blackberry aromas. In the mouth, the entry is smooth and then it picks up some texture mid-palate. The finish is long and trails berry and mocha flavours. Pair with hearty mole chili.

name: ZINFANDEL - RODNEY STRONG SONOMA KNOTTY VINES 2017
nameSanitized: zinfandel - rodney strong sonoma knotty vines 2017
sort: ZINFANDEL - RODNEY STRONG SONOMA KNOTTY VINES 2017
tastingDescription: Fresh, bright berry fruit from their heritage Russian River vineyard combined with the ripe jammy peppery fruit from Alexander Valley vineyards showcases the wonderful diversity of flavour of this Zinfandel. Aging for 10 months in French and American oak enhances the grape's inherent spicy qualities, while the ebullient fruit of this medium rich wine suggests enjoyment over 2 to 4 years. Pair it with braised red meats, short rib, grilled Italian sausage and scalloped potatoes.

name: ZINFANDEL - SEGHESIO SONOMA 2016
tastingDescription: 93 Points, Wine Spectator - "Loaded with rich, jammy fruit, this plump Zin is a pleasure to drink, with bold accents of wild berry, spicy cinnamon and licorice that glide dynamically toward plush tannins. Drink now through 2025." (June 2018)

name: ZINFANDEL - SEVEN DEADLY ZINS LODI OLD VINE 2016
nameSanitized: zinfandel - seven deadly zins lodi old vine 2016
nameSuffix: SEVEN DEADLY ZINS LODI OLD VINE 2016
sort: ZINFANDEL - SEVEN DEADLY ZINS LODI OLD VINE 2016
tastingDescription: Rich, dark berry and plum dominate the palate, interlaced with some spices and hints of chocolate

name: ZINFANDEL - SLEDGEHAMMER CALIFORNIA 2014
tastingDescription: Vivid aromas of boysenberry, blackberry, black cherry, and a good dose of black pepper. Dark fruit flavours of dried cherry, highlighted by tobacco notes, dominate the palate. The wine is balanced by soft tannins and added vanilla highlights from the influence of aging oak.

name: ZINFANDEL - WINDSTORM LODI OLD VINE 2018
tastingDescription: Rich and fruit-forward, this big Zin from Lodi pulls no punches with dark plum, boysenberry, blackberry jam, strawberry and vanilla flavours in this versatile wine.

name: ZONIN - PROSECCO ROSE BRUT
tastingDescription: A lightly-coloured sparkling rosé with a fine perlage and soft, persistent foam. Fragrant and fruity with hints of wisteria flowers, Renette Apple and red berries, including wild strawberries. Fresh and delightful. On the palate it is soft and smooth with floral notes and a hint of almond.

name: 33 ACRES OF LIFE LAGER
tastingDescription: 1848, West Coast convictions of resourcefulness and persistence, the California Common was born. Easy on the alcohol and weighing in on the taste for a complete balance. Fruit like quality is created by fermenting the lager at ale temperatures. Hints at a full-bodied ale yet retains a crisp finish.

name: 33 ACRES OF NIRVANA 6 PACK
tastingDescription: 33 Acres is one of Vancouver’s most well-loved craft beer brewers. This West Coast Indian Pale Ale beautifully balances bitter-fresh pine notes with grapefruit rind and candied orange citrus. Try it with some fried chicken for a true taste of nirvana.

name: 33 ACRES OF OCEAN PALE ALE
tastingDescription: A full flavoured beer integrated with a distinct floral hop gives a quality unique to our Pacific Northwest surroundings. This style is evolutionary from a IPA with an assertive hop, lower alcohol content, and slight pine aroma. Low in malt, this beer has a refined quality and a refreshing temperament.

name: 33 ACRES OF SUNSHINE BLANCHE
tastingDescription: Thanks to summers' launching acclaims, this romantic French Blanchè can willingly co-star any seasons current scenes. Showcasing flare for the prismatic, 33 Acres of Sunshine synthesizes an unfiltered wheat dream. Joining the arrays, glowing hops of Aurora and Styrian Golding awaken subtle anise seeds, dazzling coriander, and candied orange ovations.

name: 33 ACRES OF SUNSHINE CAN
tastingDescription: False

name: ALEXANDER KEITH'S - INDIA PALE ALE CAN
nameSanitized: alexander keiths - india pale ale can

name: CZECHVAR

name: CZECHVAR LAGER
tastingDescription: Czechvar pours a crystal clear golden colour. A light carbonation is evident as a few small bubbles rise to the surface after pouring. A delicate hop aroma creates the first sensation on the taste buds. Next an early hop bitterness comes through followed closely by a dry pale malty flavour that is mellowed by the soft mouth feel. This medium-bodied lager reveals an overall character that is clean and dry and that finishes slightly crisp. Overall a beer flavourful enough for a winter thirst reprieve but light enough to quench that heat-induced summer urge for a cold one.

People’s Choice “Best Beer” Award at Okanagan Fest of Ale, 2014. Food pairings: Chinese, Indian, Thai or Japanese cuisine go well with Pilsners. Golden straw in colour with lively foam and an aroma of hop fruitiness with notes of fresh bread and a taste of malt, slight sweetness and low bitterness. Miller Genuine Draft has a light to medium body delivering the ultimate smooth beer. The result is a crisp and clean finish leaving very little aftertaste.

name: MILLER HIGH LIFE
tastingDescription: Miller High Life represents how American-style lagers were born to be. It was created as a perfect balance of flavour and refreshment and has remained so since 1903. It embodies a simplicity, purity and integrity typically associated with products that are expensive and ultra-premium – yet it remains widely available and economically priced.

name: MILLER LITE CAN
tastingDescription: Miller Lite delivers more golden colour, hops, aroma and satisfying taste than anyone would expect in a light beer. With a pale yellow, bright golden quality, Miller Lite has the aroma of malt with a clean, fruity nose. The taste is well-balanced with low bitterness, light body and effervescent carbonation leaving a crisp, smooth finish with little aftertaste.

tastingDescription: Dat Juice is an unfiltered pale ale brewed with large amounts of flaked and malted wheat, then heavily dry hopped with %100 Citra hops. It pours a cloudy pale straw colour with bright aromatics of grapefruit, pineapple and mango.

sort: TWIN SAILS BREWING - WOULD CRUSH WHEAT ALE TALL CAN
tastingDescription: This beer started as a traditional American style wheat ale, packed with flaked and malted wheat. We selected a yeast strain with a lower ester profile than its traditional European cousins. We then loaded it full with raspberries until the lid blew off. This beer is teeming with raspberries, backed up by a creamy mouthfeel and light crisp malt profile.

name: TYSKIE
tastingDescription: Tyskie beer combines only top-quality ingredients. The best varieties of barley are used to produce malt and hops to provide the beer with its characteristic bitter taste, and Gronie Springs provide it's crystal clear water. Tyskie beer is bright golden amber. On the nose, light malt, hops and citrus aromas. On the palate it is light with a creamy mouthfeel and hints of bitter hops on the finish.

name: UNIBROUE - COLLECTION PACK
tastingDescription: The Fall Unibroue Mix Pack features six of our unique-tasting craft beers. Included in the pack is Blanche de Chambly, Maudite, Don De Dieu, Trois Pistoles, La Fin du Monde, and our new limited edition Fringante.

name: UNIBROUE - LA FIN DU MONDE
tastingDescription: A 9%  triple fermented blonde ale with a golden hue. Wild spices with hints of yeast and noble hops round out the aroma. This complex ale is well balanced on the palate with a chorus of fruit, spice and hop notes that make this highly effervescent “liquid gold” so distinctive.

name: 1792 - BOTTLED IN BOND

"....it revels in the renewed respect for bottled in bond whiskey which assures us it is at least 4 years old, 100 proof, from one distillery, and one distilling season. .. name: 1800 - COCONUT
tastingDescription: 1800 Coconut is created by infusing 1800 Silver with fresh, ripe coconut to create an exceptionally smooth liquid with exquisite taste. Lightly sweet and medium-bodied with a tropical palate, this versatile spirit is delicious on the rocks with a squeeze of lime and also tastes great mixed with pineapple juice.

name: 1800 - REPOSADO RESERVA
tastingDescription: Made from 100% Weber blue agave. The liquid is double distilled, and a special selection of white tequilas is blended together. The result is a smooth premium tequila that is dry and warming on the palate. Clean, balanced taste with hints of sweet fruit and pepper. Perfect sipped neat, on the rocks, as a shot or in a cocktail.

name: 1800 - SILVER RESERVA
tastingDescription: Made from 100% Weber blue agave. The liquid is double distilled, and a special selection of white tequilas is blended together. The result is a smooth premium tequila that is dry and warming on the palate. Clean, balanced taste with hints of sweet fruit and pepper. Perfect sipped neat, on the rocks, as a shot or in a cocktail.

name: ABERFELDY - 12 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription:
Famous for its honeyed sweetness coming from the patient process of longer fermentation which allows for more flavor
development. It is then mellowed for over 12 years in a combination of Sherry, Bourbon, Re-fill and Re-char casks. A classic fruity single malt whisky with a honeyed richness and smooth accessible taste. Scented with spices and honeyed plump fruits.

name: ABERFELDY - 21 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: 95 Points & Gold Medal Exceptional, Beverage Testing Institute - “Bright gold color. Bright, waxy aromas of honeycomb, dark caramel, raisin toast, and leather with a supple, lively, dry-yet-fruity medium body and a tingling, interesting, medium-length nuts, honeyed dried fruits, floral earth, and cedar finish. A nicely nuanced and layered Highland single malt.”

name: ABERFELDY - EXCEPTIONAL CASK 24 YO
tastingDescription: The exceptional cask series is a collection of rare whiskies selected by Malt Master, Stephanie MacLeod. The whiskies were bottled in small quantities, and will not be made available again. Matured in first-fill sherry butt casks, this single malt brings savoury and subtle herbal and spice notes, which develops to be slightly smoky.

It's powerful, with a thick, buttery feel and a long finish of lip-smacking spice cake and sea brine notes.” (December 2015)

name: ABERLOUR - 16 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores

95 pts, International Wine & Spirit Competition 2019

name: ABERLOUR - A'BUNADH CASK STRENGTH
tastingDescription: Superb (90-95 Points) Highly Recommended, Wine Enthusiast - "Toasty and malty on first sniffing; exposure to air brings the piquant spirit alive, but it doesn’t overshadow the toasty malt. On the final pass a trace of sherry emerges. First taste is sassy, oily and spirity; midpalate is very oily, sleek and rife with bittersweet flavors of cocoa, soot and fruit pit. To its credit, the tangy spirit is quiet at midpalate but explodes in the aftertaste, making for a combustible but exceedingly pleasing finish.” (August 2005)

name: ABSINTH - GREEN TREE
tastingDescription: Green Tree Absinthe is distilled from 100% wormwood and botanicals that produce aromas and flavours of wormwood, cardamom, coriander, hints of anise and herbs; sweet and rich with a spicy finish.

name: ABSINTHE - OKANAGAN SPIRITS TABOO
tastingDescription: An herbal spirit rather than a liqueur, this delicate and complex sipper is made according to a historic European recipe. Its fruit spirit base plays nicely with the traditional ingredients of wormwood, anise, hyssop, lemon balm and fennel, with the flavour of anise predominating. Try it in cocktails or diluted with water and sugar.

name: ABSOLUT
tastingDescription: Absolut vodka is a Swedish vodka made exclusively from natural ingredients, and unlike some other vodkas, it does not contain any added sugar. In fact, Absolut is as clean as vodka can be. Still, it has a certain taste: Rich, full-bodied and complex, yet smooth and mellow with a distinct character of grain, followed by a hint of dried fruit.

name: ABSOLUT RAINBOW LIMITED EDITION
tastingDescription: Since 1981, Absolut has supported the LGBTQ  community as part of the belief that a colourful, diverse and equal world is something to strive and work for. This 2020 Absolut limited edition bottle was co-created with The Gilbert Baker Foundation to pay homage to Gilbert Baker, an American artist and LGBTQ  rights activist who back in 1978 created the rainbow flag, which has become a symbol of inclusion, love, and peace.

name: AKVAVIT - BORNHOLMER

tastingDescription: A well-priced, versatile Canadian rye whisky showing aromas of toffee and oak that finishes with a peppery kick.

name: ALIZE - RED PASSION
tastingDescription: Alizé is an indulgent blend of cherry, ginger, exotic juices and passion fruit combined with French cognac and premium French vodka. Contemporary, sophisticated and meant for your most exotic mixed cocktails.

name: ALUMNI WHISKY SERIES - DARRYL SITTLER
tastingDescription: False

name: AMARETTO - DISARONNO ORIGINALE
tastingDescription: Sweet and fruity character - This Italian liqueur made from vanilla and pure caramelized sugar with a characteristic bittersweet almond taste. Disaronno claims its original amaretto's secret formula is unchanged from the year 1525. Disaronno can be served on the rocks, in shots, and a variety of cocktails, such as Disaronno Sour.

name: AMARETTO - DISARONNO ORIGINALE
tastingDescription: Sweet and fruity character - This Italian liqueur made from vanilla and pure caramelized sugar with a characteristic bittersweet almond taste. Disaronno claims its original amaretto's secret formula is unchanged from the year 1525. Disaronno can be served on the rocks, in shots, and a variety of cocktails, such as Disaronno Sour.

name: AMARETTO DI SASCHIRA - LUXARDO
tastingDescription: Lush and velvety, Luxardo's take on amaretto has an intense fragrance and flavours of bittersweet almonds, caramel and orange. Unlike many similar liqueurs, this one uses real almonds, which gives it a surprisingly deep complexity. Enjoy it in tea or coffee.

name: AMARO - MONTENEGRO
tastingDescription: A secret blend of 40 botanicals go into the production of this herbal liqueur. Look for vanilla, coriander, orange peel and eucalyptyus, just to name a few

name: AMARO - MONTENEGRO GIFT SET
tastingDescription: A secret blend of 40 botanicals go into the production of this herbal liqueur. Look for vanilla, coriander, orange peel and eucalyptyus, just to name a few. This giftpack includes Amaro Montengro with an Icon Glass.

name: AMARULA CREAM LIQUEUR
tastingDescription: Light caramel colour. Rich and velvety smooth taste with hints of vanilla and caramel and the exotic, natural Marula fruit. Distinctive, well rounded and creamy in texture and versatile in terms of mixability. Enjoy neat, with ice, infused in cocktails, or added to hot drinks like coffee, tea and hot chocolate.

name: ANHUI GUJING DISTILLERY - GUJINGGONG
tastingDescription: Limpid as crystal, fragrant and refreshing, It's hot on the attack with a warm, lingering finish.

name: APEROL - BARBIERI APERITIVO

name: APEROL - BARBIERI APERITIVO
tastingDescription: This popular Italian aperitif tastes primarily of bitter orange and rhubarb. Try it with Prosecco to create a refreshing Aperol Spritz

name: APFEL KORN - BERENTZEN
tastingDescription: A wonderful medley of freshly sun-ripened apples fills the nose and leads to a mouthful of fresh apple fruit. This schnapps is slightly sweet and so delicious! Serve alone, with ice, in mixed cocktails or topped with dry sparkling wine.

name: APPLETON ESTATE - 12YO RARE CASKS

name: APPLETON ESTATE - 21 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
Appleton Estate 21 YO Nassau Valley Casks is named after the location of the distillery in heart of Jamaica, the Nassau Valley. This prestigious rum reveals a floral scent that develops into a unique mature nutty bouquet. It offers notes of deep vanilla, mellow orange peel, rich nutmeg, vibrant almond, warm coffee and cocoa. The finish is long and dry with a slight sweetness that is not aggressive on the palate.
Gold, San Francisco World Spirits Competition 2021

name: APPLETON ESTATE - 8 YO RESERVE
tastingDescription: False

name: APPLETON ESTATE - SIGNATURE BLEND
tastingDescription: A full-bodied, medium sweet rum, aged for an average of 4 years. Perfectly balanced complex citrus, fruity and sweet notes, with subtle orange peel, dried apricot, fresh peach and a hint of molasses and woody notes. Perfect for mixing with sodas & fresh juices.

name: APPLETON ESTATE - SIGNATURE BLEND
tastingDescription: A full-bodied, medium sweet rum, aged for an average of 4 years. Perfectly balanced complex citrus, fruity and sweet notes, with subtle orange peel, dried apricot, fresh peach and a hint of molasses and woody notes. Perfect for mixing with sodas and fresh juices.

name: APPLETON ESTATE - SIGNATURE BLEND
tastingDescription: A full-bodied, medium sweet rum, aged for an average of 4 years. Perfectly balanced complex citrus, fruity and sweet notes, with subtle orange peel, dried apricot, fresh peach and a hint of molasses and woody notes. Perfect for mixing with sodas and fresh juices.

name: APPLETON ESTATE - SIGNATURE BLEND

name: APPLETON ESTATE - TASTER VARIETY PACK
tastingDescription: False

name: APRICOT BRANDY - BOLS
tastingDescription: Bold candied apricot flavours abound in this brandy with a bit of almond from the crushed pit

name: ARBIKIE - HIGHLAND RYE
tastingDescription:
"This single-estate rye whisky, Scotland's first rye in over a century, lets you lose yourself in deep clove spiciness, dark chocolate, Brazil nut, orange peel, and aromas of pressed cigars. The flavor is astonishingly good, with marmalade, old-fashioned toffee, rye bread, and toasted malt biscuits before a shower of clove spices breaks through, with dark toffee, treacle, chocolate, and pepper leading into a long finish of toffee and spice."
92 Points, Whisky Advocate 2019

name: ARBIKIE - NADAR GIN
tastingDescription: With the base spirit made from peas, Nadar Gin is smooth to drink and uses lemongrass and citrus leaf as the botanicals, which give a fresh and fruity aroma. This revolutionary climate positive gin is called Nadar, which is Gaelic for 'nature'. Nadar Gin harnesses the power of nature and science to create this world first spirit. With a carbon footprint of -1.54 kg CO2e per 700ml bottle, Nadar Gin is at the forefront of fighting climate change and biodiversity loss.

name: ARDBEG - 10 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: 93 Points, Whisky Advocate - "In body, it is thick and oily. On the palate, a somewhat sweet maltiness up front is run over by a powerful peat smoke locomotive. Again, the whisky is enriched with citrus and pear notes, spice, and seaweed. The finish is powerful, long, and warming. The smoke lingers for minutes, if not hours. If you like your Ardbeg to go to a phenolic extreme, you will cherish this one. This big, powerful whisky makes no apologies for its Islay roots.” (Fall 2000)

name: ARDBEG - 19 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription:
"The early nose offers hand-rolled tobacco, ginger, black pepper, and fragrant woodsmoke. Medicinal notes, brine, and lemon develop in time. Sweet peat smoke, tropical fruits, toffee, and aniseed on the palate, with smoked haddock and a suggestion of tar. Iodine, black pepper, and sea salt in the lengthy finish."
95 pts, Whisky Advocate 2020
1 Bottle limit.

name: ARDBEG - 25 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription:
"Briny smoke integrates with sweet bakery aromas: ....With water, butterscotch oozes out. The palate's silky texture is an ideal base for warm vanilla, toasted nuts, toffee, and milk chocolate, swirling with iodine peat and gentle gingerbread spices. The finish is complex, compelling, and quite lengthy with ginger, white pepper, allspice, saline, coffee grounds, dried apple, and lingering smoke."
95 pts. - Whisky Advocate 2021

name: ARDBEG - AN OA
tastingDescription: 93 Points, Whisky Advocate - "Ardbeg's first standard release in nearly a decade, An Oa is matured in virgin oak, Pedro Ximénez, and bourbon barrels, with component whiskies married in the distillery's French oak 'Gathering Vat.' The nose offers sweet peat, smoky lemon rind, ginger, and angelica. A soft and sweet palate entry is followed by hot peat, black tea, peppery cloves, and aniseed. Black pepper lingers through the long, smoky finish.” (Winter 2017)

name: ARDBEG - MONSTER OF SMOKE VARIETY PACK
nameSanitized: ardbeg - monster of smoke variety pack
sort: ARDBEG - MONSTER OF SMOKE VARIETY PACK
tastingDescription: False

name: ARDBEG - UIGEADAIL
tastingDescription: 95 Points, Whisky Advocate - "Uigeadail consists of a marriage of younger whisky (from 1990 and 1993) with much older whisky matured in sherry casks. The marriage works exceptionally well, with the younger whiskies providing the classic Ardbeg intensity many of us have come to expect, while the older whiskies contribute depth, maturity, and complexity. This is an incredibly complex Islay whisky, with its bonfire smoke, brine, and peppered olive notes balanced by a taming sweetness of vanilla, marshmallow, and toffee.” (Winter 2004)

name: ARDBEG - WEE BEASTIE 5 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription:
Matured in ex-bourbon and Oloroso sherry casks. Fresh herbal aromas with hints of vanilla and leather. A rich, explosive mouth feel with lots of chocolate, tar, creosote and smoked bacon, followed by a burst of antiseptic lozenges, eucalyptus and more aniseed. A long, salty and mouth-coating finish with hints of cocoa, fudge and savoury meats.
1 Bottle Limit

name: ARMAGNAC DE MONTAL - XO
tastingDescription: Blend of minimum 12 year-old and 15 to 20 year-old Armagnacs, aged in oak. Mahogany colour, with powerful notes of vanilla, prunes and violets, round, mild tannins, and a very long finish. Pair with game, foie gras, Roquefort cheese, walnuts, figs, prunes, chocolate, ice-cream, creme fraiche, mousses and creme brulee.

name: ARTINGSTALL - GIN
tastingDescription: False

name: AUCHENTOSHAN - 12 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: 92 Points & Best Buy, Wine Enthusiast - "A bourbon-lover's Scotch, look for plenty of vanilla and oak from first sip straight through the finish, plus echoes of cinnamon and dried apricot. Adding dilution brings out mellow mocha and hazelnut, overall suggesting chocolate chip cookie dough. Aged in oloroso sherry and bourbon casks.” (December 2017)

name: AUCHENTOSHAN - 21 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription:
Triple-distilled and aged perfectly for over 21 years in American bourbon and Spanish sherry casks. This creates a refined Lowland Single Malt whisky, ripe with gooseberries, sweet creamy vanilla, a hint of oak, warm honey and the signature smooth, delicate taste you would expect from Auchentoshan.
1 Bottle limit.

name: AUCHENTOSHAN - AMERICAN OAK
tastingDescription: Solely matured in American bourbon casks; this spirit pours a bright medium gold. On the nose, oaky notes are first in line, followed by roasted malt and toasty, nutty American oak. The flavors are sweet, nutty and spicy. The overall impression is light with a crisp finish.

name: AUCHENTOSHAN - THREE WOOD
tastingDescription: The colour is rich bronze with lovely aromas of blackcurrant, brown sugar, orange and raisin. The palate remains fruity and shows hazelnut, cinnamon and toffee flavors. The finish is fresh with lasting oaky sweetness.

name: AUCHENTOSHAN 18 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
"Impeccably crafted with excellent vibrancy for its age. The palate is beautifully rounded with rich orchard fruit flavours encased in layers of oak and lapsang souchong tea. A well-poised example with great finesse."
95 pts, International Wine & Spirit Competition 2021

name: AUCHROISK - 25 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: "Distilled in 1990, this rare expression was matured in refill American oak hogsheads. Quite shy on the nose, even at cask strength. Ultimately, faintly floral notes, with pear drops, vanilla, and linseed. Very smooth on the palate, with soft fruity malt, vanilla, peach, and dark berries. Buttery mango and nutmeg in the finish." - Gavin Smith 2016

name: AVERNA - AMARO SICILIANO
tastingDescription: Averna Amaro is still produced from the original 1868 recipe from natural ingredients. It has orange hints balanced with notes of licorice and Mediterranean herbs. The texture is velvety and rounded.

name: AVIATION - AMERICAN GIN BATCH DISTILLED
tastingDescription: 97 Points, Wine Enthusiast - "With its clean, neutral profile, this graceful gin works well with just about anything, from Aviation cocktails (natch) to bone-dry Martinis. On the palate, look for bewitching hints of caraway, juniper, grapefruit and a dry, faintly spicy finish.” (April 2012)

name: BACARDI - 10 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: Every drop barrel-aged for a minimum of 10 years under the Carribean Sun. Stone fruits, banana and pear - balanced with carmelized vanilla and oak. A dark gold amber appearance.

name: BACARDI - 4 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: Every drop barrel-aged for a minimum of 4 years under the Carribean Sun. Mild vanilla, toasted oak, clove and honey. A light amber rum with a golden apricot hue.

name: BACARDI - 8 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: This golden sipping rum is one of the oldest private rum blends in the world. Each batch is made from a special selection of barrel-aged reserve rums and aged for a minimum of eight years, giving it a refined flavour with notes of prune, apricot, nutmeg and vanilla.

name: BACARDI - BLACK
tastingDescription: Deep amber in colour. Sweet cocoa, molasses, ginger and spice aroma and flavour with a warm wood spice finish.

name: BACARDI - COQUITO
tastingDescription: BACARDI Coquito Coconut Cream Liqueur is a smooth, cocount flavoured, creamy liquer that offers plenty of sweet tasting flavour that can be enjoyed on any occasion.

name: BACARDI - GOLD
tastingDescription: Bright gold in colour. It has vanilla, butterscotch and lemon zest aromas. On the palate, it has light fruit and toffee flavours with a lightly spicy warm finish.

name: BACARDI - GOLD
tastingDescription: Bright gold in colour. It has vanilla, butterscotch and lemon zest aromas. On the palate, it has light fruit and toffee flavours with a lightly spicy warm finish.

name: BACARDI - GOLD
tastingDescription: Bright gold in colour. It has vanilla, butterscotch and lemon zest aromas. On the palate, it has light fruit and toffee flavours with a lightly spicy warm finish.

name: BACARDI - GOLD
tastingDescription: Bright gold in colour. It has vanilla, butterscotch and lemon zest aromas. On the palate, it has light fruit and toffee flavours with a lightly spicy warm finish.

name: BACARDI - LIME
tastingDescription: A special Bacardi rum blend from the Maestros de Ron provides a light base for the flavoured rums. Rum and fruit flavours are left to marry. Purified water is added to bring the product to bottling strength. Made with all-natural flavours, Bacardi Lime Flavoured Rum delivers the zest.

name: BACARDI - LIMON
tastingDescription: All natural flavours are combined with classic Bacardi white rum to produce this flavourful and mixable spirit. Water white this offers light floral with lemon aromas. On the palate, lemon zest with a touch of spice followed by a warm fresh finish.

name: BACARDI - MAESTRO
tastingDescription: Offering subtle notes of plum, spice, caramel and vanilla. The palate is smooth with a well-balanced and clean finish. Great for mixing or sipping on its own. Slow filtered and aged for three years for added complexity and smoothness.

name: BACARDI - MOJITO CLASSIC COCKTAIL
tastingDescription: Cloudy pale green colour; mint and lime aromas; slightly sweet lime flavour and cool mint finish.

name: BACARDI - SPICED RUM
tastingDescription: Barrel aged for superior flavour and smoothness, with a hint of smokiness from charred American oak. Bacardi Spiced Rum is blended with 100% natural flavours and spices for a bold, yet smooth taste. This spiced rum has both light and deep notes, making it perfect for mixing.

name: BACARDI - SPICED RUM
tastingDescription: Made with rum aged and unaged, with a hint of smokiness from charred American oak, Bacardi Spiced Rum is blended with natural flavours and spices for a bold, yet smooth taste. This spiced rum has both light and deep notes, making it perfect for mixing.

name: BACARDI - SUPERIOR WHITE
tastingDescription: Originated in 1862, Bacardi Superior White Rum is the original, mixable, light-bodied rum, aged between one to two years in carefully selected oak barrels. After aging, the rums are blended and passed through a second charcoal filtration to achieve maximum clarity and characteristic Bacardi smoothness.

name: BACARDI - SUPERIOR WHITE
tastingDescription: Originated in 1862, Bacardi Superior White Rum is the original, mixable, light-bodied rum, aged between one to two years in carefully selected oak barrels. After aging, the rums are blended and passed through a second charcoal filtration to achieve maximum clarity and characteristic Bacardi smoothness.

name: BAIKAL - VODKA
tastingDescription: Baikal vodka produced from premium quality non-GMO Russian grain and pure Lake Baikal water from 500 meter depth, Baikal vodka is naturally smoothed and flavored by the great Siberian land and is Kosher certified.

name: BAILEYS - APPLE PIE
tastingDescription: Flavours of delicious baked Apple pie blended with classic Baileys Irish Cream.

name: BAILEYS - DELICIOUSLY LIGHT
tastingDescription: The same delicious Baileys you know and love-a creamy, indulgent combination of Irish cream and rich vanilla flavours-now with 40% less sugar and 40% fewer calories.

name: BAILEYS - ESPRESSO CREME
tastingDescription: Baileys is all dressed up for the holidays with this limited edition festive bottle. Expect a sweet, thick coffee and cream liqueur with notes of chocolate, hazelnut and roasted coffee beans in this classic holiday treat.

name: BAILEYS - ORIGINAL IRISH CREAM
tastingDescription: Baileys is a natural marriage of fresh Irish dairy cream, sweet vanilla, dark cocoa, sugar, the finest spirit and Irish whiskey.

name: BAILEYS - ORIGINAL IRISH CREAM
tastingDescription: Baileys is a natural marriage of fresh Irish dairy cream, sweet vanilla, dark cocoa, sugar, the finest spirit and Irish whiskey.

name: BAILEYS - RED VELVET
tastingDescription: Have your cake and drink it too with NEW Baileys Red Velvet Cupcake! This seasonal limited-time-offer is an indulgent recipe of light, fluffy red velvet cupcakes with decadent cream cheese icing folded into Baileys Original Irish Cream. Best enjoyed chilled, poured  over ice or ice cream.

name: BAILEYS - SALTED CARAMEL
tastingDescription: Rich caramel and a hint of salt, artfully blended to create a sophisticated taste combination​.

name: BAILEYS - STRAWBERRIES AND CREAM
tastingDescription: Treat yourself to a grown-up strawberry milkshake! This is the classic lush cream you'd expect from Baileys, infused with strawberries and vanilla. Yum

name: BAILEYS ALMANDE - ALMOND BEVERAGE
tastingDescription: A dairy-free liquor. The blended light aroma of almonds and vanilla tantalize the nose before a marriage of vanilla, almond and a touch of rich honey delight the tongue leaving a long, deliciously light finish.

name: BAILEYS W 2 BOWLS
tastingDescription: Holiday gift pack with 2 bowls. Baileys is a natural marriage of fresh Irish dairy cream, sweet vanilla, dark cocoa, sugar, the finest spirit and Irish whiskey.

name: BAJA ROSA
tastingDescription: Baja Rosa is a strawberry cream liqueur made with real dairy cream, natural strawberry flavour and 100% agave tequila imported from Mexico.

name: BAKER'S - BOURBON
tastingDescription:
"Rich, multi-layered nose: vanilla, cornmeal, berries...Powerful, but ... controlled. The berries sing... over the corn-oak beat as the whole experience rocks along. It's powerful, sweet, authoritative, and finishes with a reprise of it all: berries, corn, vanilla, and stronger oak. Mature, complete bourbon with a 7 year age statement... "
92 Points, Whisky Advocate

name: BALBLAIR - 17 YO
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
Lifted and electric start on the nose with a vivid aroma profile of sour cherries, dried apricots, nuts and sherry. The palate has sultanas and prunes with great tannins reminiscent of sawn oak. Lavenders and other floral notes appear. The palate is sweet and meaty at the same time. Very complex and entertaining with a lot of components and a great, layered texture. The finish is never ending. An outstanding example amongst other great whiskies.
98 Points, International Wine and Spirit Competition 2019

name: BALLANTINE'S - FINEST

name: BALVENIE - 12 YEAR OLD DOUBLEWOOD
tastingDescription: Soft honey and vanilla give way to dried fruits and light spice with vanilla returning to carry through the finish in this lovely dram. Perfect with just about anything

name: BALVENIE - 14 YEAR OLD CARIBBEAN RUM CASK
nameSanitized: balvenie - 14 year old caribbean rum cask
sort: BALVENIE - 14 YEAR OLD CARIBBEAN RUM CASK
tastingDescription: 92 Points, Wine Enthusiast - "After regular maturation, this Scotch is “extra matured” in former rum casks. The end result layers rich, mouth-coating dried apricot, honey and Sherry notes on top of Balvenie's usual caramel and light peat profile. It finishes flavorful, though with a distinct burst of alcohol warmth.” (December 2015)

name: BALVENIE - 21 YEAR OLD PORTWOOD
tastingDescription: 94 Points, Wine Enthusiast - "A port cask finish gives this Scotch a copper penny hue. The aroma suggests baked apple, while the palate has a chewy, concentrated vanilla-oak profile, leading to walnut, leather and espresso. The rounded finish sings with sherry and spice. Adding water coaxes out baked apple sweetness and dials back the oak.” (December 2017)

name: BALVENIE - DARK BARLEY 26 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription:
The arrival at the distillery of a batch of dark roasted malted barley, more commonly used in the production of stout, marked the beginning of a 26-year long experiment. The result was a pleasing depth – smokiness and oakiness as well as the classic honey, vanilla and citrus flavours.
1 bottle limit

name: BALVENIE - WEEK OF PEAT 14YO
tastingDescription: Eager to experiment with The Balvenie profile using what he had learnt from a recent trip to Islay, distillery manager Ian Millar ordered a batch of Speyside peat for the kiln. For a week each year, The Balvenie distills a batch of peated malt, resulting in a whisky rich in honey, vanilla and citrus notes with an extra layer of delicate smokiness.

name: BANFF ICE
tastingDescription: Banff Ice is made from the finest grains and is triple distilled using Canadian glacier born Rocky Mountain water. Its unique cold filtering process removes unwanted impurities and creates an extra smooth and pure taste.

name: BANFF ICE
tastingDescription: Banff Ice is made from the finest grains and is triple distilled using Canadian glacier born Rocky Mountain water. Its unique cold filtering process removes unwanted impurities and creates an extra smooth and pure taste.

name: BARON SAMEDI - SPICED RUM
tastingDescription: 92 Points, Wine Enthusiast - “This robust rum has a deep, ruddy hue and cola-like vanilla and allspice scent. Despite an initial flicker of brown sugar and black cherry sweetness on the palate, it quickly morphs into a relatively dry finish, with hints of leather, clove, allspice and cocoa. According to the producer, the spirit is Caribbean column still rum enhanced with Jamaican pot still rum.” (June 2017)

name: BARSOL PISCO - QUEBRANTA
tastingDescription: Double Gold Medal San Francisco World Spirits Competition 2007. Light aromas of fresh apple, hay, ripen dry fruit, hints of pastry notes, angel food cake, cereal, vanilla, cacao, dark chocolate notes. On the palate the flavours confirm the aromas with more intensity, harmoniously complimented wit notes of granadilla fruit and egg fruit (lucuma), cacao and bitter chocolate, Taste toasted almonds and pecans. Smooth, long, lingering and elegant finish.

name: BASIL HAYDEN - TOAST
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
 This uniquely crafted 80 proof whiskey consists of an entirely new Basil Hayden's mashbill, replacing the traditional rye grain with brown rice, which adds a hint of sweetness and a touch less spice with increased depth of flavour that comes from secondary aging in a toasted then flash charred oak barrel. Rather than charring the barrel with open flame, the toasting process exposes the barrel to a long and gentle heat at a level proprietary to Basil Hayden. The softer notes from the Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey receive the flavours from the toasted barrels, which is then blended back with non Toasted bourbon to add complex flavour grounded in sweet vanilla, complemented by rich toasted notes.

name: BASIL HAYDEN 10 YEAR OLD RYE
tastingDescription: The mashbill features a slightly spicy yet approachable rye, resulting in an elegantly complex taste profile and a golden honey hue. This light, yet full-flavoured rye is sure to please any palate.

name: BASIL HAYDEN'S - KENTUCKY BOURBON
tastingDescription: This easy-drinking bourbon is velvety smooth on the palate with vanilla, toffee and traces of oak spice all in balance. The perfect gift alongside the pine nut brittle

name: BAYOU - PINK RUM
tastingDescription: The Mayhaw berries come through as soon as it hits your tongue, followed by the creamy smoothness that defines Bayou Rum.

name: BC LIQUOR STORES - 100TH ANNIVERSARY CANADIAN WHISKY
nameSanitized: bc liquor stores - 100th anniversary canadian whisky
sort: BC LIQUOR STORES - 100TH ANNIVERSARY CANADIAN WHISKY
tastingDescription: Distilled entirely from corn mash, and aged for a full 25 years in charred American bourbon oak barrels, this whisky has sweet aromas of orange peel, toffee, roasted almonds, mingling with warm flavours of baking spices and vanilla; with a gentle fruitiness and charred oak notes; the finish is silky and long.

name: BEARFACE 7 YEAR OLD TRIPLE OAK CANADIAN WHISKY
nameSanitized: bearface 7 year old triple oak canadian whisky
nameSuffix: BEARFACE 7 YEAR OLD TRIPLE OAK CANADIAN WHISKY
sort: BEARFACE 7 YEAR OLD TRIPLE OAK CANADIAN WHISKY
tastingDescription: Aged 7 years in ex bourbon barrels resulting in smooth vanilla notes. Then finished in tight grain ex red wine casks for dried fruit and chestnut notes. And a final finish in 3 year old, air dried virgin Hungarian oak to deliver a unique spice-finish.

name: BEATTIE'S - FARM CRAFTED POTATO VODKA
tastingDescription: Canadian Farm-Crafted using only the heart of the potato for a silky smooth spirit that is naturally gluten free. A subtle bouquet of buttery notes, followed by notes of white pepper, hints of almond and caramel. Ideal for enjoying over ice or in a martini with a hint of vermouth.

name: BEEFEATER - LONDON DRY
tastingDescription: A particularly fresh, clean and crisp gin with a key note of juniper, a subtle citrus and fruit edge, balanced by the spice of coriander and the earthiness of angelica.  Beefeater is a versatile, sociable spirit: its multi-dimensional character means it blends well with other flavours.

name: BEEFEATER - LONDON DRY
tastingDescription: A particularly fresh, clean and crisp gin with a key note of juniper, a subtle citrus and fruit edge, balanced by the spice of coriander and the earthiness of angelica.  Beefeater is a versatile, sociable spirit: its multi-dimensional character means it blends well with other flavours.

name: BELL'S - ORIGINAL
tastingDescription: Bell's has a distinctive, nutty and spicy flavour and is a blend of some 35 mature malt and grain whiskies from the Highlands, Islands and Lowlands of Scotland, which are brought together to create and outstanding Scotch whisky blend.

name: BELUGA NOBLE RUSSIAN VODKA
tastingDescription: A classic Russian vodka, clean and crisp with a little bit of grain flavour. Perfect for drinking straight, as is the Russian way, Beluga has become a huge word of mouth success story since 2009. Made with barley malt spirit, it is very lightly flavoured with honey and extracts of oat and milk thistle.

name: BELVEDERE
tastingDescription: Vodka Producer of the Year 2015, 2016 & 2017, International Spirits Challenge. Belvedere is silky smooth, with clean fresh aromas. This is great serve straight or in a dry martini.

name: BELVEDERE

name: BELVEDERE - DIAMOND RYE
tastingDescription: This premium vodka, made from Dankowskie diamond rye, has not been charcoal filtered so it has a full texture on the palate. Try it over ice.

name: BENEDICTINE - B AND B
tastingDescription: Combines the herbal French liqueur Benedictine with brandy for an easier-drinking version of the original. Look for notes of floral, nutmeg, anise and menthol on a medium-bodied and medium sweet palate with a long and herbal driven finish.

name: BENRIACH - 12 YEAR OLD SHERRYWOOD
tastingDescription: False

tastingDescription:
“Roasted berries, steamed barley, dark chocolate and snack crackers dominate the nose. Baking spices like mace, cinnamon and star anise create a rich base of flavour from which dark roasted coffee and cacao nib emerge. Expressive and complex.”
93 Points – Ultimate Spirit Challenge 2019

name: BENRIACH - PEATED CASK STRENGTH BATCH 1

name: BENRIACH - THE SMOKY TWELVE
tastingDescription: Available starting November 13th in select stores

name: BENRIACH - THE TWELVE
tastingDescription: Benriach 12 is three cask matured for at least twelve years in sherry casks, bourbon barrels and port casks. The whisky from each cask is then married together to create a smooth, sherry-rich single malt layered with baked fruit, and maple honey, perfectly balanced with a lingering spiced mocha finish.

name: BENROMACH - 10 YEARS OLD
tastingDescription: False

name: BISQUIT AND DUBOUCHE - V.S.O.P
tastingDescription: An inimitable bouquet of flavours, revealing complex and evocative aromas featuring a bouquet of ripe fruits, honey and sweet spice aromas underscored with floral touches. This warm cognac is beautifully balanced and has generous, full and ripe fruit flavours with supple notes of honeysuckle, citrus and mango.

name: BLACKENED - AMERICAN WHISKEY
tastingDescription: A collaboration between iconic heavy metal band Metallica and the late Master Distiller Dave Pickerell, this is a blend of American whiskeys, on average about seven years, and finished with sonic aging in ex-brandy barrels -yes, that means Metallica's music was played to the whiskey. Look for bold, honey, vanilla and golden raisin, drying into a spicy, drying slightly fiery black pepper and clove finish.

name: BLACKENED - AMERICAN WHISKEY COLLECTOR'S EDITION
tastingDescription: Signed bottles of Blackened American Whiskey by the members of the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame band, Metallica.

name: BLACKWELL - 007 LIMITED EDITION RUM

tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
Matured in hand-selected ex-bourbon casks for 10 years, this single malt has a sweet, spicy character. Delicate floral aromas with notes of honey and refreshing citrus mingle with flavours of parma violets with fresh apples and hints of wood spice. The sweet mouth-coating texture leads to a refreshing finish. 
Single Malt Category Winner, World Whisky Awards 2019

name: BLANTON'S - GOLD EDITION SINGLE BARREL
tastingDescription:
"Shows a delicious dark-toned nose of baked apple, savory rye, cured oak, and black cherry. Big wood flavors dominate the palate and unfold into sweet spiced pecan, whipped nougat, and invigorating blast of black pepper."
94 pts. -  Ultimate Spirits Challenge 2021
1 Bottle limit.

name: BLANTON'S - ORIGINAL
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
"An indulgent nose abounds with notes of toasted orange peel, coconut cream pie, strawberry liqueur, pipe tobacco, and sandalwood. The palate offers sumptuous additions of toffee and chewy caramel, with tinges of dark chocolate and golden raisin that permeate the spicy finish."
95 pts, Extraordinary, Ultimate Recommendation, Ultimate Spirits Competition 2021
1 Bottle limit.

Bols Blue is the perfect ingredient for any cocktail.

name: BOMBAY - BRAMBLE
tastingDescription: A rich, 100% natural berry taste, balanced with a classic dry gin base whilst still allowing the signature botanicals to shine through. Blended with a deep red infusion of blackberries and raspberries, with no added sugar. Enjoy in a Bramble cocktail or serve with tonic or lemon lime soda.

An aromatic nose filled with spicier notes and soft palate delicate with flavours of citrus and pepper complement the juniper and linger on the finish.

name: BOMBAY SAPPHIRE - LONDON DRY
tastingDescription: Created from a combination of ten botanicals, including juniper berries from Tuscany, which are vapour infused for delicate extraction. This process results in elegant aromas and complex flavours that are clean and balanced with a crisp finish.
