tastingDescription: Created from a combination of ten botanicals, including juniper berries from Tuscany, which are vapour infused for delicate extraction. This process results in elegant aromas and complex flavours that are clean and balanced with a crisp finish.

name: BOMBAY SAPPHIRE - LONDON DRY
tastingDescription: The complex and refined taste of Bombay is created using a vapor infusion of botanicals such as orris root, orange peel, angelica and grains of paradise. Perfect for blending in premium cocktails!

name: BOMBERGER'S - DECLARATION SMALL BATCH BOURBON
tastingDescription:
Rich, mahogany brown appearance with notes of toast and buttery caramel with some plum. On the palate, full throttle yet remarkably smooth with some burnt sugar and a bit of both milk chocolate and dark chocolate. Finish is robust with complex depth.
1 Bottle limit.

name: BOODLES - LONDON DRY
tastingDescription: Boodles is distilled with a select blend of botanicals including nutmeg, sage, coriander, and rosemary to yield a softer, more balanced London Dry profile. Distilled without citrus, and crafted with care in the UK, this clean, proper gin is the ideal spirit for mixing simply with tonic or in your favourite gin cocktail.

name: BOOKER'S - BOURBON SMALL BATCH
tastingDescription: No wallflower, this assertive bourbon starts with sweet butterscotch and builds to a peppery and oaky mid-palate before subtly relenting to a toasty, extremely long finish.

name: BOOKER'S LITTLE BOOK - CHAPTER 04
tastingDescription: Chapter 4: Lessons Honoured, a cask strength whiskey, continues to showcase Freddie Noe's creative imagination and blending skills. This newest chapter enables us to capitalize on the continued growth in small batch and will appeal to whiskey fanatics and discovery seekers looking for unique finds and limited edition releases.

name: BOOKER'S LITTLE BOOK - CHAPTER 05
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
Little Book Chapter 5: "The Invitation" is the fifth chapter in 8th Generation Beam Distiller Freddie Noe's Little Book Whiskey annual release series. This year's iteration contains four straight whiskies of varying ages, distillation styles and resulting flavor profiles. A  2-year-old Kentucky straight bourbon, a 3-year-old 100% malted rye, a 5-year-old Kentucky straight bourbon, and a 15-year-old Kentucky straight bourbon. "While younger whiskies–which make up the base of this blend–often carry certain preconceived notions, the 2-year-old bourbon and 3-year-old 100% malted rye have strong characteristics because of the way they were crafted, and they play a purposeful role in providing complex flavor and balance to this year's Little Book release," Freddie Noe explains.
1 Bottle limit.

name: BOOMSMA  - YOUNG GENEVER JONGE
tastingDescription: This 100% pure grain gin gives light aroma of juniper berries. Double distillation adds extra smooth character. Experience the full sensation of its refined and natural taste when slightly chilled.

name: BOTTEGA - ALEXANDER EXQUISITE GRAPPA RISERVA
tastingDescription: False

name: BOTTEGA - NEGRONI
tastingDescription: Ruby red, with vermilion reflections. Elegant and dry, reveals intense citrus fragrances on the nose, in particular red orange, accompanied by spicy hints and aromatic herb notes. Full and enveloping, with an excellent structure and at the same time refreshing, presents an excellent balance on the palate between the bitterness of the bitter, the soft note of the vermouth and the pungent aroma of the gin.

name: BOULARD - CALVADOS PAYS D'AUGE GRAND SOLAGE
nameSanitized: boulard - calvados pays dauge grand solage
sort: BOULARD - CALVADOS PAYS D'AUGE GRAND SOLAGE
tastingDescription: A blend of Calvados varieties from the Pays d'Auge, aged a minimum two years. Characterised by its apple fragrance and amber colour, the pure initial taste of the Grand Solage is followed by a fruity flavour and the vanilla taste of oak. Perfect with a meal, as an aperitif with tonic or on ice.

name: BOWMORE - 12 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription:
Warm amber colour, subtle lemon and honey, balanced beautifully by Bowmore's trademark peaty smokiness aromas. On the palate sweet and delicious heather honey and gentle peat smoke for a long, mellow finish.
2019 San Francisco World Spirits Competition - Gold Medal. 2019 New York International Spirits Competition - Silver Medal. 2019 International Spirits Challenge - Silver Medal.

name: BOWMORE - 15 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: 94 Points, Wine Enthusiast - "Complex and contemplative. The enticing scent mixes iodine, sea breeze and salted caramel, while the light, soft palate shows smoke, cocoa and dried fig notes, drying to clove and black pepper sparks. Water softens the overall impression to mocha and spice, with a mild blanket of campfire smoke on the exit.” (December 2017)

name: BOWMORE - 18 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: Breathe in classic Bowmore smokiness, perfectly tempered with creamy caramel, chocolate and ripe fruit aromas. Sip beautiful soft fruit and chocolate balanced with a light smokiness – incredibly complex. Savor the long and wonderfully balanced finish.

name: BOWMORE - 25 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: "Creme Brulee topping, with chopped basil, mint and honey on the nose. The palate gives more of the same, but with additional herbs of thyme and cloves and a bigger hit of deep, musty peat. Red currants on the finish and a hint of peat smoke." Gold - International Wine and Spirit Competiton 2016

name: BOWMORE - 27 YEAR OLD TIMELESS SERIES
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
The  Timeless Series has been crafted over decades, a true celebration of the vital role of time in every drop of Bowmore. Aromas of fruity cooked plums and prune jam mingle with Corinth raisins and sultana plus wafts of toffee, maple syrup, liquorice, grilled orange peel and smoked seaweed. On the palate, flavours of tobacco, rich cocoa and warming Islay peat smoke lead to a long with scented burnt wood notes, dry fruits and a touch of frankincense.

name: BOWMORE - 30 YO VAULT SERIES RELEASE
tastingDescription:
"Orange peel and black tea greet the nose on this mellow, ultra-aged expression, and lead to delicate notes of raisin, strawberry coulis, and a whiff of incense and light peat. An overlay of muted spice and peat hovers above the palate, which offers orange marmalade, cooked red berries, and chocolate eclair, punctuated on the finish by an appealing cigar ash note. Dessert and a fine stogie rolled into one."
92 pts. - Whisky Advocate 2021

name: BOWMORE - NO. 1 MALT
tastingDescription: A striking bright yellow-gold; unmistakably Islay character on the nose - peat smoke, pungent seashore and medicinal aromas; the palate brings a surprisingly focused sweetness, and this gives way to citrus, toasted nuts and chocolate; the sweetness counters the dry tang of peat smoke and leads to a long balanced finish.

name: BOWMORE - VAULT 2ND EDITION
tastingDescription: The Vault Editions are hand-selected to uncover the depth and range of flavour generated by such alchemy. This second Vault Edition showcases Bowmore's perfectly balanced smokey character, wisps of peat smoke at once enveloping and exciting the senses.

name: BRENNE - FRENCH SINGLE MALT WHISKY
tastingDescription: Available starting November 13th in select stores

name: BROCKMANS - PREMIUM GIN
tastingDescription: Brockmans stands proudly alone from the many other types of gin due to the unique recipe of exquisite botanicals and the patient steeping distillation process. To make Brockmans, botanicals are sourced from all over the world. These include some typical ingredients such as angelica from Saxony, Bulgarian coriander and juniper berries from Tuscany. The more traditional notes of gin are combined with a refreshing influence of citrus and aromatic wild berry. This creates an intensely smooth gin with a beautifully crafted taste that is sensual and daringly different.

name: BROKER'S - LONDON DRY PREMIUM
tastingDescription: Made with the finest herbs, spices and fruit imported from three continents, Broker’s Gin is specially blended to be dry.

name: BRUGAL - ANEJO SUPERIOR
tastingDescription: 92 Points - Excellent, Highly Recommended, Ultimate Spirits Challenge 2018, "Aromatically generous notes of vanilla, brown sugar and cinnamon on the nose. Really smooth of the palate, tobacco, cedar and apple pie persist on the palate. The oak flavors are very well integrated in the profile of this rum."

name: BRUICHLADDICH - 25 YEAR OLD 1990 CASK 167 LMDW ARTIST #9
nameSanitized: bruichladdich - 25 year old 1990 cask 167 lmdw artist #9
sort: BRUICHLADDICH - 25 YEAR OLD 1990 CASK 167 LMDW ARTIST #9
tastingDescription:
The whisky opens with wafts of malted barley which evolve into medicinal, vanilla, pear and savoury aromas. The palate is generous and fruity, with strawberry and raspberry flavours, complemented by Williams pear. On the finish, salty, marine notes are evident, flowing with a creamy coconut and almond touch.
1 Bottle limit.

name: BRUICHLADDICH - BLACK ART 9.1
tastingDescription:
Black Art 9.1 was distilled in 1992 and aged for 29 years, making it the oldest expression in the series to date. This unpeated Islay single malt was bottled un-chill filtered and colouring-free.
1 Bottle Limit

name: BRUICHLADDICH - OCTOMORE 10.4
tastingDescription: False

name: BRUICHLADDICH - OCTOMORE 12.1
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
Octomore 12.1 was distilled in 2015 from Scottish Concerto barley and aged for five years in bourbon casks. This super heavily peated Islay single malt is peated at 130.8 PPM and bottled at 59.9% ABV. Peppery and sweet on the palate, with a texture of warm golden syrup. Honey and peat smoke then fired oak chips and peaty apricot jam open. A mineral sandy note sits on the palate and brings through a dry phenolic earthy smoke and hints of orange zest and pear drops.

name: BRUICHLADDICH - OCTOMORE 12.3
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
Octomore 12.3 was distilled in 2015 from Islay Concerto barley and aged for five years in bourbon and Pedro Ximénez sherry casks. This super heavily peated Islay single malt is peated at 118.1 PPM. Peppery, dark chocolate, earthy peat smoke and those sherry fruits rush across the palate at first. The Peat smoke and the dried fruit dominate and then comes the barley sugar and charred oak, releasing those rich toffee and tobacco notes. Charcoal, soot and dried figs. Salted lemons and bitter chocolate on the finish.

name: BRUICHLADDICH - ORGANIC 2010
tastingDescription: False

name: BRUICHLADDICH - PORT CHARLOTTE 10 YEAR
tastingDescription: False

name: BRUICHLADDICH - PORT CHARLOTTE ISLAY BARLEY 2013
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
Port Charlotte Islay Barley expressions are a direct embodiment of everything an Islay whisky can and should be. Not only is it conceived, distilled, matured and bottled on the island, but the barley harvest for this 2013 vintage was also raised on Bruichladdich's home shores. There is great texture, a subtle almond note to combine with coconut, caramel, vanilla, and muscovado sugar. The peat smoke in this whisky is as beautifully balanced as ever, weaving through the components, highlighting them but not dominating. A dram that is gentle on the palate yet has a tremendous depth of flavour.

name: BRUICHLADDICH - PORT CHARLOTTE ISLAY BARLEY 2013
tastingDescription: False

name: BRUICHLADDICH - PORT CHARLOTTE PAUILLAC CASK
tastingDescription: Available starting November 13th in select stores

name: BRUICHLADDICH - SCOTTISH BARLEY THE LADDIE CLASSIC
nameSanitized: bruichladdich - scottish barley the laddie classic
sort: BRUICHLADDICH - SCOTTISH BARLEY THE LADDIE CLASSIC
tastingDescription: Pale gold in colour with delicate aromas of floral, honey and dried fruit notes. The palate is medium with notes of caramel, floral, apricots, banana and a light smokiness with a long finish.

name: BRUICHLADDICH - THE BOTANIST ISLAY DRY
tastingDescription: Comprised of 9 standard botanicals and an additional 22, hand-foraged from the island of Islay, this gin has a lot to discover. On the nose, there is a fresh lemony aroma coupled with spring flowers and a touch of mint. On the palate, this gin is clean with lemon florals with whispers of juniper.

Available starting November 13th in select stores

93 pts, Excellent, Highly Recommended, Ultimate Spirits Challenge 2018

tastingDescription: 94 Points, Wine Enthusiast - "Pleasantly sweet nose. Medium body and sticky-toffee flavor. name: BULLEIT - 10 YEAR OLD FRONTIER KENTUCKY STRAIGHT BOURBON
nameSanitized: bulleit - 10 year old frontier kentucky straight bourbon
nameSuffix: 10 YEAR OLD FRONTIER KENTUCKY STRAIGHT BOURBON
sort: BULLEIT - 10 YEAR OLD FRONTIER KENTUCKY STRAIGHT BOURBON
tastingDescription: 93 Points, Wine Enthusiast - "The creamy caramel and vanilla scent is echoed on the palate, where it's also interwoven with espresso and clove, finishing relatively dry. A splash of water mellows the alcohol heat and the flavor still sings out boldly.” (September 2016)

name: BULLEIT - BOURBON
tastingDescription: High rye concentration and limestone filtration along with highly charred barrels give this whisky a clear golden amber colour and aromas of rich toffee, roasted grain, spice and smoky oak notes. The palate is full body and smooth with flavours of vanilla, apple, sweet spice and smoky oak followed by a long finish.

name: BULLEIT - FRONTIER BOURBON
tastingDescription: 95 Points & Best Buy, Wine Enthusiast - "Golden and bright, this straight Bourbon whiskey is one of the most versatile around. Though it starts with a sweet flavor profile with hints of vanilla and cookie dough, it finishes supple and dry, with notes of leather, black tea and cinnamon. Bracing alcohol levels.” (September 2013)

name: BULLEIT - FRONTIER BOURBON
tastingDescription: 95 Points & Best Buy, Wine Enthusiast - "Golden and bright, this straight Bourbon whiskey is one of the most versatile around. Though it starts with a sweet flavor profile with hints of vanilla and cookie dough, it finishes supple and dry, with notes of leather, black tea and cinnamon. Bracing alcohol levels.” (September 2013)

name: BUMBU - CRAFT RUM
tastingDescription: Elegance and balance are the best way to describe this Bajan rum with equal parts caramel, vanilla, oak spice with some dried orange peel and nuts creeping in on the finish

name: BUMBU - CRAFT RUM
tastingDescription: Bumbu is distilled using two continuous stills and aged up to 15 years in grade-A, once-used Kentucky bourbon barrels. The yeast used during fermentation is a distillery secret that dates back as far as 1840, when some of the original iron pot stills were cast. Bumbu handcrafts their rums from a blend of sugarcane selected from eight countries throughout the West Indies and South America to bring exceptional balance and smoothness, without sacrificing richness and complexity that makes the Barbados distillery world-renown.

name: BUMBU - CREME
tastingDescription: Bumbu Crème is a perfect blend of Bumbu Rum, select spices, and rich, decadent, real dairy cream. It's an irresistible creation that is perfect chill straight, on the rocks, or in a cocktail.

name: BUMBU - X0 RUM
tastingDescription: Aromas of toffee, toasted oak, and vanilla give way to orange zest, peppery spice, and even a hint of coffee. A wonderfully engaging, sherry-finished rum that is delicious and endlessly sippable!

name: BUNNAHABHAIN - 10 YEAR OLD SINGLE CASK LMDW ARTIST SERIES 1
nameSanitized: bunnahabhain - 10 year old single cask lmdw artist series 1
nameSuffix: 10 YEAR OLD SINGLE CASK LMDW ARTIST SERIES 1
sort: BUNNAHABHAIN - 10 YEAR OLD SINGLE CASK LMDW ARTIST SERIES 1
tastingDescription: False

name: BUNNAHABHAIN - 12 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: The nose is fresh and aromatic. The taste starts with a light fruit and nut appeal that leads to a malty sweetness, finishing into a beautifully rich full-bodied experience. Natural colour. Un-chill filtered.

name: BUNNAHABHAIN - 2008 MANZANILLA
tastingDescription: Every golden drop of this divine single malt has been carefully matured in former Manzanilla casks for a full 11 years. Resting amid the gentle echo of the Sound of Islay, its resulting character runs deep with salted caramel, and swims with sublime currents of oak, nuts and fruit. A limited release from Bunnahabhain.

name: BUNNAHABHAIN - 25 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: Magnificently well aged with a spiced oak glow, the 25 year old is smooth and sweet - sherry, caramel, berries and cream are balanced with roasted nuts to make a delicate yet complex single malt. Unchill filtered, natural colour.

tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
A voluptuous bouquet of purple lilacs, cocoa bean, tropical fruits, citrus orange and spice opens and develops the aroma profile. The palate gives us sweet fruit candy, dark chocolate and dried fruits. On the finish, we are taken into the world of exotic fruit, guava and touches of eucalyptus and pine.
1 Bottle limit.

name: BUNNAHABHAIN - 40 YEAR OLD 1979 CASK 6508 LMDW ARTIST #9
nameSanitized: bunnahabhain - 40 year old 1979 cask 6508 lmdw artist #9
sort: BUNNAHABHAIN - 40 YEAR OLD 1979 CASK 6508 LMDW ARTIST #9
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
This 40 year old bursts with exotic passion fruit notes, spicy nutmeg, chocolate and honey. Further encompassing the aroma profile, we have mandarin citrus. The palate attack is dominated by licorice and cocoa, with snippets of aromatic herbs. The finish is fresh with herbs and spice as the fresh palate flavours mingle together in unison. 
1 Bottle limit.

name: BUSHMILLS - 10 YO SINGLE MALT COGNAC FINISH
nameSanitized: bushmills - 10 yo single malt cognac finish
sort: BUSHMILLS - 10 YO SINGLE MALT COGNAC FINISH
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
After maturing for seven years in oloroso sherry butts and bourbon barrels, the whiskey was finished in rare Cognac casks for 2.5 years. This long period of finishing rounds and ripens the fruit, creating a deeper indulgent sweetness. Wood spices, like cinnamon, develop alongside a nutty and ancient oakwood note. It's a sensational whiskey that stands with the best of Irish single malt, a giant in its own right.

name: BUSHMILLS - 21 YEAR OLD SINGLE MALT
tastingDescription: This rare Irish single malt is aged for a minimum of 19 years in former Oloroso Sherry and Bourbon casks, then finished in Madeira casks for 2 years. The result is a whiskey with aromas of dried fruit, flavours of spicy malt, nuts, toasted raisins, and a full-bodied finish. Enjoy it neat or over ice.

name: BUSHMILLS - BLACK BUSH
tastingDescription: This triple distilled Irish Whiskey includes a high proportion of single malt whiskey that has been matured 8 years in former Oloroso Sherry casks. Black Bush is rich, fruity, and nutty with flavours of rich jam and dark chocolate with a rich finish. Enjoy on the rocks or in your favourite cocktail.

name: BUSHMILLS - TRIPLE DISTILLED
tastingDescription: The World's Oldest Whiskey Distillery recipe is a blend that includes a high proportion of triple distilled single malt whiskey. Matured in Bourbon casks, with aromas of dried coconut, oatmeal, tropical fruits and subtle vanilla on the palate with a creamy finish. Enjoy over ice or with a mixer.

name: BUTTER RIPPLE SCHNAPPS - PHILLIPS
tastingDescription: Big butterscotch and praline flavours open on the palate and lead into a developed hazelnut and toffee finish

name: BUTTER RIPPLE SCHNAPPS - PHILLIPS
tastingDescription: Delightful aromas of praline and butterscotch lead to a palate that is smooth and creamy with flavours of nuts and caramel. This schnapps has a rich, butterscotch taste but is not too sweet. Try it on ice, over ice cream or with these special shortbread cookies.

name: CABO WABO - REPOSADO
tastingDescription: A smooth, no after-burn taste that’s peppery with plenty of fruit flavours of sweet lime and orange touched with fresh herbs and mint.

name: CABOT TRAIL - MAPLE CREAM
tastingDescription: Cabot Trail Maple Cream is an authentic cream beverage that marries the richness of pure Canadian maple syrup with fresh cream. Cocoa, cinnamon and amaretto merge with the maple, creating a powerful synergy of flavours, resulting in an intensely chocolatey finish and a fine, gossamer-like texture.

name: CACHACA 51
tastingDescription: Distilled from the fresh juice of Brazilian grown sugar canes, Cachaça 51 has a pleasant and sweet aroma with notes of fresh apple and sugar cane juice. Cachaça 51 is spicy, with a sweet and herbaceous finish in flavour.

name: CALEDONIAN - 40 YEAR OLD THE CADDY
tastingDescription: An extremely rare limited release of whisky from Caledonian, a closed Edinburgh distillery. The whisky is an extra-mature, cask strength, single grain that is the oldest Caledonian whisky ever released by the original distillers. Distilled in 1974 and aged in refill American Oak hogsheads. Quite out of the ordinary, one of the most individual whiskies you could taste and an excellent apéritif; highly complex yet wonderfully open and accessible, with a compelling nose; clean, fresh and fruity with a pleasing, oaky character that is amplified when a little water is added.

name: CALVADOS - CHRISTIAN DROUIN  COEUR DE LION PAYS D'AUGE X.O
nameSanitized: calvados - christian drouin  coeur de lion pays dauge x.o
nameSuffix: CHRISTIAN DROUIN  COEUR DE LION PAYS D'AUGE X.O
sort: CALVADOS - CHRISTIAN DROUIN  COEUR DE LION PAYS D'AUGE X.O
tastingDescription: False

name: CALVADOS - PERE MAGLOIRE FINE V.S.
tastingDescription: This eau-de-vie is a light amber yellow and originates from a single distillation of ciders produced from selected apples of Normandy. A well-developed fresh apple aroma reflects the distinct fruity flavour on the palate. Drink straight, on ice, in cocktails or as a digestive.

name: CAMARENA - REPOSADO
tastingDescription: Mellowed in premium American oak barrels for no less than 60 days, this Reposado tequila shows the perfect balance of natural agave sweetness and soft spice. Finishes with a naturally smooth and warm taste without the burn.

name: CAMBRIDGE - TRUFFLE GIN
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
Truffle Gin is the world'ss first digestif gin. This luxurious spirit is 
led by white truffle from Alba, Piedmont–an ingredient which is 
worth more than gold per gram. Innovatively distilled to preserve the full flavour of the truffle, Truffle Gin achieves a flavour profile more usually associated with mature spirits, and is a complex and well-balanced spirit of unparallelled depth and complexity. Enjoy it neat, over ice or in a decadent Truffle Negroni.
Gold, European Spirits Challenge 2021

name: CAMBUS - 32 YEAR OLD OLD PARTICULAR DOUGLAS LAING

nameSuffix: 32 YEAR OLD OLD PARTICULAR DOUGLAS LAING
sort: CAMBUS - 32 YEAR OLD OLD PARTICULAR DOUGLAS LAING
tastingDescription: Available starting November 13th in select stores

name: CAMPARI
tastingDescription: This brilliant, naturally red “tonic” is one of the best-known aperitivos on the planet. An infusion of 60 herbs and fruits, the result is an intriguing mix of bitter, sweet, sour and fruit flavours. Mix Campari with soda or orange juice, or enjoy a Negroni or Americano cocktail.

name: CANADIAN CLUB - 100% RYE CHAIRMAN'S SELECT
tastingDescription: The Master Blender's artful selection of liquid from three different barrels allows for the perfect balance of rye flavour and the signature smoothness delivered by Canadian Club.

name: CANADIAN CLUB - 44YO CC CHRONICLES ISSUE NO.4
nameSanitized: canadian club - 44yo cc chronicles issue no.4
sort: CANADIAN CLUB - 44YO CC CHRONICLES ISSUE NO.4
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
The 'Whisky Sixes' roadsters could easily outrun police cars, adding glamour and panache to Canadian Club. Savour the hallmark CC smoothness with the complex blend of sweet, crisp apple, plum and dried fruit mixed with zesty spice and chocolate. A well-rounded finish with the wood tannins for which Canadian Club is known.

name: CANADIAN CLUB - CLASSIC
tastingDescription: Bronze to autumn gold colour. Soft, round, fully-balanced and creamy on the nose. Fruity and firm. On the palate, delicate spiciness and creamy vanilla, in balance with rich wood and luxurious honey for a long and dry finish with enduring presence of butterscotch.

name: CANADIAN CLUB - PREMIUM
tastingDescription: Barrel blended prior to aging in white oak barrels for six years, Canadian Club has fresh and soft aromas with an almond nuttiness, a hint of spice and sweet fresh oak. Spicy and zesty on the palate with hints of wood and vanilla with a clean, dry and lingering subtle oak.

name: CANADIAN CLUB - PREMIUM
tastingDescription: Barrel blended prior to aging in white oak barrels for six years, Canadian Club has fresh and soft aromas with an almond nuttiness, a hint of spice and sweet fresh oak. Spicy and zesty on the palate with hints of wood and vanilla with a clean, dry and lingering subtle oak.

name: CANADIAN CLUB - PREMIUM
tastingDescription: Barrel blended prior to aging in white oak barrels for six years, Canadian Club has fresh and soft aromas with an almond nuttiness, a hint of spice and sweet fresh oak. Spicy and zesty on the palate with hints of wood and vanilla with a clean, dry and lingering subtle oak.

name: CANADIAN CLUB - PREMIUM
tastingDescription: Barrel blended prior to aging in white oak barrels for six years, Canadian Club has fresh and soft aromas with an almond nuttiness, a hint of spice and sweet fresh oak. Spicy and zesty on the palate with hints of wood and vanilla with a clean, dry and lingering subtle oak.

name: CANADIAN CLUB - PREMIUM
tastingDescription: Barrel blended prior to aging in white oak barrels for six years, Canadian Club has fresh and soft aromas with an almond nuttiness, a hint of spice and sweet fresh oak. Spicy and zesty on the palate with hints of wood and vanilla with a clean, dry and lingering subtle oak.

name: CAOL ILA HIGHLAND 15 YO
tastingDescription:
“Unpeated Caol Ila has become a staple in Diageo’s Special Releases program. This year’s expression was matured in a combination of refill and rejuvenated American oak barrels and bodega European oak butts. Fresh and spicy on the nose, with tropical fruit aromas. Creamy on the palate, with fruit-and-nut milk chocolate bars, plus notes of developing citrus. The finish is slightly earthy, with wood spices.”
91 Points – Whisky Advocate 2018

name: CAPEL - PISCO SOUR LIGHT
tastingDescription: Pisco is a national spirit from Chile and is produced from all-natural aromatic grapes. It is similar to tequila and vodka but made with Muscatel grapes. Natural low calorie sour cocktail, ready to drink!

name: CAPTAIN MORGAN
tastingDescription: Aged in oak for about two years, Captain Morgan has a dry, light taste, with a slightly sweet aftertaste, suitable for mixing.

name: CAPTAIN MORGAN
tastingDescription: Aged in oak for about two years, Captain Morgan has a dry, light taste, with a slightly sweet aftertaste, suitable for mixing.

name: CAPTAIN MORGAN
tastingDescription: Aged in oak for about two years, Captain Morgan has a dry, light taste, with a slightly sweet aftertaste, suitable for mixing.

name: CAPTAIN MORGAN - BLACK SPICED
tastingDescription: A darker, bolder spiced rum, crafted with black strap rum for a deliciously smooth finish. Try it on the rocks or in one of our many classic cocktails.

name: CAPTAIN MORGAN - DARK
tastingDescription: Aged in oad for more than one year, this rum is deep brown in colour. It has a dry taste, with nutty mild wood nuances.

name: CAPTAIN MORGAN - DELUXE
tastingDescription: Made from the finest, most premium reserves of Captain Morgan's oldest rums. Perfect sipping rum, enjoyed on the rocks or with juice and soda.

name: CAPTAIN MORGAN - GINGERBREAD SPICED
tastingDescription: Captain Morgan is ringing in the holidays by blending our signature taste with all the flavour and deliciousness of gingerbread spiced cookies for a unique seasonal offering. Notes of ginger, cinnamon, clove, cocoa, nutmeg, molasses & cardamom highlight this flavoured alcoholic beverage, along with all the freshly-baked notes you would expect. Enjoy as a shot or with your favorite mixer.

name: CAPTAIN MORGAN - GOLD
tastingDescription: Captain Morgan Gold rum is a medium -bodied amber rum that gets its distinct richness from blending aged dark rum into the formula. Aging the rum in white oak barrels gives it a smooth, distinguished character. Use it to spice up those classic party potions, from simple mixers to more complicated concoctions.

name: CAPTAIN MORGAN - GOLD
tastingDescription: Captain Morgan Gold rum is a medium -bodied amber rum that gets its distinct richness from blending aged dark rum into the formula. Aging the rum in white oak barrels gives it a smooth, distinguished character. Use it to spice up those classic party potions, from simple mixers to more complicated concoctions.

name: CAPTAIN MORGAN - JACK O' BLAST
tastingDescription: A balanced taste of pumpkin, caramel and vanilla with a sweet and spicy finish of cinnamon and cloves.

name: CAPTAIN MORGAN - ORANGE VANILLA TWIST
tastingDescription: A distinctive, limited edition summertime offering of our famous spiced rum taken to new heights with a deliciously smooth blend of bright, fresh orange balanced with a creamy vanilla finish.

name: CAPTAIN MORGAN - PINEAPPLE RUM
tastingDescription: Fragrant, fresh pineapple aroma with a ripe and juicy pineapple taste profile. Slight notes of molasses with a sweet, full-bodied finish.

name: CAPTAIN MORGAN - PRIVATE STOCK SPICED
tastingDescription: The Captain's Private Stock is spiced rum cranked up a notch! It adds a fantastic spicy twist to traditional cocktails or a hot buttered rum.

name: CAPTAIN MORGAN - SLICED APPLE
tastingDescription: False

name: CAPTAIN MORGAN - SPICED
tastingDescription: Smooth and medium-bodied, Captain Morgan Original Spiced Rum is a secret blend of Caribbean rums, mellow spice and natural flavours. It gets its distinct richness and amber colour from aging in charred white oak barrels.

name: CAPTAIN MORGAN - SPICED
tastingDescription: Smooth and medium-bodied, Captain Morgan Original Spiced Rum is a secret blend of Caribbean rums, mellow spice and natural flavours. It gets its distinct richness and amber colour from aging in charred white oak barrels.

tastingDescription: Mixed spices, special fruit flavours and heavy vanilla notes come together with a slight spiciness on a rich palate to create a perfectly balanced spirit with a smooth finish. Flavourful with notes of vanilla, toffee, cinnamon, clove, nutmeg and dried apricot.

name: CAPTAIN MORGAN - SPICED
tastingDescription: Smooth and medium-bodied, Captain Morgan Original Spiced Rum is a secret blend of Caribbean rums, mellow spice and natural flavours. It gets its distinct richness and amber colour from aging in charred white oak barrels.

tastingDescription: Smooth and medium-bodied, Captain Morgan Original Spiced Rum is a secret blend of Caribbean rums, mellow spice and natural flavours. It gets its distinct richness and amber colour from aging in charred white oak barrels.

name: CARDHU - 12 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: Double Gold, San Francisco World Spirits Competition 2011. Made since 1824, the 12-year-old Cardhu (Gaelic for black rock) is an accessible, light and bright single malt. It is fragrant with heather, honeyed vanilla, fruit and smoke. Smooth, and well-balanced with nutty, sweet malty flavours, it finishes mildly spicy and warm.

name: CARIBOU CROSSING - SINGLE BARREL
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
Dark honey in the glass, this whisky boasts maple and cedar aromas in the bouquet. Expect lots of spice on the palate, including clove, cinnamon, nutmeg, cayenne and black pepper, all smoothed over by a ribbon of maple and honey. It finishes big, round, buttery and mouthwatering.

name: CARN MOR - MACALLAN 28YO MORRISON & MACKAY
tastingDescription: Exclusive single cask bottling for BC Liquor Stores. This an extremely rare and old single cask of Macallan from Morrison & Mackay. Cask No. 5210 was filled back on March 7th, 1991 with the iconic Macallan whisky and then matured for over 28 years until it was bottled on July, 29, 2019. Only 96 bottles of this exceptional whisky were produced. Beautifully fragrant whisky with aroma’s of tropical fruits and soft vanilla. It has incredible balance on the palate, with juicy pineapple and heather honey. Finishing off with vanilla cream and tangy tropical fruits that take center stage of the long lingering finish.

name: CAROLANS - COLD BREW
tastingDescription: False

name: CAROLANS - IRISH CREAM
tastingDescription: This Irish cream is velvety and creamy in color. On the nose, it has smooth toffee notes married with dairy scent and honey memories. On the palate, it is vanilla in flavour with a smooth texture. It has a creamy taste, accented with the burnished gold of aged spirits and wildflowers honey.

name: CAROLANS - IRISH CREAM
tastingDescription: This Irish cream is velvety and creamy in color. On the nose, it has smooth toffee notes married with dairy scent and honey memories. On the palate, it is vanilla in flavour with a smooth texture. It has a creamy taste, accented with the burnished gold of aged spirits and wildflowers honey.

On the palate, it is vanilla in flavour with a smooth texture. It has a creamy taste, accented with the burnished gold of aged spirits and wildflowers honey.

name: CAROLANS - IRISH MIST
tastingDescription: Warming whiskey with honey, beautifully counter-balanced by darker spicy notes and a touch of bitter dark chocolate.

name: CAROLANS - SALTED CARAMEL
tastingDescription: Luscious butterscotch, vanilla and crème caramel flavours are enlivened with the bright tang of salt in this holiday liqueur

name: CARSEBRIDGE - 48 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription:
“Sure, the oldest of this year’s Diageo Special Releases manifests the brown-and-orange world of 1970 incarnate, but it does so in glorious fashion. Golden and warm, dessert-like, with bread-and-butter pudding, spun sugar, plenty of oak character, lavender honey, golden puff pastry, perfumery scents, and the first fruits plucked from the orangerie. Quite simply the grooviest thing to come out of Alloa this year.”
95 Points – Whisky Advocate 2018
1 bottle limit

name: CASAMIGOS - BLANCO
tastingDescription: Double Gold winner in 2014 at the San Francisco World Spirits Competition, this tequila is made with 100% blue agave. The nose is smoky with a mild sweet fruit note; the palate is medium-bodied and smooth with fruity character of honey, apple, pepper and florals followed by a medium length finish.

name: CASAMIGOS - MEZCAL
tastingDescription: This 100 percent agave- based spirit has all the flavours that you would get from quality blanco tequila but with the added bonus of some rich smoky notes.

name: CASAMIGOS - REPOSADO
tastingDescription: Aged for 7 months. Soft, slightly oaky with hints of caramel and cocoa. It has a silky texture with a medium to long smooth finish.

name: CATTO - RARE OLD SCOTTISH
tastingDescription: False

name: CAZADORES - ANEJO
tastingDescription: Tequila Cazadores Añejo (meaning aged) spends at least a year in new American oak barrels, creating a golden liquid with agave flavours complimented with cinnamon, vanilla, nuts and peppery, smoked wood. Enjoy the customary smooth finish that makes tequila Cazadores Añejo perfect for sipping neat.

name: CAZADORES - BLANCO
tastingDescription: 93 Points & Top 100 Spirits of 2017, Wine Enthusiast - "Brisk, clean and herbaceous, this Tequila is almost reminiscent of gin. The aroma has a spicy edge, plus hints of mint and dill, while the minty palate finishes with vanilla-coconut sweetness and mild baking-spice tingle. Versatile for a wide range of cocktails.” (May 2017)

name: CAZADORES - REPOSADO
tastingDescription: The original tequila Cazadores, reposado (meaning rested) spends up to year in new American oak barrels, creating a perfect balance of agave and woody flavors. Citrus and tropical fruits, vanilla notes and the customary smooth finish, makes tequila Cazadores Reposado excellent in cocktails or sipped neat.

name: CAZADORES - REPOSADO
tastingDescription: The original tequila Cazadores, reposado (meaning rested) spends up to year in new American oak barrels, creating a perfect balance of agave and woody flavors. Citrus and tropical fruits, vanilla notes and the customary smooth finish, makes tequila Cazadores Reposado excellent in cocktails or sipped neat.

nameSanitized: cel. of the cask black gold glenrothes 1997
