tastingDescription: This whisky was matured in a single sherry puncheon for 22yrs. Intense sherry notes loaded with fruit on the nose along witht mixed berries, dark chocolate and old leather. The palate is bursting with blackberry, cherry, tobacco and sherry notes again. Finally, a lovely dry long finish.

name: CELEBRATION OF THE CASK NORTH BRITISH MORRISON & MACKAY
nameSanitized: celebration of the cask north british morrison & mackay
nameSuffix: CELEBRATION OF THE CASK NORTH BRITISH MORRISON & MACKAY
sort: CELEBRATION OF THE CASK NORTH BRITISH MORRISON & MACKAY
tastingDescription: False

name: CENTENNIAL - CANADIAN RYE LIMITED EDITION
tastingDescription: A true Canadian rye whisky, Centennial 10 Year Old Limited Edition uses soft winter wheat blended with rye (instead of the traditional corn) giving it a smooth, rich flavour profile. Aged for a minimum of 10 years it is enjoyable in classic rye-based cocktails, on ice or neat.

name: CENTRAL CITY - LOHIN MCKINNON SINGLE MALT
nameSanitized: central city - lohin mckinnon single malt
sort: CENTRAL CITY - LOHIN MCKINNON SINGLE MALT
tastingDescription: Proudly made in BC, this small batch whisky is matured in premium oak barrels and made from the finest Canadian Malted Barley. The aroma is rich with darker fruity notes, subtle vanilla and pleasantly woody. The golden liquid sits on the palate with a touch of green apple skins, buttery notes, woody and softly texture mouthfeel. The finish is medium length, fruity and slightly drying at the end.

name: CENTRAL CITY - QUEENSBOROUGH SMALL BATCH DRY GIN
nameSanitized: central city - queensborough small batch dry gin
sort: CENTRAL CITY - QUEENSBOROUGH SMALL BATCH DRY GIN
tastingDescription: Proudly crafted in BC, Queensborough is the only Canadian Gin to have won Double Gold at the 2017 San Francisco World Spirits Competition. Infused with Vancouver Island Spruce Tips and Rocky Mountain Juniper Berries, this small batch gin is a tribute to creating a modern Canadian version of the traditional London Dry Gin.

name: CENTURY DISTILLERS - 20 YEAR OLD NINETY
tastingDescription: Ninety 20Year,  has spent the last two decades in the barrel and is crafted from 100% corn whisky with just the right touch of American aged bourbon to enhance the flavour. Resulting  in a Canadian whisky with a deep gold in colour; aromas of orange peel, toffee, roasted nuts, baking spices and vanilla; medium body with flavours that reflect the aromas with added fruitiness and smoke notes; the finish is long and smooth.

name: CHAMBORD - BLACK RASPBERRY
tastingDescription: Chambord is made from natural red and black raspberries, Madagascar vanilla, Moroccan citrus peel, honey and cognac. It has a distinct raspberry flavour and aroma. Mix with sparkling wine for a Chambord Royale!

name: CHARTREUSE - GREEN
tastingDescription: The recipe for this centuries-old liqueur (it includes 130 herbs, botanicals, roots, flowers, and more) made by Carthusian monks in the French Alps, is entrusted to just two who are bound by a vow of silence. Used all over the world in cocktails, Green Chartreuse is powerful and complex with heady notes of herbs, anise, mint and more.

name: CHATEAU DE LAUBADE - 1888
tastingDescription: Each vintage entirely comes from a single harvest and distillation year. Each vintage clearly expresses its age, which is a specificity of Armagnac and the signature of the house. More than 80 different vintages matured in Château de Laubade’s cellars. Currently, the oldest vintage is from 1888.

name: CHATEAU DE LAUBADE - 1898
tastingDescription: Château de Laubade was built in 1870 in the heart of the noblest area of the appellation: the Bas Armagnac and is today the premier Armagnac property. Today, the third generation is actively involved in the quest of excellence of the property, composed of 260 acres of single vineyard, to make Château de Laubade an undisputed reference among the Armagnac category.

name: CHATEAU DE LAUBADE - 1981 BAS ARMAGNAC
tastingDescription: The 1981 vintage Bas Armagnac has a copper amber colour in the glass and opens with strong vanilla, dried fruits, nutmeg and a light touch of cigar box. The palate is well balanced and robust with flavours of prunes, cedar, chocolate and candied fruit; all wrapped up in a long, layered finish.

name: CHATEAU DE LAUBADE - X.O. BAS ARMAGNAC
nameSanitized: chateau de laubade - x.o. bas armagnac
sort: CHATEAU DE LAUBADE - X.O. BAS ARMAGNAC
tastingDescription: 94 Points, Vinous - "Golden tinted and a bright nose of fresh herbs and spring flowers, belying its mix of 15- to 25-year-old brandies, signicant age for an XO...There's a profound juiciness, the summer peach of fond memory, balanced by spice and green tobacco, and a long nish of attractive pepper and nutmeg." (Apr 2018)

name: CHATEAU DE LAUBADE 1970
tastingDescription: Bright mahogany and amber colour fill the glass of this elegant Armagnac blend of Baco, Ugni Blanc, Colombard and Folle Blanche. The nose has pronounced rancio and vanilla oak notes. The palate is robust and structured brimming with flavours of dried fruit, vanilla, tobacco and leather. Long, complex finish.

name: CHATEAU DE LAUBADE 1980
tastingDescription: 94pts Ultimate Spirits Challenge 2019 "Warm cinnamon honey perfumes the nose. Blonde caramel, white grapes, and lightly toasted cashew flavors intertwine on the palate. The finish has a cinnamon and coffee with cream note that stays sweet with complex depth."

name: CHATEAU DE LAUBADE 1990
tastingDescription: Bright amber colour, this 1990 vintage is a blend of Baco, Ugni Blanc and Colombard. It opens with fruity vanilla notes, leading into a round, yet vivid palate, characterized by notes of fruits, plums and candied raisins.

name: CHATEAU DE LAUBADE 2000
tastingDescription: Distilled entirely from estate grown fruit and aged in casks produced from estate Gascony oak, the 2000 vintage is the first Armagnac from the new millennia. Sophisticated and elegant, it exudes with flavours of toasted nuts, sweet spice and prunes, finishing with ripe fruits and soft floral notes.

name: CHATEAU DE MONTIFAUD - XO PETITE CHAMPAGNE MILLENIUM
nameSanitized: chateau de montifaud - xo petite champagne millenium
sort: CHATEAU DE MONTIFAUD - XO PETITE CHAMPAGNE MILLENIUM
tastingDescription: 94 Points, Wine Enthusiast: "Dried figs and dates lead the nose. The bold palate opens with vanilla and oak, finishing elegant and complex, with stone fruit, barely-there hints of vanilla and cocoa, and a long, dusty cinnamon fade. A blend of brandies aged at least 30 years." (December, 2020)

name: CHERRY BRANDY - BOLS
tastingDescription: Fresh candied cherry with a hint of almond from the crushed pits are revealed in this flavoured brandy with some herbal elements sneaking in on the finish

name: CHIVAS BROTHERS - 21 YEAR OLD ROYAL SALUTE
nameSanitized: chivas brothers - 21 year old royal salute
sort: CHIVAS BROTHERS - 21 YEAR OLD ROYAL SALUTE
tastingDescription: Launched as a tribute to honour Queen Elizabeth's Coronation in 1953, this refined, complex blend of grain and malt whiskies is aged for 21 years. Medium amber in colour and finely structured, with satiny notes of dried fruit, nuts, spices and leather, it's an elegant luxurious sipper.

name: CHIVAS REGAL - 12 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: 92 Points & Best Buy, Wine Enthusiast - "The nosing finds dry grainy notes with background scents of dried flowers and parchment, and deeper fragrances of light toffee, almond paste and yellow fruit. Entry is oily, buttery and semisweet; the whisky dazzles at midpalate with layered flavors of brown butter, cooking oil, barley malt and oatmeal cookie underpinned by the single malt foundation. Concludes smoky, satiny and ultra-sophisticated.” (December 2008)

name: CHIVAS REGAL - 12 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: A sophisticated blend with multiple layers of flavour. Look for barley sugar, oatmeal biscuit and oily richness to combine with dried fruit, toffee and marzipan

name: CHIVAS REGAL - 12 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: 92 Points & Best Buy, Wine Enthusiast - "The nosing finds dry grainy notes with background scents of dried flowers and parchment, and deeper fragrances of light toffee, almond paste and yellow fruit. Entry is oily, buttery and semisweet; the whisky dazzles at midpalate with layered flavors of brown butter, cooking oil, barley malt and oatmeal cookie underpinned by the single malt foundation. Concludes smoky, satiny and ultra-sophisticated.” (December 2008)

name: CHIVAS REGAL - 12 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: False

name: CHIVAS REGAL - 25 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription:
Launched in 1909, Chivas Regal 25-year-old was one of the world's first luxury whiskies. This rare and much sought-after Scotch disappeared during Prohibition. In 2007, this remarkable blend was recreated with  the iconic tastes and textures that lay within the original luxury whisky. Enticing fruity aromas of sweet orange and peach lie in this fruity whisky, followed by notes of marzipan and nuts. Hints of rich chocolate orange with a fondant creaminess. Smooth, rounded and luxuriously long finish. 
1 Bottle limit.

name: CHOPIN -  POTATO
tastingDescription: Chopin Potato Vodka is the world's most awarded potato vodka. Its uniquely creamy and full-bodied flavor profile makes it a great standalone vodka, ideal for sipping neat or in martinis and cocktails.

name: CHOYA - GOLD EDITION
tastingDescription: This Gold Edition UMESHU is a unique premium ume liqueur using 100% Japanese premium Nanko ume and French brandy with Gold flakes. Enjoy elegant and fruity taste and aroma of the ume fruit and French brandy. 100% French brandy base, Gold flakes, 100% Japanese premium Nanko ume, French bottle."

name: CHOYA 23 - UMESHU JAPANESE PLUM LIQUEUR
tastingDescription: The real plum liquor. Sweet, Rich and Thick mouthfeel with a light golden colour, smells a lot like fresh fruit. It coats your tongue very quickly and has a nice tart finish which cuts right through the sweetness and makes you want to have another sip. No artificial additives added.

name: CHUM CHURUM - RICH SOJU
tastingDescription: Chum-Churum Rich, with an ABV of 20%, is a bolder soju for those desiring a more noted taste of the soju spirit. "Rich" is also widely becoming the preferred spirit to experiment with cocktails, as it is a more elegant alternative for infusing alcohol into the drink of choice.

name: CHUM CHURUM ORIGINAL - SOJU
tastingDescription: Chum-Churum means “like the first time” in Korean. The brand depicts a magpie and a bud. The bird symbolizes bringing good news and the bud symbolizes new beginnings. It is one of the most-produced spirit brands in the world, both by volume and liters sold.

name: CHUM CHURUM ORIGINAL SOJU
tastingDescription: Chum Churum Soju is a clear neutral spirit almost like vodka, made from sweet potato and tapioca. It has a fresh, crisp and clean taste which makes it more distinct and smoother to consume.

name: CHUM CHURUM RICH
tastingDescription: Chum Churum Soju is a clear neutral spirit almost like vodka, made from sweet potato and tapioca. It has a fresh, crisp and clean taste which makes it more distinct and smoother to consume.

name: CHUMMY COOL
tastingDescription: New Korean Soju, Chummy Cool, is clean taste and clear bottle with cute magpie character. Chummy Cool contains 16.8% of alcohol which is distilled from Tapioca, rice, sweet potato and then, dilute with alkaline water, which makes soju become more distinct and smoother to consume. It pairs well with any grilled meat, Korean BBQ, Asian food, Seafood and Sushi.

name: CINCORO - TEQUILA ANEJO
tastingDescription:
Salty chocolate-covered pretzels are prominent on the nose, drizzled with caramel, along with agave nectar and roasted artichokes. The palate begins with an herbaceous and grassy profile, segueing into butterscotch, lemon zest, and a savory-sweet collection of spices like you'd find in a barbecue rub. The finish is sweet and lingering, with cocoa powder, milk chocolate, mesquite and leather.
93 points, Distiller.com

name: CIROC
tastingDescription: Ciroc distilled grape spirit is made using fine French grapes. A true innovation in French craftsmanship, it is distilled five times, finished in a tailor-made copper pot still in Southern France. Ciroc distilled grape spirit offers a taste experience that is lusciously different and elegantly smooth.

name: CIROC - APPLE
tastingDescription: Slice into extravagance with new Cîroc Apple. The juicy taste of bright green apple brings an irresistibly crisp flavor to all your cocktails.

name: CIROC - MANGO
tastingDescription: A sensory delight, C�ROC Mango is a tropical fruit flavour. Deliciously smooth, it is infused with Mango and other natural flavours. The taste of juicy Carabao mango combines with tangy citrus and other tropical flavours to create a unique m�lange of tastes and layers of flavour.

name: CIROC - PEACH
tastingDescription: "Ciroc is distilled five times from premium french grapes  to ensure amazing smoothness. Natural peach flavours are then added to enhance the fresh aromatics of this lovely spirit.  For a perfect spring Bellini just  add a splash of your favourite sparkling wine." - Adele Shaw, Category Manager for Spirits & Sake

name: CIROC - PINEAPPLE
tastingDescription: Five times distilled in custom-made copper pot stills, Ciroc Pineapple is exceptionally smooth and has a delicious citrus taste.

name: CIROC - POMEGRANATE
tastingDescription: Ciroc Pomegranate is crafted with Vodka from fine French grapes that lends a distinctive citrus, berry taste - the perfect compliment for a delicious new limited edtion.

name: CIROC - RED BERRY
tastingDescription: A grape-based spirit infused with natural flavours of raspberry and strawberry. It has generous aromas and flavours of red berries with hints of red licorice.

name: CIROC - SUMMER CITRUS
tastingDescription: Ciroc Summer Citrus highlights ripe orange and lime notes, making it the perfect spirit for creating exquisite cocktails. It's medium-bodied and fruity with a long, elegant finish. Pour over ice, add citrus-based juice and enjoy a tropical staycation.

name: CIROC - SUMMER WATERMELON
tastingDescription: Quintuple distilled in custom-made copper pot stills, Cîroc Summer Watermelon is masterfully infused with a distinctive blend of summer watermelons and other natural flavours for a taste experience that is lusciously different and elegantly smooth.

name: CIROC - WHITE GRAPE
tastingDescription: Cîroc White Grape is a rich tasting spirit made with vodka five times distilled from fine French grapes, finished in a tailor-made copper pot still in Southern France.   The vodka is masterfully infused with a distinctive blend of white grape and other natural flavors, resulting in a taste experience that is lusciously different and elegantly smooth.

name: CITADELLE
tastingDescription: A delicate and fragrant nose of fresh flowers. After a few moments, stronger, more herbaceous aromas of juniper, citrus and cardamom, develop in a most remarkable way. On the palate, juniper gives wasy to a voluptuous complexity redolent of peppery and strong spices, leading into an elegant, round and highly refined finish.

name: CLASE AZUL - ANEJO
tastingDescription: The viscous body shows off a delicate, yet balanced mouth-feel and a nose layered with aromas of Mexican vanilla, cinnamon, apples and almonds, surrounded by caramel of the slow-cooked agave and a rich woody spice to finish.

name: CLASE AZUL - PLATA 100 WEBER BLUE AGAVE
nameSanitized: clase azul - plata 100 weber blue agave
sort: CLASE AZUL - PLATA 100 WEBER BLUE AGAVE
tastingDescription: A bright, floral nose with hints of plum blossom. Full-bodied and fruity, with a lush sweetness of pear and apricot that finishes with a big mouthfeel and long linger of sweet agave goodness.

name: CLASE AZUL - REPOSADO
tastingDescription: From the Arandas region (Highlands of Jalisco), Clase Azul is made with the highest quality of Highland agave slow-cooked in traditional stone ovens for 72 hours, fermented with a proprietor yeast, and double distilled in pot stills. A fruity nose with complex vanillas, toffee and light oak leads to a silky, rich full-bodied tequila that begins with sweet notes of roasted tropical fruits, caramel, and cooked agave. A smooth finish of rich spice, caramel, powdered sugar and a cedar fade.

name: CLONAKILTY - SINGLE BATCH DOUBLE OAK IRISH WHISKEY
nameSanitized: clonakilty - single batch double oak irish whiskey
nameSuffix: SINGLE BATCH DOUBLE OAK IRISH WHISKEY
sort: CLONAKILTY - SINGLE BATCH DOUBLE OAK IRISH WHISKEY
tastingDescription:
Created from a blend of 8-year-old grain whiskey and 10-year-old malt whiskey, it opens with aromas of vanilla, ripe white fruit, subtle spice and some leather. The palate gives us nutty flavours, spices, green herbs and some ginger. It finishes with a nice, ripe fruit balance and lingering pleasant flavours.
Double Gold, San Francisco World Spirit Competition 2019

name: CODIGO 1530 - GEORGE STRAIT ORIGEN
tastingDescription:
Código 1530 released a new limited-edition extra-añejo tequila expression, the George Strait Origen. It was aged six years in the finest Napa Cabernet French white oak barrels, making it one of the oldest and most refined Extra Añejos on the market. Expect an eloquent flavour profile, with hints of lush ripe fruit mingling with a spicy oak bouquet.
1 Bottle limit.

name: COINTREAU
tastingDescription: With layers of sweet and bitter orange, Cointreau is fresh, zesty and sweet on the nose, ripe and pleasantly bitter on the palate, with a hint of heat and a long, sweet finish. This liqueur is an essential ingredient in countless cocktails, including hot drinks. Enjoy it in just about anything.

name: COINTREAU
tastingDescription: With layers of sweet and bitter orange, Cointreau is fresh, zesty and sweet on the nose, ripe and pleasantly bitter on the palate, with a hint of heat and a long, sweet finish. This liqueur is an essential ingredient in countless cocktails, including hot drinks. Enjoy it in just about anything.

name: COLEBURN 1972 - GORDON AND MACPHAIL 125TH ANNIVERSARY
tastingDescription: False

name: COMPASS BOX - NO NAME NO.3
tastingDescription: False

name: COPA DE ORO
tastingDescription: Rich coffee, vanilla and exotic spices are what to expect from this golden coffee liqueur from Mexico. Delicious in coffee or over ice.

name: CORAZON - REPOSADO BCLS PERSONAL BARREL TEQUILA
nameSanitized: corazon - reposado bcls personal barrel tequila
sort: CORAZON - REPOSADO BCLS PERSONAL BARREL TEQUILA
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
Exclusive cask bottling for BCLIQUOR. The emptied barrel of Blanton's single cask #261 was used to age this beautiful reposado tequila. Aromas of fresh herbs, agave nectar mingle with the vanilla influence from the bourbon barrel. The flavours have earthy notes softened with vanilla, clean citrus flavours rounded with toasty oak on the palate. A well-rounded and refined tequila.

name: COURVOISIER - AVANT-GARDE BOURBON CASK
tastingDescription: The limited edition Courvoisier Avant-Garde Bourbon Finish is a VS expression finished in Kentucky bourbon casks. The extra ageing is gives the expression an elegant and velvety finish with tasting notes of vanilla, honey and sweet marmalade. On the palate, it is described as having notes of soft smoky leather and sweet orange.

name: COURVOISIER - RESERVE EDWARD VII
tastingDescription: Notes of undergrowth, boxwood and humus are followed by subtle aromas of fruits and flowers to give a set of a great harmony with a superb rancio. The palate is smooth, supple and elegant and will delight all lovers of fine Cognac.

name: COURVOISIER - SHERRY CASK FINISH
tastingDescription: False

name: COURVOISIER - SUCCESSION J.S.
tastingDescription: Courvoisier Succession J.S. was created to commemorate the bicentary of Napoleon Bonaparte's crowning as the Emperor of France in 1804, 'Le Sacre de Napoleoon', just 2000 bottles have been produced.

name: COURVOISIER - V.S.
tastingDescription: A fusion of young and old Cognac lends a fruity and delicate palate with a bouquet filled with ripe fruit and spring flowers. Floral and fruit shine through while the oak introduces very subtle spice on a light and balanced palate.

name: COURVOISIER - V.S.
tastingDescription: A fusion of young and old Cognac lends a fruity and delicate palate with a bouquet filled with ripe fruit and spring flowers. Floral and fruit shine through while the oak introduces very subtle spice on a light and balanced palate.

name: COURVOISIER - V.S.O.P
tastingDescription: A fusion of young and old Cognac lends a fruity and delicate palate with a bouquet filled with ripe fruit and spring flowers. Floral and fruit shine through while the oak introduces very subtle spice on a light and balanced palate.

name: COURVOISIER - X.O. IMPERIAL
tastingDescription: 95 Points, Wine Enthusiast - “Showing bright topaz in the glass, this Cognac entices with rich, concentrated caramel and toffee aromas. Fleetingly sweet on the palate, vanilla, mocha and hazelnut lead into a rounded brown-sugar finish punctuated by clove and orange peel. This easy sipper would be welcome at any dessert table. Made with a blend of Cognacs aged 11–25 years.” (December 2017)

name: CRAGGANMORE - 12 YEAR OLD SPEYSIDE
tastingDescription: 92 Points & Best Buy, Wine Enthusiast - "The succulent aroma develops with aeration in the sweet forms of barley, cream, light caramel, and a trace of tropical fruit. Palate entry is round, borderline plump, breakfast-cereal sweet, and honeyed; at midpalate, there's a slightly oily peat smoke. Sweetly concludes with the focus on the malt.” (June 2006)

name: CRAGGANMORE - 20 YO SPECIAL RELEASE 2020
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
A Cragganmore of this age has never been released from the distillery, making this elusive malt a much anticipated expression. In addition sweet and mellow woody notes emerge from this small batch, patiently matured over 20 years in a mix that included new fresh-charred American oak casks.  Showing the sweet and spicy effects of part maturation in new oak, this expression explores the woods just as deeply.. The texture is creamy-smooth while the taste is rich and not quite as sweet, delightfully balanced by a savoury mid-palate. The finish is long, velvety and spicy-dry.
1 Bottle limit.

name: CRAGGANMORE - 25 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: 91 Points, Whisky Advocate - "This shows mature distillery character with that discreet meaty undertow bedding down exuberant top notes: icing sugar on rhum baba, preserved lime, crystallized fruits, honey, pecan, fig, and scented woods. Typical of Cragganmore in its constantly shape-shifting character. The palate is concentrated orchard fruits, dried fruits, light spice, chestnut puree, and a little smoke. So yes, in the same league."

name: CRAIGELLACHIE - 13 YEAR OLD SPEYSIDE
tastingDescription: 90 Points, Whisky Advocate - “There are heavy florals — think lilies and stewed white fruit, and just-overripe banana — but this is given a mysterious extra heft by an underpinning of a light meatiness, accompanied by a tiny lift of (good) sulfur. The palate is, unsurprisingly, thick and creamy with huge fruit that fills the mouth. A highly physical, old-style Speyside dram with classic distillery character. A statement whisky that is a must-try.” (Winter 2014)

name: CRAIGELLACHIE - 33 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
A beautifully balanced, smooth and rich liquid with a swirl of smoke in the background. After 33 years in oak, the flavours of cedar wood, exotic fruits and rum and raisin ice cream fold together harmoniously, granting a creamy cereal complexity to the liquid. The smooth taste gives way for a lingering sweet almond note and creamy finish. Only 1,700 bottles made.

name: CREME DE BANANES - BOLS
tastingDescription: Bols Banana is one of the best-selling banana liqueurs with the color of real sun-ripened bananas. Its taste is that of bananas enhanced by a touch of soft vanilla and a hint of almonds.

name: CREME DE CACAO WHITE - MCGUINNESS
tastingDescription: Clear and colourless with sweet cocoa aromas. It has a thick, sweet chocolate flavour.

name: CREME DE CASSIS DE DIJON - L'HERITIER GUYOT
nameSanitized: creme de cassis de dijon - lheritier guyot
sort: CREME DE CASSIS DE DIJON - L'HERITIER GUYOT
tastingDescription: A ripe, aromatic and mouth-watering sweettart liqueur with the intense fruity flavour of blackcurrants.

name: CREME DE MENTHE GREEN - MCGUINNESS
tastingDescription: With its cool mint aromas and flavours, McGuinness Crème de Menthe Green is both delicious and refreshing.

name: CROWN ROYAL
tastingDescription: Crown Royal was meticulously crafted to commemorate the first grand tour of King George VI and Queen Elizabeth in 1939. It is delicately smooth and creamy, with hints of oak and the sweet flavour of vanilla with a long and lingering finish.

name: CROWN ROYAL
tastingDescription: Crown Royal was meticulously crafted to commemorate the first grand tour of King George VI and Queen Elizabeth in 1939. It is delicately smooth and creamy, with hints of oak and the sweet flavour of vanilla with a long and lingering finish.

name: CROWN ROYAL
tastingDescription: This legendary whisky, created in 1939 to celebrate the visit of the King of England, has a blend of fifty distinct, full-bodied whiskies matured in white oak barrels. Crown Royal has a taste profile defined by smoothness, enhanced by a rich, lingering finish.

name: CROWN ROYAL
tastingDescription: Crown Royal was meticulously crafted to commemorate the first grand tour of King George VI and Queen Elizabeth in 1939. It is delicately smooth and creamy, with hints of oak and the sweet flavour of vanilla with a long and lingering finish.

name: CROWN ROYAL
tastingDescription: Crown Royal was meticulously crafted to commemorate the first grand tour of King George VI and Queen Elizabeth in 1939. It is delicately smooth and creamy, with hints of oak and the sweet flavour of vanilla with a long and lingering finish.

name: CROWN ROYAL
tastingDescription: Crown Royal was meticulously crafted to commemorate the first grand tour of King George VI and Queen Elizabeth in 1939. It is delicately smooth and creamy, with hints of oak and the sweet flavour of vanilla with a long and lingering finish.

name: CROWN ROYAL
tastingDescription: Crown Royal was meticulously crafted to commemorate the first grand tour of King George VI and Queen Elizabeth in 1939. It is delicately smooth and creamy, with hints of oak and the sweet flavour of vanilla with a long and lingering finish.

name: CROWN ROYAL - 18 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: Crown Royal 18 has layers of intensity that are both surprising and delightful.  Enticing notes of vanilla and stone fruit greet you on the nose, followed by the velvety body of light oak tempered by caramel spice. Delicate notes of nougat linger in the full-bodied finish. This elegant, amber whisky is truly the crown jewel of our rare stock.

name: CROWN ROYAL - APPLE
tastingDescription: Aromas of bright apples and hints of spice. A flavourful palate of slightly tart, crisp apple with notes of caramel and light spice that culminates in a full-bodied smooth finish of refined apple notes try in a candy apple martini.

name: CROWN ROYAL - BLACK
tastingDescription: 94 Points & Best Buy, Wine Enthusiast - "Aged in charred barrels, this robust, nut-brown sipper has rich cocoa, toffee and caramel aromatics. It's dry and complex on the palate, with notes of toffee, espresso, cigar wrapper and leather. It finishes bold and spicy, with a burst of alcohol heat that calls for a splash of branchwater.” (November 2015)

name: CROWN ROYAL - LIMITED EDITION
tastingDescription: Crown Royal Limited Edition is majestically blended with select batch-distilled whiskies to create an exceptionally smooth and rich taste that could only come from the Kingdom of Crown Royal.

name: CROWN ROYAL - MAPLE FINISHED
tastingDescription: It's a perfect blend of Crown Royal's signature caramel and vanilla nose with the elegant aromas of maple, creating a flavour profile that finishes on an authentically warm and woody note.

name: CROWN ROYAL - NOBLE COLLECTION WINTER WHEAT
nameSanitized: crown royal - noble collection winter wheat
sort: CROWN ROYAL - NOBLE COLLECTION WINTER WHEAT
tastingDescription: Carefully crafted for a one-of-a-kind experience, this whisky is light bodied and sweet upfront with a nose of praline, banana bread and toasted oak, followed by hints of creamy bread pudding and toffee on the palate.  Light buttery notes bring in the finish, which is smooth and mildly warm; while lingering hints of cinnamon and toasted oak reveal themselves.

name: CROWN ROYAL - NORTHERN HARVEST RYE
tastingDescription: False

name: CROWN ROYAL - PEACH
tastingDescription: To create this extraordinary blend, Crown Royal whiskies are carefully selected by our master blender and infused with the juicy flavour of fresh Georgia peaches. The result is a vibrantly delicious whisky, bursting with the luscious flavour of peach and the distinctive smoothness of Crown Royal.

name: CROWN ROYAL - RESERVE
tastingDescription: 93 Points, Wine Enthusiast - "This blended whisky, complex enough to sip, has a deep amber hue and flavors reminiscent of pecan pie. A long, smooth trail of nutty vanilla and caramel dries to espresso and a flurry of baking spice.” (November 2015)

name: CROWN ROYAL - SALTED CARAMEL
tastingDescription: A Limited Edition Flavour. The rich, creamy notes of caramel finished with a subtle touch of salt perfectly compliment the richness of Crown Royal Whisky.

name: CROWN ROYAL - VANILLA
tastingDescription: This whisky has vanilla bean and oak spice on the nose and palate, joined by a caramel element and a warming crème anglaise finish.

name: CROWN ROYAL - XO
tastingDescription: 92 Points, Whisky Advocate - “A rich luxurious whisky finished in cognac casks. This is the cedary, leathery, tobacco-ish sipping whisky of the private club. Simple toffee and the cherry essence of Beaujolais nouveau evolve into ripe red apples and heavy, dusky, dark fruit with candied citrus peel, bitter almond skins, and hints of oak. Sizzling gingery spice and white pepper linger over textured sandalwood. Defined by its heavy, creamy body.” (Summer 2014)

name: CROWN ROYAL BLENDERS MASH
tastingDescription: This special blend showcases the warm vanilla and subtle oaky notes of Crown Royal's bourbon mash whiskies – among the most flavourful and complex of the five unique whiskies that comprise Crown Royal’s extraordinary signature blend.

name: CROWN ROYAL GIFT TIN/WITH 2 SHOT GLASSES
nameSanitized: crown royal gift tin/with 2 shot glasses
nameSuffix: CROWN ROYAL GIFT TIN/WITH 2 SHOT GLASSES
sort: CROWN ROYAL GIFT TIN/WITH 2 SHOT GLASSES
tastingDescription: The epitome of Canadian whisky is made from 50 selected whiskies blended to perfection. Two ready-to-use tumblers let the giftee share the sweet peach and woody tones with a friend.

name: CROWN ROYAL GIFT W 2 GLASSES
tastingDescription: False

name: CRYSTAL HEAD
tastingDescription: Distilled with high quality peaches and cream corn, blended to a neutral grain spirit with the pristine, waters of Newfoundland. It’s filtered 7 times, 3 times through layers of semi precious crystals Herkimer diamonds. Contains no additives – a naturally smooth spirit.

name: CRYSTAL HEAD
tastingDescription: Distilled with high quality peaches and cream corn, blended to a neutral grain spirit with the pristine, waters of Newfoundland. It’s filtered 7 times, 3 times through layers of semi precious crystals Herkimer diamonds. Contains no additives – a naturally smooth spirit.

name: CRYSTAL HEAD - GIFT PACK WITH 4 MEASURING GLASSES
nameSanitized: crystal head - gift pack with 4 measuring glasses
sort: CRYSTAL HEAD - GIFT PACK WITH 4 MEASURING GLASSES
tastingDescription: False

name: CRYSTAL HEAD VODKA - PRIDE EDITION
tastingDescription: Crystal Head Vodka is bringing creative spirits to life with this limited edition Pride bottle celebrating diversity and equality. Our original blend, distilled 4x from the highest quality Canadian corn. Silky smooth with a hint of sweetness and vanilla. Filtered through Herkimer diamonds and blended with pristine Newfoundland water.

name: CSP ANGEL'S ENVY KENTUCKY STRAIGHT BOURBON
nameSanitized: csp angels envy kentucky straight bourbon
nameSuffix: CSP ANGEL'S ENVY KENTUCKY STRAIGHT BOURBON
sort: CSP ANGEL'S ENVY KENTUCKY STRAIGHT BOURBON
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
"A beautiful, mouthwatering newcomer to the whiskey scene. Named for the "angel's share," the portion that evaporates from the barrel during the aging process, this golden amber spirit is finished in Port barrels, which explains those juicy red-fruit notes that slide into the long finish. Look for orange peel, vanilla and roasted nut flavors, too."
98 pts, Wine Enthusiast
1 Bottle limit.

name: CUTTY SARK
tastingDescription: 91 Points, Jim Murray's Whisky Bible: Balanced and lively with vanilla and citrus fruits.  It's accessible; fresh and enticing with subtle hints of vanilla ice cream and caramel.

name: D'EAUBONNE - V.S.O.P.
tastingDescription: Golden amber colour; citrus-orange and caramel nose with a hint of pineapple fruit; delicate citrus and oak flavours with a warm, dry finish. Serve neat, in Spanish coffee or use in marinades.

name: D'EAUBONNE - V.S.O.P.
tastingDescription: Warming flavours of caramel, citrus and something tropical greet you like an old friend. Try it straight up or in warm cocktails

name: D'USSE -  V.S.O.P.
tastingDescription: Naturally aged for at least four and a half years in the cellars of France's Chateau de Cognac, where some of the world's finest Cognacs have been made for over two hundred years. This emerges as a bold, full-bodied blend that is uniquely powerful and has a pleasantly smooth and balanced finish.

name: D'USSE - COGNAC 1969 LIMITED EDITION
tastingDescription:
Created to mark Jay Z's 50th birthday, this one-of-a-kind bottle of D'USSE Cognac is offered directly from the Shawn Carter Foundation, with proceeds to benefit the charity aimed at helping individuals facing socio-economic hardships further their education at institutions of higher learning. This cognac is presented in a diamond-shaped cut crystal 
bottle, adorned with 24 karat gold leaf wrapping on the neck and decorated with the symbol of La Croix de Lorraine, the historic French emblem of courage, honour and perseverance. Only 285 bottles produced globally, with a special release of only 200 bottles into the market. Two bottles have been secured for the BCL 2021 Premium Spirit Release.

name: DAIRY DISTILLERY - VODKOW CREAM
tastingDescription: Dairy Distillery crafts this locally-made cream liqueur, which is lactose and gluten free. It's rich and creamy, with a long, viscous and moderately sweet finish. Add a splash to coffee for an adult-inspired beverage and pair with shortbread cookies or chocolate cake.

name: DALMORE - 100 YEARS OF DALMORE
tastingDescription: This rare and luxurious set includes Dalmore 25, 35 and 40 in a bespoke case.

name: DALMORE - 12 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: The Dalmore 12-year-old, with its intricate aromas and flavours, is recognized as a whisky with character far beyond its age. Matured for an initial nine years in American white oak ex-bourbon casks, the spirit is then divided for its final flourish. One half remains in the bourbon barrels, while the other is transferred to exclusive 30-year-old Gonzalez Byass Matusalem oloroso sherry butts before they are reunited to create this phenomenal whisky. Aroma: Citrus fruits, chocolate and aromatic spices. Palate: Citrus, oloroso sherry, vanilla pod. Finish: Roasted coffee and chocolate.

name: DALMORE - 15 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: The Dalmore 15-year-old is smooth, rich and well rounded; the epitome of The Dalmore house style. This delicate and approachable vintage is initially matured for 12 years in American white oak ex-bourbon casks. The character of The Dalmore 15 is achieved by then splitting the whisky equally between three different sherry woods; Amoroso, Apostoles and Matusalem oloroso for a further three years. The spirit is finally married together in an upstanding sherry butt, allowing the flavours to infuse. Aroma: Orange marmalade, cinnamon and nutmeg. Palate: Mandarin, vanilla, ginger. Finish: Christmas spice and oak.

name: DALMORE - 18 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: An evolution of The Dalmore house style, this 18-year-old expression harnesses bolder notes. A robust and formidable whisky, The Dalmore 18-year-old showcases the result of extended maturation and the influence of the wood. Matured initially for 14 years in American white oak ex-bourbon casks, the spirit is then transferred to 30-year-old Matusalem oloroso sherry butts for a further four years. Aroma: Vanilla, dark chocolate, orange. Palate: Dark chocolate, candied citrus fruits, rich coffee. Finish: Citrus fruit, oak.

name: DALMORE - 21 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: The Dalmore 21 is a highly limited Highland single malt whisky, aged in American white oak casks, before enjoying a finishing period in Matusalem Oloroso sherry casks. On the palate, strong dark fruit, cocoa, followed by ginger snaps, freshly ground coffee and hints of nuttiness.

name: DALMORE - 25 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: An exceptional whisky matured in American white oak ex-bourbon casks, aged Tawny Port pipes and casks, exclusive to The Dalmore, which have held 30 year old Matusalem oloroso sherry.

name: DALMORE - CONSTELLATION 1973 CASK 10
tastingDescription: 32 years maturing in American white oak, gifting it an initial base of vanilla and honey notes. Over the next three years, the spirit would draw notes of grape, cranberries and black cherries from this noble wine cask. Lastly, it was transferred for three years into ab Kentucky bourbon barrel.

name: DALMORE - CONSTELLATION 1979 CASK 594
tastingDescription: Colour: Shimmering honeyed gold. Nose: Honey, peaches, nectarines and vanilla ice cream. Followed by notes of fresh apple, pear, apricots and lemongrass. Taste: Spicy pineapple, tropical fruit salad and caramel fudge with flashes of lemon cake, frangipane, rose hip syrup and macaroons. Followed by Bramley apples with peaches and cream,Turkish delight, spiced sherbet and kiwi fruits.

name: DALMORE - DECADES NO.4 COLLECTION SET 19
tastingDescription: The Dalmore Decades is a once-in-a-lifetime selection of exceptional whiskies, spanning six decades. This is one of only 25 sets created for the global market. BCL will be the only retailer in the Americas that will have the opportunity to offer this exceptional collection, which includes one bottle each of: 1979 Curating Exquisite Casks, 1980 Unbroken Chain of Visionaries, 1995 The Creation of an Icon and 2000 Into the New Millennium.

name: DALMORE - KING ALEXANDER I I I
nameSanitized: dalmore - king alexander i i i
sort: DALMORE - KING ALEXANDER I I I
tastingDescription: 93 Points, Wine Enthusiast - "Wine lovers will want to cap a special-occasion meal with this rich and interesting Highland specimen. Created from Scotches matured in a variety of wine casks, including Madeira, Port, Marsala, even Cabernet Sauvignon, look for a copper-penny color, heady aromas of red berries, dried fruit and marzipan, and a toffee-sweet flavor with a spicy finish.” (December 2011)

name: DALMORE - PRINCIPAL COLLECTION 12 YEAR OLD SHERRY CASK SINGL
nameSanitized: dalmore - principal collection 12 year old sherry cask singl
nameSuffix: PRINCIPAL COLLECTION 12 YEAR OLD SHERRY CASK SINGL
sort: DALMORE - PRINCIPAL COLLECTION 12 YEAR OLD SHERRY CASK SINGL
tastingDescription: A full finish using unique sherry assemblage, for twice as much sherry influence and bottled at a higher strength vs. 12YO, delivering sweet fruit and decadent spice. On the Palate, dark chocolate and crushed almonds with a dusting of cinnamon. Finishing notes include sweet mangos, panna cotta and lemon cake.

name: DALMORE - QUINTESSENCE
tastingDescription: 92 Points, Whisky Advocate 2017 - “…the first single malt to have undergone secondary maturation in five different types of California red wine casks: Zinfandel, Pinot Noir, Syrah, Merlot, and Cabernet Sauvignon. Sweet sherry, ripe cherries, marzipan, and white pepper on the nose. Rich and mouth-coating; strong flavour of thick-cut orange marmalade, oloroso sherry, malt, and milk chocolate. The finish features gentle warming spice and lingering Jaffa orange. Plain chocolate and orange notes seem as though they are never going to end!”

name: DALMORE - SHERRY CASK SELECT 12 YEAR OLD
nameSanitized: dalmore - sherry cask select 12 year old
sort: DALMORE - SHERRY CASK SELECT 12 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: This elegant 12 year old single malt is finished in three different styles of aged oloroso sherry casks, balancing nutty flavours with sweet Pedro Ximenez influence. The American white oak ex-bourbon cask gives first base of soft vanilla and honey notes. Each casks provides its own individual characteristics and flavours.

name: DALMORE RARE & FINE - 45 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription:
"Initially matured in bourbon barrels, then transferred to two Graham's port colheita pipes from 1961 and 1963. Finally, it was married in first-fill bourbon casks. Wood resin, canola oil, sultanas, and red currants on the nose. Mediumbodied, with sweet resin, honey, and sherry on the palate, turning to treacle and raisins. The finish is very long, with dark chocolate and spicy oak tannins."
93 Points, Whisky Advocate 2018

name: DALMORE VALOUR - WHYTE & MACKAY
tastingDescription: False

name: DALWHINNIE - 15 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: False

name: DALWHINNIE - 25 YEAR OLD LIMITED RELEASE
tastingDescription: False

name: DALWHINNIE - 30 YO SPECIAL RELEASE 2020
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
"Pipe tobacco, white pepper, and a mildly herbal note on the nose, with emerging vanilla, green berries, and ginger. Full-bodied in the mouth, supple and creamy, with orchard fruits and more white pepper. Drying in the very long finish, with chile, light tannins, and dark chocolate. (6,978 bottles)"
91 pts, Whisky Advocate 2020
1 Bottle limit.

name: DALWHINNIE - DISTILLERS EDITION
tastingDescription: False

name: DALWHINNIE 30 YO SPECIAL RELEASE 2019
tastingDescription:
A delicious, finely balanced and supple old Dalwhinnie with a depth of flavour that repays thoughtful appreciation, this expression is both more rounded than younger siblings and takes a spicier view of life, too. Palate: At natural strength, big, creamy-smooth and mouth-filling in texture, with a richly sweet, waxy initial taste and spicy, with a touch of salt and an appealing, gradually building peppery warmth that carries on into the finish.
1 bottle limit

name: DEAD MAN'S FINGERS - SPICED RUM
tastingDescription: False

name: DEANSTON - 2002 PINOT NOIR
tastingDescription: A limited edition 2002 Deanston single malt that has been finished in Pinot Noir casks, creating a fruity, honeyed character. Aromas of apples, pears, creamy vanilla, oaky spice and green grapes fill the nose. The palate offers notes of sweet malt, shortbread, cinnamon, sultanas, plum, honey and dried fruit that linger in the finish.

name: DEANSTON - VIRGIN OAK
tastingDescription: On the nose, light lemon zest and sweet barley sugar fragrance with hints of apple and nutmeg. On the palate, candied fruits with vanilla toffee and heather honey. The finish is delicious and lightly spiced with a burst of honeyed malt and sweet oakiness - unmistakably Deanston!

name: DEEP EDDY - LEMON VODKA
tastingDescription: The aroma is reminiscent of freshly squeezed lemonade. The palate is slightly tart with hints of pure sugar cane. Refreshing finish.

name: DEEPEARTH FARM - DEEP MAGIC BAIJIU
tastingDescription: Beginning with aromas of dried summer haze, dawn grass dew and hint of vanillin, Deep Magic Spirits Fuses walnuts and ripen pear, peaked with hazelnuts, mineral and pepper shot, settled to a steamed rice bowl in one sip. Silky texture when with light meal or velvet-smoothed with strong-spiced dishes.

name: DELLEPIANE DISTILLERY - DULCE DE LECHE LIQUEUR TAMBO
nameSanitized: dellepiane distillery - dulce de leche liqueur tambo
sort: DELLEPIANE DISTILLERY - DULCE DE LECHE LIQUEUR TAMBO
tastingDescription: Sweetness and smoothness in the mouth are its main features. Then we gradually discover the presence of vanilla and toffee notes blended with the Dulce de Leche and finally, the presence of cream rounding off in the mouth.

name: DEVERON - 12 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: Unique horizontal condensers on the wash stills of the Macduff distillery are thought to be responsible for this dram's light consistency. Golden and light-bodied with aromas of honey, vanilla, baked pear and heather; the palate opens up with tart green apple, cereal and mineral on the medium length finish.

name: DEWAR - 8YO CASK FINISH CARIBBEAN SMOOTH
tastingDescription: 90 Points, Wine Enthusiast - Crafted from 8-year-old blended Scotch whisky double-aged and finished in casks that previously held Caribbean rum for a pleasantly unexpected Caribbean smooth and tropical flavor. Dewar's Caribbean Smooth is an invigorating new blend bringing together two seemingly different worlds: Scotland and the Caribbean. Flavours of apples, caramel, and biscuity cereal that slips into dark brown sugar and tropical fruit.

name: DEWAR'S - 12 YEAR OLD DOUBLE AGED
tastingDescription: There’s a little bit of everything in this Scotch with barley sugar, cereal, orange peel and oak spice all wrapped in a cloak of smoke that lingers through the finish

name: DEWAR'S - 18 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription:
"Subtle but beautifully balanced, with creamy vanilla, honeyed sweetness and touches of rich smoke and oaky spices. Plenty of talent!"
92 Points & Silver, IWSC 2020

name: DEWAR'S - 25 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: False

name: DEWAR'S - WHITE LABEL
tastingDescription: Created in 1899, White Label is the pillar of the Dewar's portfolio, maintaining its flavour profile throughout the years has ensured its timelessness. Pale amber colour with rich honey sweetness, hints of heather and a touch of peat smoke that add to the rounded flavours and smooth satisfying finish.

name: DEWAR'S DOUBLE AGENT 21
DEWAR'S WHITE LABEL
tastingDescription: Created in 1899, White Label is the pillar of the Dewar's portfolio, maintaining its flavour profile throughout the years has ensured its timelessness. Pale amber colour with rich honey sweetness, hints of heather and a touch of peat smoke that add to the rounded flavours and smooth satisfying finish.

name: DEWARS - WHITE LABEL
tastingDescription: Created in 1899, White Label is the pillar of the Dewar's portfolio, maintaining its flavour profile throughout the years has ensured its timelessness. Pale amber colour with rich honey sweetness, hints of heather and a touch of peat smoke that add to the rounded flavours and smooth satisfying finish.

name: DEWARS DOUBLE AGENT 27
tastingDescription:
"The palo cortado finish is restrained, with notes of pale sherry, crisp green apple, honeycomb, cocoa, cooked plum, tangy citrus, and tobacco smoke, yet the palate has a generous, mouth-drawing fruitiness. Lemon meringue pie, tangerine zest, lime, and pineapple form the whisky's substance, which is augmented by a time-delayed progression through caramel, ground almond, espresso, and chocolate brownie. Smoke hangs like a specter at the feast."
90 Points, Whisky Advocate 2019

name: DEWARS DOUBLE AGENT 32
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
"Smoky and earthy aromas abound. In the mouth the campfire notes are integrated with flavors of fig cookie, brown sugar, hay, and charred grains. The dusty texture and leathery finish leave an earthy flavor in the mouth."
97 pts, Extraordinary, Ultimate Recommendation, Ultimate Spirits Competition 2021

name: DILLONS - MANHATTAN
tastingDescription: A blend of rye whisky and vermouth with notes of honey, clove , green tea, orange peel and vanilla. Finished with notes of cinnamon, nutmeg and sour cherry.

name: DILLONS - NEGRONI
tastingDescription: A blend of gin and vermouth with notes of juniper, citrus, coriander, orange peel and vanilla. Finished with notes of rhubarb, violets, and a touch of cinnamon.

name: DIPLOMATICO - MANTUANO
tastingDescription: By way of Venezuela arrives this extra-aged, reserve Diplomático rum. It oozes vanilla and toasted oak in an overall elegant and robust style that calls for slow sipping.

name: DIPLOMATICO - RESERVA EXCLUSIVA
tastingDescription: 92 Points, Ultimate Spirits Challenge 2016 - "Candied raisins, vanilla nougat, and orange zest begin to describe the lush and decadent aromatics of this indulgent sipping rum. The palate continues in form and provides mouth-filling rum indulgence all the way to its soft and supple finish.”

name: DIPLOMATICO - SINGLE VINTAGE 2005
tastingDescription: A very charming nose that reveals notes of smoked coffee, chocolate and tobacco, followed by vanilla and ripe fruits.On the palate it is soft and well-rounded, with flavors of bitter chocolate and a pronounced mellow finish with hints of red fruit. Although the rum composition is similar to our other vintages, the 2005 is slightly less dry.

name: DISARONNO - VELVET
tastingDescription: Introducing Disaronno Velvet, a smooth cream liqueur with the unmistakable taste of Disaronno, the world's favorite Italian Liqueur. Fresh notes of apricot with a touch of almond and vanilla. Enjoy chilled, over ice or in your favourite cream cocktail.

name: DOMAINE DE JOY - 1998 ARMAGNAC
tastingDescription: False

name: DOMAINE DE JOY - 1999 ARMAGNAC

name: DON JULIO - ANEJO 1942
tastingDescription: Created to celebrate the 60th anniversary, 1942 is double-distilled and aged in oak barrels for over​ two years. Agave hand selected by Don Julio himself results in a tequila with a nose of vanilla and nuts, and a silky mouthfeel with a sweet finish. This product is restricted to 1 bottle limit.

name: DON JULIO - BLANCO
tastingDescription: Pure tasting tequila made only from quality agave. Pours clear with lively aromas of fresh agave, lemon, lime, and grapefruit. Smooth on the palate with light agave sweetness, delicate grassy notes and a hint of black pepper leading to a clean finish

name: DON JULIO - BLANCO
tastingDescription: Double-distilled to achieve a light, clean and dry tequila with crisp agave flavor and hints​ of citrus. An essential component to a variety of innovative drinks.​

name: DON JULIO - BLANCO
tastingDescription: Double-distilled to achieve a light, clean and dry tequila with crisp agave flavor and hints​ of citrus. An essential component to a variety of innovative drinks.​

name: DON JULIO - REPOSADO
tastingDescription: 100% blue agave, this luxury tequila displays mellow agave, honey, hints of stone fruit and a slight smokiness. The soft palate is elegant with chocolate, spice and a smooth viscous texture. The finish is warm, silky and memorable.

name: DON JULIO - REPOSADO DOUBLE CASK LAGAVULIN AGED
nameSanitized: don julio - reposado double cask lagavulin aged
sort: DON JULIO - REPOSADO DOUBLE CASK LAGAVULIN AGED
tastingDescription: Created by Master Distiller Enrique de Colsa in collaboration with the Lagavulin Distillery Manager, Colin Gordon, this limited edition, innovative tequila is inspired by Don Julio Gonzalez�s creative spirit and passion to take the art of tequila making to new heights. Tequila Don Julio Reposado, Double Cask is a unique, rich and nuanced expression of our traditional Reposado now finished in casks that previously held Lagavulin Islay Single Malt Scotch Whisky.

name: DR. MCGILLICUDDY'S - MENTHOLMINT
tastingDescription: The Mint Schnapps has peppermint candy cane and mild menthol aromas. It is a full-bodied liqueur with intense peppermint, fresh mint leaf, and menthol flavours, with a lingering menthol finish.

name: DRAMBUIE
tastingDescription: A unique blend of aged Scotch whisky with a secret combination of spices, heather honey and herbs which matches its rich flavours. Its origins traced to a secret recipe created for Bonnie Prince Charlie by his Royal Apothecary in the 18th Century.

name: DRAMBUIE
tastingDescription: A unique blend of aged Scotch whisky with a secret combination of spices, heather honey and herbs which matches its rich flavours. Its origins traced to a secret recipe created for Bonnie Prince Charlie by his Royal Apothecary in the 18th Century.

name: DRINKS BY THE DRAM - SCOTCH WHISKY ADVENT CALENDAR
nameSanitized: drinks by the dram - scotch whisky advent calendar
sort: DRINKS BY THE DRAM - SCOTCH WHISKY ADVENT CALENDAR
tastingDescription: An entire advent calendar dedicated to the wonder that is whisky?! That's exactly what THAT BOUTIQUE-Y WHISKY CO. has delivered with this magnificent box of tasty treats. Behind each of the 24 doors you'll find a different 3cl dram including some of the worlds finest single malts, blended malts and blends. From delicate and complex to powerfully peaty, there's plenty to explore here.

name: DRUMSHANBO - GUNPOWDER IRISH GIN
tastingDescription: This distinct Gin is made from a blend of unique botanicals: Meadowsweet, juniper berries, Angelica root, caraway seed, gunpowder tea (concentrated pellets of green tea), Oriental grapefruit, cardamom, coriander seed, Orris root, Star Anise, Chinese lemon and Makrut lime. Citrus-laden flavours with exotic spices delivering a smooth and pleasant finish.

name: DRUMSHANBO - GUNPOWDER IRISH GIN WITH GLASS GIFT PACK
nameSanitized: drumshanbo - gunpowder irish gin with glass gift pack

name: DUJARDIN - V.S.O.P.
tastingDescription: Delicate, gently caramel, lightly vanilla, silky character. Created from only the best wines  selected French wines, many from the prestigious Charentes region of France. Extensive maturation takes place inLimousin oak barrels, which imparts it's attractive golden colour, exquisite rich taste and aromatic bouquet.

name: E H TAYLOR - SMALL BATCH
tastingDescription:
This Small Batch Bourbon Whiskey has been aged inside century old warehouses constructed by E.H. Taylor, Jr. Barrels are evaluated and selected to create a perfect blend of distinctive character that is like no other. Tastes of caramel corn sweetness, mingled with butterscotch and licorice. The aftertaste is a soft mouth-feel that turns into subtle spices of pepper and tobacco.
Gold Medal, San Francisco World Spirits Competition 2020

name: EAGLE RARE KENTUCKY STRAIGHT BOURBON WHISKEY
nameSanitized: eagle rare kentucky straight bourbon whiskey
nameSuffix: EAGLE RARE KENTUCKY STRAIGHT BOURBON WHISKEY
sort: EAGLE RARE KENTUCKY STRAIGHT BOURBON WHISKEY
tastingDescription: The nose is complex, with aromas of toffee, hints of orange peel, herbs, honey, leather and oak. The taste is bold, dry and delicate with notes of candied almonds and very rich cocoa. The finish is dry and lingering.

name: EH TAYLOR - WAREHOUSE C
tastingDescription:
A nose of cherry cobbler with rum sauce and a hint of oak; a palate of cherry cola, vanilla bean and toasted oak; and a finish that is long and lingering with a hint of spearmint, coffee, raisin bread and anise.
1 Bottle limit.

name: EL DORADO - 12 YEAR OLD FINEST DEMERARA
nameSanitized: el dorado - 12 year old finest demerara
sort: EL DORADO - 12 YEAR OLD FINEST DEMERARA
tastingDescription: A blend of specially selected aged rums, the youngest being no less than 12 years old, it is a combination of the Enmore and Diamond Coffey stills and the Port Mourant double wooden pot still, blended to perfection and aged in old bourbon oak casks. Lush tropical fruit and spice nose with hints of honey and dark sugar. Round, mellow, full bodied palate with rich flavours of fruit and spice.

name: EL DORADO - 15 YEAR OLD SPECIAL RESERVE
nameSanitized: el dorado - 15 year old special reserve
sort: EL DORADO - 15 YEAR OLD SPECIAL RESERVE
tastingDescription: "A great example of how good Caribbean rums can be. Coffee and chocolate notes enhance the tropical fruit and smooth oaky spice flavours of this rum." - Adele Shaw, Category Manager for Spirits & Sake

name: EL JIMADOR - BLANCO
tastingDescription: Young and fresh, el Jimador Silver tequila steps up with truly authentic character. It’s made with 100% hand-harvested blue Weber agave and double distilled with sparkling clarity. We’ve perfected the skills to produce a spirit so rich in flavor that every sip comes to life. Crisp and buzzing with citrus flavors, take a sip or shake it up.

name: EL JIMADOR - REPOSADO
tastingDescription: el Jimador Reposado begins with 100% hand-harvested blue Weber agave, naturally fermented and double distilled. Then it enjoys a two-month siesta in our own handmade American oak barrels until the perfect moment. The results are worth the wait: an exquisite golden tone, warm seasoned flavors and a smooth, confident agave flavor that really shines through.

name: EL JIMADOR - REPOSADO
tastingDescription: el Jimador Reposado begins with 100% hand-harvested blue Weber agave, naturally fermented and double distilled. Then it enjoys a two-month siesta in our own handmade American oak barrels until the perfect moment. The results are worth the wait: an exquisite golden tone, warm seasoned flavors and a smooth, confident agave flavor that really shines through.

name: EL MAYOR - REPOSADO
tastingDescription: Aged nine months, subtle golden hues, hints of sweet fruit flavours and understated spice. On the mouth smooth, round entry leads to a dryish, medium body with perfumed fruity agave, vanilla, spice and caramel for a smooth and balanced finish with fruity, perfumed spice.

name: ELDERFLOWER LIQUEUR - ST GERMAIN
tastingDescription: Made from fresh, handpicked elderflowers, it has lovely aromas of elderflower, peach, lychee and lemon with delicate elderflower, passion fruit and grapefruit on the palate. St-Germain is an exotic, aromatic addition to cocktails.

name: ELIJAH CRAIG - PRIVATE BARREL
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
Exclusive cask bottling for BCLIQUOR. Beautiful aromas of honeysuckle and marzipan. Sweet vanilla, nutmeg and toasty oak come though on the palate. Extremely smooth and delicious, a very balanced whiskey.

name: ELIJAH CRAIG - SMALL BATCH

tastingDescription: This double-distilled vodka is the most popular white liquor in Asia. It is famous for its clean taste and fruity aroma.

name: ER GUO TOU - SHAO JIU
tastingDescription: This double distilled baijiu comes with a clear and clear taste in addition to its sorghum flavour.

name: ER GUO TOU - SHAO JIU
tastingDescription: This popular Chinese rice spirit has over 100 years of history. Famous for its clean taste. The name Er Guo Tou came from its three times distillation process.

name: ESPOLON - BLANCO
tastingDescription: Soft mouth-feel, light-to medium-bodied palate with bright agave flavour; notes of pepper, vanilla bean, grilled pineapple and spice. Elegant, clean  finish that ends with a hint of spice.

name: ESPOLON - REPOSADO
tastingDescription: Bold, round mouthfeel leads to a medium dry, full-bodied palate with rich roasted agave, sweet tropical fruit, intense vanilla and brown spices. Finishes slowly with a sweet spicy fade. A hedonistic Reposado that has Añejo-like wood spiciness.

name: EVAN WILLIAMS - 1783 BOURBON
tastingDescription:
1783 Small Batch honours the year that Evan Williams founded Kentucky's First Distillery. This small batch bourbon is pulled from less than 200 barrels. It is extra-aged and uses the same sour mash process and traditional recipe. Aromas of oaky vanilla, sauteed butter, and sweet corn. The taste is semi-sweet, oaky, and honeyed with a lean, off-dry regal finish.
Gold Medal, San Francisco World Spirits Competition 2020

name: EVAN WILLIAMS - KENTUCKY BOURBON
tastingDescription: A smooth, easy to drink Bourbon, light with deep vanilla and mint on the nose. Notes of oak, brown sugar and caramel with a medium to long finish.

tastingDescription: You will enjoy this Mezcal cold and neat as much as in cocktails. The balance between the rich taste of agave and the smokiness resulting from roasting the fruit will allow you to experience the spirit in one of the most traditional ways.

name: FEN CHIEW
tastingDescription: Fen Chiew is know as the grandfather of Chinese vodka with over 1,400 years of brewing experience. It is fermented underground in ceramic containers to produce a remarkable elegant taste.

name: FERNET BRANCA BITTERS
tastingDescription: Its secret formula, passed down from father to son in the Branca family, has guaranteed the protection of the quality that still makes it the digestive bitter liqueur par excellence. The secret of its unique, unmistakable taste lies in the wise recipe: 27 herbs picked in four continents and aged in oak casks for over a year.

name: FETTERCAIRN - 12 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: Aged for 12 years in American White Oak ex-Bourbon casks. The color resembles sunlight and honey amber, and it  tastes like Vanilla and pear. A memorable finish of sultanas and black toffee, it's refereshing with hints of nectarine and tropical fruit.

name: FIFTH GENERATION - TITO'S HANDMADE
tastingDescription: Made from 100% corn, this water-white vodka from Texas features clean and elegant aromas with a hint of sweet corn. Distilled six times in pot stills, it is balanced and medium-bodied on the palate with a very slight peppery finish. Excellent on its own or infuse fresh, local ingredients to make your own custom blend of flavoured vodka.

tastingDescription: Rebel Vodka is hand crafted one batch at a time from the finest BC apples.  Distilled using our 25 plate artisan copper still it is then cold filtered preserving a bright and characterful apple aroma.

nameSanitized: forty creek -  limited 2021 edition masters cut cask streng
nameSuffix: LIMITED 2021 EDITION MASTER'S CUT CASK STRENG

tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
Experience the first ever cask strength whisky from Forty Creek, with their  15th limited-edition annual release, Master's Cut. This 5-year-old pot-distilled whisky is rich, distinct and unapologetically bold. Bottled straight from the barrel at 48.5%, it delivers a full flavour with the signature Forty Creek smooth finish. Aromas of candied fruit with floral top notes.  Flavours are spicy with vanilla and wood notes.

name: FORTY CREEK - BARREL SELECT
tastingDescription: Forty Creek Barrel Select aromas are of honey, vanilla, apricot fused with toasty oak, black walnut, and spice. The flavor is robust, complex, rich, with bold flavors of vanilla, honey, and cocoa with a toasted earthiness. The finish is smooth, lingering and has a memorable finish.

name: FORTY CREEK - BARREL SELECT
tastingDescription: Forty Creek Barrel Select aromas are of honey, vanilla, apricot fused with toasty oak, black walnut, and spice. The flavor is robust, complex, rich, with bold flavors of vanilla, honey, and cocoa with a toasted earthiness. The finish is smooth, lingering and has a memorable finish.

name: FORTY CREEK - BARREL SELECT
tastingDescription: Forty Creek Barrel Select aromas are of honey, vanilla, apricot fused with toasty oak, black walnut, and spice. The flavor is robust, complex, rich, with bold flavors of vanilla, honey, and cocoa with a toasted earthiness. The finish is smooth, lingering and has a memorable finish.

name: FORTY CREEK - BARREL SELECT
tastingDescription: Forty Creek Barrel Select aromas are of honey, vanilla, apricot fused with toasty oak, black walnut, and spice. The flavor is robust, complex, rich, with bold flavors of vanilla, honey, and cocoa with a toasted earthiness. The finish is smooth, lingering and has a memorable finish.

name: FORTY CREEK - CONFEDERATION OAK RESERVE
tastingDescription: Whisky of the Decade, Canadian Whisky Awards: Aged for a minimum of four years in vintage bourbon barrels then aged again for up to two years in custom made Canadian white oak barrels. The nose offers aromas of citrus, peach and honey with soft notes of caramel and vanilla; rich with creamy notes of toffee nicely framed with toasty oak and a long lingering finish. (2020)

name: FORTY CREEK - COPPER POT RESERVE
tastingDescription: Forty Creek Copper Pot appearance is a deep copper color. The aromas are bold with toffee, nuts and spice. The flavor is full bodied with notes of rich brown spice and dried stone fruit, and hints of marmalade. The finish is long with a sensual fade.

name: FORTY CREEK - CREAM
tastingDescription: False

name: FORTY CREEK - CREAM
tastingDescription: Made with Forty Creek whisky and fresh dairy cream, this rich vanilla and chocolate liqueur is perfect in coffee or over ice cream, and excellent with the freshly made fudge

name: FORTY CREEK - DOUBLE BARREL
tastingDescription: False

name: FORTY CREEK - FOXHEART
tastingDescription: Forty Creek's finest Canadian whisky with an infusion of premium 12-year-old Jamaican rum to deliver an exceptionally well-rounded taste. A very intriguing nose, weaving notes of rich molasses, stewed dark fruits and ripe banana with dry straw, grain and baking spice. The palate is well-rounded with rich sweetness. Dried leather, oak and barley grain notes are punctuated with lively spice, white pepper and dried fruits. A dry, spicy Cabernet Franc-like finish with a nice touch of acidity.

name: FORTY CREEK - NANAIMO BAR CREAM
tastingDescription: Forty Creek Nanaimo Bar is crafted with fresh dairy cream, delicately blended with award-winning Forty Creek whisky and flavours of chocolate, vanilla, coconut and graham wafer.

name: FORTY CREEK - SPIKE HONEY SPICED
tastingDescription: Forty Creek Spike is bright, deep gold coloured in appearance. The aromas are bold, honey, vanilla, cinnamon, ginger and brown sugar fushed with toasty oak, dried fruit and dark chocolate. The flavlour is rich and sweet, with flares of brown spices and hints of butterscotch. The spices linger on the finish.

name: FOUR ROSES - 80 PROOF
tastingDescription: This bourbon displays aromas of ripe fruit, floral essences, gentle spice and honey. On the palate, it is crisp yet soft and smooth, with fresh fruit flavours and hints of pear and apple. The finish is mellow, long, and pleasant.

name: FRANGELICO
tastingDescription: This bright amber liqueur is made from toasted wild hazelnuts combined with cocoa, dried vanilla beans and a host of other natural extracts. The complex flavours complement the nutty, fruity and floral elements of this sweet dessert.

name: FUNDADOR - BRANDY DE JEREZ SOLERA RESERVA
nameSanitized: fundador - brandy de jerez solera reserva
sort: FUNDADOR - BRANDY DE JEREZ SOLERA RESERVA
tastingDescription: Fundador Brandy, by Pedro Domecq is made at the oldest bodega in Jerez, dating back to the 1730s and was the first brand to be marketed at "Brandy de Jerez" in 1874. It is aged in the traditional Solera system in used sherry barrels which give it its dark golden color. Slightly sweet, this brandy is well-priced for its sophistication.

name: FUYU - JAPANESE WHISKY
tastingDescription: Initially, this whisky has caramel and vanilla notes quickly followed by cereal grain and dark soy sauce with a little smoke element appearing near the finish.

name: G AND W - CASK PROJECT IMPERIAL STOUT FINISH CANADIAN WHISKY
nameSanitized: g and w - cask project imperial stout finish canadian whisky
nameSuffix: CASK PROJECT IMPERIAL STOUT FINISH CANADIAN WHISKY
sort: G AND W - CASK PROJECT IMPERIAL STOUT FINISH CANADIAN WHISKY
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
A rare collaboration between Goodridge and Williams Distilling and Stanley Park Brewing. The distillery took their wheat whisky that had been aged a minimum of 3 years in bourbon casks and had notes of spice, clove and vanilla and finished it in Stanley Park Brewing Imperial Stout casks. The result is a lovely whisky with a smooth and sweet maltiness with notes of caramel and dried fruits. A true BC spirit.

name: G AND W - NUTRL
tastingDescription: This small batch artisan spirit is single distilled over an abundance of copper using two Carl stills. The 38 plate distillation process accentuates the subtle grain flavours resulting in this exceptionally balanced and smooth vodka.

name: G AND W - THE CASK PROJECT WEE HEAVY FINISH CANADIAN WHISKY

tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
A rare collaboration between Goodridge and Williams Distilling and Stanley Park Brewing. The distillery took their wheat whisky that had been aged a minimum of 3 years in bourbon casks and had notes of spice, clove and vanilla and finished it in Stanley Park Brewing Wee Heavy Scottish Ale casks. The marriage of these finishes brings an explosion of aroma and finishing notes of dark chocolate-covered cherries and roasted malt, a finely balanced whisky indeed.

name: GALLIANO
tastingDescription: Best known for its role in the classic Harvey Wallbanger cocktail, this vibrant yellow liqueur is also perfectly enjoyable on its own. The recipe comprises 40 different botanicals, predominantly vanilla and anise, for a medium bodied liqueur with flavours of vanilla bean, candied orange peel, peppery herbs and a long, smooth finish.

tastingDescription: The palate opens with sweet, smokey caramelized banana, burnt marshmallow and Vanilla which subsides into a light dry menthol and salted caramel finish.

name: GIBSONS - FINEST RARE 12 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: Made the time honoured way, tastefully aged 12 years to provide smoothness and a richer taste. Its palate displays sweet vanilla toffee with subtle oak notes and dry finish.

name: GILLESPIE'S FINE SPIRITS - CRANBERRY GIN BAUBLE
nameSanitized: gillespies fine spirits - cranberry gin bauble

tastingDescription: False

name: GILLESPIE'S FINE SPIRITS - SIN GIN
tastingDescription: Small batch, New World and distilled from 100% BC-grown grain and glacier-fed mountain water. Rich in botanicals of elderflower and juniper. Lesser known notes of grains of paradise and cubeb berries flirt with angelica and bitter orange peel. One secret ingredient encompasses flavours adding a hint of sweetness.

name: GINGER OF THE INDIES - GIFFARD
tastingDescription: This premium, straw-coloured liqueur is distilled from a natural maceration of the best ginger from Asia, enhanced with spices for a warm, rich character. Strong aromas of ginger and coriander on the nose are softened by a touch of vanilla and orange blossom. The palate is sweet at first, with a citrus tanginess, but finishes with a peppery sensation of ginger.

name: GLAYVA
tastingDescription: Place the glass a few inches from your nose and savor the rich and complex aromas. The sweet bouquet of citrus, herbs and spices blend perfectly with the subtle scent of malt whisky, slowly revealing Glayva’s many desirable virtues. Take a sip and hold it on your tongue, just for a moment, to enjoy the luxuriously smooth and indulging flavors wash over your taste buds. Elegant and rich on the palate with a long and enticing aftertaste.

name: GLEN DEVERON - 28 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
The Glen Deveron 28-Year-Old is amongst the oldest expressions released to date from this coastal distillery. This is a very rich and opulent expression from the Macduff distillery, with a generous amount of the maturation taking place in former sherry casks, creating a fuller and fruiter taste. it begins with notes of baked apple and plum pudding before developing with flavours of creamy toffee and toasted cereal, with a hint of coconut.

name: GLEN ELGIN - 18 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: A top-rated malt with classic Speyside taste, this expression has fresh aromas and layers of fruit with balanced oak providing just enough spice. A burst of sweetness washes over the palate, with traces of spun honey and honeycomb, followed by sour apples, oaky spice and brown sugar.

name: GLEN GARIOCH - 12 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: Matured for 12 year from a marriage of Oloroso Sherry Butts and Bourbon Barrels. Bourbon softens and sweetens while sherry brings fragrance, fruit and depth.

name: GLEN GRANT - 12 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: False

name: GLEN GRANT - 15 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
"Rich and rounded with summer fruits and an abundance of fresh peach and honeysuckle. Creamy vanilla fudge underpinned by tropical notes of banana with white pepper. Spicy with a sandalwood and chilli dry finish."
95 pts, International Wine & Spirit Competition 2021

name: GLEN GRANT - 18 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
"Ripe, tropical bouquet of pineapple stalk, mango, lychee, and elderflower with hints of honey-roasted walnut and lemon peel. Soft, chewy salted caramel and milk chocolate unfurl on the palate with hints of baked plum and coriander. Delightful."
95 pts, Extraordinary, Ultimate Recommendation, Ultimate Spirits Competition 2021
2 Bottle limit.

name: GLEN GRANT - 60YO DENNIS MALCOLM ANNIVERSARY EDITION
nameSanitized: glen grant - 60yo dennis malcolm anniversary edition
sort: GLEN GRANT - 60YO DENNIS MALCOLM ANNIVERSARY EDITION
tastingDescription: The Glen Grant Dennis Malcolm Anniversary Edition Aged 60 Years is the ultimate tribute to Dennis Malcolm OBE, their revered Master Distiller. Malcolm says, "This very rare and unique liquid displays an incredibly rich depth and complexity. For single malt lovers it epitomises the distinctive harmony of aroma and taste that defines The Glen Grant now and for always. It was matured for six decades in one Oloroso sherry cask making it one of the best whiskies I've ever tasted and, I'm immensely proud to say, one that is the pinnacle of my career in whisky-making."

name: GLEN GRANT PRIVATE COLLECTION 1948 - GORDON AND MACPHAIL
nameSanitized: glen grant private collection 1948 - gordon and macphail
sort: GLEN GRANT PRIVATE COLLECTION 1948 - GORDON AND MACPHAIL
tastingDescription: Initially sweet, with vanilla fudge, strawberry and raspberry nuances. Develops into thick apricot jam, with hints of dried orange and cinnamon. Gentle and lingering smoky traces complement the balanced mature oak notes. Distilled in 1948 and bottled in 2018, only 210 bottles produced. Cask #2154.

name: GLEN GRANT PRIVATE COLLECTION 1965 - GORDON AND MACPHAIL
nameSanitized: glen grant private collection 1965 - gordon and macphail
sort: GLEN GRANT PRIVATE COLLECTION 1965 - GORDON AND MACPHAIL
tastingDescription: A basket laden with windfall apples. Aromas of clementine and vibrant orange sit upon intense polished oak. Touches of vanilla come through on the finish along with flashes of nutmeg, white pepper and cinnamon. Distilled in 1965 and bottled in 2019, only 94 bottles produced. Cask #1685.

name: GLEN GRANT RARE VINTAGE 1950 - GORDON AND MACPHAIL
nameSanitized: glen grant rare vintage 1950 - gordon and macphail
sort: GLEN GRANT RARE VINTAGE 1950 - GORDON AND MACPHAIL
tastingDescription: This full-bodied greatly aged single malt populates the nose with gorgeously rich Madeira spiciness and dark chocolate; luscious ripening red berry aromas linger long after the dram has been consumed. The dark golden liquid peppers the palate with a touch of charred oak, a well-rounded hint of ash, and warm stewed autumn apples enhanced by a long cinnamon finish reminiscent of apple pie. Distilled in 1950 and bottled in 2010, only 604 bottles produced. Cask #2750 and #2760.

name: GLEN GRANT RARE VINTAGE 1951 - GORDON AND MACPHAIL
nameSanitized: glen grant rare vintage 1951 - gordon and macphail
sort: GLEN GRANT RARE VINTAGE 1951 - GORDON AND MACPHAIL
tastingDescription: The nose of this golden amber coloured dram is plentifully reminiscent of the sherry butts in which it matured for 61 years: sweet and fruity accompanied by almonds toasting over an oak fire. One sip of this medium-bodied, elegant old Speysider delights: the initial white pepper heat is enriched by warm apple crumble and a dark chocolate finish. Distilled in 1951 and bottled in 2013, only 358 bottles produced. Cask #2760 and #3202.

name: GLEN GRANT RARE VINTAGE 1952 - GORDON AND MACPHAIL
nameSanitized: glen grant rare vintage 1952 - gordon and macphail
sort: GLEN GRANT RARE VINTAGE 1952 - GORDON AND MACPHAIL
tastingDescription: Delicate sherry notes with polished leather and ripe banana aromas. Herbal and earthy notes develop. Smoky and peppery with a subtle phenolic edge. Underlying sherry character remains with apple and pear flavours. Distilled in 1952 and bottled in 2012, only 665 bottles produced. Cask #378, #1133, #1471, and #3245.

name: GLEN GRANT RARE VINTAGE 1953 - GORDON AND MACPHAIL
nameSanitized: glen grant rare vintage 1953 - gordon and macphail
sort: GLEN GRANT RARE VINTAGE 1953 - GORDON AND MACPHAIL
tastingDescription: Defined sherry influences with stewed apples, beeswax and lemon. A subtle menthol edge develops. The palate is peppery initially with orange and dark chocolate flavours. A bonfire ember edge lingers. Distilled in 1953 and bottled in 2013, only 517 bottles produced. Cask #598, #599, and #1105
