World's Best Single Malt, World Whiskies Awards 2021

name: GLENCRAIG 1975 - GORDON AND MACPHAIL 25TH ANNIVERSARY
tastingDescription: Fragrant honey and desiccated coconut aromas lead to citrus blossom. Malted cereal notes come to the fore alongside tart grapefruit with soft ginger and subtle oak. Rich nectarine flavours and mouth-warming white pepper give way to refreshing lime zest. C

name: GLENDALOUGH - 17 YEAR OLD SINGLE MALT MIZUNARA
nameSanitized: glendalough - 17 year old single malt mizunara
sort: GLENDALOUGH - 17 YEAR OLD SINGLE MALT MIZUNARA
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
A 17 Year Old Single Malt that was initially aged in ex-Bourbon barrels for 15 years before being finished in a rare Japanese Mizunara cask for the final two years.

name: GLENDALOUGH - 25 YEAR OLD SINGLE MALT VIRGIN IRISH OAK WHISK
nameSanitized: glendalough - 25 year old single malt virgin irish oak whisk
nameSuffix: 25 YEAR OLD SINGLE MALT VIRGIN IRISH OAK WHISK
sort: GLENDALOUGH - 25 YEAR OLD SINGLE MALT VIRGIN IRISH OAK WHISK
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
The Glendalough 25 Year Old is the first Irish Single Malt to be aged in Irish Oak. Initially this whiskey was matured in heavily charred ex-Bourbon barrels before being transferred into an Oloroso Sherry cask before finally being aged in virgin Irish oak.

name: GLENDALOUGH - DOUBLE BARREL
tastingDescription: Irish whiskey is hot and this beauty has been matured in both bourbon and sherry casks. Smooth vanilla and caramel notes are quickly joined by dates and dried cherry through the finish

name: GLENDRONACH - 1992 BATCH 18 CASK 6049
tastingDescription: Available starting November 13th in select stores

name: GLENDRONACH - KINGSMAN EDITION 1989 VINTAGE
tastingDescription: The GlenDronach Kingsman Edition 1989 Vintage has been crafted by The GlenDronach Master Blender Dr. Rachel Barrie, in collaboration with the Kingsman film franchise producer, writer and director Matthew Vaughn, to mark the global release of "The King's Man" in 2021. Matured in oloroso sherry casks with a final maturation in Pedro Ximénez casks from Spain, this 29-year-old vintage is richly sherried, characterful and complex, with an enduring finish. Just six of the finest casks from 1989, one of The GlenDronach's most exclusive vintages, have been meticulously selected and married for exceptional character.

name: GLENFARCLAS - 105 CASK STRENGTH
tastingDescription: Gold Medal, The Scotch Whisky Masters 2019 Speyside Cask Strength Category - "Drying, assertive and richly spiced, the 105 makes for a superb dram. Add a drop of water if you please to explore its depth - and don't be put off by that ABV, there's plenty of flavour here to enjoy." (June 2019)

name: GLENFARCLAS - 12 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: Silver Medal, The Scotch Whisky Masters 2019 Speyside Premium Category - "Notes of Brioche, rum soaked raisins, good old sherry and malt loaf underneath. Nutella, white pepper, clove and plum jam rounds out the finish." (June, 2019)

name: GLENFARCLAS - 17 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: Complex, full-bodied and rich, it fills and coats the palate with warming nutmeg, sherried fruits, cinnamon and mixed peels. Long, spicy and sweet with just a hint of smoke on the tail.

name: GLENFARCLAS - 1976 FAMILY CASKS WINTER 2015 CASK 3110
tastingDescription: On the nose jammy, fruity, sauternes, herbal, menthol freshness and toffee. The palate is rich and balanced. Fruity, exotic spices, earthy and aniseed. The finish is plum jam, soft, rubbery and herbal.

name: GLENFARCLAS - 25 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: Gold Medal, The Scotch Whisky Masters 2019 Speyside Ultra Premium Category - "An all-time classic, Glenfarclas 25yo is the epitome of long-aged sherried Speyside, gorgeously smooth and silkily-textured, with rich, generous flavours of fruitcake, hazelnuts, dried fruit and a hint of dark chocolate and coffee. A thoroughly delightful dram." (June 2019)

name: GLENFARCLAS - 30 YEARS OLD
tastingDescription: Gold Medal, The Scotch Whisky Masters 2019 Speyside Ultra Premium Category - "This edition of 30-year-old whisky is rich, dark and smoky with notes of marzipan, icing, sugared peels, coffee and burnt chocolate. Finishing long, full and rubbery on the tail."

name: GLENFARCLAS - 40 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: Complex and well-rounded, with great depth and no excessive oak. Lush, candied citrus, old pot still rum, maple syrup, fig, roasted nuts, and polished leather, with hints of mocha, candied ginger, and tobacco. Oily in texture with a good tannic grip on the finish. A classic, well-matured Glenfarclas - and a very good value for its age.

name: GLENFARCLAS - FAMILY CASK 1961
tastingDescription: Would you just look at the delightfully dark hue on this Glenfarclas Family Cask release! This is a 1961 vintage, matured in a single sherry hogshead until March 2014, when it was bottled for their Summer 2014 release. Just 144 bottles were produced. It ought to be a fantastic sherried treat.

name: GLENFARCLAS - FAMILY CASK 1971 SP17 CASK 151
tastingDescription: This is another smashing release from the Glenfarclas Family Cask range. It was distilled back in 1971 and set aside to mature in a sherry butt until said cask was cracked open in January 2017. 424 cask strength bottles were produced.

name: GLENFARCLAS - FAMILY CASK 1980 W18

name: GLENFARCLAS - FAMILY CASK 1982 W17 CASK 4565
tastingDescription: False

name: GLENFARCLAS - FAMILY CASK 1986 W18 CASK 4335
tastingDescription: Delicate molasses and Christmas cakes, rum soaked raisins and baking spices, cigar tobacco on the nose.  The palate is sweet, afternoon coffee, with a touch of cream sherry, berries, polished wood, old piano, worn out leather jacket, marzipan, with a warming spice and dark chocolate finish.

name: GLENFARCLAS - FAMILY CASK 1987 W18 CASK 3831
tastingDescription: False

name: GLENFARCLAS - FAMILY CASK 1988 S18
tastingDescription: The nose offers a lush fruity sherry profile with dozens of different home-grown and exotic fruits, however the taste is bold and much more spicy than the nose. It is nicely layered with all three sherry, malt and woods in a fine balance. The finish is long and extends the delicious taste into eternity.

name: GLENFARCLAS - FAMILY CASK 1989 W18 CASK 13010
tastingDescription: False

name: GLENFIDDICH - 14YO BOURBON BARREL RESERVE
tastingDescription: Matured exclusively in ex-bourbon casks for 14 years and finished in deeply charred new American Oak casks, the liquid delivers a rich, sweet and vibrant flavour to this award-winning single malt scotch. Certified Kosher and only available in Canada and the U.S.

name: GLENFIDDICH - 21 YEAR OLD GRAN RUM CASK FINISH
nameSanitized: glenfiddich - 21 year old gran rum cask finish
nameSuffix: 21 YEAR OLD GRAN RUM CASK FINISH
sort: GLENFIDDICH - 21 YEAR OLD GRAN RUM CASK FINISH
tastingDescription: 97 Points, Wine Enthusiast - “Finished in rum casks, the honey and orange zest aromas suggest a cocktail, not a straight pour of Scotch. These flavors are echoed on the silky palate, opening with cocoa and leather and evolving into a luscious, fudge-like finish, with hints of orange peel and cinnamon. Enjoy with a big rock of ice and a piece of orange peel, it needs no other adornment.” (December 2017)

name: GLENFIDDICH - 26 YEAR OLD EXCELLENCE
tastingDescription: 95 Points, Wine Enthusiast - “Light and silky, this Speyside Scotch, matured in former Bourbon casks for a minimum of 26 years, boasts scents of apples, pears, vanilla and a whiff of jasmine. There's a sweet smoke tone upfront, while flavors of vanilla and custard-like sweetness unfold with each sip, fading to a more delicate floral and lemon curd finish.” (December 2015)

name: GLENFIDDICH - ANCIENT RESERVE 18 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: 92 Points, Wine Enthusiast - “Aged for 18 years in former oloroso sherry and bourbon casks, the mild aroma has a distinct, sherry-like dried apricot note. The palate is relatively dry, with hints of cocoa, leather, stone fruit and clove. Adding water coaxes out more vanilla sweetness and hints of citrus, exiting dry and spiced.” (December 2017)

name: GLENFIDDICH - FIRE AND CANE
tastingDescription: The fourth release in Glenfiddich’s Experimental Series, Fire & Cane combines peated and unpeated whiskies. The whisky is then finished in rum casks, sourced from a number of South American countries, for three months. Expect a bold fusion of smoky and sweet flavours on the palate.

name: GLENFIDDICH - SOLERA RESERVE 15 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: 95 Points, Wine Enthusiast - “Look for rich, rounded flavors with lots of honey, vanilla and baking spice notes. The palate is creamy, with a mouth-filling texture and smoky finish.” (December 2013)

name: GLENFIDDICH SPECIAL RESERVE - 12 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: 93 Points & Best Buy, Wine Enthusiast - “Lush and rich, this honeyed whisky is loaded with dense notes of creamy custard and tropical fruit, finishing with a flourish of baking spice.” (December 2013)

name: GLENFIDDICH SPECIAL RESERVE - 12 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: 93 Points & Best Buy, Wine Enthusiast - “Lush and rich, this honeyed whisky is loaded with dense notes of creamy custard and tropical fruit, finishing with a flourish of baking spice.” (December 2013)

name: GLENFIDDICH SPECIAL RESERVE - 12 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: 93 Points & Best Buy, Wine Enthusiast - “Lush and rich, this honeyed whisky is loaded with dense notes of creamy custard and tropical fruit, finishing with a flourish of baking spice.” (December 2013)

name: GLENKINCHIE - 24 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: "The third Special Releases cask strength Glenkinchie is the oldest to date and the first to have been matured in European oak casks. Peach and pear soufflé on the initial nose, followed by apricots and toffee. The palate is rich and smooth, with dark fruits, walnuts, nutmeg, and a hint of resin. Quite lengthy, with ginger and white pepper in the aromatic and subtly drying finish." Gavin Smith 2016

name: GLENLIVET  - 50 YEAR OLD SCOTCH WHISKEY VINTAGE COLLECTION
nameSanitized: glenlivet  - 50 year old scotch whiskey vintage collection
nameSuffix: 50 YEAR OLD SCOTCH WHISKEY VINTAGE COLLECTION
sort: GLENLIVET  - 50 YEAR OLD SCOTCH WHISKEY VINTAGE COLLECTION
tastingDescription: The Glenlivet Single Malt Scotch Whisky, The Winchester Collection.  50 Years of Age, Laid to mature in 1967 and bottled on 6th June 2018 at Cask Strength.

name: GLENLIVET - 12 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: This whisky has been called a lot of things in its time: smooth, fruity, complex, sophisticated, entertaining, classic. Representing The Glenlivet's signature style, this classic malt is first matured in traditional oak, before spending time in American oak casks which impart notes of vanilla and gives the whisky its distinctive smoothness.

name: GLENLIVET - 12 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: This whisky has been called a lot of things in its time: smooth, fruity, complex, sophisticated, entertaining, classic. Representing The Glenlivet's signature style, this classic malt is first matured in traditional oak, before spending time in American oak casks which impart notes of vanilla and gives the whisky its distinctive smoothness.

name: GLENLIVET - 12 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: 92 Points & Best Buy, Wine Enthusiast - “Off-dry malted barley and light toffee smells greet the olfactory sense along with flowery fragrances of heather, rose petal and pine. Entry features sweet grain and candied apricot tastes; the midpalate is mellow, malty, fruity (white raisins, apricots) and sophisticated. Ends on a buttery note. Remains the Speyside benchmark.” (November 2008)

name: GLENLIVET - 15 YEAR OLD FRENCH OAK RESERVE
nameSanitized: glenlivet - 15 year old french oak reserve
sort: GLENLIVET - 15 YEAR OLD FRENCH OAK RESERVE
tastingDescription: 92 Points, Wine Enthusiast - “Don't dilute this light, gentle Scotch too much. Enjoy the honeyed, fresh tropical fruit aromas and mouthwatering vanilla and almond flavors with a hint of smoke and spice on the finish. Light body. Good value.” (December 2011)

name: GLENLIVET - 18 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: 93 Points, Wine Enthusiast - “Vibrant orange-amber color and a warm, citrusy scent. Expect lots of honey and caramel from the get-go, winding into an interestingly dry and lingering finish entwining leather, cocoa, coconut and ginger. Good value.” (December 2011)

name: GLENLIVET - 21 YEAR OLD ARCHIVE
tastingDescription: 98 Points, Wine Enthusiast - “Opening bouquet offers sedate fragrances of dried flowers and malted barley; aeration stimulates marginally bigger aromas of dried yellow fruit (baked banana), toasty oak barrel and still-vigorous spirit. Palate entry is succulent, honeyed and luscious; midpalate tastes of dates, figs, S'mores, cocoa butter, nougat and dark fudge. Finishes oily, buttery, honey-sweet and focused.” (December 2009)

name: GLENLIVET - 25 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: Rich, with notes of chewy sultanas and morello cherry; dried herbs and cooked fruits with apple crumble and a balanced acidity; creme de cacao. On the palate thick and smooth, with notes of sherried peels and sultanas; chewy toffee and walnut; dried fruits with a juicy touch. Long and rich with winter spice finish.

name: GLENLIVET - FOUNDER'S RESERVE
tastingDescription: 96 Points & Best Buy, Wine Enthusiast - “Delicate and complex, this newly released Scotch boasts scents of maple sugar and spice, and unfurls on the palate with a distinctly floral start that evolves into creamy vanilla, honey, sarsaparilla and baking spice. Light and silky, it almost feels effervescent on the tongue, finishing with a perky herbal note reminiscent of hops.” (December 2015)

name: GLENLIVET - FOUNDER'S RESERVE
tastingDescription: 96 Points & Best Buy, Wine Enthusiast - “Delicate and complex, this newly released Scotch boasts scents of maple sugar and spice, and unfurls on the palate with a distinctly floral start that evolves into creamy vanilla, honey, sarsaparilla and baking spice. Light and silky, it almost feels effervescent on the tongue, finishing with a perky herbal note reminiscent of hops.” (December 2015)

Light and silky, it almost feels effervescent on the tongue, finishing with a perky herbal note reminiscent of hops.” (December 2015)

name: GLENLIVET - FOUNDER'S RESERVE SCOTCH WHISKY
tastingDescription: 96 Points & Best Buy, Wine Enthusiast - Delicate and complex, this Scotch boasts scents of maple sugar and spice, and unfurls on the palate with a distinctly floral start that evolves into creamy vanilla, honey, sarsaparilla and baking spice. Light and silky, it almost feels effervescent on the tongue, finishing with a perky herbal note reminiscent of hops. (2015)

name: GLENLIVET PRIVATE COLLECTION 1954 - GORDON AND MACPHAIL
nameSanitized: glenlivet private collection 1954 - gordon and macphail
sort: GLENLIVET PRIVATE COLLECTION 1954 - GORDON AND MACPHAIL
tastingDescription: Brown sugar and toffee apple aromas with hints of fine herbs evolve into hard candy. Traces of aniseed and cinnamon add depth whilst thick fruit jam, lemon curd and vanilla notes linger. Aromatic fresh roasted coffee beans and orange zest linger on the finish. Distilled in 1954 and bottled in 2018, only 222 bottles produced. Cask #1412.

name: GLENLIVET PRIVATE COLLECTION 1974 - GORDON AND MACPHAIL
nameSanitized: glenlivet private collection 1974 - gordon and macphail
sort: GLENLIVET PRIVATE COLLECTION 1974 - GORDON AND MACPHAIL
tastingDescription: Intense green apple and ripe, juicy pear aromas are complemented by fresh jasmine. Notes of candied pineapple emerge followed by delightful citrus with undertones of vanilla. On the finish sweet strawberry licorice tones come to the fore alongside ripe banana and aged leather. Distilled in 1974 and bottled in 2019, only 71 bottles produced. Cask #18035.

name: GLENLIVET RARE VINTAGE 1946 - GORDON AND MACPHAIL
nameSanitized: glenlivet rare vintage 1946 - gordon and macphail
sort: GLENLIVET RARE VINTAGE 1946 - GORDON AND MACPHAIL
tastingDescription: The delicate nose of this medium-bodied ancient Speysider is a perfumed delight building into an enchanting vanilla spiciness. Smooth and mellow fruity flavours coat the palate and mingle with subtle herbal influences that culminate in a lightly smoky, lingering finish. Distilled in 1946 and bottled in 1992, only 317 bottles produced. Cask #8.

name: GLENMORANGIE - 10 YEAR OLD THE ORIGINAL
tastingDescription: Aromas of citrus and peaches along with vanilla. On the palate vanilla is detected among a burst of flowery fruitiness. The finish is clean with hints of orange and peach.

name: GLENMORANGIE - 12 YEAR OLD LASANTA SHERRY CASK FINISH
nameSanitized: glenmorangie - 12 year old lasanta sherry cask finish
nameSuffix: 12 YEAR OLD LASANTA SHERRY CASK FINISH
sort: GLENMORANGIE - 12 YEAR OLD LASANTA SHERRY CASK FINISH
tastingDescription: 93 Points, Wine Enthusiast - “Aged in Bourbon casks for 10 years, then “extra matured” for two years in Oloroso Sherry casks. The result is luxe and rich, a fine after-dinner sipper. Allow a little time for the aroma to emerge, and a splash of water for maximum flavor. The reward is a thick caramel aroma and flavor, with mouthwatering spicy notes of clove, cassia bark and a hint of orange peel.” (December 2011)

name: GLENMORANGIE - 14 YEAR OLD QUINTA RUBAN
tastingDescription: 92 Points, Whisky Advocate - "This Quinta Ruban succeeds the 12 year old version, adding two additional years of finishing in port casks, while maintaining the same bargain price. The result is a symphony of understated opulence. Marzipan, fresh apple and pear, milk chocolate, red berries, candied ginger, and praline on the nose build slowly, leading into a fruity, spiced palate. Flavors of soft gingerbread, molasses cake, cherry pie, spiced plums, almond nougat, and dark chocolate intermingle with faint strains of pipe tobacco. It sings on the finish, with a parting crescendo of hazelnut, spice, cigar wrapper, and lengthy oak" (November 2019)

name: GLENMORANGIE - 15 YEAR OLD THE CADBOLL ESTATE
nameSanitized: glenmorangie - 15 year old the cadboll estate
sort: GLENMORANGIE - 15 YEAR OLD THE CADBOLL ESTATE
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
"Glenmorangie has been growing its own barley for years, ... the first release produced entirely from its estate-grown grain. Honeysuckle and jasmine waft over lemon curd and shortbread on the nose, while bright aromas of blueberry and lime stand out. The palate is malty and full: shortbread with tumbling fresh blueberries, toasted almonds, and gingery spice. It's silky, rounded, and seamless into the finish, and beautifully transformed by a drop of water."
93 pts & #13 in the 2020 Top 20, Whisky Advocate 2020
1 Bottle limit.

name: GLENMORANGIE - 18 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: False

name: GLENMORANGIE - 18 YEAR OLD AZUMA MAKOTO EDITION
nameSanitized: glenmorangie - 18 year old azuma makoto edition
sort: GLENMORANGIE - 18 YEAR OLD AZUMA MAKOTO EDITION
tastingDescription: A master of the universal language of flowers, Azuma Makoto delighted in this radiant whisky's dancing floral notes. He explains, "It begins with rich, rounded aromas of dried fruits and honey, then unfurls into a bouquet of geranium, tuberose and jasmine. They dance on the tongue with honeysuckle and sweet pea, figs and nuts until the blossoms fade into a sweet and lingering finish." As Azuma Makoto translated the whisky's delicious bourbon cask softness and sweet, oloroso sherry cask hints, he drew on the beauty of almost 100 different blooms from across the world to create the design for the label.

name: GLENMORANGIE - DISCOVERY PACK
tastingDescription: False

name: GLENMORANGIE - GIFT PACK
tastingDescription: Aromas of citrus and peaches along with vanilla. On the palate vanilla is detected among a burst of flowery fruitiness. The finish is clean with hints of orange and peach.

name: GLENMORANGIE - GRAND VINTAGE 1997
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
Glenmorangie Grand Vintage Malt 1997 is vivacious and floral. With a heart aged in rare Château Montrose red wine casks from Saint-Estèphe in Bordeaux. Dr. Bill Lumsden, Director of Whisky Creation at Glenmorangie, says, "The Glenmorangie Grand Vintage 1997 is dramatically different: lively with aromas of red berries, seductive spice, melting marzipan and floral notes. Inspired by my dream of expressive single malts and in the spirit of the kaleidoscopic style of Glenmorangie."

name: GLENMORANGIE - NECTAR D'OR SAUTERNES CASK FINISH
nameSanitized: glenmorangie - nectar dor sauternes cask finish
sort: GLENMORANGIE - NECTAR D'OR SAUTERNES CASK FINISH
tastingDescription: 96 Points, Wine Enthusiast - “This 12-year-old single malt was finished in casks that previously held Sauternes, the golden sweet wine of Bordeaux. Smooth and elegant, look for a honey hue and notes of vanilla and lemon cream on the palate, finishing with baking spice and a puff of smoke. Adding water unleashes more creamy vanilla and citrus.” (December 2017)

name: GLENMORANGIE - PRIDE
tastingDescription: This is the rarest, oldest and deepest single malt that Glenmorangie has ever created. Nurtured in the finest casks for 41 years, the whisky's two parcels of spirit were brought together in inspired union for an expression of unparalleled harmony. Their inspired union brings forth a whisky with intensely rich depths, which speak of its long maturation. Balanced by a smoothness and finesse, this is a single malt beyond comparison.

name: GLENMORANGIE - X
tastingDescription:
Aged in ex-bourbon and new charred oak casks, X was crafted in partnership with mixologists to create a whisky of sweeter and richer taste. It is a vehicle for infinite flavour combinations and pairings, with its name lending itself to endless mashups. X by Glenmorangie is a spirit made for mixing.
1 Bottle Limit

name: GLENROTHES - 12 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription:
“This introduction to the Glenrothes distillery shows their elegant side, with a wonderfully dry expression that still evokes clover honey. Some old leather, cedar, and mace notes elevate this to a sipper, but it would make an elevated dry Rob Roy.”
95 Points – Ultimate Spirit Challenge 2019

name: GLENROTHES - 18 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
"Breakfast cereal, graham crackers, and butter baked fruit are refreshing aromas. Flavors of sea salt, caramel, coffee and cream are deep and continue to develop in the mouth. The dark toffee finish has a hint of smoke and leather."
98 pts, Extraordinary, Ultimate Recommendation, Ultimate Spirits Competition 2021
1 Bottle limit.

name: GLENROTHES - 25 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription:
"This statesman of whisky combines decadent flavors of honey coated plum and fresh brioche for an outstanding nose. The palate is completely harmonious and tastes of golden hay, wild flower, and vanilla scented stream water."
97 Points, Extraordinary, Ultimate Spirits Challenge 2018

name: GLENROTHES - BOURBON CASK RESERVE
tastingDescription: Classic vanilla and honey in this Scotch are joined by coconut, orange peel and a light, salty tang with oak spice on the finish.

name: GLENURY ROYAL 1984 -  GORDON AND MACPHAIL 25TH ANNIVERSARY
nameSanitized: glenury royal 1984 -  gordon and macphail 25th anniversary
sort: GLENURY ROYAL 1984 -  GORDON AND MACPHAIL 25TH ANNIVERSARY
tastingDescription: Stewed fruit aromas and soft notes of polish give way to cocoa powder. Cinnamon spice comes to the fore alongside tart plum skin, tracle and subtle traces of toaste oak. Sweet and drying with fresh cheerry and orange peelflavours. Burnt sugar and notes of

name: GOLDEN PEAR - HUNGARIA
tastingDescription: The beautiful sweet pear flavour works in perfect harmony with its delicate aromas and intense golden colour. Served chilled with a lovely pear dessert.

name: GOLDSCHLAGER - CINNAMON SCHNAPPS
tastingDescription: Based on the Goldwasser produced as far back as 1598 in Germany, this is a strong cinnamon-flavoured schnapps that is notable for containing flakes of real 24 karat gold. The flavour is reminiscent of red hot cinnamon candies, with a spicy burn on the finish. Best served ice cold in clear glasses to show off the pretty gold flakes.

name: GOLDSTREAM - WHISKY
tastingDescription: Made from 100% Canadian ingredients, aged three years in oak barrels, blended with our Goldstream Spring water and finished with toasted Brazilian cherry wood. You'll find hints of smoked cherry blended with the undeniable roots of this Canadian Whisky.

name: GOLDSTREAM VODKA
tastingDescription: With its gentle aroma, Goldstream Vodka is as light on the palette, as it is on the nose. This vodka is so exceptionally smooth, it stands straight on its own or hides well in mixed beverages.

name: GOLF LIQUOR - MASTER
tastingDescription: The Golf Liquor was crafted by distilling masters. It has integrated sports and fashion elements, and is tailored for golf lovers and elite entrepreneurs. There are four steps of enjoying it: viewing the colour, inhaling the aroma, tasting the flavor, and observing the overall character.

name: GOODERHAM AND WORTS 11 SOULS - CANADIAN WHISKY
nameSanitized: gooderham and worts 11 souls - canadian whisky
sort: GOODERHAM AND WORTS 11 SOULS - CANADIAN WHISKY
tastingDescription: Strength: 49% ABV. Colour: medium gold. Nose: vanilla, English toffee, orange blossom honey, and toasted almonds. Body: very complex mosaic. Palate: quick pear drops and green apple, sweet honey, dried fruits, peppery and baking spice, with subtle smoke. Finish: spicy, mouth-coating.

name: GORDON AND MACPHAIL - BENROMACH LIMITED EDITION 50YO
nameSanitized: gordon and macphail - benromach limited edition 50yo
sort: GORDON AND MACPHAIL - BENROMACH LIMITED EDITION 50YO
tastingDescription: After half a century maturing in a single ex-sherry hogshead, this 1969 vintage single malt from Benromach was bottled in June 2019. Savour sweet sherry aromas, the sweet luxury of prune syrup, stewed raisins, brown sugar and warm spices. Hints of butterscotch, ginger and candied orange peel appear before giving way to undertones of gentle smoke.

name: GORDON'S - PREMIUM PINK
tastingDescription: Berries are definitely on display here with strawberries and raspberries and juniper a distant third. Try it with a splash of tart lemonade for a quick and light cocktail.

name: GORDON'S - SICILIAN LEMON GIN
tastingDescription: A delicious Mediterranean twist on an original 1931 Gordon's recipe. The classic taste of Gordon's perfectly balanced with flavourful lemons from sun-soaked Sicily. Made with only natural flavour.

name: GORDONS - LONDON DRY
tastingDescription: Almost 250 years ago, Alexander Gordon started his distillery in London and set about creating the recipe for a brilliant tasting gin. Gordon's high quality and distinctive juniper flavour has come to define the taste of the classic Gin & Tonic.

name: GORDONS - LONDON DRY
tastingDescription: A carefully balanced blend of natural ingredients (juniper berries, rare herbs and spices, along with fresh citrus) during the final distillation creates Gordon’s distinct flavour – a crisp citrus taste with a full and fragrant aroma.

name: GORDONS - LONDON DRY
tastingDescription: Almost 250 years ago, Alexander Gordon started his distillery in London and set about creating the recipe for a brilliant tasting gin. Gordon's high quality and distinctive juniper flavour has come to define the taste of the classic Gin & Tonic.

name: GORDONS - LONDON DRY
tastingDescription: Almost 250 years ago, Alexander Gordon started his distillery in London and set about creating the recipe for a brilliant tasting gin. Gordon's high quality and distinctive juniper flavour has come to define the taste of the classic Gin & Tonic.

name: GOSLING'S - BLACK SEAL
tastingDescription: A most complex, unusual spirit with a rich, intricate flavour, well balanced and nuanced with butterscotch, vanilla and caramel.

name: GRAN CENTENARIO ANEJO
tastingDescription: Mexico's #1 tequila, Gran Centenario Anejo is aged in American white oak barrels for a minimum of 16 months. Renowned for the Seleccion Suave process, which blends the richest and smoothest tequilas to yield a complex yet smooth profile. Smooth and balanced with notes of toasted oak, chocolate, caramel and honeyed almonds.

name: GRAN CENTENARIO PLATA
tastingDescription: Mexico's #1 tequila, Gran Centenario� Plata is crafted using 100% blue agave tequila mellowed in French Limousin oak casks, creating an unusual smoothness for a Silver tequila. Balanced fruit-forward notes of pear, lime, and citrus with a hint of black pepper. Exceptionally smooth finish for a silver tequila.

name: GRAND MARNIER - 1880
tastingDescription: Grand Marnier 1880 contains 92% of XO Cognac from Grand Champagne. The flavours are characteristic notes from the old Cognacs, vanilla, dried  apricots and nuts with a delicate orange touch and a long aftertaste.

name: GRAND MARNIER - CORDON ROUGE
tastingDescription: Candied orange peel and a hint of bitter orange is met with vanilla, hazelnut and toffee in this classic French liqueur.

name: GRAND MARNIER - CORDON ROUGE
tastingDescription: Candied orange peel and a hint of bitter orange is met with vanilla, hazelnut and toffee in this classic French liqueur.

tastingDescription: Candied orange peel and a hint of bitter orange is met with vanilla, hazelnut and toffee in this classic French liqueur.

name: GRAND MARNIER - CORDON ROUGE
tastingDescription: Candied orange peel and a hint of bitter orange is met with vanilla, hazelnut and toffee in this classic French liqueur.

name: GRAND MARNIER - CUVEE LOUIS ALEXANDRE
tastingDescription: Created in honour of Louis-Alexandre Marnier Lapostolle, the inventor of Grand Marnier liqueur. This original recipe was inspired by one of his favourite rituals: adding an extra drop of cognac to his prestigious liqueur. It is an exclusive blend of fine old cognacs from the region's best production areas with essence of wild, exotic oranges. An intense and less sweet taste, for a contemporary experience.

name: GRAND MARNIER - CUVEE REVELATION
tastingDescription: False

name: GRAND MAYAN - ULTRA AGED
tastingDescription: This extra añejo tequila is aged over 4 years in oak offering a dark, mahogany spirit, rich with notes of hazelnuts, salted caramel, and cacao followed by a long, dry Cognac-like finish.

name: GRANT'S - SHERRY CASK 8 YO
tastingDescription: Our Sherry Cask Finish spends 8 years ageing in oak barrels, followed by a maturation period in Oloroso Sherry casks. On the nose, green apple and soft vanilla. The taste is oaky vanilla with malty notes, dried fruits and woody spices. The finish is sweet with a hint of spice.

name: GRANT'S - TRIPLE WOOD
tastingDescription: Family owned since 1887, patiently crafted to a rich, smooth complex style with palate that balances vanilla sweetness with malty, light floral flavours, and a long sweet finish of peat and smoke.

name: GRANT'S - TRIPLE WOOD
tastingDescription: Family owned since 1887, patiently crafted to a rich, smooth complex style with palate that balances vanilla sweetness with malty, light floral flavours, and a long sweet finish of peat and smoke.

name: GRAPPA - BOTTEGA ALEXANDER
tastingDescription: With a clean, elegant mouth feel and a flavour profile dominated by fresh white grape notes and a hint of flowers, this grappa makes for a refreshing digestif or cocktail ingredient.

name: GRAPPA - LUXARDO EUGANEA
tastingDescription: Grappa is a Northern ltalian distilled spirit obtained from the "vinacce" or grape's stem. Luxardo Grappa uses Merlot, Cabernet Sauvignon and Cabernet Franc grown in the Euganean Hills to achieve its floral, subtly citric flavour profile. Enjoy it chilled.

name: GRAPPA DI MOSCATO - MASCHIO BENIAMINO
tastingDescription: Clear water white in colour. Intense floral notes from the moscato combine with grappa's characteristic herbal/anise scents. Aromas carry through on the intense, full-texture unctuous palate. Pairs well with Panzanella Insalata.

name: GRAPPA SARPA DI POLI - DISTILLERIE POLI

sort: GRAPPA SARPA DI POLI - DISTILLERIE POLI
tastingDescription: False

name: GRAY JAY DELUXE - CANADIAN WHISKY
tastingDescription: A Deluxe Canadian Whisky as unpretentious as the bottle in which it comes. Balanced taste, with character notes of vanilla and caramel. Has been designed to welcome newcomers to the category. Experienced whisky drinkers will appreciate the well-rounded character and versatility, which it perfect for craft and classic cocktails.

name: GREAT PLAINS - 18 YEAR EXTRA SPECIAL CASK FINISH
nameSanitized: great plains - 18 year extra special cask finish
sort: GREAT PLAINS - 18 YEAR EXTRA SPECIAL CASK FINISH
tastingDescription:
Handcrafted in limited quantities, from superb legacy whisky from the old Potter's distillery in Kelowna B.C. Then custom finished in select vintage Brandy de Jerez casks. Bottled at high proof 54.5% ABV without colouring or chill filtering to yield a taste and character unlike anything else on the market. Full-bodied with port, wood, tobacco, and concentrated dried fruit notes. Very long and sweet finish.
Award of Excellence Best New Whisky Gold Award, Canadian Whisky Awards 2020

name: GREY GOOSE
tastingDescription: Expressed in every bottle of Grey Goose Vodka is the essence of the finest ingredients from France; soft winter wheat from in and around Picardy plus pure spring water from Gensac in the Cognac region. Nose: Clear, fresh with an elegant floral aroma accented by a subtle citrus note. Palate: Initially soft with a gentle sweetness that gradually envelops the mouth-smooth and rounded texture with a hint of almond. Finish: Fresh and bright throughout with a long, satisfying finish.

name: GREY GOOSE - LE CITRON
tastingDescription: Lemons grown in the renowned Menton region of France are concentrated into a complex citrus extract and blended with Grey Goose vodka to create this crystal clear elixir. Expect aromas of lemon zest, lemon candy and a smooth-balanced palate with creamy lemon meringue and citrus candy flavours.

name: GREY GOOSE TWIST AND REVEAL
tastingDescription: Your favourite Grey Goose is dressed in a decorative package that reveals hidden messages to suit any occasion.

name: GUANGDONG MI JIU
tastingDescription: Rich and pure rice fragrance, this is the famous Chinese rice spirit. Smooth and elegant with a slightly sweet taste, served chilled or at room tempreture.

name: GUJINGGONG-YUANJIANG - ANHUI GUJING DISTILLERY
tastingDescription: Manufactured with aged spirit of minimum 5 years, it has a thick, smooth and elegant texture. Followed by a sweet aftertaste, you will get a spicy finish with strong fragrance of grains.

name: GUOTAI LIQUOR - 15 YEAR
tastingDescription: This premium sauce-aroma Chinese Baijiu from Moutai Town is blended with the 15-year aged base liquors and stored at least 1800 days before bottling. It has an extremely complex and rich taste with floral and sauce flavors.

name: GUY LAFLEUR - GIN
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
Peppery and spicy, this Quebec gin with the Spicy taste tag unveils fragrances of juniper berry along with delicate notes of flowers and citrus. The perfect teammate come aperitif time or when the night goes into overtime!

name: GUY LAFLEUR - GIN SIGNATURE
tastingDescription: Peppery and spicy, this Quebec gin with the Spicy taste tag unveils fragrances of juniper berry along with delicate notes of flowers and citrus. The perfect teammate come aperitif time or when the night goes into overtime! Signed by Gyuy LaFleur himself.

name: HAKU - VODKA
tastingDescription: Haku, which means “white” in Japanese, is made with 100% Japanese white rice and is created using a distinct 3-step distilling process. The resulting liquid’s taste profile is clean, soft, and smooth with a sweet rice flavor.

name: HAPPII
tastingDescription: Smooth, with fruity aromas and a slightly sweet taste.

name: HAVANA CLUB - 3 YEAR OLD ANEJO
tastingDescription: "A very pleasant palate, with smoky, vanilla and chocolate notes. Havana Club 3 year old  is the ideal ingredient for all premium cocktails, such as the Cuban Daiquiri."-  Adele Shaw, Category Manager for Spirits & Sake

name: HAVANA CLUB - 7 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: Look for brown sugar, vanilla, cedar, tobacco leaf and some tropical fruit on the finish in this rich Cuban rum that is bursting with flavour

name: HAVANA CLUB - ANEJO RESERVA
tastingDescription: Integrated aromas of pear and light tobacco introduce a more robust bouquet from wooden and natural ageing. Havana Club Añejo Reserva is a strongly flavoured rum offering complex, lasting aromas of cacao, coffee, tobacco and spices. It is characterised by an exceptional roundness and smoothness.

name: HAVANA CLUB - ANEJO RESERVA
tastingDescription: Integrated aromas of pear and light tobacco introduce a more robust bouquet from wooden and natural ageing. Havana Club Añejo Reserva is a strongly flavoured rum offering complex, lasting aromas of cacao, coffee, tobacco and spices. It is characterised by an exceptional roundness and smoothness.

name: HAVANA CLUB - CUBAN SMOKY
tastingDescription: False

name: HAYMAN'S - SLOE GIN
tastingDescription: Hayman’s Sloe Gin has intense plummy aromas, hints of almond nuttiness, and delicious fruity flavours that all come together in perfect balance. You’ll be left charmed by the complex finish and a delightful warmth that stays with you. The sloe berries are steeped with Hayman's Gin carefully for several months before blending with natural sugars. Always by hand, of course.

name: HEAVEN'S DOOR - TENNESSEE BOURBON
tastingDescription:
“Aromas of spiced wheat dried apricot and rose petals, jump from the glass. Cardamom and coriander are abundant in the mouth, with light caramel and hints of vanilla. The texture is clean and soft with and leaves the mouth refreshed.”
96 Points, Extraordinary – Ultimate Spirit Challenge 2018

name: HEAVEN'S DOOR - THE BOOTLEG SERIES
tastingDescription:
"Exotic, yet soft aromas of coconut, pink peppercorn, dried mango, and orange blossom honey. Exceptionally smooth and bright on the palate, which belies its 26 year old age statement; nectarine and red plum are followed by walnut and brown sugar. A triumphant whisky, indeed."
96 pts, Extraordinary, Ultimate Recommendation, Ultimate Spirits Competition 2020
1 Bottle limit.

name: HENDRICK'S - LUNAR GIN
tastingDescription: Hendrick's Lunar is a delightfully smooth and alluring gin that offers a delicate balance of gentle spice, subtle floral notes with a soft citrus finish.

name: HENDRICK'S GIN
tastingDescription: "Produced in Scotland, Hendricks is a premium gin that has a unique infusion of rose petals and cucumber added to enhance the traditional gin flavours of Juniper and citrus. This is an elegant gin that has a silky smooth finish and beautiful fresh aromas." - Adele Shaw, Category Manager for Spirits & Sake

name: HENDRICK'S GIN
tastingDescription: "Produced in Scotland, Hendricks is a premium gin that has a unique infusion of rose petals and cucumber added to enhance the traditional gin flavours of Juniper and citrus. This is an elegant gin that has a silky smooth finish and beautiful fresh aromas." - Adele Shaw, Category Manager for Spirits & Sake

name: HENNESSY - MASTER BLENDER'S SELECTION NO.3
tastingDescription: False

name: HENNESSY - PARADIS IMPERIAL
tastingDescription: The unprecedented alliance of age and finesse, Paradis Impérial is a Cognac of magisterial complexity, balance, and the finest texture, continually revealing new tones of expression and delicate floral essences on the palate.

name: HENNESSY - PARADIS RARE
tastingDescription: The Paradis Rare made from several hundred eaux-de-vie aged 25-130 years and on the decadence scale is like crème brûlée made with foie gras. It is lavishly creamy, with a floral-citrus fragrance and slowly unfolding layers of caramelized sugar, chocolate, orange, banana and spice cake.

name: HENNESSY - V.S.O.P.
tastingDescription: The world’s first, and favorite V.S.O.P Cognac blends over 60 eaux-de-vie to achieve perfect harmony – a testament to the enduring expertise of the Hennessy Master Blenders. A natural balance of strength and smoothness with a long-lasting finish.

name: HENNESSY - VERY SPECIAL
tastingDescription: The world's most popular cognac, Hennessy V.S is the modern-day equivalent of the original Hennessy 3-Star. It is an expression of expertise and consistency, centuries in the making. Intense character and full-bodied flavours, V.S reveals its liveliness whether enjoyed neat, on ice, or with a mixer.

name: HENNESSY - VERY SPECIAL
tastingDescription: This is the same rich and full-bodied Very Special cognac from Hennessy now available in celebration size

name: HENNESSY - VERY SPECIAL
tastingDescription: The world's most popular cognac, Hennessy VS is the modern-day equivalent of the original Hennessy 3-Star. It is an expression of expertise and consistency, centuries in the making. Intense character and full-bodied flavours, VS reveals its liveliness whether enjoyed neat, on ice, or with a mixer.

name: HENNESSY - VERY SPECIAL LES TWINS
tastingDescription: False

name: HENNESSY - X.O. THE ORIGINAL
tastingDescription: A full sensation of power with a hint of cocoa and a warm fruity finish expressing the complexity of the Cognac blending and its long aging process. Intense and deep amber colour, aromas of candied fruit and light spice notes with smooth, full flavours, a warm fruity presence and tremendous length.

name: HENNESSY - XO
tastingDescription: A full sensation of power with a hint of cocoa and a warm fruity finish expressing the complexity of the Cognac blending and its long aging process. Intense and deep amber colour, aromas of candied fruit and light spice notes with smooth, full flavours, a warm fruity presence and tremendous length.

name: HERRADURA - REPOSADO
tastingDescription: 92 Points, Wine Enthusiast - “The perky aroma suggests vanilla and citrus, for a lemon cream pie-like effect. The palate starts out with vanilla, coconut and waxy honey, and is perked up by citrusy acidity and hints of lemon peel in the finish.” (May 2018)

name: HEY Y'ALL BREWED BLACK TEA VODKA
nameSanitized: hey yall brewed black tea vodka
nameSuffix: HEY Y'ALL BREWED BLACK TEA VODKA
sort: HEY Y'ALL BREWED BLACK TEA VODKA
tastingDescription: BC’s best selling hard iced tea is now giving distilled spirits lovers a hard bar, 70 proof, Hey Y’all experience! Serve straight up or over ice with a dash of chilled water for a sure refresher.

name: HIGHLAND PARK - 12 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription:
The heart and soul of Highland Park, Viking Honour is a perfect harmony of aromatic smoky peat, sweet heather honey and rich fruit cake.
96 Points - 2019 Ultimate Spirits Challenge

name: HIGHLAND PARK - 15 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: The Highland Park 15-Year-Old is created from casks hand-selected by their Master Whisky Maker, Gordon Motion. The colour is light and golden, with aromas of charred cinnamon shards, gentle heathered peat and warm vanilla. On the finish, experience the rich and complex notes of gentle aromatic peat smoke and light fruity character.

name: HIGHLAND PARK - 18 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription:
A perfect expression of harmony, complexity and refinement, Viking Pride combines honey sweetness with delicious hints of cherries wrapped in chocolate, and subtle top notes of aromatic peat smoke.
97 Points - 2019 Ultimate Spirits Challenge

name: HIGHLAND PARK - 21 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription:
"Leather and smoke are warm and inviting aromas. The mouthfeel is rich and weighty, yet supple, intertwined with flavors of honeyed grains that deepen into coffee, toasted cacao, and crunchy brown butter crackers. The finish is nicely charred with dark wood aromas lingering."
96 pts, Extraordinary, Ultimate Recommendation, Ultimate Spirits Competition 2021
1 Bottle limit.

name: HIGHLAND PARK - 25 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: Natural cask-driven colour: Gold with warm hints of copper. Dark chocolate, fudge, heather honey, nutty toffee and ried fruits flavours.

name: HIGHLAND PARK - 30 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription:
Highland Park Master Whisky Maker, Gordon Motion, took the unusual step of bringing together three different cask types for this release. For sweet notes of vanilla and honey with hints of sharp citrus, he selected first-fill ex-bourbon casks; to add rich layers of stewed fruit and warm spice flavours, first-fill sherry seasoned casks were selected; and finally, a small but vital number of refill casks were called in to round off the harmony of flavours.
Gold, Luxury Spirits Masters 2020
1 Bottle limit.

name: HIGHLAND PARK - 40 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription:
Rich and beautifully balanced, deep and aromatic, and infused with a delicate sweetness, this truly exceptional whisky is the product of just 5 refill casks originally laid down before 1979. These casks were brought together in 2008 and filled into first-fill sherry seasoned American oak casks to intensify the flavour over a further 10 years of maturation.  The refill casks that originally held this whisky are ideal for a long, slow maturation imparting an oaky flavour which doesn't dominate, while the first-fill sherry seasoned casks in which the whisky completed its maturation, bring a depth of character and nutty, fruit-filled notes of sherry to the flavour.
Gold, Luxury Spirits Masters 2020
1 Bottle limit.

name: HIGHLAND PARK - FIRE
tastingDescription: 94 Points, Ultimate Spirits Challenge 2017 - “The long slumber in refill port casks has imparted this whiskey with dark chocolate and baked plum. The palate shows even more influence with a silky mouthfeel and hints of salt and smoke that bely the malt’s Orkney origins.”

name: HIGHLAND PARK - MAGNUS
tastingDescription:
A whisky crafted in the old way by a new generation of Vikings, Magnus bears the soul of Viking ancestors and the name of just one – Highland Park founder, Magnus Eunson. Unapologetically bold, smoky and undeniably Orcadian, this single malt has its own distinct character.
Gold Medal - 2019 San Francisco World Spirits Competition

name: HIGHLAND PARK - ORCADIAN 1968
tastingDescription:
A delightfully rich, naturally golden hue with remarkable clarity and brightness. At full strength, the 1968 Vintage is reminiscent of thick, opaque honey but with attractive notes of lemongrass, sandalwood and a variety of aromatic spices. This expression of Highland Park has a delicious complexity; the citrus evident on the nose develops into dried orange peel whereas the wood shavings transform into toasted oak. A lasting impression of rich spiciness is the legacy of a single malt that is extremely long and surprisingly sweet.
1 Bottle limit.

name: HIGHLAND PARK - ORCADIAN 1976
tastingDescription:
A combination of 13 butt and hogshead refill casks, hand-selected by Highland Park's longest standing Whisky Maker, Max McFarlane for their outstanding character, yielded just 893 bottles. With an intriguingly light and fruity flavour profile, this vintage enlivens the senses with dashes of melon and smooths things over with a beautifully balanced pairing of sweet heather honey and aromatic peat smoke.
1 Bottle limit.

name: HIGHLAND PARK - VALFATHER
tastingDescription: The Third and final installment in the highly anticipated Viking Legend Series. Valfather is an intensely balanced whisky with long floral smoke perfectly offset by notes of fresh fruit.

name: HIGHLAND PARK VALKNUT
tastingDescription: The second highly anticipated edition in the three-part viking legend series, Valknut is matured predominately in sherry season Amberican oak casks. Crafted with a higher percentage of peat than Valkyrie and expertly balanced with enhanced sweet notes.

name: HOMBO SHUZO - MARS SHINSHU IWAI WHISKY
nameSanitized: hombo shuzo - mars shinshu iwai whisky
sort: HOMBO SHUZO - MARS SHINSHU IWAI WHISKY
tastingDescription: This whisky is inspired by the great whiskies of America. A majority of corn, balanced with light malt and aged in ex-bourbon barrels. Sweet with fruit flavours of pear, quince and hints of red fruits and vanilla.

name: HONG XING ER GOU TOU - 8 YEARS
nameSanitized: hong xing er gou tou - 8 years
sort: HONG XING ER GOU TOU - 8 YEARS
tastingDescription: Er Guo Tou Jiu translates to "second distillation" and is a baijiu made from sorghum that takes six months to produce. This particular brand, Red Star, is one of the most popular in the world.

name: HORNITOS BLACK BARREL
tastingDescription: Bright citrus and agave notes combine with oak spice, vanilla and caramel in this tequila that has pepper and agave syrup in a clean finish. Try in a kicked-up margarita

name: HORNITOS CRISTALINO
tastingDescription: Triple-distilled for a smooth liquid which is rested in American white oak barrels for at least 12 months. A charcoal filtration process gently extracts the color and rounds the oak flavor, uncovering bright and herbal agave notes, while still maintaining the warmer, sweeter notes from the Anejo.

name: HORNITOS PLATA
tastingDescription: The aroma is herbs, fresh cut grass, citrus and pear. The taste is intense fresh agave, with herbal and red chili pepper undertones. The finish is warm and drying with a medium body but a short smooth finish. Make a margarita with Hornitos Plata.

name: HORNITOS PLATA
tastingDescription: The aroma is herbs, fresh cut grass, citrus and pear. The taste is intense fresh agave, with herbal and red chili pepper undertones. The finish is warm and drying with a medium body but a short smooth finish. Make a margarita with Hornitos Plata.

name: HORNITOS REPOSADO
tastingDescription: Sauza Hornitos Reposado has a fresh aroma of fruit and wood that leads to complex yet perky flavours of sweet pear and spice, with a warm, oaky finish. Reposado's smooth and mature sophistication makes it perfect for drinking straight, and limitless mixing possibilities. Made from 100% fresh blue agave.

name: HOWLER HEAD - WHISKEY
tastingDescription: Howler Head is blended with the finest Kentucky straight bourbon whiskey. You've got a kick of oak, a whirl of sweetness and some straightfrom- the-jungle Bananarama awesomeness.

name: HPNOTIQ
tastingDescription: Since stepping onto the scene in 2001, Hypnotiq broke the mold with their eye-catching turquoise blue colour and premium blend of exotic fruit juices, French vodka & a touch of Cognac.

name: HUDSON - BRIGHT LIGHTS BIG BOURBON
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
Smoothly integrated and flamboyant wood nose, with an abundance of stone fruits, nutty ripeness and drying elements. Sweet citrus peel and candied ginger, heat intensity and a rounded brisk finish.

name: HYDE - 1922 SINGLE MALT RUM FINISH IRISH WHISKEY
nameSanitized: hyde - 1922 single malt rum finish irish whiskey
nameSuffix: 1922 SINGLE MALT RUM FINISH IRISH WHISKEY
sort: HYDE - 1922 SINGLE MALT RUM FINISH IRISH WHISKEY
tastingDescription:
"I've yet to taste any Hyde whiskey that I haven't loved, and this may be their best yet. A wave of soft, sweet caramel and toffee, light vanilla, fresh apricot, zesty citrus, rum notes, and an agreeable mix of aromatic spices. Buttery soft mouthfeel with butterscotch sweetness, banana custard, vanilla, and gentle spices. Very approachable and dessert-like, the spices becoming slightly more assertive than the sweetness on the finish."
92 Points, Whisky Advocate 2018

name: ICEBERG
tastingDescription: Iceberg is Canada’s vodka. Crafted and blended with 20,000 year old icebergs, the purest water source on the planet. This classic vodka is exceptionally smooth, comprised of light notes of sweetness and complete with a clean and crisp finish.

name: ICHIRO'S MALT - CHICHIBU 2015 THE PEATED
tastingDescription:
In its manner of taking center stage or, on the contrary, of blending into each of the notes of the aromatic palette, the peat of this peated Chichibu is a mixture of modernity of expression and academic beauty. It shows a classicism that plunges us several decades back. From this sublime paradox is born a timeless single malt produced with genius by the founder of the distillery: Ichiro Akuto.
92 pts, Distiller.com
1 Bottle limit.

name: ICHIRO'S MALT - CHICHIBU CHIBIDARU SINGLE CASK 2013
nameSanitized: ichiros malt - chichibu chibidaru single cask 2013
sort: ICHIRO'S MALT - CHICHIBU CHIBIDARU SINGLE CASK 2013
tastingDescription:
The floral fragrance coming off the glass perfectly illustrates the iconic Chichibu – An easy, genuine and complex single malt. With years passing by each expression is a contribution to the master distiller Ichiro Akuto's remarkable work. An aromatic bouquet of flowers, fresh fruits and beeswax present itself, with malted barley, bourbon vanilla, candied citrus fruits and coconut making up the taste profile. This continues on towards honey and butter mixed in with cereal oats on the finish.
1 Bottle limit.

name: ICHIRO'S MALT - CHICHIBU CHIBIDARU SINGLE CASK 2014
nameSanitized: ichiros malt - chichibu chibidaru single cask 2014
sort: ICHIRO'S MALT - CHICHIBU CHIBIDARU SINGLE CASK 2014
tastingDescription:
Each new opus of Chichibu is the brainchild of its creator and genius master blender, Ichiro Akuto. This eagerly awaited whisky marks one more chapter of Chichibu history with the release of this new Chibidaru, the Japanese equivalent of the "quarter cask". Opens with a bombardment of fresh fruits and vegetal notes, Williams pear, peaches, currants and raspberries, then evolves into exotic dried fruits. These fruits come to the fore on the palate as citrus, cereal, white oak and malted barley emerge to complement. The evolution continues into hazelnuts and walnuts in their fresh state while the creamy sweetness persists with rich dried fruits and minty freshness towards the finish of this unforgettable journey.
1 Bottle limit.

name: ICHIRO'S MALT - CHICHIBU NOD 10TH ANNIVERSARY SINGLE CASK 20
nameSanitized: ichiros malt - chichibu nod 10th anniversary single cask 20
sort: ICHIRO'S MALT - CHICHIBU NOD 10TH ANNIVERSARY SINGLE CASK 20
tastingDescription:
Chichibu distillery is a small distillery with only nine full-time employees, it is owned by Venture whisky which was founded in 2004 in Chichibu city, Saitama just outside of Tokyo. This special cask was bottled to celebrate the 10 year anniversary of the Number One Drinks Company, a company that has brought Japanese whisky to light when the world was closed to it. Specially selected and created by Ichiro Akuto, this cask has all the hallmarks of genius that come from this remarkable master blender. This Chichibu single cask was matured in Bourbon cask number 635. Distilled in 2009 and bottled in 2016 at 62.1% ABV.
1 Bottle limit.

name: ICHIRO'S MALT - CHICHIBU ON THE WAY 2013
nameSanitized: ichiros malt - chichibu on the way 2013
sort: ICHIRO'S MALT - CHICHIBU ON THE WAY 2013
tastingDescription:
"Caramel topped flower blossom aromas come first, followed by fresh melon and oak. The palate gives way to canned peaches and pears, as wood spices and pepper notes join in. A hint of mint is detected for a moment, before the spices sweeten and escalate, leading to a long, warm finish. On the way, but with this, you've arrived!"
92 pts, Distiller.com
1 Bottle limit.

name: ICHIRO'S MALT - CHICHIBU ON THE WAY 2015
nameSanitized: ichiros malt - chichibu on the way 2015
sort: ICHIRO'S MALT - CHICHIBU ON THE WAY 2015
tastingDescription:
A blend of 41 casks, Chichibu "On the Way" is matured in a multitude of different barrels including Mizunara oak.  This whisky initiates our journey with aromas of dried orange peel, spices, cotton candy caramel and malty notes. As we liquid touches our palate, fresh apples and pears coat the tongue, then raisins and vanilla oak are prevalent, which then graduate into cooking spices, leather and a touch of smoke on the malty finish on the way to greatness.
1 Bottle limit.

name: ICHIRO'S MALT - HANYU 15 YEAR OLD THE FINAL VINTAGE
nameSanitized: ichiros malt - hanyu 15 year old the final vintage
nameSuffix: HANYU 15 YEAR OLD THE FINAL VINTAGE
sort: ICHIRO'S MALT - HANYU 15 YEAR OLD THE FINAL VINTAGE
tastingDescription:
Distilled in the final year of production at the Hanyu distillery, this Japanese single malt was matured 15 years in various casks including Cognac, Puncheon, Bourbon Barrel, Hogshead and Port Pipe. The nose has an intriguing mix of sweet apples and pears with an earthiness that flows along with vanilla oak, maple syrup and orange citrus. The palate is complex with dark chocolate, blood orange and morello cherries mixing with aniseed and oily menthol, ending with light oak.
1 Bottle limit.

name: IMPERIAL COLLECTION - SUPER PREMIUM VODKA
tastingDescription: Super premium Russian vodka. Distilled 5 times and filtered 12 times. Bottled in Murano Glass Carafe and decorated with 24 carat gold and Swarowski crystals. Ultra smooth and velvet texture. Most premium vodka in the market.

name: IMPERIAL- 25 YEAR OLD SINGLE CASK LMDW ARTIST SERIES 10
nameSanitized: imperial- 25 year old single cask lmdw artist series 10
nameSuffix: 25 YEAR OLD SINGLE CASK LMDW ARTIST SERIES 10
sort: IMPERIAL- 25 YEAR OLD SINGLE CASK LMDW ARTIST SERIES 10
tastingDescription:
Very pure, this Imperial presents impressive aromatics of juicy apple, beeswax, camphor and tropical fruit, a precise flavour profile of chocolate, spice and quince jelly, and a finish lingering with cardamom, lily of the valley and semolina cake. Possessing a magnetic charm and vibrant radiance, it travels with an imperial allure along the paths of the region where it was born: the Speyside. 
1 Bottle limit.

name: INCHGOWER - 27 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription:
“Inchgower makes its debut in the Special Releases range with this veteran bottling that was matured in refill American oak. The nose offers a whiff of soy sauce, honey, and blotting paper. Salty and spicy on the palate, with green apple, walnut, and cloves. Jaffa orange and black pepper in the long finish”
– Gavin Smith, 2018

name: INDOGGO - GIN
tastingDescription: Developed by hip hop legend and the King of "Gin and Juice", Snoop Dogg, Indoggo Gin is made with seven botanicals and infused with a strawberry flavour. Enjoy it with pineapple juice and soda water.

name: INTENSE BUTTERSCOTCH - DR. MCGILLICUDDY'S
tastingDescription: Pale amber in colour; intense aromas and flavours of sweet butterscotch and caramel with a nice long finish.

name: INVERGORDON - 18 YEAR OLD OLD PARTICULAR DOUGLAS LAING
nameSanitized: invergordon - 18 year old old particular douglas laing

tastingDescription: Available starting November 13th in select stores

name: ISLE OF HARRIS - GIN
tastingDescription: This award-winning Scottish gin leads with aromas of juniper followed by fresh citrus, green herbs and spice.  Refreshing on the palate, locally harvested sugar kelp delivers subtle maritime notes well-balanced by juniper, sweet citrus and green herbs.  A long, clean finish ends with peppery notes and hints of the sea.

name: ISLE OF JURA - SEVEN WOOD
tastingDescription: Beginning medium gold with glints of amber in the glass. The nose reveals notes of toffee, cinnamon, buckwheat honey and oak toast. The whisky's entry is forceful with notes of cinnamon stick and earth dominating. The finish is penetrating and slightly hot with lingering spice notes. A dynamic single malt.

name: J AND B RARE
tastingDescription: A highly distinctive blend. 42 individual malt and grain scotch whiskies combine to create the subtle yet rich and complex flavour of J & B Rare.

name: J AND B RARE
tastingDescription: A highly distinctive blend. 42 individual malt and grain scotch whiskies combine to create the subtle yet rich and complex flavour of J & B Rare.

name: J. P. WISER'S DELUXE
tastingDescription: J.P. Wiser’s Deluxe is a full-flavoured Canadian whisky which offers a rich aroma with a body that is complex and perfectly balanced. Bright golden in colour with a sweet caramel aroma, and a sweet corn meal and vanilla flavour.

name: J. P. WISER'S DELUXE
tastingDescription: J.P. Wisers Deluxe is a full-flavoured Canadian whisky which offers a rich aroma with a body that is complex and perfectly balanced. Bright golden in colour with a sweet caramel aroma, and a sweet corn meal and vanilla flavour.

name: J. P. WISER'S DELUXE
tastingDescription: J.P. Wiser’s Deluxe is a full-flavoured Canadian whisky which offers a rich aroma with a body that is complex and perfectly balanced. Bright golden in colour with a sweet caramel aroma, and a sweet corn meal and vanilla flavour.

name: J. P. WISER'S DELUXE
tastingDescription: J.P. Wiser’s Deluxe is a full-flavoured Canadian whisky which offers a rich aroma with a body that is complex and perfectly balanced. Bright golden in colour with a sweet caramel aroma, and a sweet corn meal and vanilla flavour.

name: J.P. WISER'S - 15 YR OLD
tastingDescription: This distinctive blend has benefited from ageing; with typical banana and caramel notes balanced by the oak-influenced sweet spices reminiscent of nutmeg and cinnamon. Round and creamy it reveals citrus and cherry with time. Long and enduring with layers of dried fruit and chocolate rounding out this memorable whisky.

name: J.P. WISER'S - OLD FASHIONED CANADIAN WHISKY COCKTAIL
nameSanitized: j.p. wisers - old fashioned canadian whisky cocktail
sort: J.P. WISER'S - OLD FASHIONED CANADIAN WHISKY COCKTAIL
tastingDescription: Nose: Initial aroma of shaved orange rinds followed by cinnamon, nutmeg and rye spice. Taste: Pleasant warming rye whisky with notes of orange followed with rye bread and hints of clove and black licorice. Finish: Lingering baking spices.

name: J.P. WISER'S - WHISKY BLENDING KIT
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
EACH KIT INCLUDES:  5 different whiskies for consumers to experiments, blend and create their own whisky to enjoy at home: 1 x 5 yr old double distilled, light smooth whisky, 1 Single Column Distilled rye whisky, 1 Double distilled Wine Barrel whisky, 1 Double distilled smoky whisky, 1 Double distilled Spice whisky, 1 x 375 ml empty bottle (to fill), 1 graduated cylinder + pipette, 1 Dr. Don's Master Blending guide.

name: J.P. WISER'S 18 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: J.P. Wiser’s whiskies are known for being blended with exacting care and aged to perfection. J.P. Wiser’s 18 Year Old is a unique single grain whisky that evokes a dominant note of green apple from being aged in the fluctuating temperatures of Southern Ontario and Lake Ontario. The pensive aging in white oak casks and careful blending in small batches delivers a matured Canadian whisky with an incredibly smooth finish, emphasizing notes of vanilla and caramel. Best Canadian Blended Age Statement Whisky, World Whisky Awards 2016

name: J.P. WISER'S RARE CASK SERIES SEVEN REBELS - CANADIAN WHISKY
namePrefix: J.P. WISER'S RARE CASK SERIES SEVEN REBELS
nameSanitized: j.p. wisers rare cask series seven rebels - canadian whisky
sort: J.P. WISER'S RARE CASK SERIES SEVEN REBELS - CANADIAN WHISKY
tastingDescription: This whisky was created in collaboration with and exclusively for BC Liquor Stores. This unapologetically bold blend pays tribute to the tradition of innovation in Canadian whisky and the Canadian whisky pioneers, which defined it from the beginning. This remarkable blend of 7 different distillates introduces smoke and spices. Finished in virgin oak and Speyside casks, with notes of wood embers, toasted malts, vanilla, clove, cinnamon, and spice.

name: J.P. WISERS - APPLE WHISKY
tastingDescription: J.P. Wiser's flavoured whiskies are crafted from natural ingredients to create a smooth taste without any artificial sweetneres or fake flavours. Apple flavor occurs naturally within whisky, making it easy for J.P. Wiser's to create something that celebrates the character of whisky in a delicious way.

tastingDescription: Up front, it is light and smooth with plenty of sweetness. Hints of dry spice and oily nuts, with a touch of smoke. Smooth and soft with notes of banana milkshake, a mixed nut note, a touch of caramel. The finish provides toasty oak and a little bit of cereal sweetness.

tastingDescription: Jack Daniel's Old No. 7 Tennessee Whiskey is revered internationally as a classic American icon, crafted in Lynchburg, Tennessee at America's oldest registered distillery. Maturation in new, toasted and charred barrels provides a rich, amber coloured whiskey with a distinctive flavor, packaged in the familiar square bottle with the black and white label. Jack Daniel's has a smooth aroma and flavor of vanilla, toasted oak and caramel which translates well to the palate.

name: JACK DANIEL'S - SINATRA SELECT
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
"This classic bold, smooth whiskey is crafted to honour Frank Sinatra's friendship with Jack Daniels. Deep amber in colour, spiced, elegant and crisply multilayered, this is defined like each note in a Sinatra song: paced, spaced with unforgettable character. It's classic, demanding in its precision so that it keeps you awake while it seduces you. Strong (45% alcohol), distinct with an element of mystery, this is a JD to make Sinatra proud."
95 pts, WineAlign.com

name: JACK DANIEL'S - SINGLE BARREL LIMITED EDITION NO. 1
nameSanitized: jack daniels - single barrel limited edition no. 1
sort: JACK DANIEL'S - SINGLE BARREL LIMITED EDITION NO. 1
tastingDescription:
Only 1 in 100 barrels is deemed to be of the quality to be judged a Jack Daniel's Single Barrel, as selected by the Master Distiller from the top floor of the barrelhouse. This whiskey first provides the thought of a walk through the barrelhouse, full of oak and caramel aromatics. The flavour evokes tastes of burnt brown sugar, cinnamon and cloves. The finish is long, with baking spice, a slight touch of smoke and corn cereal sweetness.
1 Bottle Limit

name: JACK DANIEL'S - SINGLE BARREL LIMITED EDITION NO. 2
nameSanitized: jack daniels - single barrel limited edition no. 2
sort: JACK DANIEL'S - SINGLE BARREL LIMITED EDITION NO. 2
tastingDescription:
Jack Daniel's Single Barrel Personal Selection is the premium version of Jack Daniel's Old No. 7. Only 1 in 100 barrels is deemed to be good enough to become a Jack Daniel's Single Barrel, as selected by the Master Distiller. This barrel was chosen for its exceptional complexity. The nose offers toasted oak, with notes of cereal sweetness and subtle smoke over a hint of clover spice and toffee. The finish provides more spice with good length, oak taste which lingers with a good dose of bright raisinated fruit notes and caramel.
1 Bottle Limit

name: JACK DANIEL'S - SINGLE BARREL SELECT
tastingDescription: Because no two barrels can occupy the exact same space within the barrelhouse, the whiskey that emerges from each barrel has a difference in character. Evidence of this unique background is the bottle's neckband indicating its rack, barrel number and individual bottling date. This is the beauty of Jack Daniel's Single Barrel and each barrel will provide a singular experience for those who enjoy it.

name: JACK DANIEL'S - TENNESSE APPLE
tastingDescription: Highly versatile and deliciously smooth, a perfect blend of natural green apples enhanced by the sweet, bold notes of Jack Daniel�s Tennessee Whisky. Easily enjoyed at home in a refreshing cocktail, as a chilled shot shared amongst friends or sipped slowly on the rocks. Made with real crisp apples, gluten and GMO free.

name: JACK DANIEL'S - TENNESSEE FIRE
tastingDescription: The Tennessee Fire blends red-hot cinnamon liqueur with the smooth character of Jack Daniel’s Old No. 7 for a classic spirit with a fiery finish.

name: JACK DANIEL'S - TENNESSEE HONEY
tastingDescription: Tennessee Honey is Jack Daniel's Tennessee whiskey flavoured with a unique blend of all natural flavors and real Tennessee honey. Notes of natural honeycomb, molasses and roasted nuts glaze the distinctive nose of Jack. The flavour is laced with honeycomb, toasted nuts, and delicate hints of molasses, chocolate and pralines. Smooth with long trails of rich honey and nut character on the finish.

name: JACK DANIEL'S - TENNESSEE HONEY
tastingDescription: Tennessee Honey is Jack Daniel's Tennessee whiskey flavoured with a unique blend of all natural flavors and real Tennessee honey. Notes of natural honeycomb, molasses and roasted nuts glaze the distinctive nose of Jack. The flavour is laced with honeycomb, toasted nuts, and delicate hints of molasses, chocolate and pralines. Smooth with long trails of rich honey and nut character on the finish.

name: JACK DANIEL'S - TENNESSEE RYE
tastingDescription: JD Tennessee Rye combines the distinct flavour of rye and the Jack Daniel Distillery's time-honoured charcoal mellowing process. On the palette, this well-rounded rye whiskey brings out the sweet caramel and dry baking spice followed by a peppery rye character finish on the back end. Distinctly Rye, Unmistakably Jack.

name: JACK DANIEL'S - WINTER JACK APPLE WHISKEY PUNCH
nameSanitized: jack daniels - winter jack apple whiskey punch
sort: JACK DANIEL'S - WINTER JACK APPLE WHISKEY PUNCH
tastingDescription: Winter Jack Tennesse Cider has an aroma which is full of warm seasonal spices, with notes of orange peel, cinnamon and clove.  On the palate, it has flavours of warm apple pie and cinnamon which compliment the notes of Jack Daniel's Tennessee Whiskey.

name: JACK DANIEL'S MASTER DISTILLER #5
tastingDescription: The 5th bottle released in the Limited Edition Master Distillers series in commemoration of Master Distiller Frank Bobo. Smooth and soft, with notes of caramel, spice and toasted oak. Savour neat, over ice, or in a classic whiskey cocktail.

name: JAGERMEISTER
tastingDescription: Germany’s best-selling spirit is both a bitter and a liqueur and also something of a mystery. A unique combination of 56 all- natural herbs, blossoms, roots and fruits, gently macerated and aged in oak barrels for at least one year to perfection.

Distinctive aromatic spicy notes lead to a delicious, sweet and rich finish. Shake to wake the exclusively crafted, all-natural ingredients and serve as an ice cold shot or in your favourite cocktail.

name: JAMESON - BLACK BARREL

The drawn-out finish incorporates touches of cinnamon, nutmeg, allspice and even a mouthwatering sprinkle of salt.” (March 2014)

tastingDescription: Jameson has been finished in Irish Pale Ale seasoned barrels, which helped introduce light hints of hops, fresh citris and floral notes, while maintaing our signature smoothness.

name: JAMESON - IRISH

On the nose, mellow pot still whiskey with toasted wood and sherry undertones. The taste is smooth and sweet with mild woody and nutty notes.

96 pts - Top 100 Spirits - Ultimate Spirits Challenge 2019.

name: JAMESON- COLD BREW
tastingDescription: Jameson Cold Brew is Jameson Irish Whiskey infused with natural cold brew coffee, made with Arabica beans from Brazil and Columbia. 30% abv/vol.

name: JARAL DE BERRIO - MEZCAL
tastingDescription: This mezcal made from 100 percent agave shows herbaceous, vegetal, smoky and peppery aromatics. It is slightly sweet and tinged with citrus, spice and smoke notes. It has a creamy mouth feel and a sweet, mellow and peppery finish. It is delicious neat, in margaritas or with spicy cuisine.

name: JEFFERSON'S - KENTUCKY STRAIGHT BOURBON VERY SMALL BATCH
nameSanitized: jeffersons - kentucky straight bourbon very small batch

tastingDescription: Jefferson’s Bourbon is crafted in very small batches using traditional techniques. It is a marriage of four different Kentucky straight bourbon whiskies of different ages. This is a smooth and light bourbon, with hints of complexity that will satisfy the most discerning bourbon fans. Aged in new oak barrels with only a slight char. It’s deliciously smooth and stylish.

name: JIAN ZHUANG
tastingDescription: Juan Zhuang has a thick elegant cellar taste. It has a mild fruit flavour, is easy to drink and has a long finish.

name: JIM BEAM - BLACK EXTRA AGED
tastingDescription: 93points, Ultimate Spirits Challenge 2018 - The palate shows a subtle minty-ness that keeps the bold oak flavors from overwhelming and leads to a refreshing finish.

name: JIM BEAM - KENTUCKY BOURBON
tastingDescription: The palate opens sweet, with light caramel and vanilla flavours and, later, a slight woody char. The finish is long, crisp, and clean.

name: JIM BEAM - KENTUCKY BOURBON
tastingDescription: The palate opens sweet, with light caramel and vanilla flavours and, later, a slight woody char. The finish is long, crisp, and clean.

name: JIM BEAM OLD TUB
tastingDescription: Before Jim Beam bourbon, the Beam family made Old Tub. This unfiltered, bonded bourbon is oaky and grainy on the nose, though the palate leads to warming caramel. The full-bodied finish leaves a lingering warmth.

name: JINRO - 24 SOJU
tastingDescription: Since its launch in 1924, Jinro has consistently held its position as the number one soju brand in Korea. Globally, Jinro Chamisul Soju has been the world’s best-selling soju for 12 consecutive years. Jinro 24 achieves a delicate balance between clean and smooth finish. It is an ideal base for cocktail mixes.

name: JINRO - CHAMISUL CLASSIC
tastingDescription: Jinro Chamisul Classic is the first soju to be filtered four times with charcoals made from Korean bamboo.  This breakthrough filtration method eliminates impurities, leaving only a smooth and clean taste.

name: JINRO - CHAMISUL FRESH
tastingDescription: Chamisul Fresh is made with a natural sweetener to create a uniquely fresh taste. Innovative technologies enhance the effect of the natural bamboo charcoal refinement process, resulting in a cleaner and fresher Chamisul.

name: JINRO - CHAMISUL GRAPEFRUIT SOJU
tastingDescription: Infused with fresh, sweet-tasting grapefruit and having a lower alcohol volume, Jinro Chamisul Grapefruit represents a new twist on a Korean favourite.

name: JINRO - CHAMISUL GREENGRAPE
tastingDescription: Fruit juice in soju is becoming more popular, and Jinro Green Grape has unique green grape flavour and taste that everyone can enjoy. It is easy to drink with an alcohol content of 13%.

On the palate, this is smooth, light and easy-sipping, leading with vanilla and caramel, plus gentle peat smoke floating into a baking spice finish. Sip or mix.” (December 2016)

tastingDescription: 94 Points, Wine Enthusiast - “This maple syrup-toned spirit is a blend of Islay and Speyside malts, with no grain whisky added. The result is an effortless mix of lightly smoky and oaky caramel notes, and a smooth, velvety feel. A splash of branchwater amps up the peat quotient.” (September 2011)

name: JOHNNIE WALKER - 18 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: 97 Points, Whisky Advocate - “Magnificently powerful and intense. Caramels, dried peats, elegant cigar smoke, seeds scraped from vanilla beans, brand new pencils, peppercorn, coriander seeds, and star anise make for a deeply satisfying nosing experience. Silky caramels, bountiful fruits of ripe peach, stewed apple, orange pith, and pervasive smoke with elements of burnt tobacco. An abiding finish of smoke, dry spices, and banoffee pie sweetness. Close to perfection. Editor's Choice.” (Spring 2018)

name: JOHNNIE WALKER - BLACK ICON
tastingDescription: This striking bottle captures the iconic flavours of Johnnie Walker Black. As many as forty whiskies make up this complex blend. The nose and flavour are an excellent combination of dry smokiness, with rich malt and peat overtones balanced by hints of cedar and fruit with trademark dark chocolate and vanilla sweetness

name: JOHNNIE WALKER - BLUE LABEL

This blended Scotch whisky is best enjoyed over ice for a cold, smooth finish.

name: JOHNNIE WALKER - RED ICON
tastingDescription: The famous 'Johnnie Red' is now available in a limited-edition Icon package. This dram's distinctive profile was created to be suitable for blending. Expect classic notes of smoke, vanilla, clove and butterscotch tones. Initially sweet and spicy on the palate, it develops a fruity and smokey character with a warm finish.

name: JOHNNIE WALKER - RED LABEL
tastingDescription: Johnnie Walker Red Label is their Pioneer Blend, the one that has introduced our whisky to the world. Highly versatile and with universal appeal, it has a bold, characterful flavour that shines through even when mixed. Johnnie Walker Red Label is crackling with spice and bursting with vibrant, smoky flavours. It’s a blend that combines light whiskies from Scotland’s East Coast and more peaty whiskies from the West, creating an extraordinary depth of flavour.
