Aromas of rich oak, fresh coffee, fine cocoa and dried fruit. Flavours of vanilla, toasted almonds and cinnamon with a long finish. Enjoy lightly chilled and neat.

name: JOSE CUERVO - RESERVE DE LA FAMILIA PLATINO
nameSanitized: jose cuervo - reserve de la familia platino
sort: JOSE CUERVO - RESERVE DE LA FAMILIA PLATINO
tastingDescription: False

name: JOSE CUERVO - TRADICIONAL REPOSADO
tastingDescription: Tradicional Reposado is 100% blue agave rested tequila and inspired by a 200  year old recipe. It has been aged for a minimum of 2 months in oak, giving it smooth and subtle complexity. Aromas and flavours of cooked agave, roasted pineapple, and vanilla followed by light spices like cinnamon and pepper.

name: JOSE CUERVO - TRADICIONAL SILVER
tastingDescription: Tradicional� Plata is 100% blue agave silver tequila and inspired by a 200+ year old recipe. Fragrant with aromas of lime, fresh herbs and spice. The palate is rounded and intense with refined flavours of white pepper, lime, mango and herb. A smooth finish, perfect served as a frozen shot or in cocktails.

name: JOSE CUERVO - WHITE PEACH MARGARITA
tastingDescription: Mixed perfectly, Jose Cuervo Authentic Light White Peach brings you the same delicious taste as the original, but with fewer than 95 calories per serving. Jose Cuervo Authentic Margaritas are made exclusively with Jose Cuervo's Gold Tequila. Serve on the rocks or blend with crushed ice.

name: JOSE CUERVO AUTHENTIC LIME MARGARITA
tastingDescription: Jose Cuervo� Authentic Margaritas, made exclusively with Jose Cuervo� Gold Tequila. Serve on the rocks or blend with crushed ice.

name: JP CHENET - BRANDY XO
tastingDescription: Complex, warm, subtly woody flavours with a very smooth palate.  Serve at 20°C.

name: JURA - 12 YEAR WHISKY GIFT SET
tastingDescription: This gift set includes Jura 12 Year Old and 2 drinking glasses. Aroma: Honey, spice and pine. Palate: Roasted coffee and chocolate. Finish: Whispers of smoke and sea spray.

name: JURA 12 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: Aroma: Honey, spice and pine. Palate: Roasted coffee and chocolate. Finish: Whispers of smoke and sea spray.

name: K.W.V. - PAARL FIVE STAR V.S.O.P.
tastingDescription: Lively and deep gold in colour, this 5-year-old brandy has luscious flavours of apple, pineapple, pear and raisin. enhanced by a mild toasted oak aroma, this medium-bodied, fortified spirit leaves you with a lingering, fruity aftertaste that will complement this rich, sweet dessert.

name: KAH - TEQUILA ANEJO
tastingDescription: The word "KAH" translates to life in Ancient Mayan language. Flavours of agave, chcolate, tobacco and coffee. Spending more than a year in American oak casks. Leaving the palate feeling full bodied and viscous.

name: KAHLUA
tastingDescription: Created in Mexico in 1936, Kahlua has become a top-selling coffee liqueur globally. Expect inviting aromas and flavours of freshly ground coffee, dark chocolate, vanilla and roasted chestnut.

name: KAHLUA
tastingDescription: Created in Mexico in 1936, Kahlua has become a top-selling coffee liqueur globally. Expect inviting aromas and flavours of freshly ground coffee, dark chocolate, vanilla and roasted chestnut.

name: KAHLUA
tastingDescription: Created in Mexico in 1936, Kahlua has become a top-selling coffee liqueur globally. Expect inviting aromas and flavours of freshly ground coffee, dark chocolate, vanilla and roasted chestnut.

name: KAHLUA
tastingDescription: Created in Mexico in 1936, Kahlua has become a top-selling coffee liqueur globally. Expect inviting aromas and flavours of freshly ground coffee, dark chocolate, vanilla and roasted chestnut.

name: KAHLUA
tastingDescription: Created in Mexico in 1936, Kahlua has become a top-selling coffee liqueur globally. Expect inviting aromas and flavours of freshly ground coffee, dark chocolate, vanilla and roasted chestnut.

name: KAHLUA - PEPPERMINT MOCHA COFFEE LIMITED EDITION
nameSanitized: kahlua - peppermint mocha coffee limited edition
sort: KAHLUA - PEPPERMINT MOCHA COFFEE LIMITED EDITION
tastingDescription: Cool peppermint and dark chocolate blended with 100% Arabica coffee and sugarcane rum. Serve on the rocks, with hot chocolate or iced to give the average drink that Kahlua twist. Body: Thick, smooth, round and full. Color: Deep coffee brown Nose: A delicious combination of icy, refreshing peppermint and dark chocolate. Palate: Rich and decadent taste of cool peppermint, smooth dark chocolate and a hint of coffee and caramel. Finish: A cool mint chocolate lingering after-taste.

name: KAHLUA - VANILLA
tastingDescription: A vanilla flavored rum & coffee liquor, for those special times with friends—perfect neat over ice, or mixed into your favorite cocktails.

name: KAIYO - THE PEATED
tastingDescription:
“This is utterly unique: made from imported Scottish peated malt, it spends 2 years in madeira casks, then 6 years in mizunara casks. Light, clean, fruit refreshment: apple, white grape, lingering cigar smoke, coconut macaroons, and ample Japanese oak influence. Apple and watermelon flavours, developing a more sugary fruitiness of life savers hard candy, all brushed with gentle spice and a swish of smoke”
90 Points – Whisky Advocate 2019

name: KAIYO - UN-CHILLFILTERED
tastingDescription:
“Finely ground spice, vanilla sponge cake, light honey, and brown sugar cubes, as well as the mizunara fingerprints of aromatic wood and incense. Pastry, egg custard, and allspice flavours; there’s just enough body apparent as the spices settle down, unleashing a substantial wave of vanilla creaminess. Leaves a long aftertaste, like a light-hearted pillow fight between the vanilla cream and the fading spices.”
91 Points – Whisky Advocate 2019

name: KAMORA - COFFEE
tastingDescription: Kamora brings you the finest beans, roasted to perfection, blended to a satiny smooth decadence with vanilla, chocolate and caramel notes. In a cocktail, in coffee or alone on ice, Kamora is just right, anytime.

name: KAVALAN - MANZANILLA SINGLE MALT WHISKY SOLIST
nameSanitized: kavalan - manzanilla single malt whisky solist
sort: KAVALAN - MANZANILLA SINGLE MALT WHISKY SOLIST
tastingDescription: 90 Points, Whisky Advocate 2017 - "Clove-spiked orange, melon, pomegranate, cherry lozenge, and aniseed. Cherry, Strawberry Laces, growing spiciness, ginger, pepper, almost effervescent fruit jamminess. Later, citrus peel, vanilla. Finish has vanilla bitterness and fresh green herbal tones. Water keeps the fruit but boosts those spices on the finish."

name: KAVALAN - PEDRO XIMENEZ SINGLE MALT WHISKY SOLIST
nameSanitized: kavalan - pedro ximenez single malt whisky solist
nameSuffix: PEDRO XIMENEZ SINGLE MALT WHISKY SOLIST
sort: KAVALAN - PEDRO XIMENEZ SINGLE MALT WHISKY SOLIST
tastingDescription: 92 Points, Whisky Advocate 2017 - "Damson jam, herbal undertones, banana leaf, scallions, and clean, fresh oak notes. Burst of red fruit; raspberry, strawberry, rosehip, and sherry with lips tingling from the PX spices, citrus enters the fray, then chewy butter toffees. Wonderful complexity and flavor trajectory, it rounds off on a strawberry note. It is great to find a heavyweight whisky that is perfectly approachable at cask strength. The finish stays juicy, with vibrant spices."

name: KETEL ONE BOTANICAL - CUCUMBER & MINT
tastingDescription: Ketel One Vodka distilled with real botanicals and infused with natural fruit essences. No added sugar, artificial sweeteners or artificial flavours. Lively and aromatic with crisp cucumber and fresh mint flavours. Add soda water and serve with plenty of ice. Garnish with thin slices of cucumber or a sprig of fresh mint.

name: KETEL ONE BOTANICAL - GRAPEFRUIT & ROSE
tastingDescription: Ketel One Vodka distilled with real botanicals and infused with natural fruit essences. No added sugar, artificial sweeteners or artificial flavours. Experience aromas and flavours of zesty grapefruit and rose petals. Add soda water and serve with plenty of ice and a grapefruit wedge garnish.

name: KETEL ONE BOTANICAL - PEACH & ORANGE BLOSSOM
nameSanitized: ketel one botanical - peach & orange blossom
sort: KETEL ONE BOTANICAL - PEACH & ORANGE BLOSSOM
tastingDescription: Ketel One vodka is distilled with botanicals and infused with natural fruit essence. Flavours of white peach and orange blossom entice the senses

name: KILCHOMAN - MACHIR BAY
tastingDescription: False

name: KIRSCH DRY - SCHLOSS OBERANDRITZ
tastingDescription: This kirsch is a clear, colorless fruit brandy made from double distillation of morello cherries, a dark-colored cultivar of the sour cherry.

name: KNOB CREEK - 9 YEAR OLD BOURBON SMALL BATCH
nameSanitized: knob creek - 9 year old bourbon small batch
sort: KNOB CREEK - 9 YEAR OLD BOURBON SMALL BATCH
tastingDescription: This bourbon is a deep amber colour with orange highlights. Burnt sugar and maple syrup dominate the nose, with additional hints of raisin, flint and fresh oak. Maple syrup and caramel flavours lead in the palate, then spice takes over with notes of cinnamon, clove and licorice. It has a dry, lingering oak finish with sweet and herbal notes.

name: KNOB CREEK - CASK STRENGTH RELEASE 1
tastingDescription:
"Dripping with caramel and tingling with spice, this is a blockbuster whiskey that delivers across a spectrum of flavours. Maple syrup, sugar in the raw, and caramel-drizzled flan highlight the aroma, while the palate turns fruity and tropical with the sweet drive of peach nectar, grilled fruits, and pineapple upside-down cake. At the same time, it's lemony bright, warmly spiced, tremendously rich, and oh-so-good! Pour on the water and enjoy the ride!"
93 Points - Whisky Advocate 2018

name: KNOB CREEK - TWICE BARRELED RYE
tastingDescription:
Scintillating spice meets deep wood characteristics on the nose, hinting that a remarkable rye awaits in the glass. The palate follows through with full-bodied notes of roasted nut, brown butter biscuit and candied maple dusted with clove and cinnamon that carry through the long finish.
92 Points & Excellent, Ultimate Spirit Challenge 2019

name: KOCH EL MEZCAL DE OAXACA - ESPADIN
nameSanitized: koch el mezcal de oaxaca - espadin
sort: KOCH EL MEZCAL DE OAXACA - ESPADIN
tastingDescription: False

name: KUJIRA JAPANESE WHISKY - BOURBON CASK 20 YEAR OLD
nameSanitized: kujira japanese whisky - bourbon cask 20 year old
sort: KUJIRA JAPANESE WHISKY - BOURBON CASK 20 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: Aromas of herbs with hints of various plum fruits, prune and mint candy appear on the nose. The palate is very balanced with a light body and flavours ofsweet vanilla spice and smoky woodiness. You will find licorice and Japanese pepper on the medium finish.

name: KUJIRA RYUKYU WHISKY - BOURBON CASK 20YO
tastingDescription: False

name: KWEICHOU MOUTAI CHIEW - FLYING FAIRY
tastingDescription: Pungent and exotic, this complex baijiu has been awarded the prestigious National Liquor title in China. Soy sauce, earth, fruit and mushroom are only a small part of the layers of flavour in this bottle.

name: KWEICHOW MOUTAI YINGBIN CHIEW
tastingDescription: Moutai Yingbin Chiew is a fresher, lighter and more delicate variation of Moutai. With a fresh and sweet aroma of apple and pear, Yingbin is mild and mellow in flavour while still retaining some of the complexity of its older sibling.

name: LA PINTA
tastingDescription: False

name: LAGAVULIN - 12 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
"Sweet woodsmoke, peat embers, Jaffa oranges, new leather, sea salt, and cigarette smoke on the nose. Orange carries over onto the robust palate, with quite pronounced smokiness, black pepper, and dark chocolate. Long and peppery in the finish, with lingering smoke and brine." —Gavin Smith
93 pts, Whisky Advocate 2020

name: LAGAVULIN - 16 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: Double Gold & Best Distiller’s Single Malt, San Francisco World Spirits Competition 2017. Lagavulin 16 is an intense, smoky-sweet single malt with seaweed flavors and a huge finish, aged in oak casks for at least 16 years. It has a strong peat-smoke that's typical of southern Islay but also offers a dryness that makes it a truly interesting dram.

name: LAGAVULIN - 8 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: 90 Points, Wine Enthusiast - “Look for a straw hue and unmistakably peaty, smoky scent. On the palate, fruity sweetness leads at first, quickly morphing into a billow of pungent peat smoke. Quite drying, and finishes fiery. Water tamps down the alcohol heat and brings more orchard fruit forward.” (December 2017)

name: LAMB'S - NAVY
tastingDescription: Dark brown in colour with a brown sugar nose with hints of maple and honey. It is smooth with a hint of caramel in the finish.

name: LAMB'S - NAVY
tastingDescription: Lamb’s Navy is a warm blend of spice, fruit and oak; a pleasant initial sweetness then reveals the complex mix of island flavours.

name: LAMB'S - NAVY
tastingDescription: Dark brown in colour with a brown sugar nose with hints of maple and honey. It is smooth with a hint of caramel in the finish.

name: LAMB'S - NAVY
tastingDescription: Dark brown in colour with a brown sugar nose with hints of maple and honey. It is smooth with a hint of caramel in the finish.

name: LAMB'S - NAVY 151 PROOF
tastingDescription: Alfred Lamb was known for producing the rum of choice for the British Navy. The hexagon shape of the bottle assured his smooth and refined rum wouldn't roll around on ships. At 151 proof, this rum is great for cocktail mixing.

name: LAMB'S - PALM BREEZE
tastingDescription: Pale gold in colour with a burnt sugar aroma and vanilla flavour.

name: LAMB'S - PALM BREEZE RUM PET
tastingDescription: False

name: LAMB'S - SPICED RUM
tastingDescription: False

name: LAMB'S - WHITE
tastingDescription: Crystal clear in color with hints of green banana and vanilla bean on the nose and palate. It has a clean, crisp finish.

name: LAMB'S - WHITE PET
tastingDescription: False

name: LANGLEY'S NUMBER 8 - LONDON DRY
tastingDescription: 93 Pts - Wine Enthusiast. - “This complex, balanced gin has a citrusy, lightly sweet palate, hinting at grapefruit and delivering a faint, pleasing white floral note. The finish offers citrus and spicy zing.”

name: LAPHROAIG  - 10 YEAR OLD CASK STRENGTH BATCH 13
nameSanitized: laphroaig  - 10 year old cask strength batch 13
sort: LAPHROAIG  - 10 YEAR OLD CASK STRENGTH BATCH 13
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
Batch 13 is matured in charred ex-bourbon barrels which impart gentle vanilla and barbecue top notes, the palate is sweet and spicy showcasing burnt marshmallow, sea salt toffee, cinnamon stroopwafels and white pepper finishing in waves of rich Islay peat smoke.

name: LAPHROAIG - 10 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: 92 Points, Wine Enthusiast - “Look for a distinctly peaty aroma, with hints of smoked fish, bacon and mesquite. The palate shows peat smoke from the first sip plus an undercurrent of honey, finishing with black pepper heat. Water brings out a spearmint note and a touch more vanilla.” (December 2017)

name: LAPHROAIG - 27 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: Double matured and bottled at cask strength. Limited edition: only 838 cases produced. The nose has ripe, pulpy tropical fruit flan, topped with finely chopped toasted macadamia nuts and smothered with vanilla cream. The flavours of smoke are tempered by limes and nectarines, giving way to sea salt and mild chilli. Antique leather and green tobacco leaf appear on the long finish.

name: LAPHROAIG - 28 YEAR OLD CASK STRENGTH
tastingDescription: The marriage of different cask sizes with sherry casks creates a sweet taste, complemented by peppery spices and finishes with a lingering peaty flavour and touch of iodine and seaweed reminiscent of Islay

name: LAPHROAIG - 30 YEAR OLD IAN HUNTER SERIES
nameSanitized: laphroaig - 30 year old ian hunter series
sort: LAPHROAIG - 30 YEAR OLD IAN HUNTER SERIES
tastingDescription: 30 years in first fill American White Oak Bourbon Barrels. Peaty and peppery with notes of herbs, cedar, kumquat zest and gorse flower. A sweetness of custard cream and vanilla pods.

name: LAPHROAIG - 33 YEAR OLD THE IAN HUNTER BOOK 3
nameSanitized: laphroaig - 33 year old the ian hunter book 3
nameSuffix: 33 YEAR OLD THE IAN HUNTER BOOK 3
sort: LAPHROAIG - 33 YEAR OLD THE IAN HUNTER BOOK 3
tastingDescription: Welcome to the 2021 release of the Ian Hunter series, a 33-year-old non-chill filtered whisky with creamy liquorice notes, fully matured in refill ex-bourbon barrels so the original character shines through. In this series we celebrate the legacy of the one man, the last of Johnston family to own and manage the Laphroaig distillery, Ian Hunter. This is the story of a character as unique as the  whisky.

name: LAPHROAIG - CAIRDEAS CASK STRENGTH PEDRO XIMENEZ
nameSanitized: laphroaig - cairdeas cask strength pedro ximenez
sort: LAPHROAIG - CAIRDEAS CASK STRENGTH PEDRO XIMENEZ
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
Càirdeas (meaning "friendship" in Gaelic) is triple-matured in American oak ex-bourbon barrels, followed by quarter casks and finally in European oak hogsheads containing PX sherry. It has a smoky, peaty, yet sweet and fruity flavour, with hints of grilled bacon, manuka honey and oak spices. The whisky is completed with nutty notes, combined with an intriguing blend of candy floss, toffee and cinnamon on the nose and a hot, spicy and salty finish.
1 Bottle limit.

name: LAPHROAIG - QUARTER CASK
tastingDescription:
Full sparkling gold colour. Burning embers of peat in a crofters fireplace, hints of coconut and banana aromas. Deep, complex and smoky yet offers and surprises the palate with a gentle sweetness. for a really long finish that dries appropriately with smoke and spice.
2019 New York International Spirits Competition - Double Gold Medal.
2019 San Francisco World Spirits Competition - Gold Medal
2019 SIP Awards - Gold Medal

name: LAPHROAIG 30 YEAR OLD THE IAN HUNTER STORY - BOOK 2
namePrefix: LAPHROAIG 30 YEAR OLD THE IAN HUNTER STORY
nameSanitized: laphroaig 30 year old the ian hunter story - book 2
sort: LAPHROAIG 30 YEAR OLD THE IAN HUNTER STORY - BOOK 2
tastingDescription:
Welcome to the 2020 release of the Ian Hunter series, a non-chill filtered whisky with sweet sherry notes underscored by Laphroaig's characteristic peatiness, aged for 30 years in Spanish oak oloroso sherry casks.
1 bottle limit

name: LAPHROAIG SELECT
tastingDescription: The Select is created from carefully selected casks of each of Laphroaig’s key styles. Mostly, these are historic styles, with one notable addition: the heart of the spirit is drawn from a final maturation in American oak casks – rarely used for scotch whisky. With spirit selected by Laphroaig’s master distiller from Quarter Cask, PX Cask and Triple Wood (Oloroso sherry) and a final addition of 10-Year-Old, it represents a subtle blending of peat, oak and sweetness.

name: LARCENY KENTUCKY STRAIGHT BOURBON
tastingDescription: Bright new copper colour. Fresh bread and toffee aroma, with notes of butterscotch. Taste is buttery caramel and honey, with a rich mouthfeel. A long, gently sweet, and savory finish.

name: LAURA SECORD - CHOCOLATE CREAM LIQUOR
tastingDescription: False

name: LEDAIG - 10 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: On the nose, sweet briny smokiness with a distinctly island character that hints at mint chocolate and floral seaside aromas. On the palate, sparks of spicy pepper with peaty smoke and vanilla malty creaminess. The finish has spicy white pepper and sweet vibrant liquorice and cloves, with a lingering saltiness.

name: LEDAIG - DOUGLAS LAING PROVENANCE 10 YEAR OLD
nameSanitized: ledaig - douglas laing provenance 10 year old
sort: LEDAIG - DOUGLAS LAING PROVENANCE 10 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: From the Tobermory Distillery comes this smoky Ledaig single malt. The peated whisky was distilled in 2009 and left in a single refill hogshead for a decade, until Douglas Laing bottled it for the Provenance series with an outturn of 411 bottles.

name: LEGENT
tastingDescription: Legent is a bourbon, but it’s unlike anything you’ve ever tried, because it’s unlike anything that’s ever been created. It’s an unprecedented collaboration between two whiskey legends – Fred Noe, from the founding family of bourbon and Jim Beam’s seventh-generation Master Distiller, and Shinji Fukuyo, from the founding house of Japanese whiskey and Suntory’s fifth ever Chief Blender.

name: LEMON HART - BLACKPOOL SPICED RUM
tastingDescription: 93 points, Tastings.com - ". Attractive, confected aromas of cherry, butter pecan, mocha coconut macaroon, vanilla wafer cookie, and tiramisu with brandied orange peel with a satiny, vibrant, off-dry medium-to-full body. Delicious, well balanced, with unique and attractive flavours; try after dinner and as a modifier in craft cocktails."

name: LEMON HART - PREMIUM DEMERARA
tastingDescription: "88 points, Tastings.com: ""Aromas and flavours of brown butter, dark burnt sugar, molasses coffee cake, and leather with a supple, bright, dryish medium body and a peppery, cheery finish that shows notes of coffee grounds, bark, and charred nuts with honey finish. A very dry, dark, and austere dark rum for cocktails."""

name: LEMON HART - PREMIUM DEMERARA
tastingDescription: 92 Points, Ultimate Spirits Challenge - "An explosion of banana, vanilla, shortbread, candied almonds and toasted oat aromas. Excellent and highly recommended." (2020)

name: LICOR 43
tastingDescription: The diversity of ingredients, perfectly balanced sugars and alcohol deliver wonderfully layered flavours of vanilla, Mediterranean citrus and spice. Although perfect when enjoyed pure with or without ice, its flavours are so harmonious that it simply invites other drinks to be mixed with it and is unmatched in its versatility.

name: LIMONCELLO - LUXARDO
tastingDescription: Obtained from the infusion of lemon peels in alcohol, Limoncello is one of the most world-renowned Italian liqueurs. It stems from an ancient tradition which enhances the natural aroma and fresh taste of lemons from Southern Italy. Well-rounded and harmonious, a pleasant sensation of aromatic freshness on the palate.

name: LIMONCELLO - ROSSI D'ASIAGO
tastingDescription: An electric lemon peel aroma radiates from the glass of this beautifully balanced tart and sweet limoncello. Best served chilled or in a long drink.

name: LIMONCELLO - RUSSO
tastingDescription: Authentic Russo Limoncello is made from the peels of organic Verdelli lemons from the Amalfi Coast, prepared entirely by hand using traditional methods, without dyes or preservatives.  Enjoy ice cold, drizzled over your favourite desert, or mix with soda or Prosecco for a light, refreshing thirst quencher.

name: LITTLEMILL - 25 YEAR OLD SINGLE MALT SCOTCH WHISKY
nameSanitized: littlemill - 25 year old single malt scotch whisky
nameSuffix: 25 YEAR OLD SINGLE MALT SCOTCH WHISKY
sort: LITTLEMILL - 25 YEAR OLD SINGLE MALT SCOTCH WHISKY
tastingDescription:
The 1989 liquid went into the cask on December 17, 1989 at 68.5 degrees and the 1990 was casked between April 1 and 4, 1990 at between 68.6 and 68.7 degrees. The liquid was originally laid down in a mixture of the finest American and European Oak casks and for this 1st bottling it has been married together and has experienced a period of finishing in 1st fill European Oloroso Sherry casks.
1 bottle limit

name: LOCH LOMOND - 12 YEAR OLD SINGLE MALT SCOTCH WHISKY
nameSanitized: loch lomond - 12 year old single malt scotch whisky
nameSuffix: 12 YEAR OLD SINGLE MALT SCOTCH WHISKY
sort: LOCH LOMOND - 12 YEAR OLD SINGLE MALT SCOTCH WHISKY
tastingDescription: This exquisite 12 Year Old Single Malt has a deep fruity character of peach and pear layered with a vanilla sweetness and the characteristic hints of peat and smoke found in Loch Lomond Whiskies. Aged in three types of cask bourbon, refill and re-charred these whiskies are brought together delivering a perfectly balanced single malt.

name: LOCH LOMOND - 25 YEAR OLD OLD PARTICULAR DOUGLAS LAING
nameSanitized: loch lomond - 25 year old old particular douglas laing
nameSuffix: 25 YEAR OLD OLD PARTICULAR DOUGLAS LAING
sort: LOCH LOMOND - 25 YEAR OLD OLD PARTICULAR DOUGLAS LAING
tastingDescription: Available starting November 13th in select stores

name: LONG ISLAND ICED TEA - ICE BOX
nameSanitized: long island iced tea - ice box
sort: LONG ISLAND ICED TEA - ICE BOX
tastingDescription: Aromas of citrus, orange and juniper; medium sweet with flavours of orange, juniper and lemon tea. All the flavour of a classic Long Island Ice tea without the need for a fully stocked bar. Just add Coke and serve!

name: LONG ISLAND ICED TEA - ICE BOX
nameSanitized: long island iced tea - ice box
sort: LONG ISLAND ICED TEA - ICE BOX
tastingDescription: Aromas of citrus, orange and juniper; medium sweet with flavours of orange, juniper and lemon tea. All the flavour of a classic Long Island Ice tea without the need for a fully stocked bar. Just add Coke and serve!

name: LONG ISLAND ICED TEA - POTTER'S
tastingDescription: Vodka, gin, rum, and triple sec all combine to create this party favourite.

name: LONG TABLE - CUCUMBER GIN
tastingDescription: Premium West Coast Gin with a complex balance of nine botanicals including two elegant pepper varieties. Made with fresh BC cucumbers. The gin has a garden-fresh nose with soft citrus notes that immerse your palate. Beautiful lingering peppery finish. Ideal in a Gin and Quality Tonic with seasonal herbs.

name: LONG TABLE - LANGBORD AKVAVIT
tastingDescription: Award-winning Scandinavian-style botanical spirit. Copper-pot distilled. Made from six forage spices including star anise, fennel, caraway and Canadian coriander. Nose of bright complex licorice notes. Rich finish of lingering orange marmalade and Nordic herbs on the palate. Langbord is both an inviting digestif and a perfect cocktail base.

name: LONG TABLE - LONDON DRY
tastingDescription: Distilled at Vancouver’s first independent distillery. This premium West Coast gin is characterized by a complex balance of eight botanicals resulting in bold forward notes of evergreen, juniper and citrus. Finishing with earthy notes of wood, fennel and pepper. Fragrant, flavourful and fresh. Perfect for all classic gin recipes.

name: LONG TABLE - TEXADA VODKA
tastingDescription: Premium small batch vodka. Copper-pot distilled with fresh lemongrass. Polished over a bed of Texada Island BC limestone. The resulting spirit showcases qualities of light floral sweetness, cool minerality and finishes with a touch of spiced citrus. Complex, stately and crystal clean. Try it in your next Mule.

name: LOS SIETE MISTERIOS - DOBA-YEJ MEZCAL
tastingDescription: The nose offers intense, floral and maraschino like qualities with a slight bit of smokiness and herbaciousness to compliment the red bush fruit. On the palate you will taste flavours of powerful campfire smoke, full texture, creamy and viscous hit. More ripe berry fruit but also hints of grilled banana and plantain. The finish is subtle, elegant and balanced. Long enough to stand strongly alone, versatile enough to clearly be playful with other elements.

name: LOT 40 - PEATED QUARTER CASK
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
By experimenting with unique and unexpected barrel finishes, Lot No. 40's Master Distiller has complemented this distinctive rye profile with an equally unmistakable finish–Peated Quarter Casks. Previously containing a peated single malt whisky from Scotland, these barrels bring a distinct peaty, smoky element to the whisky. Starting with cigar smoke, iodine, red apple, baking spices on the nose, this whisky brings mesquite, hickory, savory, nutmeg, cloves and peppercorn on the palate, finishing with hot cinnamon notes. Bottled at cask strength. Limited to fewer than 4,000 bottles.

name: LOT NO. 40 - RYE WHISKY
tastingDescription: Lot No. 40 is made with 100% rye, pot distilled and aged in new oak barrels. This results in a bold whisky that highlights the unmistakable intensity of the rye grain. The ideal whisky for classic cocktails, Lot No. 40 is also smooth enough to be enjoyed neat. Expect notes of dark fruit, baking spices, vanilla and English toffee. Two-time winner of the Canadian Whisky of the Year.

name: LUKSUSOWA
tastingDescription: Luksusowa is the Polish word for luxury. This potato vodka is gluten-free and blended with Artesian well water, non-allergenic and triple distilled. Aromas of cream pie, nougat, and toast with a silky smooth, dry medium-body and a delicate vanilla soufflé, sweet grass and peppery spice finish.

name: LUKSUSOWA
tastingDescription: Luksusowa is the Polish word for luxury. This potato vodka is gluten-free and blended with Artesian well water, non-allergenic and triple distilled. Aromas of cream pie, nougat, and toast with a silky smooth, dry medium-body and a delicate vanilla soufflé, sweet grass and peppery spice finish.

name: LUKSUSOWA - VODKA
tastingDescription: Luksusowa is the Polish word for luxury. This potato vodka is gluten-free and blended with Artesian well water, non-allergenic and triple distilled. Aromas of cream pie, nougat, and toast with a silky smooth, dry medium-body and a delicate vanilla soufflé, sweet grass and peppery spice finish.

name: LUXARDO - APERITIVO
tastingDescription: Its mild alcoholic content makes it an ideal product to create low ABV drinks, perfect for aperitivo occasions. Mix it with Prosecco and soda for a perfect Spritz.

name: LUXARDO - MARASCHINO PERLA DRY
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
Luxardo has released a higher-ABV Maraschino Perla Dry liqueur to celebrate its 200th anniversary this year. Perla Dry was previously made in very limited quantities, with its final production dating back to the 1970s. This liqueur has Kirsch eau-de-vie-like aromas with roasted nuttiness and faint smoke. The taste is intense, thick and syrupy, with sweetness partially offset by fruit tartness plus notes of concentrated cherry juice, cherry jam and black pepper spice.

name: LUZHOU - LAOJIAO ER QU
tastingDescription: Luzhou Laojiao Er Qu is visually clear and transparent that gives an elegant aroma, typical of good quality strong fragrance Baijiu, possessing a mellow taste and finishes with a gentle lasting fragrance.

name: LUZHOU - LAOJIAO TOU QU
tastingDescription: False

name: MACALLAN - 12 YEAR OLD DOUBLE CASK
tastingDescription: False

name: MACALLAN - 12 YEAR OLD DOUBLE CASK
tastingDescription: 96 Points - Extraordinary, Ultimate Recommendation - Ultimate Spirits Challenge 2018, "Wonderfully sherried nose of salty, honey-roasted walnuts, golden raisin, truffle, and baked red cherry. The palate is full of briny, salty goodness with hints of apricot, tinned peach, and a tinge of mesquite smoke. Long and honey-tinged.

name: MACALLAN - 25 YEAR OLD SHERRY CASK
tastingDescription:
This distinguished single malt is matured exclusively for twenty-five years in Oloroso sherry seasoned oak casks from Jerez, Spain. Laying undisturbed in the same casks for a quarter of a century, the maturing spirit transforms to create this luxurious single malt whisky characterised by its rich flavours of vanilla, dried fruits and ginger spice with a long finish and rich mahogany colour. 
1 Bottle limit.

name: MACALLAN - 30 YEAR OLD SHERRY OAK
tastingDescription:
This distinguished single malt is matured exclusively for thirty years in Oloroso sherry seasoned oak casks from Jerez, Spain. Laying undisturbed in the same casks for this thirty year period, the maturing spirit transforms to create this luxurious, naturally dark, single malt whisky characterised by its rich flavours of dried fruits, orange and spice. 
1 Bottle limit.

name: MACALLAN - CLASSIC CUT 2018 RELEASE
tastingDescription: Matured exclusively in hand-picked, exceptional oak casks seasoned with Oloroso sherry from Jerez, Spain, The Macallan Classic Cut has been bottled by The Macallan Master Whisky Maker to reveal its extraordinary character of creamy vanilla, sweet ginger, and warming oak.

name: MACALLAN - CLASSIC CUT 2019 RELEASE
tastingDescription: The 2019 edition of Classic Cut is bottled by the Whisky Maker Polly Logan and features a liquid matured exclusively in exceptional sherry oak casks seasoned with Oloroso Sherry from Jerez, Spain. Heightened flavours of orange, sweet ginger and vanilla come to the forefront, combined with a satisfyingly long finish. Classic Cut 2019 is a truly indulgent single malt whisky.

name: MACALLAN - CLASSIC CUT 2020 RELEASE
tastingDescription:
The 2020 Edition of Macallan Classic Cut has been carefully crafted by Macallan whisky maker Polly Logan using a combination of sherry-seasoned European oak casks and ex-bourbon American oak casks. Aromas of vanilla, candied orange peel, honey, sultanas and fresh oak fill the nose, complemented by notes of fresh ginger, juicy orange, honey, vanilla and fresh oak that linger in the finish.
1 Bottle Limit

name: MACALLAN - DOUBLE CASK 15 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: False

name: MACALLAN - DOUBLE CASK 18 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: False

name: MACALLAN - DOUBLE CASK 30 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: The Macallan 30-Year-Old Double Cask unveils the unrivalled commitment to the mastery of wood and spirit for which The Macallan has been known since it was established in 1824. This distinguished single malt is matured exclusively for 30 years in hand-picked sherry seasoned American and European oak casks. The culmination of this extraordinary journey marks the birth of something exceptional—a harmonious, well-rounded single malt whisky, with a warm character.

name: MACALLAN - DOUBLE CASK GOLD
tastingDescription: The burnished gold spirit presents a lemon citrus nose, then orange peel and an interlacing sweetness that softens but doesn't eliminate the zest. A quiet note of vanilla is followed by dark chocolate with lingering floral and light oak notes.

name: MACALLAN - ESTATE
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
The Macallan Estate is an extremely special single malt containing rare spirit from a proportion of the barley grown at Easter Elchies estate, the birthplace of The Macallan. It delivers a subtle hint of citrus which balances the traditional sherried richness, resulting in a complex single malt with an extraordinarily long finish.

name: MACALLAN - EXCEPTIONAL SINGLE CASK 10935
tastingDescription:
Every single bottle of The Macallan Exceptional Single Cask is unique in its own particular way. Each individual cask selected by The Macallan Whisky Makers was chosen for its distinctive characteristics. The 2020/ESB-10935/02 was distilled on October 7, 2004 and filled in European oak sherry butt casks selected by Sarah Burgess. It was bottled on July 16, 2020 at 61.5% ABV and limited to only 560 bottles.
1 Bottle Limit

name: MACALLAN - EXCEPTIONAL SINGLE CASK 13921
tastingDescription: Every single bottle of The Macallan Exceptional Single Cask is unique in its own particular way. Each individual cask selected by The Macallan Whisky Makers was chosen for its distinctive characteristics. The 2020/ESH-13921/03 was distilled on December 12, 1995 and filled in European oak sherry hogshead casks selected by Sarah Burgess. It was bottled on July 16, 2020 at 55.9% ABV and limited to only 243 bottles.

name: MACALLAN - LONDON
tastingDescription: The Macallan Whisky Maker, Steven Bremner, and the Roca Brothers, owners of El Celler de Can Roca in Spain, twice named Best Restaurant in the World, have selected the perfect combination of six first-fill European olorosso sherry seasoned oak casks to create this unique single malt whisky. Distil Your World: The London Edition is a character-led whisky with encapsulating nuances of orange caramel, curry spice and Earl Grey tea. This expression takes the taste buds and imagination on a journey of discovery, bringing London's soul and unique character to life.

name: MACALLAN - M
tastingDescription: M sits at the pinnacle of The Macallan 1824 Series. Created from the rarest whiskies at the distillery it is the most expensive whisky ever sold* (*Guinness Book of World Records). M is born of a collaboration between three masters of their crafts: Fabien Baron; Lalique; The Macallan, with a unique objective: to create the most sophisticated whisky in the world contained in an exquisite, exclusively designed crystal decanter. M is a masterpiece of design brought to conception by creative director Fabien Baron; brought to life by Lalique mastery of crystal; and brought to purpose by The Macallan highly complex, meticulously crafted single malt whisky.

name: MACALLAN - NO 6 IN LALIQUE
tastingDescription: No. 6 brings together the art of The Macallan Whisky Maker with Lalique exquisite craftsmanship to create a stunning whisky encased in the finest, and most stylish, crystal decanter. This rich, complex single malt takes its unique natural colour and character from the first fill Spanish sherry seasoned oak casks handcrafted by the master craftsmen of Jerez de la Frontera, the home of sherry. The cooperage exclusively creates Spanish oak casks which, once seasoned with sherry, give the unique, rich flavour of this exquisite whisky. It is from this one single cooperage that these casks are taken in order to ensure the infinite quality and character at the heart of The Macallan.

name: MACALLAN - RARE CASK
tastingDescription: Ruby red in colour. On the nose, soft notes of opulent vanilla and raisin give way to a sweet ensemble of apple, lemon, and orange. All balanced by a spicy quartet of root ginger, cinnamon, nutmeg and clove. On the palate, this spicy quartet is unwavering. Oak resonates, timeless, polished and rich. Vanilla and chocolate lead the finale along with a light citrus zest. The finish is warming and woody.

name: MACALLAN - REFLEXION
tastingDescription: The Macallan lives up to its reputation with this exceptional whisky, presented in its own decanter. Initial light citrus zest gives way to the succulent sweetness of lemon and orange in this premium Scotch with raisin, sultana, apple, and subtle hints of cinnamon and ginger

name: MACALLAN - SHERRY OAK 12 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription:
Matured exclusively in Oloroso sherry seasoned oak casks. Once filled, the maturing spirit remains undisturbed in the same casks for 12 years and is brought together in this rich and complex whisky characterised by spice and dried fruit and a natural rich golden colour.
1 bottle limit

name: MACALLAN - SHERRY OAK 18 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription:
When matured exclusively in Oloroso sherry seasoned oak casks from Jerez, Spain, our rich, fruity and full bodied ‘new make' spirit is transformed into an iconic single malt. Once filled, the maturing spirit remains undisturbed in the same casks for 18 years and is brought together in this rich and complex single malt characterized by mature oak, ginger and raisin flavours.
1 Bottle limit.

name: MACALLAN - SIR PETER BLAKE COLLABORATION AN ESTATE
nameSanitized: macallan - sir peter blake collaboration an estate
nameSuffix: SIR PETER BLAKE COLLABORATION AN ESTATE
sort: MACALLAN - SIR PETER BLAKE COLLABORATION AN ESTATE
tastingDescription: The Anecdotes of Ages Collection is an extraordinary art and whisky collaboration with globally renowned British pop artist, Sir Peter Blake. An Estate, A Community and A Distillery tells the story of some of the colourful characters from The Macallan's past and present and features a label digitally designed by Sir Peter himself. The Macallan Lead Whisky Maker, Sarah Burgess, was inspired by Sir Peter Blake's character to create a whisky classic in style with surprising notes of treacle and black pepper.

name: MACALLAN - THE HARMONY COLLECTION RICH CACAO
nameSanitized: macallan - the harmony collection rich cacao
sort: MACALLAN - THE HARMONY COLLECTION RICH CACAO
tastingDescription: Rich Cacao was created in collaboration with Jordi Roca, pastry chef of El Geller de Can Roca who is known for  extraordinary chocolate creations. The Macallan Whisky Maker Polly Logan created a whisky using sherry seasoned oak casks to deliver a rich dark chocolate flavour along with  honey, dates, vanilla and cinnamon notes. It was bottled at  44% ABV to create the perfect pairing with fine chocolate.

name: MACALLAN - TRIPLE CASK 12 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: The Macallan Triple Cask is a uniquely complex combination of oak casks that delivers the extraordinary smooth and delicate character of this single malt. Twelve years spent in a cask results in a vibrant malt busting with citrus fruits, vanilla, fresh oak flavors and a lighter color.

name: MAESTRO DOBEL
tastingDescription: The original Cristalino tequila. Made with 100% pure agave and formulated using a blend of Extra-A�ejo, A�ejo, and Reposado tequilas, it goes through a proprietary filtration process that selectively removes the colour, while preserving the tequila�s complexity and smoothness. Diamante is a complex mix of sweet flavours � caramel, honey and maple with nutty vanilla and mild wood tones from resting in barrels.

name: MAKER'S MARK
tastingDescription: Full, yet delicate and well-rounded on the nose, possessing the distinctive caramel aroma of charred oak with a hint of vanilla. Rich in flavour, yet soft on the palate this Bourbon is distinctive and complex and balanced. On the finish there is a lovely bittersweet impression of caramel, toffee and oak spice.

name: MAKER'S MARK - 101
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
"This attractively golden-hued whiskey shows the delicate aromas of orange peel, white pepper, and butterscotch. Upon tasting there is a gentle heat that gives ample zip to the smooth texture of baked apples, raw vanilla bean, crushed spices, and lightly charred oak."
93 pts, Excellent, Highly Recommended, Ultimate Spirits Challenge 2021

name: MAKER'S MARK - 46
tastingDescription: 94 Points - Excellent, Highly Recommended, Ultimate Spirits Challenge 2018, "As bold a bourbon as they come. The richest aromas of toasted vanilla bean, custard, and cinnamon stick are all apparent on the nose. Luxurious on the palate with baked peach cobbler, subtly piquant clove spice, and coffee with cream."

name: MAKER'S MARK - KENTUCKY BOURBON
tastingDescription: False

name: MAKER'S MARK - KENTUCKY BOURBON
tastingDescription: Made with winter wheat instead of rye in the mashbill, this bourbon is designed to be full flavoured but easy to drink, with no bitter or sharp edges

name: MAKER'S MARK - KENTUCKY BOURBON
tastingDescription: Full, yet delicate and well-rounded on the nose, possessing the distinctive caramel aroma of charred oak with a hint of vanilla. Rich in flavour, yet soft on the palate this Bourbon is distinctive and complex and balanced. On the finish there is a lovely bittersweet impression of caramel, toffee and oak spice.

name: MAKER'S MARK - PRIVATE SELECT 2018 RECIPE
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
Exclusive cask bottling for BC Liquor stores.
1 Bottle limit.

name: MAKER'S MARK PRIVATE SELECT
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
Exclusive cask bottling for BC Liquor stores.
1 Bottle limit.

name: MALFY - GIN CON ROSA
tastingDescription: Distilled with classic Juniper and then infused with Sicilian Pink Grapefruits and rhubarb – this is fresh and bright gin that is delightfully refreshing and perfect for a wide variety of cocktails.

name: MALIBU - COCONUT
tastingDescription: Malibu Coconut Rum is made in Barbados from quality ingredients, offering natural tasting coconut flavours. It's delicious on ice, mixed with soda or as an ingredient in a fruity cocktail.

name: MALIBU - COCONUT
tastingDescription: Malibu Coconut Rum is made in Barbados from quality ingredients, offering natural tasting coconut flavours. It's delicious on ice, mixed with soda or as an ingredient in a fruity cocktail.

name: MALIBU - COCONUT
tastingDescription: Malibu Coconut Rum is made in Barbados from quality ingredients, offering natural tasting coconut flavours. It's delicious on ice, mixed with soda or as an ingredient in a fruity cocktail.

name: MANNOCHMORE - 25 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: “Along with Auchroisk, Mannochmore is one of Diageo’s well-kept secrets. This 1990 distillate was matured in first-fill American oak hogsheads and European oak butts. Oily orange notes on the nose, plus vanilla, brittle toffee, and honey. The palate is substantial, rich, and sweet, with figs, sultanas, banana, and more honey, plus developing cloves. Raisins and plain chocolate in the long, spicy finish.” - Gavin Smith 2016

name: MAOTAI CHUN - BAI NIAN SHENG SHI
nameSanitized: maotai chun - bai nian sheng shi
sort: MAOTAI CHUN - BAI NIAN SHENG SHI
tastingDescription: This sauce-aroma Chinese Baijiu has an acidic taste at first, opening up into mushroom broth and fermented pineapple with a slight minerality and dried cacao in the distant. A long and delightful decrescendo of flavours finishing with a pomace-like flavour at the end.

name: MAOTAI CHUN ASTROLOGY EDITION
tastingDescription: Maotai Chun Astrology Edition is crafted using innovative manufacturing techniques over traditional sauce aromatic baijiu, to yield reduced sourness and enhanced sauce flavor. The soft sauce flavor is refreshingly mellow and clean with the aroma of apple and pear.

name: MARASCHINO - LUXARDO
tastingDescription: Luxardo Maraschino follows the original recipe from 1821 and requires four years to produce this specialty. Marasca cherries are harvested from Luxardo’s own trees and the solid components are then infused in larchwood. Perfume: typical of marasca distillate, with an excellent intense aroma, fine and well amalgamated. Taste: smooth but sharp, a sweet liqueur unusual for the punch of the distillate. A rounded taste and a surprisingly persistent aroma.

name: MARCEL TREPOUT - MILLESIME ARMAGNAC 1991
tastingDescription: False

name: MARCEL TREPOUT - MILLESIME ARMAGNAC 2001
tastingDescription: False

name: MARQUIS DE VILLARD V.S.O.P.
tastingDescription: An elegant blend of eaux-de-vie, aged in oak, with flavours of pear, butterscotch, dark chocolate and even a hint of maple sugar. Enjoy as a digestive, an aperitif, neat or with water, on the rocks or in a cocktail.

name: MARTELL - BLUE SWIFT COGNAC
tastingDescription:
“Enticing aromas of candied pear, honey, pastry and caramel. In the mouth the flavours play between burnt orange and linden tea, with hints of baking spices running throughout.”
93 Points - Ultimate Spirits Challenge 2018

name: MARTELL - VS SINGLE DISTILLERY FINE COGNAC
nameSanitized: martell - vs single distillery fine cognac
sort: MARTELL - VS SINGLE DISTILLERY FINE COGNAC
tastingDescription: Martell VSSD: Among the great cognac houses, only Martell distills exclusively wines that have been cleared of all sediments, revealing the luscious fruit aromas and finesse that are our hallmarks. Tasting notes: Martell VS Single Distillery delivers an easy, smooth and fruity blend, with plum, apricot and candied lemon aromas. It is fruity, luscious, round and sweet on the palate.

name: MARTELL X.O.
tastingDescription: With its dominant characteristic of Grande and Petite Champagne, Martell XO offers a pleasant body and structure in the mouth for great cognac lovers to enjoy. A spicy, rich crescendo starting with the mellow elegance of the Borderies, followed by the intensity and finesse typical of Grande Champagne eaux-de-vie.

name: MARTELL- CORDON BLEU EXTRA OLD
tastingDescription: Martell Cordon Bleu Extra is defined by its remarkable roundness with intense candied fruit aromas. Martell Cordon Bleu Extra can be enjoyed neat and on the rocks.

name: MARY-LE-BONE - DRY GIN
tastingDescription: Thomas Greenall founded Greenalls in 1762 - at a time when London's Marylebone Pleasure Gardens were in full swing. Turns out distilling was in Thomas' blood, as it has proved to be for his son, his grandson�all the way down through eight generations to Johnny Neill, who carries the family torch forward today. Marylebone London Dry Gin is made today in London by the Pleasure Gardens Distilling Co., using a combination of botanicals including juniper, lime flower, lemon balm, clove, liquorice, chamomile and grapefruit.

name: MASAHIRO - PURE MALT WHISKY
tastingDescription:
From one of the oldest and largest distilleries in Okinawa, Masahiro Pure Malt Whisky is aged in sherry and bourbon barrels before finished in Jack Daniel's first-filled bourbon barrel. Okinawa's humid and warm subtropical climate and the Pacific Ocean breeze help accelerate the cask maturation, creating a rich and balanced flavor with hints of tropical fruit. It's a light body and a delicate malt, with a
hint of ginger juice and white woody flavour with a finishing of mellow sweetness followed by a lingering spicy taste.

name: MASSENEZ - GOLDEN 8 LIQUER
tastingDescription: Aromas of a freshly picked pear, almost candied or in the form of jam, before revealing delicate, caramelized vanilla notes, merging into the light cascades of the eau-de-vie that brought it to life: a Massenez Pear Liqueur aged for more than 8 years.

name: MATSUI - SINGLE MALT MIZUNARA CASK
tastingDescription:
"Very pale, fresh whisky, with lychee, fresh pear, morning dew, apple notes, and just a dash of salt and white pepper. It's a honeyed and thick dram on the palate,... then late bittersweet citrus that attempts to dampen down the jackhammer of pepper. Enjoyable weight, texture, and flavors... "
90 Points, Whisky Advocate 2019

name: MATSUI - THE HAKUTO PREMIUM GIN
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
"A complex gin that starts rather smoky, with a tangle of peppercorn, coriander, and savory tea, eventually getting a lift from citrus zest and Juniper as well. This is a thought-provoking gin with a lithe body that could do well in stirred drinks or as a straightforward neat pour."
92 pts, Excellent, Highly Recommended, Ultimate Spirits Challenge 2021

name: MATTHEW GLOAG - NAKED MALT
tastingDescription: 96 Points - Extraordinary, Ultimate Recommendation - Ultimate Spirits Challenge 2018, "Saltine cracker and wheat cereal dominate the nose, with aromas of fresh butter shining through. Smooth and round in the mouth, the pillowy texture complements the soft flavors of bran muffin with hints of toasted coffee and cream."

name: MATTHEW GLOAG - THE FAMOUS GROUSE
tastingDescription: Allegedly Scotland's favourite and best-selling blended whisky, Famous Grouse, named for Scotland's iconic red grouse, contains The Macallan and Highland Park scotches. Light and easy-drinking, The Famous Grouse is pleasantly peaty and malty with toffee, mild spice, flowers, apples and citrus. Mix or enjoy neat.

name: MATTHEW GLOAG - THE FAMOUS GROUSE
tastingDescription: Allegedly Scotland’s favourite and best-selling blended whisky, Famous Grouse, named for Scotland’s iconic red grouse, contains The Macallan and Highland Park scotches. Light and easy-drinking, The Famous Grouse is pleasantly peaty and malty with toffee, mild spice, flowers, apples and citrus. Mix or enjoy neat.

name: MCAFEE'S - BENCHMARK NO 8 BOURBON
tastingDescription: The nose bears caramel notes with a delicate stone fruit backdrop. A robust and sturdy palate with some fine leather notes mingling with dry tobacco, a touch of oak and a hint of dried cherries. The finish is smooth and calming.

name: MCCLELLANDS - HIGHLAND
tastingDescription: Highland malts capture the true spirit of Scotland; the moorlands, heather and fresh pint forests - rounded, firm and fruity.

name: MCCLELLANDS - ISLAY
tastingDescription: Famous throughout the world for their peaty character and dry finish, the Islay dram is the unmistakable taste of Scotland.

name: MCCLELLANDS - SPEYSIDE
tastingDescription: Speyside malts are sweet and fruity; sometimes delicate, sometimes rich and robust. Always complex.

name: MCGUINNESS - BLUE CURACAO
tastingDescription: Bright neon blue colour wiht natual orange rind aromas and a pleasant, sweet lingering orange flavour.� 15% ABV.

name: MCGUINNESS - CREME DE BANANE
tastingDescription: Bright yellow colour with candied banana aromoas and sweet banand flavour.� 15% ABV.

name: MCGUINNESS - PEACH SCHNAPPS
tastingDescription: Water clear in appearance with aromas and flavours of ripe canned peaches.� Sweet with a medium long finish.� 15% ABV.

name: MCGUINNESS PEACH SCHNAPPS
tastingDescription: Fresh market peaches are available from May through September. McGuinness Peach Schnapps bottles up the fresh fruit flavour so it can be enjoyed all year round.

name: MCGUINNESS PEPPERMINT SCHNAPPS
tastingDescription: With its sweet candy cane flavour, McGuinness Peppermint Schnapps is a festive choice for putting the fresh in refreshing.

name: MELON - BOLS
tastingDescription: Bols Melon is a light emerald green liqueur based on the honeydew melon. It has a uniquely crisp and fruity finish.

name: MENTHE PASTILLE - GIFFARD
tastingDescription: False

name: MERMAID - SMALL BATCH GIN
tastingDescription: False

name: MERSER AND CO - RUM
tastingDescription: The palate is mouth coating,  warming and generous, with soft notes of vanilla, more of that tropical fruit and some wine-like notes created through the cask maturation process. The toasty oak returns on the finish alongside sweet vanilla and  hints of pastry cream.

name: METAXA - 7 STAR
tastingDescription: Medium amber colour; floral aromas with hints of orange peel, plums, spice and vanilla; sweet notes on the palate with a long intense finish.

name: METHOD AND MADNESS - SINGLE GRAIN WHISKEY
nameSanitized: method and madness - single grain whiskey
sort: METHOD AND MADNESS - SINGLE GRAIN WHISKEY
tastingDescription: New pencil shavings, light rose petal, fresh rain on pine on the nose. On the palate, warm toasted oak, fresh peeled grapefruit, zesty wood spices that finishes with sweet cereal, clove spiciness and fresh mint.

name: MEUKOW COGNAC - VSOP RED EDITION
tastingDescription: This cognac is rich, smooth and satisfying with flavours of caramel, orange, wood spice and some delicate cocoa and dried flower on the finish

name: MICHTER'S - TOASTED BARREL FINISH BOURBON
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
First introduced to great acclaim in the Fall of 2014, Michter's US*1 Toasted Barrel Finish Bourbon is a groundbreaking whiskey expression. It is made by taking Michter's US*1 Kentucky Straight Bourbon and then aging it for an additional period in a second custom-made barrel. This second barrel is assembled from 18-month air-dried wood and then toasted but not charred. Expect campfire and cinnamon notes with pecan and candied fruit plus a lingering finish of baked pears, vanilla and marshmallow. 
1 Bottle limit.

name: MICHTER'S - US *1 SINGLE BARREL STRAIGHT RYE
nameSanitized: michters - us *1 single barrel straight rye
sort: MICHTER'S - US *1 SINGLE BARREL STRAIGHT RYE
tastingDescription: False

name: MICHTERS - 10 YEAR OLD KENTUCKY STRAIGHT BOURBON
nameSanitized: michters - 10 year old kentucky straight bourbon
sort: MICHTERS - 10 YEAR OLD KENTUCKY STRAIGHT BOURBON
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
“There’s evident age here, with dried leaves, old suede jacket, and dusty oak at the forefront, but underlying that maturity is plenty of dried fruit, figs, and cola. It pours broad and mouth filling, exuding both power and grace as it delivers caramel, tobacco, and a mélange of baking spices—cloves and nutmeg. The solid wood structure and oak tannins are here in abundance, but never out of balance.” 
92 Points - Whisky Advocate 2018

name: MICHTERS - 10 YEAR OLD KENTUCKY STRAIGHT RYE
nameSanitized: michters - 10 year old kentucky straight rye
sort: MICHTERS - 10 YEAR OLD KENTUCKY STRAIGHT RYE
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
"Concord grape juice, leather armchair, cola syrup, iced tea, roasted pecans, and furniture polish on the nose. The palate is deeply fruity, with cooked cherries, blackberries, Concord grape jelly, Coca-Cola, dark chocolate, silky baking spice, and white pepper, with a lush and velvety texture. A complex finish of bitter chocolate, peanut shell, Dr. Pepper, and leathery oak rounds things out."
93 pts, Whisky Advocate 2019
1 Bottle limit.

name: MICHTERS - US 1 SMALL BATCH BOURBON
tastingDescription: 90-95 Points, Wine Enthusiast - "The bouquet has a dry, grainy aroma which is accented by peppery/spicy scents. The palate entry is surprisingly sweet and corny, considering how dry the aroma is; the midpalate point is deep, corny sweet, sap-like and a bit syrupy. Ends up well and balanced, with a backnote of dried red fruit (raisins, prunes).“ (December 2007)

name: MIDLETON - BARRY CROCKETT LEGACY SINGLE POT STILL
nameSanitized: midleton - barry crockett legacy single pot still
nameSuffix: BARRY CROCKETT LEGACY SINGLE POT STILL
sort: MIDLETON - BARRY CROCKETT LEGACY SINGLE POT STILL
tastingDescription:
"This is mastery of American oak!... , allspice, and paprika, and a riot of mostly overripe fruit: custard apple, mango, brown banana, baked apricot dessert, and fresh fig. Caramel, date slices, treacle, and cracker bread flavors are bathed in feisty pot still spices and fleeting green apple, before a lush, rich sweetness... The finish is seemingly eternal."
95 points, Whisky Advocate 2018

name: MIDLETON - VERY RARE 2021
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
"A fruity nose offers up hints of bramble, aloe and vanilla custard. Toasted apple pie notes emerge on the palate, with delicious golden cereal flavours and cool creaminess leading into a wonderfully nutty finish. Fabulously assertive, complex and harmonious."
95 pts, International Wine & Spirit Competition 2021

name: MIDLETON - VERY RARE BOTTLED 2016
tastingDescription: This year's liquid missive from head distiller Brian Nation has a nose of caramel, macaroons, and beeswax with green, grassy notes. The first sip evokes barley sugar, which grows into a citrus glow, nourished by some green oak and a little white pepper. It has lovely poise this year, effortlessly lighter on the tongue than the 2015 or 2014 creations. The conclusion is slightly nutty with soothing oak.

name: MIGUEL TORRES - 10
tastingDescription: Aged in oak barrels using the traditional Solera system this shows all the character of a mature brandy. Dark topaz colour with noble old gold glints. On the nose, it shows candied fruits, wrapped in sensual aromas of vanilla, cinnamon and nutmeg. On the

name: MINOR CASE - STRAIGHT RYE
tastingDescription:
The nose has earthy and sweet sherry notes. Hints of sweet butterscotch grace the palate. It finishes smooth with hints of dried fruits.
Gold Medal, San Fransico Spirits Competiton 2019

name: MONKEY 47 - SCHWARZWALD DRY GIN
tastingDescription:
“If ever a gin deserve 100 points, it’s that. Very attractive nose with typical London Dry characters with some slight spicy notes. Crisp and fresh on the nose and equally so in the mouth. Some tangy notes in the mouth add extra freshness to the traditional characters. Fairly complex. Good balance of all components and racy, fresh finish.”
100 Points – Robert Parker
375 ml

name: MONKEY SHOULDER
tastingDescription: A bold and versatile, premium-blended 100% Malt Scotch Whisky. Richness and vibrancy combine with fruity aromas and smooth mellow vanilla notes making Monkey Shoulder the ideal introduction to Scotch Whisky. Perfect for mixing, enjoy in a Lazy Old Fashioned and your favourite whisky cocktails. Voted Drink�s International�s Top Trending Scotch for the fifth year in a row. (2015-2019)

name: MONTELOBOS - MEZCAL JOVEN
tastingDescription: False

name: MOONLIGHT - PREMIUM SHOCHU
tastingDescription: Smooth and soft, this shochu goes down well on it's own, over ice or mixed with a splash of hot water. Easy to create amazing cocktails with this light, clean tasting vodka-style spirit.

name: MORRISON AND MACKAY - OLD PERTH 23YO
tastingDescription: Exclusive cask bottling for BC Liquor Stores. This very special single cask of blended malt has a luscious and buttery aroma with hints of cedar, hazelnut and ripe stone fruit. It is warming on the palate with a gorgeous mouth feel of butterscotch, vanilla and shortbread with a soft lengthy finish.

name: MORTLACH PRIVATE COLLECTION 1954 - GORDON AND MACPHAIL
nameSanitized: mortlach private collection 1954 - gordon and macphail
sort: MORTLACH PRIVATE COLLECTION 1954 - GORDON AND MACPHAIL
tastingDescription: Dessert in a glass. Stewed plums with thick orange marmalade topped with spun brown sugar. Dark chocolate gateaux joins morello cherries steeped in syrup. Hazelnut praline complements notes of vanilla. In time, freshly roasted coffee beans and soft wood tannins offer richer undertones. On the finish, hints of aged leather with a gentle nutty edge slowly fade to mature oak nuances. Distilled in 1954 and bottled in 2019, only 286 bottles produced. Cask #491

name: MOSSTOWIE 1979 - GORDON AND MACPHAIL 25TH ANNIVERSARY
tastingDescription: Fragrant vanilla pod and butterscotch aromas lead to candied peel and hedgerow blossom. Leather and stewed apple notes come to the fore alongside blackcurrant leaves. Flavours of black pepper complement spiced grapefruit and subtle sherry influences. Dark

name: MOUNT GAY - ECLIPSE
tastingDescription: Bright medium amber colour; fragrant aromas of molasses, white raisin, caramel, vanilla and clove. On the palate, it is full-bodied and warming, with flavours of Demerara sugar, candied ginger, caramel and vanilla spice that linger on a long finish.

name: MR JONES - PREMIUM VODKA
tastingDescription: Made in the ski-town of Revelstoke, BC in small batches using pristine mountain water.� This triple international award-winning premium vodka has a smooth, clean, authentic taste. Mix it in your own signature cocktail or serve it neat and tidy.�Mr. Jones is sure to impress.�

name: MUHAK - WHITE GOOD DAY SOJU
tastingDescription: Also known as Korean vodka, it has a very smooth taste. It’s a clear distilled liquor made from rice and the most popular type of alcoholic drink in Korea.

name: MUHAK - WHITE SOJU
tastingDescription: False

name: NEMIROFF - DELUXE VODKA
tastingDescription: This award-winning vodka has clean, crisp aromatics on the nose with hints of apple, lemon peel and mint. Smooth and full-bodied with hints of spice, citrus, vanilla and apple leads to a long, dry finish.  Perfect in Martinis or Mules, and more complex cocktails.  Try with smoked fish or brie-topped crostini.

name: NEW AMSTERDAM - PINK WHITNEY VODKA
tastingDescription: The Pink Whitney is New Amsterdam Vodka infused with fresh pink lemonade flavour creating the perfect balance of sweetness, natural lemon zest, and a clean, refreshing taste.

name: NEW AMSTERDAM - PINK WHITNEY VODKA
tastingDescription: The spittin' chiclets crew has taken over New Amsterdam Vodka to create a spirit inspired by Ryan Whitney's favourite drink: award-winning New Amsterdam Vodka mixed with fresh pink lemonade. The result is an exceptionally smooth great-tasting pink lemonade flavoured vodka.

name: NEW AMSTERDAM VODKA NO 525
tastingDescription: Five times distilled for unparalleled smoothness, filtered three times for a clean, crisp finish. Slightly sweet on the palate, making it smooth enough to drink straight, yet distinctive enough to enhance any cocktail.

name: NEW AMSTERDAM VODKA NO 525
tastingDescription: Premium 80 proof vodka made from some of the ­nest quality grains from America’s heartland. Five times distilled for unparalleled smoothness, filtered three times for a clean, crisp ­finish. New Amsterdam Vodka is slightly sweet on the palate- making it smooth enough to drink straight, yet distinctive enough to enhance any cocktail.

name: NIKKA - COFFEY GIN
tastingDescription: From one of the biggest names in Japanese whisky comes Nikka Coffey Gin. This gin’s complexity is achieved through the perfect balance between 11 selected botanicals and the silky texture of Coffey distillates. The bright and zesty aroma originates from four Japanese citruses, Yuzu, Kabosu, Amanatsu and Shequasar, to compliment the traditional gin botanicals. There is also a touch of apples, followed by pleasantly tangy hints of green Japanese Sansho pepper to make this a true highly recommended sipping gin.

name: NIKKA - COFFEY MALT WHISKY
tastingDescription: Nikka operates two "Coffey" type column stills (named after its inventor Aeneas Coffey) within the Miyagikyo distillery for the production of its grain whiskies. Imported from Scotland in 1963, these old stills yield a distillate with more flavour and depth than modern column stills, imparting a distinct character that defines the house blends. The Nikka Coffey Malt, a rare 100% malt bottling, is the result of this continuous distillation process and offers surprisingly rich texture with notes of clementine, praline and vanilla cream.

name: NIKKA - COFFEY VODKA
tastingDescription: This refined vodka is the purest expression of the signature "Coffey Stills" which produce Nikka Whisky's outstanding grain whiskies. With decades of experience in distilling white spirits as well as whisky, Nikka's vodka perfectly captures the extremely smooth and delicate taste of the Coffey-distilled corn and barley spirits.

name: NIKKA - DAYS
tastingDescription:
"An accomplished blend packed with appealing flavors... Honey, baked lemon, vanilla essence, brioche, golden syrup, and spring tree blossom aromas, with hints of butterscotch and caramel. Smooth, rich, and rounded, this has toffee, chocolate, red berry fruit, plum, vanilla pod, a touch of oak char, and clipped spices. A flash of peat smoke on the finish, with flavors of burnt sugar, baked fruits, and spices."
89 Points, Whisky Advocate 2020

name: NIKKA - FROM THE BARREL
tastingDescription: #1 Whisky of 2018 and 94 Points, Whisky Advocate - "Notably balanced and elegant, the colourful palette of whiskies combines for tremendous depth of flavour. Soft, sweet butterscotch and orange peel meet poached pears and stone fruits. Earthiness appears as dried autumn leaves, coffee, old oak, and tobacco." (December 2018)

name: NIKKA - MIYAGIKYO SINGLE MALT
tastingDescription: Located in the valley of Miyagi, a region in the north of Japan's Honshu island known for its pure air and the quality of its natural springs, the Miyagikyo distillery produces a refined malt whisky with a signature fruity and floral freshness. The single malt Miyagikyo bottling represents the perfect expression of the distillery's delicate character, with an emphasis on ex-sherry casks for maturation to bring added depth to this whisky's natural charm.

name: NIKKA - MIYAGIKYO SINGLE MALT PEATED DISCOVERY SERIES 2021
nameSanitized: nikka - miyagikyo single malt peated discovery series 2021
nameSuffix: MIYAGIKYO SINGLE MALT PEATED DISCOVERY SERIES 2021

tastingDescription: Available starting November 13th in select stores

name: NIKKA - SUPER RARE OLD
tastingDescription: One of Nikka’s classic brands in Japan that launched in 1962, the Super Nikka was crafted in honour of Rita Taketsuru who passed away the previous year. This blend of Yoichi and Myagikyo malt with Coffey grain whisky provides a subtle harmony of fruit with light peat and sherry cask notes.

name: NIKKA - TAKETSURU PURE MALT
tastingDescription: As a disciplined craftsman, Masataka Taketsuru always searched of perfection in the art of blending his whiskies, a trait that inspired Nikka to create the Taketsuru Pure Malt. This whisky is a blend of casks from Nikka’s two distilleries, and showcases an exquisite balance between the smoky and peaty character of Yoichi with the fruity and floral elegance of Miyagikyo.

name: NIKKA - YOICHI SINGLE MALT
tastingDescription: Nikka Whisky's first distillery and guardian of their tradition, Yoichi is located on the coast of Hokkaido. A subtle blend of Yoichi casks of various ages, of which a large portion was matured in ex-sherry casks, the perfect representative of Nikka's historic single malt expresses a delicate balance between smoky, fruity and floral aromas with refined coastal and peat notes.

name: NIKKA - YOICHI SINGLE MALT NON-PEATED DISCOVERY SERIES 2021

name: NOLET - KETEL ONE
tastingDescription: Ketel One is a crisp and clean vodka with subtle citrus aromas and flavours, the perfect base for any cocktail.

name: NOLET - KETEL ONE
tastingDescription: Ketel One Vodka is exquisitely balanced in flavour, silky in mouth feel with a subtle fragrance of citrus and honey, and lively tingle to finish. The nearest to a handcrafted vodka as you're going to get.

name: NORTHERN KEEP - VODKA
tastingDescription: Distilled 5 times for exceptional smoothness using a mix of the finest Canadian rye for hints of citrus and light spiciness, and winter wheat for subtle sweetness.

name: O'DARBY - IRISH CREAM
tastingDescription: Coffee and cream colour; sweet milk chocolate aroma; slightly lighter body.

name: O.F.C - BOURBON WHISKEY 1995 VINTAGE
tastingDescription:
Colonel E.H. Taylor Jr. christened the O.F.C. Distillery in 1870 and this legendary whiskey brand has been revered ever since. Each hand-cut crystal bottle is vintage-dated according to the specific year in which the bourbon was distilled. Tasting notes for this bourbon describe cherry cordial on the nose followed by caramel and slightly smoked oak. Dark chocolate, tobacco leaves and dates are found on the palate, followed by a lingering finish of leather, black pepper and cinnamon.
1 Bottle limit.

name: OBAN - 14 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: Gold Medal, San Francisco World Spirit Competition 2016. One of Scotland’s oldest and smallest distilleries, Oban was built in 1794; the West Highland port city of the same name has grown around it. Oban is the one Single Malt Scotch Whisky in which the rich, complex flavours of the Highlands meet and mingle with the peaty, maritime character of the Islands.

name: OBAN - DISTILLERS EDITION
tastingDescription: Gold Medal, San Francisco World Spirits Competition 2011. The Oban Distillers Edition is double-matured in Montilla Fino cask wood, its dry, sea-laced flavours expertly selected to release a complex, slumbering giant, which has a rich fruitiness that cleverly accentuates this graceful coastal malt's salty sea breezes.

name: OBAN - LITTLE BAY
tastingDescription: 92 Points, Whisky Advocate - “Finally, an unimpeachable counterpoint to the rally cry against no age statement whisky. Oban Little Bay is everything that Oban 14 is, and more. A rich, fruity, malty nose showcases dried apricot, dark chocolate, and salt. On the palate, Little Bay explodes with flavor, combining malt with orange, chocolate, and blackberry. Clove and oak spice join the party in the mid-palate, which shows superb balance and integration. A long, slightly dry, citrusy spice finish caps off a stunning whisky.” (Fall 2015)

name: OCEAN - HAWAII SEA SPIRITS
tastingDescription: Made from organic cane sugar, sustainably farmed, and water sourced from 3,000 feet below sea level just off the coast of Hawaii, this vodka is exceptionally smooth

name: OLD EZRA 7 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription:
"Sensationally rounded with upfront woody characters reinforcing distinctive hazelnut, leather and oak notes. Well balanced with vanilla toffee sweetness and crème brûlée elegance. Very dry with an enduring peanut skin dominant finish."
97 pts, International Wine & Spirit Competition 2021
1 Bottle limit.

name: OLD FORESTER - 100 PROOF 2021
tastingDescription: A rather sweet and unctuous dram, this 100 proof bottling delivers bold flavors of fresh lumber, new leather, flamed orange oil, and pencil lead. The finish is dry and pleads for sweet vermouth to make a solid Manhattan.

tastingDescription:
Barrels were stored in the small Warehouse B and larger Warehouse J, on the 5th and 8th floors respectively. The upper floor locations exposed the barrels to a great degree of heat during the summer months resulting in a rich, complex maturation profile. The result is bourbon filled with rich caramel layers with a combination of milk and dark chocolate notes dusted with brown sugar. A sprinkling of brown spice and a hint of orange peel round out the sweet character.
1 Bottle limit.

name: OLD FORESTER - SIGNATURE 86 PROOF

The finish is clean and soft, with lingering candied flavours.

name: OLD TOMS - EGG NOG
tastingDescription: It must be the holidays when the Nog comes out. This one is smooth, creamy and filled with vanilla, rum and raisin.

name: OLE SMOKY - APPLE PIE MOONSHINE
tastingDescription: Ole Smoky Apple Pie Moonshine conjures up memories of warm apple pie on a cool summer evening and goes down just as easy.

tastingDescription: Moonshine is as American as apple pie. So it only made sense to blend pure apple juice, ground cinnamon, and other spices with our whiskey to create Ole Smoky Apple Pie Moonshine. This delicious combination of flavours can conjure up memories of warm apple pie on a cool summer evening, and goes down just as easy.

name: OLE SMOKY - BUTTER PECAN MOONSHINE
tastingDescription: Sometimes the only way to improve on a classic is to add moonshine. We took the undeniably delicious flavors of butter, cream, toasted pecans, and caramel and blended them all up with Ole Smoky moonshine. The result was nothing short of heavenly.

name: OLE SMOKY - MOONSHINE PEACHES
tastingDescription: Dip in and grab one of those succulent, moonshine-infused peaches and experience a sweet little slice of heaven. After they're gone, it leaves just enough moonshine to make a summer sangria that pairs perfectly with sunshine.

name: OLE SMOKY - MOONSHINE PICKLES

name: OLMECA - ALTOS PLATA
tastingDescription: Clear in colour, with herbal notes of cooked agave and a light citric aroma with sweet tones on the nose. It is sweet to the mouth with citrus notes like lime, lemon, and agave. The after taste is pleasant and long lasting.

name: OLMECA - GOLD
tastingDescription: This tequila has a fruity, sweet, slight citrus aroma with a touch of smoke and slightly woody scent. Sweet with slight honey flavour and smoky, black pepper nuances, it is clean and balanced!

name: OLMECA - SILVER
tastingDescription: Olmeca Silver has a fresh herbal scent, green pepper, with a soft citric note at the end. It has a sweet, slightly smoky, with a final soft honey flavour.

name: OUZO - TSANTALIS
tastingDescription: The distilled anise dominates the nose and palate at first. The mouthfeel is robust, yet offers a very elegant, rather creamy coating sensation and a lovely warmth due to the alcohol levels. Although anise seems to head, the rest of the natural aromatics—linden blossom, coriander, cardamom—bring in more complexity and finesse, thus create the perfect balance and enhance the food-friendly character. When water or ice is added, the crystal clear color gives its place to a rich, milky-white color without losing any of the aromas and flavors.

name: PADDY - IRISH WHISKEY
tastingDescription: A triple-distilled blend of grain, malt and pot still whiskies, Paddy is soft and approachable, with mild cereal maltiness, delicately sweet floral flavours and hints of spice, honey, vanilla and wood.

name: PARALYZER MIX - POTTER'S
tastingDescription: A perfect combination of vodka and coffee Liqueur. Easy to make restaurant quality Paralyzers; simply add ice cola and milk.

name: PARKER'S HERITAGE COLLECTION 14TH EDITION - HEAVY CHAR BOURB

tastingDescription:
"Comforting nose of pipe tobacco, warm maple syrup, blueberry preserves, and toasted cinnamon sticks. Deceptively smooth considering it's high ABV, baking spice, sweet smoke, and pecan pie charge forward into a long finish with suggestions of smoked, peppered beef. An incredible Bourbon."
94 pts, Excellent, Highly Recommended, Ultimate Spirits Challenge 2021
1 Bottle limit.

name: PASTIS DE MARSEILLE 45 - RICARD
tastingDescription: This iconic liqueur was first made in 1932 by 23-year old entrepreneur Paul Ricard from star anise, green anise licorice and Provencal herbs. Anise-flavoured it's slightly bitter smooth and mellow. Traditionally pastis is mixed with water which turns the transparent yellow liquid milky.

name: PATRON - ANEJO
tastingDescription: Handcrafted from the finest 100% Weber Blue Agave, carefully distilled in small batches in Jalisco, Mexico. Patrón Añejo is aged in French, Hungarian and American oak barrels for at least 1 year. Similar to winemaking, each batch is carefully crafted to produce a smooth, oaky tequila with distinct hints of vanilla, raisin and honey.

name: PATRON - REPOSADO
tastingDescription: Handcrafted from the finest 100% Weber Blue Agave, carefully distilled in small batches in Jalisco, Mexico. Patrón Reposado offer tequila drinkers complexity and smoothness. Aged in oak barrels for at least 2 months, creating notes of fruit, citrus and honey. Clean and fresh agave notes combine with smooth and sweet oaky notes.

name: PATRON - SILVER
tastingDescription: Handcrafted from the finest 100% Weber Blue Agave, carefully distilled in small batches in Jalisco, Mexico. The fresh agave aromas and hints of citrus make Patrón Silver a favourite of tequila connoisseurs. Its smooth and sweet taste with a light pepper finish mixes flawlessly in an array of cocktails.

name: PATRON - SILVER
tastingDescription: Handcrafted from the finest 100% Weber Blue Agave, carefully distilled in small batches in Jalisco, Mexico. The fresh agave aromas and hints of citrus make Patrón Silver a favourite of tequila connoisseurs. Its smooth and sweet taste with a light pepper finish mixes flawlessly in an array of cocktails.

name: PATRON - SILVER
tastingDescription: Handcrafted from the finest 100% Weber Blue Agave, carefully distilled in small batches in Jalisco, Mexico. The fresh agave aromas and hints of citrus make Patron Silver a favourite of tequila connoisseurs. Its smooth and sweet taste with a light pepper finish mixes flawlessly in an array of cocktails.

name: PATRON - X.O. CAFE
tastingDescription: Patrón XO Cafe is dry, not sweet as with most low-proof coffee liqueurs. Intense aromas of fresh coffee, chocolate & vanilla. Flavours of dark roast coffee, chocolate and light tequila. Its smooth finish makes it excellent for sipping, as a premium cocktail ingredient, or as a unique and delicious dessert topping.

name: PAUL JOHN - MITHUNA INDIAN SINGLE MALT
nameSanitized: paul john - mithuna indian single malt
sort: PAUL JOHN - MITHUNA INDIAN SINGLE MALT
tastingDescription:
Unpeated, non chill-filtered, matured in American virgin oak casks and finished in ex-bourbon casks, this whisky opens with sophisticated aromas of liquorice, beeswax, ulmo honey on crisp toast and vanilla. Chewy flavours of coffee mocha, orange peel and delicate spice float on active tannins while gentle oils enjoy gists of dark cocoa tones. The finish is gratifyingly long and complex with multi-toned sugars and delicate honeys.
Double Gold, San Francisco World Spirits Competition 2021

name: PEACH - DR. MCGILLICUDDY'S
tastingDescription: This clear, colourless peach schnapps has a ripe peach aroma and a sweet, fresh peach flavour. Perfect as a chilled sipper, it is very versatile, adding rich flavour to fresh fruit juices, punches and desserts.

name: PENDERYN - SHERRYWOOD
