name: PENDLETON
tastingDescription: Celebrating the spirit of the Rodeo Cowboy, Pendleton is minimum 3 year aged American oak Canadian Whisky only using the finest ingredients. Aromatics of burnt marshmallow, caramel, rye bread, and flavours of caramelized sugar, oak, vanilla, ending off with a semi-sweet finish. Best enjoyed neat or with your favorite mixer.

name: PERNOD - PERNOD FILS
tastingDescription: This aniseed aperitif was created in France as a replacement for the banned absinthe, and it quickly became a massive success in its own right. Serve diluted with ice-cold water.

name: PERSIAN EMPIRE -  ARAK SAGGI
tastingDescription: Ontario's Persian Empire Distillery is the only North American producer of this classic Persian drink distilled from raisins. Enjoy it chilled neat, or in many of your favourite cocktails.

name: PIKE CREEK - 10 YEAR OLD DOUBLE BARRELLED

tastingDescription: Polished copper in colour. This whisky delivers rich aromas of golden raisins and brown sugar with subtle hints of dried orange peel, green apples, and vanilla. On the palate, it is smooth and round with sweet honeycomb toffee and subtle island spices. The finish is warm and pleasant. Best enjoyed neat, on the rocks, or in a classic Manhattan cocktail.

tastingDescription: Strength: 45% ABV. Colour: polished brass. Nose: instant green apple, honey, subtle rye spices, nutmeg, dried fruits and wood shavings. Body: light, smooth, and crisp. Palate: toasted toffee, French vanilla, caramel, and marzipan. Finish: lingering vanilla yet drying.

name: PIMMS - NO. 1 CUP

name: PINNACLE

name: PISCO - CAPEL PREMIUM
tastingDescription: This natural grape spirit has been aged for up to six months then distilled in crystal clear water from the Andes Mountains. Its delicate bouquet and versatile quality make it ideal for food-friendly cocktails such as a lychee pisco martini.

name: PISCO EL GOBERNADOR - MIGUEL TORRES CHILE
nameSanitized: pisco el gobernador - miguel torres chile
sort: PISCO EL GOBERNADOR - MIGUEL TORRES CHILE
tastingDescription: Brilliantly clean and clear, this truly premium Chilean Pisco is the distillate of Rose Muscatel and Muscatel of Alexandria grape varieties. It has an exuberant floral scent with notes of roses and jasmine, in addition to candied citrus peels. On the palate, it is appetizing and generously textured, featuring more citrus peel and herbs with a long and persistent finish. Incredibly versatile for today's modern cocktails.

name: PITTYVAICH - 25 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: Distilled in 1989. From Pittyvaich, a short-lived and closed Speyside distillery rarely seen as a single malt. This bottling has lived longer than the distillery itself. Treacle toffee cut by green apple crispness: sweet and cooling, with light acidity, a warm nuttiness, a balancing sharpness.

name: PITTYVAICH - 30 YO SPECIAL RELEASE 2020
tastingDescription:

92 pts, Whisky Advocate 2020

The result is a profound structure spiced with notes of cinnamon and clove, whose smoky quality adds texture. An ideal companion for cocktails.

name: POIRE WILLIAM - GIFFARD

name: POLAR ICE

Distinctive floral aromas, without being overpowering, prelude a taste bursting with refreshing pine and citrus balanced by mild spice.

name: PORT ASKAIG - 100 PROOF ISLAY SINGLE MALT

name: POTTER'S
tastingDescription: Produced from fine western prairie grains, we create a quality spirit using only the purest mountain spring water. Distilled to reflect the traditional Easter European style vodka, Potters Vodka is polished to precision through careful filtration.

name: POTTER'S
tastingDescription: Produced from fine western prairie grains, we create a quality spirit using only the purest mountain spring water. Distilled to reflect the traditional Easter European style vodka, Potters Vodka is polished to precision through careful filtration.

name: POTTERS-SPECIAL OLD
tastingDescription: Potter's Special Old Rye Whisky is a Canadian corn-based whisky which has been aged in charred American White Oak barrels. Light vanilla and honey nose with a generous spice bite to the taste, finishing with a gentle smoothness. A classic traditional Canadian Rye whisky.

name: PRINCE IGOR EXTREME VODKA
tastingDescription: False

name: PROCLAMATION - IRISH WHISKY
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
Proclamation is tripled-distilled and matured in bourbon casks and blended with a touch of sherry-finished malt. The nose reveals ripe Williams pear, apricot and crème brûlée notes, followed by rich custard, freshly brewed cappuccino and woody notes. On the palate are flavours of toasted brioche, freshly baked pastry and overtones of macerated yellow fruits. The finish is smooth and cream with hints of toasted cereal.
Gold, San Francisco World Spirits Competition 2021

name: PROPER NO. TWELVE
tastingDescription: False

name: PROPER NO. TWELVE - IRISH WHISKEY
tastingDescription: Founded by CEO Connor McGregor, the name from the district of Dublin he grew up in. It's a blend of triple distilled single malt, Irish grain spirit, and matured in bourbon barrels. The aroma is charred oak, vanilla, honey with flavors of chocolate and ripe green apple, and a soft finish. Enjoy it straight up or with your favourite mixer.

name: PROVINCIAL SPIRITS - JUNIPER GIN
tastingDescription: One of a kind blend of botanicals with a good kick of juniper and a smooth blend of lime and lemon for a punch of citrus. A classic dry gin that is made for splashing in the deep end of cocktails. Made locally in Port Coquitlam, B.C.

name: PUNJABI CLUB
tastingDescription: The nose is full of clean oak and rye spice with obvious notes of fresh grain and straw accompanying the spice. As the glass sits, orange peel and citrus fruit notes begin to climb out of the glass as well as some fresh ginger and coriander spice. Upon sipping this whiskey neat you will find the flavor of rye in the foreground is surrounded by oak spices. The fruit-like flavours have an exotic flair with bits of mango and grilled pineapple mixed in with orange and sour apple juice.

name: RABBIT HOLE - CAVEHILL
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
This 4-grain Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey is a homage to generations of Louisville distillers. Crafted from a unique mash that combines malted grains with corn, this super-premium bourbon combines depth with style. This marvel of modern distillation wows the senses with lovely aromas of spice and fresh apples. When sipped, you experience honey, mint and creamy orange. As Cavehill falls to the back of your palate, it evolves into vanilla and custard. 
Best Straight Bourbon, New York Wine & Spirits Competition 2017

name: RABBIT HOLE - DARERINGER
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
"Rich, honeyed aromas of grilled corn cakes, walnut bread and a hint of mint. On the palate, full-bodied, moderately sweet and appealingly spicy, massively and dangerously quaffable. Its subtlety belies its strength, and it's a total winner."
92 pts, Distiller.com

name: RADEMON ESTATE - SHORTCROSS GIN
tastingDescription:
"Aromatic and well-focused, with a pronounced juniperled nose. This is big and oily, mouth-coating and creamy, with a high-quality alcohol-driven palate. The finish has some apples and is sherbety, lifted and long."
91 Points, IWSC 2019

name: RED STAR ER GUO TOU
tastingDescription: With the special distillation processes, this crystal clear traditional baijiu has a light fragrance. It is strong but mellow and has a long aftertaste. It is famous and popular in Northern China and has the longest history of its kind.

name: RED TASSEL
tastingDescription: A Canadian favourite for over 30 years, McGuinness Red Tassel Vodka goes well with your favourite mix and makes a great cocktail.

name: REDBREAST - 15 YEAR OLD SINGLE POT STILL
nameSanitized: redbreast - 15 year old single pot still
sort: REDBREAST - 15 YEAR OLD SINGLE POT STILL
tastingDescription: One of the most decorated Irish whiskeys, Redbreast is the largest selling Single Pot Still Irish Whiskey in the world. Made from a mash of malted and unmalted barley, which is then triple distilled in traditional copper pot stills, Pot Still Irish Whiskeys are characterised by full, complex flavours and a wonderful, creamy mouthfeel. The inclusion of unmalted barley to the mashbill, along with the tradition of triple distillation, defines the character of Pot Still and this uniquely Irish approach to whiskey distillation.

name: REDBREAST - 21 YEAR OLD SINGLE POT STILL

Available starting November 13th in select stores

92 points, IWSC 2019

Honeyed and silky in texture, with toffee, toasted marshmallow, nougat, maple syrup, banana bread, and a hint of toasted coconut. Bright fruit and golden raisin blend in nicely with the layers of sweetness. Impeccable balance and very approachable. Classic Irish whiskey! (Winter 2010)

name: REMY MARTIN - 1738 ACCORD ROYAL
tastingDescription: This luxurious elixir offers a generous nose of toasted coconut, almonds, vanilla and bananas flambe. On the palate, it is warm with flavours of candied pineapple, vanilla, toasted oak and roasted almonds.

name: REVELSTOKE GIN - SERIES NO. 1
tastingDescription: Made in the ski-town of Revelstoke, BC in small batches using pristine mountain water.  This international double gold award-winning gin is carefully balanced to let the citrus shine.  Resulting in an excellent taste which is smooth on the palette from start to finish. Ski, Sip, Savour, Repeat.

name: REY SOL - EXTRA ANEJO 6 YEAR
tastingDescription:
Rey Sol is aged six years in new French oak barrels. It has an intense bright amber colour with orange and copper highlights, with strong body and ever-so-slow forming legs. Initial aromas of oak, chocolate, vanilla, hazelnut, roasted almonds and dried fruit mark the nose. At the start of the palate, it is sweet and full in body, where the oak notes are dominant, delivering a long, lasting finish of chocolate and almond flavours.
1 Bottle Limit

tastingDescription:
It's a Cognac exceptionally round, smooth and robust. The nose is very complex and aromatic with notes of dry fruits, prunes and dark chocolates, developing beautiful aromas of a cigar box. The palate is voluminous, combining the notes of citrus, chocolate, candied fruit and tobacco.
Double Gold Medal, New York World Wine & Spirits 2018

name: RIGA BLACK VODKA
tastingDescription: Purified through black charcoal and silver. Filtered 7 times to ensure the purest & most prestine taste.

name: RITTENHOUSE - STRAIGHT RYE WHISKEY 100 PROOF
tastingDescription: 95 Points & Best Buy, Wine Enthusiast - “A versatile must-have for mixing cocktails, look for pleasing vanilla, maple and a hint of dried cherry. The finish is long and drying, with plenty of baking spice notes.” (July 2016)

The nose is initially barley rich and buttery and develops to gentle peat smoke. The palate bursts with a beachy quality of sea spray and black pepper. The finish goes on and on with wave after wave of wood embers, orange peel and gentle spice.

95 Points, Extraordinary, Ultimate Recommendation, Ultimate Spirits Challenge 2020

This golden amber treat is smooth, complex and warm with vanilla, roasted caramel, creamy toffee and an enticing hint of plum. Rich, velvety and entirely enjoyable straight up or on ice! This rum earned the Double Gold Medal at the San Francisco World Spirits Competition, where it was named the "Best Rum." In addition, it earned a score of 90-95 points from Wine Enthusiast.

Highly versatile and mixable, RumChata is light, refreshing and incredibly delicious on its own, mixed with other ingredients and compliments many food/dessert recipes.

name: RUSSIAN STANDARD - PLATINUM
tastingDescription: Russian Standard Platinum is made from 100% Russian ingredients and production methods; Made according to renowned Russian scientist Dmitri Mendelee. Distilled from winter wheat from the Black Steppes of Russia, of which every grain is polished to remove impurities.  Blended with naturally pure glacial water from Lake Ladoga in Russia's frozen north. Crafted in our state-of-art distillery according to the strictest standards exceeding the purity requirements of all world regulatory bodies. Undergoes an additional silver filtration in a proprietary process for a smoothing finish

name: SAILOR JERRY - SPICED NAVY

name: SAILOR JERRY - SPICED NAVY
tastingDescription: An award-winning premium brown spirit. Vanilla, dry buttery toffee and subtle cinnamon notes. On the palate, warm spices of cinnamon and nutmeg with rich vanilla. A long dry finish balanced with a subdued sweetness and a very nice hint of roasted toffee.

name: SAILOR JERRY - SPICED NAVY
tastingDescription: An award-winning premium brown spirit. Vanilla, dry buttery toffee and subtle cinnamon notes. On the palate, warm spices of cinnamon and nutmeg with rich vanilla. A long dry finish balanced with a subdued sweetness and a very nice hint of roasted toffee.

name: SAINT JAMES - AGRICOLE ROYAL AMBRE
tastingDescription: It is clear amber in colour with intense aromas of caramel, nutmeg and vanilla followed by flavours of brown sugar, spice, raisins and a hint of smoke. The palate is medium-bodied with a long finish. Ideal in mixed drinks served neat or over ice.

name: SAINT VIVANT - V.S.O.P.
tastingDescription: Aromas of orange rind, sweet orange blossom, brown sugar and clover honey, patisserie, toffee, vanilla and caramel. Some baking spice accompanies the oak and a sandalwood perfume. Flavours of mandarin orange, citric zest, fig, oak, vanilla, caramel, clove and cinnamon. It has a long finish with complexity.

name: SAMBUCA DEI CESARI - LUXARDO
tastingDescription: Perfume: typical of sambuca, with intense anise aroma. Taste: sharp but well balanced, very rounded, with the anise taste persisting in the mouth.

tastingDescription: Perfume: typical of sambuca, with intense anise aroma. Taste: sharp but well balanced, very rounded, with the anise taste persisting in the mouth.

tastingDescription: Passione Nera is Luxardo's market leader in black sambuca. The predominant taste is star anise. However, it is combined with a new velvety sensation on the palate, with light spicy hints of cardamom and coriander, and an after-taste where the typical digestive aromas of liquorice predominate.

Before bottling, it's aged another year in French oak casks, which results in a dry, smooth sip with notes of bitter chocolate, nuts and buttery biscuits.

name: SAUZA - GOLD
tastingDescription: The fresh agave flavour is clean and crisp with hints of sweet caramel combined with oaky softness balanced with white pepper and a soft finish that is slightly sweet and surprisingly clean.

tastingDescription:
"The distinct nose of cherrywood smoke, golden apple, mace, butterscotch, nutmeg, and savory herbs is intriguing. The palate is bold and rich with bright notes of raisin, figs, and sweet spice flavors marked by toasted oak and tobacco. Dried flowers emerge on the finish."

Versatile for cocktails, including its namesake Sazerac.” (July 2016)

The resulting whisky reveals an explosion of rich, dark fruits, chocolate and spice interwoven with vanilla. Award-winning Scallywag is bottled and released in genuinely small, precious batches.

name: SCAPA - GLANSA SCOTCH WHISKY
tastingDescription:
“Stone fruits and hardwood smoke are intertwined on the nose. Ultra soft and smooth, the golden liquid glides over the tongue revealing flavours of toasted butterscotch candy, light golden honey, and finishes with a strong yet balanced hit of lasting wood smoke.” 
93 Points - Ultimate Spirits Challenge 2018

name: SCAPA - THE ORCADIAN SKIREN FIRST FILL

tastingDescription: We call Skiren the honeyed tropical one because of its smooth, creamy sweetness with a hint of tropical fruit, citrus and coastal heather. It is exclusively matured in first-fill American Oak Casks, selected by Scapa artisans.

name: SCARABUS ISLAY SINGLE MALT SCOTCH WHISKY - HUNTER LAING

tastingDescription:
Scarabus, an Islay Single Malt for those with a curious mind and an eye for detail. A whisky bold and honest about its origins and just a little mysterious about everything else. Islay peat smoke and sea salt on the nose, followed by warming leather notes, stewed rhubarb and a wonderful vanilla sweetness in the mouth, leading to a rich lingering finish.
3 Bottle Limit

name: SCREECH - DARK
tastingDescription: An award-winning Jamaican rum, steeped in history – crafted in Newfoundland. Sweet taste of caramelized sugars, ripe fruits, vanilla and oak. A smooth, balanced blend with no sugar added.

name: SEAGRAM'S - V O
tastingDescription: A complex and delicate blend, Seagram's VO contains over 20 whiskies. It is soft on the palate, yet characterized by a dry delicate finish.

name: SHEEP DOG - PEANUT BUTTER WHISKEY
tastingDescription: Blending peanut butter with whiskey? We thought the idea sounded a little nutty too. But it�s high time a whiskey was bred to take the party to the next level. Grab a bottle of Sheep Dog Peanut Butter Whiskey, break away from the pack and woof down some good times.

name: SHENK'S - HOMESTEAD SOUR MASH WHISKEY
tastingDescription:
Shenk's is a Sour Mash Whiskey made with a substantial amount of rye. Dark golden amber color. Aromas of brown sugar with baking spic and fresh citrues. On the palate, a beautiful sipping whiskey with some sweet caramel notes followed by hints of nutmeg, cloves, and dried fruit. A smooth and elegant finish with lingering citrus and gentle oak.
1 Bottle limit.

name: SHERIDAN'S ORIGINAL
tastingDescription: Double your fun with two liqueurs in one! The rich dark coffee side pours with a luxurious vanilla cream on top

name: SHETLAND REEL - FINISHED IN SHETLAND BLENDED MALT SCOTCH

tastingDescription: Shetland Reel is a distillery on the most northerly inhabited island of the UK. This idyllic setting is conducive to whisky making due to the dramatic weather conditions which is perfect for ageing Scotch whisky. Fruity sherry notes, a touch of smoke, vanilla and caramel on the nose. Creamy and fruity on the palate, developing into dried fruit and toffee, then finishing long with hints of smoke and peat.

name: SHINOBU - JAPANESE BLENDED WHISKY
tastingDescription: 50% Malt and 50% Grain, this whisky is expertly blended to create a silky, buttery whisky, that finishes with a pleasant bitterness and lots of woody flavours. Expect a candied-nut sweetness, coupled with buttery coconut, sandalwood, and vanilla.

name: SHUI JING FANG - RED FORTUNE
tastingDescription: Shui Jing Fang's Wellbay uses the beauty and exquisite craftsmanship of its packaging to communicate the perfection of the spirit inside. The spirit has been nurtured and influenced by the Yuan, Ming and Qing dynasties for over 600 years and contributes to the elegance of Chinese living with its inherited taste and cultural background. Shui Jing Fang's Wellbay is packaged in a prism shaped bottle within an elegant, tinted box which can be fully opened only by pulling back the three rings held within the lion's mouth.

name: SHUI JING FANG - WELLBAY
tastingDescription: Made from the oldest distillery in China with more than 600 years of continuous production, aged for a minimum of five years but blended with spirits aged up to 40 years, and filtered with activated charcoal, it has a refreshing taste with subtle sweetness and clean finish.

name: SIERRA TEQUILA - REPOSADO
tastingDescription: Sierra Tequila Reposado is the highest quality entry level Reposado Tequila available today. A recipient of numerous international awards, Sierra Tequila Reposado’s delicate aromas of vanilla, caramel, and herbs makes it especially complex. Traditionally distilled twice in copper pot stills and made from hand harvested Weber Blue Agave, it is then matured for nine months in toasted oak barrels, which gives it its all natural shimmering golden color. Sierra Tequila is 100% natural and uses no colorants or caramel/sugar in the Tequila.

name: SILENT SAM
tastingDescription: Silent Sam is triple distilled, filtered four times and “polished” through pure silk for exceptional taste and purity.

name: SILENT SAM
tastingDescription: Silent Sam is triple distilled, filtered four times and “polished” through pure silk for exceptional taste and purity.

name: SILENT SAM
tastingDescription: Silent Sam is triple distilled, filtered four times and “polished” through pure silk for exceptional taste and purity.

name: SILENT SAM
tastingDescription: Silent Sam is triple distilled, filtered four times and “polished” through pure silk for exceptional taste and purity.

name: SILKIE - DARK IRISH WHISKEY
tastingDescription: Dark Silkie contains a core of triple-distilled peated single malt whiskey which has been matured in sherry casks. It is also blended with a double-distilled single malt which has been matured in bourbon barrels along with soft grain whiskey which has been finished in virgin oak casks. The result is a dram that is soft and subtle with notes of caramel sweetness, oak, chocolate with a warming smokey spice.

name: SINGLETON OF DUFFTOWN - 12 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: The Singleton of Dufftown is a satisfyingly refined, beautifully balanced single malt that is naturally rich and smooth. It offers sweetness, crunchy nuts and smooth fruity richness. Smoothness allows full enjoyment of the flavour of the whisky, because no single part of its character is overwhelmed.

name: SIPSMITH - LONDON DRY
tastingDescription: The quintessential expression of a classic, traditional London Dry Gin. Bold, complex and aromatic – smooth enough for a Martini, yet rich and balanced, perfect for a Gin & Tonic.

name: SKINNYGIRL - MARGARITA
tastingDescription: Hazy, pale lemon-green in colour. Lime zest and citrus aromas and flavours with a hint of spice; medium-sweet with a tart finish.

name: SKREWBALL - PEANUT BUTTER WHISKEY
tastingDescription: Sure enough, it smells like peanut butter - or at least a hybrid of peanut and hazelnut butter. Sweet and quite buttery on the nose, it's immediately evident what you're getting into. The palate again lands halfway between peanut and hazelnut butter, and it's both surprisingly salty and very sweet.

name: SKYY
tastingDescription: A citrusy, spice-like scent that creates an award winning, smooth and crisp liquid. SKYY delivers a dry, medium body with a nice creamy mouth feel, anise and coriander notes with a faint peppery finish.

name: SKYY
tastingDescription: A citrusy, spice-like scent that creates an award-winning, smooth and crisp liquid. SKYY delivers a dry, medium body with a nice creamy mouth feel, anise and coriander notes with a faint peppery finish.

name: SLJIVOVICA OLD PLUM BRANDY - MARASKA STARA
nameSanitized: sljivovica old plum brandy - maraska stara
sort: SLJIVOVICA OLD PLUM BRANDY - MARASKA STARA
tastingDescription: This first class plum brandy is distilled from ripe plum fruits and reflects the true nature of the fruit. Full-bodied and rich, this traditional spirit is powerful and fruity on the nose. It is served neat, well chilled, as an aperitif or digestif.

name: SMIRNOFF - BERRY BLAST
tastingDescription: Smirnoff Berry Blast has the cooling taste of Cherry, Citrus, and Sweet Blueberry flavors all combined for a refreshingly delicious taste of summer. Perfect chilled as a shot or mixed in your favorite summer cocktail.

name: SMIRNOFF - BLUE LABEL
tastingDescription: Triple distilled and filtered through hardwood charcoal for purity and smooth taste.

name: SMIRNOFF - GREEN APPLE
tastingDescription: Smirnoff Green Apple possesses an intriguing taste. Both sweet and sour, its flavour lights up your taste buds and your night.

name: SMIRNOFF - PEACH
tastingDescription: Smirnoff Peach is infused with the natural flavor of juicy peaches for a sweet and fruity taste. This spirit has a pleasant sweetness and pairs best with soda water, lemonade, or iced tea.

name: SMIRNOFF - PEPPERMINT TWIST
tastingDescription: Remember those white and red hard peppermint candies with the individual wrapping? This is just like those but in liquid form

name: SMIRNOFF - PINK LEMONADE
tastingDescription: False

name: SMIRNOFF - RASPBERRY
tastingDescription: Ripe raspberry character and smooth, classic vodka come together to create an intense flavour experience. Mix with lemonade and soda or cranberry for a layered flavour experience.

name: SMIRNOFF - RASPBERRY
tastingDescription: Ripe raspberry character and smooth, classic vodka come together to create an intense flavour experience. Mix with lemonade and soda or cranberry for a layered flavour experience.

name: SMIRNOFF - RED LABEL
tastingDescription: Founded in 1864 by Pyotr Arsenievich Smirnov, what we now call Smirnoff was the first vodka to use charcoal filtration in the distillation process. This charcoal filtration produces a spirit that is ideal for mixing because of its smooth and clean palate. Perfect in a Moscow Mule or a Classic Caesar.

name: SMIRNOFF - RED LABEL
tastingDescription: Founded in 1864 by Pyotr Arsenievich Smirnov, what we now call Smirnoff was the first vodka to use charcoal filtration in the distillation process. This charcoal filtration produces a spirit that is ideal for mixing because of its smooth and clean palate. Perfect in a Moscow Mule or a Classic Caesar.

name: SMIRNOFF - RED LABEL
tastingDescription: Founded in 1864 by Pyotr Arsenievich Smirnov, what we now call Smirnoff was the first vodka to use charcoal filtration in the distillation process. This charcoal filtration produces a spirit that is ideal for mixing because of its smooth and clean palate. Perfect in a Moscow Mule or a Classic Caesar.

This charcoal filtration produces a spirit that is ideal for mixing because of its smooth and clean palate. Perfect in a Moscow Mule or a Classic Caesar.

tastingDescription: Founded in 1864 by Pyotr Arsenievich Smirnov, what we now call Smirnoff was the first vodka to use charcoal filtration in the distillation process. This charcoal filtration produces a spirit that is ideal for mixing because of its smooth and clean palate. Perfect in a Moscow Mule or a Classic Caesar.

name: SMIRNOFF - RED LABEL
tastingDescription: Founded in 1864 by Pyotr Arsenievich Smirnov, what we now call Smirnoff was the first vodka to use charcoal filtration in the distillation process. This charcoal filtration produces a spirit that is ideal for mixing because of its smooth and clean palate; perfect in a Moscow Mule or a Classic Caesar.

name: SMIRNOFF - RED LABEL PET
tastingDescription: Founded in 1864 by Pyotr Arsenievich Smirnov, what we now call Smirnoff was the first vodka to use charcoal filtration in the distillation process. This charcoal filtration produces a spirit that is ideal for mixing because of its smooth and clean palate. Perfect in a Moscow Mule or a Classic Caesar.

name: SMIRNOFF - RED LABEL PET
tastingDescription: Founded in 1864 by Pyotr Arsenievich Smirnov, what we now call Smirnoff was the first vodka to use charcoal filtration in the distillation process. This charcoal filtration produces a spirit that is ideal for mixing because of its smooth and clean palate. Perfect in a Moscow Mule or a Classic Caesar.

name: SMIRNOFF - VANILLA
tastingDescription: Smirnoff Vanilla is delicious whether you blend it with mixers or enjoy it on the rocks. It has a sweet taste and pleasant aroma that makes Smirnoff Vanilla a hit among all guests.

name: SMIRNOFF INFUSIONS - WATERMELON AND MINT
tastingDescription: Tart melon flavor balanced with the fresh taste of cool mint for a cool and calm finish.

name: SMIRNOFF RED
tastingDescription: Founded in 1864 by Pyotr Arsenievich Smirnov, what we now call Smirnoff was the first vodka to use charcoal filtration in the distillation process. This charcoal filtration produces a spirit that is ideal for mixing because of its smooth and clean palate. Perfect in a Moscow Mule or a Classic Caesar.

name: SMOKEHEAD
tastingDescription: An award-winning Islay single malt with a cult following that stands out from the crowd. Smokehead is a heavily-peated Islay single malt whisky of the highest quality, it hits you like a cannonball and takes you on an explosive rollercoaster of peat, smoke and spice with a hint of sweetness.

name: SOBIESKI
tastingDescription: Grains harvested from the rich Mazowse fields where the golden Dankowski rye is found are used to produce this authentic Polish vodka. Pouring crystal clear the nose is clean with subtle rye spice notes. The palate is quite refined and balanced in taste with a smooth, clean finish. Ideal for mixing.

name: SOHO - LYCHEE
tastingDescription: Clear and colourless, this exotic liqueur has an intense floral and lychee nose which is followed in the mouth by sweet lychee and melon flavours. Try in fancy mixed drinks, a vodka-based martini or over fruit salad.

name: SOJU - JINRO
tastingDescription: JINRO SOJU embodies mild and soft feelings of drinking of alcohol 16.9 degrees and clean tastes for all enjoying convenient sense of drinking. It expresses sensuous tastes and designs as well as old sensibility and nostalgia of Korea's original Soju JINRO.

name: SOMBRA - ENSAMBLE
tastingDescription: This limited edition mezcal is made from two subspecies of wild agave to produce a complex flavour profile of earth, peppers, citrus, fruit and a lovely enveloping smoke

name: SOMBRA - MEZCAL
tastingDescription: This Mezcal has been awarded 90 Points by Wine Enthusiast, 95 Points from Spirit Journal, and was a Double Gold winner in 2016 at the San Francisco World Spirits Competition. Spicy, fruity, and smoky on the nose with a high note of citrus, this Mezcal is smooth and warming to the palate with a clean and fruit-driven finish.

name: SORTILEGE - CANADIAN WHISKY & MAPLE SYRUP
tastingDescription: Bring the fun home with a bottle of Sortilege, a uniquely Canadian blend of 100& rye whisky mixed with first run Quebec maple syrup. Golden colour with caramel aromas and sweet, rich maple syrup and toffee flavours.

name: SORTILEGE - MAPLE CREAM
tastingDescription: Blended to be the perfect balance of premium Canadian whisky, pure maple syrup and fresh dairy cream, this is truly a decadent treat. Fragrant with aromas of buttercream, maple syrup and a touch of milk chocolate notes; rich and full with a thick creamy texture and flavours of caramel fudge, maple syrup and vanilla.

name: SOUR PUSS - APPLE
tastingDescription: Bright light green in colour with Granny Smith apple aromas. It has a sour, sweet Granny Smith sour candy flavour.

name: SOUR PUSS - RASPBERRY
tastingDescription: Bright reddish-pink in colour. Bold raspberry aromas with a slight herbal bitterness. Sour, sweet and bitter raspberry flavours.

name: SOUR PUSS - RASPBERRY
tastingDescription: Sour Puss Raspberry combines secret and exotic natural flavours with neutral spirits to create a fruity and sweet beginning that finishes with a mouth and eye watering pucker. Sour Puss can be mixed with soda, juices and other spirits such as vodka and liqueurs.

name: SOUTHERN COMFORT
tastingDescription: Southern Comfort has been bringing friends together since 1874 when a bartender named Martin Wilkes (M.W.) Heron created the fruit, spice and whisky flavoured spirit. Heron kept the recipe a closely guarded secret and remains closely guarded to this day - a spirit that has become an American icon now enjoyed by friends in over 90 countries.

name: SOUTHERN COMFORT
tastingDescription: Southern Comfort has been bringing friends together since 1874 when a bartender named Martin Wilkes (M.W.) Heron created the fruit, spice and whisky flavoured spirit.  Heron kept the recipe a closely guarded secret and remains closely guarded to this day – a spirit that has become an American icon now enjoyed by friends in over 90 countries.

name: SPEYBURN - 15 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription:
“Hallmark aromas of golden raisin, dried apricots drizzled in honey, tinned peach, red licorice, and brine fill the nose. This bright fruitiness persists on the palate, with allusions to baked peanuts, citrus, and crème brûlée. This is a superb whisky.”
95 Points, Extraordinary – Ultimate Spirit Challenge 2019

name: SPICEBOX - SPICED
tastingDescription: Inspired by the story of a Prohibition-era Canadian bootlegger who sold whisky in wooden barrels stamped with the word "spices", this small-batch blend of rye whisky is infused with nutmeg, cinnamon, cloves and vanilla. Great for enjoying on the rocks or mixed with cola or ginger ale.

name: SPUD VODKA - CARAMEL MACCHIATO
tastingDescription: False

name: ST GERMAIN - GIFTSET
tastingDescription: False

name: ST REMY - SIGNATURE
tastingDescription: St-Rémy Signature is luminous, bright and amber in colour with sweet aromas of vanilla, coconut and almond greeting you on the nose. Round and balanced on the palate, the woody notes are enriched with honey, nut and butter flavours. St-Rémy Signature provides a unique base for your favourite serves, reimagined: French Old Fashioned, Signature Dry, Signature Rose or a Tin Train. Equally, the liquid is perfect for use in traditional brandy cocktails such as Club, Corpse Reviver No. 1, French Metropolitan and the French Alexander. To discover St-Rémy Signature is to discover a new kind of harmony.

name: ST. REMY - V.S.O.P.
tastingDescription: This brandy is carefully aged in small French oak barrels, revealing an intense bouquet of exquisite fruity and floral aromas, accented with subtle tones of vanilla. This aromatic fruity and spicy brandy is perfect for mixing or sipping solo.

name: ST. REMY - V.S.O.P.
tastingDescription: This brandy is carefully aged in small French oak barrels, revealing an intense bouquet of exquisite fruity and floral aromas, accented with subtle tones of vanilla. This aromatic fruity and spicy brandy is perfect for mixing or sipping solo.

name: ST. REMY - V.S.O.P.
tastingDescription: This brandy is carefully aged in small French oak barrels, revealing an intense bouquet of exquisite fruity and floral aromas, accented with subtle tones of vanilla. This aromatic fruity and spicy brandy is perfect for mixing or sipping solo.

name: ST. REMY - V.S.O.P.
tastingDescription: This brandy is carefully aged in small French oak barrels, revealing an intense bouquet of exquisite fruity and floral aromas, accented with subtle tones of vanilla. This aromatic fruity and spicy brandy is perfect for mixing or sipping solo.

name: ST. REMY - X.O.
tastingDescription: St-Remy XO is a brandy of distinct character, with elaborate aromas and a rich taste. Elegant and smooth, the intense blend lingers gracefully on the palate. Medium-deep amber in colour, it offers aromas of peach apple, pear and vanilla; dry, fruity flavours, and an oaky finish.

name: STAGG - JR
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
"This bourbon shows a deep orange-gold in the glass and a delightfully warm nose spiked with cocoa, nutmeg, orange, black tea, and caramelized toasted oak. The expansive palate is replete with vanilla, caramel, and cherry cola through the spicy hot finish."
94 pts, Excellent, Highly Recommended, Ultimate Spirits Challenge 2021
1 Bottle limit.

name: STIGGINS' - FANCY PLANTATION PINEAPPLE RUM
tastingDescription: A rich and delicious bouquet , accented by smoky notes and aromas of tropical fruit, pineapple, citrus peel and a touch of clove. The palate opens with a structured, pleasant sensation of ripe banana, pineapple and spices layeterd in a smoky finish.

name: STOCK - 84 V.S.O.P.
tastingDescription: Its unmistakeable character is the result of the aroma, flavour and golden colour developed during long maturation in oak vats. It is during this ageing process that Stock 84 acquires the unique mellow taste and palate-pleasing smoothness that has been known for.

name: STOLICHNAYA - BLUEBERI
tastingDescription: Plump ripe berries lead the nose, with blueberry, black currant and lemon fruits, and to the back, a hint of juniper. The mouth feel of Stoli Blueberi is smooth and creamy, with a buttery grain character and an aromatic note of eucalyptus.

name: STOLICHNAYA - CRUSHED PINEAPPLE
tastingDescription: Stoli CRUSHED, is a premium mix of imported Stoli Gluten Free Vodka CRUSHED together with real fruit juice. Available in juicy Pineapple, Ruby Red Grapefruit, and Mango to make delicious simple vodka cocktails.

name: STOLICHNAYA - CRUSHED RUBY RED GRAPEFRUIT
tastingDescription: Stoli CRUSHED, is a premium mix of imported Stoli Gluten Free Vodka CRUSHED together with real fruit juice. Available in juicy Pineapple, Ruby Red Grapefruit, and Mango to make delicious simple vodka cocktails.

name: STOLICHNAYA - GOLD
tastingDescription: Produced from Russian winter wheat and water filtered through rare meteoric rock, this double distilled Stoli's final filtration is achieved through coils of gold thread. It is incredibly smooth with a lightly fruity nose, notes of apricot, and vanilla souffle on the palate and a long creamy finish. Use in a Moscow Mule

name: STOLICHNAYA - PREMIUM
tastingDescription: Stolichnaya is a classically styled, exceptionally smooth vodka. Crystal-clear in color with marshmallow, mineral and mild fruit peel aromas. A soft, supple entry leads to a smooth, medium-bodied palate with pastry frosting, talc and citrus rind flavors. Finishes with a clean, lightly sweet, sugar dust, wet straw and balanced pepper fade.

name: STOLICHNAYA - PREMIUM
tastingDescription: Stolichnaya is a classically styled, exceptionally smooth vodka. Crystal-clear in color with marshmallow, mineral and mild fruit peel aromas. A soft, supple entry leads to a smooth, medium-bodied palate with pastry frosting, talc and citrus rind flavors. Finishes with a clean, lightly sweet, sugar dust, wet straw and balanced pepper fade.

name: STOLICHNAYA - PREMIUM
tastingDescription: Stolichnaya is a classically styled, exceptionally smooth vodka. Crystal-clear in color with marshmallow, mineral and mild fruit peel aromas. A soft, supple entry leads to a smooth, medium-bodied palate with pastry frosting, talc and citrus rind flavors. Finishes with a clean, lightly sweet, sugar dust, wet straw and balanced pepper fade.

name: STOLICHNAYA - PREMIUM
tastingDescription: Stolichnaya is a classically styled, exceptionally smooth vodka. Crystal-clear in color with marshmallow, mineral and mild fruit peel aromas. A soft, supple entry leads to a smooth, medium-bodied palate with pastry frosting, talc and citrus rind flavors. Finishes with a clean, lightly sweet, sugar dust, wet straw and balanced pepper fade.

name: STOLICHNAYA - RAZBERI
tastingDescription: Stoli Razberi opens with an intense nose of raspberry jam, boiled sweets and hot berry fruit infusions. The palate has raspberry ripple creaminess, balanced by the sweet spice of rye and wheat grain vodka, and lifted by crisp citrus notes. Stoli Razberi is finished with hints of pepper and wild raspberry cane.

name: STOLICHNAYA GLUTEN FREE
tastingDescription: Stoli Gluten Free Vodka is made with a blend of corn (88%) and buckwheat (12%) from the fertile soil farms of the Tambov Region of Russia. The corn and buckwheat is distilled in the state-of-the-art Stoli distillery, Talvis and the distillate spirit then travels to the historic Latvijas Balsams where it goes through filtration and blending. Using traditional production techniques and best-in-class corn and buckwheat farming, the result is perfectly clean, crisp and smooth Stoli Gluten Free Vodka.

name: STRATHMIL - 25 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: Originally founded in 1923, Strathmill is a lesser-known single malt whisky which represents a rare and highly collectable release. Biscuity, creamy and spicy on the nose, this attractive whisky has a multitude of complex aromas which include orange peel, raisins, dark chocolate and earth. Textural and mouth-coating on the palate, subtle floral notes and baked apple flavours come forth, together with a savoury malty backdrop and vanilla overtones.

name: SUNTORY WHISKY - HIBIKI JAPANESE HARMONY
tastingDescription: Amber in colour with a nose of rose, lychee, a hint of rosemary, mature woodiness and sandalwood aromas. The palate has a honey-like sweetness, candied orange peel and white chocolate notes. A subtle, tender long finish, with hint of Mizunara (Japanese oak).

name: SUNTORY WHISKY - TOKI
tastingDescription: A vivid blend of carefully slected whiskies from the House of Suntory's globally acclaimed Hakushu, Yamazaki, and Chita distilleries. Silky with a subtle sweet and spicy finish.

name: SWEAR JAR - CANADIAN WHISKY
tastingDescription: False

name: TALISKER - 10 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription: 90 Points, Whisky Advocate - “Another that should need no introduction. The thing to look for in Talisker, as with all smoky whiskies, is sweetness that gives the requisite balance to the drying effect of smoke. Underneath Talisker’s smoke, which ain't as all-pervading as Lagavulin, is a sweet pear-like quality. When young there are notes of the land: heather, moor, sweet seaweed, and a finish that has a distinctive cracked black pepper hit.” (Summer 2012)

name: TALISKER - 8 YO SPECIAL RELEASE 2020
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
"Warm tar, farmyard, charcuterie, and faint iodine on the fruity nose. Peppery stewed fruits and gentle woodsmoke on the voluptuous palate. Very prickly in the long finish, with fruit-and-nut dark chocolate and chile paste. An intriguing and attractive take on Talisker."
93 pts, Whisky Advocate 2020

name: TALISKER - DISTILLERS EDITION
tastingDescription: False

name: TALISKER - STORM
tastingDescription: 93 Points, Wine Enthusiast - “Made on Isle of Skye, this brisk, briny single malt carries honey and campfire smoke aromas on the nose. On the palate, a salted caramel flavor unfolds, with smokiness leading into the brisk finish that brushed with fleeting notes of citrus and rich espresso. It has plenty of alcohol punch, so be sure to add a generous splash of water.” (December 2015)

name: TAMNAVULIN - DOUBLE CASK SPEYSIDE SINGLE MALT SCOTCH WHISKY
nameSanitized: tamnavulin - double cask speyside single malt scotch whisky
nameSuffix: DOUBLE CASK SPEYSIDE SINGLE MALT SCOTCH WHISKY
sort: TAMNAVULIN - DOUBLE CASK SPEYSIDE SINGLE MALT SCOTCH WHISKY
tastingDescription: Matured in American Oak Barrels for a sweet, mellow taste with a rich, smooth Sherry cask finish. On the palate is fresh, mellow notes of pear, creamy peaches, roasted pineapple and a hint Demerara sugar.

name: TANQUERAY - FLOR DE SEVILLA
tastingDescription: Sevilla orange essence is combined with the botanical bouquet of Tanqueray to create a lively and slightly bittersweet gin.

name: TANQUERAY - LONDON DRY
tastingDescription: In the bouquet, the clean, crisp aroma of juniper berries is prominent and balanced by hints of fresh wintergreen and spices, such as anise. As the spirit lingers in the mouth, the finish is full, dry and incredibly long.

name: TANQUERAY - LONDON DRY
tastingDescription: In the bouquet, the clean, crisp aroma of juniper berries is prominent and balanced by hints of fresh wintergreen and spices, such as anise. As the spirit lingers in the mouth, the finish is full, dry and incredibly long.

name: TANQUERAY - LONDON DRY
tastingDescription: In the bouquet, the clean, crisp aroma of juniper berries is prominent and balanced by hints of fresh wintergreen and spices, such as anise. As the spirit lingers in the mouth, the finish is full, dry and incredibly long.

name: TANQUERAY - LONDON DRY
tastingDescription: In the bouquet, the clean, crisp aroma of juniper berries is prominent and balanced by hints of fresh wintergreen and spices, such as anise. As the spirit lingers in the mouth, the finish is full, dry and incredibly long.

name: TANQUERAY - NO. TEN BATCH DISTILLED
tastingDescription: The only gin in the World Spirits Hall of Fame, this top-drawer, small batch traditional-style London Dry gin is distilled four times and uses whole oranges, grapefruit, limes, orange peel, chamomile and other botanicals. It's fresh and smooth with complex orange and floral notes. Enjoy neat, in a dry martini or in cocktails.

name: TANQUERAY - RANGPUR
tastingDescription: "The key to the beautiful flavours of this gin is the addition of the Rangpur limes in the distillation which enhances the Juniper flavours with zesty sweet citrus. For a refreshing cocktail, try Tanqueray Rangpur with a splash of cranberry juice and soda." - Adele Shaw, Category Manager for Spirits & Sake

name: TEACHERS - HIGHLAND CREAM
tastingDescription: It is said that William Teacher would not give his name to his blend until he had found perfection; this is his golden expression of perfection. Intense sweet grain, peat and smoke on the nose follows through on the palate; warm and round with smoky nuances in the finish.

name: TEANINICH - 17 YEAR OLD
tastingDescription:
“Distilled in 1999, this single malt was aged in refill American oak hogsheads and refill American oak barrels. Pineapple and walnuts figure on the early nose, which becomes more floral, ultimately offering violets. The palate is full and fruity, majoring in peaches in syrup, with new-mown hay and white pepper. Nicely balanced and rounded, with buttery notes emerging. The finish dries slowly, with subtle licorice.” 
Whisky Advocate 2017

name: TEARS OF LLORONA - EXTRA ANEJO
tastingDescription: Tears of Llorona Tequila gives an initial impression of exceptional smoothness, blending vanilla, coffee, and dark chocolate with a distinct but soft agave presence. This is followed by delicate citrus, smoky notes and cinnamon. Overall, Tears exhibits a velvety, gentle combination of sophistication and layered flavor notes.

name: TEELING - POTSTILL
tastingDescription: Available starting November 13th in select stores

name: TEELING - SMALL BATCH IRISH WHISKEY
tastingDescription: Awarded Best Blended Irish Whiskey at the 2018 Irish Whiskey Awards. Aged in hand-picked casks and finished in rum barrels. In the glass, a brilliant yellow gold. Light, smooth and sweet on the palate, with notes of burnt sugar, tropical fruit, vanilla and spice.

name: TEMPLETON - BARREL STRENGTH LIMITED EDITION
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
Each year a limited number of the finest American barrels are selected by Distillery Manager, Lester Brown who carefully marries and vats together the aged whiskeys. The result is a barrel strength product that showcases the Templeton Rye expression in its purest form. The whiskey is sourced from Indiana (Midwest Grain Processors) with a mash bill of 95% rye and 5% malted barley. The resulting flavor profile is an extraordinary whiskey with ripe apple aromas, followed by warm cinnamon and orange notes that dovetail marvellously, fading into creamy, raisin-infused toffee tones and intensifying rye spice that deepens into a long, robust finish.

name: TEMPLETON - SINGLE BARREL 10 YEAR RESERVE RYE WHISKEY
nameSanitized: templeton - single barrel 10 year reserve rye whiskey
nameSuffix: SINGLE BARREL 10 YEAR RESERVE RYE WHISKEY
sort: TEMPLETON - SINGLE BARREL 10 YEAR RESERVE RYE WHISKEY
tastingDescription: Aged a full decade in charred new American oak, Templeton 10-Year Rye is bottled from a hand-selected single barrel. Aromas of rich chocolate, vanilla, toasted oak, green apple and apricot lead to flavours of smooth, dark oak with honeyed floral notes and Templeton's signature rye spice carried by a silky smooth, creamy, caramel mouthfeel. The finish is long-lasting with lingering butterscotch.

name: TEQUILA OCHO - BLANCO
tastingDescription: Bright, clear, thick on the glass. Buttery with fresh lively fruit, pineapple, lemon, herb, anise, cloves, and white pepper with a nuance of green pine. On the palate, complex balance of sweet and acidity, cooked agave, green grape skin, hints ofpineapple, green apple, cloves and uncooked asparagus. Luscious and full textured with beautiful medium crisp finish.

name: TEQUILA OCHO - SINGLE BARREL EXTRA ANEJO
nameSanitized: tequila ocho - single barrel extra anejo
sort: TEQUILA OCHO - SINGLE BARREL EXTRA ANEJO
tastingDescription: Aged in ex-American whiskey barrels for more than 36 months. Bottled at cask strength. Made with 100% Blue Agave. Pale golden in colour, the aroma is spicy yet sweet. Notes of spice-poached pears, and a touch of Tellicherry black pepper are found. It starts to develop this perfume-like acidity in the palate that bounces back and forth between sweet and dry. The highly floral ending has a kiss of cacao and coffee.

name: TEREMANA - TEQUILA BLANCO
tastingDescription: Crafted in a small Mexican town, amidst the highest peaks of the Jalisco Highland mountains, this tequila offers notes of bright citrus with a smooth, fresh finish. Due to limited quantities, this product is restricted to 1 bottle limit.

name: TEREMANA - TEQUILA REPOSADO
tastingDescription: This medium-bodied small batch tequila serves up vanilla, oak, chocolate, and herbal notes. Due to limited quantities, this product is restricted to 1 bottle limit.

name: THAT BOUTIQUE-Y GIN COMPANY - RETRO GIN FRIDGE
nameSanitized: that boutique-y gin company - retro gin fridge
nameSuffix: Y GIN COMPANY - RETRO GIN FRIDGE
sort: THAT BOUTIQUE-Y GIN COMPANY - RETRO GIN FRIDGE
tastingDescription: The perfect premium gift for friends or family and what a gin lovers dreams are made of! A unique and premium gift set consisting of a variety of That Boutique-y Gin's extraordinary expression, housed in a bespoke designed, retro inspired 'fridge tin'.

name: THE ARRAN - ROBERT BURNS
tastingDescription: "What better scotch to serve to address the Haggis. Endorsed by the World Robert Burns Federation this light aromatic Single Malt is ideal for drinking, prior to or during a meal. Very fresh with no artificial colouring." - Adele Shaw, Category Manager for Spirits & Sake

name: THE ARRAN MALT - DRUMADOON POINT
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
An initial wave of sweetness followed by spiced apple, cocoa powder and star anise. Flavours of dark chocolate and raisins also start to develop, creating a beautiful balance between Arran's signature style and sherry cask maturation.

name: THE ARRAN MALT - KILDONAN AND PLADDA ISLAND
nameSanitized: the arran malt - kildonan and pladda island
sort: THE ARRAN MALT - KILDONAN AND PLADDA ISLAND
tastingDescription: The latest edition in the Arran Explorer Series Collection. Rich fruity aromas of candied orange peel, nectarine and sherbet. Sweet and tangy on the tongue with bursts of strawberry liquorice, fresh raspberries and ginger. A multi-layered dram with a long lasting finish of red fruit, oak and hints of tobacco.

name: THE ARRAN MALT - MASTER OF DISTILLING II
nameSanitized: the arran malt - master of distilling ii
sort: THE ARRAN MALT - MASTER OF DISTILLING II
tastingDescription: A limited edition whisky celebrating master distiller James MacTaggart’s 10th anniversary at Isle of Arran. Rich in chocolate orange, quince jelly and the zest of citrus fruits. The subtle tang of yeasty, buttered sourdough and a kick of rock salt come through as the Palo Cortado Sherry cask displays it’s influence. Warm ginger comes through on the finish.

name: THE ENGLISH - SMOKEY SINGLE MALT WHISKY
nameSanitized: the english - smokey single malt whisky
sort: THE ENGLISH - SMOKEY SINGLE MALT WHISKY
tastingDescription: False

name: THE ENGLISH - VIRGIN OAK CASK SINGLE MALT WHISKY
nameSanitized: the english - virgin oak cask single malt whisky
nameSuffix: VIRGIN OAK CASK SINGLE MALT WHISKY
sort: THE ENGLISH - VIRGIN OAK CASK SINGLE MALT WHISKY
tastingDescription: Aromas of coconut and liquorice with hints of toffee and dark chocolate. Light vanilla and rich oak. Wood spices, think cloves and nutmeg. The taste is rich and oily. Spicy. The notes of dry oak and vanilla come through. Hints of honey, toffee, chocolate and cloves linger on the palate.

name: THE EPICUREAN  - CASK STRENGTH GLASGOW LIMITED EDITION BLEND
nameSanitized: the epicurean  - cask strength glasgow limited edition blend
nameSuffix: CASK STRENGTH GLASGOW LIMITED EDITION BLEND
sort: THE EPICUREAN  - CASK STRENGTH GLASGOW LIMITED EDITION BLEND
tastingDescription: The unique recipe for this special bottling is the result of a collaboration between Douglas Laing and some of Glasgow’s finest bartenders and spirit experts. The resulting whisky is bursting with zesty citrus, green fruits and a sweet nuttiness, proclaiming to be “certainly a little bigger, more urban than other Lowlanders”. Bottled at 58.6% ABV without colouring or chill-filtration, its high strength is said to ensure the natural robust character of the city spirit shines through.

name: THE FAMOUS GROUSE SMOKY BLACK
tastingDescription: A dried fruit, cereal grain and barley sugar base is quickly joined by a smoky charcoal campfire that lingers on a medium length finish

name: THE GLENLIVET - 12YO SINGLE MALT GIFT PACK 750 WITH 2 X 50
nameSanitized: the glenlivet - 12yo single malt gift pack 750 with 2 x 50
nameSuffix: 12YO SINGLE MALT GIFT PACK 750 WITH 2 X 50
sort: THE GLENLIVET - 12YO SINGLE MALT GIFT PACK 750 WITH 2 X 50
tastingDescription: False

name: THE GLENLIVET - CAPTAIN'S RESERVE
tastingDescription: Captain’s Reserve combines the raisin-rich taste of cognac with the signature citrus notes and creamy smoothness of Glenlivet. After maturing in bourbon and sherry casks for many years, The whisky is finished in ex-cognac casks for at least six months, creating a unique rich and intense flavour. The aromas are rich in honey and apricot jam, with notes of sweet cinnamon bread and a subtle sensation of spicy licorice. The taste has succulent flavours of mandarins in syrup, poached pears and chocolate-covered raisins. The finish is incredibly smooth and luscious.

name: THE GLENLIVET - CARIBBEAN RESERVE
tastingDescription: The Glenlivet Caribbean Reserve is a sweet, tropical twist to The Glenlivet. To create this whisky, our makers finished a portion of the whisky in barrels which previously held Caribbean rum.

name: THE GLENLIVET - DAVOCH SINGLE CASK EDITION SCOTCH WHISKY
nameSanitized: the glenlivet - davoch single cask edition scotch whisky
nameSuffix: DAVOCH SINGLE CASK EDITION SCOTCH WHISKY
sort: THE GLENLIVET - DAVOCH SINGLE CASK EDITION SCOTCH WHISKY
tastingDescription: This marvelously evocative single cask dram opens with notions of butterscotch, sponge toffee, candied lemon peel and apricot jam; a few drops of water unleashes lemongrass and hayfield... appreciate its elegance, polish and decadent flavours of lemon squares and peach cobbler.

name: THE GLENLIVET - SPECTRA
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
The Glenlivet Spectra is a limited-edition trio of single malts, each offering a unique take on The Glenlivet's signature smooth and fruity style. Released without tasting notes, each set comes with a QR code that will take you to a secret website that explores the character and flavours of The Glenlivet Spectra set.

name: THE IRISHMAN - FOUNDERS RESERVE SHERRY CASK FINISH
nameSanitized: the irishman - founders reserve sherry cask finish
sort: THE IRISHMAN - FOUNDERS RESERVE SHERRY CASK FINISH
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
"The third in the Reserve Cask series, this has wafts of sherry wood, Victoria plum, dark marmalade, toasted almond, polished wood, ground nutmeg, and dried pear. Warm fruits, panettone, and citrus peel precede a moment of nippy spice on the palate, followed by red berries and caramel. This saves the best till last with a delicious final phase, as milk chocolate and spice soften to end with Choco-Leibniz and dried fruit."
91 pts, Whisky Advocate 2021

name: THE KINSHIP - HUNTER LAING MIXED PACK
nameSanitized: the kinship - hunter laing mixed pack
sort: THE KINSHIP - HUNTER LAING MIXED PACK
tastingDescription:
The Kinship Collection is an annual release by family-owned, Scotch whisky distiller, blender and independent bottler Hunter Laing. This year's fourth release consists of six bottles of incredible whiskies, most of them bottled at 30 years old, all bottled at cask strength:
1. Highland Park aged 30 years : BBQ surf and turf and malty notes with highland heather honey.
2. Ardbeg aged 28 years: Quite tarry on the palate, with medicinal notes, liquorice, camphorwood, and a touch of orange zest along with peat as on a sea breeze.
3. Bowmore aged 30 years: Crispy bacon, sweet lemons, leather, prunes and tobacco on the palate alongside honeyed almonds, burnt orange zest and clove.
4. Bunnahabhain aged 30 years: Markedly fresh and salivating arrival on the palate, subtle at first, growing with time encompassing citrus, brine and a sponge-cake sweetness.
5. Caol Ila aged 30 years: On the palate, there is a gristy malty note, lime zest, Seville orange, new leather, fine tobacco and a typical Caol Ila ashiness leading to a wonderfully refined finish.
6. Laphroaig 30: Rich and expansive on the palate with nutmeg, bandages, malty notes, new leather boots beside a peat fire and a touch of liquorice.

name: THE KRAKEN - BLACK ROAST COFFEE
tastingDescription: False

name: THE KRAKEN - BLACK SPICED
tastingDescription: The Kraken is crafted from aged Caribbean rum and blended with a secret mix of spices including vanilla, cinnamon, nutmeg, and clove. Named after the beast of legend, this spiced rum is dark, smooth, and bold. The Kraken's flavours shine in simple classics like a rum and coke, or mixed into your favourite rum cocktail.

name: THE KRAKEN - BLACK SPICED
tastingDescription: The Kraken is crafted from aged Caribbean rum and blended with a secret mix of spices including vanilla, cinnamon, nutmeg, and clove. Named after the beast of legend, this spiced rum is dark, smooth, and bold. The Kraken�s flavours shine in simple classics like a rum and coke, or mixed into your favourite rum cocktail.
