Named after the beast of legend, this spiced rum is dark, smooth, and bold. The Kraken's flavours shine in simple classics like a rum and coke, or mixed into your favourite rum cocktail.

name: THE KRAKEN - UNKNOWN DEEP 2021 LIMITED EDITION
nameSanitized: the kraken - unknown deep 2021 limited edition
sort: THE KRAKEN - UNKNOWN DEEP 2021 LIMITED EDITION
tastingDescription: The Kraken is crafted from aged Caribbean rum and blended with a secret mix of spices including vanilla, cinnamon, nutmeg, and clove. Named after the beast of legend, this spiced rum is dark, smooth, and bold. The Kraken's flavours shine in simple classics like a rum and coke, or mixed into your favourite rum cocktail.

name: THE SEXTON - SINGLE MALT IRISH WHISKEY
nameSanitized: the sexton - single malt irish whiskey
sort: THE SEXTON - SINGLE MALT IRISH WHISKEY
tastingDescription: From first Irish female master distiller, Alex Thomas, comes this remarkable, triple distilled single malt. Aged 4 years in first fill oloroso sherry casks, the aroma is an incredibly robust, nutty, like baked apple pie with spicy flavors, ripe fruits, and a rich finish. Enjoy it neat or over ice.

name: THE SINGLETON OF DUFFTOWN - 17 YO SPECIAL RELEASE 2020
nameSanitized: the singleton of dufftown - 17 yo special release 2020
sort: THE SINGLETON OF DUFFTOWN - 17 YO SPECIAL RELEASE 2020
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
This unusual first-ever exclusively refill cask release of The Singleton Dufftown has been matured for seventeen years in refill American oak hogsheads, to showcase the fresh, spring-like nature of this slowly crafted single malt.  The mellow aromas mark this as a classic Speyside malt, with a first sweet impression of honeycomb and beneath, a floral note of dry grasses with hints of fruit on an earthy base. The texture is creamy-smooth and coating, while the taste is sweet, rich and perfectly balanced. There is a warming, drying finish, with a peppery spiciness.
1 Bottle limit.

name: TIA MARIA
tastingDescription: Tia Maria is a sweet liqueur with a strong coffee character and a complex aromatic structure. Using cold brew extraction, ensures that this coffee liqueur has a distinct taste using 100 percent Arabica coffee beans, Madagascan vanilla and Jamaican rum. A favourite for coffee liqueur lovers the world over, in a fresh new look bottle.

name: TIERRA NOBLE - EXTRA ANEJO 6 YEAR
tastingDescription: Tierra Noble Exquisito Extra Añejo is aged in a single new French oak barrel for 6 to 7 years to create a true masterpiece for the ultimate connoisseur. Intense dark amber, ochre and reddish in colour. Perfectly clean, bright and translucent with reddish hues. Great adherence in glass, showing legs and tears of great body. Very pleasant and smooth with the nose with a gamut of aromas going from fruity and sweet notes to cooked agave, vanilla, prune, chocolate and toasted almonds, light notes of apricot and tobacco balanced perfectly with oak elegantly showcasing the lengthy maturation of this spirit. Smooth on the palate, well-balanced and complex with flavours of bitter chocolate, dry fruits and berries, light tobacco and spices, with a lengthy, persistent finish. Surprisingly elegant, harmonious and balanced, with a slight hint of toasted almonds, leather and tobacco.

name: TIERRA NOBLE ANEJO
tastingDescription: Tierra Noble Anejo carries a rich and complex nose owing to 24-30 months in French and American Oak, with nice notes of wood, prunes, toasted almonds, vanilla & a touch of chocolate. The palate shows superbly structure with a creamy, balanced mouthfeel and dark chocolate flavours caressed with dried fruits.

name: TOBERMORY - 12 YO
tastingDescription: The new signature expression from Tobermory Distillery, a unique and artisan-crafted, Single Malt Scotch Whisky. Non-peated and a longer maturation of 12 years lends to rich fruit, orange and citrus notes, fresh floral hints and rich oak with vanilla and spice. A vibrant and rich, characterful whisky capturing the essence of the Isle of Mull, Scotland.

name: TOMATIN - COGNAC CASK FC
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
Distilled on May 16, 2008, this whisky is brimming with  fresh fruit and floral flavours with subtle notes of lavender and Scottish heather. On the palate there are hints of cranberry, orange zest and rose water with well-balanced spices. The French oak provides a finish which is long, with notes of Earl Grey tea and poached pears.

name: TOMATIN - CUBOCAN IMPERIAL STOUT AND MOSCATEL WINE CASK
nameSanitized: tomatin - cubocan imperial stout and moscatel wine cask
nameSuffix: CUBOCAN IMPERIAL STOUT AND MOSCATEL WINE CASK
sort: TOMATIN - CUBOCAN IMPERIAL STOUT AND MOSCATEL WINE CASK
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
Creation #1: Black Isle Brewery Imperial Stout + Bacalhôa Moscatel De Setúbal Wine Casks. An unusually creative collaboration, this intriguing mix marries the best bits of its wine and beer counterparts; sweet and buttery with hints of orange marmalade and espresso. Imperial stout casks impart waxy and herbaceous notes of tobacco, coffee and leather, while Moscatel wine casks impart notes of orange marmalade, dried fruit and melted butter.

name: TOMATIN - CUBOCAN JAPANESE SHOCHU AND EUROPEAN VIRGIN OAK CA
nameSanitized: tomatin - cubocan japanese shochu and european virgin oak ca
nameSuffix: CUBOCAN JAPANESE SHOCHU AND EUROPEAN VIRGIN OAK CA
sort: TOMATIN - CUBOCAN JAPANESE SHOCHU AND EUROPEAN VIRGIN OAK CA
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
Creation #2: Japanese Shochu + European Virgin Oak Casks. An experiment where the Far East and Europe meet, this  innovative creation is rich and lively with hints of smoke  and key lime pie. Japanese shochu casks impart ethereal and estery notes of pear drops, sweet lime and earth, while European virgin oak casks impart full-bodied and warming notes of maple syrup, toasted walnuts and exotic spice.

name: TOMATIN - LEGACY
tastingDescription: False

name: TOMATIN - MONBAZILLAC CASK FC
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
Distilled on April 25, 2008, this whisky's aroma dances between notes of dark, maple syrup and intense espresso, balanced with cinnamon baked apples. On the palate, there is a sweet cereal flavour combined with sweet milk chocolate and honeycomb ahead of subtle spices and emerging nutty flavours. The finish is rich with walnut and maple syrup.

name: TOMATIN - RIVESALTES CASK FC
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
Distilled on September 19, 2008, this whisky marries Tomatin's characteristic fresh fruit notes incredibly well with the sweet nutty flavours for which Rivesaltes wine is known. Contrasting sweet and bitter flavours dominate the palate, held together by an underlying barley aroma. The finish is velvety with the flavours from the palate lingering for some time.

name: TOMATIN - SAUTERNES CASK FC
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
Distilled on September 19, 2008, this whisky brings a burst of peach and apricot on the nose, calmed by rich Manuka honey. The sweet honey continues on the palate accompanied by coconut and ginger. The finish is wonderfully sweet and fresh with a syrupy mouth feel indicative of the Sauternes wine that once occupied the cask.

name: TRIPLE SEC - HENKES
tastingDescription: Clear, light, and sweet, with mild orange notes.

name: TRIPLE SEC - MEAGHERS
tastingDescription: This fresh, orangey, aromatic liqueur balances bitter and sweet flavours and finishes warm and smooth. A natural in cocktails, it can also be enjoyed chilled.

name: TRIPLE SEC - MEAGHERS
tastingDescription: This fresh, orangey, aromatic liqueur balances bitter and sweet flavours and finishes warm and smooth. A natural in cocktails, it can also be enjoyed chilled.

name: TULLAMORE DEW
tastingDescription: Tullamore Dew's particular taste character depends on the correct balance of mature whiskeys blended together. Medium amber gold in colour, the nose shows a mild blend of spicy, lemony and malty notes, with charred wood and vanilla undertones. The warming palate of toasted wood, vanilla and hints of sweet spices is rounded out with light citrus fruitiness.

name: TULLAMORE DEW XO RUM FINISH
tastingDescription: An Original Triple Blend Irish whiskey, with an additional finish in XO Caribbean rum casks. Triple distilled, triple wood-matured and a triple blend. Medium golden amber colour with notes of vanilla, oak and citrus with a creamy smooth taste of deep caramel and a long sweet finish.

name: TULLIBARDINE - 15YO SINGLE MALT SCOTCH WHISKY
tastingDescription: Available starting November 13th in select stores

name: TWISTED SHOT - B52
tastingDescription: Creamy coffee and orange liqueurs are blended as they pour for a smooth, flavourful finish. Enjoy creamy sweet mocha flavour, with notes of orange and spice.

name: TWISTED SHOTZ - ISLAND THUNDER
tastingDescription: False

name: TWO BREWERS - YUKON SINGLE MALT WHISKY RELEASE 28
nameSanitized: two brewers - yukon single malt whisky release 28
sort: TWO BREWERS - YUKON SINGLE MALT WHISKY RELEASE 28
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
Two Brewers Release 28 is a sweet and savoury whisky with pulpy fruit and toasted oak. This dram explores the dusky tones of sherry barrel aging. A blend of some of their oldest sherry-finished whisky with some younger body \-building mash, and re-barrelled in older sherry barrels for over two years of mingling. The darker sherry tones are prominent, not necessarily fruity. This is enhanced by the Hungarian oak in the older Pedro Ximénez sherry casks.

name: UNCLE NEAREST - 1856 PREMIUM AGED TENNESSEE WHISKEY
nameSanitized: uncle nearest - 1856 premium aged tennessee whiskey
sort: UNCLE NEAREST - 1856 PREMIUM AGED TENNESSEE WHISKEY
tastingDescription:
"This whiskey shows a bombastic nose of maple candy, vanilla fudge, black tea, and toasted tangerine peel. In tasting, the spirit starts out with more indulgent flavors of honey and corn fritter before finishing with a pleasant kick of star anise spice."
92 Points, Ultimate Spirits Challenge 2019

name: UNGAVA - CANADIAN PREMIUM
tastingDescription: The unique colour of this spirit comes from the mix of Arctic sourced botanicals that include cloudberry, labrador tea, rose hip and more. Medium lemon yellow in colour; aromas of juniper, herbal tea, spice and tart fruit; dry and medium-bodied followed by a warm and spicy finish.

name: VAN GOGH - ESPRESSO
tastingDescription: "Delicious and very aromatic with dark chocolate and espresso notes and flavours coming though amazingly balanced on the palate. Serve in chilled glasses with a small amount of milk and ice for a decadent cool cocktail." - Adele Shaw, Category Manager for Spirits & Sake

name: VECCHIA ROMAGNA - BLACK LABEL
tastingDescription: Vecchia Romagna is made from a blend of wine spirits matured in small oak casks. The choice of the wine for the spirit is made from Trebbiano di Romagna grapes. The distillation technique and the maturing process are fundamental elements in creating the intense and harmonious bouquet that characterizes this brandy. It leads with powerful, rounded vanilla notes and finishes with lots of baking spice on the finish.

name: VECCHIA ROMAGNA TRE BOTTI - MONTENEGRO
tastingDescription: Made from the finest blend of distillates, which have been aged for up to 15 years. Round, soft and well-balanced, due to the combination of the woody notes of oak and toasted hazelnut with the sweet and fruity notes of almond brittle, vanilla, and tropical fruit, with hints of spice.

name: VICTORIA DISTILLERS - EMPRESS 1908 GIN
tastingDescription: 90 Points, Wine Enthusiast "This gin is vivid indigo-blue, thanks to an infusion of butterfly pea blossoms, and transforms to an attractive pink hue as tonic or citrus are added. The aroma is relatively neutral and the palate is mild and malty, with hints of coriander, orris root and white pepper. But it's really all about the eye-popping blue color and all the party tricks that can be performed with this gin. (Sept 2020)

name: VICTORIA DISTILLERS - EMPRESS 1908 GIN AND TONIC KIT
nameSanitized: victoria distillers - empress 1908 gin and tonic kit
sort: VICTORIA DISTILLERS - EMPRESS 1908 GIN AND TONIC KIT
tastingDescription: Live colourfully with Empress Gin and Fever-Tree tonic water duo.

name: VICTORIA DISTILLERS - EMPRESS GIN
tastingDescription: The classic juniper flavour of gin is joined by grapefruit, ginger and some orange peel. Watch it change colour from indigo to pink with the addition of tonic.

name: VICTORIA DISTILLERS - VICTORIA GIN
tastingDescription: This artisan gin is produced by hand in small batches at Victoria Spirits on Vancouver Island on Canada's West Coast, according to a recipe and formula developed at the distillery. Victoria Gin is all about aromatic balance. On the nose, there is faint sweetness elicited by the delicate spices coupled with the floral bouquet of rosebuds. The mouthfeel is smooth and soft on the palate. The characteristic juniper is apparent, but does not overwhelm the other botanicals, adding just a slight evergreen resiny character to the blend. The initial gentle sweetness is balanced by savory coriander. Light citrus notes of lemon and orange mingle at mid-palate with the more earthy tones of angelica and orris root. Tying the spirit together is the bouquet of the rosebuds that were first apparent in the nose; they add a floral component to finesse the mix. In the aftertaste, a hint of licorice brought by a star anise lingers as subtle cinnamon fades.

name: VILLA ONE - SILVER TEQUILA
tastingDescription: Villa One is an ultra-premium tequila founded by Nick Jonas and John Varvatos. Silver is bottled immediately on production to deliver a nose of cooked agave with fruit aromas. It features a continuous bouquet of dried fruit and nuts that meanders into a caramelized agave with a long, smooth finish.

name: VILLA ONE ANEJO - TEQUILA
tastingDescription: Villa One is an ultra-premium tequila founded by Nick Jonas and John Varvatos. Anejo is aged for more than twelve months in American oak barrels, resulting in a dark amber color, with notes of rich caramel, wood, vanilla wafer banana essences on the nose. It has a full-bodies mouthfeel and gives a rich and long lasting finish with notes of smoke, dark chocolate, and honey.

name: VINCENT VAN GOGH
tastingDescription: False

name: VINCENT VAN GOGH - ESPRESSO
tastingDescription: "Delicious and very aromatic with dark chocolate and espresso notes and flavours coming though amazingly balanced on the palate. Serve in chilled glasses with a small amount of milk and ice for a decadent cool cocktail." - Adele Shaw, Category Manager for Spirits & Sake

name: VIOLETTE - GIFFARD
tastingDescription: Very aromatic, floral, sweet and smooth liqueur made from the infusions of violet flowers and extracts of violet leaves. Perfectly served neat on the rocks, as an apertif with sparkling wine or in cocktails.

name: VOLCAN DE MI TIERRA - BLANCO TEQUILA
nameSanitized: volcan de mi tierra - blanco tequila
sort: VOLCAN DE MI TIERRA - BLANCO TEQUILA
tastingDescription: False

name: WATERFORD IRISH SINGLE MALT - ARCADIAN SERIES ORGANIC GAIA
nameSanitized: waterford irish single malt - arcadian series organic gaia
sort: WATERFORD IRISH SINGLE MALT - ARCADIAN SERIES ORGANIC GAIA
tastingDescription: Satsuma peel, aromatic florals and subtle aromatic spices are followed by fruit syrups and a hint of olive oil on the nose. It's clean and bright on the palate, with plenty of sweetness. The citrus, toffee and salted caramel flavours on the palate are disrupted by a shockwave of pepper, leaving tangy peels, hints of nuts and sour gooseberry in its wake before a finish of citrus and sweet barley.

name: WATERFORD IRISH SINGLE MALT - GAIA 1.2 ARCADIAN ORGANIC SERI
nameSanitized: waterford irish single malt - gaia 1.2 arcadian organic seri
sort: WATERFORD IRISH SINGLE MALT - GAIA 1.2 ARCADIAN ORGANIC SERI
tastingDescription: The colour is a deep copper, with unctuous oils and legs as slow as if one had made it to mile 26 of a marathon. Aromas of a rose bed after a summer shower, white pepper, rhubarb tart, salted caramel, popcorn, fudge, marshmallows, cherries and vine tomatoes. It tastes of white pepper, orange zest, almond, dates, lemon sherbet, liquorice, gentle maltiness and warm chocolate brownie, with a finish of warm spices that gently goes to leave a cherry biscuit note.

name: WATERFORD IRISH SINGLE MALT - SINGLE FARM ORIGIN BALLYMORGAN
nameSanitized: waterford irish single malt - single farm origin ballymorgan
sort: WATERFORD IRISH SINGLE MALT - SINGLE FARM ORIGIN BALLYMORGAN
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
In the  Mountains, Robert Milne exploits one of Ireland's premier barley terroirs. There's something about the spirit derived from Robert's barley in 2015. Aromas of dried herbs, malt, red apple, plums, milk chocolate, vanilla, fennel seeds and custard mark the nose. Flavours of apple crumble with toffee, milk chocolate, slight fudge, cloves, a green apple collated in caramel, with pepper heat and aniseed dominate the palate. Lingering spice heat with a mouth-watering oiliness that turns mouth-puckering.

name: WATERFORD IRISH SINGLE MALT - SINGLE FARM ORIGIN HOOK HEAD
nameSanitized: waterford irish single malt - single farm origin hook head
sort: WATERFORD IRISH SINGLE MALT - SINGLE FARM ORIGIN HOOK HEAD
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
Best in Class - San Francisco World Spirits Competition 2021.  The nose has citrus peel, clove, white pepper, caramel and salted popcorn. The palate is a spice bomb up front; with cloves, white pepper, liquorice, ginger biscuits, lemon zest, & chilli chocolate. The finish is dry, and holds the spiciness for a long time.

name: WATERFORD IRISH SINGLE MALT - SINGLE FARM ORIGIN LAKEFIELD
nameSanitized: waterford irish single malt - single farm origin lakefield
sort: WATERFORD IRISH SINGLE MALT - SINGLE FARM ORIGIN LAKEFIELD
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
Warm custard, bread baking, red apple, dried flowers, butter cream, and pine needles on the nose.  The palate has a gentle clove to start that leads into bread & malted biscuits, in the middle a pepperiness then honeydew melon & pears. The finish meanders along like a tributary to the start of a great river.

name: WATERFORD IRISH SINGLE MALT - SINGLE FARM ORIGIN SHEESTOWN
nameSanitized: waterford irish single malt - single farm origin sheestown
sort: WATERFORD IRISH SINGLE MALT - SINGLE FARM ORIGIN SHEESTOWN
tastingDescription: This opens with aromas of a freshly mown meadow that was not only covered with grass, but also with wild herbs and flowers. Fresh and floral with a hint of fresh yeast dough and marzipan. The taste is rich and very chocolatey, followed by toffee and milk coffee dusted with cinnamon. Dry wood, dried apricots, whereby the fruit notes have only a very subtle appearance. The finish shows a bit of peppery spiciness which is then softened again by cinnamon and coriander. Cold coffee with milk, coffee grounds, an indefinable sweetness.

name: WAYNE GRETZKY - CREAM LIQUOR
tastingDescription: The aromas and flavours of this cream liquor excite with rich notes of almond, cream, dark biscuit, nutmeg and toasted wafer. The mouth-feel is smooth, rich, sweet and creamy, with a long pleasing finish.

name: WAYNE GRETZKY - RED CASK WHISKY
tastingDescription: A remarkable blend produced from locally sourced grains and finished in red wine casks from the winery which impart a pale amber color. Expect a smooth and refined flavor profile that includes notes of marzipan, light citrus, vanilla, oak and spice; the finish is long, warming and balanced.

name: WAYNE GRETZKY - SALTED CARAMEL CREAM WHISKY
nameSanitized: wayne gretzky - salted caramel cream whisky
sort: WAYNE GRETZKY - SALTED CARAMEL CREAM WHISKY
tastingDescription: A delicate creamy tan in colour. The aromas and flavours of this cream liquor excite with rich notes of melted caramel, sweet cream and a hint of marshmallow and milk chocolate. The mouth-feel is smooth, rich, sweet and creamy, with a long pleasing finish.

name: WELLER - CYPB
tastingDescription:
"....Cracker Jack and butterscotch sweetness appear on the nose, with cedary oak and black cherry soda lurking just beneath. On the palate, the flavors are bold, mouthwatering, and juicy, like dark berry fruit sprinkled with baking spices and spearmint. This has big impact, but is also delightfully drinkable, as the finish delivers citrus oil, stone fruit, and blackberry."
90 points -  Whisky Advocate  2020 
1 Bottle limit.

name: WELLER - FULL PROOF
tastingDescription:
"Fragrant lemon and dried herbs on the nose... The palate offers deep notes of blackberry compote, tiramisu, and milk chocolate, all underpinned by earthy tones of cedar and polished oak. A rich symphony of flavor punctuates the long, impressive finish...."
93 points Whisky Advocate Spring 2020
1 Bottle limit.

name: WELLER - SINGLE BARREL
tastingDescription:
Weller Single Barrel has a nose of cherry and mint, fading to vanilla.  Caramel and baking spices with hints of cocoa explode on the palate, with a finish of cinnamon, coffee, and a hint of pepper.
96 pts, Extraordinary, Ultimate Recommendation, Ultimate Spirits Competition 2021
1 Bottle limit.

name: WELLER - SPECIAL RESERVE
tastingDescription: A sweet nose with a presence of caramel. Tasting notes of honey, butterscotch, and a soft woodiness. It's smooth, delicate and calm. Features a smooth finish with a sweet honeysuckle flair.

name: WELLER 12 YEAR OLD BOURBON
tastingDescription:
"A bourbon with a decadent nose of orange cake, candied pecan, toffee, and cinnamon candy. In the mouth the spirit is lush and effusive giving more confectionary notes before finishing with a light baking spice note."
93 pts, Excellent, Highly Recommended, Ultimate Spirits Challenge 2021
1 Bottle limit.

name: WESTLAND - AMERICAN SINGLE MALT
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
The fruity aromas are bright and high toned, calling to mind lemon zest and yellow nectarines. Delicate floral flavors enhance the soft mouthfeel which becomes rich with nutmeg and raw cocoa on the suede like finish.

name: WESTLAND - COLERE EDITION 1
tastingDescription:
"Smoked grains, sea salt, and red bell pepper are fresh and lively aromas. The flavors open up with sweet pastry before turning intensely nutty with roasted tobacco, coffee, and crunchy butter toffee. The finish is long and aromatic with floral undertones. Absolutely scrumptious."
93 pts, Excellent, Ultimate Spirits Challenge 2021

name: WHITE LIGHTNING - MAX VODKA
tastingDescription: While White Lightning Max’s iconic name and label reflect the rebellious nature of the infamous “moonshine,” this 100-proof vodka is distilled with precision from Canadian wheat and pure Rocky Mountain spring water specially filtered for purity to create a smooth and clean tasting vodka.

name: WHITE LIGHTNING - MAX VODKA
tastingDescription: Lightning Max's iconic name and label reflect the rebellious nature of the infamous "moon shine".  This 50% alc. vodka is distilled with precision from Canadian wheat and pure Rocky Mountain spring water. Charcoal filtered for purity, creates a smooth clean tasting vodka.

tastingDescription: This much-awarded, crystal clear Alberta rye whisky is made from a blend of 10-year-old wheat whiskies and younger rye whiskies. Triple charcoal-filtered and oak-aged, it's smooth, mellow and slightly sweet with butterscotch, citrus and spice notes. It is a great sipping whisky or use in cocktails in place of rum or vodka.

name: WHITLEY NEILL - RHUBARB & GINGER GIN
tastingDescription: Inspired by the glory of English country gardens, the essence of rhubarb adds a tart, crisp edge to the smooth English Gin base, whilst the ginger extract warms the palate for a full bodied finish.

name: WHYTE AND MACKAY - SPECIAL

name: WIDOW JANE - 10 YEAR OLD BOURBON

name: WILD TURKEY - 101
tastingDescription: The flagship mark, Wild Turkey 101 is a marriage of 6 to 9-year-old bourbons. Wild Turkey 101 has less water added, giving it a fuller and more pure bourbon taste – it’s higher proof for more flavour. Its nose is gentle yet rich, revealing deep vanilla and oak, and a slight hint of oranges and toffee. It’s deep rich amber in colour, with a rich and powerful palate that explodes with vanilla, caramel, honey and a hint of tobacco. The finish is extremely long, deep and smooth with a recognizable burn.

name: WILD TURKEY - 81 PROOF
tastingDescription: 92 Points & Best Buy, Wine Enthusiast - “This Kentucky Bourbon is aged up to six to eight years in “alligator charred” barrels, yielding honey-vanilla aromatics and mouthwatering, rounded maple and vanilla notes that close out with clove and cinnamon spark.” (November 2014)

name: WILD TURKEY - KENTUCKY SPIRIT SINGLE BARREL
nameSanitized: wild turkey - kentucky spirit single barrel
sort: WILD TURKEY - KENTUCKY SPIRIT SINGLE BARREL
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
"This is an indulgent spirit showing a massive nose of spiced walnuts, pecan pastry, toasted cinnamon, and dried peach. The palate is equally generous with admirable density and very little heat from the elevated proof."
92 pts, Excellent, Highly Recommended, Ultimate Spirits Challenge 2021
1 Bottle limit.

name: WILD TURKEY - LONGBRANCH
tastingDescription: In Kentucky, the only thing more important than bourbon is family. Honouring the long branches of their family trees reaching from the Bluegrass to the Lone Star state, Matthew McConaughey and Master Distiller Eddie Russell present their rare, small-batch bourbon. Aged for a minimum of 8 years, the whiskey is refined with Texas Mesquite and oak charcoals to deepen the flavour and complexity. The result is an exceptional bourbon with subtle hints of smoke and spice.

name: WILD TURKEY - MASTER'S KEEP ONE
tastingDescription: Master's Keep One is a unique spirit that reflects the distinct philosophies of the two Russell distillers responsible for a combined 107 years of experience at Wild Turkey Distilling Co. It embodies their distinct yet parallel philosophies-combining Jimmy's love of mid-aged bourbons (8 to 10 years) with Eddie's passion for complex characteristics that come with bourbons aged longer. Notes of toasted and charred oak result in an enticing aroma of sweet honey and brown spice, with bold vanilla, butterscotch, and caramel that evolve into a fresh and lingering toasted oak finish.

name: WILD TURKEY MASTER'S KEEP - CORNERSTONE
tastingDescription: Master’s Keep Cornerstone Rye is the fourth release in the Master’s Keep series, and the oldest rye whiskey ever released by Wild Turkey. For this one-of-a-kind limited edition, master distiller Eddie Russell hand-picked and set aside a secret lot of his oldest and boldest rye whiskey barrels, all aged from 9 to 11 years, then used his nearly four decades of experience to create a perfectly balanced spirit. Aromas of vanilla, black pepper and toasted rye give way to cascading flavours of honey and baked apple before a long and lingering finish of spice and oak.

name: WISER'S - SPECIAL BLEND
tastingDescription: A smooth mellow Canadian whisky that reveals a deep gold color and suggests a hint of spice, vanilla, and oak. Its subtle sweetness delivers a full finish that is clean and compact.

name: WISER'S - SPECIAL BLEND
tastingDescription: A smooth mellow Canadian whisky that reveals a deep gold color and suggests a hint of spice, vanilla, and oak. Its subtle sweetness delivers a full finish that is clean and compact.

tastingDescription: Batch 375 is the third small-batch release from Wolfburn. Batch 375 has been crafted from spirit matured for four and a half years in half-size first-fill bourbon casks, married together with a smaller proporion matured in second-fill Oloroso sherry hogsheads. The resulting whisky is rich and complex in flavour, with a beautifully sweet and aromatic nose and lingering finish.

name: WOODFORD RESERVE - DISTILLERS SELECT
tastingDescription: The entry is sweet caramel and vanilla, then gradually honey, citrus, oak spice and the fruitiness of rye come out in this smooth bourbon. Some tobacco and leather linger on the smooth finish.

name: WOODFORD RESERVE - DISTILLERS SELECT
tastingDescription: 93 Points, Wine Enthusiast - “Look for a gorgeous copper hue with orange highlights, a butterscotch-like aroma and soft feel. This Bourbon offers lots of fruit on the palate—orange, apricot, tropical fruit—that finish long, with caramel and a bracing burnt-orange peel note.” (September 2014)

name: WOODFORD RESERVE - DOUBLE OAKED
tastingDescription: 93 Points, Wine Enthusiast - “For a warm and comforting sipper on a chilly evening, this is a fine way to go. This honey-hued Bourbon has a big, powerful, sweet caramel aroma, and a rich mix of buttery, oaky and toasty flavors.” (July 2012)

name: WOODFORD RESERVE - KENTUCKY DERBY
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
Woodford Reserve, the presenting sponsor of the Kentucky Derby, is honouring "The Greatest Two Minutes in Sports" with the release of its 2021 commemorative Derby bottle. It features the artwork of Louisville resident Richard Sullivan, a former professional baseball player. Sullivan's stunning watercolor is of thoroughbreds as they thunder down the stretch.

name: WOODFORD RESERVE - MASTERS COLLECTION VERY FINE RARE BOURBON

tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
This year's expression marks the 15th release of the Master's Collection, which was created to honor the many discoveries and innovations that occurred at the 1812 distillery site where Woodford Reserve is now located. The bourbon includes liquid from barrels that are 17-years-old and date to 2003, the year Chris Morris was named Master Distiller. Layers of rich oak sweet aromatic notes, caramel, brown sugar, chocolate, vanilla merge into a cured tobacco character brightened with apple fruit.
1 Bottle limit.

name: WULIANGYE
tastingDescription: Wu Liang Ye liquor is praised as the magic liquor of China. Distilled from 5 choice fermented grains including sorghum, glutinous rice, rice, wheat and corn, by adopting traditional techniques, Wu Liang Ye liquor is uniquely characterized by “lasting aroma, mellow and luscious taste, harmonious and just-right flavor”, which enables it to be a category leader among the liquor products of today. Wu Liang Ye liquor was awarded the gold prize “National Famous Liquor.” In 1991, Wu Liang Ye liquor was named one of the “Top 10 Well-known Trademarks” of China. As of today, Wu Liang Ye liquor has been awarded 39 international gold prizes.

name: WULIANGYE - JIAOBEI
tastingDescription: This aged top Wu Liang Ye Jaiobei is a great product from the Wu Liang Ye family.

name: WYBOROWA RYE GRAIN
tastingDescription: It is the Polish rye that gives the classic well-recognised Wyborowa vodka its distinct, iconic taste. A delicate texture with clear notes of Brazil nut, wholemeal bread, subtle sweetness and balanced creaminess. Exceptionally smooth and versatile in a fresh, new bottle. Voted Top Ten Best Selling Vodka, Drinks International 2020.

name: YAMAZAKI - 12YO
tastingDescription:
"The first thing you notice is the elegant fragrance of lychee, spring blossoms, lily, rosewater, and raspberry meringue. Deeper in, grassy notes with star fruit, kumquat, and kaffir lime leaves. The flavors offer perfection in their simplicity: silky honey, soft spices, crystalized pineapple, barley sugar, lemon, and orange. On the finish, the spices chatter on and on as the sweet citrus and honey fade in and out. One to cherish."
93 pts, Whisky Advocate 2018
1 Bottle limit.

name: YANTAIGUNIANG
tastingDescription: Yantaigunian is an exquisite spirit series created by a century-old company in Yantai, a coastal city in China. Not only has it been a popular choice for the Chinese, it has gained international recognition and has been consistently ranked as the #1 Chinese spirit sales in Korea. With its pure taste and superb quality, Yantaiguniang is certainly becoming one of the favourites in the liquor market.

name: YELLOW CRANE TOWER - 135
tastingDescription: With a thick aroma of grains, it is clear in colour and harmoniously sweet, soft, mellow in taste.

name: YELLOWSTONE - SELECT 93 PROOF
tastingDescription:
A delicate fusion of flavours from seventh-generation distillers, this straight bourbon features a handpicked blend of 4-year-old and 7-year-old bourbons for an exclusive old-fashioned whiskey that honours its deep family origins.
Double Gold Medal, San Francisco Spirit Competition 2019

name: YELLOWSTONE PRIVATE - SINGLE BARREL 2021
tastingDescription:
Available starting November 13th in select stores
Exclusive cask bottling for BCLIQUOR. You will find aromas of dark ripe cherries and toasty vanilla. A complex whiskey with layers ranging from, creamy caramel, baking spices, dry mocha, toasty nuttiness with an underlying tinge of smoke. Caramelised sugar and spicy dry notes linger on the finish.

name: YOUNG - OLD SAM DEMERARA
tastingDescription: Full on molasses, marmalade, cigar box, oaky barrel notes (vanilla, toffee, coffee, chocolate), dried fruits (sultana raisins, dates, prunes), a little nutty and smoky. On the palate sweet brown notes: dark brown sugar, English toffee, leather, tobacco. Lots of baking spices coming through (nutmeg, cloves, cinnamon), walnuts, orange peel, dried fruits – figs, dates, raisins. Sweet and spicy, yet very soft and smooth at the same time.

name: YUKON JACK

name: ZAYA - GRAN RESERVA

Enjoy this luxury rum of 12 different rare rums that are carefully selected and blended by the Zaya master blender to achieve the delicate balance and unique profile of Zaya Gran Reserva. Some of these rare rums are up to 18 years old. Nose: Rich and sweet caramel, vanilla, cocoa, banana. Palate: Vanilla, caramel cocoa, apples, bananas, cherry. Finish: Heavy, velvety, smooth.

tastingDescription: Experience cider done the Big Rock way, striking just the right balance between dry and sweet. All ciders are based on traditional European recipes, briskly carbonated and totally refreshing! As you drink this, you may puzzle over how we managed to brew a cider that is equal parts crisp, fruity and refreshing. While it’s based on a traditional European recipe, the real difference is in the apples themselves. Our four flavourful varieties— Bulmers, Norman, Belle de Boskoop and Bramley— are all grown exclusively in Western Canada’s very own fruit orchard, the Okanagan. Discover the hints of vanilla and cinnamon we add as you enjoy the clean, bright colour of sunrise in the Rockies.
